links_reviews_text: I sized down, per reviews. Glad I did, even a size down was very roomy and comfortable. I did not get the belt, but I don't think it needed it. Very light material, but thick enough to be flattering. Pairs great with white pants!

This top is amazing!! I rented this to go to a Saturday afternoon ballet in FL. I normally wear a small or medium in tops. I got both small and medium in this top and the small fit amazing! I saw some reviews that complained about the top being too big and or not having a belt. I suggest sizing down since I tried the small on and it fit perfect. It was a little bit fitted while the sleeve was still billowing and beautiful. The material is lightweight and the color is striking.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic top for curvy mamas. Flows nicely and hides problem areas.
links_reviews_text: Loved this top so much I wore it three times. Would have worn it more if I had more places to go. I have wide hips and a post baby bump that isn't going anywhere. It flows really nicely, hiding the areas I'm not as fond of, while flattering my best qualities. It's more of a royal blue and it worked with black pants. I liked it most with 3/4 length pants.

links_reviews_title: This top is Great!! Loved everything about it.
links_reviews_text: So comfortable. Even if its to big it looks great. Loved the length and the colors!
Love how different this is from anything else in my closet and I could wear a bra under it. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Colors are gorgeous and the fabric feels great
links_reviews_text: Would definitely rent again looks great with white capris. Slimming and flattering.
I was missing the belt, but perfect with white jeans.

The top arrived without the belt, which seems to be a trend from the comments. No time to get a new one with it, so made it work. It looked cute loose also, though not super figure flattering that way. I tried white leggings, but the high side was too high up on my thigh to feel comfortable showing that much white legging leg (I'm tall), so paired with dark blue skinny jeans and flats for the theater. It's unique and eye catching and I felt cute wearing it ... though one arm was cold! ;) Rated a 3 vs 4 because of the belt thing.
Fun, lightweight dress! Could double as a bathing suit coverup. Perfect for an afternoon around the pool. The length is shorter on one side...maybe a little too short for me.
I loved wearing this, so feminine! Hubby loved it too. Looked great with white capris.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments about this shirt.
links_reviews_text: This shirt fit perfectly for what I wanted. It's a little long and I wore it as a dress with leggings underneath, which was what I was hoping for. It's a very comfortable fabric and breathable. I loved it. I might even buy it.

links_reviews_title: Fun cut and print, material felt heavier than I expected.
links_reviews_text: Runs large
This was perfect! Sleeve was a bit long but otherwise amazing. Great for my shower. Lots of compliments. Great with white pants.

The tie can be a bit tricky at first, but once I figured out how to get myself into this top I really liked it. I also liked that the open shoulder side is adjustable. I wore a strapless bra with this top. The pattern is super fun and bright. It was perfect for Easter brunch with the family. Runs true to size.
Amazing in every way. Can't stop wearing it. Considering purchasing.

The only, and I mean only, complaint I have about this shirt is that it was missing the belt shown in the picture. I called RTR and they sent another shirt out, but it was also missing the belt. I still wore it and it was quite pretty. It does run large, so I suggest getting one size smaller than you think you need.

This is such a pretty top! Like other reviewers, mine came without the belt - but that can be remedied with a ribbon or worn without. Hollywood fashion tape helps it stay in place with such a big neckline. Love this top! I wish RTR had a way to really zoom in - seams and details are important.
Wore this a few times with a few different bottoms and enjoyed them all.

This is fantastic, but it's the second time I rented it and it came without the sash both times. The first time, I sent it back, but dreamed of it, so I rented again. It came without the sash again. So without the sash, it can't be worn as shown in the picture. However, I still wore it with white shorts and it looked like a risque dress.

links_reviews_title: The top is much cuter than I thought it would be! Unfortunately it arrived WITHOUT the belt.
links_reviews_text: Since there is a belt loop on the outside of the top that dangles out, I can't even try to pull it off without the belt. Too bad.

It has some stretch to it, but since it is a relaxed fit, it didn't even matter. I love that the strap is adjustable! I wore this to a dinner and an after-party and was very comfortable. My first order arrived without the belt that is pictured, but RTR sent another one with the belt.
I was stopped by multiple people complimenting this outfit. I wore it on a cruise, as a dress, but I'm only 5'3"
Too big to wear.

A colleague actually told me I looked like I was heading for a cruise. (I was not.) A fun one but a bit over the top. Maybe mine was extra flowy since it was missing the belt sash. Also you can see in to your whole side flank when you raise your arm.
Wanted to like this to wear with white pants but it was just too overwhelming on me. The fabric is nice but the asymmetry on this didn't work.

links_reviews_title: Wore the tunic as a dress
links_reviews_text: The tunic ran a little big, I could have worn the 1x but decided to go with the 2x and wore it as a dress. I'm 5'6" so I was pleasantly surprised that it worked out to wear as a dress. It was super cute!

links_reviews_title: Great top - wore it on a cruise for dinner/drinks/casino.
links_reviews_text: Overall very nice, great material - little hard to figure out the string/belt part. I ended up wearing it on the side. I ordered a size too big so it slid a little on the sleeveless side. But color and shape were perfect. With a lot of these types of shirts I find they come down to low, but this one was the perfect coverage.

links_reviews_title: I love this! Flattering, Flirty, and Perfect!
links_reviews_text: I adored this one. It's long on me b/c I'm only 5 '1 and at 173 lbs I'm full-figured. As such, many garments are hit or miss for me with more tending to be misses. That said, this one is SO flattering and fun. I feel so good in it that I ended up purchasing it. At my height and a 1x the shirt fits me more like a sundress which is absolutely perfect. If I put a heel on, and a pant it would work, too, but I prefer it as a dress. : )

links_reviews_title: super comfy perfect for a vaca
links_reviews_text: ran big but can adjust strap and tie strap is just wide enough to hide a bra strap
Fit perfectly with white capris
This top runs huge. There is a lot of fabric and could easily be worn as a dress.
The fabric is very good quality and the color is vibrant. I loved the style of one side draping like a kimono and the other sleeveless. The length is a little long. Wore with white, narrow pants.

links_reviews_title: Trying a new look for vacation.
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little loose but still flattering. Only problem was in the strap that was as tight as it could go but just didnt hold up as well as it could have. It may fit differently on others. I bought white capris leggings to copy the model and I loved the whole outfit.
Beautiful colors-comfortable, attractive fit. Generous sizing. Tons of compliments on this top. Highly recommend.
Really lovely. I paired with white jeans. Good fit...feels expensive and classy.
Strap is adjustable - genius! Fabric is silky soft, but not sheer. Almost long enough to be a dress on its own.
I feel incredible in this top!! Love it.

This dress was perfect for beach maternity photos. The material is stretchy but hits in all the right spots to show off and flatter any bump! Would highly recommend this dress - you can easily dress it up or down

This dress is sooo comfortable & sexy for us expecting mamas. I'm 7.5 months pregnant and feel like I could have rented it even next month, with the stretch that it offers. Very happy with this rental and would recommend to others.

This dress looks awesome from the side - great fit, hugs everything really well. A lot of reviewers talk ab the weird slit so wanted to show it from the front. It definitely shows a lot of leg. Worth the rental for the beautiful side profile, but the wide slit would only work if your legs are ready to be fully shown

this was a great maternity dress for a more formal wedding. the material is stretchy and comfortable. The dress DOES run a bit small, but it fit my petite frame very well. I am 27 weeks pregnant in this photo. Once you get past the seam placement it really is a beautiful dress. Compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: It's great if you size up!
links_reviews_text: I sized up 2 sizes based on reviews and it was perfect! So comfy for an outdoor evening wedding on the beach at 35 weeks prego. I got lots of compliments. Loved it!

Dress does run small and I sized up for my backup ordering small and medium. Ended up wearing the medium. I am 38 weeks and about 142lbs. The dress worked well for the event and was easy to dress up. The side with the slit is a little odd since the rouched seam sits on the side of your belly. This almost makes it look like maybe the dress doesn't fit. Overall not a bad maternity dress comfortable with some simple features to make it more dressy.

links_reviews_title: Nice Dress But Runs Very Small
links_reviews_text: The dress was really nice and comfortable, however I spent most of the day adjusting it cause it pulled a bit weird across my body. I'm 4.5 months pregnant and the large was almost too small. Typically a medium. Recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes and avoiding later in pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: From the reviews I thought this was a more formal dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is ribbed cotton and not appropriate for the wedding I rented it for.

Literally my favorite dress. I've had it my whole pregnancy. Fit me at 6 months to the end... a little tight at the end, but so it everything. So flattering. You can dress it up and down! Color is vibrant and looks so new.
I rented this dress for a vacation and a wedding rehearsal dinner. It was comfortable, made me feel great at 23 weeks pregnant, and I wore it multiple times. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Easy and put together pregnant look
links_reviews_text: The slit was far too high to be able to wear this to work, but I wore it for days running out and doing errands, seeing family and friends, etc. The arms holes were a little tight - not too tight, but may have been if I got my current M size; glad I sized up. I'm almost 18 weeks and don't really have a bump yet, but this accentuated the teeny tiny bump that I do have, which is nice! I didn't wear a bra because the dress was pretty tight and supportive on its own. Overall pretty great, only reason I'm sending it back now is because I can't also wear it as a work dress!
Runs small and slit is far too long for work. Could look nice for an event, but too scandalous for a professional woman seeing patients all day.
Great soft dress that made be feel sexy enough for my preggo body.
Comfortable cotton material but the vertical striping on the dress is sort of all over the place and the slit went at an uncomfortable angle towards the crotch area

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this, so can't say!
links_reviews_text: Very tight and small - I should have ordered a Medium, whereas all the other Small dresses I ordered fit well.

links_reviews_title: Loved this easy to wear flattering dress
links_reviews_text: This is another Hutch gem. Loved the round skirt, flowing and flattering. Fun to wear on a spring/summer day and effortlessly elegant.
Love the ties on top - very unique! And it fit so well!
This dress was lovely and perfect for dancing. Classy and beautiful

I loved this dress and got so many compliments on it. It's very summery and perfect for a brunch or shower. The ties on the shoulders add such a nice touch and the whole dress was sturdy and had an underlay to keep it from looking cheap. Flattering and pretty pattern with the seersucker stripes.
Dress fit ok. Not overly flattering on my body type. Slightly small in the chest

I had such fun wearing this dress! Full skirt with lots of material with also pockets and lots of twirl potential. It is more of a casual style and material, so it can be dressed down easily for a day of low-key fun but you still feel the urge to dress up. Longer than I usually go, and my usual size actually felt a bit loose, but I didn't have a second size to compare it against, so I am rating it as "true to size."

I enjoyed wearing this dress during vacation in Maine. The fit is true to size. I needed help from my husband with zipping up the dress, since the zipper was getting stuck in the waist area. I liked the ropey part the you can untie and adjust. The full skirt was fun! However, the dress has some extra fabric in the tummy area and I almost looked pregnant (which I was not). I ended up wearing this dress twice.

I rented this dress to wear to my brother's wedding shower and it was absolutely adorable. The ties are made of a hard, gauzy like material but can look nice with help from a friend. Because I'm so broad, I'm usually a 6 and sometimes even an 8 in dresses that zip all the way up the back. Because this dress had adjustable shoulders and a V-back, I ordered a 6 and a backup size 4. I wore the 4 and still had room to move. Size down for your back up FOR SURE! It was a float dress that was easy to move, sit, and help in. Highly recommend for a day time event!

I absolutely love this dress. I loved it so much that I rented the size 10 after trying it on in the store. Everyone who saw it complimented me. I knew I needed a size smaller but it still looked great. I've ordered the 8 and will wear it again.

I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and wore the 2. It fit perfectly. Because of the cut, it's roomy in the stomach and is great at hiding that area. It also has adjustable ties at the shoulders so also makes it easy to adjust for a larger or smaller bust. Not too low for the chest. Super cute and conservative enough for work. My boyfriend loved it and I got a bunch of compliments from women. The print is seersucker. The shoulder ties were a little difficult to tie and make look nice. This is great for a more casual event. I ordered it for my friend's summertime wedding rehearsal dinner and it's definitely too casual for that event. I would probably rent this again.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful wedding, fun times and great friends.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress but it had a few drawbacks. I'm usually a 6 or 8 in dresses and I wore a 6 to my event but the bodice was a bit loose. There's a lot of fabric in the skirt (it's a full circle skirt with a layer underneath) which made it a bit heavy but the fabric was breathable. Dress was a bit loose for a size 6 on me so I would suggest sizing down if you're usually between two sizes.
I got so many compliments on this dress! Fits like a glove and very comfortable. The pockets are a great feature.

links_reviews_title: Loved how sweet I felt in it
links_reviews_text: Great fit! You feel held together.
I didn't wear this. The straps didn't tie well. It was uneventful.
The dress is cute but the style makes you think it would be light weight. It was too much fabric for me, especially around the midsection. It made me look pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Wore to brunch in the city
links_reviews_text: Was a little tight in the top but I'm a bit chesty. Was flowy made me feel pretty and sophisticated

links_reviews_title: Super nice dress with cute touch
links_reviews_text: Worn it for a date with my husband. Super cute and great fit. Would love to rent again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Overall this dress was very flattering and comfortable. It even had pockets!
links_reviews_text: The only reason I gave this dress 4 stars and not 5 was because I thought it was more of a pink chiffon material but instead it’s a reddish seersucker, which worked fine for the dress rehearsal I went to. It fit great and I got so many compliments on it but it’s definitely a summertime dress.
Loved this dress. Can dress it up or wear casually. Straps are adjustable for a short or long torso. Felt very feminine. Plus....pockets! Great length if you are medium height and above.

This dress is a bit heavy so chose not to wear it on a super hot day but saved it for a day in the mid 80s and it was perfect! While it's heavy it's still super comfortable and it's so flattering and got so many compliments on it.
The dress fit well overall and has a very full skirt. The seersucker fabric was great for a hot summer day!

Fit: -runs true to size -shows a bit of cleavage, but you can wear a white tank underneath and it doesn't take away from the look -my one complaint about this dress was that it made me look rounder than other similar dresses from RTR; not sure what it was about the fit Fabric: -it looks pink but it's actually red and white striped -thick, high-quality material + lining Style: -retro chic -loved the white straps tied at the shoulders
I wore this for a graduation event. It is attractive but very puffy.

links_reviews_title: Light, airy summer dress with adjustable straps!
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress for girls who have some junk in the trunk (like myself). Form fitting at the waist with almost no give, it has pockets you can actually put things in without it looking bulky. I am 5'1" and it hit right at the midi-length. The straps are adjustable so they are perfect for those who have shorter torsos or are less busty. Would absolutely rent again!
Love it!
I love this dress, and it's great for nursing too! The fit was perfect, and it flared just right - that it hid my post-baby tummy!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, but wanted to love it more than I did on me
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress a lot, but think it would have looked better on me if the length was a little shorter. At my 5'3" height, the longer length plus the full skirt made me look a little wide
This was really large on me and looked frumpy. Very nice fabric for summer, and it has pockets!

Seersucker at its best with this fit and flair. Full skirt was fun and flirty. Hits at the waist and although not tight the side zipper was a little tough to get past the fabric transition by oneself. Ties at the shoulder topped of this adorable summer dress.
I got this as a backup dress for a wedding and it was a nicely cut pink seersucker perfect for Summer! My first dress fit well and I didn't even get a chance to try this one on!

links_reviews_title: Runs large. Shoulder ties are awkward
links_reviews_text: Cute fit but runs large and feels a bit matronly. The shoulder ties are very difficult to make look cute.
This dress is made of a really nice material. I'm only 5'5 and the skirt just overwhelmed me. I think this dress would be stunning on a taller person.

i'm typically a 4 with a large waist and this had a a touch of room so if you're btwn sizes consider sizing down. the fabric doesn't have stretch, but is v comfortable. hit a few inches below the knee. very comfortable. great to have pockets. no bra or strapless works well. highly recommend

I loved everything about this dress except the bows at the shoulders. They seemed so much larger "in person" than in the photo and just seemed too young for me. The cut was fabulous for an hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, good length provides flexibility.
links_reviews_text: This dress is really cute and perfect for summer. I wore it for a brunch and loved it. I liked that it wasn't skin tight so it didn't stick to my skin even though it was really hot. The zipper is not great. It required 4 hands and got stuck in the middle. I liked that the bows are adjustable so that I could lower the dress and customize the fit around my ribcage. The length was great since it didn't require me to be cautious of any activity-riding bikes, bending over, sitting on a high stool. I received many compliments and would gladly rent again. Since I'm petite I usually veer toward shorter hemlines but this one is so fun. It has a bounce like Baby's dress at the end of Dirty Dancing!

This dress was a pleasure to wear! My favorite thing was how it felt very flowy around my legs as I walked, and the sear-sucker fabric is so light the skirt lifts out as you walk downstairs. Fit note - It runs just a tiny bit large. I generally wear either a 2 or a 4 so I would have expected the 2 to fit snugly around the waist, but it was pleasantly unrestrictive. It looked nipped in at the waist and I thing that is the intended fit. I would not size down. I have a long torso and the ties at the shoulders allow you to adjust the length just a bit so it his right at my natural waist.
This a cute and well-constructed dress, but it is a lot of fabric. I'm between an 8 and 10 and got the 10, the 8 would have been better because of the amount of fabric.
I loved this dress!! Waist cutout is sexy but classy, totally comfortable to wear

This dress got a lot of compliments!! It was perfect for a winter wedding. It went great with strappy black heels! The sleeves were not stretchy but the solid part of the dress was. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. I felt like Grace Kelly!
links_reviews_text: Lovely and classic, I chose the 8 rather than the six to have s not more room. There were s few snags in the lace sleeves from wear but nothing so bad that it was noticeable to anyone else. I would consider buying this dress. It got lots of compliments.
Found this really fitting well

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a wedding and was comfortable from sitting to dancing the night away.
links_reviews_text: Fits me a glove. It was a little tough to zipper over the lace and would be difficult if you were getting dressed alone. Perfect for a cold January wedding.

links_reviews_title: I would love to own this dress
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress. Felt incredibly comfortable and confident. There is a little bit of lace at the tummy, but it doesn’t really show much unless you lift your arms. I liked that. Complements an hour glass figure.

links_reviews_title: Unique little black dress for winter!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a November wedding where the temperature was in the 40's. The material is thick, so it felt great in that regard. The lace is gorgeous too. Many of the reviews said to size up, so I ordered a 6 & an 8 (I usually am a 4 or 6). I found the 6 to even be a little baggy. It wasn't horrible, so I still wore it, but I wish it was a bit tighter. Because of this paired with the length & long sleeves, it felt a little 'funeral' and not very wedding to me. I wore it any way and still got a ton of compliments. I think the 4 would've been perfect!

This was an amazing dress for a fall event. It was a LITTLE too formal for my purposes so I fabric taped the top up a little to make it more of a crop top and it was perfect. I felt so confident and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a friend's fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: I typically have trouble finding dresses that fit and are flattering for my bust. I was able to wear a strapless with this dress and was comfortable for the night. The sleeves were perfect for a fall wedding.
Dress was incredibly comfortable and fit so well! Lace detail was not constricting and the overall cut was very flattering

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a New Year's Eve party! I highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: This dress was exactly what I wanted. It fit comfortably and I was able to dance the night away. Fit great and got lots of compliments.

This dress was very comfortable (the lace was not itchy at all), and it fit true to size. I am 5'4" and 130lbs, for reference, and wore the size 4. I received many compliments. Perfect for a Christmas Party!

This dress was gorgeous and I received so many compliments on it. I wore it to a work holiday party. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a classy but still sexy dress. Very beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress was a little big on me and I probably should have ordered two sizes BUT, the fit was very comfortable and perfect for a cocktail party. The material is thicker so it does not wrinkle super easy. There is a little structure to the front of the skirt on the dress which makes the front fall flattering.

I loved this dress! Unique, fun, comfortable and made me feel confident. I ordered the 12 and the 14 and there was very little difference in the sizing in the skirt, it was definitely form fitting for the fuller hips but had enough stretch. I was able to wear a strapless black bra without issue. I would rent this again in a second.

Overall my experience with rtr was good. Dresses arrived a day late and right arm had a small hole in sleeve. Customer service comped me a little for the inconvenience. Loved the dress, received lots of compliments. Zipper was a little difficult to get up when fabric changed. Would definitely rent again.

Rent this dress for an elegant feel with a trendy twist! I'm not usually a fan of fitted dresses but the lace detail alone is worth it. Don't be afraid of the sleeves being too tight, as there was a comfortable amount of room on top. However, curvier women should consider sizing up as it was very fitted in the hips and midsection, with no stretch in the fabric. You'll also want to take into consideration that this dress requires a strapless bra since the lace is sheer. Overall, it's the perfect way to make a statement while still staying fairly conservative.

links_reviews_title: Fit was great. Very nice material. Length hit just below the knee.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8 but fit very comfortably in the 6
Fit perfectly, was perfect length for tall women (I'm 5'9"). Wore to a night wedding, would be great for cocktail party, holiday party or date night as well!

I loved the quality of this dress and the lace added just the right amount of sexy for a wedding. I ended up wearing a size bigger than normal to be comfortable to sit down and move around, but because of that, I did feel the shoulders and arms were big on me, therefore, not getting the true affect the torso lace should have given. A RTR must!

Great winter wedding dress. The mid section reveal is less pronounced than it appeared on the model image (which worked for the conservative wedding I attended). The top is snug enough that I was able to go without a bra.

links_reviews_title: I just recently had a baby and this dress made me feel sexy for the first time in over a year!
links_reviews_text: This dress ran true to size. I had to size up because I am breastfeeding and I needed a little extra room. Looked amazing. High quality fabric. Would love to wear it again.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress! I absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great fit and felt true to size.

links_reviews_title: So glad I went with RTR! Saved me a lot of aggravation of having to go shopping!
links_reviews_text: I paid careful attention to the reviews and looked at the pictures of the ladies wearing this dress to give me an idea of what it might look like on my figure. I was not disappointed. The dress was on time and absolutely stunning. My free backup size was not available so I'm glad my normal dress size fit perfectly. I was comfortable all night and had ease of movement on the dance floor. This was my first rental with RTR and I can't wait for another occasion to rent again. Thanks so much for this service! The only con was that when I tried on the dress when I received it, it took my husband and daughter to help zip it up once it got to a certain point of the dress. For a $500 the zipper should zip with ease. THANKFULLY the day of the wedding the zipper went up just fine! Still 2 thumbs up for this dress.
Dress was super comfy and fit like a glove. Was nervous whether the 8 would fit when i normally like to wear a 10 but that size was out of stock.
Really gorgeous dress. The lace has a good amount of stretch and the sizing was right on. I felt really comfortable in it for a cocktail party. Strapless bra worked fine.

This dress was amazing!!! I still have my baby weight from my pregnancy and this dress hid all my less confident areas, but still made me feel sexy. It kept my tummy in without being too tight, and the length was perfect!!! It definitely runs true to size.
Top of the dress true to size the waist was a little bit but didn't affect look. Loved the lace! I want to buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: The event was a wine gala fundraiser for the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation
links_reviews_text: I was an intern for the foundation and needed something that could fit a gala but on a college students salary. Rent the Runway was my savior and the dress was a HUGE hit at the gala. It ran a little tight in the bust more than anything but the cut and style of the dress still made it look extremely flattering on me. I got many compliments from guests and my bosses. It was a fantastic evening where I more than fit in, I stood out!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a November wedding!
links_reviews_text: Overall fit was great, I rented the 12 and the 14 and wore the 12. The sleeves were not tight at at all, and the bust was good for me (I wear a 36DD). The dress had just enough flare to stand out among the other LBDs at the wedding. The only place it was snug was across my derrière, because the material doesn't have much give. I received a lot of compliments on this dress and would wear it again!

I loved this dress!! The sleeves were great, I was nervous that they would be too small. I'm an hourglass shaped body, and it was a little tight on the bottom but it fit perfectly everywhere else. I would definitely rent this dress again.
This dress was perfect! It was almost midy length on me because I am short. Material is thick and great quality kept me warm on this fall evening!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous black dress, perfect for an outdoor October 1st wedding in North Jersey!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful black dress, nice fabric, warm, fabric was a heavier weight. Lace was amazing! Very soft, comfortable! Sleeves fit well, weren't too tight, just perfect! Received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! Loved the look all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great, I didn't need a bra and the compliments just wouldn't stop. It was comfortable, well made and slimming!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I felt absolutely gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: The dress did fit a bit small. I normally wear a size 10; I ordered this dress in a 10 and 12 and ended up wearing the 12. It felt a bit tight in the mid section and bum which is why I went with the 12. I was a bit worried the lace sleeves would be tight, but they weren't at all. The fit very comfortably and even had some stretch to them. I would definitely rent this dress again!

I absolutely loved this dress! It was for an April wedding in NJ where the weather isn't yet warm but not freezing either.. This was the perfect solution. The fabric was thick and well made, the lace was perfect with no snags or anything. I'm normally a 10 but went with the 12 because I felt the lace being slightly looser made it classier and more comfortable.. the length was perfect as well. I received a ton of compliments and felt great! I would rent this again in a heartbeat..wish it came in another color!

links_reviews_title: I got complimented all night long in this dress. It fit like a glove! Easy to dance in too .
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit, super sexy, I'm tall and it wasn't too short at all.

links_reviews_title: Elegant w/ a modern edge! So chic.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adored this dress. It was not too tight in the sleeves or shoulders which always worries me with lace dresses. Very comfortable and the length was appropriate. I also loved that the panel in the front didn't show too much tummy so I felt comfortable with that as well. I am self conscious about my flabby arms, so the sleeves were perfect. The 14 was a little big, and I probably could've worn the 12, but I was getting ready by myself and couldn't get the 12 zipped up over the seam. It would've zipped, but I couldn't do it by myself. I would consider this a conservative dress even though it has the sheer lace. The length was great and the cut was nice so it didn't fit too much like a bodycon dress. I'll definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night on the town in Vegas!!
links_reviews_text: love it

links_reviews_title: This dress fit so well. It was so comfortable and made my body look great!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great!

I am usually an 8. The 8 fit but felt a little too tight around the stomach so I sized up to the 10 for a looser fit. The straps were long but I pinned them in the back which was perfect. The material was thick and I did not need to wear a bra. I felt very comfortable and classy in this dress all night!
Very pretty color, flattering cut and quality fabric--no unflattering lines and no bra needed.
This dress fit great however a little loose in the stomach area. Very simple but classy.

Hugs in all the right places, got many compliments on this dress. Wore to an early fall wedding and the fabric was warm enough that I didn't freeze for an outdoor Midwest wedding. Easy to move in - straps were a little big for the smaller busted ladies out there.
Loved this dress, it's very flatter in a pear figure as it gave more volume at the bust to balance my hips. 10/10 would rent again, comfortable for standing, sitting and dancing.

This dress was the perfect blend of elegant and sexy. It hugged every curve just right and I got so many compliments. It hold everything in and is a great thick material. I would just advise that I thought it ran a bit small. I am usually a 10 but wore the 12 and it was a bit tight. The straps are a little long but they did not give me such a problem that I would not recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear but it was a nice dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this as my back up dress and didn't end up wearing it. I thought it was a nice dress with thick fabric. My boyfriend is determined that I need to rent it again for another occasion! However, I'd need to buy some type of shape-wear for underneath the dress to help smooth out bumps and lines in the hip area. The straps were a little too long for me as well.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable. Small on top, large in hips.
links_reviews_text: Dress was small on top and a bit too large in the hips for me (I like things like to fit like a glove). I didn't have to wear a bra, but it would likely have been too tight on top if I wanted to. I was happy with the dress overall! Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Probably the most flattering dress I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is thick enough to smooth things out without being too heavy. I wore this to a Summer wedding in New York and it was comfortable despite the humidity. It's definitely form flattering without being too revealing.
This dress was stunning! It fit like a glove. I wear a size 4 and the 4 fit perfect. Got so many compliments and felt amazing in this dress. It was very comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I felt great in the dress. Even after dancing and eating the dress was still comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit. The dress was very easy to wear. The shoulder straps were a bit long. The material is thick enough so it does not cling and it stretches a bit so there is some give.
The fit is perfect and very comfortable! This is my second time renting this dress! I received lots of compliments throughout the evening! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I felt sexy, classy, and "held-in" in the best way possible for a modern city wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent as a last minute for my original rental that did not fit-overnight shipping is a godsend! The fabric is thick and hides all the lumps and bumps that another, thinner fabric may not. The fit was tight, but not uncomfortable and I felt "held in" all night. I did wear Spanx and an adhesive strapless bra underneath, which both worked perfect with this dress. I felt sexy, classy, and perfectly dressed for a nighttime wedding at a modern restaurant in the city. My only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because, like other reviewers have mentioned, that straps on the dress are a little long. I didn't feel I was ever coming out of the dress, but I did have to tug it up periodically throughout the night. This could probably be easily fixed with a few pins in the back, but I didn't want to fuss with anything else. Overall, was very happy with this backup dress. I would definitely recommend and rent again for future occasions.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Wore this as a bridesmaids dress for my sister's wedding in Florida. Material was light enough that I wasn't too hot but thick enough that I felt comfortable even with the classic stomach trouble spot. Straps were a little loose like others mentioned but I didn't need to pin them. Also didn't need to wear a bra which was the best part of this dress!

I rented this as my backup dress and ended up wearing it because it was more formal than the other dress I rented. This dress fit me perfect and I wore it with a strap bra! First time rented and i loved it!

Dress was a little large through the hips as others stated. I could of gone down a size if I wanted it tighter. Pretty dress that can be dressed up or down. The slit is what makes it really stand out.
This dress is so flattering. It was super comfortable and felt great!
This dress made this mom of 2 feel great! Strongly recommend.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous! I wore it to a June wedding and I was sad to have to return it! It gave me plenty of room to eat and dance the night away! I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wedding, true to size, comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect, I don’t have many curves and I am smaller up top which is a difficult shape for fitted dresses, but it fit my shape really well. The color was really beautiful and the slit in the front wasn’t too high, it felt really comfortable and appropriate for a wedding. Really loved this dress!

While very simple, this dress was a beautiful option for the price. I personally felt it was a little plain on its own; however, you can definitely make it your own by pairing jewlery or other accessories with it. I generally wear a 10 or 12 in dresses, wore the 10 just fine. One small issue- the straps are very long and non-adjustable, I kept having to pull them up. I enjoyed wearing it and recommended it but probably wouldn't rent again, just because it didn't blow me away, if that makes any sense?

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 2, expecting it to fit small but it actually was slightly big around my hips and chest. The slit was higher than expected while sitting but modest while standing. Thick and comfortable fabric. Got lots of great comments!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, so comfortable and true to size!
links_reviews_text: All pros---no cons

I'm 5'10, 150 lbs, size B bra and the size 6 dress fit perfectly! The material is thick so covers well and stays in place very well. The length was perfect and I loved the slit. Very flattering overall!
Fit pretty well. Smaller than usual size 4, but likely due to fabric (form fitting but slightly stretchy). Fabric is thick and might be a bit warm in the summer.

links_reviews_title: Great quality material- runs a little large
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable! The material is thick, but not heavy! The straps are a little longer and the body of the dress runs a little bigger than true size, so I opted for the smaller backup size.

I wish I could have kept this dress! My only complaint was the shoulder straps were a little long. This dress had a perfect combination of sexy, feminine, and conservative with the length. I would definitely rent this again! If I had more events to go to, I would buy it and tailor the straps.
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner. I am a true size 8 and this fit like a glove. I didn't wear a bra, felt incredibly comfortable the entire night. Hugged my curves and hid the tummy area well!

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner at a brewery. This dress was SO comfortable and so easy to wear. It fit perfectly and I did not need to wear a bra due to the top ruffle. I would definitely rent again!
This dress fit perfectly. It was a good length, thicker material and was just the right fit. It was very flattering and perfect for a (cold) spring wedding!

Love this dress it was nice and snug without being too tight. The other reviews were right about the straps being a tad bit too long, was annoying at first but I forgot about it and was so comfortable in the dress all night. I rented the 6 & 4, and ended up going with the size 4. Was a little long on me since I'm so short but didn't bother me. Would recommend this dress for sure!

links_reviews_title: Very forgiving thick fabric fits so cute!
links_reviews_text: Adorable dress that fits perfectly
Fit true to size...compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Easier than shopping in a store.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Lots of compliments. Picture reviews made it easy to find a perfect last minute dress! Reasonable prices; no hassle!

links_reviews_title: First time ordering with RTR and was so happy with this rental!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the size 4 and 6, both fit well but I liked how size 4 felt on me better. Thick, durable material so didn't have to worry about my "pooch" showing. In chillier weather, you can pair the dress with a shawl for warmth. Very nice dress!
I wore this dress to a wedding and received so many compliments! I'm usually between a size 4 and 6 and I wore the size 4. It fit perfectly!
True to size and flattering. Super comfy material. I've loved every rental from RTR!

links_reviews_title: tight but able to dance in all night
links_reviews_text: This dress was very tight but worn with a pair of spanx it was flattering. I was still able to dance for hours at the reception with no issue.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic fit! So many compliments. Even a passing stranger said “Beautiful dress!”
links_reviews_text: Not a lot of stretch and straps are not adjustable. I would order your size and then a size up. This dress made me feel sexy without being too revealing!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for the perfect wedding.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress so much! It was perfect !

links_reviews_title: The royal blue color and dress pattern detail is gorgeous! Must rent for an event! Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wore dress with tape on nipple covers. The dress was a success for my event and everyone loved the color of royal blue. It's an amazing knee length so classy, easy to move in not too much extra material either.

This dress was perfect for my Christmas work party! Before I rented this dress, I read almost all the reviews and I noticed most of the reviews the dress was worn without tights. I needed a dress for more of a "Winter" wear so I was a little hesitant about renting but it just looked too cute to pass up... But as you can see, it looks great with tights too! I paired it with some black stiletto booties and it was perfect! I got so many compliments on the dress and how unique and beautiful it was. The fit is very true to size and I had plenty of room to wear a strapless bra. Definitely would recommend this dress!!
If I could I would have purchased it, it fit well and got a lot of compliments.
Size 0 would've fit me better, but was not available.
Comfortable. Fit great!
I loved the dress but I could not wear a bra with it because of the cut. I’m 5’5” 115 lbs and wore size 0.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Super comfortable, easy to dance in
links_reviews_text: The nude layer works really well and the fit was perfect. I normally get midi dresses because my legs are long but this fell at the perfect place.
Fit was overall good. A little snug around the bust. Would have given a 5 star but there was a tiny little hole present on the left top right over my boob!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, unique dress that received raving reviews all night. Perfect for a spring wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, no need to wear a bra. One of the best dresses I’ve worn, I’d add this one to my closet in a heartbeat. Being that I’m 5’2” it did come down a little longer on me than the model.

I wore this to a show in NYC. Very comfortable sitting for the show and walking a good distance in the city. The only con for me is I had to wear a strapless bra but it was worth it for such a great dress.

Loved the fit of this dress - I have a short torso, and the length was great! Only the top shoulder section is mesh - the rest is lined. Received a ton of compliments - it fit well on my athlete build!
Loved the fit of this dress. Very comfortable
Fit wonderfully, super cute in person, nice length (not too short!).
It was true to fit. The zipper is a little tricky. The fabric is great quality. I normally wear a 4 and it fit perfect. I am 130 and 5'6".
The fit was perfect. I'm short and was worried the dress might be too long but it fit slightly above my knee. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I loved how feminine and fun this dress was!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. Super comfy and very easy to wear. Got a ton of compliments on it too! The 6 fit me but I liked how fitted the size 4 was so I wore that.

links_reviews_title: Great cure for the winter blues!
links_reviews_text: Rented as part of my monthly unlimited, wore for a spontaneous date night (I was probably overdressed but I didn't care :)). Definitely something out of my comfort zone, but wanted a little something fun to break up the mundane of the winter months. Loved this dress - so many compliments!

Nice fit! Looks very classy on. Fully lined from the beginning of the breast piece down, so not too sexy or formal events. I'm very pale, and while I could tell the nude was much darker than my skin, most didn't think so. However, the waist was a little low for my natural waist, which made the dress ride up and fold. Because of the nude lining, it made it look like my gut stuck out over the dress in some photos. Breast panel was a bit short or my breasts, too, so if you wear a DDD or larger, beware that it might look like you have underboob (again, fully lined so it's not a real problem, but depends on where you're wearing the dress!).

links_reviews_title: Classy and looks great on athletic gals
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and looked great on me. It was classier than anticipated and extremely comfortable. I have an athletic build and some little love handles (which of course will be gone in 2019), but the dress really hides it well. Get this dress! And enjoy :)
I absolutely loved this dress. It was equal parts sexy and sophisticated and the perfect choice for our reunion party.
I go between 12-14. This dress offers no stretch. I'm glad I had the size 16 as a back up . The style is nice and it is very comfortable to wear .
True to size and flattering. I love how the dress looks like it has cutouts, but is completely covered. Winner.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress to wear to a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was my first Rent the Runway dress and I'm very happy with it. I wore this to a friend's wedding and it was fun and easy to dance in. The waist was a little snug but it was comfortable enough to wear for the entire night. The zipper is a little trying so you might need some help zipping it up. Overall, very happy with the dress!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. Easy to dance in and super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I did not need to wear a bra. There was enough padding to cover everything up. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Love the fit of the dress and it was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly, not too tight in the waistband. The color was much more vibrant than expected but I still loved it.

Could not wear a bra, but the fit of the dress made it okay, good length,fit well, showed off my large shoulders, I like that it reminded me of a swim suit so perfect for a warm fall evening in California

As a tall girl, I'm always happy to find a dress that's at or just above knee length (and not too short); this dress fit the bill. The nude lining is also quite comfortable, and I thought the dress fit true to size. I love that I could wear a regular strapless bra with this, too. I had been eyeing this dress for awhile, so I'm glad I finally had an opportunity to rent it!
I rented this for my birthday and loved the color and the blue mesh details. The length was right above my knees. I got compliments all night long and danced the night away in it.
Dress was cute and comfortable. I love slate and willow. Long enough to be appropriate for a bridal shower during the day.

This dress is cute. The pattern is really interesting and I love the balance of sheer paneling and embroidery. The fabric is nice and has some weight to it, but not too heavy- perfect for a summer wedding. The only downside to this dress is that I am a pear shape and it seemed to accentuate the pear with the gathering at the waist (the waist was probably too high on me as well). Overall the color, fabric, and pattern were great! Just not quite right on me!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit well, it was very comfortable, and I received several compliments on it :)
links_reviews_text: It fit like a 2 should fit. The mesh at the top means you'll need a regular, strapless bra.
Super unique pattern to this dress. Flattering and comfortable. Will rent again.
I loved wearing this dress and I got soo many compliments. (:

Really a lovely dress, perfect for an outdoor wedding at a winery. I fluctuate between a 4 and 6, so based on reviews I figured a 4 would be right on the money. It fit juuuust right, if not a little tight. I have a very wide ribcage and anything with a structured middle is iffy for me. If a 6 was available, I think it would have fit better. Still, a beautifully fun dress and I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Great night surrounded by great friends and lots of love!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I’m usually a size 4 or 6 in dresses and with this dress the 4 fit perfectly! Very comfortable and light weight.
It fit great, felt good and looked better. Rented 2x and I'd rent again. Unique and interesting but without being risqué.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear this, was just OK
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this for the wedding I was going to (it was my back up dress). Cute dress overall, but looked super boxy and did not flatter my figure. I have wide shoulders and am 36D, and this dress did nothing for that area of my body. Looked super cute on several others though! I might be biased bc I was not "glamoured" for the occasion yet.
I loved the style and fit. The waist part is not see-through, there's a liner. A strapless bra works great. Length perfect for my tall height. At time of rental I probably weighed 200
This dress was perfect. The length was great, even with longer legs. The waist fit perfectly as well as the bust.
Great dress to wear as a guest to a wedding! I loved the illusion neckline, and had no problems wearing a strapless bra. The dress has fun detail and I received a ton of compliments. True to size.

Such a fun dress, perfect for my country chic themed event. Flattering fit and pairs well with cowboy boots;) Top was tight on my small chest. I did not wear a bra for this reason although I believe a regular bra would be appropriate. The lace part of the dress was a great length. Loved the layers. However, the slip was very short! I wore black spandex shorts to prevent any inappropriate sightings. I had trouble with the zipper and had to get it half way zipped up before getting into it.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress... so much so, I’m desperately trying to find it to buy (no luck so far)
links_reviews_text: I am tall (5ft 11) so was a little worried since I’d read reviews that said the dress (especially the slip) ran short. However, I loved the look of the dress online so decided to take a chance... I was not disappointed. The dress fitted absolutely perfectly - bust, waist, hips, length, everything! It was a decent length and I felt quite conservative and certainly not like I had my ‘bits’ on display!! It is well made, substantial in the feel of the material and is clearly a better quality dress than your usual high street wedding fashions. It was so pretty from both the front and back views, and I had so many kind compliments on how it looked. The only issue I had was getting myself zipped up (impossible to do by oneself!). TBH I would love to buy this dress, but have had no luck finding it online so far!
It was very flattering, fit very well, I got a lot a compliments in it. My only issue was that the zipper was finicky and took some help to be able to zip all the way

links_reviews_title: Very convenient and dress came right on time!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly and it looked amazing, had a lot of compliments. I did had a little struggle with the zipper but overall a very nice first good experience, will use RTR again!

The dress is very beautiful and light. I got a whole lot of compliments on it. I took off one star because the slip underneath was really short and would keep riding up. So, I had to keep my hand on it the whole night, which meant that I couldn't move freely because I felt self conscious. So, definitely put a shorty slip underneath. But overall, I'm very happy with the it.

This dress fit a little small, the zipper was stubborn, it was complicated to get into, and the lining was VERY short! BUT it was super cute, comfortable to wear, and the layers of lace with the gold detailing was so beautiful. It was also pretty flattering if you’re sensitive about your stomach, since the ruffles cover a lot. I was able to wear a regular bra with this too, which I really appreciated.

Glad I read the reviews before submitting for my rental; it does seem to run small (usually a size 0), but since I was on a cruise celebrating a milestone birthday, so happy I sized up. I'm a tad self conscious about modesty, and agree the slip was slightly shorter than I would have preferred; however, the ruffles, lace, gold bead accent, and asymmetrical hem made me feel like a million bucks on my special night! Would definitely rent again (once I run out of options)!!

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and looked great!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and comfortable! Looked great with the fascinator and at the February Run for the Roses Auction dinner I attended!
I wore the XL which gave a little more room for dancing. The ruffles made it fun and comfortable. It was easy to match my own jewelry. Would definitely rent again.

This is a gorgeous dress-definitely rent it! Wore to a formal gala and got so many compliments. One lady even came across the ballroom to ask me about the dress. Was unique and extremely comfortable. I got the navy color and paired it with gold heels and jewelry. Fabric was a good weight and had a nice stretch which made it very flattering. You might need help with the zipper since it was stuck in places where there was a thick seam.

I loved all the details of this dress! The lace is a deep blue and relatively heavy so the dress feels structured. The waist is small and the ruffles accentuate it even more! The only challenge is getting the dress and slip on without flipping one or the other inside out. The cut is conservative enough while still being very fun.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on how beautiful and festive this dress was!
links_reviews_text: I normally fit into size Small dresses, but in this case I fit perfectly into the Medium size. This was such a lovely, elegant dress, and really flattering. I didn't have to wear any shapewear as the skirt is in layers, and the asymmetry was a nice touch. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. Sturdy lace, and a completely separate shift underneath the lace layers. Definitely recommend! My only negatives - the gold ball beads are a nice detail and way to punch up the look of the dress, but they are sometimes a bit uncomfortable when sitting down... Also, as a heads up - I do not recommend wearing any bracelets with tines/etc. on them, as I rented one along with this dress and it frequently would get caught in the lace. Overall though, a wonderful, beautiful dress that I would gladly wear again!

I took a risk with this dress and I don't regret it. I rented it for a Christmas Party at work and I soon as I took my coat off I received the first compliment. After this, the compliments were endless, even from people I did not know. After reading reviews I decided to rent the M and Large and I am glad I did. I am usually between S and M on dresses depending on the style (I have a really curvy shape) The M was a little long and lose around the armpits, but the slip underneath runs really small!!! Thank God I had the large to swap the slip from this size because otherwise, I would be showing my goodies!! I also wore black spanxs to feel more comfortable as I knew there was going to be a lot of dancing. I gave this dress 4 stars because the slip kept sliding up and my spanxs were showing (not noticeable due to the lace on the dress) but made me a little uncomfortable. If you are looking for a dress that stands out on its own, this is definitely the right option for you. Its sexy and conservative at the same time and was the right dress for this occasion.

I rented this dress for a formal work Christmas party. It has a beautiful lace pattern with a slip sewn in so it doesn't get bunched. My favorite part is the skirt which has multiple layers giving it shape and flattering curves. Very comfortable and looks fantastic. I would definitely recommend this dress.

I really liked this dress. The inner fabric that is the more covering fabric is definitely short. The lace obviously goes down further, but the slip is short. If you order a back- up size, I'd recommend ordering up. Overall, comfortable and fun to dance in!

links_reviews_title: Easy to rent, easy to return
links_reviews_text: Rented for a work holiday party. Glad 2 sizes were sent - seemed to run small. Only downside is I received it a day later than scheduled.
Good fit, flattering

links_reviews_title: True to color. True to form.
links_reviews_text: I have an average bust/waist/hip size. This dress fit me like it was made for me. I felt very comfortable in it.

The inner lining is very short, and I had to basically turn into Houdini to get the lace overlay and lining to work properly. However, I loved the dress once it was all figured out. It's an awkward fit, but it worked.
The style didn't look like how the image is portrayed , the overall quality looks cheap, returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: The fit was very flattering, and I received a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7” and 170lbs. I usually wear a large but the XL fit a bit better. The zipper was finicky, as other reviewers commented, but in the end I think the dress was completely worth it! I’m very happy!

I liked the idea of this dress but it ran SUPER small. The boobs probably played a part in that as the waist of the dress was sitting right under said boobs once I got it on but even so I usually fit into most larges and I would have probably need a 2 or 3 XL to get into that dress.
I couldn't wear this out because the slip was too low and my boobs were out for the world to see

Nice material. A little heavy, but not overwhelming. The dress was shorter than expected and I couldn't wear it bc the zipper would not go all the way up. Not sure if it was a defective dress or just too small?
Unflattering, fits in all the wrong places. Just looks like pillow cases sown together. Not their finest work. Large women do not want to appear as such. Thanks.
No liner

When I originally ordered this dress I thought that it was black, actually I thought I had ordered and entirely different dress. It had little gold ball all around the skirt that you don’t see in the photos but they give an accent to the layers on the skirt. It was a very pretty dress and I got a couple of complements on it. The high neckline was comfortable without being constricting and the length was just at my knees which was perfect for a Good Friday service where I was singing. The dark navy color looks almost black except in direct sunlight.

The dress did not do anything for me. I had both small and xsmall and they were both huge on me. I looked like a bag of potatoes. This is the first time I've rented from RTR and did not like my rental. I'm 5'4 and I think this would look better on a taller gal.
It showed up with a horrible body odor. I thought it looked nice but ended up wearinig something else that looked better and didn't smell.

links_reviews_title: I decided to wear L, it was loose on me but it looked great. Got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: fits great, absolutely loved it
Too small. Pretty dress, but unable to wear.
Zipper did not go up all the way. Dress has extra layers that made me look pregnant event though I'm not. Did not like the fit.

links_reviews_title: Too small on top for broad chest
links_reviews_text: Would have been perfect if it wasn't too narrow on top for my broad shoulders. I worry about it being too large everywhere else if I size up to Large.

I loved this dress! I'm 5'7" and 135 lbs and the M fit perfectly. As the other reviews mention, the slip is a little short, but the longer lace hem is both opaque enough, and definitely long enough, to be appropriate (I wore this to a work event with 3 inch heels). As an FYI, you really can't wear a bra with the lace back, but with the slip and the thicker, structured fabric of the dress this wasn't a problem. 10/10!
This dress fit me in an odd way. I'm top-heavy and it just made me look like a triangle not a very flattering look I couldn't wear it. I'm more of an hourglass and it just didn't work.

I rented this for 1920s theme party. But ended up not wearing it because my accessories were white and silver and the beads on the dress were gold colored. I think it would be better suited for a wedding.
Such a fun dress! Despite being busty I was able to wear without a bra and it looked slimming and perfect. Definitely would rent again.

This dress fit true. It had a lovely silhouette. I personally felt that it was too "young" looking on me. It felt like a costume on me at almost 40. It had a very spicy kind of feel, maybe for a party or a dance rather than a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Runs small, really hard to get on and get zipped up. Once it's on though you're good. Really comfortable. Shorter than it looks but I wore it with tights so no issue.

links_reviews_title: The dress was form fitting and flares at the bottom. Very nice dress great quality.
links_reviews_text: If you have broad shoulders maybe size up. Top half of dress was a little tight
Comfortable and fun top for the summer. Easy to wear.
Cute top. The only thing I didn’t love was the string tie, it made the top feel/look like a bathing suit from the 70’s.
Fit nicely. Pretty colors and pattern. Lightweight fabric, perfect for a hot day. That said, it didn't do much for me and I probably wouldn't rent again.
I loved the bright pattern and style of this top. The off shoulder actually stayed in place pretty well. The only down side was the fabric. It looked pretty wrinkly after two hours of wear.

links_reviews_title: SUPER cute top- I loved the bold pattern!
links_reviews_text: The off-the-shoulder was so cute! It's the perfect summer top!

Wore this too on Cinco de Mayo while vacationing in San Diego. I went a size up because I have a long torso and wanted more length. Adorable and I got tons of compliments! Would rent again in a heart beat!
So cute. Highly recommend w heels on a warm summer day at brunch.

links_reviews_title: Great simple summer top with white jeans....
links_reviews_text: This was fun Trina Turk top to where out to dinner on vacation. Colorful and fun!
Very cute and wears well on the shoulders
Overall fit is great and looks great with white jeans.
Cute, fun, easy to wear. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful bright colors and well made
links_reviews_text: Lind this Trina Turk top. The colors are rich and beautiful. However, I think it made me look a bit wide when worn off shoulders.
Great casual top, stays in place.
Fun too for summer
I wouldn't normally wearing something this short, but it was perfect for Vegas! Many compliments!

This dress was amazing!! The zipper was a bit iffy even though it fit me fine and around the arms it was a bit itchy because of the sparkles on the dress but other than that it was amazing!! I got many compliments from people I didn't even know and I felt great all night. The cleavage isn't too bad—but I'm small chested. A strapless bra should work for almost anyone in this dress!! Definitely would recommend!

links_reviews_title: This was my dress for my senior homecoming and it was amazing! I felt amazing!
It was perfect for a semi-formal party.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 0-2. The XS was tiny, probably closer to a 00. The small fit perfectly, but the v-neck is very low. Too low for me. I added a black lace bralette, and it helped, but it was still low. I'm also 5'1" so I know my torso is smaller and that could be the reason it was so low on me.
I rented this for Christmas and it was perfect. I received so many compliments on it! The only bummer is the sequins can pull at your hair, so I recommend wearing your hair up. Worth it though!
Awesome dress! I received a bunch of compliments and loved the way it moved in the dance floor!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Prepare for cleavage!
links_reviews_text: I wore this my company holiday party and got lots of compliments on how pretty the dress was. It was fun and sparkly and I paired with black tights so it didn't feel so short (I usually don't wear short dresses). It was a bit low cut and tight in the neck line/chest so my cleavage was definitely on full display, but I got a lot of compliments of "The Girls" as well. Ha!

I absolutely loved wearing this dress. The neckline was just low enough to be sexy and not uncomfortable. It's very flattering and comfortable to wear. Your arms do rub up on the sequins a little but it's not enough to be annoying. I wish I owned this one!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a sexy disco ball!
links_reviews_text: Omg I loved wearing this dress! The fit was perfect and I received so many compliments all night long! The dress flares at the waist which made me feel comfortable after a meal. I wore a bra but would have been fine without one as well. The dress is low cut and shows cleavage so this isn't the dress for you if that isn't your style. I didn't want to return the dress! If you rent this one, remember to not be swinging your arms too much as little irritation did happen on my arms since it's sequins.
Loved how this dress fit and held the girls in! I didn't even need to wear a bra!

My proportions are traditional hourglass, but it's usually impossible for me to find something that is flattering to my chest AND my waist; this dress was a dream come true! The sequins were not uncomfortable and the dress maintained its shape the whole night. I was able to wear a standard bra with it which was an added bonus. I will definitely rent this again in the future!
Wore at my bachelorette party and out dancing. Looks great in photos and gorgeous color. Itchy around upper arms due to friction with sequence but kinda worth it. Size medium here, fits well.
HOT MAMA! Loved this dress! Def a step out of my comfort zone but it was so worth it!
Def size up or you won't be able to breathe!
I loved this dress! Perfect for a Valentine's Day formal. The fit was great and I felt so fun and flirty!
I got soo many compliments! Loved this dress even though I'm flat chested. Wore it for a college formal dance

Chose to get the medium because they run small and it fit PERFECTLY! It's very low cut in the front so I wore a black tube top underneath. The only bad thing was that the sequins did cut my arms a little bit, but what was to be expected. Pretty hurts, I guess!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but uncomfortable & color is not accurate in person (See Photo)!
links_reviews_text: As a bustier girl, this runs small on the top. The sequin is very scratchy and irritated my skin. The armholes are smaller than usual, making it a little tight around the armpit (contributing to the irritation). I only wore the dress for a few hours because I couldn't take it anymore lol Sizing up would've helped, but it was unavailable. I'm usually a full 8 or a small 10, 36 DD/DDD, and the sz L was snug up top. Overall, the dress is beautiful and flattering, but uncomfortable if a size up isn't available.
Very great dress if you want to show off your figure!

I wanted sparkles for an NYE in Las Vegas! This dress was perfect. I was able to wear one of my own bras with the dress. Sequins always rub a little on the underarm area, so that was expected. I had a medium and a large. The large just has slightly more room in the rib cage, but other than that I cooked tell much difference between the two sizes. It was like 35 degrees out on the Las Vegas Strip so I was able to pair it with black tights and a denim jacket.
The perfect party dress. Wore this to my 25th bday and felt like a queen. Pretty busty but it makes your chest look great
This dress fit perfectly! I was so happy with everything

Super cute dress for party! I selected true to size, but it runs a tiny bit small. Getting the zipper up was a bit of a struggle, but once zipped it fit like a glove! I loved not needing to wear a bra under the dress. Overall this was a fun dress, I'd rent it again for another night out!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this one but wish I had somewhere to wear it!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup style - it was SO BEAUTIFUL. I loved it. Stunning color, the fit was lovely. I just fell in love with my first choice. Will definitely rent this in the future for a formal affair

links_reviews_title: So pretty and form fitting in all the right places
links_reviews_text: Definitely would rent again. The sequences under the arm were not bad at all. Everyone loved the dress.

This dress was a show stopper. I got a ton of compliments all night and was perfect for my company holiday party. This was my first RTR. I originally wanted to wear a different dress but they only had a small available and it was just a little too tight that I thought I'd be adjusting all night. I'm so glad I picked this as my back up. I'm 5'6", 129 pounds and the medium fit perfect. I could fit into the small but it really was snug. Overall great rental and I'll use RTR again.
This dress was a hit! The color was even more beautiful in person. It does run a bit small. I am normally a medium and it was a bit snug, but an overall beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so gorgeous and comfy. I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Only con I had was my underarm was a little scratched up from the sequins but I didn't notice till the next day. Guess I was having too much fun lol. It is very comfortable on and fits perfect in all the right places.
I was beyond thrilled with this dress. The cleavage area was a little loose so it made me nervous occasionally but overall the fit was great and it felt amazing!

links_reviews_title: Every compliment made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the small and medium as a backup but the medium fit perfectly! I'm 5'4" and 138lbs!! I got so many compliments! I loved how they made my boobs look and it was flattering not trashy!! Will definitely order from RTR again!!

This dress was so comfortable. This was the first time I had worn something with a plunging neckline. Since I'm so small chested, I didn't need any tape or anything. The dress fit perfectly. It was a great color which made it different from everyone else in the room. I got a TON of compliments on it. I wore it for about 6 hours and about 3 hours in the sequins were starting to itch under my arms. Several others mentioned this in their review so I was prepared for that and the only reason my review is a 4 and not a 5. I loved this dress!

I wanted to try a sequins dress for this years holiday party and I saw several but this one caught my eye. I love the forgiving fit.. fit around the waist and then the flare out to the hips. I felt so good and everybody loved it !

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my Christmas formal.
links_reviews_text: It runs true to size, but it was borderline to short for me since I am 5'8". Had I been going to a classier event, like a wedding rather than college formal, I would have needed to think about getting another dress. But, for this I just wore short heels and was fine! It was comfortable, form fitting, and flattering. It wasn't too much or not enough cleavage. I was a little bothered by the sparkles under the arms, but only briefly. Will TOTALLY rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great holiday party. Loved the compliments I received.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Received tons of compliments! Not zippable by yourself. Like any sequin dress the edges cut into you. Especially under your arms

links_reviews_title: Fun, sexy dress that delivers a real wow factor
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a charity event who's theme was A Night in Vegas. The dress fit very well. There is some stretch to the material. I am very short at just 5 ft but since it's cut to be a mini I didn't have to worry about the length. I do wear a 32 D bra so if you are short and small chested there's probably too much material on top to fit comfortably but for me personally it fit my chest perfectly and I didn't have to worry about any unwanted flashing even while dancing the night away. Only downside is by the end of the night the sequins do start to rub your skin raw around the edge of the chest/arm pit area. Many compliments and would rent it again if I had an appropriate event.
Wore this for a night out in Vegas. Nice outfit but slightly uncomfortable around the arms.

This dress was very pretty. Great for, although a little more open in the chest than we thought. Luckily, it still worked out. Short, but we knew that part. Great little dress. She wore it to the homecoming dance.

Fun dress! Fits true to size. Pros: Males your figure look great! I have smallish breasts but in this dress my cleavage never looked so good!! Cons: The sequins rub your arm and makes it uncomfortable to wear for a long period of time

I wore the dress for a photoshoot in Times Square. People were constantly stopping to compliment me. The fit was flattering and comfortable. The sequins did scratch my arms a little, but not enough to deter me from wearing it. The color is beautiful! Double sided tape will be helpful if you don't wear a bra.

this dress was perfect for my homecoming formal!! got so many compliments. i usually wear a size S but i wore the M and it fit perfect!! it's also more purple than expected, but still a very cute color.
I wore to work but you could easily wear to any other function. I would definitely rent again. It's great for shorter girls. Very cute and comfortable! Just recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Sassy, girly dress with a southern charm.
links_reviews_text: LOVED the bright colors!! I wore it to my nephews baby shower and my friends concert. Also loved how comfortable this dress was! Pockets would have been nice but nbd because I had my Kate Spade purse, also a rental!

I wore this to my son's first communion. The quality of the dress is top notch. The fit was perfect even though I have a large chest. it even had pockets. This dress is the definition of classic. I got lots of compliments. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Size up for this polka dot dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits as all the other Valentino dresses available on RTR. I wear a 00-US and 38-IT so I'd recommend to size up (especially for the waist line). The fabric and pattern are amazing and I always feel happy and lucky to wear a Valentino. It comes with pockets too! This particular dress arrived, very unfortunately, a little smelly in the armpit area...not very impressed by it. So 5 stars to the dress, 1 star to RTR. I'll rent it again, hoping next time to receive it properly cleaned.

Fit is small in the ribs more so than the bust but that could be due to the 3 children I birthed impacting my rib cage circumference. I loved this dress when it arrived and was so happy it zipped with the help of my husband, a pair of pliers, some deep breaths and a couple swear words. The polka dot pattern was fun and different and a little bit stand-outish without making you feel like an outrageous attention whore. Pairs well with nude shoes and navy earrings. Highly recommended for wedding guests who love debating politics at the table, crashing other people's photo booth pics and trying every beer on the menu. Poofy skirt comes in handy for "a little bit softer now" part of the shout song which will be played at least 2 times if you're at a wedding in Buffalo, NY- Go Bills! #billsmafia
Perfect fit. A stunner!!! Wore it fur a Board meeting and then to an evening event. I felt stunning!

I wore thia for my office holiday party and it was perfect! Felt very slecial and got lots of compliments. I debated between ordering the 40 and 42 and after reading other commenda decided kn the 42. It fit perfectly, was just slihtly tight in the armpits but not too noticeable. Would reccommend for any special occasion. Im 5'3", 137 pounds, and wear a 32DD , usually a size 4.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a holiday party, very cute and fun
links_reviews_text: Great fit, a little on the shorter side if you have long legs.

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, but there is no give. I typically wear a 0 or 2 and tried on both the 38 and 40. 40 fit perfectly.

This dress was so perfect for my husband's graduation dinner from medical residency. It was conservative and formal enough while still being my fun and quirky style. Length was perfect, and I'm 5'6" with a long torso. Didn't have to wear spanx b/c bottom not fitted. Wore my regular push-up bra b/c I'm small-chested (32C).
