I'm usually a 4, sometimes a 2 on top, and this 4 was TIGHT on top be warned--not for the broad-shouldered or big-chested, or then order a size up. Has pockets!! My only complaint is the neckline is super high and kind of dug into my neck by the end of a very long night of partying. I would still wear it again in a heartbeat though!!
Perfect for KY Derby! No stretch and tight at the bust. Should have gone with the 42 but ended up not wearing a bra and it fit like a glove. Standout in a sea of RTR!
I loved this dress. The cut, color, quality and material were amazing. The fit was a little snug in the chest but I wore a cardigan and wore it to work. The extra added bonus was that it has pockets.

Runs small and short so I wore black tights with it and boots. Would definitely go a size up in this line in the future. Also even though it's such a high profile brand, dress doesn't have lining in the skirt which was surprising.

Fun work to play dress! This dress runs a bit small in the chest . I recommend going up a size for backup and maybe even two if you have a larger bust size, I am a 34B and it felt snug up top. The dress is flatteringly fitted through the midsection but has comfortable room in the hips from the fuller skirt. I usually steer clear of full skirts because I am 5 foot 3 and they tend to overwhelm me. However, this skirt looked great and was not to full for my taste! It hit me just above the knee making it great for work too! Very flattering !

The dress fit great. Just a bit odd. The waist seam fell between my bellybutton and ribs. Just an odd spot and the gathering stuck out a bit too much for my liking. Unfortunately I didn't wear it. I did find the length ok. Not too short as I expected.
Ended up sending back for a 42, since it was a little too big on top. 42 fit perfectly. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work. Very classy, sophisticated, flirty
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Love the contrast with the polka dots and color blocking. Red Valentino is one of my favorite brands.

My fav RedValentino I've rented - I sized up because I a 34D and it fit well on chest and was still cinched enough in the waist. Perfect length for 5'0 human. Really cute with black turtleneck and tights - will rent again!
I was SO sad, this dress was perfect, but the hem had come undone! Was obvious and I couldn't wear it even though it would have been perfect for the occasion
cool
I rented this to wear to see the LOVE show in Vegas. Im 17 weeks pregnant and I sized up once size and this fit great. I felt cute and my husband loved this dress.

The cut of this dress is not very flattering on my body type. As you can see from the photo of it on the model, the waist is cut quite high. This means the part that fans out right under the waist sat pretty high on me and it just looked like I had a belly (which I don't have). I think this dress would be good if you have a naturally high waist.

Fit was okay--it was a little on the loose end, but the length was perfect, since I'm on the short side. I didn't like the way the top bunched up when I sat--probably because I have a small chest. Overall the pictures in it were great, and I liked the pattern. The chest part is a little loose for those without much..

This was the second Valentino dress that I ordered as part of my unlimited collection. I love the way the dress fits. Very girly. I am petite but curvy and can wear any where from a size 4 to a size 8 depending on the designer and the cut of the dress. the 42 was perfect but be warned that the neck of the Valentino dresses tends to be a bit tight.

I ended up wearing the smaller of the two sizes I ordered - the larger had a lot of space, and I only regretted my choice after eating a very large dinner - it is pretty fitted at the waist, and the fabric does not have any stretch. The arm holes were not very generous, either, but they worked. Overall, this was a cute, interesting, easy to wear dress, without being too out there! It's also fairly short, so plan accordingly.
This dress was too big in the waist and too tight in the chest for me. It would be great for someone without curves
Little tight across chest and arm holes

links_reviews_title: Not for anything over a B cup!
links_reviews_text: Adorable dress. Fits true to size in waist but is so tight with no stretch in chest. I'm a 34 D and it smushed everything to a very odd shape! I wish I had gone bigger but then I think it would of been too large in the waist. For petite ladies!
The fit was true to size for this brand. I loved it.
Wore to reunion. Cute dress! Loved the fit and length. Lots of compliments. A must rent!
Didn't end up wearing Runs small with little to no stretch Cute colors but don't order if you have a full chest.

links_reviews_title: Runs smaller than most Red Valentino dresses
links_reviews_text: I've worn a 4 and a 6 in Valentino, but this one had a busted zipper (although brand new) and wouldn't have fit otherwise. The fabric is amazing, I love the dress, but size up.
For my size, the small was a little loose. I wish I would have ordered XS as my backup size. Other than that, the dress was perfect for a cold rainy date night. Sexy, but not too sexy.

I wore this dress for a work Christmas party and it was perfect. The material is very thick and forgiving in areas you want to hide. The slots on the shoulder made it a little more fun without being too revealing. The fit seemed large so I'd recommend getting your normal size and one size down

I wore this to a work holiday party and it was perfect. I'm normally more of a small but the extra small fit much better, especially in the top. It was much thicker than I was expecting and great for the cooler temps

links_reviews_title: Love being able to wear, drop in a UPS box and not have my closet fill up with dresses I wear once
links_reviews_text: The dress was form fitting but very comfortable. I'm 5'6", 34DD, 140 lbs and I wore a small. Overall very happy with the dress.

links_reviews_title: An evening out with my Mon to the orchestra and dinner
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color but the material would gather and it was a thicker material than I expected it to be.
Great fit! Comfortable. Fabric has a nice stretch and is a nice thickness. Cold shoulder look and color adds something different!
Extremely easy to wear. Very comfortable and the husband loved it.
Loved wearing this to a cold December wedding. Heavy material and long sleeves but still sexy. Loved it!

This is one of my favorite RTR dresses I've ever rented. The material is soft, flattering, and forgiving. The open slits at the shoulders shows just enough skin, but the dress is classy still. Can wear with leggings/tights and boots, too!

I rented the dress for an employee appreciation dinner around the holidays and LOVED IT! It's probably one of my favorite RTR dresses of all time. The material is thicker, so perfect for winter and the neckline is flattering but not super low so perfect for a work function. The material is body hugging with some give so it was fine for dancing and eating without having to adjust. It does run large though so I'd recommend sizing down. Overall 100% recommend!!

Nope, this would not have been an appropriate choice for a quiet, intimate family wedding! This dress is all about the sexy, and there's no hiding it. I loved that the material was thick and had a ton of stretch. Wish it had a zipper--pullover styling can just be awkward, especially with a more form fitting style. Short girls: the sleeves are looong.

links_reviews_title: I was planning on wearing it to a party but I went with a different option
links_reviews_text: The dress kept bunching and didn't lay flat against my body. I would pull it down and as I move it would ride up and then the fabric would make folds. I think it was because it was a bit too long/too much fabric. It landed right above my knee (I'm 5'8") ... shorter girls should probably pass.

The fit is true to size and was perfectly smooth over all my curves. Great quality fabric. In my opinion this dress was a little too casual for the party I was attending so I chose to wear another dress. This would be great for a date night.

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments, but I didn't feel my best in it
links_reviews_text: The dress itself is made really well and the fabric is thick without being suffocating. I received a lot of compliments in it, but it showed every line from my undergarments. The dress is tight, although very easy to move in, so I wore spanx and control top stockings, but you could definitely tell I was wearing them which was not ideal. Also, the material bunched up every time I sat down so I had to adjust the dress whenever I stood up. Overall, I wouldn't rent it again unless I tone up my whole body.

I'm 7 months pregnant so sized up but probably would have been better with original size since the dress stretches and the shoulders and arms were a little big. Pretty color and good length and fabric weight. I'm not a huge fan of shoulder cutout style but these were a little higher up and looked more design driven than trendy.
Fit a little on the large side. Was warm enough to wear under a coat in 40 degree weather.

This had a bit of a weird fit, it was a little bit loose for a medium and the sleeves were a bit long. The fabric is nice and thick for a winter dress and the color is beautiful. I didn't end up wearing it because the fit didn't work on me.
Great stretchy and thick fabric.

It's a gorgeous color, great material and very well made! It was a bit too big on me in both fit and length, but I wore it anyways cuz I loved fit so much! Perfect fall/winter sweater dress! Many need to size down and rent again!!
Fit great. Fun cut with the open shoulders. Was great for third trimester of maternity. Wore it for work.

I was not a fan of the length of this dress. Although it was comfortable, stretchy and very stylish it was just too big/long for me. I though about folding it under and wearing it but I decided on a different dress and didn't wear this one
Loved this dress. Hugged in all the right places, but still extremely comfy! Perfect for cold winter nights.
I'm 5'5" & 150 lbs and I ordered a Medium. It was huge! Probably could've worn an XS. Couldn't wear it. Beautiful dress though! Nice thick material.
Nice dress however it was slightly large. I'm usually a 2/4 and ordered a small but the dress was too large to wear. May consider renting again in XS if available.

Rented this for a fundraiser event party. It was cute, fun and flattering. Its a little short. I'm taller (5'6") so it was almost a mid-drift. but not quite. It fell right at my pant waist line. I wore it with skinny jeans and got several compliments. Color is pretty and very vibrant.

The medium fit well with no bra and I wore it to dinner one night. Decided to wear the large with a strapless bra for a Girls night out in the big city the next night. Nice fabric. Comfortable and summery!

links_reviews_title: Cute top for a night out in the city
links_reviews_text: Cute top, wore out to dinner and a fun night out. I rented medium and small and wore the small. Medium was a little too big on the side of the arm without the sleeve. I am a 34 D and was comfortable and normally a size 6. It is a little short though so if you normally don't like shorter tops this one might not be the best, I wore with higher wasted skinny jeans. Fun colors and like the one shoulder!

links_reviews_title: Loved this rental!! The ca and small both fit but in the end, I was more comfortable in the small.
links_reviews_text: I loved this top and wish I owned it. It was comfortable, cute, perfect for a weekend in New Orleans with friends. I wore it with a regular bra and just tucked the strap in.

I LOVED this top! I wish I had more places to wear it, I'd definitely rent it again for a vacation or work party. I felt covered in the bust area and a bandeau bra worked great for me, the length was perfectly at the skinniest part of my waist, and it looks stunning with white bottoms!

links_reviews_title: Surprised me in the Best way!
links_reviews_text: Wore without a bra- shirt was a little short- great for petite - dresses up with black shorts and heals and casual with white shorts. Want to buy!!
Rented this for casual date night with my BF. Perfect fit. Couple of compliments. Just a great little top!

Fun top, fairly comfortable. Felt a little short and pulling it down caused the inner lining to be exposed. It was just slightly large under the arm on the sleeveless side but not noticeably so. Would not have sized down however.
Although it was a little loose fitting, this top made me feel put together and colorful. The material is rich but comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Cute floral blouse for work or play
links_reviews_text: I wore this top tucked into the Halston Heritage Black Wrap Front pants from RTR to work and received multiple compliments. It fit true to size and, although it's a bit of a cropped fit, there was still enough material to tuck in. I personally got away without wearing a bra which made for a super comfy summery rental. Would rent again!
This top is really fun, I loved the pattern and color. Not the most flattering top and not super breathable but still worth renting.
Absolutely loved this top! It's flowy and the asymmetrical design got me lots of compliments. However, I do wish it was a bit longer (I'm already petite and it almost was a crop top for me).
Perfect for a vacation or warm weather trip. Vibrant color. Pairs well with white denim.

True to size and super comfortable fit. Material does not have stretch but drapes so beautifully. It has a side zipper to get it on and off and is so polished and chic. Overall length is a little shorter than I'd prefer, hitting just at the waistline of a mid-rise cut pair of jeans but not a deal breaker. Would absolutely rent again or own in my wardrobe. You can dress it up or down and the colors are gorgeous.

This top is cute enough! The orange with gray is a nice heading into fall combo. It's nothing super special. I wish it was a little longer in the torso. I enjoyed wearing it the one time, but won't rent it again.
I have rented this twice this summer, great top. Very comfortable to wear, elegant drape, great color and pattern.

Gorgeous print, really nice fabric, lovely asymmetrical ruffle neckline that isn't too over the top. I really like the colorway with the oversized gray and coral graphics, very sophisticated take on a floral.

So comfortable and great colors! I loved the style and pattern of the shirt. It fit true to size. I would recommend going one size down for backup. It felt a little loose right under the arm. The fabric has no stretch but it was loose fitting and comfortable throughout the midsection. Great for any cup size. I would recommend wearing a Nubra or strapless because of the off the shoulder. Overall, fun top that you can make dressy or casual! Would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Considering I got engaged, on the beach, in Hawaii, in this top, I'd say its one of my favs!
links_reviews_text: I loved this top!! It fits great! runs short but I paired with high wasted shorts so it was perfect! Very bright and vibrant! I would definitely rent again!
Lovely fit and absolutely comfortable! Wore it in Napa which looked great in the vineyards!

I really like the colors of this top. I received a lot of compliments on it. It is short, however, and I wish I'd sized up. I couldn't wear a real bra with it because it was too tight. See more photos: http://wp.me/p5FkV7-1fu
Loved this top. Fit true to size. Great color!
The fit was loose but a good loose. I felt so pretty with it on! I wore a strapless bra and didn't need to pull up during the day at all.
I never wear orange, but this top was just so pretty and bright I had to make an exception. This top fit perfectly and was very comfy on a night out.
Could have maybe worn a small but XS fit was fine. Length is on the shorter side- came right to the waist of my pants. Flattering fit and nice pattern
Evening garden party

I wore this out to dinner and received several compliments. I loved the fit and bold colors. I will say that it was the perfect length on me (5'4") but I could see how it would be a little short if you're taller.

Got in a small first and it was too big. But I liked it enough to return and try and extra small. It's very trendy and not typically something I would go for. Where it to a street festival tonight and God is many compliments on this top is I did my adorable six month old golden puppy. I'm going to wear it to California for the weekend and still trying to decide if I will buy it or not. It runs a little big but it's super cute comfortable and I highly recommend it!!!!
I rented this top to wear to my friend's gallery opening and another friend's bachelorette weekend. Worked out great for both events!

The bold colors really popped. The weight of the material made it feel dressy! Didn't feel like it was falling or sliding off my boob at any point which I do find often with one shoulder tops so this was a win in my book! Great for a date night dinner.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this top!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this top. It was so comfortable and I got so many compliments. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: Cute, but too short for me.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful cut and fabric. I just wish it wads a little longer.
Paired this with black Capri pants, it looked great! The cut was very flattering.
Its fine. Cute basic top. Not a lot to say about it. A solid choice but not extra special.

Runs a little short if you are not wearing high rise shorts or pants. Overall the color is beautiful. The quality wasn't great because there was a couple snags. Overall I liked the top and fit though.
Bought it
Great fit and beautiful color combination

I ordered this in a M instead of a S since I didn't want it to be too short. As others mentioned, it was a bit loose at the right under arm and the lining sometimes peeked out. I liked the way the rest of the top fit so this didn't bug me too much and it was just long enough to hit below my pants button or tuck in a bit if I wanted. Such a cute, fun, unique top! I paired with white jeans for a night out in the summer.
I got lots of compliments in this top. Very pretty, summery top. Fit great.

I wore this for a casual date night with my bf. Paired with white jeans and a short silver necklace, it was a fun, flirty choice for a summer evening. I wore the XS and it still felt a tad big. I kept checking to make sure I wasn't hanging out of the top!

links_reviews_title: Am in LOVE with this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for our event....black tie optional. It was SO comfortable! I was afraid it might be itchy but it was the furthest thing from itchy...it was so cozy and silky soft. It also fit great...not too tight that I couldn't move or sit or dance but still flattering. I was concerned about the length b/c I am on the shorter side and the models in the pictures are always way taller than me. But I felt like the length worked just right as well. Would definitely rent this again!
Loved this dress. It fit great and was flattering. Got lots of compliments. It wasn't scratchy like some sequined or glittery dresses can be.
Received so many compliments and it was so comfortable I didn't want to take it off. I worn it to work holiday party and the detail in the back gave it such a fancy look.

I was 25 weeks pregnant and needed a dress for a friends wedding. This was a great pick the fabric was stretchy and comfortable and I could wear a bra with it. The shimmer was a nice touch and made me feel elegant in my expanding state. The draping detail in the back was a nice touch and brought it from basic to different. Overall I loved this dress and would rent again.

Rented as the backup to the outfits I ended up wearing. Wish I had a reason to wear it, the back is gorgeous. Dress is clingy but forgiving since it is black. Shapewear might be needed if you have a pooch like me. Plus you can still wear a bra!
I sized down one size and I'm glad that I did! It's very stretchy, comfy, and flattering. It has a slip, so it's not itchy at all.

I wore this for tango dancing on New Year's Eve, and it is perfect for both! You can wear a regular bra and the fabric has stretch and a smoothing pattern/texture. It's special and still easy to wear. I completely loved it!

I wore this dress on NYE at 23 weeks pregnant (around. 134 lbs). The fabric is stretchy so it easily fit over my bump. The back is fun and you can still wear a normal bra. I thought this was a great dress! Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. Fit well! Loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: It has a very flattering shape. I absolutely liked it. It stretches with the body without being too tight or constricting.

links_reviews_title: I felt very glamorous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: No zipper to fuss with. Very stretchy and comfy. I wore Spanx hosiery to smooth out my curves. Dress had a few picks but nothing very obvious. I would buy this.
Could have used a smaller size. No bra required

links_reviews_title: The dress was STUNNING - the pictures do not do it justice!
links_reviews_text: The dress was STUNNING - the pictures do not do it justice! The material is really comfortable and forgiving. I was complimented all evening and felt the utmost confidence all night. Highly recommend!
Very comfortable!!! And classy! Wore it all night all over Monaco and it was a great fit and comfy!
This even fits a very pregnant person comfortably. I was 8 months pregnant for this event. Liked the shimmer and open back.
Very comfortable and stretchy material so I was able to wear it all night long with no issues. It sparkles more in person than what you can tell from the picture.

"Class act dress" was the classy way for me to summarize this dress, but what I really wanted to say is that this dress makes you feel sexy but without revealing too much!! I loved the length, and the scoop back even works with a standard bra. The fabric wasnt itchy at all, which can sometimes be a concern with dresses that have some sparkle to them. The fabric definitely has a lot of stretch, but for me it wasn't too much to become unflattering. It was just incredibly comfortable. Wore it to dinner, and then it held up for a night of dancing (and it wasn't too hot.) A great rental to help me ring in 25!
Wore this for my husband's office holiday party. Nice quality, great fit -classic but the slit adds a little sass. Really comfortable.
Loved this dress. I wore it to a friends 10th wedding anniversary part the night before NYE. Very flattering. Can wear a normal bra...wear spanks for a smooth finish. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: TONS of compliments; very classy and fun dress
links_reviews_text: I could have worn the 2 or 4, but felt more comfortable in the 4. I was able to wear a regular bra without it showing. So many compliments and so comfortable to wear. Love this dress! Very pretty with sparkle but not overdone. This was my 2nd RTR experience and got a $30 discount for my birthday with Pro. Great dresses, great fits, and great experience!

I wore this dress for my sister in law's wedding when almost 34 weeks pregnant. I was nervous because my backup size wasn't available but the 6 was stretchy and worked perfectly for me. I'm a 4 when not pregnant but thought I may need an 8. My only complaint was that the arm holes were a little small so the sparkley material rubbed a little bit but other than that it was perfect!
I wore this dress to a wedding when I was 20 weeks pregnant with my second. Fit the bump great and I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: got so many compliments on this!
links_reviews_text: very flattering to any body type since its a stretchy fabric. Almost like a comfortable sweater could honestly wear to bed it was so comfy. It is a little long for people with short legs but still beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress for formal work event
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a formal work event where the theme was "Sparkle" and it was perfect. So flattering! It was very comfortable and easy to move in. I got compliments all night. I'm pretty short and I thought the length was great.

I love this dress. I wore it to a friends birthday part and I received a ton of compliments on it. I ordered a size 6 & 8 but ended up wearing the size 6. I normally wear a size 8 but this dress has a lot of stretch to it. I really liked how the back dropped and the small specs of silver shimmer. Even though the dress had some stretch it still fit like glove in the right places. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress for a conservative church wedding.
links_reviews_text: I was worried that this dress would be too tight because of my bust. I'm usually a size 6 but I ordered a size up just in case the fabric wasn't as stretchy as it looked. The fabric is stretchy and hugged my curves. The dress is very flattering and is perfect for a more wedding or office event.

This dress is so comfortable and the sequins are not itchy! Although it is fitted, the material is very stretchy and it moves with your body. The dress is great for any cup size and hip size, you can also wear a standard bra! I would recommend sizing up for your back-up and at 5'10", the dress hit right above my knee. This is a great rental for a holiday party!
It was a perfect fit for my work Christmas party! Great length and very modest. Will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable. It fit in the right places and was flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a semi-formal Peach Bowl festivity. It is sparkly but not overwhelming. As a woman I her 40s, o am conscious of showing too much leg. This hit right below the knee - great length for some modesty but still a little wow. The biggest advantage of this dress was the ability to wear a normal bra.

links_reviews_title: Almost wore. Bookmarked if I need another cocktail dress during my pregnancy.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute and classy in person. I almost work to a work holiday (cocktail) party while 20 weeks pregnant, but opted for another. However, I will absolutely rent this if I need another cocktail dress during my pregnancy. It's incredibly stretchy and could easily accommodate a bump of (almost) any size. Also super cute under non-pregnant circumstances!

I am usually a 4 in dresses but was 4 months pregnant so the 6 fit a little better and I wore that size. The dress is really stretchy which made it comfortable but also pretty form fitting so be aware it shows all your curves! It was appropriate for my work holiday parties and it would work for a wedding. Since the fabric is pretty stretchy, there were some small pulls in the dresses but they weren't noticeable to others. Overall I'd recommend the dress, especially if you are looking for something nice but stretchy while pregnant!
Very comfortable all night long. At 27wks pregnant this was stretchy enough and flattering enough to make me feel great about the way I looked. Super fun sparkly dress!

I wore this to a wedding at 33 weeks pregnant. It was SO comfortable. Super stretchy, light, material was soft. The fabric shimmers in a sophisticated way (not cheesy or glittery). Adored this dress. I am 5'10" - usually 140 lbs and a size 4. 156 lbs at 33 weeks and got both a 6 and 8. Either would have worked but I went with the 8 for comfort - there's enough stretch that it didn't look schlubby going a size up.

This was very slinky and comfy but definitely would need some shape wear. I ended up not wearing it to the wedding I rented it for because it seemed too much like a "going out" outfit versus something for a wedding. Loved the back detail though- sexy without being revealing and would have been able to wear a normal bra with it too. Nice length as well.
length wasn't a problem on my 5ft body - great dress, lots of compliments!

I loved this dress so much I ended up wearing it twice and got so many compliments. It's extremely comfortable, and for a busty woman, it was wonderful to have something fit well that I can also wear a regular bra with. The sparkle is just right, and would be perfect for any cocktail, formal or semi-formal event. I wore it to a work gala and an evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for wedding, fancy prenatal dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect for 7 months pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Unusual fit - didn't work - didn't wear
links_reviews_text: Unusual fit - didn't work - didn't wear

I wore this for NYE and it was a hit - lots of compliments, easy to dance in. I read other reviews on sizing down, so I did, and wished I hadn't. I'm between a 4 and 6 and went with the 4 and it was fine but tight in the armpits and neckline. Length was just above my knees (5'9) and would rise higher at times. It's flattering on curves but you may want spanx for your tummy if it will bother you to see it. I went with a strapless bra but you could probably wear a normal one. I just didn't want to risk straps showing. Fabric is Stretchy and not too itchy. The shimmer is just perfect for a party.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a party, even at 34 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, lined, flattering - I sized up (usually I'm a 4) because I'm 34 weeks pregnant and it fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: This took out the worry of finding a great dress while pregnant.
links_reviews_text: This is very stretchy and forgiving. I wore this when I was 6 month pregnant and I felt amazing!
Would have dozed down but reviews said no stretch! Definitely a stretchy dress. Normally wore a 10, should have gotten a 10. Doesn't photograph well, but sequins are beautiful.

I'm curvy and wore the 16, which was my backup size. The 14 fit, but it was a little tight for my taste. Wore to a charity gala and had a blast. I felt great in this dress! Very forgiving and cute. Wore with gold accents and received many compliments!

This was fun to wear. It does that thing where it looks one color if you push the sequins one way and another if you push the sequins another way so make sure you push them all one way before you take pictures or you will look like you have a stain. Overall it was a fun, high quality dress.
Easy dress to wear - flattering and very comfortable

Sequins are back in full force! I love this dress because of how easy it is to wear and I am confident to be comfortable all night. Since it is a shift, it is comfortable in the bust, waist, and hips and with some awesome accessories, you can jazz up this even more! This is a must have for the holidays and NYE!
Got this to go dancing in; plenty of room in the chest and forgiving of my apple shape. Planned to wear this as a tunic with flowy pleated chiffon pants since I knew it was going to be short.

Dress was true to size and was really cute! The sequins are not for anyone who is a perfectionist, they will never all sit in one direction. If you’re will to accept that, the dress is fun without being too flashy. Perfect for a wedding. It is not swingy like in some of the mode photos but it is still flattering.
Too Big under the arms. it looked sort of dumpy, I usually wear an 8 but I think a 6 would have been better, it was sort of dumpy on

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Denim & Diamonds fundraiser party
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and was a hit at a Denim & Diamonds fundraiser
I didn't realize this was a 20 until just now! I really like this dress and now I want to try it in an 18! I was going to say it ran large- oops!

This dress was perfect for boots n bling. It had sequins and it was the color of denim blue. The material had some stretch so it was very comfortable. And even though it had sequins it wasn't scratchy. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress for a party
links_reviews_text: This dress was a winner for the party I was going to. I never wear things like this, so it was a great RTR experience. I got this in the NYC store and they only had sizes a bit larger than what I needed. I wear a 14 usually and probably needed a 16 in this, but took the 18 and it worked. I wore it over a long sleeved black tee, black tights, and black ankle boots. I felt great! The sequins do appear a different shade of blue when you rub them the wrong way, so if that bothers you you might not like it. Overall, I loved wearing this and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: That I couldn't wear the dress :-(
links_reviews_text: There is zero stretch to this and it runs on the narrow side. The lining of the dress really makes it about 2 sizes smaller then it is labeled so it probably has an awesome swing and sway to it - if it fit. I had such high hopes.
Fit was very forgiving
Loved this dress that gave me a 90s vibe when I wore it out. Could be paired with heels or doc martens depending on your aesthetic

links_reviews_title: Just enough sparkle for the Holiday.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to the company Christmas party. The dress fit the hips, but was way to big up top for me. I made it work by covering up with a furry throw.

links_reviews_title: Looks better on than it does on the hanger. Very flattering for all shapes.
links_reviews_text: Wasn't sure about this when I picked it up, but putting it on it looked amazing - impressive for a shift dress on a plus sized hourglass. Fabric was nice and heavy but still draped well and lining around the neck and arm holes prevented sequins from rubbing too badly. Be careful zipping/unzipping the dress as the sequins are dense all the way to the zipper. You can wear a regular bra and no spanx needed!
Soooo comfortable and versatile and sparkly

links_reviews_title: Cute but not the right silhouette for my body type
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and the swing style but inevitably it wasn't the right length or silhouette for my pear shape.
It fit well but was too short for my age. Pretty color.

It has a very straight fit. Easy to wear. It didn't cling to anything. It was easy to wear. As always sequins under the arms are scratchy. It would look completely different on someone with a larger chest. I was able to go down a few sizes because it seemed rather large in that area.
The dress was perfect for a fall wedding. I did need to use double sided tape to keep the dress in place around the cleavage, but otherwise it was comfortable.
I was about 180 pounds and wore a 36 D at the time. I felt sexy and carefree going out for dinner and then drinks with my fiance and friends! Fit great, just be prepared for people to look :)

links_reviews_title: Awesome color & my husband loved the low cut
links_reviews_text: Pros: high quality fabric, great alternative to LBD, equal comfort dancing or sitting, flared skirt meant no spanx and room for eating. Cons: the fit was so tricky, almost couldn’t wear, if my event was more public, I wouldn’t have. Cut really narrow in ribs just below the girls but above the waist... couldn’t zip last 2 inches of the Small. The Medium bodice was way too big in front, I managed to tuck & safety pinning an inch on both sides, fabric tape & ramrod posture made it wearable, but still quite R-rated.

Truly obsessed with this dress. It was a little tight around the ribs but I only received the Medium and was so in love with it, I was determined to wear it no matter the discomfort. Once zipped up though, it actually was a very flattering & comfortable dress. I typically have issues with shorter dresses given my height and was pleasantly surprised at the length! It really made a difference having it slightly longer in the back. Fashion tape is a MUST for the top though since it is quite loose!

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up using this dress.
links_reviews_text: I am 6 weeks postpartum. This didn't sink low enough in my waist and was crazy gaping up top. I don't think having a larger bust would have made a difference. I have a shorter torso...whereas a longer torso would have given room for the straps to actually sit on my shoulders instead of falling off. Loved the fabric, color, potential ...just didn't work at all.

For ladies with a smaller bust, you can't wear this without Hollywood Tape. It saved this dress for me, otherwise the top would have been too large. At the event, the green pattern didn't photograph too well, looked more like a simple dark dress, but I loved the shape.
This dress photographs really well! I wore the smaller size because the top felt more secure even though it was a bit tight across my ribs.

links_reviews_title: Recieved so many compliments on this, very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, I'm a 32 C and weigh 116, I did need to safety pin the sides by armpits slightly so it laid down, otherwise there was gaping.

This was my backup style so I wasn't expecting to wear it, but it fit way better and I loved it more than my first choice. This dress was the perfect color for a holiday party - the dark green on top of black was sultry and sexy while staying super classy. The fit was perfect, the deep v was complimented by the thicker straps. The skirt flared out and looked great when twirling on the dance floor. I'm really tall (5'11") and the length was great, especially for my work holiday party. The back of the dress is a little longer than the front. The only thing I had to do that was kind of inconvenient was needing to tape the front of the v-neck down. Since I have smaller boobs (32C), I didn't fully fill out the front so I imagine someone with bigger boobs would fill it out better, but having the fashion tape was perfect and made me feel much more secure. Overall super happy with this dress, and I loved being complimented all night! I wish I could have just kept it!

I wore the Medium. The straps were too long so I had to pin them up which made the outer seam flare out. I tried body tape to make a temporary hem that didn't stay all night. Still felt amazing in this piece! Never been confident braless but I was in this dress! Just the right amount of my itty bitties showing. Fun! Easy to dance in. Highly recommend!!

I absolutely loved this dress! The shade of green was just stunning. It is a bit low cut so I got that boob tape and it was perfect. Never had a slip!! The length was nice, great for cold weather. And the mid section was a bit forgiving, perfect for a large meal!!

links_reviews_title: So easy to rent a dress from Rent A Run Way!
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress. Got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a late summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: This was a beautiful dress online, but a much more beautiful dress in person. My only issue was that the bust was a bit big. I had to use tape to make sure I wasn't falling out of it. I think this dress would be perfect for someone with a C cup or larger.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, LOTS of cleavage...
links_reviews_text: I was super nervous about wearing this dress for a family wedding, but I'm smaller chested, so I thought why not? Well, I should have been nervous. It came and it was very, very inappropriate for me. Not only was it super plunging, but the straps were very loose, so it would have been a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen. Luckily I ordered a black lace bandeau from Amazon ($12!) added a safety pin and I was good to go. The dress definitely doesn't have a lot of give, so I had to size up to the M. The small's straps were better, but was too hard to zip. I did get a lot of compliments, so it ended up working out well!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit with a classy silhouette
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly! I ordered it for a wedding I was attending where my husband was a groomsmen, and I wanted to match him. I have a pretty small bust so I was worried there might be extra fabric in that area but I didn't have any issues. It was eye-catching, but still very classy. I don't have many excuses to get dressed up for my husband so I wanted to take a risk with the low neckline and he loved it!

Beautiful dress! Fits well! I wore a medium, and it was a little loose up top (I'm a 36B), but fit well length-wise and around the waist. Because of the loose-ness up top, I found myself adjusting constantly throughout the night to avoid showing anything I didn't mean to. Overall, love!

links_reviews_title: Too low cut if you’re busty.
links_reviews_text: The straps were really long on this dress and it was too revealing , even with double sided tape it would not keep me covered

Beautiful color and fit! I'm small chested and my only complaint was that I had to use fashion tape to keep the top in place, but other than that I was obsessed! My backup size was unavailable so I wore the medium and was comfortable enough to dance the night away! Would definitely rent again!

I loved this dress. I rented it for a wedding cocktail party the night before. I ended up wearing it a week earlier to a brunch because the dress I rented for that didn't fit. It was a little low cut for what I ended up renting it for. I am large chested, so it was quite a bit a cleavage. I love the dress tough, and decided to buy it. I do need to have the shoulders taken up, because it fit very loose. I had to be very careful sitting to not flash anyone. Going a size smaller would not have fit in my waist though. Love the color though, and the length. I will be wearing this again for date nights.

links_reviews_title: Had to pin the shoulders to fit
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but I ordered as a backup and didn't end up wearing. Like others mentioned, I had to pin the shoulders so the neckline wouldn't be too low.

links_reviews_title: Eye catching dress even distracted people from my fracture book!
links_reviews_text: This dress is incredible! It's #glamorous but also #comfy. I'd been put in a fracture boot a bit before the wedding and people were so obsessed with the color, fabric, and cut of the dress that they almost didn't know the fracture boot below. I have a narrow frame and a small chest and found the cut to be no issue at all- even when dancing. I also loved that it was loose enough in the waist that I could enjoy all the wedding food without worrying about whether or not that would impact the look. I paired with bold earrings and a cocktail ring which I would recommend. If you're between two sizes, I'd recommend going for the smaller. I'm between a 0 and a 2 and the xs fit true to size. Overall, I would absolutely recommend renting this dress!

Wore this to our friend's wedding over the weekend and got so many compliments! Ordered a size M based on previous reviews. The length was perfect, but the top was a bit loose. Nothing some fashion tape couldn't fix, stayed in place all night! Definitely recommend!

I loved this dress, the green was a great color for Fall, and it fit very well. It does run a bit big, I'm normally a Small, sometimes medium due to height, but I wore an XS. I was able to wear it without a bra, always a plus, and it stayed put very well. Wore this for our First Anniversary dinner at St. Regis Atlanta and I felt comfortable and elegant.

High quality, cute and simple. Not quite right for a petite frame (straps and dress length are a little long), but overall, was a cute number for a wedding. Received lots of compliments. Wish there were pockets!

This dress worked great although I will say the sleeves were a little long so I had to use tons of fashion tape to make sure I wasn't exposed during the night! Also has to keep my shoulders back. I'm 5'10" and it was definitely long enough, no problems there.
Need tape to keep it in place and straps were a touch long but the tape kept everything together. I'm a weight lifter so this fit my athletic body perfectly, will rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a fun eye-catcher
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect in the waste, but baggy in the top- precarious given the cut! I am a 32C and thank god for Victoria Secret low cut body suit and lots of tape! Otherwise you would be popping out! Not sure how a bigger or smaller bust would fit honestly, but once in it, it looked fantastic and the fabric was high quality. This isn't something I would ever buy, so it was extra fun to rent for a special occasion.

I really enjoyed this dress! The fit was great with the exception of the length of the straps. If I had a bigger chest(I'm a 32A), I may not have had a problem, but the dress fit loose there. Fixed the concern with some garment tape, but that was my only complaint. The length was perfect! The color was great and I received a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Size and color were perfect for this fall wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress fit pretty perfectly. I have a small chest so had to get a little creative with some padding and tape but it was def worth it. Lots of compliments! Really comfortable to dance in :)
Great fit and amazing quality! I would definitely wear this dress again.

links_reviews_title: great color, odd fit, still cute
links_reviews_text: The color is great, the fabric of the material is very nice, thick and cute pattern. The fit is a little weird, I have a large bust and the straps felt big. Not sure if the intent is for the dress to be super plunging neckline? I pinned the straps back to help support the girls and wore a little bralette, just in case. I could have gone without pinning the dress, but everything felt a little more secure when I did. Definitely a cleavagey dress, but ain't nothing wrong with that. Overall, cute dress LOVED the color, while the fit wasn't perfect it's definitely workable.

Boyfriend picked this dress out and I have to admit that he did a pretty good job! The dress was absolutely perfect! I normally wear a 2-4 and had to go for the extra small to get my bust feeling secure. I was a little nervous at first-felt a little exposed with all that cleavage. But it honestly felt super comfortable once I relaxed a bit. It was a bit tight around my ribcage, but in a way that made me feel tucked and secure. Used two pieces of tape to keep everything in place and hit the dance floor. I would order it again!

links_reviews_title: I loved dancing in this dress! I was very comfortable and didn't die in the heat.
links_reviews_text: The dress was gorgeous, comfy, fit me perfectly. I was complimented over and over. The only con is my own fault, i didn't use sticky tape or anything and was so paranoid of a "nip slip" i kept touching my chest area and dress to make sure i was covered.

This dress was a showstopper! The material and fit were top of the line. It is very fitted up top and the neckline is very low so you have to be confident to wear it! I am usually a size 4-6 and am 34DD. With a little tape, the girls stayed where they belonged! I got a ton of compliments and would recommend to anyone comfortable showing some cleavage!

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and I got so many compliments. Perfect for a wedding any time of year!
links_reviews_text: I had to pin the top of the dress a bit where my shoulders were because it was a little baggy otherwise. I don't know if this would be the case for everyone, but I am in-between sizes, so the medium required this. The small wouldn't have needed this, but it was a little tight around my ribs. Overall, it was incredibly flattering and comfortable and I would definitely recommend!

Tight fit, runs small. There is no give around the ribs, so be advised. LOVED this dress. I wore it to the theatre and a night out on the town. There is a lot boob in this dress, I wore pasties and it stayed where it should. I was worried I would need double sided tape but there was a lot of support. There is so much detail in this dress. Good length and it's a little longer in the back so now worries about it showing your booty.

Overall a great dress! The fabric and color was stunning and elegant! The fit would have been perfect, but the straps became very loose after wearing it for a while, nothing a couple safety pins could fix though. I felt the perfect mix of elegant and sexy! I would definitely rent again!

Really fun, comfortable, pretty stress. I didn't feel too scandalous, but I also have no cleavage. Had to tape the sides down and pin the straps - they were several inches too long. Once that was done, the dress was great!

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: The small fit better in the bust area but literally broke the zipper trying to sit down in it. Went with the medium obviously and the waste fit well but the top was a little loose so needed to use a lot of fashion tape to prevent any wardrobe malfunctions. But I got lots of compliments and my dad said he didn't hate it!

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night long... but short girls watch out!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. The small fit my waist perfectly and the length was great. The only issue I had was how long the torso/straps were. I had to pin them up almost 2 inches to get the top of the dress to fit. Double-sided tape is definitely your friend with this dress! I used a bit of tape at my shoulders after pinning to keep everything PG. It's a great dress, but unless you're at least 5'6"/have a much larger chest be prepared to temporarily pin the straps.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful & well made but not for me
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well & was very well constructed. I am between a size 2 & a 4, but I tried the 2P because that was available. The fit was perfect, and I think the 4 would have been too large for my smaller bust. Overall I didn't love it simply because it did not feel like "me." You can tell in my body language in the photo that I'm not comfortable in it. It is flattering & forgiving, and if strapless is your thing then you will love this dress. In the end I chose a different style for my event.

This dress is beautiful but it was either super stretched out or it runs very large. A 0 fits me usually perfectly and this dress was falling off all night. I was very uncomfortable and it looked like a sack hanging. The wiring on the sides was very flimsy for a heavy beaded dress. I had to pinch my arms in all night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress fits like a glove.
links_reviews_text: A beautiful dress fits so well. I got lots of compliments.
This was my first RTR experience and I couldn't have been happier! The dress fit perfectly and was exactly the look I was going for.

I did not wear this to the event, but it was one of my alternatives, even though I never wear strapless. It's stretchy and fun with the sparkle. It's heavy. Length was perfect, not too long. Might need two people to zip you into it. You feel very hugged in it. I ended up going with a dress from RTR with straps and just overall more comfortable and flattering.

Wore this gown for a fundraiser last night. The size 6 was a bit tight in the chest, but fit everywhere else so o had to wear the size 8R. It fit better in the chest and was still a really good fit for the rest of my body. I'm 5'4" and 140. Did have to hold the dress up a bit when I walked because of the train in the back. Lots of compliments, felt beautiful the entire night. Definitely a Jessica Rabbit type dress.

Overall great fit. Didn't end up wearing because at the end of the day too plain and needed something more exciting. It is very forgiving along the tummy area. Would rent for event that he more formal.

links_reviews_title: I felt great wearing this dress and got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Was a little big on me, but I loved it! the length was slightly longer and it kept slipping down a little, but I would 100% wear it again! This was my first RTR dress and I'll definitely be doing this again.

Loved this dress, felt so glamorous! It was perfect for the formal event we attended and I received so many compliments. Good quality, has rouching in the middle to create a very flattering look. I was a little nervous about renting because I’m 4’11”, so length is always a concern. This was my backup, and so glad I picked it. My first choice was too long. This one seemed to run a little small. But, with the help of a corset and my hubby, we got it zipped. The dress brushed the floor, even with 5” heels, so I had pick it up to walk comfortably. It also has a small train which added to the gorgeous look, but I had to remember to pick it up to dance. The dress is on the heavy side, because of the sequins, so I found myself pulling it up now and again, and the sequins got a little scratchy under the arm by the end of the night. Great experience and will rent in the future.

Lovely dress and it fit great. Perfect for the Mardi Gras ball I went to. I’m 49 years old, 155 lbs (depending on the day), very nearly 5’ 7” (depending on the time of day). I wore a 10R dress with 4” heels and the bottom of the dress touched the floor. The dress has some stretch to it so it is comfortable.

I wore this dress for New Years and loved it! It was so flattering and looked amazing. I got compliments all night long. The top held up fantastically (not one of the dresses where you are pulling it up all night). And the length was perfect with 3" heels (I'm 5"4). I would absolutely rent again!
Very tight around the chest with my 34G top, and a little loose around the tummy. But it worked and I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a "Red Carpet" Holiday Party!
links_reviews_text: The 4P fit just right. The zipper is tough to zip so it made me nervous at first because I didn't think it would fit. The dress was form fitting and easy to walk around in and sit for a long dinner. I received soo many compliments!
The 6 fit great but decided to go with the 8 for more room in the chest. I got all kinds of compliments. I wish I could buy it so I could wear it again.

LOVED this dress. I'm 5' tall, and wore 5" heels and the petite length was perfect. I got so many compliments and felts like a princess. The dress has definitely been well worn, the zipper was a little iffy, and the right wire for the chest structure kept moving in the wrong spot and was slightly uncomfortable. It scratched my underarms a bit, but overall it was well worth it.

I'm 5'4". Long but great with tall shoes. Love love this dress. It looked amazing in pictures. Classy, sexy and fun. But painful. The top of the dress- the sequins were sharp. One of the wires was also poking out on one of the sides.

links_reviews_title: Very sparkly, and glittery! Made me feel glamourous but not too over the top!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a dream, and extremely comfortable all night long. Perfect length with my 3 inch heels. Overall very satisfied with RTR for the ease of use, and the quality of the items. However, a tear away lock was not included in the pocket for me to use for the return, so I purchased zip ties because I felt uncomfortable sending this back without one.

links_reviews_title: I felt absolutely amazing in this dress. It's comfy yet slinky.
links_reviews_text: Fit was spot on for me. It has a little stretch to it. The regular does run long. I am 5'6, wore 4 inch heels, and it still dragged a little. I would absolutely recommend renting this.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, and I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a Great Gatsby-themed gala for work. I loved it! It fit relatively true to size (maybe a bit smaller fit than my other size 8 dresses), but it was beautiful and fit the occasion perfectly! RTR was so easy, and I will definitely use again!
Great fit. This was my second choice dress and loved it. Had many compliments!

So my original rental got miss sorted at ups and my dresses were not going to be here in time for my event. I was so upset and stressed. RTR associates were very helpful and overnighted be two other dresses, not of my original choosing, but they were also very pretty. Well I was more than happy when I tried on the dress. It was a perfect length and fit. I'm 5'3 and 116lbs (4 months pregnant) and this dress was perfect. I had people at the ball come up to me and tell me how gorgeous my dress was which made me so happy since it wasn't my original choice. Very happy, I do wish I had gotten my original choices but I'm glad RTR was able to get me something

links_reviews_title: Loved the sparkles! Got complements all evening.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit tough because I was between sizes. The 2 was just tight enough to be uncomfortable, and the 4 was a bit loose. I ended up going with the 4 and putting a push up bra underneath to fill it out.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my Star Wars gala!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Long sparkly dress anyone would feel amazing in!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and fun! Received lots of compliments and felt amazing!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit every curve nicely
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect. It looked GORGEOUS. I thought the sequins would be too much, but they weren't. They were the right amount of dazzle without being too extra. The dress was a little heavy, but that's to be excepted with long dresses.

links_reviews_title: This is as close to the perfect black dress as you can get.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress that photographs well and bonus... it is comfortable. I am 5'1 and the petite length was great with 4in heels but I could have worn 2 in with it
Nothing negative to say about this dress it was beautiful, fit perfectly !!

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress, but the sequins hurt and it was a bit short
links_reviews_text: Lovely fit. Sequins hurt my arms and chest by the end of the night. I'm 5'7" and the 4 was a bit short on me

The dress fit like a glove and was a show stopper! The shape hugged every curve and the sparkle turned heads. This elegant and sexy dress was perfect! I'm only 5 foot tall and the 6 Petite fit very well. I read other reviews and decided to put on some large bandaids around my rib cage so that the boning in the dress (which others said could be sharp) wouldn't bother me - and it didn't bother me at all, not one bit. I went with an old hollywood glamour look to complete the dress.

I am 5'7, 140 lbs. and normally wear between a 4 and a 6. The 4 was extremely tight in the hips but fit great in the chest. The 6 fit better on the hips but was too big in the chest. I am a 32C. Wish I had taken the time to get some inserts because I did have to continuously pull it up throughout the night. Other than that the dress was great. Got tons of compliments. The sequins and material are very flattering. We had a huge dinner at the event which normally sucks when wearing a tight dress, but it the dress was still flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfect!!! The length was great for my 5'1 frame. I had so many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: Loved that it stayed up and I could breathe.

This dress is gorgeous! I am busty and it fit on top, however I did feel like I was pulling it up at times. I did wear a strapless bra with the dress. It is not something you can zip on your own. My husband and daughter had to zip me into it because the zipper is hard to pull up and hold the zipper close together at the same time. The dress buckled in the back a bit but wasn't noticable. I only had the 8 as the 10 wasn't available so I dont know if that would have been better. It is a comfortable dress to wear and you feel amazing in it. I am 5'7 and 1/2" tall and wore the 8R. I wore 2in heels. The 8L would have been too long for me. Can't wait to rent again!
Does rub under your arms but fit well

links_reviews_title: So comfortable abd flattering! Laus just right. Love it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing comfortable and flattering, This is one I will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I got married in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8 petite and even in 4 inch heels it was too long, which made the dress feel big. It was very comfortable, and stretched sort of like lycra, so dancing all night was a piece of (wedding) cake.

I wore this dress for a black tie NYE paryy and it was the perfect amount of sparkle and formality for the event. The dress is pretty form fitting so i went a size up. It has ruching along the waist and is form flattering. You dont need to wear a bra in this dress since it has built it in support but can you can go strappless if you want to.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a nee years wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress fits true to size. If you are small in the bust area, it may be slightly big there. The supports in the front of the dress are slightly annoying if you have nothing to hold it up. Otherwise, perfect dress!

links_reviews_title: This glamorous dress was perfect for a formal holiday ball.
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was spot on! I always worry about length but this was just right on my 5', 2" frame. The overall fit was perfect, too, though I did need a hand getting the zipper up. The dress has a bit of stretch so it is very comfortable. The sequins weren't scratchy either.
Petite fit perfect with 3 inch heels. Tons of compliments and comfortable to eat, socialize, and dance. Would rent again!

As a rather, ahem, top heavy woman I have to be pretty careful when it comes to strapless gowns. The material is stretchy so I sized down a bit and felt totally secure in this one! I had no trouble with the zipper despite the sequins, which look great but do get a little uncomfortable on the underarms after a while... totally worth it though. The length of the regular was slightly shorter than my absolute ideal, I'll probably order the long in the 8 if I do rent the piece again. Other than that it was great!
Liked the shirt. Quality of material was not as good as others, but pretty and different. I got some complements too.

links_reviews_title: Love love LOVE this material. Glides on and delicate but strong to the touch. Very nice stretch.
links_reviews_text: Pros- High Quality Material, fits nicely, and beautiful print. Con- Sheer/ See Through everywhere
I LOVED this and I plan to rent it again. It had a stretchy fit and was very comfortable.
The top is very cute - perfect fit all around. Loved the sleeves. Wore this for my birthday dinner with my husband and kids. Lots of compliments.

Loved this top. Very comfy yet form fitting. Slightly see through in the chest area. I wore a black bra which made it look like there was a bodice type liner underneath. Very stylish and fun for a party, date or evening out. Can be worn casual chic with jeans or dressier with a skirt or dressy pants. Will defintely rent again.

This top ran very small, so I was grateful to have sized up based on other reviews. It was very pretty, and I loved the flowy sleaves. They even pushed up easily for cooking. Great top for a date night or night out.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy Fabrics and Design Flattering and Fun
links_reviews_text: Netting of slightly sheer fabric is the best. Stretches for comfort and fit that is impeccable. Flutter sleeves really fun. Wore with black jeans and pale pink velvet heels. Love this shirt.

links_reviews_title: Fun top and the sleeves made a statement
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! Wore it to a friends 40th celebration. The sleeves definitely make a statement on this one. It is quite sheer so I️ wore a camisole underneath. The only drawback is the sleeves were long- so I️ had to pull them up a bit. Also a bit of a loan when washing your hands as they are long and hang- but worth the trouble!
Not what I'd hope for and a bit too snug
Long arms

links_reviews_title: Loved style, pattern is just OK
links_reviews_text: This shirt was flattering on. I tried it on with a blank cami under since its sheer but a black bra would be fine too. The arms were a fun detail. I didn't end up wearing this but would rent again. I'm usually a small and the M fit perfect.
The stretch shirt form fitting with flowing sleeves, fun.
If you're between sizes, go up. It's very fitted. The sleeves are fun and it made plain pants look festive for a comfortable outfit.
Loved this blouse. Very stylish and sophisticated.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top! High level of comfort. Loved it so much I'm keeping it!
links_reviews_text: The top runs a bit small, I rented the large; normally wear a medium. The top fit all of my curves. I wore a camisole underneath due to the sheer material. I would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Loved this -the tiered sleeves are fun and sexy.....not good to wear while cooking ( haha)!
links_reviews_text: Loved the very fitted body of this top - the tiered sleeves are fun and does run long as extends into your hand.

Pretty print. Dramatic and flattering cut. I wore this to speak on a panel at a conference and it was comfortable enough to not get hot on stage and flexible enough for me to move around since I use my hands to speak. :-) I'd order this again.
good fit, it was modest, yet stylish

links_reviews_title: The sleeves, the print and the fabrication rock on this top!
links_reviews_text: Sexy with coverage. It's fitted top, but there IS give. Love the neckline, too!
Wore this once with a camisole for a more conservative event and once without. Definitely sexy and fun with a bra showing through. Love the sleeves and form fittedness of it. Super pretty.
Needs an undershirt or tank top as it is very sheer. Very versatile and highly recommended

Absolutely loved this top. I wouldve bought it but a little more than I wanted to spend considering I prob wouldnonly get to wear a few times. Other than that it was perfect for a night out. I just wore a black bra underneath and even though it was sheer it was still flattering.

I loved this top, it was flattering yet had drama with the sleeves. The body of the top is see through, but not so much that it's tacky to just wear a black bra (in my opinion!) Great top for a night out.
Great

Loved everything about this top, the fit and fabric. Unfortunately the sleeves were super long! I was so excited to wear this but the sleeves were like, "no." Would definitely recommend this for a taller individual (I'm 5'4"), it's beautiful top.

links_reviews_title: The many compliments I got wearing this Fuzzi top!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, loved the sleeves! Lots of compliments
Stretchy fabric with a hint of print and fantastic long dramatic sleeves, this is great for a night out.

links_reviews_title: I like this top, it was unique
links_reviews_text: Leaves were a bit long, but you can bunch it up under the ruffles to adjust the length. It was a nice top. I usually wear a medium and sized up to a large based on other reviews.

I rented this top to wear to the Touring Company rendition of Kinky Boots. I generally wear a small to a medium in a top. The large fit perfect, but for me it was a little to sheer, so I ended up not wearing it. It is a beautiful top, very delicate.

I absolutely love this! I may need to purchase this one.... not sure I'm sending it back. It is sheer but my nude bra does not show through which is great. It has an elegant look to it. I could pair it with classy pants and wear it at work as well.

This shirt is a very light, comfortable, mesh-like material. It is 100% a tight top, but is very flattering to wear with a high waisted skirt or pants. The material is very thin, so don't worry about being hott in the long sleeves! Beautiful colors and sleeves are very unique.
Awesome dress loved it lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Raising money and awareness for abused children
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress for a fundraising gala. Stretchy and flattering with the lace, but does run small, so be sure to size up. The length is a little short, but looks great with nude heels and helps elongate petite legs.

I wore this for a formal work event. I received so many compliments. I was able to wear a regular bra with it which is always a plus. I typically wear a 6 but after reading the reviews and seeing it runs small, decided to size up to an 8 for my second size. Good thing I did! I tried on the 6 and it was very tight. I could've squeezed into it but knowing I would be uncomfortable and had a second size available I decided to wear the 8. It was much more comfortable however still form fitting. I was wearing tights underneath because it was very cold out and I kept feeling like you could see where the tights held snug around my waist. If it was warmer I definitely would have gone without them. I liked how the back had a v shape since the front comes up high like a boat neck. Overall it was perfect for a work event and I received tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Amazing but wow get your spanx ready
links_reviews_text: This dress was sooo glamorous and flattering, a totally showstopper. Surprisingly comfortable too! Definitely size up. I'm usually a 2/4 but even the 4 was pretty snug. If I rented again I'd prob go for the 6!

links_reviews_title: This dress sure does run small
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered this dress in the ivory in a size 8 (I'm normally a 6, so sized up based on prior reviews). When that was (way) too tight, I got the navy in a 10. Still super short, though it fit a bit better everywhere else. I wanted to wear this to a work holiday party but I didn't feel it was appropriate. BUT, the dress is pretty, so I'm going to wear it to an out-of-work event with some tights. Super pretty dress, but just be aware that it is pretty short!

links_reviews_title: It fit my curves nicely! This picture was without spanx! Nice length for my 5'4 frame.
links_reviews_text: I'll rent this again!

Really loved the color and the detail, fit true to size. Im tall (5'8) and did not find the dress to be too short, even with heels. The scalloped lace around the chest did fold in often , but overall loved the dress and was very comfortable all night long

links_reviews_title: A perfect look that still suits winter season!
links_reviews_text: I've never received more compliments on a dress in my life. This was so flattering on my legs and arms and allowed me to be comfortable even in early spring/winter. It is definitely short, so only rent this if you're comfortable showing off your legs! I would definitely rent this again.

I absolutely loved this dress. The dress definitely runs small. The 4 was too tight and short but the 6 fit great. It was so comfortable to wear and bonus is that you can wear a normal bra with it! Great length without being too short. I wish I could have kept it!
True to size, fabric and lace are high quality, great to dance in. I could wear a regular bra. Only downside is navy was so dark it photographs black. Would order again!
Fit true to size. Super comfy.

I am normally around a size 10 but very busty for my height- I am 5'2" and a 30H, and it is very hard for me to find things that fit and are flattering. This dress had the right amount of stretch and was very comfortable and did not require a nonstandard bra. I did wear spanx but didn't really need to- I could have worn the 12 but the 14 was only a tiny bit bigger and was more comfortable. This was my first RTR experience and it was positive, since this dress fit and I got some compliments at the event we attended which was cocktail attire.

links_reviews_title: It was nice day, with great weather and friends for a NY wedding.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress and look forward to renting it again, maybe in another color next time. I ordered a size 4 & 6. The 6 was a little big especially in the back and the 4 was a little snug on my hips but it fit way better than the 6. So I ended up renting the 4. The dress has double zippers. I was worried if it would unzip from the bottom while walking or sitting and it didn't. It was like it only had one zip. It does become short (like any other dress) when you sit but it depends on what your comfortable with. I received plenty of compliments throughout the night. Definitely a great dress to rent.
Loved this dress, but it runs really small. I ordered the 4 and had to wear the back up size and it was still a bit tighter then I like.
Ordered the 10 and 12. Wore the 12 for the length- it's VERY short- otherwise could've worn the 10 or 12. Great dress, would rent again.

This dress was by far one of my favorite rentals and I wish I could have kept it! The dress ran true to size, fit well, lace wasn't itchy at all, and the color was beautiful. Would definitely recommend!

I normally wear a 0 or a 2 and could have used a 4! I wore the 2. I'm 5"3 and 118lb It was a little on the short end and tight as well. It worked great for my photos and it didn't look short in them, and for being a tight dress it was very forgiving with the lace detail.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for Christmas Eve (in the south)
links_reviews_text: The fit was stunning. I felt very confident and beautiful in this dress. It was a bit short for church so I used my scarf to cover my legs while seated. but otherwise I thought the length was perfect for my short 5'2 frame.

This fits great! Its a little short when sitting down (and I am very short) so I cannot imagine it would be appropriate for anyone tall. However, I felt comfortable dancing in it. The lace at the neckline was a little bit itchy but manageable. The zipper is cool in that in completely unzips from either direction!

links_reviews_title: Classy, elegant, yet fun and sexy
links_reviews_text: This dress has some elastic give, which was exactly why I got it over a few other very pretty lace options I looked at. I wanted to be able to dance and not be uncomfortable knowing I was going to wear it from 1 pm- 11 pm, eating and dancing. Pros: elastic give; straight cut that was flattering; beautiful lace detail across the neckline, sleeve and bottom edge, with solid, lacy body; V-detail in the back; can wear regular bra (yay!!); good length. Any shorter would be an issue. Cons: Ran small in my book. I am consistently a size 0 in RTR (and have even worn a 0P) and other brands; I wear a size 25 jeans typically and am 107 lbs. So I ordered a 0 and 2 for the back up. The 0 was laughably tight. The 2 was a skin tight option and a hair short--perfect if it was a bachelorette party or if I was in Vegas. I called RTR and they sent the size 4 complimentary plus shipping to my hotel I was at, and it was PERFECT. Fit like a dream and was there when I arrived, having flown across the country. Would defs recommend, just verify size you want.

This dress is amazing. The color is absolutely gorgeous, and it fit like a glove. I'm typically a 2 or 4 in dresses like this, but only the 4 was available so that's what I ordered. Luckily, it fit perfectly. Super comfortable too. I felt great in this dress all night and got lots of compliments. Worn this time to my boyfriend's company holiday party, but would be great for many types of events or weddings. Classy yet sexy. Would definitely rent again. Another RTR win!

I am 5'4 and 105 lbs. Size 0 fit great. Only complaint is the zipper that runs the full length didnt lay flat. I think i needed a curvier butt to rock it. So if you are built without a lot of curves, it will be cute but would be better with a butt.

I wore this dress for a wedding anniversary in late December. I could have easily fit the 10, but felt too self conscious about extra curves and bulges. The layer under the lace in the body was warm and soft, buy not too stretchy. Overall, I loved how classy the dress looked.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Sad to send it back!
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I chose this as my backup because this dress is GORGEOUS. I received so many compliments at my work holiday party!
Beautiful dress that wears well and is very comfortable. Do size up. It is very short so make sure youre okay with that. I have broad shoulders and long legs and it worked well.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress, runs small, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience! I had a wedding to attend and thought why not try RTR! My experience was OK. I am usually a size 4 and read reviews fhat this dress runs small, so I ordered a size 6 and 8. The day before the event UPS had a delay and the dresses i picked didnt come in time. I called RTR and they said onky a size 6 was available and they shipped it at the location the wedding was! (Talk about nervous breakdown)...luckily the size 6 fit; it was a little snug in the chest area.....but it worked! Overall i think the size 8 would have been a better choice. I did get alot of compliments and will try RTR again

links_reviews_title: A lot of wine and a lot of dancing :)
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It was comfortable and easy to dance in. My only complaint is that the length was shorter than I would have liked (self-conscious about my thighs). I felt confident and pretty in it, which rarely happens anymore as a mom of 3 with a flabby tummy, deflated boobs, and inches of baby weight that’s never coming off. My husband’s response when he saw me in it: “Wow! How can I buy that for you?!”
Perfect fit, very comfortable, and compliments all night long!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my boyfriends fire department dinner. Received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit snug and was very forgiving material.

Absolutely gorgeous dress. 6 actually fit better than the 8 which seemed smaller than it should be. Glad to be able to rent two sizes! Wore to cocktail hour and dinner. Silhouette and shape were extremely flattering. Nonstop compliments all evening.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress, that photographs well.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress, that photographs well. I felt it fit true to size. However, it is a tad on the short side. I'm typically a 4, and this one fit me great but for this event I did't want it to be too short so I went with the 6. It is very form fitting so it still fit very well. It feels shorter on than it really is, maybe because from where the hems stops but then the lace come down another inch or so. It was very comfortable to be in all evening. I still didn't want to take it off by the end of the night nor send it back!
This dress was absolutely perfect! It fit great, was extremely comfortable, and looked amazing. It was great for a fall wedding and I would 100% rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this dress and wish I could buy it!
links_reviews_text: I had so many compliments on this dress. Yes, it was a little on the shorter side but still very classy and very flattering. The smaller size fit me perfect, it was comfortable and great for an outdoor Fall wedding in South Carolina!

It fit my daughter perfectly but alittle short if you have long legs. She usually wears a 0 or 2. Usually we need the bigger size due to length. We had a little issue with a tear that we missed when we original got it but she was still able to wear it. Next time we will check the item more thoroughly when they arrive. RTR was fabulous correcting the issue. We will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress will make you feel like the bee's knees. :)
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely darling! First of all, I want to give RTR a shout-out. They allowed me to pick a second back-up last minute. The original dress I wanted wasn't available, and at the time I didn't put too much thought into the back-up I first picked, thinking I wouldn't need it (whoops!).
