The original back-up dress was much too formal for a country-style wedding. So I did some quick browsing, and found this gem! I was a little self-conscious at first, as it isn't very forgiving in the tummy area. I did wear spanx in the beginning, but those did not last long, haha, I felt way too restricted. The dress is just so beautiful that you quickly learn to let go of the itty bitty flaws of yo-self, because you'll feel like a queen in this dress. I received many compliments. Being so short (5' 0"), it was really nice to have a dress that was actually kinda short on me (for once in my life). Not like "I'm goin' clubbin'" short, but just short enough to be sexy, hitting about mid-thigh. The lace detailing is beautiful. But I do agree with most of the other ladies on here... size up. I'm usually a size 4, but I went with a 6, and it seriously fit like a glove. The sleeves weren't too tight, and it zipped right up effortlessly. However, had I gone with a 4, it probably would have been a struggle to get in it, or I would have been uncomfortable all night. Again, this dress was wonderful, so far my favorite one from RTR, it was hard to give her back. You won't be disappointed in this one.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could keep it! Amazing Dress!
links_reviews_text: Order a size up!!! I ordered a four(4) because all of the dresses in my closet that fit are a 4. I was very glad to have the six(6) as a back up because that is the one I wore. The size 6 felt better and the zipper on the back laid flat. It runs small and the fabric doesn't have any give to it at all. It was a beautiful dress, perfect for the evening wedding we attended, and I received many, MANY compliments on it!
It fit really well- super comfy to wear. Loved the navy blue. I usually wear a size 2 but the 4 fit well, was a little short at times

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! I was worried it might be too short, but it was actually perfect; hitting below my fingers (arms extended downward) by 2". For reference, I am small busted with curvy hips!

I'm usually between a 12-14 depending on the type of dress. The 14's fit was very comfortable so I didn't even both trying on the 12. I have fuller hips and a large bust and felt this dress was flattering. Great for a early September wedding. Be prepared for it to be quite short when you sit. The zipper also runs the length of the dress and can be a little troublesome so use some TLC. Overall, good experience!

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, very comfy and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Tight fit
Super comfortable! Wore with flats. Appreciated the forgiving stomach area. Flattering design that had an open back, so had to go braless. Overall very very comfortable and easy to move around.

links_reviews_title: Amazingly classy dress, felt like a movie star!
links_reviews_text: This dress’ front and back would look stunning on any body type. Make sure to select the correct length if you are to wear heels, like I did. I ended up wearing the 12L as I wanted the front to be a bit loose. Everyone complimented me at my best friend’s wedding.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments on this dress, many people asked where it was from.
links_reviews_text: Great gown. Worn for military banquet. Fit me true to size and the petite option was perfect for my height. I liked the back better than the front but still felt comfortable in the gown for the evening.

This was a fantastic dress for my gala event. 7 months prego and worried what to wear. This fit beautifully. I wore the 6R, I am normally a 2/4. This dress didn't have stretch per se but the way the material lays and how much material there is made it lay perfectly on the belly. It does run short, I'm 5'5" and wore flats since I was running around on my feet for 16 hours (prego probs) so the length worked for my needs but heels of any height would have made it too short - get the Long if you are wearing heels. The sizes listed are my usual sizes.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful (and comfortable) with my bump!
links_reviews_text: Bump friendly! I typically wear a 0 or 2 but sized up to a 6 for my 25 week belly. The material is super stretchy which made it comfortable to wear all night! A lot of dresses I tried ended up being too short since the bump pulls the fabric up but this dress was the perfect length. I'm a jewelry designer so I had fun pairing this dress with some of my favorite Earrings! Highly recommend for a formal affair or even a engagement/maternity session! AlexandraGioia.com

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for an adult prom event, and it was a hit! It fit true to size. I was able to go without a bra, but someone with a larger chest may need some stickies. I wore four inch heels with it, and it fell to the perfect length then. I was a little concerned with the train on the back, but I didn't have very many issues even when I was dancing the night away!
I ordered a long because I'm tall. All the reviews of women my height included a picture with a dress very long. Mine came and it was so short!!! Horrible first experience with RTR

This dress was amazing! I'm 5"2 and wore 3 inch heels and it was the perfect length. Width wise it was so comfortable and roomy which is great for if you plan on eating and drinking without worrying about a food baby showing. Overall it was beautiful and comfortable.

Loved the fit and the color. It was just what the bride was looking for me to wear as the MOH. It didnt rub on my underarms like some sequins dresses do and it was nice that I just packed ut up and shipped it off after the wedding was done. Got tons of compliments on this dress! Loved the back unfortunately dont have a pic of it.
This dress made me feel like I walked out of Marilyn's personal closet! It fit wonderfully and I felt like a star.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress! Fast Shipping! Easy Process!
links_reviews_text: This dress is just as beautiful as the picture. Color is almost exact. I am 5'7 and wear a 6/8. I went with a 6R and was nervous about the length. Everything worked out perfect! I wore 3 inch heels and the length was great. The 6 was perfect. I would suggest if you are between sizes to size down. I also suggest wearing you hair up to show off the back. I received many compliments throughout the night! Will be renting again!
Great fit! Felt so chic

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and found it flattering even at 7 months pregnant. Perfect amount of sparkle
links_reviews_text: Pros: good fit, lots of stretch and sequins were not scratchy. I loved this dress and would wear/rent again!! Flattering in photos.
Fit like a glove. Even the length was perfect. I was amazed how comfortable this was!
Wore 2" heels. I'm 5'2, 125 and fit perfectly. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Would be flattering on an expecting mom - I am not and it was terrible
links_reviews_text: This would be great for an expecting mom body. The knot would be very flattering. I disliked this dress a lot. It did not flatter my body at all and the length is awkwardly short for heels - likely perfect for flats.

It was my 30th birthday and I had been planning for a year to have all my friends up in wine country for a formal dinner party. When I found myself 8 months pregnant for the occasion, my wardrobe selection was limited. Cue rent the runway. This dress hugged all the right places and yet was super comfortable!
Absolutely amazing gown. Receives compliments all night! Runs bigger than expected.

links_reviews_title: Ok Dress. Fit not quite right.
links_reviews_text: It's a really pretty dress and I LOVE the train. The front part was super weird though. Too much material especially if you don't fill it out much. Regular length was good for me with four in heels. I'm 5'3". The belly part is also weird. Kind of baggy and accentuates any problem areas even though I thought the opposite would happen with the little extra give. Just weird.
This dress fit great! I got so many compliments on this dress! I usually wear a petite but I was able to wear the regular with 3 inch heals.

links_reviews_title: Perfect gown for my first Mardi Gras Ball. I was the Belle of the ball.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted accentuates all curves. Not too much stretch but a great fit overall

It fit really well. I wore it for husband's 40th party. Really stood out from the crowd. Got lots of compliments. It fit perfectly. I wear size 4R and the 4P was perfect. Sequence was very comfortable too, didn't hurt at all. I wore it for more than 6 hours. Would definitely recommend. Fan of Badgley Mischka now.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my daughter for prom...she loved it!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little big in the bust for my daughter, but overall fit very well. She's 6ft tall, so we were glad that it comes in long!
This was an emergency Saturday morning delivery. It fit perfectly. Looked gorgeous whenever photographed

links_reviews_title: Super glamorous! Perfect for NYE wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, I wore a sticky bra since the dress was backless and had to safety pin the train because it was a little long even with heels. The sequins caught the light and were shimmering all night. The dress was comfortable and I really liked how it looked-- definitely recommend!!

The dress style might work better for somebody taller. I was 8 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress, and so how a little bump, so the twist in the front made me look a little bigger than I actually am. The back is beautiful. While I ended up wearing it, I wasn't as confident as I have been in other rentals. I'm 5'2" and the Petite length fit, but I wore short heels. If you are wearing taller heels, I would recommend the regular length.

links_reviews_title: Leave a little sparkle where you go
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my Junior League's annual Holiday Market preview party. I felt fabulous! Of course I had the issue with the dress being too long, despite the fact that I chose petite and wore 4 inch heels. Petite in high fashion must be for those 5'4" +. Anything shorter must be considered a "petite petite". The dress being backless meant going without a bra, but I was surprised at how loose the dress felt. Maybe because it was backless?
I am 24 weeks pregnant and I was comfortable all night in this dress. The bust was a little big but pre pregnancy I was a 34A so this may not be an issue for everyone.
I felt beautiful in this gown!
This dress hugs every curve and is absolutely gorgeous in person.

It was a comfortable and glamorous dress for a black tie event. I was on the event committee so I was running around the whole time and I was able to do so easily. The regular length was perfect for me to wear comfortable flats (I am 5'4"). The only bad thing is that it was a little too big up top. I did not wear any kind of backless bra, although I could have and that probably would have made it fit better. Overall I am pleased with this dress and would rent it again!

I had a downfall with my order which almost gave me an anxiety attack ! I received an email that my dress would be one day late. I called to ask about it and they told me that my dress was out of stock. I was so upset. They sent me another dress which I wasn't too happy with because I was a bridesmaid! I finally got a "shipped" email and apparently the girl on the phone was an idiot because my original order still shipped. My dress came and I ordered a 6 R and an 8R. They honestly both fit the same, but the 8 R was a little longer. I chose to wear the 6R. I received so many compliments, it was crazy! Everyone loved the dress. It was beautiful and very true to the champagne (light gold) color. My only complaint or con is that on one side of the dress, where the zipper is, the sequins let rubbing against my arm, so all night I kept messing with it, the next day I had a red spot on my arm and it looked like minor scratches due to the rubbing of the sequins against my arm. Other than that, the dress was gorgeous! I would get a good backless bra, my bra was just hose silicone pads that you stick on, not the best choice
Comfortable fit! Wore shoes 2 inches high and dress was a little short, but still loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my reception and it felt very vintage Hollywood glamor!
links_reviews_text: Fit is very forgiving if you have any problem areas. The color is beautiful and true to the website photo. I would chosen the petite length but since it was unavailable I went with the regular length. With 3" heels it was still a little long but not too bad.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments. The back was the highlight of the dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. If you are busty, you don't have to wear any bra. Since I'm not, I have a wear a self-taped bra. The sequins are a little scratchy at first along the armpit. The length was a little long at the back even with a 4" heel, that I kept catching on to my heels. Overall, I got to dance comfortably without tripping.
At six months pregnant this dress still allowed me to feel beautiful while taking my engagement photos! Had some issues with length and customer service was extremely nice and accommodating!

links_reviews_title: I was the maid of honor to my best friend's wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress felt and looked stunning on me. I'm normally a 4L, but the dress I had gotten was damaged last minute. Thankfully the 2L fit perfect! I had to be careful of what underwear I wore though, because the shape of my hips really showed under the dress. The color was perfect and it was a perfect fit for the wedding!

I wore this dress for a pageant and it was stunning!! I got so many compliments on it. The 2R fit so great that I didn't even bother trying on the 4R. With 3 inch heels, it was a tiny bit shorter than I would've liked, but no big deal whatsoever. I wasn't sure what color shoes to wear with this dress as it is not silver but not really gold either, but I went with a taupe metallic heel. Also had to buy a backless bra. Love this dress!

I wore this dress as a bridesmaid for a classy upscale wedding. The fit was large, I usually wear a 2 or 4 and the 2 was a bit big on me and it dropped in the back. RTR didn't have the long because it was retuned back to them ruined, so I had to wear the regular, which was too short with my heels on. Other than that, the dress sparkled in the sun and I got a ton of compliments on it. I love Bagley Micshka and it didn't disappoint.

links_reviews_title: Hallelujah it worked!!!! I love you RTR!!!
links_reviews_text: I seriously felt so proud and honored to wear such a gorgeous dress that I would not have been able to afford if it were not for RTR! I got so many compliments through out the night of my best friends wedding saying how gorgeous the dress was! Everything worked out so well as far as the shipment, the packaging, and the fit and design of the dress! I was delighted to find that I fit in the 2R that I ordered instead of the 4R that I am accustomed to wearing. The only negative I had was I wish there would have been a 2L available because it was a little short even without heals. Thank you RTR for helping make my best friend's wedding a breeze for me!

links_reviews_title: Light material with enough stretch to let it hug the curves.
links_reviews_text: A little short but totally doable. Everything else was great.

This dress was fun and easy to wear. The fabric is nice and doesn't show every flaw. It shows some bras in the underarm section (as shown here). But my bra didn't show with the bra I ended up wearing with it.
Color was a bit duller in real life than in photos. Too large, so gapped at the armpits, too big around the middle. Loved the ruffles, fabric was thicker, so good for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: I normally wear a 10 but the 8 worked great! Simple but very pretty. The ruffles dressed it up!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this dress. Very flattering. Very comfortable. Great quality fabric.
Loved this dress on comfy and cute nice fabric and fit

links_reviews_title: Unique plum color with fun details
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed the color on this dress because black gets boring after a whole but everyone knows darker shades are more flattering. This plum color also gave me a chance to accessorize with my new amythest necklace! The fit was good. Some of the ruffles at the hip made me question if they made me look bigger but i decided it looks like the dress not me. If the fabric wasnt such a nice thick quality it wouodnt poof up as much there but alas its quite nice fabric.
Def worth the rental. This is probabl one of m favorite dresses ever, would def get again.

links_reviews_title: Great rental for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! The rich dark purple color was pretty for a winter wedding. The ruffles were a fun change and I received many compliments. Dress runs big, i wore my backup size and could have even gone down one size. Wore with a normal bra. Great rental, thanks RTR!
I'm typically a size 4 and ordered a 2 as the backup. The 2 was definitely a better fit! The color is beautful and the overall style is SO flattering!
I was 3 weeks postpartum and this dress was very flattering and comfortable. I went a size pigger but I think my prepregnancy size would have worked too.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for a fall outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, only complaint is it came a little wrinkly but I just ironed it no issue. :) Beautiful dress for a fall outdoor wedding, got many compliments. Is a thicker, nicer material but doesn't feel heavy when wearing! Would definitely buy if I could! Flattering fit, and the cute ruffled sleeves laid nicely, naturally.
Fit great and made me feel confident!

links_reviews_title: dress color and fit was a dream
links_reviews_text: The dress fit me perfe tly and the color was great for a warm fall day. i paired it with Kate Spade earrings on RTR and strappy sandals.
This was a very comfortable dress with a loose fit.

Had an issue with my RTR order. This was my 3rd pick, overnighted to me so that I had something for an option. I was very pleased with this dress. Although it was a bit too large it worked for the night! It has great detail with the large ruffles on the sides making it less "tent" like. I would certainly recommend this dress to anyways but just make sure you size down. Also, make sure you have some sort of steam available whether it be a steamer or a hot shower for 20 minutes. This dress wrinkles very easy. Would rent again even after these few issues!
The fit of this dress is super flattering and forgiving. I had tons of compliments on the amazing color as well.
Really enjoyed wearing this dress. Very well made and fit like a dream. Was incredibly comfortable to wear and dance in. The ruffles added enough personality for it to not be too boring.

links_reviews_title: Just ok - ran big and wasn't particularly flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit large, and had large arm holes that showed too much bra. Had to belt it to give the dress shape.

Although I am not a huge fan of short sleeve dresses, I really did like how this purple crepe, crew neckline fits. Love the ruffles on the side and the loose fit of the dress. I usually wear a size 4 and although I think it runs true to size, I recommend sizing down for backup. With comfortable room at bust it is great for any cup size. This piece is not fitted with some stretch and has comfortable room throughout midsection and hips. With a closed back, this piece can be work with a standard bra. At 5'6 the length hit me at mid-thigh to my knees. Pair it with a sleek bracelet and nude heels.
Well made, very exact, I ordered the wrong size so I couldn't wear.
I have a lot of Rebecca Taylor dresses and size 2 usually fits perfectly. This one fits really big. Wore a belt so I could wear it, but it was too big with too much fabric. Size down!
It was right up top but loose on the bottom. It's prob good for someone wanting to hide their lower half or has more curves

links_reviews_title: This dress is so flattering on! And the color is lovely. Great to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: Fits snug around the bust, but loose in the ribs, waist, and hips. Falls just above the knees. The flutter detail is flattering, flirty, and fun.
Runs big, so definitely size down. Loved the color, but the dress is a bit boxy.

links_reviews_title: Was a little big so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Was just a little big on me so sending it back!
fit true to size and flattering
Flattering fit, thicker material, understated - but ruffles add a unique detail

I thought this dress was relatively flattering on me, but nothing special or memorable. I have a shorter torso, larger bust and hourglass shape. I wore the 8 but there was just a touch of extra fabric in the back of the waist that could be taken in. If you have some insecurities or extra weight in tummy area, I'd suggest wearing spanx underneath because it doesn't glide over everything.
Looks great on some reviewers but I found it only okay on my curvy figure.

Overall, this dress was super cute and loved the ruffle detail. The color was perfect for an outdoor fall wedding! The only thing I would suggest is to definitely size down. I'm usually a size 4, but ended up going with the smaller size as my backup. The length was perfect and hit just above my knees. Easy to dance in and the material wasn't too thick or thin.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Got TONS of compliments throughout the day and night.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size - only negative is the back would sometime hike up a bit and feel too short.
Overall, it hugged my body just right.
Wore this to a baby shower. Jazzed it up with a necklace!

links_reviews_title: It was a classy dress fit for a low-key formal dinner.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for day or night!
links_reviews_text: This was not my first pick, but after my first dress was unavailable, RTR sent this one to me, and I am glad they did! This is an adorable dress, and would definitely be perfect for work and transition seamlessly to night. I wore it with statement earrings and dressed it up for a Christmas concert with my significant other's family. I would say that the size is pretty TTS, but perhaps a little big. If you're between sizes, I would order your true size and go one down for backup. I was worried about the overall cut / ruffles making me look bigger than I am, especially since I have an extremely short waist, but that wasn't a problem at all. Great dress -- the only thing that could make it better is pockets!
I'm typically around a size 2 and this dress was a little big, fit loose, and did not work for a cocktail party. Would be much better for someone with some curves or to wear to work. :)
runs big. I would get an 8 next time instead of the 10. Beautiful style. perfect for work and dinner afterwards.
This dress was so fun to wear. The fabric shows some natural bumps, so I wore a slip to smooth things out. The length was perfect for flats or heels.
This dress is gorgeous - I didn't want to return it! I will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore at a cocktail party gala
links_reviews_text: Great color and fit. Loved the cap sleeves and flair at the hips for a stylish, elegant look and practical coverage. Good length, at the knee; not too short, even when sitting.

Very nice dress. I most often wear size 6, but I do have wider hips and the 6 was a bit tight in that area. The top of the size 8 had a weird shaping issue, it didn't rest on my skin and kind of puffed up, but my hair covered it and I didn't let it bother me. I wouldn't have bought it, but was happy to rent and wear it.

links_reviews_title: I'm usually more of a loose and flowing A line dress style, but I tried this and LOVED IT!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments. Based off some of the reviews, I ordered my normal size (4) and went up one size (6) just in case it was tight. However, the 4 worked out perfectly and it fit over my booty well too!

links_reviews_title: Great dress. I loved the print for a summer wedding and got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size I am usually 4-8 in dresses depending on the shape (I am a pear) and the 6 worked great for me. Dress definitely was on the tighter side on the bottom for me but I think the size up would have been too big up top. Highly recommend! I am 5’4 145lbs
Only con is the liner would ride up sometimes & the slit has a pull. But I def give this dress all the stars!
Such a pretty dress! It ran a bit loose on the top and tight through the ribs but it was very flattering on and comfortable!
Great dress, beautiful detail on the back, sexy but classy! Fits 29" waist,39" hips just right
The back made it look cheap but liked the dress
It was a really nice dress. Wore it for a friends birthday dinner. Great quality I wore a 6 and it fit perfect Im about 137 pounds.

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear because it is cut small and my second size wasn’t available.
links_reviews_text: I think if this would have been available in my second choice size, a size up, I would have loved this dress.
Tons of compliments! Love the cut!
Beautiful dress for a summer cocktail wedding!

This was one of three dressed I ordered for my anniversary dinner. Unfortunately, this was very tight through the ribcage. I might have liked it better if I had sized up, but I wasn't crazy about the back of the dress.
This dress was so fun and comfortable. I was afraid that I would need to wear a bra but it holds you in all the right places.
Great dress, great fit and received tons of compliments!

A few weeks prior to wearing this maroon one I had rented the black for another party. Love the way it fits and I could go totally braless without feeling uncomfortable or that it was so noticeable. Not too short and love that the back is revealing without actually being backless. If the black one ever goes on a sample sale, I'd purchase it in a heartbeat!
Great fit, comfortable!
This dress was not only super sassy, but also really comfortable. Showed off my curves perfectly.
Easy fit, nice stretch to it and overall very sexy for a fabulous party!
Great fit and quality! Many compliments and easy to dress down with some flats and a jean jacket or up removing jacket and adding heels

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous lace but size up 1-2 sizes
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but there isn't much give in the midsection so I ended up going up from a 6 to a 10. The 10 fit very comfortably though and was a great shift dress with lace details. Fiancé loved it too ;)

links_reviews_title: I had so many people mention how great the dress looked and I felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: Amazing amazing amazing! I had so many compliments on this dress I may just need to rent it again. Love it!
Dress fit perfectly, no bra needed, super cute, not too short. Was perfect with nude heels. I'm 5'6", 133 lbs and 34C. I got so many compliments.
This dress is awesome!! I received a ton of compliments. I loved the quality! The cut is very feminine and the length is just short enough to add a sexy flare.
Received so many compliments on this dress. I loved it. Wore it as a host for an awards dinner and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: It was so nice and breathable which is perfect for an event that involved dancing.
links_reviews_text: It fit really well; however, I would've preferred it to be somewhat tighter around the chest. My only main concern was that it had a very short slip underneath that could ride up easily, especially if you have a bigger butt. Other than that, I absolutely loved this dress and am totally planning on renting it again!! I wasn't sure about all the ruffles either but they looked great so I couldn't be happier with the dress.

Rented for a Christmas party. I actually rented both the red & green dress. The red fit me best so I let my friend borrow the green. I'm 5"5 and 125. Loved the classy look & feel of dress with an edgy sexy feel.

Super fun, flirty & sexy while still being classy! Very flattering fit, especially for shorter people. Fabric was comfortable. Couldn't wear a bra but didn't really need one with the way the fabric is made around the chest.
I rentEd this dress on a size 6 first and it was a little big then I order a size 4 and it was perfectly I got many complements all night. I definitely would order again

links_reviews_title: Beautiful comfortable dress. Sexy with sass
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. I will rent this again. I probably could have worn a size for and really held my breast up and in but the 6 was fine for tightness there. My breast's are au natural so normally I need tape in dresses like this to pull them up and keep them in place but this dress I didn't need any support. I would go a size down not a size up when ordering. Maybe dresses are bigger because they are rentals and worn more because normally a 6 would be snug on my breast area! Wore a light nude color shoe it was perfect! Will rent again!
This dress is my favorite so far!! Comfortable and so flattering!!

I loved this dress so much! I received so many compliments. I was a little worried about how low the dress went in the front since I just had a baby 6 months ago, but I was very flattering with the lace. It looked pretty short on the model but it was just the right length. I'm 5'3 and 145. The size 10 fit perfectly! I would definitely rent this dress again.

This dress is so unique and special! I received compliments all night. It fit true to size but definitely isn't for larger busts. Sleeves and ruffles were super cute and not overbearing. Would recommend for any cocktail/semi formal occasion!

links_reviews_title: The lace detailing is what makes this dress really stand out!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs slightly big, I typically wear size 6, but I think I could have gone with a size 4. The dress is also for girls who are bustier as it's roomier in that area. Also you can't wear a normal bra, you have to use stick ons. Length is on the shorter side, perfect for petite sized women. Overall great dress, would rent again!
This dress was beautiful, I received so many compliments!
Fit was great and very comfy. Sexy but still appropriate for a work holiday party. Wore a nice bra and you could see it but I felt that was better than no bra at all. Love this dress!
I liked this dress it's really cute and trendy . Was too trendy for me but fit great I Normandy wear a size 12 . I have a bigger waist and didn't think this was flattering on my waist.

I've rented this dress before in black and it did not disappoint. No bra is needed. It's sexy without being too revealing and is perfect for a party, wedding or date night. I received compliments all night and people kept asking where I got it. Love this one!
Normally I'm fine in 0/2 even with 30F chest but this was VERY snug. Doable just tight

I rented this dress for my sorority's semiformal in a 0 with a backup size of a 2. The 0 fit perfectly! It was comfortable and I didn't even have to wear a bra. It's perfect if you want a statement dress that is still fun to dance in. Also, the color is absolutely beautiful!
I got so many compliments all night, it fit me perfectly, and I felt so comfortable in this dress! I was worried it was going to be too short, but it was just perfect.
I'm usually not a fan of a high neck but this was very comfortable! The fabric has a nice weight to it without being too heavy. I received so many compliments and would definitely rent it again!

I wore this for my friend's rehearsal dinner and loved it! It was sweet but sexy. I wore a nude bra , which worked well with the peek-a-boo lace in the front and back. As a tall girl, it was on the shorter side but I wore flats to balance it out. I didn't want to send it back - fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: I felt gorgeous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Both the 8 and 6 fit, but I felt more comfortable in the 8. The tricky part was the bra, which I definitely needed. I was able to find a backless plunge that worked great!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!!! I want to buy it! So comfortable and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful and the fabric is soft while still being sturdy

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for cocktails the night before a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Nothing wrong with the dress - great quality, all lace in tact! But it was simply too big from the waist up. Its meant for a taller, larger busted woman, which I'm just not. I pinned it at the base of my neck to make it work and was conscious of extra fabric in the bustline, no bra was comfortable. I made it work, but either I needed a 00 or it's better for women a little bigger and taller.

links_reviews_title: The most compliments I've ever gotten on a dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a friend's wedding and it did not disappoint. The fabric is a little thick, so it was nice for a slightly chilly day and made me feel covered even with the dramatic cutouts and fact it was knee length. I wore a 2, which was true to size. There was a little extra room for me in the waist and hips, which was nice for dancing and indulging in wedding food, although I realize this may not be true for everyone. The ruffles on bottom were fun for shaking my hips on the dance floor! The color is beautiful as well. I can't say enough good things!

I was unsure about this dress when I first received it, but wore it at th encouragement of my husband and friends. I felt it was true to size and easy to wear without a bra! Very comfortable and received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit great! It was unique and I got a lot of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Fits great! Fitted, without being too fitted. I was also able to wear a nude bra and you couldn't even see it. The ruffle skirt was awesome and even though it was short, made it not too revealing if you were moving or dancing.
The dress was perfect for a fall barn wedding! So comfortable and I got lots of compliments. RTR rocks
Great dress, loved the fit. It was a little short, but I have great legs, so I didnt mind. Loved everything about it. Its fun and flirty. I weigh 150, and 5'6, rented a size 4.

This dress!! I originally was going to rent this dress in black, but then I saw it in the burgundy and was sold. (after this rental however, I will rent the black one someday!) It fit like a glove. A bit on the short side, as I am only 5'4", which made dancing and sitting just something you had to be aware of. It's the perfect combination of sexy and sophisticated. Also, husband approved and SO MANY compliments.
5'3, 125, 34D wore the 2 but could have gone down a size. Got a lot of compliments and felt very comfortable all night.
I got a lot of compliments on this dress. Perfect for the fall wedding.

The dress couldn't have been more perfect. It was so comfortable! I got loads of compliments. The color was great, and the cut makes it extra flattering. I normally wear petites in dresses, but didn't have to in this one. Such a classy dress with a unique twist on it.
Perfect for a Fall wedding. The 0 fit but the 2 was more comfortable
Easy to wear and accessorize, would rent again
I rented this dress for a October wedding! And loved it! I felt amazing all night! I am pretty little and 2 fit me great with a little room too! Probably could have worn a 0. Would rent again!
Absolutely loved the fit of this dress and felt amazingly comfortable in it.

This dress was perfect for a rustic wedding we went to. It does fit snug to show your curves so if you plan on drinking and eating a lot I would suggest going a size up so you're more comfortable. Overall I'd highly recommend!
Loved this dress! It was perfect for a wedding, and I received so many compliments! Needs a racer back or strapless bra

links_reviews_title: Great dress for summer/early fall weddings!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I ended up wearing my backup size (10, I'm usually an 8) simply because the 8 felt a little too tight for a wedding occasion. It was really comfortable and easy to move in, plus the color is gorgeous and the ruffle adds some fun. I got a bunch of compliments! Perfect for a summer or early fall occasion. Would definitely consider renting this one again!
Dress fits perfectly, very comfortable, sexy, easy to move/dance in. I received SO many compliments on the color. Definitely recommend for cocktail type events.

Love the color - much more vibrant in person. I sized up from normal; the 6 technically fit but was tighter than I like, especially around the chest. The 8 felt appropriate but still fitted and flattering. The arm holes were a tad low so I used some tape to make sure my bra didn't show. Wore strapless bra. I think it's best accessorized with nice earrings as the ruffle doesn't need a necklace. Great length too (I'm 5'2"). Definitely recommend!

This dress was a lovely color, very comfy material, and the ruffle was a fun detail. But I didn't love the fit - I found it to be on the small side (I usually wear a four but could have gone up to an 8). The 6 bust and hips were both a little tight and the material around the hips rode up a bit. Still, overall it was a nice date night dress, with more give than I expected after a big dinner. Would recommend but definitely size up 1-2 sizes!

I usually wear a six and ordered this in both a six and an eight based on reviews. Both fit and I could have worn either! The 8 just was a little bit more comfortable. I could not wear a regular bra with it. Super comfy and lined well. Got lots of compliments!!
Wore this dress to a wedding. The color is even more beautiful in person, it fits like a glove! It is form fitting without being too tight. It's my favorite dress I've been rented on RTR!
I read reviews before so I ordered a size up so glad I did! Even with the size up it still was a little tug but I'm 9 months postpartum so my body is a little off. Overall it was really cute

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with a nice fit!
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding. Nice thick fabric. I'm 5'4" and it was a little past my fingertips. I would normally wear a 0/2, but this dress was snug, so I sized up to a 4 and that worked great. The 4 felt a little big, but once I added heels, it fit perfect! Would highly recommend this dress!

Loved this dress. Length was perfect for my height. (5'1") after reading reviews I ordered a size up and the larger size since others said it ran small. I ended up wearing the 2. It was a tad tighter then I wanted for a family wedding but the 4 was too big. I am typically a 0. The ruffle detail on the side added a nice touch of sophistication without being too over the top. Would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, super comfortable and a beautiful color.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit, super comfortable and a beautiful color.

I loved this dress! I normally am between a 4 and 6 and the size 6 fit perfectly. I loved the ruffle- it added a flirty touch! And the color was stunning! So perfect for any season. Overall, I loved this dress and my first RTR experience! Will definitely use again.
Fitted but has stretch.

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments on this dress and how it flattered me! It made me feel awesome.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect! Slim fit but I was still able to dance the night away.
I ordered the size 0 and size 2. The 2 was big in the bust and the waist. But the 0 fit me perfectly. Absolutely loved the dress and got tons of compliments. Would definitely rent again.
I wore this dress to an event for law school admitted students. It was the perfect mix between professional and fun!

This is a gorgeous dress, I felt both sexy and classy at the same time :) The color is perfect, vibrant without being obnoxiously pink. I feel like it ran a TAD small, but definitely not a whole size small. I'm normally a 0 in pretty much everything and tried the 0 and 2... the 2 was a little loose such that it didn't seem as flattering due to just hanging in a few places. The 0 fit great while I was standing but pulled a little in the collarbone area and got a bit shorter than I'd prefer when I sat down. In the end though, I got several compliments that night and was very happy with it... would rent again.
Great dress! Usually wear a 4-6 but the 8 was a much better fit. Size up. Good stretch and nice thick fabric.

Personally, the color was faded, not as bright in the photo, and some parts of the dress had been stretched out. It created a pouch in the belly area, but it worked for the wedding, and I still received compliments. Nothing special though.

I rented this dress for a party I attended and got compliments all night! The suggested attire for the event was semi-formal/cocktail. I ordered both the size 4 and size 6, after reading reviews that the fit was a little small. I'm normally a size 4 (sometimes a 2), and ended up wearing the size 6 for this event. It was the perfect fit for me!!! I added turquoise earrings to give it an extra pop of color for spring!
Went one size up but should have gone two. Fit fine up top but I'm curvy on the bottom and it was snug.
Fit was great. Perfect length. Nice material. Loved the color! Wore to a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear but probably could have
links_reviews_text: Fit is tight. I rented the 8 as my backup dress. I could have gotten away with it but if you have curvy hips go up a size.

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing!!! Perfect little dress!
links_reviews_text: I can not say enough good things about this dress. The color is so so pretty, it is a plum/purple, I wanted red for Christmas but this was perfect. The fabric had some flexibility to move around and dance. It fits like a glove that has room that let me eat a great dinner without it noticing in my appearance. I can't wait to rent this again!!

This dress is true to size, the 4 fit perfectly. It was very comfortable to wear and easy to move in. I got a to. Of compliments on it. It was also easy to dress down just a tad with shoes. I wore it for a beach wedding and paired it with dressy sandals versus heals.

This dress was my emergency backup that the wonderful RTR customer service sent me overnight after my original dress didn't fit whatsoever. I was so happy with it! The color is beautiful and it was very comfortable. Runs true to size and was easy to celebrate and dance the night away in. I received so many compliments all night long. 10/10 would recommend and rent again.
Loved this color and got so many compliments.

Loved this deep burgundy color! Wore to a formal work function and was concerned the 6 would be too tight and the 8 wasn't available as a backup. This bad boy worked out perfectly. Form fitting but thick material kept it appropriate. Highly recommend!

Favorite dress I've ever worn. SO flattering, comfy and beautiful. I love the little sleeve detail and got tons of compliments. I wore it to a wedding and even the bride kept telling me how much she loved it! Shows of all the right curves but covering enough to dance. I'm 5'3" and loved where it hit - didn't feel like I was ever showing too much and could sit down without my legs showing too much. Highly recommend!
I rented this dress last minute for a wedding. It fit comfortably, great material. I received a lot of compliments on it....wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: The look on my boyfriends face when I walked out!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect to accentuate every curve. Was very comfortable! I was able to move, dance and sit so well with the stretch of the dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I wore this out on a date with my husband. He loved it! It fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect color for a winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: The color comes out different in pictures depending on lightening. I am normally a size 6 and had to size up.
The fit was perfection and very flattering! I wanted to keep this dress.

This dress makes you feel amazing! It's so beautiful and flowy and the ruffles hide any imperfections you may have so WINNER in my book. The built in bra help keep the ladies in check which saved the day dancing. I really enjoyed this dress

Loved this dress could have used 12L but it was still the best dress at convention! I've rented several like this this designer and would do more! Very giving in material. Love love! Wish I had taken A better picture.
Loved this dress so much! So many compliments.

I've rented this dress twice now, and I'm completely obsessed. I'm 5'3" and the high low is a perfect length. There is boning inside the dress to keep the torso secure, that allows the off the shoulder part of the dress to fall just right. The color is very rich, a bright red, perfect with gold accessories. Overall, gorgeous dress, super comfortable, 10/10!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was Beautiful!! I received so many compliments throughout the night! Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear size 6, but the 8 was the only one available. Fortunately for me the dress fit like a glove! Size 6 would've been too snug. So size up. I wore this dress to a charity fundraising event. #roseball

Fit was wonderful, I have a large bust(34F) and had no problems with the fit. My only complaint is that the back zipper kept bunching at my lower back. I wear a 10-12 and the 12 was what I wore. The length was good. It dragged the floor a bit but not bad. I'm really short though

This dress had the wow factor! I wore it to a Spanish wedding and it was the perfect look! Everyone was complimenting my outfit all night. The red is lush and the dress has an ease about it. So easy to dance in and move. It was a hit! Dancing girl emoji come to life!

links_reviews_title: Great theme dress for a fiesta. Comfortable fit. Tons of compliments. Real show stopper.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Easy to dance in

links_reviews_title: Hottest dress at the gala! Lovely off the shoulder look. Super attractive high low!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 or 8 but the 6 fit very well but kinda tight on breast. . I have a 34E bra size and the zipper barely made it. I'm 135 lbs,5 foot 7. Get this dress! I wore fish net and it rocked the gala.
Can't rave enough about this dress. My favorite rental. If only it was more affordable I would have bought it. Fits perfectly and flows like a dream.

This dress is...unforgettable! I'm an entertainer and wore it onstage. Members of the audience went on and on about how much they loved this dress. I find that the cut of Badgley Mischka dresses flatter a woman's shape, no matter the size. And this one in particular, with the off-the-shoulder neck line and ruffles, is so incredibly feminine. And BIG bonus...it's very comfortable! I highly recommend this rental.

links_reviews_title: It was my 2nd time renting this dress. 1st time it was comfortable. This one needs repairing.
links_reviews_text: I gave it 4 stars because the dress is gorgeous and is forgiving in the waist, hips, & arms (all my not so flattering parts) but it needs to be repaired. The bonding was poking through the dress and made it so uncomfortable, I had to change halfway through the celebration.

links_reviews_title: Havana, Cuba Themed Work Holiday Party
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Comes with a built in corset that acts as a bra and keeps the dress up without having to pull it up all night. Matched the Havana theme perfectly and I got a ton of compliments!
Rented this to try on for NYE didn't end up choosing this dress but very pretty and comfy

links_reviews_title: Absolutely, Loved this Dress!!! It was Perfect, for my birthday Celebration. I was the lady in Red!!
links_reviews_text: It's a Zipper in the back, I did not need to wear a bra

I'm typically a size 0 but that one was unavailable so I had to get a 2. The 2 was definitely big thru the bodice on me but for a photoshoot that didn't matter so much. This dress was so pretty and fun to wear. Definitely recommend it but be sure to get your true size if wearing out!

Love! Love! Love! Perfect for Day of the Dead in Mexico. Just an all around gorgeous dress. I went with the petite just because I was wearing a smaller wedge because we were walking on cobblestone streets. The 6R worked well too though. It has some structured boning and because I have pretty big boobs I don't think the 4 would have worked although I'm usually a true 4 waist wise. I got so many compliments! Love this dress. Really comfortable too. Easy to wear.

I had so many compliments on this dress. It looked amazing on! There were a few cons. There was a small rip under the top ruffle where the sleeve connects to the dress. It was not visible, however as it was covered by the ruffle. Also, there are underwires that run up and down the entire length of the bodice in the front and the back. Within an hour, the front underwire was poking me in the stomach and the back underwire was poking out the dress. It was not noticeable, but it was uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: I rent it for a photo shoot
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my photo shoot of October and it was a great success! The dress fit me perfectly. The corset made me look thinner and gave a beautiful shape to my body. The pictures came out amazing! Everybody was crazy about this dress when I posted my pics on social media. One of my favorite dress from RTR

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a Fall Fiesta and it was a HIT!!
links_reviews_text: Usually, I wear a 6 in dresses from RTR, but only a 4 was available. I took a chance because I fell in love with this dress for the fiesta-themed party we attended. With shapewear underneath, the 4 was perfect. The best part is that no bra is necessary with the built-in corset/boning and the sleeves stayed perfectly off the shoulder all night without riding up! I would definitely recommend it!
This dress is so much fun! It was slightly too long (about 3 inches), but then I was also wearing sneakers. Added the belt as the only other detail since I had no other accessories.
Really pretty, comfy and fun.

I wore this in Spain and toured in it all day, perfect dress for great pics in the street and park de guelle, then didn't have to change to go out that night for dinner at carpe diem and then to the w for a night out.

This dress is so fun and flattering. It was perfect for a "dancing with the stars" event. Felt like the real life emoji! The top has a built in corset, so there was no worry about keeping the top up if you're small chested! Very comfortable.
I have worn this dress before but in the multicolored version. It's perfection! Fits well and is super flattering. So many compliments! Love Badgely Mischka and love this dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful for that evenings gala.
links_reviews_text: Being short came in handy while wearing this dress because it gave me a dramatic train that got me compliments all night long. Wish i remembered the name of the associate staff who helped me in the Georgetown store. She sized me up perfect and had me in and out the store in less than 20 minutes.

links_reviews_title: I switched into the red dress during the reception and knocked people's socks off. Everyone said it.
links_reviews_text: Fit great everywhere. The length was a little long and got caught up on my heels a bit but it was worth it. The sheer long skirt added glare and ruffles made my figure voluptuous.
I really loved this one, fit like a dream, photographed well, endless compliments all night long

links_reviews_title: I was the emcee for a Red Haute Fashion Show and this was the perfect gown. Absolutely loved the fit
links_reviews_text: I was the emcee for a Red Haute Fashion Show and this was the perfect gown. Absolutely loved the fit and received tons of compliments. Extremely comfortable.

Without the reviews, I wouldn't have taken a chance on this dress. Thank you, ladies. A less expensive dress of this style would most likely be loose fitting and fraught with under garment challenges. Also too, I am short and so I wasn't sure about the length. However, the outward illusion of elegant wisp is held together by a no nonsense infrastructure. The sleeves stay put, a bra is unnecessary, and a simple spanx or in my case nude, toeless control top (invisible) leg wear worked perfectly. The shorter length in the front gave the illusion of height and the regular 4 did not drag too much with my heels. The bold color drew attention and many compliments from strangers. The only issue was a pesky underwire that dug into my ribs. I probably could have avoided this had I given it attention while dressing. I could imagine pairing this with purple or yellow shoes, but I chose black. I wore this dress to the opera and it did not disappoint. Beautiful!
Fits like a glove. Beautiful dress and nice material. Would rent again!
This was fun and gorgeous, a head turner for sure!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! Got compliments the entire night!
links_reviews_text: This dress not only fit perfectly but it's very comfortable. I'm 5'3" around 120 pounds with an athletic build. I have small boobs and a big butt/thighs so I wasn't sure if this was going to be too tight around the waist but it's made of stretchy fabric that complimented my curves perfectly. The ruffles also hid my belly well which made me extra confident. I was worried the off the shoulder would make it hard to dance but the straps on the arms are stretchy and very easy to move around in. There's a built in bra but I still wore a strapless underneath it just for extra support. With 3.5" heels the dress just touched the floor so I had to pick it up once in awhile as I walked but otherwise the length wasn't a problem. Would wear this dress again in a heartbeat, people kept saying I looked like the dancing emoji!

This is one of my favorite rentals ever. I rented this dress for a wedding in New Mexico. The dress fit like a glove and the boning inside helped keep me sucked in and supported all night. The hi low hem is lovely and not overdone. Ultimately you'll feel like a feminine senorita. I ended up renting this dress in other color ways for other occasions!

Wore this dress to a Spanish theme event. There is structure inside so no need for a bra. The underwire did poke through but I fixed that with a bandaid to cover the sharp plastic underwire. Great fit and very comfortable. The zipper was difficult but worth the effort.

links_reviews_title: I was the dancing girl emoji and loved it!
links_reviews_text: True to size and got TONS of compliments. Wore for a Havana Nights themed charity event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Spain wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is bright and fun, has a ton of movement, and keeps you cooler even on a hot Spain wedding day. Material is slightly sheer on the bottom. The corset fit was a little off for me in the chest as it was large, but didn't take away from a perfect bodice fit. Length was great with 2-3" shoes. Might be a bit much for an average event but for a destination wedding it was perfect

I loved this dress and it was so fun to wear but the wires on the inside poked through. Quality and insurance people shouldn't checked it before sending it out because this dress should be retired. I had to tape them so it didn't poke me. Either than that cute dress!

I mean. The picture says it all. What hasn't been said about this dress? It's perfection. When walking around in it with no shoes on, it didn't graze the ground. It was light and airy. But corseted to keep your form and give you a formal feel.

Very beautiful dress! Comfortable yet appropriate for a formal affair. I'm 5'7 and with heels I can be 5'10+, really wish I rented the long instead of the regular... was still okay, but could have been better.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a formal summer wedding
links_reviews_text: The 4R fit perfectly, but it was a little tight and I wanted a bit more breathing room to eat and dance. The 4 and the 6 worked equally well. The 4 had that bit of overlay at the bottom of the dress whereas the 6 did not, so I did not have to alter the dress in any way. I loved every minute of wearing this dress, and it received tons of compliments. It shone subtly in the sunlight, which I loved. It was comfortable and hugged my body in just the right way. I didn't feel like I had to squeeze into this dress at all. I would highly recommend this dress!
I thought this dress was kind of boring but it was classic elegance and I received many compliments!

I rented this to wear as a bridesmaid in my sister-in-law's black tie wedding (she asked that we all get dresses in the champagne/rose gold family). I got lots of compliments and was super comfortable. Great length on me and I'm 5'3. My heels were super uncomfortable and I was able to change into flats for the reception without it dragging on the floor at all. One drawback was that the underneath layer was sticking out 2 inches or so in front, but I pinned it up and it was no problem.
This fit me perfectly! It wasn’t even too long, which is rare for me, being 5’3. It was so flattering and I got so many compliments.
First time with RTR. Great fit. Tons of compliments. Ordered a size up, happy I did. Just signed up for another dress for a Christmas party!

links_reviews_title: Fit well and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit well!

links_reviews_title: My 81yr old mom worn this dress to the Emmys this year. She loved it and looked gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: it fit nicely, and was very comfortable. she's 5'6", about 142lbs, 81 years young, long-waisted. she tried the size 10 but the waist was far too long (!) and the under layer seemed to poke out beneath the dress at the hem. the size 8 fit perfectly and no issues w the hem at all.

links_reviews_title: I was the Mother of the Bride in this beautiful dress. I felt so confident & got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: There was only 1 size close to mine when I ordered the dress, so I actually went down a size, but the dress still fit like a glove. I did order a size regular in length so I did have to wear a slightly lower heal, but by the end of the night, I was happier with the lower heal. I never once felt like I was going to trip over the dress. My only suggestion for this dress would be to wear a regular nude/sheer bra. I bought a sticky bra thinking that I would need that for the back of the dress, when a regular bra would have made me look better. There is a somewhat built in bra, but I would only recommend that for a small bust size. With a full B or higher cup size, try the dress with a regular bra.

links_reviews_title: The customer service! Chose 2 styles, felt they were wrong got 2more in 24hrs, went w 1st I chose
links_reviews_text: When I received the first two they were totally different. The first was the gold formal length. The second was blue hi/lo, both in 10 R. I had read all the reviews because of my size, shape. The zippers were hard and they stuck (which was stated numerous times) but I didn't remember reading they were snug through the middle. They were and the blue was a heavy gown ( I think I remember reading that, also). I called customer service on Friday at 1p, the day before my event. They didn't have the gold in the next size, so she sent me two sizes in another of my favorites that arrived the day of my event at 1030am! So impressed with customer service. Those were just too much sequins for me. I went with the very first and just wore a lot of Spanx. Also, there were at least 3 other of the same sequined dress at the event. Maybe, there could be a way to ask what event the renter is attending so there won't be the duplication. Overall, as a first timer this was a great experience.

I wore this for my brother's wedding and it was perfect! It was on the short side (I am 5'2" and found short heels.) like others have said, I had to use fashion tape for bottom hem. I for so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I am a musician. I was hired to play a "solid gold" party for NYE.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect for me. I am busty, small-waisted, with hips. I rented the 4L because I read that the style ran short. I was glad I rented the long. The lining was too long for the gown, but I taped it and it was fine. It was absolutely gorgeous, so comfortable, and I got tons of compliments. I would buy this dress if I could afford it! I loved the built-in cups, and it seemed to hug all the right spots on my figure. Would rent this gown again.
Fit great. I am glad I ordered the Long- length was perfect. Color, fit, everything was what I expected.
I rented this dress for a friend's December wedding and absolutely loved it. It was very formal without being too over the top and it was super comfy. Would rent it again!!!
It was very comfortable and the fit and length was perfect with heels. I felt like royalty!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my wedding! Extremely comfortable and easy to move in; the champagne color is goreous
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Def wanted the longer dress with heels and the regular was a bit too short; hem hung longer than 4R dress itself.

links_reviews_title: Hugged my curves in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: The 4r was too short, so I went with the back up 6r which gave it some length.

I love RTR so much, and this dress only further solidified that. I rented this for my friends evening October wedding in Ohio. Both the 6 & 8 fit; had I been willing to wear shapewear all night I would've worn the 6... but it was BBQ wedding food so I opted to wear the 8 & not worry about it. As other reviews stated, the lining was longer than the overlay, but I figured some double sided tape would fix that easily. When I tried it on with heels, I realized it was definitely not long enough for the look I was going for so I ended up wearing flat sandals instead and it worked out great. I got tons of compliments on the dress, and was very comfortable all night. I would say that if you have broad shoulders or very muscular biceps, this might be a little tight. My movement was slightly limited but it wasn't bad at all and I barely noticed as the night went on. I would absolutely recommend this dress & might rent again!

links_reviews_title: Crying all night long at the beauty of the wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous and I definitely received compliments all night long. With that said, I usually wear a size 6, and wear dresses well as I have a small waist, but thankfully I ordered a back-up size 8L. It was still surprisingly tight and I didn't feel that it hugged the right places on my body. I wore heels and it was just long enough.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and received tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The bride of the wedding asked all of her bridesmaids to rent dresses off RTR to save money; knowing that we'll probably be wearing the dresses only once. We all loved the idea! We had to place the order months before the wedding, but the dress came right on time -- a few days before the wedding. The dress fit perfectly and all of the bridesmaids loved the dress. It looked beautiful in pictures and I got so many compliments! A few things though: another bridesmaid ordered the same dress in a different size and the inner lining was longer than the outside fabric. (Not with my dress -- it was a good length! But just wanted to share and give a heads up) And since it is very fitting, the zipper is a bit hard to zip and sometimes it felt like it was going to break. (But it didn't break -- but I would be careful zipping up and down!) Overall, loved the dress and I would definitely be using RTR again for future events/occasions!

links_reviews_title: My sister's wedding was spectacular, she's wearing my mom's dress from the 60s ;)
links_reviews_text: Amazing Maid of Honor dress!! The 0R was a perfect fit (I'm 5'5" and about 115lbs) with ballet flats

links_reviews_title: Simple, classy, elegant... perfect for a post partum mom!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for me. I'm 5'4" and 150lbs. I just had a baby a few months ago so I was worried about spending too much on a larger dress than I normally wear. Even though I'm still sporting my mom pooch, I thought this dress fit great! It was very elegant and flattering, perfect for a black tie wedding. I received tons of compliments and bragged about RTR all night!

links_reviews_title: Not too long and fit well!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my sons wedding. Not too long, I was able to wear my flats with it at my height! It was also not too tight which I prefer at my age. Perfectly conservative but still subtly glamorous. I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Shimmery, draped and feminine. Great dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and I would rent it again!
True size and very comfortable
The dress was fitted and flattering. Fits me perfect. I am 5'4. 135ibs

links_reviews_title: Great dress in neutral color and simple style!
links_reviews_text: This dress was my backup dress, but it ended up being more comfortable than my first pick. It is a taupe color with silver, and paired well with nude shoes. It was the perfect length for a 2" heel. I am 5'2, and the regular length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect, and I received so many compliments. I love it and recommend!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Feb. Black Tie event. It was exactly what I was expecting based upon the pictures and reviews. I'm on the shorter side, and the 4R was a good length. The fit was super comfortable and flattering.

I wore flats and the 8L was just about the perfect length for my height. It was pretty comfortable, even with shapewear. I lost count of how many women came up to me to compliment the dress. The only minor issue is that it's mildly sheer on the upper back, so regular bra straps will likely show through a little. It didn't bother me at all though, so I wore a skin-tone regular bra.

This dress was a very nice, formal dress. I was unsure when I first ordered it, but once it was on, compliments came from everyone. The dress was used a bridesmaid dress, but it definitely could be used for any formal event. I ordered 6-8, and I had to use the 8, which was perfect.
Comfortable and easy to move in! Flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Great wedding in a DC art gallery, felt like my dress fit the feel of the event!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately the dress underslip was a few inches longer than the overlay which was definitely noticeable. Other reviewers had also mentioned this. Also the underslip had significant staining all over it which translated to a few dark shadowed areas on the dress which were barely noticeable. I reported this to RTR customer service and they were very understanding about it! Overall, I felt great in this dress! It was super comfortable and hugged my curves in all the right places. Will definitely RTR again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty details. Great length for petites.
links_reviews_text: Luckily a 4R was available, the fit was perfect. I wore comfortable 2.5 inch heels and had my sister pin the dress up a tiny bit and it worked out great. The details feel subtle but definitely impressionable. A modest but sexy fit. Felt glamorous and pretty as a bridesmaid.

One of my best friends got married recently and asked that all of her bridesmaids wear long, gold RTR gowns. Unfortunately, even though I rented a 4R, this dress was a little tight (but doable) but way too short. I'm only 5'4" had to wear my shortest heels, and the dress was still awkwardly short. You can't tell from this photo, but you could see my entire shoe below the dress. I'm not sure if someone hemmed this dress or if I was just accidentally sent a 4P? Maybe rent an L just in case. Other than that, the whole RTR experience was a great one for all of the bridesmaids and I will definitely rent again.

Fit very well. 4L was form fitting but a bit short with 3 1/2" heels. 6L still fit beautifully and was long enough. It did have more shine than expected, which was welcome! Built in bra cups, so no bra was needed. Lining does hang lower than the lace but it didn't bother me. Classically simple yet elegant dress for bridesmaids. I am also 4 months pregnant when I wore this and there was plenty of room for my mini bump. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I had my bridesmaids wear this dress for my wedding and it was STUNNING!
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to make sure my bridesmaids didn't spend a ton of money on a dress for the wedding but still had something beautiful and comfortable. This was exactly that. Not only did it look incredible on every body type, but it photographed so well. They just shimmered and there were so many compliments on them. The girls did say that they ran a little bit small in the chest area (so if you have a larger chest, maybe order a size up as your second size) and the hemline of the dresses on some were a little bit worn. Otherwise, everything was absolutely perfect!

I ordered 2 sizes which were 8R and 10R decided with 10R because it fit more comfortable but wished the length was a bit longer.. The 8R wasn't gonna work even if it fit because the inner length of the dress was longer than the actual lace of the dress. Overall I did receive a lot of compliments and I will definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: The dress came on time and the fit was great!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was extremely comfortable! I'm so glad that I ordered the long because the dress was the perfect length with heels.

Comfortable, classy. Perfect dress for a formal event and a unique color during winter when everyone else is wearing black. The fit was flattering for just about any figure and true to size. Only issue was that it was short, I still wore 2-3 inch heels and the dress was an inch or so off the ground with them.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. I originally ordered the2R and when it came it was way to short. I contacted RTR and the overnighted me the 2L. I loved this dress and my favorite thing about it was how comfortable it was and easy to move in.
This jumpsuit is beautiful! I got so many compliments all night long. A little tight up top but overall very comfy!
Cute for a beach vacation. Glad I sized down.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy for a fun affair
links_reviews_text: Cute jumpsuit for a birthday party. Very comfortable and flowing. Might not be the best if you are on the curvier side (it can kinda show a tummy the way the fabric lays). Great for spring and summer!
looooved this jumpsuit so much. SO flattering and beautiful. the print really standed out and i got a ton of compliments! highly recommend!!!
Instant vacation when you put this on. At 5 5 it was almost a little too short in torso but worked.

links_reviews_title: Size it up and not for a day out in warm weather
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a day out in Nassau. Since the material it isn't cotton, it was a little uncomfortable in the heat. The crotch area felt tight and I had to keep pulling it down. I love the color and print, but since I cannot wear even mildly uncomfortable clothes, maybe this would work better for someone petite.

Absolutely gorgeous print.. and there's pockets!! My first jumpsuit, and I felt amazing! Such a fun wear. Million compliments! Light and flowy, great material, doesn't feel cheap. I have thicker thighs and some booty, and consider myself a pear, so it was a little tight on bottom half, (which ended up being flattering still showing off curves) but the midsection was a little baggy and fit nicely around breasts. I'm 34C. I used the straps but didn't need them. It hit above ankle and flowed very well when moving. I had so much fun going for cocktails, and walking Fremont Street. People literally stopped me to say the loved it! I'll rent again and again! P.S. Ladies be sure to check the pocket inside the bag for the belt. I've seen some people say it wasn't included with shipping, but I've found most ties, belts etc. are always in there. Just a helpful hint in the future ladies.

I rented this for a fancier night out on our recent trip to Cabo San Lucas. ABSOLUTELY loved this and so did my husband. I do think the inseam is better for ladies 5'7" or under as it was pulling a bit on me and I am 5'6". The overall fit was kind of large...I felt like the sleeve straps were too big and I couldn't adjust them so I just tucked them in so I didn't have to mess with them all night. I liked where the legs hit on me and would DEFINITELY rent this again.

Fit me like a glove! I'm a size 2 and wore a small regular. If you're in between sizes I'd definitely size up. Strapless bra required. I thought it was a great material and super flattering, recommend renting!
Loved this jumper! Wore it on vacation to the DR and it was just perfect.
Tuck the straps in and wear without them! Looks way better and more comfortable! Material is thicker and stiffer than I thought but very pretty color!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, bright and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: The fit of this jumpsuit is really flattering and looks WAY better on than it does on the hanger. The fabric is a light, breezy linen with a fine texture. I did have some trouble zipping and unzipping the upper section (just because it's an awkward are to reach), but luckily I had help. Loved the color, the fit and the style. Fit like a glove!

Rented this for my trip to Mexico and absolutely LOVED it and got tons of compliments all day. I had a small and wish I had a medium, as it was a little tight and I needed help to zip the back. Material is great and does not wrinkle. Can't wait to rent again!

Wore this to a friends rehearsal dinner in Charleston. Originally rented the XS, but it was tight in the the thighs so was very happy that the small fit better. Lots of options for how to wear the top given thin spaghetti straps as well as off the shoulder ones.

Got this just in time for a Cinco de Mayo party I threw at my house. What a perfect outfit! I found it a tad bit short-waisted, but I also have a long torso. It didn't come with the belt, so I'm thankful I had a skinny red belt I could add to the outfit. Definitely needs a little definition around the waist. It was comfortable and festive. Really loved it.

links_reviews_title: Too many compliments to count, LOVE this jumper!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this jumper, it fit perfectly with the theme of the event "A Magical Night In Havana" I got so many compliments on it! I ordered a small and a medium as my back up, and ended up wearing the medium (I couldn't even zip up the small). I tucked in the spaghetti straps and just wore it off the shoulders (more trendy that way). The only problem with the dress is that there is no stretch, so it was hard to bend over. It would ride up a bit at points but nothing too bad. Also you have to bring a friend to the bathroom with you. But I still loved it, and if it had a little bit of stretch to it I would totally buy it! Also a bonus that RTR shipped it 3 days early. This was my first experience with RTR and I'm already planning on when I'm going to rent next!

links_reviews_title: Sooo many compliments on this one
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size and had just the right amount of structure to make a great silhouette. Felt perfect for strolling around Cartagena, Colombia

I wore this jumpsuit for a food and wine festival in miami! The weather was 75/80s it was pretty hot for this outfit i mean it was too heavy but heavy enough where i was pretty hot in this outfit, but it wasnt terrible. It was bareable though. It was super cute got compliments! Was super perfect for the event it was fun and flirty! The small was perfect just a hair tight but i was able to move and dance in it! Medium fit but was baggy
Great pattern and a length that works for short girls. Got so many compliments!
It photograpped well! Great bright colors. Was baggy/runs a little big, but that is the look!

I loved this romper! The color and print are so fun, and the fabric is light and comfortable. The length is intended to be cropped but still looked great on my petite frame. It's not the easiest to get on and off for the bathroom and I had to double knot the belt to keep it tied, but it wasn't unbearable. It transitions well from day to night. I'd rent again!

The medium actually fit slightly better overall, but the risk of camel toe was a little too real. I went with the large just to be safe. I really loved this jumpsuit though! It was comfortable, and the waist of the jumpsuit hit my natural waist, which is rare for me due to my height. A great jumpsuit for tall ladies!

Hands down an awesome romper. I would have bought it if I didn't dread taking this to the dry cleaner. This piece is light weight but not seethrough. I didn't have to wear a a bra, but I am small chested 34a. I normally don't like linen pieces because they wrinkle easily, but I did not have that problem with this piece! I ended up wearing it 3 different times. I would have kept it but then I realized it would just sit in dry cleaning :( you will not regret renting this one.

links_reviews_title: Super fun pattern, tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This might be my favorite item ever rented. I wore this off the shoulder without the spaghetti straps (wore them under my arms), it looked great. The thighs on the legs are definitely on the narrow side which I was worried about but it worked fine for me and I have thicker legs- just expect it to be fitted. Amazing amazing color and pattern/fabric!

Wore this for a weekend getaway. The length is perfect for me (5'3) and the material was comfortable to wear in high 70s. It's not give stars because it was really hard/ impossible to completely unzip and zip yourself going to the bathrooms unlike other jumpsuits I've had before.
Such a great romper! Wore it to brunch with friends and it was a hit. It can be dressed up or down and is a great day to night piece. Highly recommend!

I wore this to a class birthday party. While I usually wear a size 8, my pear figure didn't fit in the medium. I wore the large. It was comfortable to wear and I received many compliments. If you make frequent trips to the ladies room this might be a problem in this outfit but nevertheless, I loved it and I felt great in it.

Went on the bourbon trail for my bachelorette party and this outfit was dressy, classy, comfortable, and made me stand out as the bride to be! Wish I could own it cause it was perfect in every way possible

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual afternoon wedding.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit fit perfectly, except that the regular length was a little long for me, and made me feel short. This piece felt like a little bit of a risk for me- It seemed too bold for my usual taste, but as always when I wear RTR, I got tons of compliments, and I felt confident in it.
