Other reviews said the fabric felt lightweight and good for a hot summer day, but in an un-air-conditioned restaurant in the middle of a hazy, smoky heat wave (90 degrees in Seattle), I still felt like I was melting (although it was OK outside). Overall, it was perfect for the event, and I while I don't have any need to own it or wear it again, I am so glad I got the chance to wear it once!

While I love this and got loads of compliments, it was short in the torso and made me feel like I had a permanent cameltoe. The zipper was awful and I had to have my friends take me to the bathroom during a party where we were drinking. Sooo getting stuck in this romper was less than ideal. The fabric was very stiff with no give. I would say it's a standing outfit to look pretty. Not a sitting do anything outfit.

I found any excuse to wear this adorable and comfortable jumpsuit during my rental! It worked for both a day at the office and a rooftop engagement party - and the compliments were pouring in! The fabric feels like a lightweight linen and is loose enough that it's cool and comfortable for a summer party. The waist was fitted, but not too tight. The pants and sleeves both had a pretty loose fit without being baggy, and the off the shoulder style wasn't at all restricting on my arms like it can be on other pieces. The color and print on this jumpsuit are unbeatable if you're looking for something fun. The only issue I had was getting it on and off - I needed to ask for help before using the restroom! This is a piece that would work for all sorts of summer events.
Wore this to a wedding shower & on vacation. The cropped length worked really well to substitute for a petite.

Words cannot describe how much I LOVE this jumpsuit. It was so classy and chic, I had so many random people stopping me and telling me how beautiful the jumpsuit was. I was afraid it was going to look weird since I have a shorter frame but it's one of those outfits that looks good at any height. I received and XS and a S and the small didn't have the belt (someone either lost it or forgot to return it) and I could see how that could happen. NOTE: it took me about 5 minutes to unzip the outfit while using the restroom, then take the belt off. And then I had to do that all over again If you're going to be using the bathroom a lot, you may want to ditch the belt so you don't lose it. It's still super cute without the belt!

links_reviews_title: A little tight in the butt
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit is so cute and a really statement maker. I rented it because I was going to a floral themed party. Unfortunately it's a little tight in the thighs and hips and the fabric is linen so there's basically no give. It'll be great for something else but for a party with dancing it isn't the best choice.
Wore for my sons third birthday dinner out at Disney Springs. Comfortable and practical for chasing a three year old but still looking nice. Highly recommend
This jumpsuit is beautiful. The material is light and the pattern is gorgeous but the fit wasn't my favorite. It was baggy in all the wrong places.
Like other reviewers have mentioned the waist is smaller and you may need extra torso fabric to sit down, so size up! Belt was missing but many many compliments. This was a fun rental.
So beautiful and chic outfit. Try out!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a day trip to the pier and out at night. Fit great!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as part of my unlimited package. This jumpsuit fit pretty much perfectly, and it worked quite well for a day to night look.
Loved it and got compliments the entire day. Wore it to a day trip to wineries. Only downside was the undressing process every time you had to go to the bathroom (needed a friends help)
Random people where stopping me and complimenting me all night long! It was perfect for the event!

links_reviews_title: Really fun open back details, flattering fit and flare, perfect for an office holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Runs pretty true to size, the darting in the chest laid a little funny, but overall comfortable and cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a wedding and it was perfect for a cocktail occasion
links_reviews_text: Great fit and got many compliments!

A fantastic cocktail dress, serious in the front, party in the back!! This looked just ok on the hanger but was great on. Didn't need a bra or spanx. I wore this to a conservative work event and got so many compliments!!!! So classy!
I did not wear this option but it is a great dress. It is comfortable, true to size and the open back is gorgeous.

This dress is well made, super cute and comfortable, but it's just too short for me (and really, too short for anyone over 21?). I loved the open back, no bra needed as the fabric is sturdy. Only flaw (other than length!) was that my torso was just a little too short... when I stood up straight, it looked great, but if I stood like I normally do, the fabric bunched a little on the side. Not a deal breaker, but heads up if you are short of torso (I am average). The deal breaker was the length...

So cute! I loved this dress but it was my backup and I loved my original dress too. I was sad not to have a place to wear them both. The dress fits true to size (I am a size 6 and it fit perfectly). It's a little short so tall folks might not be as comfortable, but it fit my 5'3" frame well. Great for a dressy wedding or cocktail event.

i rented this dress for my boyfriend's graduation. i absolutely loved this dress! it fit like a glove and was perfect for the occasion. the dress has pockets and that was a pleasant surprise! my only complaint is that you can not hardly put anything in the pockets without the dress sliding down. other than that, perfect dress and probably buying it!
Very cute dress.. wore it for gender reveal....
Cute and easy fit! Wore to a concert and it was really cute!

This dress is so cute! I rented it for a weekend that was full of festivals and loved it soo much! I was able to wear both S and M, but I wore the M to be more comfortable when eating festival food. Plus I couldn't wear a bra in size S. Not too short or long. Lined material so that if you don't wear a bra, you should be ok. Very comfortable!! Pockets!! Really loved this dress a lot! Might rent again!
Love the fit of this dress! It has pockets! I'm usually a size 8 and the medium was a perfect fit!
It's a super cute dress, very light. It was a little tight on the arms and in the bust area, but overall recommend!
This dress is comfortable and has pockets!!

This dress was perfect for a fun night out with the gals. Light, comfortable, breezy and super cute! Runs true to size, great material. I didn't notice a issue with wrinkles myself. Would highly recommend for a cute summer dress

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, it was perfect for a spring/summer bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great color, style and fit. I loved it so much I want to buy it to wear again. The S fit well, I was happy with the length, it wasn't too long or too short. Would totally rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great for a day at a winery
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a girls day at a winery and it was perfect; comfortable and very cute! It was light enough that I wasn't warm (it was about 80 degrees) in it. One downside is that the material wrinkles kind of easily. Great dress overall I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments and it was so comfy! Also it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’10” and 165 lbs. I ended up wearing the Large because it was a little longer but medium did fit really well.
Love this -- fits true to size, and is light and comfy -- can be dressed up or down (wore with heels for dinner out, and wore another time with flats and a casual bag for errands).
Wasn't super flattering but nice pop of color and an otherwise fun dress!

I LOVED this dress! I rented this off-the-shoulder dress for a girls weekend in Nashville. I've worn a medium in another Cupcakes and Cashmere dress but was more comfortable in the large due to the length. Since it ties around the neck, you don't need to adjust the shoulders like other off the shoulder styles. Would definitely recommend!

I wore this for a party we hosted, it was very comfortable and I loved the pockets! In pictures I feel like the pockets added a little to my already wide hips, we tend to be our own worst critic so it was probably just fine. I can be between sizes and ended up going with the medium just because it had a little more length. I paired with a belt to make it a little more fitted through the waist, looking back I probably should have opted no belt.
Fit well, even at 5 months pregnant!
The dress fit great and looked great on. Only con is that it wrinkles very easily, other than that it's a great rental
This piece fit pretty well but was a bit large in the waist and chest!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a "country" themed charity event
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable, but looked better with a belt. I wear a size 6-8 in most dresses & the medium fit well. I didn't love the color on pale skin (wasn't my favorite yellow), but it worked.

The pink and yellow hues of the dress were the best part. Such a pretty pattern for spring or summer! I wore it to a bridal shower and it was super comfortable. The material didn't feel cheap and didn't wrinkle as much as I anticipated it would!

Love this cold shoulder dress by Cupcakes and Cashmere! Running true to size, I recommend sizing down as a back up, the dress is a bit loose. I wore a standard strapless bra. At 5'3" the dress hit right above my knees.

links_reviews_title: Felt young, pretty and flirty in this vey comfortable dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit and length were perfect for a petite woman 5'1" like myself and could be worn with or without a belt.

links_reviews_title: not great on short & busty girls :)
links_reviews_text: it was not flattering on me since there was a lot going on around the bust area, and it did not have a very well defined waist. Not great for an hour glass figure. I would recommend this if you want to show off your legs.
The dress is cute, fit TTS, but is a bit frumpy in color and cheap in material. Overall okay but would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Not as flattering as I had hoped
links_reviews_text: While the pockets were a great addition, they made the skirt a little bulky. Every time I moved my arms the waist rode up making it look frumpy. Cute, but not worth all the fidgeting and fixing.

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual for date night
links_reviews_text: I liked how this fit on me. I'm a little bigger on the bottom and although it was a little tricky getting the waistband to pull over my booty (there is no stretch!), it looked great!

links_reviews_title: This was a fun dress. I wore it for my birthday.
links_reviews_text: Elastic waist and a loose fit. Loved the tie neckline.

This dress was perfect! It was really hot but I was fine in this float comfortable dress. I was 12 weeks pregnant and it was nice and roomy in all the right spots. And I did not realize when I rented it that it has pockets! Would've bought it if I could have.
This dress fit very poorly. It was frumpy and unflattering.
This is really cute and I wore it for a day around town but I am 5'3'' and found it fairly short. Especially anytime I lifted my arms. I am also busty so maybe that's why... but overall very cute!!

This dress is fairly cute, but didn't do much for my figure. I rented small and it was loose on me. But also short. I felt like I was wearing a frumpy beach coverup, so I didn't wear it to the party I rented it for.
Loved it! Plan on wearing it to a daytime wedding soon.
It was funky and colorful for a fall wedding in VT. Unfortunately the shoulders/sleeves made it hard to lift your arms up comfortably when dancing. Cute dress though!
Pretty color and pattern but I wasn't over-thrilled with the style. It was a bit average and mediocre. Not a stunner but cute enough for a day dress. I didn't end up wearing it bc I wasn't impressed.
Loved this dress - ended up purchasing it! Sexy yet sophisticated.
Cute dress; however the elastic kept riding up. I had to constantly pull the dress down so I wouldn't look frumpy. I also had to make sure the sleeves were pulled down under my shoulders.
The fit is a lot more baggy than I thought. Super cute dress so bummed it didn't fit the way I like
Great dress. Feels cute on. Flattering for most body types.Sexy yet not too revealing. Perfect for a shower or daytime corporate event.
Loved the color .

This dress is cute, feminine and flouncy with its ruffles and bright colors but it just didn't quite feel like my own personal style. I liked the way it looked without the neck tied up (if it was straight across the chest, strapless.) ran a bit big at the waist, I would have sized down had I known

links_reviews_title: Not Particularly Flattering for an hourglass Figure
links_reviews_text: Boxy fit, did not accentuate curves, los in all the wrong places. Great thick material for winter though.

links_reviews_title: work dress with criss cross added
links_reviews_text: This feels (and looks) like a work dress/sheath with a criss cross added to it. It isn't appropriate for work but feels too formal for a first date. Had high hopes but returning it

Originally I went with a medium and the small was my back up. Medium was loose on me and would get the weird bumps around the zipper. Small fit me like a glove. First time I wore anything this tight/revealing in a very long time. I am 5'5 147lbs and have the mom pouch. I didn't wear spanx under. I love this dress! Only con was that it would ride up when I walked so I had to keep adjusting.
Loved this dress. Very va va voom. Hugs all the right places. I have a large bust and didn't wear a bra with no issues.
This dress is great. Warning - it is short and does ride up! The placket in the bust also kept flipping up. Super annoying. Still going to buy this one.
I loved this dress! It was a touch shorter than I'm used to, but I'm typically pretty conservative. Lace front adds a sexy flare without being too much. Great stretchy material too!

Overall I absolutely love this dress! Perfect for the colder weather but still great on the dance floor. I gave it four stars because it did seem a little stretched out I probably could have gone down a size… No need to wear a bra the fabric is thick and hugs your curves, wore with over the knee boots and got tons of compliments! Had issues with the dress being sent to a previous address even though my default address is current, other than that RTR always impresses me!
I loved the thick fabric. No bra needed and while it was low cut, the crisscrossing across made it seem more appropriate. Very flattering!

The dress was a great length for a bachelorette party in the cold weather. The sleeves were the perfect fit and length, and the dress was low cut enough to be fun without showing too much. It also was thick enough material to be supportive without a bra. I'd rent this again.
Perfect little black dress for a bachelorette party. True to size. Very fitted. Good quality fabric.

Wore this for a night out with girl friends. Size Small. I needed spanx (which I did not have on this pic) but once those were on it was all va va voom! Very warm dress as well for a winter Midwest night in the city.

This dress is more for a skinny body shape. My chest was smashed but the dress was very baggy around my waist area, it fir great around my butt- as shown in the pic. The dress itself is super sexy and made of thick fabric which hugs you and doesnt show imperfections. It would be too hot to wear duing the summer in my opinion.

links_reviews_title: Cutebut a little bigger than expected
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a nye party. It was a little bigger than i would have expected but it worked. The backside had a baggy area on my lower back, almost like someone with a really short torso and a bootie stretched it out in a weird place and I have a normal torso i think. It was a little longer than I was expecting too, hitting only a couple inches above my knees (im 5'3). Overall was cute but wouldnt rent again.
Ok so this dress is amazing!! Received sooo many compliments and just felt amazing in this dress! The material is thick and flattering and is not too low cut. Great rental!
It was a little short but great for the occasion!
Cute dress but very short. I'm 5'8 and has to wear the large to cover my rear. Still could only stand. Material was thick and forgiving but not too hot.

links_reviews_title: Easy, basic dress that flatters all body types
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a concert. The details down the front draw attention to various parts of the dress which makes it flattering since the shape isn't the only important detail. The dress is a little short and it does ride up but it's a very basic LBD easy to dress up or down. The material is thick (thick enough to hide Spanx!), comfortable, and breathable. I love this dress and how easy it is to make it your own!

Cute sexy dress but but slightly awkward since I have a long torso so the area where the hips go was a little off and baggy but not bad. I could have gotten away with wearing it but the Fabric was a lot heavier than I expected for the summer time. Would work well for the fall or winter

links_reviews_title: Very sexy dress for a girl's night out!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great and was a flattering little black dress. It was very low-cut and fitted, but worked perfectly for a girl's night out on the town. I could have worn either the S or XS, but went with the XS for a more tight fitting look. The fabric did not have much stretch though so arms were a bit tight and I was unable to wear a bra due to the cut of the front but the fabric was thick enough to be supportive. Overall a very fun dress-- I would definitely rent again!

I wore this to a friend's birthday party and received so many compliments on it! Simple, classy and subtly sexy. It was a little tight and I could have used a few more inches on the length but overall a stunner and a great dress! Loved wearing it and would rent again but would definitely size up to the S.

links_reviews_title: This review is for us larger girls
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 12 or 14. The dress was snug but I feel like it's supposed to be. The fabric is thick and durable. It felt like quality material. I felt comfortable and sexy. My boyfriend loved it. I got a lot of looks from other people (men and women). I definitely recommended renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night out in AC!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and supper flattering. I loved the criss cross detail at the top. Perfect for a night out in Atlantic City!

links_reviews_title: Sexy yet warm enough for an outdoor evening event :)
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. The lace up detail on the front is just enough sexiness but I still felt covered. I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress but you need one that is low-cut because otherwise it shows. I rented it for an outdoor concert and was pleasantly surprised at how warm it kept me. It is form fitting, but in a very flattering way; overall I was impressed!

links_reviews_title: For unusually high bums or very short torsos
links_reviews_text: I got this for a date but didn't get to wear it because of the unusual fit. I have a torso in proportion to my height and a substantial sized bum and average width hips. But this dress had tons of space in the hips and 500 tons of space in the bum and not only that but the bum area was unusually high for me. And even though it is a bodycon style, it didn't conform to me. I could have gotten away with the hip thing as the dress looked so very good from the front. But from the side and back it just looked ridiculous. I even tried to disguise the fit with different types of belts but nothing worked. Other than this it is cute.

This is hands down my new favorite dress!! I felt so incredibly sexy all night in this dress and got so many compliments (especially from the hubby) and lots of stares! The girls were on display but with the strings crossing I never worries about anything moving around/popping out! It was the perfect length (I'm 5'3") for date night! The armpit area was kind of uncomfortable at first, like it was cut small so it kept digging. But the uncomfortable aspect wore off pretty quickly once I started moving around. I rented this for date night, and I guarantee I will be renting it again for just about every occasion I can think of! Loved, loved, loved!!!

This dress was very sexy! I rented it for a bachelorette party in SF and this definitely did the job. I am very large chested and it is very low cut so the girls definitely come out for those who are also busty! But still comfortable and I you can still wear a bra if you have a low plunge one (also a plus for the busty ladies haha). The material is nice and thick so it was perfect for a February night in San Francisco! Felt super comfortable and confidant! Would def recommend for a friend!
Super comfortable, easy to accessories and got lots of compliments.

I wore this for a bachelorette in the middle of February in NYC! It was perfect for the occasion! Can be paired with thigh high boots or a pump! Can be a little long for us short girls, but nothing a little fashion tape can't fix! What can I say, the perfect LBD for winter

links_reviews_title: Straight fire. Husband didn't want to leave after he saw me
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this dress. It's so flattering, kind of unbelievable. I normally wear between 8-10 and the M fit me beautifully. I got tons of compliments from men & women. Makes you feel sexy and powerful. Considering buying it. Definitely will rent again. Slay ALL day with this one here

This dress fit so well. The small was perfect. I usually wear a 4. It is a little hard to wear a bra since it is super low cut. Luckily I had one that was cut low enough to wear. It's a very thick material and was perfect for a night on the town in January.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress made for wide hips!
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress, but unfortunately I sent it back with out wearing Bc the fit wasn't right for me. The arms hit at an awkward length in between long sleeve and 3/4 sleeve on me ( I have really long arms) so I just rolled the sleeves and it still looked cute. The problem for me was in the hips, I unfortunately don't have any curves to my hips. My butt will fill a lot of clothes making this a non issue, but this dress is specifically cut for ( or has been worn by) someone with curvy hips. Would be extremely flattering on someone with curves!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a bachelorette party and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, form fitting but stretchy and not too tight. The dress was short but not too short to the point where I had to worry about it. Also the fabric is heavy so it's not see through at all either. Loved it and I received so many compliments!

It is a very thick dress, which was perfect for how cold it was on NYE. I was able to wear a small (when I am normally a medium), THANKFULLY, because they were unable to send the medium last minute. It obviously shows a lot of cleavage, but I was able to wear a normal strapped bra which I was extremely happy about. (The girl with me in one of the pictures is also wearing a RTR dress!)

This was a perfect LBD for a Christmas party. Classy and sexy at the same time. I wore the small size because it fit my bust better but it bunched a little bit around my waist above my butt. The XS size fit my waist better but was squishing my bust. The small size was comfortable to sit in, move around in, etc. I definitely recommend renting this dress!

links_reviews_title: The compliments of professional yet sassy
links_reviews_text: This dress is awesome! I normally wear an 8 in dresses but the medium fit perfect on me with some room to spare. You can wear a normal bra too and everything is hidden. I chose no bra and was fine. The material is thicker which kept me warm but not sweaty, and BONUS it hides all my dents and bulges. I definitely recommend this dress and I'm sure I'll rent it again if I don't buy it.

Its fitted but a thick flattering material. Shorter length but not uncomfortable. The top is pretty low - id recommend going braless or wearing a nu bra so u dont see it coming through like mine did. Definitely rent this dress for ur next night out.
This dress was tight, but not too tight. It is a thick material so it holds everything tight nicely. Wasn't too short and cleavage was just the right amount!

links_reviews_title: The dress was a great quality matieral for a late fall wedding.I was able to wear without a bra.
links_reviews_text: This is very low cut. If you have a bigger chest you can't wear a bra because your breasts will looked caged in. However, it is a great quality so if you feel brave enough you can go without a bra. I opted for the no bra option and the dress was tight enough to keep them in place. I would recommend pasties though.

I rented this dress for my birthday. The material is thick, which is good for colder weather. It is also tight with minimal stretch. And short. But I really liked the crisscross detail in the front. Showed just enough. I was able to wear a low cut push-up bra with it. My only qualm was the inside flap of material along the v-neck kept popping out.
cute dress but the lining wouldn't stay hidden. It's pretty short but the material is substantial (almost scuba-esque)

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for New Years Eve party in NYC!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic. It's extremely comfortable and true to size. I received lots of compliments wearing this beautiful dress.

I wore this dress to my company's Christmas party and it was perfect. I rented both the size 6 and 8. I ended up wearing the 8. I'm 5'5" and I wished I had rented the long. With the regular, I could only wear 1" heels. The material is great. Overall I loved the dress and the style and fit. It was beautiful and I received many compliments.
I really liked the cuts on this dress. The way the skirt flared just the right amount and the neckline cut a little into the shoulders really made this dress stand out.
I wanted a modest dress for a wedding, and this was the perfect choice.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, very classy, easy to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect fit at the bust, waist, and length. It was super easy to wear because it has short sleeves and you don't have to worry about your bra showing. Overall, I loved this dress and it was great for a formal work event near Christmas.

This dress was very elegant. It was nothing flashy and it did not stand out, but it certainly has an air of subdued elegance. Perfect for a wedding, actually! It runs true to size, albeit a tiny bit on the smaller side. I think this dress is more of a "Mother of the Bride," dress, so I would recommend it for the mother of the bride or someone looking for a more conservative, but elegant, look.
Love love love the dress! I'm hooked!
Snug fit and loved the waistline and colours

The dress was gorgeous and got so many compliments! It flatters curves SO well. I have a short torso so the zipper bunched in the back and was hard to negotiate by myself, but that's the only problem I had. I wore 5in heels and the length was perfect.

Previous reviews were correct - this runs a little on the small side. I am usually a 0, and the 2R was definitely the right size. Only complaints - it was a bit tight in the bust for me and a tad long, but was flush with the floor with 2.5" heels. Aside from those two minor things, the dress was very comfortable and beautiful. I got so many compliments! Would definitely recommend.
Wore this for my cousins wedding. Beautiful dress! Fit perfect and true to size! Definitely renting again!
Fit great. I ordered a long and it was just long enough to cover heels. Lots of compliments. Loved the dress!

This dress is beautiful on. I wore to to a formal work event and was classy and sassy! Dress is a little long for a petite gal, I'm 5'1 but the fit was wonderful and true to size. I'm 131lbs and wore a size 6.

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments, perfect classy dress!
links_reviews_text: Runs slightly tight on the bust, (I'm an inverted triangle), struggled to zip it up. I'm 130 pounds and usually wear a 4, but luckily the 6 was my back up size. I do agree my bust is really large though, so sometimes dresses just don't fit. However length was amazing for someone who's petite (I'm 5.2 and wore 3 inch heels) Material is beautiful especially the skirt, would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Slimming but size up if you have hips or a butt
links_reviews_text: So pretty and slimming on! Got so many compliments! No give on the hips! Mermaid style! I would have sizes up to see how it fit but they didn’t have a larger size.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing, comfortable and classy
links_reviews_text: I didn't love this dress in the pictures but tried it on in store and was blown away. This was a formal event I attended for work and I wanted the dress to be more modest while still showing of my figure. I am 5'10" 128lbs and the 4L was exactly the right length. I got so many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: This was a just in case style shipped to me when my original dress was unavailable - I loved it even more than the original dress! Sadly I didn't get to wear it because it was a tad shorter than I wanted when I put on the 3 inch heels I had planned to wear with it (I'm 5'7). Barefoot, it fit perfectly and was so elegant and flattering. If I could rent this again, I'd do it without hesitation, but I'd get it in the long size.

Felt like a million bucks! I would recommend wearing a size or two large in this dress for two reasons. 1. The fit is snug and choosing a size that is more loose still gives the desired silhouette without sacrificing comfort. 2. The truth is that the dress is slightly used and the if it is to tight it could damage the zipper.

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely gorgeous!! I loved everything about it—10/10 would wear again. :)
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly! The material it’s made of is really good quality. I am a size 34C-34D (depends on the bra), 5’2”, 120 lbs. The dress was a tad bit too long for my height however—I had to wear 4” heels and actually pick up the dress when I walked so it wouldn’t drag on the floor. Was still a beautiful dress though—I didn’t mind too much :)
I absolutely loved this dress. It was a little long for me (I'm only 5'0) but nothing some heels and hem tape couldn't take care of. It was flattering and easy to dance in. I got tons of compliments!

So... my boss and I rented the same dress. Crisis averted because she wore her back up style, buuuuut I think there should be a way to see if anyone else in the area rented the same dress during the same time frame. That aside, RTR is amazing and so easy! My favorite part about RTR is being able to see what the dress looks like on REAL people. I rented this dress (and another) for a work charity gala. This was my back up dress and I didn't wear it to the gala, but I wanted to review it anyway because it is a beautiful gown. This is a good choice for heavy chested gals who want to be a little more conservative, especially for a work function. I like the cap sleeves because I'm a little self conscious about my arms. The dress is light weight, but the fabric is thick enough to smooth/hide little imperfections. I always wear shape-wear under dresses like this to make sure everything stays put. I'm 5'6.5" and after reading other reviews I decided to order the long. If you're in between reg/long like me just remember, you can always wear higher heels! I had on 5 inch heels and the length was perfect. Personally, I would've worn a statement necklace with this dress since the top half is a little plain. The dress doesn't have any stretch to it, so I would get one size up if you have a larger chest. I'm 36DD and I know I should have. This dress would be perfect for a holiday party and I would consider renting it again... but only if I lost a couple lbs so that I could breathe comfortably. :-)
I wore this to the military inaugural ball. It was so beautiful and I received so many compliments. It was comfortable and very flattering.

This was a "back up" dress and I am happy I did not get my first choice as this was a very comfortable dress all night. A wee bit of a challenge with zipper as I am chesty and have a broad back, but I got a girdle to make slipping into dress easier. Got many compliments on dress at a wedding in México

links_reviews_title: This dress was so elegant and I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I reccomend heels as without them the dress is quite long. I also am normally a size 4, but the top is tight and I am bustier girl so I went with a 6R and it was a perfect fit! A statement necklace is the perfect accessory. I was very pleased with this dress! It was perfect for the Gala I attended!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a banquet/award ceremony.
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and elegant. I loved the slightly mermaid cut it had. The only real negative was that it wasn't long enough. I'm 5'11 and had to wear flats, which you could see popping out.

links_reviews_title: Really fun dress to wear for black tie event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful to wear at a black tie wedding. A few thoughts: material of dress is super thick and well made, it's a bit more forgiving to imperfections. The zipper is pretty tricky and I have a shorter waist so it was pretty tight in the middle for me. If I had more time, I would have tried an 8 to see if it was a better fit. I'm 5'3" and wore 2-3 inch heels. Really fun to dance in and fit perfectly with heels.

Wearing a floor length gown is always fun, but I felt very glamorous in this one. The length was perfect and the fabric was a really nice weight. Felt well made and elegant. Only thing missing was pockets :)

Not my first choice, but it was selected by RTR customer service when the dress I originally ordered was unavailable to ship. This dress was incredibly comfortable and fit like a glove! I was initially worried that it wasn't formal enough for the gala I was attending, but the detailing on the sleeves and the subtle, metallic sheen on the red/flower portions on the skirt really dress it up (especially with the right statement necklace/accessories!). Definitely glad that I was sent the 12L, which turned out to be the perfect length (5'7", plus 3" heels). Zipper needs a little TLC... make sure that you have someone there to help you get ready!

This is a beautiful deep red dress. It is VERY LONG! I had to baste in a 3 inch hem to wear it with 3 inch heels. (And I was following a crease from a prior renter, so I am not the only person who had to do that!). But, with the shortened length, the dress was perfect. Very comfortable and not just "another black dress" at the gala! I fit both the 2 and the 4. Wore the 4 because it gave me a little extra room at the shoulders. Otherwise, there wasn't much difference in size between them and the length was about the same on both.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It was my backup, but I preferred it to my top choice. Comfortable and elegant.
links_reviews_text: Fit of 12R was good. The only issue was it was tight around the bust. I'm a 38DD. I was still able to zip it (with some help), and I don't think I would order a size up next time regardless, because the next size would be too big elsewhere. I am 5 feet 7.5 inches tall and I wore 2.5-inch heels, and my toes just showed when I walked.

links_reviews_title: Unexpected proportions made for an absolutely perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: I adore this dress!! Do not judge a book by its cover- this dress is so much better in person then it is on the hanger. The higher rise of the "skirt" made this 5 foot girl feel tall, and I was comfortable dancing the night away with the short sleeves. Note that the top is a bit snug across the chest- I did not wear a bra. I will be keeping my eye on this one to buy it when it goes on sale! Rent this one!! Compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I am 5"1/5'2, about 118 pounds, and a narrow build. I wore this dress for a wedding, and it was a last minute, desperate find but worked out wonderfully in the end. I think it was a small 2, because it was skin-tight and i could hardly breathe but everyone said it looked like it was made for me (though I would have gone a size up probably if I knew how it fit). I wore 4 inch heels and I hemmed it 2 inches and it was floor length. It looks quite plain on the website but I added the Marchesa eternal garden necklace which just completed the dress so well and turned it into an awesome piece. It was light material and really comfortable to dance in. Overall, it was a fantastic find and I'm so happy I got it!

The dress was perfect for my work holiday party. I am usually size 4, but the fabric on top is quite thick and tight. I could barely breathe, so I called RTR and they shipped size 6R overnight. Thank God! Otherwise, I would have to figure out a plan B. I got many compliments all night. PS: I am 5-7, 130 pounds, and wore size 6R with two inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for black tie holiday party
links_reviews_text: Worn for a black tie event and received compliments all night. Didn't love this on the hanger but it's stunning once you put it on. I'm usually a 0 or 2 but only the 2 was available and it fit perfectly. Great for dancing all night!

This gown is beautiful and was perfect for a formal fall/winter wedding. The skirt material is thicker and kept my legs covered and sufficiently warm. I'm 5'7", 32E, curvy frame, and normally wear a size 4 or 6. If you are between sizes, size up! The 6R fit perfectly; it was not too snug around my waist or chest (always a concern), and the skirt hung nicely off of my frame. The recommended size chart said that I should order the Long due to my height, but I only wore 2" heels, and the Regular nearly skimmed the floor. I received several compliments on this dress, and I felt beautiful wearing it. Highly recommended!

This was my first RTR experience and I am so happy that this was my dress! I paired it with a Kate spade necklace also from RTR. I wore this dress to a very formal function. It was lovely. It fits like a mermaid gown in that it will accentuate your hips, however it was not too tight. I could easily sit down and walk in this dress. I'm 5'4" with 4 inch heels and it was still a bit long. The cap sleeves did not alter arm movement as sometimes they can. I felt so amazing in this dress I was so sad when I had to send it back.

This dress is very pretty and provides a little more coverage for those of us who avoid showing too much upper arm. It was a replacement dress for my first choice that was too small; it fit very nicely and I would've enjoyed wearing it, but my event was canceled due to COVID-19.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but a bit worn
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful but the particular one I received had definitely seen better days. It had lost part of it's stitching in the front hem, which I had to safety pin so that I did not trip by stepping on it. There were also some areas with a pull or two in the threading but barely noticeable. As for the fit, it did not have a lot of give to it. The long is a must if you are over 5'7". All in all I felt lovely wearing it and will definitely rent again!

This was such a beautiful classy dress. Due to bust size I had to wear the 4 but the 2 fit better on the bottom half. After reading reviews I went with the "long" - I ended up having to wear taller heels so probably could have worn the regular / not long version. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. Could not fit over hips or even try to zipper it up.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but could not possibly wear this size. Definitely needs a slim torso and hips.
Fit was a tad tight but felt amazing. Great material. Got tons of compliments. Photographs well. Overall very satisfied

This dress was a second backup style, because my first backup style choice was out of stock at the last minute so I had to select a different one, so they sent this one also for free. It was beautiful! But since it was so last minute, they didn't have a long length and the dress was WAY too short for me even barefoot. Nice material, gorgeous cut out at the top.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, very sexy and classy at the same time
links_reviews_text: It fit very well

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. Didn't want to give it back!
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredible. Just the right amount of fun, but in an overall very elegant dress. The material was flattering and the size was mostly true to size but ran just a little bit small. Compliments all night long!

The dress fit like a classic 2 and was perfect length (with heals on). I love the belt but it was long and floppy material so i has to safety the loose end to stay against the waistband. The material was thin but great quality so I didn't even need to wear my spanx. Will definitely be renting again next year for a different event!

I absolutely loved this dress! I rented both the 2R and 4R on reviews it ran small. RTRW didn't have the 4 to ship me and I was stressing but happy to say the 2 ended up fitting perfectly! I am 118 5'6. The belt has no buckles on it so I used a black Bobby pin to secure the tail in place. Very classic and not too revealing in the bust. I loved the neck line and felt comfortable all night in it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal gala. Fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. I ordered the 0 long, because the regular length was sold out. I am 5'4" and with heels this fit great. I wore an adhesive bra. It was easy to walk and sit in. I didn't find it too constricting and the slit wasn't too reveling. I didn't see the belt until I was returning the dress. I wore statement diamond earnings and a diamond bracelet. I typically wear a 0, 00 in clothes so I found the sizing to be normal. Rent this dress, you won't be disappointed.

I love this brand and how high quality the fabric, cut and details are. This dress highlights the waist with the same fabric belt (which you can opt out and style up with another belt if you'd like) and I loved how it accentuated my body in the right places. The window in front is definitely conservative but still hot, so I call it the "confidence window" :) I was nervous about the neck being tight and non stretchy, but there was enough space. Received so many compliments and felt beautiful!!! The fabric is thicker and doesn't show.

I really liked this dress. The material was heavy so it was great for a winter wedding. It was also pretty stretchy so it was really easy to dance in all night long. It wasn't my most favorite dress (the color was dull) but it was still good for the occasion.

i wore this to prom and got tons of compliments. people said it looked so classy and pretty. the slit was not too high and the top was not too low cut. it was slim fitting but somehow didn't accentuate my food baby. i loved this dress.

I fell in love with the dress when I went for a trial fit appointment. It hugs your body nicely, showing just the necessary curves. Combine it with long earrings and hair do, and you are all set. The collar and belt end was loose, which I was easily able to adjust with pin. Definitely an attention grabber.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very flattering! I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Would rent again!
Definately runs 1-2 sizes smaller and I loved he belt with it. Elegant dress!

links_reviews_title: perfect dress for a black tie event
links_reviews_text: it fit perfect! definitley order a size up than what you usually wear. the slit was a little tight on my leg but other than that it was so cute! a very flattering dress for all figures

links_reviews_title: Sexy, Sophisticated and full of confidence!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and thick material. I do not rent long dresses bc of my height (4'10"), but I researched the lengths and with heels it was about perfect (a tad long, but manageable!). I wore this dress to a Christmas Black Tie Wedding. I felt covered but still sexy. Slight was not too high and my boobs stayed in place.
Rent it now!!! Compliments alllll night

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Was my first pick.
links_reviews_text: I wore this gown for a black tie event. Beautiful dress, fit like a glove! Fabric is thick enough you do not need to wear a bra if you're small chested(I'm a 34B). I received MANY compliments during the evening. My husband loved it! I am 5' 11", 117lbs and it was a perfect fit. I wore 4" heels(not platform sole). I give this 5 stars!

links_reviews_title: Sexy black gown that keeps it classy.
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress last minute when found out my order had not been returned in time. Its a slam dunk kind of dress. Think it would be flattering for anyone! I had to order the 6L since that was all that was left last minute. I usally wear a 4 but this fit althogh it was a bit big in chest. I pinned it around back of neck & that helped. The long was perfect. I'm 5'6 ,short torso/long legs. I wore 3 inch heels & it looked like a custom made length for me! I didnt realize there was a belt until i packed to return. It looked fine without it. I really wanted to wear a red dress for holidays. So that prevented me from giving 5 stars in my review. Bit this dress worked out for my xmas Gala.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and great fit! I wore this for a James Bond themed formal and it was perfect!!!
links_reviews_text: The original dress I ordered didn't work for me so I called customer service for a solution. They were amazing! I was sent links to several dresses based on what I described I needed. It was overnighted without a charge and arrived right on time! This is a fitted dress and runs small and long. Being petite, I taped the hem. If you're in-between sizes, go for the larger one - Loved it!
I got a TON of compliments on this dress. I wore it without the belt and you couldn't tell at all ! It has a very flattering fit with stretchy material. I would wear this dress again in a heartbeat !

I LOVED this dress. It hugged my curves in all the right places yet had enough give to allow for dancing! I️ LOVED the slit and the keyhole. I'm 5'7 with a 34d chest and muscular legs, I️ usually wear a size 4Runner, but the 6r fit perfectly!

This dress fit like a glove. The dress comes with a belt but I didn't wear the belt with it because I felt like the belt took away from the elegance of this dress. I def recommend this number. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress to accessorize as Cleopatra.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress in an 8R and 12R since the 10 was unavailable. I wore the 12 because it fit me better in the waist. (It was a bit big in the hips.) The dress was very comfortable and sexy. I wore it to a costume party as Cleopatra and the high slit was perfect for showing off my gladiator sandal. (I would mention that the top is very low cut.) I loved how this dress made me look and received so many compliments through out the evening and even won Best Costume Award in it. Its a really great dress!

links_reviews_title: James Bond Girl Meets Audrey Hepburn Vibes
links_reviews_text: So sleek and classy - and a touch sexy at the same time. Long but stretchy and easy to dance in.

I felt great in this dress. It was so comfortable and slimming and I got a ton of compliments. I'm usually an 8 but sized up based on reviews and I'm glad I did. It was tight through the hip but had just enough stretch. The belt loops were missing so I had to pin the belt, otherwise it would have flapped open. Also be careful if you're large-chested; I'm a 36D and it was very tight across my chest, creating a weird pressed look from the side. It wasn't so bad with my hair down to cover it a bit, but I would have been a little self-conscious if my hair were up. It looked great from the front though! I'd wear it again for sure.
The dress fit perfectly-no bra needed, and wouldn't have fit under if it was needed! The material was good quality, and not too heavy.

RTR actually shipped me the 6R instead of the 8R but it worked out. The dress was tight but it worked. I would say it runs small because I'm normally a 4-6. I couldn't wear a bra with it but, even with a larger chest (34DD) I didn't need one. I felt great in this dress and that's all that really matters. The many compliments I received just made me feel better. I highly recommend ordering this dress but I would probably size up just to be safe :)

I usually wear a size 2, and this dress definitely runs small. Even the 4 was tough to zip. I did love wearing the dress. The keyhole opening and long leg slit add a little bit of sexiness without overdoing it. I gave it 4 stars because although the dress was clean, you can tell it has been worn many times due to the discoloration around the armpits, caused by deodorants from past wearers.

This dress is everything!! Sexy, classy, and comfortable! Runs true to size and was very comfortable! I wore the 0L with 4.5 inch heels. Sidenote: you can wear a strapless bra with this dress. I would highly recommend this rental!

links_reviews_title: I'm so happy I chose this dress! I felt stunning and received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews, I went back and forth between the Long & Regular length. I initially ordered the 4L and 6L and had them shipped directly to my hotel. The 6L fit great, but was too long for me. Even with almost 4" heels, it was dragging the floor. I was afraid of stepping on the dress all night, so I called RTR to see if they had a 6R available, and they did! They overnighted the new dress and it arrived the day of my event. Based on my height and heels, I believe the 6R length was perfect. As others have stated, the fabric is thick enough so I did not need a bra (score!). The fabric does not really have much give, so I did find bending over to pick something up had to be done gently. Also, the belt was just shy of reaching the side loop to tuck the extra, so a piece of double-sided tape or a safety pin may be necessary. Overall, I loved this dress!

Felt very (almost too) sexy in this sleek black dress! I'm usually a size 4 and the 6 fit snug, similar to other dresses by this brand. I am 5-5" and wore 3" heels and the regular length worked well, although may have been a touch too long. The thigh slit does come up pretty high when seated. I'm probably a little too busty (34DD) to have been wearing such a large v-neck split. I was able to wear an unlined bralette with a halter neckline underneath for support but beware - outside of miraculously having this bralette you will not be able to wear a strapless bra or bustier with this dress. Even the nubra cups I bought originally were visible through the slit. The belt did loosen on me throughout the night with movement, and the excess material won't lay flat so it was visible from the side in pictures, though that didn't bother me. If you're going for sexy and formal without being too fancy (read: black tie optional) this is a great choice!

links_reviews_title: Service was great- love the fact that it comes with a backup size as well.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly. I am 5'5 and weigh 138 lbs; I would say I have an athletic body type. I am also a 34A and 27 waist. I got the size 6R- length and fit was just right. The dress fit snug but was not uncomfortable at all.

links_reviews_title: Showstopper at high school reunion - compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: My original reserved dress for this event was another Cinq a Sept but a few weeks before, RTR sent me an email saying that they could not send it, so I chose this dress as my replacement. It worked out wonderfully! The fit was true to size and I wore it without a bra (I'm not sure that it would have zipped up all the way if I had worn a bra, but keep in mind that while I am not busty, I have a broad chest and shoulders. A gal with a more average or petite frame probably wouldn't have any issues with wearing a bra). I am average height and got the Regular instead of the Long and I thought that it worked out fine with my shorter heels (maybe like 2 inches). Wrinkles came out very easily with my steamer. My only complaint is in regards to the belt that comes with the dress, which is the reason that this gets 4 stars instead of 5. The dress has one attached belt loop to keep the belt secure, but it does not hold the belt's excess fabric in place so I kept having to adjust it all night. I should have utilized a safety pin on the belt. Other than that, this dress is amazing and all of my old friends said that I looked fantastic. Would highly recommend this dress if you are looking to stand out and impress a crowd.

I wanted to show off my legs and the dress did just that. I was also nervous about it being too tight but it ended up being super slimming. The cut out on the chest made it sexy but not too revealing. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Stunning Dress for Black Tie Weddinng
links_reviews_text: Perfect length ( I am 5'6') amazing and flattering fit. Received tons of compliments, was so comfortable and a total blast to dance in. Wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Stunner! Was about 2 inches too short for my height when i put in heels but great besides!
links_reviews_text: Dress runs very small in the waist, glad i got a back up size! Was slightly short for my height still even in a long, besides that was great.
Great dress. I did not wear it for the occasion. It was too sexy for the event. The dress had Belt Loops but there was no belt in the bag. I would definitely rent this dress for another occasion.

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress at prom. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit snug up top which I enjoyed. The only bad part was sitting down with the slit.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous for my senior Carnation Ball formal! Classy and unique.
links_reviews_text: SO glad I ordered the backup size because the 2 was too tight and the belt for the 2 wasn't on the dress. I LOVED this gown, I got tons of compliments all evening, it was chic and I loved the cut of the keyhole. Super comfortable, easy to sit in, flattering on my hourglass figure, couldn't get enough of it. Would definitely purchase if I could!

I didn't get to wear this dress for the occasion because it was more formal than I wanted it to be but I loved how it looked on me. It really hugs the shape of your body, which is why I preferred the fit of the 12 over the 10. It was so sleek and sexy that I would consider renting it again. This time, I would try to get the 12L since I would have liked a little drag at the bottom in order to wear high heels.

This dress runs a touch small through the chest but I wore my usual size since the sleeves were falling down on the larger one. I loved this dress, it was beautiful material and definitely different. I'm 5.7 and the front was knee length.
Great dress. A tad busty but still classy. The arms were a little baggy.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, but the top was loose
links_reviews_text: The dress was a snug fit! It was flattering on, however, the top of the dress and sleeves slipped for most of the night.

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding in November in FL
links_reviews_text: I actually had this as my back up, but first dress didn't fit well up top, I needed more support. This was tight, I should of gotten a 6 and it would of been no problem, but the material was actually so comfortable and soft that I didn't mind it sucking me in! And over time it loosened up a bit where I didn't notice. It was very comfortable, and I felt fabulous. I'm also a bit wider in the shoulders so it was hard to zip up towards the top, had to have hubby really work on it, again, I think with a 6 it wouldn't of been an issue. Loved the dress, and the service, will do again

links_reviews_title: The dress was chic and fun for the party. I did put a jacket over it for synagogue
links_reviews_text: I had tried this on in store and knew I had to size up. My one regret is that it was a bit too low cut. Otherwise it accommodated my large bust size.

links_reviews_title: The dress was great, got a lot of compliments and it fit well. Loved the pockets!!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big for a 0, I'm 5'4"/32c. Loved it, comfortable, pretty, and for me the pockets were the sell, I didn't have to carry a bag and you couldn't tell I had anything in there.

links_reviews_title: Slinky... but size up at least one size.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wait for an excuse to try this dress. The photos on RTR are so beautiful! I found a reason, but almost didn't get to wear this because it runs SMALL. Thankfully my back-up size was larger. Even that just barley zipped comfortably, but the husband said it still looked good (of course he did). The dress is a lovely cut, made with a nice fabric that offers stretch. It could be dressed up for a very formal event, or be equally appropriate for a more low-key affair. You can't wear anything under this without it showing. I wore a strapless body suit to keep everything underneath in place. I even added a backless/strapless bra for extra lift, because the chest area is on full display. This would be ideal for a woman with a smaller chest. The only annoyance was that the shoulders kept wanting to slide down all night.

links_reviews_title: Non-stop compliments and comfort! I LOVE this dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress. I actually wish I could buy it. I received soooo many compliments and felt gorgeous all night. I wore it to a wedding on a yacht in the San Diego Bay and it was absolutely perfect. Very expensive looking and comfortable as well! I'm busty and although tons of cleavage it still looked classy and beautiful! RTR is the best!

I love this trendy dress by Parker! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. I would recommend wearing a strapless bra due to the sheer panels near the shoulders. At 5’7”, the length fell to my knee. This uniquely structured dress is perfect for any formal event!

Fit perfectly and I received compliments from so many people. I loved the flare at the bottom , perfect twirl for dancing. My original dress didn't come and I got this as a back up from the store, I almost didn't try it on because it didn't look like much on the hanger. I'm so glad I did, I have never felt so beautiful. It's the perfect combo of sexy and classy.

links_reviews_title: Nude mesh on shoulders between sleeves is a neat idea.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 2 months pregnant for a little belly needing some stretch in the midsection and bust area. Fit great. Fun to dance in, too!
Runs very small. I wasn't able to zip it.

I'm 5'2", 143 lbs, 34DD, waist 29", hips 40". I probably could have worn the size 2 with pantyhose/spanx but it wasn't quite the right fit in the bust - it wasn't the right cut for me. The size 4 fit better, but the straps were waay too long and wouldn't stay on.
Had to return for a bigger size
I didn't wear it because it didn't fit. I would side up.
This dress is good if you're looking for a simple black dress-there isn't much too it. Couldn't even zip it was so small! Size up.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: The shoulder straps didn't stay up on my shoulders. Kept slipping and so I didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Too tight through the chest so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size but no give to the fabric.

links_reviews_title: . Sexy and hugged my curves a lot.
links_reviews_text: My back up style. Sexy and hugged my curves a lot. The cap sleeve and neckline were great. Dress was tight and would have required spanx.. I opted for the less voluptuous and my first choice.

Wore this for a fundraising dinner event with work colleagues in attendance. This dress was perfect - flattering but not inappropriate. It definitely runs small. I'm usually a 4, but could hardly zip up that size in his dress. The 6 fit like a glove.
Not meant for barrel chests or broad shoulders. Such a lovely dress, but going up sizes will not solve the fit in shoulders because it needs to be slim in middle.
Neither size fit well. Either to tight or to long in the body. I really wanted this dress to fit as it was very nice.

links_reviews_title: Not very forgiving material and small around the rib cage
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Christmas party. Usually a dress is too tight in the hip area but this dress fit there but was very small around my rib cage and I couldn't zip it. The material also cling to some bad areas so I would suggest spanks with it.

I could hardly zip this up. I should have sized up. Once zipped though you could see every bump so I didn't wear it. I doubt I would have worn it if I had ordered a larger size. I think if you are on the athletic side it could be very sexy.
Didn't wear the dress because it ran small and was not flattering of my FUPA. Style is nice though

Rented for engagement party. A tad tight. I wore spanx and it looked good. I hate tight clothing though. I’m 5’7” approx 125. Maybe it was too tight to me cause I have gained a couple pounds recently. But overall looked nice. No picture.
Form fitting but true to size and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: nice dress, I needed a 4 instead of a 2 - I'm curvy
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear, I am too curvy for a size 2 in this dress.
Made my chest look flat. Wanted to like it, but no
I am usually in between a 6-8. The six was too small, 8 was a better fit. It was tight but was not uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because did not fit.
links_reviews_text: Runs very small.
Way to small.

links_reviews_title: lining on the inside does not give so it doesn't allow the dress to fall or hug the body
links_reviews_text: would have been a great dress but for curvy women, when a dress fits perfectly up top, it doesn't give enough to fit well on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: It very classy and sexy. However it does show a quite a bit of cleavage
links_reviews_text: The fabric gives but it does hug all the curves. Very nice fabric. Was able to wear a regular bra underneath. Did not require spanx.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for broad shoulders and no hips.
links_reviews_text: The nude shear it has on the sleeves is cool. Really liked that. But I was surprised at how tight the dress was due to the fabric. And it kept slipping down and exposing my bra. I considered going bra-less, but was afraid stuff might pop out if you know what I mean. So I decided not to use it. I also had trouble zipping it up. The stretchy fabric was not helping. Finally had to get 2 friends to help. Thi

links_reviews_title: Did not wear out, but tried in and...
links_reviews_text: Did not wear this out, but I tried it on and I can barely hit the dress pass my hips. Runs small...

links_reviews_title: Hugs in all the right places. Great dress! Looks better than the photo
links_reviews_text: Great dress

links_reviews_title: Classy dress, but a couple issues
links_reviews_text: It's bit long for someone 5' 3'', but I love the fit and look. I expected that it would be a little long since most of the other reviewers are 5' 7'' . However, the shoulders of the dress fall down over my shoulders. The shoulders of the dress won't stay up at all, which is an inconvenience and something that I didn't expect to be a problem. I don't have an incredibly petite frame , so this issue surprised me. I typically wear a 4 or 6, but maybe the 2 would have fit me better in the shoulders. I'm hoping that I some fashion tape I purchased through RTR a few months ago will do the trick!

links_reviews_title: Extremely fitted, I did not wear it
links_reviews_text: More fitted than I realized
It is beautiful but tight in the waist and hips

I wore this dress to a wedding, and it could not have been a better choice. I got compliments all night!! I am 5'9" and this dress looked good with heels and flats. I wear a 34DD bra and was able to VERY comfortably go bra-less, which is not usually an option. The pockets were awesome because I didn't need to bring a purse! I highly recommend this dress. It is a thick material, which might get warm in the summer, but it was perfect for a winter wedding!

Really liked the dress overall. I don't normally wear strapless so it was a little annoying to have to keep pulling it up. But ultimately I was really pleased with the dress. Surprisingly comfortable.

I truly loved this dress. It was a bit tight and the zipper was a tad worn but once I got it zipped I felt very comfortable. I loved that the dress had big pockets to put my phone and lipstick in without it looking bulgy. The material is very thick so I would only wear in the winter which was perfect for this event.

Fits very true to size! Length was perfect, and even though it was strapless it didn't fall down. I'd highly recommend this. FYI: The black design on the dress is more prominent in person, than it looks on the website.

Ordered 4L as my main size and it runs way too small. The size 6 fit much more like a 4. The dress was great and worked well for the wedding I attended. The ribbing for the bust area did poke through the material the whole night into my rib cage and made it slightly uncomfortable to wear for the 9 hours I ended up having to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and I definitely got compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly except a little longer than I thought. I am 5’7” and wore 2inch heels and the 4L had about an inch touching the ground in the back. Loved it though!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! A bit long on a 5'4" gal.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful, comfortable and easy to dance the night away in. I received many complements all night long. The zipper was a bit hard to zip but once it was closed it fit like a glove. Runs true to size but the regular ran a bit long on me, even being 5'4" wearing 3" wedges. Pockets were great and wasn't too thick for an early October wedding. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: This was my first experience and I loved how easy it was to use (receive and send back)
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3 34A and weigh 120lbs. This dress was comfortable, loved the pockets! It was longer on me then the model in the picture showing the dress but I thought that made the dress look even better! Loved it!

I'm a sucker for a dress with pockets, and these were deep pockets. I had an iPhone, wad of cash, coozie, lipstick, and essential oil bottle in my pockets and you can't even tell. This dress fit true to size for me, but was a little long. I didn't mind too much because it hid my shoes, so I was able to wear booties instead of heels for comfort. I loved that the top wasn't tight and didn't accentuate armpit fat, but still stayed up without me having to pull it up constantly. Absolutely loved this dress, received so many compliments! I ordered a size 0R and 2R, and wore the 2.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a black tie event, it was gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this dress is beautiful and photographs great! I loved the black and navy combo. No complaints other than the fact that it was a bit tight around my chest.

awesome fit, and showed off all of the good curves and hid all the bad ones, fit even after the wine, and was fun and easy to dance in! had pockets which made it so i didnt have to carry a clutch all evening with everything in it. fit true to size, but would suggest ordering a size larger as backup just in case.

I wore this to a winter Black Tie wedding in Texas. This dress worked really well for my body shape: I'm tall, a bit small-chested, with muscular legs/glutes. I normally wear a 4 and the 4L fit like a glove. I suggest wearing a statement necklace (and shoes!) as this is a simple dress meant for accessorizing! I did not wear a bra. Although the dress has rubberized material on the inside of the bodice, I had some minor issues with the dress slipping down by the end of the night...I mostly attribute that to my wild dance moves!

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfortable dress for a wedding
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 in dresses, and the 4 fit really well (not as tight as I usually like at the bust, but I'm also a small cup size). Loved the extra room in the hips. 4R was plenty long, even in regular length my heels would sometimes catch the back hem. Stayed in place all night with no need to pull up or adjust like some strapless dresses.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfectly elegant. It fit like a glove and was such a flattering dress!
links_reviews_text: everything was wonderful with this dress EXCEPT that it did not zip up the day of the wedding. It zipped up just fine the day before when I tried it on.. but come the day of the event the zipper broke. I spent 20 minutes during the Catholic Mass wedding ceremony trying to fix the zipper and zip up my dress. I ended up safety pinning the back just so I could dance and enjoy the night. Besides that the dress was PERFECT. I got so many compliments. I love how elegant the style of the dress was and the navy and black was perfect for a fall wedding! I would 100% recommend this dress!
#perfect guest dress#pockets!!!

This was my first RTR experience and I absolutely loved it. I wore this dress to an October wedding. The dress was beautiful and I got so many compliments. It has pockets so kept my lipstick and phone on me all night. I ended up getting the long because of my height and I wanted to wear taller heels but I think the torso was too long because the bones of the dress were poking me the whole night. I think if I had ordered the regular it would have been a perfect fit.
This dress was perfect! Would rent again. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: It matched his dress uniform perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Loved the quality and pockets! Hard to zip up over the seam, but felt secure and didn't slip a bit. Lots of compliments :)

links_reviews_title: I wore this gown to a fundraising event that included fine dining and dancing.
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic! In person, the greens in the dress were mistaken for black unless people looked quite closely. Still, it was beautiful and fit wonderfully. The fabric and stitching was all top quality, so I felt like a million bucks! I got so many compliments throughout the night. For being strapless, it also stayed in place as I dined and danced. Bonus - it has deep pockets! I would highly recommend this dress to others.

I was intimidated by the thought of a floor length dress for a black tie wedding, but this worked perfectly for my short height (I'm 5 2). I originally tried on the 4 and it fit perfectly, tight in the ribs so that I didn't need a bra. Luckily I tried on my final order at the store because the 4 zipper was stuck and there was a slight rip in it. I ended up going with my backup size of a 6, and the fit was similar, and I felt more comfortable to move all night. It's a heavy fabric, but a fun pattern that looks more colorful in different lighting. I wore high heels, and since it is shorter in the front than the back, didn't trip much. It does take getting used to move the longer fabric in the back around when you walk. Definitely recommend!
Perfect dress for anything, always, everywhere.

links_reviews_title: A comfortable and beautiful dress for any formal event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great choice for a grad school ball. It was true to size and I didn't have to deal with any issues that usually come with a strapless dress. Even though it was a little long for me (I'm 5'2"), it wasn't a big deal at all. Additionally, I loved having pockets! I would absolutely recommend this dress to anyone.
This dress is comfortable and true to size. It was perfect for a black tie wedding!

The dress fit well. I was glad to have ordered the 10P as a back up. They were out of the 8R and the L was too long and didn't have enough room in the bust. The 10P fit perfectly (although hit a little longer than shown on the model). I got lots of compliments and felt comfortable in the dress all night. Perfect for an evening winter wedding!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a princess. Loved how the gown felt and how it looked.
links_reviews_text: Got great. Only negative was how difficult it was to get it zipped up. It was impossible to do it on my own and I had to ask my date to help.

The dress fit perfect and was beautiful. I was able to get the hem to fall out by pressing both the hemline and the skirt. Loved the fit. It is long but worked well for my height 5'8.5" so consider that when you order. I wore 4 inch heels.

This gown was delightful to wear. I toned it down a bit with soft hair, nude heels and statement earrings as it was a transitional wedding (late afternoon to evening). I received many compliments and loved the subtle gold undertones. Lovely for an autumn black tie event.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to the Governor's Inaugural Ball and loved it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4R and 6R and ended up wearing the 6R. I thought the fit was true to size. I didn't have the full high low effect but it was perfect that it didn't drag since it was raining that night. Lots of compliments!
Fit great! Held my boobs up! Loved the pockets. Felt like a princess all night and got hella compliments. Definitely needed help zipping up the back but it's all good.

links_reviews_title: My son's childhood friends winter wedding. The dress was perfect for the venue.
links_reviews_text: The pattern, the color and the fit were absolutely stunning . I felt gorgeous and received so many compliments.

This dress was just everything. Fancy, beautiful and heavy for a winter wedding, but light enough that it didn't just fall off. The pockets are always perfect, especially to keep the red lip going strong :) if you are smaller chested like me, I would definitely recommend some extra help in the top with this dress. I found myself pulling it up around there a lot but it was worth it. I felt so beautiful and received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: The conservative elegance of this dress and comfort was great.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. A little longer than on the the model because I am only 5 foot 4 inches and curvy so the larger size caused the dress to be longer. I would recommend the 14P but the 14R was the only one available. My heel did get caught a couple if times in the hem. It went well with my husbands military dress blues.

The dress was pretty and runs true to its size. I got this dress but didn't end up wearing it to the wedding as I liked the other dress I got better. The fabric was soft and comfortable. Overall a great dress.
Loved the dress and it fit perfectly. I did have some trouble with getting the zipper up all the way as it would get stuck in one specific spot.

I rented this dress to wear to a wedding. It was easy to move and dance in and was super comfortable. My only complaint is the boning was sticking out under my arm and irritated my skin. I received many compliments and wish I had another event to wear it to.
This dress has POCKETS!!!!!! This dress was amazing!! The fit was great without a bra. The bones helped keep it up. It helps hide a belly if you have one without wearing spanx.

links_reviews_title: So elegant with an edgy vibe!
links_reviews_text: I really liked my rental of this dress. I was 14 weeks pregnant and had no problems with my little bump fitting in the dress. I would not recommend this for larger chested girls though. I'm well endowed to begin with (36D), but with the swelling due to pregnancy, the dress was almost too tight up top. I didn't clasp the inside corset because it would've been uncomfortable. If I were to rent it again I would go one more size up (I wore the 10). The dress never fell down though (ha)!! The pockets were great for storing my phone, lipstick, a room key, and some cash! I also loved that the bottom front was short and showcased my shoes. Perfect for shoe lovers!! The material is thick but not too hot (I wore this in September) and it felt very expensive. I eventually changed into flats and the dress did drag the floor in the back just a little (I'm 5'7). I would recommend renting this dress. It's beautiful and fun!

links_reviews_title: Real life cinderella experience! But more bad ass.
links_reviews_text: In dresses I can vary from a size 2 to 6 depending on the cut, style, fit, etc., and in this dress I was a 2. The fabric is on the heavier side, so I sized down, which helped me feel more comfortable that the dress would stay up. The dress has great boning, and essentially an inner corset. I was able to dance all night without worry. This dress is a slight high-low cut, which I didn't notice before. I loved it, great for showing off shoes.

links_reviews_title: First Rental And It Was A Winner!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my 25 th birthday party and it rocked. The detailing was just right, wasn't a dramatic hi low effect which I was glad about. I'm on the taller side and with heels it was just at the floor might be a tiny bit long if you don't wear heels.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly especially for a shorter person!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and I felt beautiful in it. Being 5'1" I often struggle finding a dress that doesn't need shortening. Although this dress is midi length on taller women this dress was perfect floor length on me! The front hit right at my ankles showing off my shoes and left a small train behind me. The dress also had pockets which is always a win in formalwear. The only negative I can say is the boning was in both the front and back and the back boning dug into me a little bit. The zipper was also a bit difficult where the upper and lower sections of the dress came together. I would definitely recommend the dress especially if you are short and looking for a formal gown!

cool and easy-to-wear fit with the winding piping running throughout. best for layering over (with a jacket) rather than under (with a tee) due to the tight fitting banded top. works for cooler or warmer temps based on how it's styled.

links_reviews_title: So odd it feels very edgy and fashionable
links_reviews_text: At first, the dress feels a little strange - weighed down in unexpected places - but this passes quickly and it was actually very comfortable.
