I chose it as an emergency backup option when an item was unavailable, and while it wasn't appropriate for the evening event I was RTRing for, it turned out to be perfect for a daytime dressy work event where I didn't want to emphasize any curves--and believe me, it won't. You won't want this for a hot date, but it is interesting to the point of being so unusual it looks very fashionable, edgy, and avant garde. Remember that scene in the Little Mermaid when Ariel washes ashore, newly with human legs, and realizes she's naked? Flounder and Scuttle quickly fashion her a dress of discarded sailcloth and rope? THIS IS THAT DRESS. I enjoyed wearing it once. It was really different from other dresses...but I have no qualms about sending it back for the next person to try.
Very cute and unique dress for my Florida vacation. A bit snug around the chest but still comfortable. Maybe just a bit too much fabric from the waist down but still looks nice. I would rent again.
This dress fit perfectly except the black band across bust was too tight creating armpit bulges. Apart from the fit issue I loved this modern unique dress. Slips on over the head. No zipper etc.
Wore to a museum on vacation! It was a lose fit, so not entirely flattering, but I liked the flow of it.

I literally had people stopping their cars to tell me how nice I looked in this dress that I wore during a weekend at the beach. Made me feel like a million bucks! The dress is flowy, not clingy, perfect for a warm breezy day.

This is a very cool, easy to wear dress that looks fresh and unusual. It's definitely a look that will stand out and draws attention. I wore this to a spring day time party where most women were in floral a-line dresses. This got tons of compliments from other women and I loved it. I also wore it layered with a blazer to work. Another thing i loved is that, unlike a lot of more unusual cut clothing, this dress actually worked on me as a petite/smaller framed person. At 5'3, it's more ankle length than midi but I wasn't swallowed by too much fabric. It's also a comfortable, breathable fabric that works in both sunny outdoors and air conditioned office. Only negative is it wrinkles when sitting. Would buy if it was less $$

This isn't the dress you get if you're looking to show off your shape, it's the dress you get if you want to wear something unique and fashionable! Overall it was pretty comfortable, however the straps did slip a few times. After sitting for a while, it does wrinkle. The back of it is really cool- the entire dress is cool but hard to tell right away from one angle. It's definitely a piece you have to study for a minute to "get". Perfect choice for a fashion show.

I wore this piece for day to day activities, and it brought fun into otherwise "mundane" moments. The straps are a little small to support all the fabric weight of the dress, but I loved the asymmetrical vibe of this hot haute piece.

I had really high hopes for this dress!! It looked so good on everyone in their photos. To be fair, it may have looked better if I got one size down, but then I feel like the black band across the chest would have bit slightly too constricting. The material felt like a parachute or something. The swing of the dress was nice, but even the colors just looked so... off. I thought it was kind of shapeless and my husband said it had a very "oh... did you make that yourself?"look to it. He's not wrong.

This was a fun rental. It was light enough for summer and the material was super comfortable. I know some folks felt it unflattering but I thought the shape of the dress was super interesting, especially when you walked, and I received many compliments. Only issue was that the top black part was a bit tight - if I'd ordered the larger size it would have been too big. It wasn't impossible to wear though and I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: not a flattering cut at all. Looks like a bag. Interesting idea, but just not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Not flattering for any body type
The top has no give so better for small busted ladies. Wonderful dress, wore to work under a black blazer. Easy, breezy, summer look. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Second time writing a review, wonder if it will stick?!
links_reviews_text: Weird dress, which is why I tried it with unlimited. I thought it was pretty ugly on but I got a ton of compliments all night from other fashionable ladies. Ok. Styled with studded black flats and a black studded leather moto jacket.
Compliments all around. This dress is so different and current that everyone comments on it. It's very flattering and the fabric is great!

links_reviews_title: Try it if you're going for "edgy"
links_reviews_text: I rented this only because it was a $2k dress and I have the Unlimited plan. My friends were divided- some said it looked like a shower curtain or picnic blanket sewn together unevenly, and some said it was cute. I thought it looked just okay. It was definitely "edgy".

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable for a spring party
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! Quality fabric that drapes well and looks great

I really liked this dress and wanted to wear it to a casual outing. Unfortunately, while I'm thin I am broad and the top was entirely too tight around. The chest would have been fine but there was no zipper.
This dress is okay, but I expected more. It is sort of poofy all over except where the black band is. Just looks a little frumpy.
Beautiful dress: soft sequins- non-abrasive. I wouldn't recommend this dress for smaller busted women. If you are fuller up top it would be perfect. Unfortunately not for me.

links_reviews_title: Sparkles and champs on Christmas eve!
links_reviews_text: Originally rented for NYE but decided to lounge in it on Christmas Eve. Very comfortable, stretchy, fab. Styled with silk ugh slippers and champagne.
I loved this dress so much! It was super flattering. However, it was a lot more revealing than anticipated.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect look for my work Gala!
links_reviews_text: Pro’s: Very slimming Fit great, just enough stretch to it Length worked out with my heels (as I’m 5’0) It’s elegant with just enough sexy (b/c the cut outs) True to size! I wear 8-10 normally Con’s: My bust is a size C/D and it was looser than I would have liked it to be (but... I don’t have shoulders always been an issue for me) The sequins rub your arm raw after awhile

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper. I ft great wearing it to a charity gala.
links_reviews_text: This dress gave me an hourglass figure without feeling to self conscious.

I of course waited until the last minute to find a dress and this was my first time with RTR! I looked for a couple days and with it being the holidays and awards shows and galas there was ONE I repeat ONE dress in a 0P. I had no choice other than to get this when I found it. I was apprehensive due to some reviews but thought well they give you a few extra days in the event it didn't work out! I tried the two sizes on 0P and 0R. They both fit but since I am short the 0P fit perfectly length wise. I could not be more thrilled, I immediately rented my next one for a few weeks out! This is amazing :)

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful gown. Fit well, very comfortable. I will definitely be ordering from RTR again!
links_reviews_text: Fit well I probably could have gone down a size. This dress fits true to size. Very comfortable no complaints

links_reviews_title: Felt very comfortable and glamorous at the same time
links_reviews_text: Husband loved the dress.
Overall great dress but a bit long and straps too big (but I am very petite). Wore it to my best friend's black tie wedding and I got many compliments. Loved the sequins and cutout!

This dress arrived after my event; however, it was too short to wear anyway. It fit beautifully elsewhere, but it hit just below my ankles. I am 5'5", so a regular dress should at least graze the floor. It's a very glamorous dress and quite comfortable too!

I really wanted to love this dress. I got it for my prom and was so excited for it, but when I got the dress I was super disappointed and ended up getting a replacement dress. The fit on me was awful. It was super short on me and I have worn the same size in another dress from this designer and it was much longer than this one and fit me perfectly. This dress also was super unflattering. It made my hips look larger and didn't fit the my chest so there was extra fabric everywhere. I was very shocked of this because the dress I got last year by the same designer was perfect and this one was the complete opposite.

links_reviews_title: Best Purchase I Have Made In A Long Time
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress! I received so many compliments. I wish I didn't have to return it(:

I chose this dress for prom and it was perfect! Upon reading reviews before ordering, I was worried that the bust area would be too spacey (considering I can barely fill an A-Cup). In the end, there was definitely a little bit of room that I couldn't fill, but nothing that was uncomfortable or odd-looking. I wore breast petals and I was secure dancing like a freak to the Backstreet Boys. I don't believe it would be too tight for someone with a larger bust. I received so many compliments on the dress and really stood out amongst my peers as being very classy and elegant. Overall this dress was perfect. Minor warning, you might find some sequins lurking around your house after you wear it!

links_reviews_title: The all over sequence and side cutouts were just edgy enough and the black kept it classic.
links_reviews_text: I am almost 6ft tall and this dress was a little too short in the front - even in the long size and wearing flats. I am curvy through the hips, but didn't feel restricted, just enough stretch. I was worried about the sequence being scratchy on my under arms but didn't have any issues. I was super aware about how low cut the top was, but was able to wear a strapless bra to help. Overall I thought the dress was beautiful for a black tie optional wedding, I just wish it was a bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, length was just right.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly in size 2R, many compliments and a great night!
Got a lot of compliments on this dress! Highly recomend it

I wore this dress to a Mardi Gras ball. I loved it!!! You can actually wear a bra with it, which is great. However, I did notice the length is rather short. I am 5'7 and I rented the long. Luckily, for me it worked out, but anyone who is taller may have some issues with that.
This dress fit like a glove. I received sooo many compliments. Only draw back was that my heel kept getting caught in the train.
It is very true to size. I am 5 foot three and 117 pounds and it fit absolutely perfect .
Im 5'9... the long was perfect... the dress fit perfect... I could not out dress the bride... but i was close lol.. make a statement!
Beautiful dress! Very flattering on chest, does show off every curve. Tight around mid section and tummy.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments with this dress
links_reviews_text: Im 5'3 and 145 and the dress fit perfectly! I was getting compliments all night and if I had more formal events to go to I'd probably buy it. Definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I got compliments all night, it was a real eye catching dress!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’6, 115lbs, a 34C bust and the 2R was a perfect fit! And it’s a little stretchy so it was very comfortable!

I wore this dress to a ball. This dress fit perfect. My original size was a 10L but it was to tight around my chest. The 12L was a perfect fit and the length of the dress was everything! I'm 5'10 and wore 4" heels and you could barely see my shoes (like that's amazing!!)...If you want to look elegant and chic look no further!!

This dress was perfect for me! I'm a petite woman, 5'2" and 127 lbs. The length was just right, even with flats on only my toes and tops of shoes peeked out, and I didn't have to hold it up at all while walking. The dress was form fitting yet flexible enough to sit, walk and dance without worrying about a thing! This dress truly felt like it was tailored to my body, I did not want to take it off and was disappointed when the night ended! The dress arrived in great condition, very professionally parceled. I loved this whole RTR experience- i highly recommend it for any event!

links_reviews_title: Guest at Debutant Ball- Fit in well
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful dress perfect for the occasion. It did fit a little large around the bust and rib cage area but that is typical for most things with me. It lay nicely everywhere else but wasn't snug. The only thing I wish could have gone differently is that there was a smaller size available, but besides that it was amazing. It was a heavy dress due to the sequins but I didn't have any problems with the skinny straps digging in I was very comfortable all night. I wore it with 3 inch heels and the length was perfect in the front.
I absolutely love this dress. Although the size 0 didn't come in a longer size so my heels popped out a bit. The dress was also a bit big around my waist but it wasn't too noticeable

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for prom and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit amazingly and I got lots of compliments. The cut of the dress is perfect and the sequins are so pretty!

Dress was over all cute. Fit true to size with stretch. However, it was so short I couldn't wear it. I'm only 5'6 and ordered the regular. It touched at about my ankle. Maybe would have been ok in the long.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and flattering all night!
links_reviews_text: Lots of cleavage, the cut outs on the side are in the perfect place, very flattering. I was surprised the dress didn't touch the floor with heels on, but that was a good thing, didn't trip over it all night. This was my first time, and I'd do it again, so easy.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to prom, it was a real head turner in all the right ways!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful! I got so many compliments. It was flashy, but not over the top while being elegant. The fit was impeccable, it hugged me in all the right places. I would defiantly rent this dress again!
Perfect dress for black tie wedding. Comfortable and runs true to size
This dress is a showstopper. I'm 5'3", 125 lbs and I rented a size 2R. Perfect size and length!

links_reviews_title: The dress was amazing. It fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful. I was complimented by everyone. It takes out your curves perfectly.
I had gotten a size a little larger than my normal size but it still worked out great.

links_reviews_title: Great dress- stretchy, so you can make either size work.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size but maybe a bit bit because its stretchy fabric. I ordered an 8 and 6. I usually wear a 6 in clothing. InNEVER wear a 4 but managed to squeeze into it fine as a last resort. A bit busty if you're big chested.

Ended up getting this as a replacement and was super excited after the reviews but the top was too big. Fit comfortably through hips but the top gaped on both sides just above the cutout. Otherwise, felt good on the body and not too heavy for a sequin gown. Would size down if hips are larger than bust.
Wore this to a gala and it was perfect! Fit just right and I got tons of compliments

It was a gorgeous gown, but I rented both 10L and 12L and were both way too short. Otherwise the dress was beautiful. If you're going to rent, it would be perfect with flats but I had planned to wear 3inch heels. I expected it to be longer with renting the long sizes, but felt more like a regular length. Ended up wearing my backup style, which I loved a lot more!

links_reviews_title: The scalloped lace neckline and and draped back are gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Fit very well and was comfortable. The only odd thing was the attached belt is much tighter than the dress’ waist, and I couldn’t button it. However, I figured out a way to use it since it is sewn on and is therefore a must. The belt comes together in the back Nd is hidden by the drape. So I just used a black hair tie to connect the ends, and that worked- totally hidden by the draped fabric. I was complimented all night!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress... just buckle on belt was missing
links_reviews_text: Love how it fit! Gorgeous dress! Lots of compliments! The hooks on the belt buckle were missing so I had to safety pin the belt! That is literally my only complaint! Love the dress otherwise!

It's really nice that they provide two sizes since you never really know how a dress will fit. This was my first time using rent the runway and I thought the dress hadn't arrived in time, I called customer service and they were delightful to work with. Turns out my boyfriend had signed for it and it had in fact arrived. I felt beautiful all night, definitely a gorgeous and classic style.
Fit perfect! Received so many compliments!
Rented this dress for a black tie wedding. It arrived on time and was a perfect fit. A little tight with the waist belt, but overall was very happy with it. Long and elegant, yet simple.

Fit was perfect! I'm 5'10" and ordered the long and it was a perfect length with heels. There is a belt on the dress that does not stretch. That was a little snug in me being 4 months postpartum, but other than that I loved this dress! Just enough cleavage without being too much!
I had to wear a padded bra. It would have been fine without, but I didn't fill it out. Other than that, it fit like a glove. I am 5' 7" and I think it could have been an inch longer.
I am 5'-6" and the long was perfect with heels.
I wore this for a work black tie event. It was cozy and elegant and I was able to wear a regular bra with it. It runs a bit small.
Fits larger than other brands but not too large. Not a lot of stretch but fit comfortably and flattering. I had 3 dinners and still looked great- haha.
Dress fit as expected and I could wear it with a notmal bra. Felt great, comfortable to wear, and lots if compliments. NOT your average LBD. Would definitwly rent again for a black tie affair!

links_reviews_title: Great dress - perfect fit and style for Charity Gala event!
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up style (original one we decided was too fancy and sparkly for the event), and I loved it! Per other reviews stating that the bust size ran tight on larger-busted women, I ordered a size up from my normal size 6. I had some wiggle room, but preferred that over the potential of a too-tight top. This dress can be worn with a regular bra, no problem. There is a "belt" that hooks at the small part of the waist to ensure a nice silhouette along with a side zipper. Length was great - I'm 5'3" and wore a 2-inch heel. Nice material, comfortable to dance and sit in. Zero complaints!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but the top is unusual
links_reviews_text: So really try to look through as many pictures as you can. The top is two distinctly different parts. The lacy underlay is against your skin and then the solid black part is almost like a sheath on top of it. Its really pretty but i think better suited to a b cup and above. A huge pro is that you can wear a regular bra underneath it! It was a little bit short for me at 6'1" and my feet were poking out at the bottom with flats on. The middle slit was super easy for dancing and walking. I would recommend this again.
Fit like a glove! Stylist was awesome in picking out this dress that I would never have picked otherwise

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Was not too tight and could definitely dance all night! Got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Didn't love the way the sleeve hit on my arm. Overall true to size.

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and unlike anything I have ever worn. I got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am a 34dd so the bust was too small in the 8R. The dress runs a bit small anyway so the 10R was good.

Funny story, this was not the dress I ordered!! I originally ordered something else, and last minute, RTR emailed to say they couldn't deliver the dress. They graciously sent me several dresses to choose from based on my previous rentals and style. I chose this and it was a total hit. I love looking at these photos of me in this dress. Very sexy, and very flattering. It gives the illusion that you are showing skin up top, but its mostly material that appears see-through. Check it out. I curled my hair in an old hollywood glam wave look and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I sized up because I have a larger bust (ddd). I was able to wear a regular bra. The lace on top is beautiful and I loved the way the black fabric draped over it in the back. The only thing I didn't love about the dress was a belt that goes right below the lace. It was very tight around my chest.
Loved this dress!!! It fit great. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I received multiple compliments on this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a formal wedding. I am 5'2 so I had to wear pretty high heels but that was the only con. Dress fits very true to size.

This dress was actually the backup to my backup that I ended up getting shipped overnight to arrive on the day of my event. Luckily it fit perfectly. The peekaboo lace on the sides/front is a beautiful pale pink (which I felt didn't show well in RTR pictures). The slit in the front makes the dress a little more "moveable" and I'm glad I ended up with a good option!

I didn't realize that the top of this is a blouson while being 2 pieces. The lace underway was gorgeous, but then there was a loose, black overlay that just didn't seem to work right on me! The cut of the dress was awesome-I just didn't care for the overlay blouson top!

This dress is very flattering. I am 5"2 and typically a 4. I wore the 4R and the length was perfect with heels. The fit was pretty true to a size. The lace detail on the bust and under the arms is very flattering. If you have a large rib cage I would recommend sizing up. There is a subtle belt right under the bust line and may be tight if you have a larger rib cage. This dress is really comfortable and looks lovely on. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Great fitting dress.
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful dress. I'm a 2 or 4P regularly but I read reviews about the bust. I'm a 32 DDD so I went up a

This dress is beautiful and I received so many compliments! There is not a whole lot of "give" in the material of this dress. I rented the 4 and 6. (I'm a usual 4) The 6 was too from the waist up but fit ok everywhere else. The 4 was snug but worked much better...with little room to spare. I was still comfortable but I would definitely suggest sizing up on your second size and trying both and going with whatever feels better. It was the perfect dress for a formal wedding. The dress falls straight down with little room in the hip/thigh area, but I still managed to dance the night away!

links_reviews_title: Received a ton of compliments! The lace detailing makes the dress!
links_reviews_text: Fabulous classic dress!!! Fits like a glove and is super flattering! Highly recommend for any formal event.
Great dress for my work holiday party. Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Classy, sexy, fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: My favorite rental so far! This dress holds everything in perfectly and has elegant details. The neckline is not too deep and not too conservative, and the slit in the front is sexy without you having to worry if you are showing too much. I have a bigger butt, so I was worried it would be too tight but I had the right amount of room without looking baggy. My one and only complaint is the empire waist band was a tad tight, but the dress still zipped easily.
Fit was perfect! The length was great, even at 5'2".

Stunning black gown by Raoul! Running true to size, we recommend going one size up for backup. With no stretch in the fabric and a tighter fit in the bust, this dress is better for smaller cup sizes. This gown is fitted at the waist and hip area, so if you’re curvier, you may want to consider sizing up. One thing that I love about this dress is the lace detailing at the neckline; however you would have to wear a NuBra or no bra for this look. At 58” from shoulder to hem, this gown is perfect to wear with heels for a gala or black tie wedding. Pair it with silver jewelry and any color heels.
I wore this dress to a black tie event for work. It was very comfortable and classy. The lace is a great detail.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but runs a bit small with no stretch in the material.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress with unique detail. The only problem I had with the dress was the belt. It's hard to see from the image but there is a belt sewn to the dress that does not adjust and has no stretch. It is very tight and uncomfortable. I wish I would have sized up for my back up dress solely because of the belt. By the end of the night it was very restrictive. I received a lot of compliments on the dress and would rent again if it wasn't for the belt! Also the skirt has no stretch its fairly tight but I didn't find it to be a problem. I'm 5'2'' and 150 lbs and I wore the size 8R which was a little long even with heels.
After just having a baby....I wore this too a wedding tins of compliments...made me feel great
Very comfortable, no bra needed. It's much prettier in person. Classy unusual details.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress...but a tiny bit too small.
links_reviews_text: The dress is stunning but there is a belt under the bust that was just too tight for me to wear the dress. Very sad, and fit everywhere else like a glove!
Perfect fit and absolutely gorgeous dress! 6R was perfect for me 5'5" 130.

I didn't end up wearing the dress because another that I rented for better, but the dress looked amazing! Very dressy and flattering, I would recommend ordering a size up because the belt is very tight. You won't be disappointed with this dress. You can wear a normal bra as well.
Great length, I’m 5’8

Unfortunately I didn't end up wearing this dress as it was a little snug and I didn't think I would be comfortable in it all night - I needed something to wear while volunteering at a black tie gala but as a volunteer there's more running around than as a guest so I opted to wear my back up dress. Wish I was able to wear this and would definitely rent it again for a different event!
Love this gown. Unfortunately even the long was too short on my 5'10" frame.

links_reviews_title: Pretty for a work Xmas party. Had to use a backless strapless stick on bra
links_reviews_text: Had to use a stick on bra, which made it a little more difficult to wear, but pretty and bright color for a holiday party
Stunning dress that stands out. Super comfortable and lots of pretty detail accents.

I'm 5'3" and 120 lbs. I usually wear a 4 and since most said this runs true to size I chose a 4. It fit perfectly. I never wear red, but it looked great. I received so many compliments. Red is my new go to color.
I received tons of compliments. Comfortable fit. Beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a March wedding with nude-colored heels - I added a long black cardigan w/ chilly weather!
links_reviews_text: Although the fabric bunches up a tad underneath, overall it lays nicely and fits true to size. The candy apple red color would be perfect for a red gala or something similar, but I loved the red and nude colored heels I wore for a spring March wedding.

links_reviews_title: I never wear red but so glad I did!
links_reviews_text: We hosted Christmas Day and I wore this sweet red number. The dress has more stretch than I expected but I still opted for the size 12 so I could be as comfortable as possible all day. I felt very festive and the dress was beautiful. My only complaint was the neckline looked a bit worn and out of shape.

links_reviews_title: Good fit, be careful with Spanx!
links_reviews_text: I have a large bust and a smaller waist, so it can be difficult to find a good form-fitting dress. I loved the bold color & lace, and figured I'd give this one a shot. The 12 fit great - didn't need to use the 14. That said, the back is slightly low, so I decided to use a low-back Spanx for cup support instead of a strapless bra. The Spanx fabric kept getting stuck to the interior of the dress, and the entire dress would shift and twist so the zipper and slit was off-center. I ended up dumping the Spanx about ten minutes into the reception (used a regular bra with stuffed-in back instead), and was better off for it. My mistake for waiting until the last minute to try the dress on with my chosen undergarments, but figured it's worth a warning for other renters.

links_reviews_title: Dress was exactly what I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: I wore it for our family Christmas photos and red photographed really well. The lace on this dress does not stretch. Keep in mind if your not looking for something tight and form fitting.
Tight in chest, did not wear a bra and I'm a 32DD-E and the dress smashed the girls a bit, but otherwise gorgeous on, lots of compliments!
This dress was great and perfect for a holiday cocktail party. My only complaint was that it was a little tight around the bust and stomach/hips.

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect fit for my holiday party. I received several compliments and the fit was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fabric allows you move and sit comfortably with plenty of breathing room.
I usually wear a 6 so the 8 was my backup size and I'm glad I got it because I ended up wearing the 8. The fit was tight in the hips which is why I had to size up.
It ran small in the bust but I'm 34 DD, also tight in the hips. I could still dance but it did ride up.

The dress fit as if it was tailored for me. Not too tight, but followed my curves...I'm petite but still have hips so this isn't always the case. It was perfect for my holiday party at work. And bonus, there's definitely no need for a bra!
Tight across shoulders and chest. Bodice detail really nice! Appropriate length for most events. I really liked it.
Easy to wear, the zipper stuck a little but other than that, looked like it was supposed to and ran true to size. Comfortable, got compliments.

links_reviews_title: Okay dress, might be too long for short people
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding. It was a little tight in the midsection but the size two was too big. The fabric wrinkles a little when you sit down so I had to smooth it out whenever I stood up. A little more conservative than I thought it would be but probably because I am only 5'1". Price was a little high for the quality of the dress, I have ordered cheaper better dresses from RTR.
Really beautiful dress with a unique style! It fit great & received a lot of compliments all night!

The open back is gorgeous, and the dress provides enough coverage to bun and flirty without being too revealing. The back is too low to wear a bra with, but there is enough structure in the dress that I didnt feel like I needed one.

First time RTR customer and will rent again! Received many compliments and the color red was perfect for a November cocktail party. The first dress came with lose stitching and a broken hook but RTR acted fast and corrected the issue within 24 hours.

This dress is incredible! Wore if for my wedding rehearsal dinner (wanted something different than white) and it was perfect! Fit true to size, very comfortable and breathable. The dress is light weight, very flattering on any figure and is a great vibrant color! I'm 5'3, 110lbs and ordered a size 2. Received compliments all night and it photographs very well! Highly recommended!!
Wore this to my cousins rehearsal dinner. The color was great and I received a lot of compliments on it. I loved the cut out on the back. Rather comfortable dress

I wore this for a fundraiser with a Vegas night theme. I really liked this dress and got a lot of compliments. My only complaint is I had to adjust it a lot. The seams kept going crooked. It might have been my shape wear though. And the lace around the neck and hemline was started fray a bit from wear.
The dress pretty true to size. You do need to wear a strapless bra due to the lace and open back. I was very happy with this rental.

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments but I didn't love it
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a cocktail party thrown when my Rodan + Fields team hit Lexus so it was a very special and important night. I just had a baby 3 months ago so I'm self conscious about my tummy and my boobs are huge from breastfeeding. The dress was lovely, but I had really high expectations so it wasn't quite up to par. It showed my "baby bump" and despite the Spanx, I still felt like I looked unattractive. The color is more muted than I hoped - more of a blue red than an orange red. It was tough to find a bra for this dress because of the cut out in the back so I ended up going bra-less. The dress was structured and tight so it worked and looked fine, but you may not be comfortable with going without a bra. The length of the dress was great, and it definitely stood out in photos!

I loved this dress. I received many compliments and felt great in it all night. My only complaint is that it gathered oddly below my waist which you can kind of see in the attached picture. Overall gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress! A head turner, for sure!
links_reviews_text: A classy yet still sexy, perfect true red dress. I received lots of compliments all night long!The back is nicely cutout, a strapless bra is wearable if you don't mind pulling it down half an inch. The hem just hit my knee, which I like...a dress riding up too high when I sit is a big pet peeve! I ordered a size up and it was roomy enough to sit, eat and dance.

I loved the dress, although i didn't realize how form fitting it was when i decided to rent it. It turned out to be perfect, though, because of the length. I felt very sophisticated and classy, yet sassy in this dress. I received so many compliments and would rent it again!

This dress is beautiful. It's a close fit, but I felt comfortable in it. I had to get a new strapless bra because my usual one showed below the lace. My typical size floats between 12-14 and in this case the 14 was right. I loved it!
Loved the dress. Fit awesome, and lace was still in good shape.

links_reviews_title: Nice for a date night out on the town!
links_reviews_text: Fits pretty true to size. Got so many compliments on it!! The only negative would be that the back scoops a little low so had to keep adjusting the strapless bra so it wouldn't peep out.

I had a couple of issues with this dress (which Customer Service took care of for me). Other than that, this was a beautiful dress which is classy, yet also a a little sexy (but not too crazy for a wedding). I wish that I had worn a sticky bra with it, but it was fine without a bra. Also, I would suggest Spanx (I'm so glad I wore them!). My favorite detail is the open back! I was initially concerned about the slit in the back, but it was modest (at least for my height). Keep in mind that since this is a rental, it is possible that the top of the dress may be stretched out from previous wearers (the issue I had with the dress), so it would have been impossible for me to wear a necklace with this. Instead I wore some really awesome earrings and it popped! It was very comfortable and I had no issues dancing in it.

links_reviews_title: I got many compliments on this dress. It was perfect for an outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am reviewing this a little late, but from what I remember, this dress didn't have as much stretch as some others, It was more structured with the ribbing. Regardless, both sizes that were sent fit me, but I wore the larger of the 2. I got many compliments and it was a great little dress to wear to a wedding. I will definitely rent this one again for a wedding in a different color, as Rent the Runway has this in multiple colors. I do love the red though.
I typically wear a 6 and ordered both a 6 and an 8 for this dress. The 6 didn't fit comfortably so I went with 8. I got so many compliments on this dress and felt great wearing it!
This was so fun to wear. An ideal RTR experience since I'd never buy a dress like this. It accentuated my curvy figure in a classy way :)

I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner and was initially concerned about it being too much (I never wear red), but it was perfect! I prefer my clothes to fit a little loose over being a little snug, so I wore the 8 when I typically wear a size 6. I love the color, the lace, and the length of this dress. To me, it says "classy but with a bit of sass," which is exactly what I was going for with this event!

I wore this dress for a family wedding rehearsal dinner. My husband's brother was getting married, so it was important not to show off too much skin in front of my in laws at the rehearsal dinner. The dress hit me right above the knee. I love how it was modest, not showing any cleavage, but with a sexy back cut out. This dress does not have any give, and it was lined with a satin lining. To flatten things out in the tummy area, I did wear a spankx undergarment, like really tight shorts. I wore a nude color strapless bra. And lastly, I wore nude close toe pumps. This dress was just such a classy look and perfect for the dinner, which was in an upscale restaurant. I felt like Charlotte from Sex in the City. The event also took place in early December, so the red dress was fitting for that time of year.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! I got compliments all evening about it.
links_reviews_text: Length was on the longer side, but I felt like it was a good balance since its a lacy dress and bright red. Definitely elegant and sexy at the same time. I was nervous the dress would be too tight so I ordered the next size up (size 4) but it was too big. The 2 fit perfectly. The back neck part laid flat which was a concern for me since I am petite sometimes features like that tend to sag on me. I am so pleased I rented this dress.

This dress was amazing! It was very comfortable, beautiful and I got a ton of compliments all evening. I ordered the 12 and 14. The 12 was a bit too snug and the 14 was a bit larger than I would normally wear, however it ended up being perfect because it was comfortable to move in and for dancing! Highly recommend!

It looks very classy and very sheek. Stretchy and comfortable material. The only down side is that I don't have a large breast so the top half was a little big after being worn by other people. Other than that it was amazing. Definitely the girl in the red dress that night. I highly recommend this dress to anyone looking for a classy but yet sassy look!
Many compliments!!

It's a shortie, no doubt about it, and I am 5'9" but I it's SO super adorable. I gotta wear it another time or two before returning it. It's comfortable, and figure flattering, and quite busty. I was a little shy about my chest but still dig the dress.

The dress was appropriate for a formal family day party, falling just above the knee and not revealing to much cleavage. The six showed too much, so I wore the eight, thereby making it more appropriate. It was comfortable and I am happy with the rental. (5"5', 115, 34C)
Girls with larger busts- beware! Dress was very low cut and showed tons of cleavage. Could not wear this to work

Gorgeous and classic dress. Fabric is thicker than I expected, but as a result it really works to emphasize your curves and create smooth lines. Box pleats on the bottom kicked out a bit more over my hips than on the model but it still looked really cute. For me, this showed just enough cleavage but it is pretty low cut. Just keep that in mind!

Wore this for a Bat Mitzvah...but had prom pics before with my daughter. Great dress- I love a minimalist look n this fit the bill. No bra needed -yay! Runs a bit small as I am often a 4 but 6 fit great. I have long legs but short waist with a bit of a belly for reference. Great for dancing - get a fun twirl from skirt.

This dress is really flattering. The pleats are a great look. The V is deep to wear to work so I added this white top underneath and I thought it paired well. Would definitely buy if it were a bit more discounted.

links_reviews_title: Super cute pleats, hugs curves nicely.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 2 and this was the zero on me. Didn't end up wearing this out but it is very cute, not too short or too low cut but is still sexy.

This is great for both warm and cool weather. I wore w a jacket because of weather. The quality is great. The fabric is sturdy and it fit well. It was a bit too low cut for work, so something to think about if you have any bit of cleavage.

Wore this to a show, and a cast member afterwards mentioned how great it looked-he noticed it before the show and remembered it 3 hours later. Very fun dress with the low v-neck and pleats, and comfortable, plus could wear a regular bra under!

This dress is soooo stinking cute! For me it was a little too much cleavage for work but I would wear it again. I have debated about buying several dresses but this one is at the top of my list for when I cave. Makes your curves look perfect and hits in the right areas. I can't believe I didn't take a picture.
Rented this for more of a work dress - everything fit great except for the length - I'm 5'9" and it was a little too short to be comfortable in
Great cut and color! Shape is perfect for a curvy girl. A little low cut. Added a silver camisole underneath and it popped.
Fit true to size. Super cute pleated skirt detail. Does show quite a bit of cleavage if you're wearing it for work.

I love this dress and this brand. It is so well tailored and the fabric is always beautiful. I'm a 0/2, usually a 0 but I do order a size up with this designer. The only challenge is that I am 5'7" and this dress is SHORT. Too short for work but I threw a cream suit jacket over it and wore nude stockings (which I can't stand in the winter let alone the summer but they were necessary for a corporate environment).
Runs very small....should have ordered an 8, possibly a 10. I normally wear a standard 6, sometimes a 4.

Fit nicely until I zipped it up. Wildly low cut. It was too big in the top and around the arm. I could have fudged the bra showing around my arms but no way with how low cut it was. Just didn’t have the boobs to make it work. Everything else was perfect. In other circumstances, I can get away with a sticky bra but this one was just so low cut, anything I put on would have shown. 5’1” 32A Pear 105
This dress is very well made wore this to work got many compliments. Professional looking with jacket or light sweater.

links_reviews_title: really well made dress, but v low
links_reviews_text: be aware, this is a very very deep v. i didn't wear a bra and depending on how i adjusted my boobs, this looked v scandalous. i was able to wear a blazer for work, but i swear this got lower as the day went on so i couldn't take off the blazer at any point. i'm typically btwn a 2/4 and the 2 fit well, maybe a touch snug so i wld say this is true to size. hit around the knee, love the pleats. really well made dress

This is a great dress. Such a fun style and fabric is thick. I did size up because I'm busty and it fit like a glove. The neckline is a little low, so I wore a cami under it, since I wore it to work. No cami needed if wearing for a night out.
Dress is very fitted at in the chest and very short

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors, Lightweight Material, Incredibly Short
links_reviews_text: Worn for a family member's wedding, I wanted a lightweight dress for an outdoor event at the end of the summer. The colors on this dress are beautiful, the material is a great lightweight for the summer but the hem was so incredibly short that I felt like my lady parts were going to peek out if I crossed my legs too quickly - or uncrossed them! I wore the XL in order to make the length work because the replacement turnaround time was too risky for my event's timing. I found the belt to be very difficult to maneuver correctly. I also pinned the top of the dress to keep it a little more modest as it was a family wedding. What was great was that I could wear a regular bra.
Wore the XL and it was loose in top but fit everywhere else. Had to wear a cami since I wore it to work. 170 lbs 5'6.5", 38D

links_reviews_title: Well made but not flattering on a small waist
links_reviews_text: Color, ruffle and fit are not flattering- visually adds inches to a small waist. Nice material, the color/design are also not great. Did not wear. Would be good if you wanted to hide some extra weight.
I loved this dress, it made me feel beautiful. It was a bit loose in the bust area but I was able to fix that with a small pin. I highly recommend for any special occasion.

The dress was very flattering as it's a wrap dress makes your waist look slim! The fit for me was perfect - I did have to pin it around my chest and still had a bit of cleavage going on but it worked !
Loved the material, fit, design, and colors!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor California wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a casual outdoor wedding on the Central California coast. I used fashion tape to make sure the bust area didn't flop open, but that might not be necessary for someone with a slightly larger bust who could fill it out better. I also recommend using a safety pin or fashion tape to secure the dress where it overlaps around the mid-thigh-- it was windy at the wedding and the two halves of the dress don't overlap quite as much as I wanted. Otherwise the dress was perfect and the high-low hem was so much fun to dance in!

I wore this to a Havana themed fundraiser. Perfect for salsa dancing the night away. I rented the L with the XL back up. The L fit, a little to much cleavage for a fundraiser and a tiny bit tight across the hips. The XL was large under the arms but with the wrap style I was able to wrap it around enough to cover the girls and had more room in the hips for dancing without the skirt flying open. Would be super cute for vacation, a summer wedding, a cruise...you name it!
Love this dress and received tons of compliments on it. Don't wear it on a windy day! It tends to open up in the front because it's a true wrap dress.
This fit pretty well, but it was a little lower cut than I was expecting from the photos. I think it's because I'm short in the shoulder so it hung a little lower on my bust than average.

I rented this dress for a cocktail party in the desert. It's light and airy and very comfortable. I tied it a little loose so the neckline was super plunging. I have a fairly flat chest so I wore with a long necklace.

links_reviews_title: This dress did not do it for me
links_reviews_text: It fit but was not flattering. The slit from the wrap goes really high. Had to keep making sure I didn't expose myself. All in all I would absolutely never rent this again
Wear a tank top if you have small boobs!

links_reviews_title: Very low cut not good for ladies with girls
links_reviews_text: This dress looked awful on me. Very low cut, would have flashed boob if I wore this in public.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a Hawaiian beach wedding and received several compliments.
links_reviews_text: Like others said, it needed to be worn with a camisole under. The wind required me to keep making sure I stayed it kept blowing open, in hindsight it would have been helpful to pin the skirt closed; this was not an issue at all when I was not in the wind. I wore flats and the back just barely didn't touch the floor, I'm 5'2
Got this to wear over the weekend but pulled it off for a low key Friday at work with a black tank under it. Very cute and not the kind of wrap dress that opens too much in the front. Fits TTS.
A bit large on top. Used bandeau to correct. Material a bit scratchy
You're going to have to wear a bralette or embrace the girl being out there for all to see.
The bottom of the dress was fabulous; however, the top was way to big and I had to wear a cami with it. This took away from the look of the dress and also the top still gaped so wasn't the best

The dress is a true wrap style which allows you some flexibility in the fit but can make it a little low cut in the front. (I didn't think it was inappropriate, just maybe not the best choice for a business event). I'm rather petite (5'4'') so the dress goes almost to my ankles in the back. I thought it looked good though -- added a bit of dramatic flair. I received so many complements!

This dress hugs all the curves in all the right places. I had to safety pin it a little at the neck in the back to make sure that the bust did not hang open but otherwise it fit perfectly (don't you just love a good wrap dress!?). The ruffles at the bottom are extremely flattering. This dress is a stunner!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it, was too tight around the chest.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear the dress, but I wish I could have. Great fabric and beautiful fabric.
This dress fit perfectly! Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Really loved it but too lose on top
links_reviews_text: I honestly loved this dress and just wished there was a way to make the top tighter! It was way way too lose on the bust no matter how I wrapped it :/

links_reviews_title: It was easy to find a dress in style.
links_reviews_text: This was so easy! The dress was perfect; I received it a little early which was helpful with finding accessories.
This was the perfect summer dress for a hot southern night. The material is so light and airy.
Had to safety pin the top. Otherwise, pretty dress that fit well

links_reviews_title: Way too low cut and way too short. I couldn't wear the dress. Bummer, because it's so cute.
links_reviews_text: Way too short/high cut.
Probably have to wear something underneath it. I just wore bathing suits for the beach and it worked perfectly.
This dress is easy to wear and comfortable. It's a little large in the chest area.

links_reviews_title: Not made for a petite body/short torso
links_reviews_text: Rented the dress for a graduation. Didn't end up wearing it. It fit fine in the waist and the skirt was at a good length. The top part was definitely designed for someone with a much longer torso mine. I was able to pinch the top of the dress at each shoulder and lift the top part approx 3-4 inches above my shoulders.

The dress fits beautifully. The wrap style is flattering. Know that when you walk it may fly open a bit, which is typical in any wrap. It is fitted enough through the hips that it doesn't "expose" you.
Bottom fit but I'd have to pin it a lot just to get it to stay closed. Was ok, but I didn't want to be playing with it all night. Returned without wearing because a backup fit much better.

This dress ran small, an I'm glad I had a larger back-up size. I was certain that this dress would not stay on the shoulder, and I was wrong. This dress was great because it stayed in place and was still easy to raise and lower my arms in. It was a beautiful color and I got compliments all night. I recommend sizing up for your back-up, and I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, sassy and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this after recently losing 80lbs, for my husbands company party. It was true to size, great stretchy material and hugged all the right places! I received so many compliments and felt confident + secure wearing! The sleeves seemed a bit snug but by no means hindered the night. Will absolutely rent again!
I wore this dress to the White House Hanukkah Party. It was just lovely! It stayed in place and I had no problems wearing a strapless bra with it.

The color and sleeves totally make this dress. I received many compliments, and I felt wonderful. I wish I could keep it! I'll be renting it again for sure. Only drawback: my husband had to zip it for me. There was no way I could reach around to do it for myself.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress if you don't like to dance..
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress all night long. It's was relatively comfortable and super cute but I could barely move my arms. You don't have to worry about the shoulders/arms riding up but they are pretty snug and don't allow much movement.

links_reviews_title: It was really pretty- got a lot of compliments! Very form fitting
links_reviews_text: I'm 4'11" and a 36D and built very broad. It was right around the armpits so I had a little rubbing the whole night. Also, very form fitting so if you're looking for a dress that's going to hold you in, this is not it.

Perfect fall wedding dress. Fits true to size but need another person to zip it up. Not too much but makes a statement with or without accessories. For some reason though, this dress made me SWEAT really bad though but maybe it was just me :)
The dress fit great! I wore a size 4 bigger than I normally would wear but I'm 23 weeks pregnant. Loved the dress. Tons of compliments!

My typical size of 8 was unavailable, so I went with the 6. It was a little snug but with support shorts I felt great! I'm 5'1" and the dress hit just above the knee which I loved! It was a little tight on the shoulders but I think that is simply due to wearing a smaller size. I danced for hours in the dress and kept getting compliments on how great my bum looked! Very flattering to the figure! Would definitely rent again - just in my typical size 8 due to my comfort level with the tightness.

links_reviews_title: Little nervous about shipping to hotel, but it made it there as promised.
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting, but comfortable stretchy material made it easy to move in. Color is vibrant. Little challenging to zip. My first rental and would definitely rent again.

This dress fit so well! It was supportive and SO comfortable. I was able to dance and enjoy myself without tugging at a dress all evening, or being uncomfortable at 26 weeks pregnant! People could not be more complimentary! The color was BEAUTIFUL as well! Highly recommend!

I loved the color and style of this dress! It fit like a glove, and I didn't even have to wear a bra with it! Pairs well with other colors too. I wore it with a pink clutch and pink wedges. So many compliments!
Very comfortable

I wore this for a friend's wedding in Napa. I'm usually a 0/2. I was 38 weeks pregnant. Got it from a flagship store. They only had a 6 which worked, but I wish they'd had an 8. Biggest pro was that the wedding was windy and the fit kept me from exposing too much. I chose the fabric because I knew it wouldn't show sweat in the 92 degree heat, but it did make it extra hot. It was also easy to go to the bathroom in. Felt good and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Was unable to attend the event
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color, dress tight in hip area

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and the fit.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress and the only thing I had trouble with was being able to zip it without help.
I'm 5' 4" and 169 lbs. I felt the dress was a little tight and ended up not wearing it, but with Spanx, it would have been fine. I just ordered a different one that I loved!
This dress fit well, however it made me look like Sarah Palin at a dinner party. Not for me!

Wore this to a work holiday party and felt great in it. Loved the color, the sleeves, the length and it was warm enough to wear inside in the winter. I am 23 weeks pregnant and it has just enough give to fit my belly perfectly and still be well fitted everywhere else. I wore my pre-pregnancy size and think it would fit me when not pregnant too.
This color was a standout at a formal work party! Fit true to size and had a great thick fabric. Length was right at the knee for me. Loved this dress. This one was a hit!

links_reviews_title: The color of the dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Fit a little loose but I likely needed a smaller size. Fits off the shoulder as shown. Needed help zipping it up. Great look and easy to match shoes and accessories.

Love this dress. Just the right amount of stretch to stay comfortable standing, sitting or dancing. No wrinkles either. The only downfall is the need for someone to zip you in and out. Because of the sleeves, you can't zip yourself all the way.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an unforgettable wedding event.
links_reviews_text: Bright blue, beautiful color. Nice "shelf" elastic with bathing-suit-like hook, so (for me) no bra necessary. I should've taped down the hanger ribbons, b/c the ones in the back popped out after dancing.

I think the dress was stretched out from previous wear. I did notice a number of pregnant women reviewing this dress. It is a very nice, flattering style, but I couldn't wear it because it was stretched out in the mid section. I normally wear a size 4 and tried on the size 4. I would say it is true to size other than for the stretching in the middle.
Really flattering off the shoulder dress in a stand-out color. Great for work and paired with a silk scarf-- client ready! Also good for transitioning to dinner / evening.
Overall great dress and comfortable. A little snug on top since I have broad shoulders for my size and then almost too loose in the bottom. Nice length.
I loved the sleeves! I received a lot of complements at the event. It wasn't much give in the fit but it fit true to size.

Loved the color and the off the shoulder style. Longggg and I'm pretty tall so I held the dress while walking through the city at times. The zipper gave me an issue the day I wore it and I was freaking out but my husband was able to get it.

links_reviews_title: Went to a work summer party. Super foley, comfy to wear.
links_reviews_text: A bit see through, get some nude undergarments
Beautiful color and cut but I sized up and it was still a tight fit. Loved the look but couldn't wear it past a quick dinner.
Very comfortable and flattering. Will need to be steamed. Wrinkles.

Rented this dress for a summer wedding. The color was gorgeous and perfect for summer. The dress was very lightweight. The material felt very thin, I can't see how this dress retails for $200 but it was a pretty dress nonetheless. This dress has ZERO give! So if you are a curvier girl I would steer clear of this dress. Also, the zipper is nearly impossible to get up on your own make sure you have someone around to help!

The material is extremely light and worked well for a SoCal summer pool party. The skit is high and can be problematic in windy conditions. I loved the beautiful color and sleeves. The zipper was difficult to zip at fitted waist area.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for our girls' night out!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a ton of fun to wear, moves beautifully, and I received many compliments (even from strangers). Couple things worth noting: It requires ironing and there is NO stretch around your rib cage. So, the dress felt fine at the start of the night, but after two sushi rolls it was very uncomfortable. Also, you MUST wear a slip because this material is see through. I really enjoyed wearing this dress but would never pay retail price to own it. With my limited sewing skills, I'm pretty sure I can remake one myself if I really wanted. Overall, very glad I picked this dress.
A little tight but good fit overall.

links_reviews_title: The color was perfect for my skin tone. I received so many complements! Rent this dress!
links_reviews_text: I had to purchase nude shape wear and a nude strapless bra as my black one was visible in the sunlight. This dress was the perfect except the zipper was sticking at the waist and my husband had to zip me up.

This dress was beautiful, elegant and bold. By far one of my favorite rents! The center band was very tight on me in the XS and I wish I went with the small for that reason. The rest fit great. I'm 5'7 and in order for this dress to touch the ground I got the long with flat sandals. Highly recommend!
Very little give in this dress and very thin - but perfect for a summer evening!

I wore this dress to a Tropical Wedding. The material is very light weight and the dress was comfortable, easy to dance in and perfect for the occasion. The band around he waist was a little tight but I tried the small/long and it was over all too small so I went with the xs/long.

I love this trendy by Flynn Skye! Running small with some stretch, I recommend wearing a size up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a strapless bra since the dress is strapless/off the shoulder. At 5'0", the length hit floor length on me. The dress is perfect for the pool side or the beach but be aware that the piece in the midsection is very tight, with no stretch. Pair with sandals and a cute accessory to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Just beautiful, but very very small.
links_reviews_text: I had to engineer it to look backless since the zipper wouldn't go all the way up. Got lots of compliments though. Would order 2x size up next time

links_reviews_title: It runs very small in the back
links_reviews_text: Sad I couldn’t zip it up. Runs very small definitely order a size up
I freaking loved this dress. The color really stands out and is perfect for summer. I truly felt like a goddess. It's tight but I liked that because I was not paranoid about anything falling down

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear this piece because it was impossible to zip!
links_reviews_text: The fabric around the band has NO stretch and isn't the same fabric as the rest of the dress, making it impossible to zip.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because waist was too tight
links_reviews_text: The waist is very tight and difficult to zip.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear the dresses to the event because of fitting
links_reviews_text: the waist was incredibly tight and I am pretty thin already, while the dress was way too long even with 3 inch heels and i am 5'2. the material felt very cheap and looked cheap, it looked like a very casual beach dress.
This was really beautiful but ran extremely small so I couldn’t wear it.
Seemed like your everyday cotton maxi dress, except for incredibly small and runs short as well.

I adored this dress. It fits tight on the ribcage, but forgiving everywhere else. It is quite sheer, but worth the rental if you have a half slip under it. I had to order one, but was glad I got to wear this. Tons of compliments!

Love this dress! Fit very well and was very flattering. I will say though that the fabric is very sheer and it was tricky finding underwear that would not show through the fabric. The fabric also wrinkles quite easily.

Sadly, I wasn't going to a pool party - but the material and cut of this dress is more appropriate for a pool party or beachside trip. Seems more like a thin gauze material than an occasion dress. Runs at least 2 sizes too small. I'm usually a 8 - Large barely zipped and everything was tight otherwise. Even with long length, this came about to my ankle (I'm 5'9").
Didn't wear it on vacation

links_reviews_title: Ridiculously tight in the upper waistline
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear due to it being so tight I could not zip up. I'm a typical size 4/6 5'7" 137lbs. Would have had to remove a couple of ribs to get the size M to zip up. Also, my weight is carried in my hips/thighs- not my stomach.

I should have listened to past reviews and held off on renting this. It didn't even come close to zipping up in a size medium. It wasn't amazing enough otherwise to try a large as the fit is just too problematic. It probably runs at least 2 sizes too small.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but runs VERY small!
links_reviews_text: The color and style were beautiful but this dress runs VERY small! I ordered a small and medium since I'm typically a 6 in dresses and could barely zip the medium. Luckily I had received the dress early from Rent the Runway and they were amazing and sent a large to me right in time for the event. Unfortunately though, even the large didn't fit well and was tight around my waist and hips so I ended up wearing something else for the event.
I am a size two in almost everything I buy but I couldn't zip this dress up in an XS.

links_reviews_title: Thin fabric, runs small in torso.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear. Runs really small in the waste and torso area. Flat stomach required
Wasn't flattering on my figure. I tend to have broad back and waist and thin hips & legs. Waist was snug. Probably large would have been better but may have been too long then...oh well.

links_reviews_title: So bummed - it didn't fit so I left it at showroom
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. I'm usually an 8 or 10 and medium in most brands - but I go by the RTR reviews to choose size. This dress didn't have any reviews . Tried it on at Neiman Marcus but it wouldn't zip - they didn't have a large in a stock.

links_reviews_title: Great dress as a wedding guest!!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a small, but this dress is semi-body con and I wasn't comfortable with how tight it was on me. the small fit, but I ended up going with the medium. I will say as a warning--you cannot wear spanx under this dress! The slip rode up due to the spanx and I had to take the spanx off mid-cocktail hour!
Two piece dress, medium was a little small, large fit great and was super comfortable. Wore to a charity gala and received many compliments. I loved this dress!
Fit well, super comfortable and very flattering! I wore this for my son's first communion and received many compliments- would definitively rent again!!!

This dress runs small, but RTR has the BEST customer service and they overnighted me the larger size. The dress comes in 2 pieces, so I wore the medium slip/bottom layer and the large lace top layer. The quality of the fabric is ok for the price point, but not as good as other dresses I've rented. The fit and design are fine, but nothing too memorable. I was not able to get the lace around the neck to stand up like it does in the model photo.

Love this dress. It fits well and the lace is soft. It comes with a liner/tank dress to wear under it. I thought the liner was a little big but still fits well with the top layer. I'd definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I always wear a black dress to this event and this year I wanted to mix it up.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great! Very breathable material. Comfortable. This was actually my second choice dress! The blue was classic and pretty. So glad I chose this one.

I would keep this dress if I could!! It fits great, is not too revealing, and it's just so cute. I loved the high neckline and ruffle. I usually wear a 6/8 and the medium dress fit perfectly. I also felt it was forgiving in the midsection, which I appreciated.
The fit is true to size I am 6'1 and it was a little short for my liking but was a great dress for vegas

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but neck wouldn't stay up
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6, but ordered the L and it fit perfectly. The neck wouldn't stay up as pictured which was frustrating but didn't ruin the look.
I love the color and fit; i was very comfortable and had such a wonderful time that night!

This dress was a replacement for a dress that was sent because the dress I really wanted to wear was unavailable to ship. When I put it on, it was comfortable to wear but as soon as I lifted my arms or tried to walk, my bottom half was just out. I did not wear this dress to the event.
I wore the small slip underneath with a medium top over
Rented this for a wedding but it was a little too short and rode up if I moved around too much so I didn't end up wearing it. But it was very cute.
Great fit!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a derby party. Very fitting but love it
links_reviews_text: very fitting

links_reviews_title: Forgot a photo but this dress was Great!
links_reviews_text: Had this dress overnighted to me as my original order was severely underwhelming and omg I loved it! The collar and sleeve were fun instead of being too much as I feared and the length worked great for me (5'6") hitting just above my knee. The color was lovely and they even sent a brand new slip (had to take the tags off lol) to wear underneath the lace dress. Only wish I'd remembered to have someone grab a pic of me in the dress!
Ran a little short for me for this event but the color is gorgeous and the fit is perfect I’m 5’ 2” and 125 lbs so may be a little short for a very tall person for

I wore this to a gala for my work. I ordered a small and x-small and ended up wearing the XS. I'm 5'5" and 129 lbs 32DDD. I was surprised that it's actually a 2-piece dress-a navy slip and a lace overlay but it looks like one piece once it's on. Overall, I liked the fit and it didn't ride up like a lot of bodycon or sheath dresses do. I felt great and loved wearing it!
Very comfortable for dancing, perfect for a cocktail attire wedding.
looked cute but not what i wore

links_reviews_title: Received a lot of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Needed a L since I’m DDD. Fit perfect!
Definitely ran true to size, sized up because of some concerns. Which made it super baggy. Loved the color and lace but the ruffles around the neck and arms were too much.
A little short for work. 5'8
The length is just right for work and the sleeves are so cute! I loved wearing this dress!
The ruffles and the print were gorgeous on the shirt. My only complaint is that it was short, and kept riding up so I had to keep pulling it down. Maybe a larger size would have helped.

This top definitely runs on the smaller side, and is good for smaller chest ladies. It's super cute and feminine and can definitely be worn in many different ways. I wore it today to work tucked into black jeans and plan to wear it next week to a wedding welcome reception with a skirt I found on RTR and some cute pumps. Great fit, great quality and got tons of compliments!
Take an outfit to another level with this piece, i have done it polished and distressed and both look amazing.
I wore this to dinner on a night out in Europe on holiday. Paired it with black skinny pants and black booties. It's floral and feminine and super flattering. Received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Felt very feminine in ths blouse.
links_reviews_text: Hard to button by yourself:)

This is a really pretty shirt that went perfectly with my black skirt and tights. The back is sheer and the front keyhole is large, so I wore a black cami under it for more coverage. I could have probably sized down, but the fit was easy and comfortable and looked nice.

links_reviews_title: Great top for work or night out!
links_reviews_text: Loved the print! Im short waisted and only 5'2" but if taller or if you have a long torso this might run a bit short on you. Light fabric but not see through so you dont have to wear a cami under it.

This top was. better than expected. It IS really tight. I struggled to get into it, but once I did, it fit really well. I feel like if I was to get a size 4, it wouldn't fit as well. If my bust was bigger, it definitely wouldn't fit at all. Lot's of compliments!

I wore this to work and on thanksgiving! The colors are light enough to wear as a fall floral. I got tons of compliments at work. The back I see through and cut out is low so I wore a camisole underneath.

Size around chest go narrow( even everywhere is fine), i could not go with push up bra, even with unpadded it was to stretch at chest & opening was folding not nice, probably size bigger would have better flowing fit, & i have just a B size, so girls with any C & up -size up! other wise nice top

links_reviews_title: Awesome ruffly top without being über girly.
links_reviews_text: Loved the sleeves, the color, the cleavage slit, the whole thing. The back is see through, FYI. Great blouse!
I liked the blouse but it wasn't my taste: to busy and shapeless for me. But received many compliments.
The amount of compliments I got while wearing this top was unreal. The detail is so gorgeous. Considering buying if it goes on sale.

Love this flowy printed top by Nicholas! I love the ruffle detailing since this is a very trendy look recently. I love how this can be worn dressed up or down depending on how it's styled. I would likely wear this with some black culottes and flats to my office or even with some jeans for a weekend lunch with the girls! It does fit true to size but I would maybe size up if you are fuller in the bust. Make sure to rent this top, you won't regret it!
Perfect delicate details in beautiful fall colors. Great wardrobe transition piece.

The color and pattern really stand out and the ruffles and high neck add some drama to the look. Difficult to find a bra that is cut low enough not to show in the open neckline, but a lacy bralette works pretty well.
Looked great. Loved this! Will get again. Many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this item because it fit smaller than I had intended.
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this item because it fit smaller than I had intended.
Great fit a little low for work but a cami works!
Fit true to size, size 8 was a bit too big and the key hole hit lower than I would like. The print and shape is great.
Pretty pattern, but too many ruffles I was lost in it.
Fits true to size, needs camisole
Top is beautiful fabric and very well made but the style didn't work on me. It is definitely on the shorter side as others have mentioned.
Size 8 may work but key hole in front is very low. Also busy pattern

i wanted to love her; but she was too tight all over, and very very frilly. i ordered a 4, which js my normal size; but she kept folding over my bust and sticking there. i also thought the keyhole on the back was sorta low for every day officewear. also, the bottom of the sleeves buttoned and were very consricting on my wrists. i sent her right back - def size up if you order. fit just too odd!

I wore this to a casual rehearsal dinner and it worked out really well. Because the front has a rather large opening at the bust, and the back of the blouse is completely see through, I wore a black tank under it and it worked nicely. For a different type of event, I could see wearing it open at the front or pinning it a bit and leaving the back bare for dramatic effect. Well lots of wear options but all of the, great.

links_reviews_title: Wore once and wasn't a fan
links_reviews_text: The top shows far too much cleavage and I had to wear a tank under it.
very nice materials - great pattern. Loved it for everyday work wear as well as going out!
the top was SO pretty but showed wayyy too much boob for work. I am a 36c and this just did not work for me. the top was also a bit tight in the wrists and around the arms.
I was mistakenly sent a 2 instead of a 12.
Overall gorgeous top. Fit well. Considered buying it

This top was perfect for date night out on vactaion! Breezy for the hot evening but warm enough for the cooler late evening. Super comfortable and perfect sizing. On of the bottun loops around the neck as ALMOST freyed off, but overall it was cute!
Big pretty colors
I got sooo many compliments on this! The only thing is the front is deceptively low so I had to wear a bandeau with it.

Obviously a beautiful piece, but I wasn't a thrilled with the collar...I was aware of the fabric hitting my neck, which by the end of the day became bothersome. Would rent again for special occasion, not for work, though.
A little short in the body, and the opening cuts lower than the center of a bra. I had to pin it a bit.
This is very cute, but runs small

I consider myself a pretty young 50, but I like my under garments to be under my clothes! I don't want my bra to be seen, nor do I want to wear a camisole under every top I find lately. There is a sizable split in the middle of the blouse from about collar bone to almost under bra line in the front. Other than that, this is a pretty top.
Love this shirt for casual going out. Sophisticated and sexy top that is very versatile.
Ordering again! Love this top - just a little sex appeal but fine for work after hours.

I loved this dress! It was a bit long for me, but it was very comfortable and easy to move around in. The straps were very sexy without being over the top, and the lace cutouts were a great touch. I would definitely wear this again.

Great style for a dress with interesting lace paneling. BCBGMaxAzaria usually fits me well, but this dress was not the right proportions for me. I am 5'11" with a very long torso. The pleating for the hips was too high for me and bunched at my waist. Length wasn't as long as many of their gowns usually are either. Just a miss for me.

This dress is beautiful! I got so many compliments. Even though the neckline is very low, and the ladies are out there, the v-strap running up the middle keeps the look classy. This is a departure for me as far as amount of skin shown, but I felt comfortable all evening. The fit is true to size, but it is tight. I would have liked to try a size up to see what that felt like, but it wasn't available. My only area of fit issue was the rib cage area, so if you have wider ribs, that is something to keep in mind. Even with that, it was comfortable and not a deal breaker.

This dress was amazing! I didn't want to take it off! It fit perfectly and I received so many compliments! I'm 5'0" so I ordered the petite and with a small heel, it was the perfect length! The dress did fit me tighter in the hip area than I would've liked, but when I tried on the next size up (6) it still fit the same in the hips, but was too big up top, so I stuck with the 4! I didn't have to wear a bra with this dress either (I'm a 34D).

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress for a wedding, but a bit revealing in the chest area
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress as a back up. It for true to size. I a true ally liked the way it fit, but it was just a bit too revealing in the chest area. You would also have to be creative with undergarments because they definitely showed the lines through the shirt portion of the dress.

This dress is perfect! A little challenging zipping up the back, since I have a curvy booty - but luckily, the fabric has a little bit of a "give" - so this was doable. I got compliments all night. I love this dress! I didn't wear a bra and didn't need tape as the material around the bust is thick. Can't say enough good things about this dress!

Form fitting that highlights a woman's best assets. This was my back up. You cannot wear a bras with this dress unless you are smaller than a D cup, I think. The length was perfect with 2 1/2" heels. I really want to wear this for something. I did not notice this tidbit until I showed a friend. The darts on the front of the dress are extremely noticeable if you are busty. Very revealing.

Ton of compliments all night and was absolutely perfect for a black tie wedding! Loved the dress. The lace panels are larger than expected and I had some trouble keeping the ladies in check.
