Definitely recommend for smaller chested woman (I am a 32DD and struggled with the underside) and a healthy dose of fashion tape.
So perfect! I am 5' 10" and the long was just the right length

I loved this dress. The petite fit was the perfect length since I am only 5'1. I received many compliments all night. I wore the stick on bra and even though I taped it down, it still peeked out every once in awhile. I probably could have gone braless but was a bit worried to.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent in place of the dress I ordered because the person before me did not return it on time. I was disappointed at first but once I had the dress on I was pleased. I literally am a size 32AA so I had to use tape so it wouldn't gape but that's not the dresses fault! I'm short but the length was perfect with my shoes. Had no trouble with zipping it. Still wish I had my original dress but this one did not disappoint! I wore it to a Mardi Gras Ball/Fundraiser black tie event.

links_reviews_title: Great New Years Eve Dress-RTR customer service is the best!!
links_reviews_text: I had originally ordered this in a 6R, it was too tight in the hips and waist. It was a small miracle that the 8R was actually available to order as a replacement on 12/30. Customer service was so helpful and double checked to make sure the dress was actually out of dry cleaning and ready for overnight delivery. I got the back up dress by noon on New Years Eve! I'd suggest fashion tape to keep the top in place. I'm 5'3 and the regular length was perfect with 3 1/2 inch heels. I usually don't go for this type of neckline but it was something different and it worked well.

This dress was incredible! I was a little uncertain about it given the plunging neckline, however a nude bra is undetectable. The straps were a little long, but not a problem. I am 5'3" and I wore 4" heels with the 4P. I wore this to the opening night at the Lyric Opera and received tons of compliments. This was the back-up to my back-up dress since the size I had ordered was not available.

I had originally ordered a different dress but it ended up being damaged an unavailable for my event so this was sent as an alternative. It is definitely not the style I would usually choose for myself but it was fabulous. I felt fierce and glamorous and got so many compliments all night!

I wore this dress to a formal beach wedding, so it was a little hot, but it was beautiful! I have a large chest (34DDD) so the girls were on full display, but I didn't wear a bra and felt comfortable even while dancing. Just the right amount of sexy with classy.

links_reviews_title: Spiced up the basic black gown
links_reviews_text: Not for larger chested women. Dress actually cuts it close on the chest, but without looking slutty. Got tons of compliments all night. Great dress.

Loved this dress, got so many compliments! The neckline is not something I would normally gravitate towards but I decided to take a risk based on the other positive reviews and it definitely paid off. Such a flattering fit- the neckline and sheer panels are edgy but the shape of the dress is very classic, fit and flare throughout the skirt. The sheer panels are also high enough on your torso that you can still wear spanx if you want without them showing through. The neckline dips low though and the cutouts in the neckline are wide enough that if you're really busty this may not be the best option. I will say the length was a little annoying- I'm just about 5'7 and without heels the length of the regular was perfect and with it was maybe 1/2 and inch-1 inch too short- but the length of the long was 3 inches longer so it would have been wayyy too long without heels. I wore the regular with about 3 inch heels and it was fine- not perfect but perfect-enough!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress. It was so comfortable and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress. I was really nervous about the fit, and the top. But it looked great! Plus, I'm not too comfortable with a lot of chest showing, and this was just enough, but also hid some as well! The bottom part of the lace, on hip area has a nude insert, but the ones on top do not. It's classy, but also a bit sexy without too much. I got tons of complements all night! One con for me, it was about 6 inches too long. I just wore super high heels!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit, but still looked okay in pics!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black-tie optional Christmas party. It really is a beautiful dress, but the fit was really weird on me. I am 5'9" and about 135 lbs, usually a 4-6 in dresses, and ordered the 4L and 6L. First of all, I think the dress ran a little short, so I would absolutely not recommend for anyone 5'9" and above. It appeared a little longer in the back than in the front on me, but not in the model photos. Second, the 4L was a little tight on my hips...but so was the 6L! The only difference was that the 6L was much bigger on top, so I ended up wearing the 4L even though it felt tight on the hips. To be honest the 4L was a little big on top too, but I do have a small bust. It looked okay in pictures, but scrutinizing myself in the mirror it definitely fell across my hips weirdly. So moral of the story: do NOT rent if you have hips!!! It would have looked (and felt) really great on someone with slimmer hips, but it just did not fit right on a more hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Fun, formal holiday party with a friend. Dress was perfect, in spite of the snow.
links_reviews_text: Received this dress as replacement/backup. Thank goodness for the overnight delivery and the very helpful customer service rep who suggested it based on my size, color preference, etc. I wore the 4R which was a little shorter than I'd have liked but I felt that with 3" heels, the 4L would have likely been too long. It seems that 5'6" is on the cusp of 4R & 4L depending on the dress. I don't enjoy wearing a lot of jewellery, so the neckline was perfect for me as it added some visual interest without embellishments. The dress was a little snug in the hip area but I feel the 6 would have been too large. I didn't need to wear a bra and the "push-up" effect of the dress made the fit even more flattering.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a knockout. I never received so many compliments in my life!
links_reviews_text: Great fit

I went to the store for the dress. They did not have a 6R in stock so I had to go with the 4R which fit like a glove but it worked well! It was the perfect length but definitely would not have been able to wear very high heels with it - I wore 3" heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful - but use tape if you're busty!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress - edgy and sexy. But, if you are large busted, be sure to use double sided tape. It was more revealing than my norm, but the straps between the cleavage helped "hide" the girls a bit! The lace is gorgeous and the long size was perfect for me at 5'9. Lots of compliments that night!

links_reviews_title: Unique design, great length for me.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a lot of fun to wear! I received several very nice compliments. The 0P was a little tight for me but the length was perfect. It was tight and the fabric thick enough that I didn't need a bra. Finding the perfect bra for this cut may have been a challenge. The only con for me was the zipper. It was really difficult to zip it up and down, on and off my body. Otherwise I LOVED the dress and had a great time showing it off.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit very true to size, it was a little shorter than I anticipated. Everyone at the wedding loved it, not too heavy, very slimming.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the wedding I was attending!
links_reviews_text: I needed a formal gown for a wedding I was attending, this dress was perfect! It fit amazingly and was definitely a show stopping dress! Runs true to size, I toggle between a 6 and an 8. I needed the 8 just because the 6 was too tight around the hip area. I definitely recommend this dress for a black tie event you want to turn heads at!

links_reviews_title: I had a great time networking at the gala I attended, and felt fabulous!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I wore a 4L, and with 3.5 in heels made walking easy, not too long and not too short. I was able to wear a bra under the dress without any issues, and the cutaways were a nice touch. Many compliments and looks, and I felt elegant and polished.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit well, many compliments to give a special presentation to my adopted Regiment!
links_reviews_text: It was surprisingly a little revealing in the chest (although I don't have much of one) but sexy and classy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress in the showroom. I was in and out in 15 minutes. Couldn't be easier!
links_reviews_text: The stress was comfortable and elegant. I wore it to a cousin's wedding and got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: A very sophisticated gown with unique details.
links_reviews_text: This dress was sent to me an a replacement for the dress I picked, which became unavailable at the last minute. When I saw the picture online, I was not impressed and not excited to wear it. But when it arrived, I loved the details that made the dress really special. There are three lacy panels on each side. The top two panels are sheer but the lower panel has nude colored fabric behind it. The unique shape of the top is very sexy but sophisticated. It is very low-cut in the front and because I'm an A-cup the fabric puckered out a bit and exposed more than I'm comfortable with so I was pretty self-conscious throughout the night. I would not recommend this dress for anyone with less than a B-cup unless you have a special bra or double sided tape to use (which I didn't).

This is a super fun and flattering gown, classy yet edgy. It's very comfortable and I love the slits on the front and back. It runs true to size, but I would recommend sizing up for backup especially if you're curvier. An important thing to note is that you need a backless bra with this style if you choose to wear a bra. The fabric has a bit of stretch to it, which helps hold everything in. I tried on the 2R, but would have preferred the 2L (I'm 5'7'). Would recommend pairing this style with statement earrings and/or a cuff. Great choice for a black tie event, prom, wedding, etc!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. I loved the cutouts and the fun neckline.
links_reviews_text: Fit and length were great. Very high quality material. Would definitely recommend!
I loved this gown
this dress fit like a glove! accentuated my curves in a very elegant way.

links_reviews_title: The dress is really pretty and perfect for any event
links_reviews_text: I have a 38C Chest and it was a little tight but still fit well
This was sent as a backup dress and I couldn't have been happier. I will be renting again

links_reviews_title: Sexy black dress, shows a lot on top.
links_reviews_text: The dress was sexy and elegant, with see-through lace panels and a wide planning neckline. The cleavage itself is covered by straps but the "peek-a-boo" areas on either side were rather revealing. The size 4P fit perfectly but I decided not to wear the dress as it was a little too revealing for the wedding we were going to.
Dress is beautiful but I didn't end up wearing because I didn't like the way it fit on my body!

This dress was absolutely beautiful. I was concerned about feeling covered with the neckline as low as it is, but the dress is constructed in a way that it keeps the important bits covered. Ladies with a larger bust might find themselves falling out a bit, though, so I would recommend this for smaller chested women. It was comfortable enough to dance in, but fit snugly enough that I felt secure the entire night. It's perfect for a classy affair if you're looking for something with a little extra vavavoom!
Rented my normal size 4, zipper was incredibly difficult to get up, even off me. Ended up not wearing it.
I was so pleasantly surprised by this dress - it is form fitting but so flattering. It's stretchy and conservative and extremely comfortable! I loved wearing it and got compliments all night.
Loved the color of this dress. The fit is very flattering even with my 5 month pregnant belly. There is just enough stretch to it that it would work for all body types.

This dress was so beautiful! The underpart did ride up occasionally, but not to the point where I was annoyed by it. It was a flexible dress that allowed me to move/dance and sit comfortably. Would definitely rent again! So many compliments!
Loved this dress, it hugged all the right places and the color was great for a fall wedding.
I worn this to a wedding. I received many compliments all night. The dress fit true to size, looked great and most of all was still very comfortable. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Classy, Flattering trumpet style dress that is true to size and a great fall burgundy color
links_reviews_text: Stretchy material that is forgiving. It is not itchy and material is breathable. I usually wear a 4 and a small in this dress was perfect. I am 5'5" 135lbs. Went great with rose gold jewelry and nude heels. Good fall color for wedding guest. Flattering and flirty, but still appropriate for a wedding. Wanted to try a trumpet style dress that flares at the bottom and it was exactly what I thought it would be. Received many compliments.
Easy to wear, classy fit well

I got this dress as a back up option and ended up going with it for a fancy dinner. Very stretchy material and maternity-friendly. I’m a size 8/10 pre-pregnancy and the medium fit while 36 weeks pregnant, so I would suggest the dress runs slightly big. I would have been more comfortable in the large (wasn’t available) but I didn’t have any trouble getting this on and moving around in it. Since the dress hugs every curve and line, be careful about the lines your underwear/bra creates, because this dress will accentuate the heck out them. I wore the wrong bra and probably would have looked better if I ditched it altogether.
Such a great dress. Very comfortable and easy to move in. Since I'm a bit shorter, it was a midi dress on me. Very cute!
Loved this dress for my friend's wedding - so comfy, classy, and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and length! Stretchy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Perfect party dress!
Fit lovely and very comfortable! The material was really stretchy and forgiving. Looked great for my friend's wedding!
This dress is a well-made, extremely comfortable choice. I wore it all day for a special event and received MANY compliments. I would definitely consider this as an option. Fit true to size for me.

I absolutely loved this dress. The cut and shape is super flattering and the tulip bottom gave it a flirty, feminine feel! I was able to wear a normal bra with this and felt super comfortable dancing.

I wore this to a work event, and just loved it! It's super comfortable and flattering. I felt so beautiful in it, and coworkers were still commenting on it the next day at work! The material is thick, but stretchy; so stretchy that, when I had some trouble unzipping it, I gently tugged to see if I could pull it the rest of the way off (without fully unzipping) and it came off without any trouble! When I went to put it on for the event, I zipped it most of the way up, and then just pulled it on!
I rented this as an option for a holiday party. I felt it made my hips look big and ended up going with another option. Good length for a tall gal

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a retirement party with lots of dancing.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, didn't ride or bunch. Was very comfortable all night.

Pros: flattering fit and color, hit at a great spot for my height hugs and accentuates curves neckline is flattering and feminine Cons: runs small slip rides up (have to correct whenever you stand up)
Rented for a work gala. Ran a little small. I usually wear a medium & the large fit great. Loved it!

I ordered this dress last minute for a gala (business/cocktail dress code). The dress is so comfortable and flattering. Only issue I had was that the lining was not attached to the outer part of the dress which did ride up a bit, but nothing terrible. Overall, great dress and I would rent it again!
Loved the fit! Very flattering and has some stretch so it was easy to move and dance.

I loved the color of this dress. The stomach area was not very forgiving, spanks may be advised. I loved the idea of the neckline, but i just didn't love it on. I ended up going with a different dress that I felt more comfortable in. This dress is very form fitting. The dress did fit well though.

This dress is GORGEOUS, I want to own it. I got so many compliments and even someone said I looked like I lost weight (I actually had gained ha) but the dress hugs at the perfect places to give curves. The added ruffle at the bottom is a nice touch and is sophisticated, not childish. The small fit me snugly but because I went to a fundraiser that was featuring cuisine from around the world, I opted for the medium to account for all the eating and food baby :) The color is as pictured, a beautiful wine color. Only complaint is my bra did show on both sizes slightly on the side but could just have been my bust size and I didn't have time to find a bra that could be hidden. I can't remove a star just because of how happy I am with the dress. Will definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my baby shower.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments. I was 6 months pregnant at the time and the dress was so comfortable and flattering. The color is just as beautiful in person.

links_reviews_title: If only it came in white
links_reviews_text: I wore the backup size (the small was just a tad too snug) and the medium fit perfectly! Wore a regular bra and the fabric was stretchy where I needed it. I felt comfortable the entire time and received compliments on the dress. I loved it so much I would actually wear it as a wedding dress if it came in white!

Loved this dress, although not a favorite rental. The fit was perfect, definitely more form fitting though. There was plenty of stretch in the dress which made it great for dancing! The reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because of the smell of the dress. The size small that I wore smelled like it hadn't been cleaned after someone wore it all night and sweat in it! I tried to mask the smell, but it was still a little disappointing as I was worried people would smell me!

Loved the dress! Got multiple compliments. The only issue was that I had to wear the backup size (xs) because the small had been previously damaged and they must’ve tried to repair it. Right by my belly the top layer must’ve snagged or ripped and they sewed it. It was bunched and looked weird. Luckily, I was able to squeeze into the xs. It was pretty snug, but I think it still worked well for me. I had a baby 4 months ago and I still felt pretty! If you are a small and want this dress, take heed for the damaged dress. Hopefully they have multiple smalls in stock and will see this to take the damaged one off the circuit.
Loved the fit of this dress, fit like a glove and was so flattering. I received so many compliments and would definitely rent again. It's very stretchy so it wears very comfortably.

links_reviews_title: I attended a fundraiser for the nonprofit I chair.
links_reviews_text: This was the third dress I tried on for the fundraiser I was attending, and it fit perfectly! I LOVED this dress. A sales associate at the store here in Chicago found it for me and it was amazing since the initial two dresses I chose did not fit well. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful. The color was very complimentary.
links_reviews_text: Material is very forgiving. I opted out of wearing spanx but definitely an option if needed. However, the zipper was tricky going up and down. I was concerned I would rip it off. Other than that the dress is definitely more beautiful up close than in pictures. This was a backup dress and I wasn’t upset about it at all. The wine color is beautiful. I felt so great in it. This is definitely a dress I would recommend.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This fit like a glove. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for outdoor fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Great fit!! Tight but the material is very forgiving and stretchy so easy to dance and move in! Perfect length, even for a shorter person!
Very comfortable dress for a wedding. Another woman actually came up to me saying she had rented it as well! Only complaint was the neckline was a little loose and did not lay flat.

I wore this for a work event and received many compliments. Fit perfectly except that it was a little long on me because I'm short. It came below my knees instead of right above. Also it gaped a little at the top of the zipper but you couldn't see it with my hair down. Loved the material. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The dress!! I received compliments allll day even from the bride and groom!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit...Stretchy but not cheap. The dress has a very comfortable lining that is breathable as well.

This is a really pretty dress and I wore it for my husband's work gala. I wore the large because the dress is really form fitting and the large allowed me to wear spanx underneath. The dress has so much stretch and it is super comfortable. I thought the fit was really true to size. I am on the shorter side (5'4") so the dress went past my knees, which I wasn't crazy about but there was nothing I could do. Overall, it was a great dress to rent.

links_reviews_title: The process was so easy and he dress was amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits amazingly, it has stretch to accent all the right areas! The length was perfect for my work event!

I wore this dress to my boyfriend's work larty and it was great! I got tons of compliments and was super comfortable all night. I ordered bith the small and the extra small, but the small let me be a little more comfortable while sitting down. The only downside was the detailin on the dress wasnt in the best condition. It was a little stretched out. But nobody really noticed! Overall I loved the dress.
Wore for a wedding. Fit like a glove but it was super comfortable at the same time. I absolutely loved this dress. Great color, perfect length, unique.
The M and L both fit well. The M a tiny bit more form fitting, so I went with that size. There were a few torn parts of the design. Mosty towards the bottom, so rhey were not noticable.

links_reviews_title: Sexy yet appropriate for a business party.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect for an hourglass and you could wear a strapless bra but I did not need a bra as the top was snug and the fabric was thick.
Worked great for work

The fabric is so nice and soft, yet think enough to disguise anything going on underneath. It was snug in all the right places but also loose enough to be really comfortable. It is classy and elegant, but the mesh detail and the slit give it a hint of sex appeal. Plus, you can wear with a regular bra. Love this dress.

links_reviews_title: I had a great time with my boo and my friends at the company Christmas party
links_reviews_text: I did not thing that this dress was going to fit as well as it did. All the little details really make it come together as an interesting wear. The fabric is really nice and structured, without being too confining. I liked the see-through shoulder stripe and the ruffle along the hip. It's not something I would usually pick out, but ended up really liking the fit. The stretchy-yet-strong fabric took away the need for a bra, though I could have used some more room for my chest, as I got more of a sports bra effect.

I love this classy dress by Parker. It runs true to size and has no stretch. Its comfortable for any bust size and there is comfortable room in the midsection area. Curvier women should consider sizing up especially if they have full hips. I recommend wearing your true size and sizing up for your backup size. At 5’3 this dress hits knee length for me.

This dress is very classy with just a few sexy hints (a small sheer cut-out in the front and a little leg slit). It is perfect for those that need to dress conservative to an event, but still want something that is form fitting and has little hints of something more. I am a perfect size six and it fit me perfect - however, you may need to pull the dress over your head instead of stepping into it. The dress lining is very soft and silky, making it comfortable to wear. The dress hit me right below the knee, however, the slit goes up to right above the knee. Because of the sheer cut-out that extends from the front to back, you will need to wear a strapless bra with this dress. I really wish I had gotten to wear this dress... It unfortunately arrived a day late and after I had already left for my evening event.
The combo of cutout and ruffle looks strange in person. Dress ran small, but I was a little relieved that it didn't fit, because it looked so awkward.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very flattering and fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: This dress was professionally sophisticated yet added a subtle sexiness. I wore this to an after work event and it transitioned perfectly for a night out!

links_reviews_title: I love the illusion on the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits tight and short. I am also tall. I love the material. This is a sleeveless dress but I feel like it's an extreme sleeveless dress.
Fit well

links_reviews_title: Received plenty of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress.

This dress had no reviews yet I took a chance on it and it worked out great! Here's all the things I wondered if it would work out... I fit into the 6, but it did not hug my hips nicely so I went with the 8 because I have curvy hips and it hung better. I'm 5'4" and the slit in the skirt came to just above my knee. The mesh slit in the chest was low as if it was a low cut blouse but without showing cleavage. I was able to wear a regular black demi cut bra with it and it was hidden fine. A win all around!

links_reviews_title: Dress was way too small and shoulder slit came halfway down my breast.
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I normally wear a 14, but I couldn't zip this one. Bought something locally to wear for gala.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments all night-walked the line between looking AMAZING and still being professional
links_reviews_text: The ruffle on the hip was a really nice feature. The slit may be a bit high, but I figured out how to sit in it. the detail elements are classy and special.
Fit a little loose on the top but overall was a perfect fit
The dress was flattering but runs a little small. The slight is quite high on the dress, too high for my liking but you can only see it when sitting down.

Wore this to a fancy office holiday party and received many compliments. Loved the plunging back and the neckline (though I had to secure it with a safety pin because I'm small-chested). Love the surprise leg slit. The boning in the dress was flattering without feeling too constrained. I was able to dance and eat in it!
Loved this dress! I did need to use fashion tape for the chest area but other than that it was a great fit and I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Just add safety pins and you're good to go!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, no spanx required. I'm 5'9 and had flats on and it barely touched the ground so tall girls beware. Can't wear a bra with it so I used a few safety pins to tighten things up. It's definitely revealing between the low cut top and slit but I figured why not embrace it, especially after all the compliments I got!

links_reviews_title: Many compliments on the flattering fit and the color
links_reviews_text: Loved how it fit my body and was great dancing in it. Very comfortable. I did have to safety pin and tape my bust because I was falling out. Definitely would size up for this designer.

links_reviews_title: A little big on top and tight in torso, but beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: The zipper was a bit difficult to maneuver. The dress is very form fitting through the torso and large on top. I had to pin the top ad I felt it was a little to big and my breast were falling out. It was an easy fix. I did love how the dress was slim fitting.

links_reviews_title: Looked great but was so tight I couldn't sit
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 22 which is my normal. It was a little big on top which is normal for me, but it was so tight on my tummy and hips that I couldn't sit down. The dress looks like it flows nicely, but on the inside it's a straight liner that's very restrictive. For plus size, if you've got the chest I would recommend ordering a size up. I ended up not wearing this dress even though I thought it looked great.

I received a lot of compliments on this dress. It was comfy. I wear 14/6 but the 16 for best. There is quite a bit of cleavage so I used one safety pin for more modesty. I am a large DDD or F, no bra was needed for the dress. Also the slit in the dress underneath the top layer is pretty high which was only a problem when I sat down. Lastly the zipper was tough to zip up (just the last 2-3 inches).

links_reviews_title: Dress is beautiful! Not meant for dancing or much movement!
links_reviews_text: The bust was too big and I had to use A LOT of dress tape to keep it in place. I didn't realize how high the slit in the leg went up either. Overall, beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt very fancy wearing a designer dress!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the larger size of the dress that I ordered. The dress was beautiful and such an amazing quality! I will say that looking at the dress in the picture online, it appears to be a flowy-type dress, when in actuality it's form fitting with a cascading cape-style fabric over it. The slit in the tight fitting portion of the dress is very high, so if you're not a fan of high slits, then this dress is not for you. The dress is also very, very low-cut. I'm self-conscious about low-cut things and was very uncomfortable all night long. I received many compliments on the dress, but they were all from men who couldn't stop staring at my cleavage.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful, however it didn't feel beautiful on.
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous but it was really uncomfortable and fit very weird. The bodice was snug, which was a surprise since I don't have a large chest. You can wear it without a bra (score!). The slit in the leg was SUPER high. Combine that with a short slip underneath, you are pretty exposed if you're not careful when you're sitting down. Thankfully I was at a dinner table and had a napkin to cover it for the majority of the time. As nice as it looked, I would not wear again since it was such a chore to take care of sitting down.

I love this lovely gown by WATTERS! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for cup A-C sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’4”, the length hit floor length on me. The color of the dress is beautiful in person and the hidden split make it unique. Pair with nude, metallic, or black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress made me feel confident and happy.
links_reviews_text: Understated but eye catching, this dress was perfect for a gala. Fair warning: there's a HIGH leg slit I didn't catch in the photos. It was fine for sitting at a table with a napkin in my lap, but I'd be careful sitting in this number without some cover! Overall, great dress. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly Sexy Dress! The right figure will turn heads!
links_reviews_text: I purchased several dresses for this Mardi Gras Ball but decided to go with something a little more fitting . My first time ever wearing this style of dress and I will definitely wear it more often. It was flattering and forgiving. I am a 38 G -40 H and I pulled this off with NO Bra. I had to be aware of the "girls" but it was good fit. I wore a smoothing undergarment (no waist trainer) and 3 inch heels. It dragged a little but it wasn't annoying. The split is pronounced if its windy or a fan is blowing but just walking, your legs aren't exposed. I wouldn't wear this dress in church without a jacket because its low cut but at a reception it's a head turner. (as you can see in the second pic) I am definitely going to buy this label in the future.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a formal gala. Dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Adhesive bra is a must. Was happy to not have to wear spanx as the bottle was flowy enough
Fit well through waist and length (I'm 5'6''), if not a little snug...but quite large in chest...needed a lot of fashion tape to make sure it didn't fall down throughout the night!

I wore the dress to my husband's work holiday party. The dress was a backup when I couldn't zip up my original order. I felt beautiful in the dress though. I have a shorter torso, so the straps were a little long. I typically wear somewhere between a 4 and a 6. The top of the six was to big and the 4 was a bit snug, so I went for the 4. Even though it was snug, it pulled in all the right places, I didn't even need to wear Spanx. I had to wear slightly taller shoes than I would have liked, but the dress was beautiful.

I wore this to my law firm's holiday party ("formal attire encouraged"), and got loads of compliments. I'm 5'5" and wore low heels (~2") and it was the perfect length. It was also a great navy color with white earrings and nude heels. I feel like you could dress this up or down depending on the type and color of jewelry because it's very simple and elegant. My only complaint is that I had to keep *extremely* good posture all night to keep the straps up. My torso may be shorter than these straps were intended for. Without pulling my shoulder blades back, my cleavage was insane. I'm also a DD cup size though, and it still fit on my chest, so overall it was a win! I think a smaller-chested person may have better luck with the straps.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end of wearing it. The zipper was hard to zip up.
links_reviews_text: Fit great

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, but plunging neckline. Did not need a bra with it because of the built in soft cups.
links_reviews_text: Cut super low; it worked, but I was more self conscious about the bust line than I would have wanted to be.

links_reviews_title: Fit great. The slit is a bit high. Overall a very nice dress.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. I love the dress.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to close the zipper on top and couldn't wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: Overall fit was fine, but couldn't close the top of the zipper.

Loved this dress! Ended up ordering an overnight replacement in a size 20 because this ran really small (I ordered a size up from my normal size and it was not even close to fitting). The sizing was frustrating, but I did end up wearing the replacement size that RTR overnighted to me (thank god for this feature!!) to my event. Extremely figure flattering!

links_reviews_title: Fit my body type great super sexy dress!
links_reviews_text: Very fitted in the mid section, low cut in the front and with the slit up the side makes for a super sexy dress.
Runs small in the mid section, but that part fit me perfectly. The top was way too big and kept falling down. Disappointing, I couldn't wear it
Although the gown was gorgeous, I was unable to fit into it. The size 12 ran extremely small and it would not fit over my hips.

links_reviews_title: Honoring our Military Personnel and Veterans.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great except I am flat on top and the padded inserts weren't helpful in my case at all. I had to safety pin the top down. If you have a fuller top, then it will fit you wonderfully.
I normally wear 18W or 20W. The 22W was still too tight and didn't zip all the way. It was very tight on my hips and ribcage. Definitely size up if you have a large bust or hips.

links_reviews_title: Awkward arm fit and EXTREMELY tight around the ribcage
links_reviews_text: I am typically a 12/14 depending on the clothing company when it comes to dresses and pants, but I had to go up to a 16 for this dress to even zip, and the 14 was extremely tight around my hips and but. That being said, even the 16 was extremely tight around the ribcage and the fit around the arms/armpits was very uncomfortable. The 16 was too large for my (not small) chest whereas the 14 fit well in the chest but not the waist or hips. The dress itself was beautiful, I loved the color and material, but I definitely think it would fit inverted triangle or straight body types best. Hourglass shapes beware! This dress may not be for you.

links_reviews_title: Wore backup dress for wedding, did not wear this one. Dress runs small.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress!!! Could not zip dress, dress runs a size small. Advise getting size up for primary size and backup getting one more size up.

Beautiful dress but much too small on the hips that I could not wear it at all! I wear a size 10 or 12 in skirts, dresses, and pants and could not even get my legs in. If you have wider hips I suggest sizing up a size or two.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a black tie gala.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit and was the correct size (6) but the top/ bust were very large. It is pretty low cut and the chest area gaps. I didn’t wear it because it felt much too provocative. Beautiful color, I wish it could’ve worked!
This dress was offered as a "freebie" when we ordered another dress for her prom. She is 5'6" 126# 32D and we couldn't zip up the dress. It was a lovely dress!

links_reviews_title: Was too small or tight to zip up unfortunately . Otherwise lovely dress
links_reviews_text: Lovely material but didn't fit

links_reviews_title: Well made dress but odd fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress was huge on top and very tight on the hips. Might be a good choice for someone with a bigger chest and straight hips. I'm pear shaped but the chest/hips disparity was a big extreme even for my shape!
This dress is more for a dinner vs a formal. However it runs small. The dress I wore was the same size as this one and I couldn't even zip this one.

I loved this dress and it would have been perfect except the waist was too high and hit around my rib cage. There is no give in the waist, which would have fit perfectly had it been 1 or 2 inches longer waisted—as it was it wouldn't zip over my ribs.
The dress seemed to run small in the top. It was pretty and good quality, but ended up not being able to zip it all the way up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but very small around rib cage
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and nice color but I couldn't wear it. The fit around rib cage is very tight and strange fit around the bust.
LOVED this dress! I wore it to a debutante ball and it was so fun and comfortable to dance in!
Loved this dress! Perfect for a formal wedding. I got compliments on it all night. The color is absolutely beautiful. Be warned, it is very clingy and a little low cut on the sides if you're busty.

It didn't quite fit me perfectly. A little big and the chest didn't really do anything for me. But it definitely wasn't a bad dress! Bold blue color is standout. Would rent again. Length was great for me at 5ft10 with modest heels.

Wore this beautiful, eye catching blue dress to a friend's engagement party. It is a thick material so it will hide things but it also feels comfortable to move around/dance in. Loved the neckline, paired with big earrings.

links_reviews_title: The best dress I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering. The color and the shape are incredible. I'll definitely be renting this again!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering fit for a family wedding downtown
links_reviews_text: Neckline in the front shows off shoulders, fitted but not too tight for dancing and dinner. Felt confident and comfortable, but also appropriate for a family wedding. The color is a show stopper.

Simple elegant dress. A little boring (which I knew before renting) but good enough for a dressy wedding. Hooks on the halter and side zipper made it easier to get in and out of the dress. Thick lined material meant no rexposed panty lines. Length was good for me (5'4" with 3" heels). Don't have any full length pictures so here's a half length one cropped from a photobooth picture.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and elegant for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit and ease of this dress. Felt like it covered all my least favorite parts while still looking sexy and chic. Could have been a bit more body-hugging. Wore a strapless bra. My 2.5-3 inch heels were right height, dress was barely off the ground so I didn't step on it too much.

The long version of this dress was too short for me (I’m 5,10), so I didn’t wear it for my event. Otherwise, it fit true to size, but I don’t feel like it did anything great in terms of shape. The color is beautiful, and I loved the neckline and back

I absolutely LOVE this dress. I rented the exact same one in gold from RTR for prom three years ago, and I loved it so much that I got it in this GORGEOUS blue color for my sorority's formal. It hugged me in all of the right places and still left enough room for my Spanx. The dress is lined, but I am a 32DD, so I had to wear a backless bra, which worked well. I wound up wearing the 6R, but I might have been able to do the 4R... My backup was an 8R because I was worried about room for the girls, but the dress was definitely good for my bust. It really flattered my figure and minimized the girls while giving me an awesome hourglass figure. For shoes, I wore 4-inch heels, and the dress didn't drag. I did take them off to dance, and the dress did drag on the floor a little bit (I'm 5'6) but not too badly. Obviously, I love this dress since I've rented it twice, haha. I am OBSESSED with the cobalt blue color of this one. Got compliments all night long! Rent the Runway, you never disappoint!

I loved this dress. The color was stunning, the material was a great weight, and the dress was comfortable all evening. I did opt to wear spanx because I was really bloated he night of the event and I wanted a smoother look, but with the right underwear, spanx aren’t necessary. The 4R and 6R fit, but I needed to wear the neck on the second more loose set of clasps with the 4 so it left the fits set of claps exposed (poor design flaw). Due to the exposed claps with the 4 I opted for the size 6. We have another event in a couple months and my husband has asked me if I’ll wear this gown again!

I ordered this dress for a formal event in both the 10R and 12R. I am pretty consistently a size 10 but have had bad luck in the past with designer gowns running small. This fit like a glove! And I did not have to wear a bra, which is always a concern for me, as I am a 36DD. Beautiful color! I am 5'8" and it just hit the floor, so if you're planning on wearing heels (I didn't), maybe do the long version.

I really enjoyed renting this dress for a gala that my school had. I was told that I looked beautiful in blue. It also helped that my husband had a matching tie to go with the dress. The only issue I had was that the clasp on the top was loose. Luckily I found a hair tie that matched my jewelry and I used that in the back to pull the dress to be snug. Overall I enjoyed the dress look forward to renting again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a formal event in Beverly Hills and still got compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore a size 10P because my chest is larger, I'm a 34 DDD and it fit well. The material is stretchy, which helped so much on my chest! It was a few inches too long, I'm only 5'0, but it wasn't bad at all. I would rent this dress again as I loved it so much!
Material was stretchy and super comfortable. Fitted material but hit in all the right places. It was a perfect rental! I wore it for an awards ceremony and it was stunning. Rent this!
Color is bold and beautiful. The fit is super comfortable and I was still able to wear my spanx:). Highly recommend!!

At 5'8", I always order the long length gown and wear with heels. This style did not come in long length, but I gave it a try with the knowledge that I'd have to adjust my shoe choice accordingly. What I didn't realize is that the long length gowns aren't just longer in the hem. The overall proportion of this dress was shorter: the neckline, waist, and hip all hit me at the wrong spot. The fabric has no stretch, which might have helped a little. Although I measure a 4 in this designer, I chose to wear the 6 because sizing up gave me almost an extra inch in length overall. My regular size 4 was the correct width at bust, waist, and hip BUT it was so short in the neck that it was choking me. On the plus side, it's a lovely vivid color and photographs well. I'm glad I tried it but would not rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: The color on this dress was spectacular! It flowed great and I received tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress materials was nice. The color was a hit- it was a beautiful shade of blue that really makes you stand out. The flow of the dress was fun and free - it did not tug. You can not really wear a bra however the cut on the top allows you to do so with enough material where you can not notice. I ordered 8p and 10p and went with the 10p because of my bust size. The length was a little long but I am only 5.2 with 2 inch heals. Overall, a hit!

links_reviews_title: Great color - low cut around the girls
links_reviews_text: Heavy material with lining, fitted through torso with room to move at the hips. I'm only 5'1" but there was no 10p available so I wore the 10R with a 4" heel, there was a little drag, but really I didn't find it problematic. Be warned if you're bigger busted, I really wanted to go braless, but the top doesn't have much depth to compensate and I was concerned about popping out the sides (I'm 34DDD).

I rented this as a back up and liked it so much I ended up going with this one instead. Really beautiful color and glamorous cut. It is very form fitting. My spanx line showed so I just went without. I was pushing it on the size in the torso but the length with 2 inch heels was perfect. I got tons of compliments and was a standout in a sea of black.
This is my third time using RTR as always everything was perfect. This dress fit really well and the color is bright and beautiful. Just enough sexy without being over the top.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but went with a different option
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. I got it as a backup style for a black tie auction. I ended up going with the other dress only because that dress was less eye-catching and I was at the auction as a volunteer, not as an attendee. If I had another occasion to wear it the weekend I rented it, I would have worn it. I will definitely rent it again for a formal event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a September black tie wedding and it was perfect! I got compliments all night - the fit is flattering and the color is great. I'm a little over 5'6 and wore either 2.5 or 3 inch heels and the length of the 6 was perfect. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pop of color, photographed well
links_reviews_text: Wore shapewear and sticky boobs and was perfect. Average length was perfect. Wouldn’t work for large chest

Rented this for a black tie event. I will sometimes wear dress sizes 0 or 2. I went with 0. There wasn't much difference besides the 2 looked like it had been worn too many times and the side lining was off. I wore medium sized heels and length was perfect! I am 5'2. If you have an hour glass shaped body this works wonderfully!

links_reviews_title: My back up dress. Beautiful but better for a formal black tie, not a wedding
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this because my husband preferred a different dress. The color is stunning

The dress was really nice with a lining. I usually wear an 8 or a 10 because I'm busty with a bigger waist, but with Rent the Runway I always go up a size and I've had good luck with that. The neck was pretty, I wore a simple gold choker, but you could get away without wearing a necklace. The top part was a little low, but if you're smaller it'll fit just fine. I didn't wear a bra because of the back, but I did wear those adhesive breast lifts (Fashion first aid The perk up) which not sure if I needed because the waist was fairly snug (but comfortable), but it made me more comfortable knowing something was kind of sort of holding me up. The dress was a little long, but with heels it was perfect. The zipper was a little sticky, but it seemed to loosen slightly with each time I tried it on. It would be nice if they could wax the zippers before sending. I've seen this complaint before with other dresses as well. All in all though the dress was beautiful and I got loads of compliments.

It was a super comfortable dress. Very easy to wear and mobile to dance in. I'm only 5 feet tall and the 2P was the perfect length for me with two inch heels. However I felt the dress was a little boring to wear as the only special feature was the neckline. It also flattened my chest out a lot and wasn't really flattering there.

links_reviews_title: The dress itself was beautiful and the color was perfect for the Indian wedding I attended!
links_reviews_text: The body of the dress fit well but I have a larger chest and although it was secure, I felt like I had to keep adjusting so I didn't have a nip-slip.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous cobalt color and incredibly forgiving fit.
links_reviews_text: I was pretty picky about the dress I chose for a very upscale black tie wedding in southern Ca. This was perfect...it was forgivingly snug around my curves with an incredible neckline. I don't care for fussing with cleavage, and this was perfect. A low key shapewear was worn and no bra was needed- which has NEVER been the case with my 34d bust. The material was thick with a hint of stretch and the leg slit was very tasteful. We mingled, ate and danced...& I felt my best the whole time!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Couture and Cars Fashion Show and it was a hit! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8 and weigh about 153 lbs. I also CrossFit and its hard to find clothes that fit a muscular body properly. This dress fit me like a glove and was the perfect length that I wanted (I wore flats and didn't want them to show).
I rented this dress for a black tie work event. I absolutely loved the silhouette of the dress and the bright blue is gorgeous in person.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on the dress! I danced all night long!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! I ordered the 12 and 14 but ended up with the 12 because the bust was really big on me. I sized down and didn’t mind it being a little tighter on the bottom.. but if you need to.. just buy tape. The material is smooth and stretchy. It hides and minor rolls ;). It’s extremely comfortable to wear and the slit adds a nice sexiness to the dress.

This dress fit perfectly. The regular length was a tiny bit long with 3” heels, but I was still able to walk and dance comfortably in it. The top is fitted and has a little padding built in so a bra wasn’t necessary. Overall, very comfortable!
The color of this dress was amazing, great thick fabric. I'm a 34 DD so it was tight around the neck and chest for me but I made it work! I received a lot of compliments on our cruise.

links_reviews_title: The dress came a couple of days early which was perfect. The return process was super simple.
links_reviews_text: Fit was excellent I am very tall but I did not need the tall size even with heels. The fabric was very light weight and form fitting. This dress is very easy to walk and dance in!

The fabric on this dress was perfect! Thin enough that it didn't weigh your down, but also not so thin that it clings to you in a weird way. Super easy to move around/dance in. I wore this for a formal event for my school and the dress was classy and sophisticated, and the slit on the side added a bit of sexiness! I got so many compliments on the color and fit of this dress! I normally wear a size 8 but went with the size 10 just so I had enough room to move around all night.

I would order this again in a size down (I'm 5'4" 110lbs) or a petite as it was a little long an a little loose in the chest. Even a little bit it was still very comfortable and flattering! Lots of compliments.

I rented this dress for a black tie optional party. It was a pretty deep blue but the top was loose and almost too low. The cross cross design around the next adds interest but the top was low in the front and the dress was overall very heavy. It was not my favorite rental.

I wore this dress to a black tie gala. I am 5'2, 34a chest, with an athletic build and small waist and the dress fit like a glove. Not too long either. The petite would have been too short. I wore 3 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: roomy but still comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: this dress is roomy but for big busted gals the shape isn't too bad. I probably could have sized down to a 6 or maybe even a 4 for the waist and skirt. if you are average to small busted, size down. really comfy for work and didn't wrinkle while sitting all day.

This runs a taaaad big, I think I could have gotten the 8 and it would have been fine. The waist sort of floated around instead of sitting where it should. Simple, but the wrist detail and poof sleeves add some interest. Great dress!
This dress has a deceptively good fit - hides my big arms and compliments my small waist beautifully. I love this dress so much, it's going in my "rent again" heart list. God bless RTR.

I'm a size 12 and the size still was loose on me. These dress doesn't photograph particularly well but is flattering and comfortable to wear. I chose it for a travel day and airports and jazzed it up with but statement earrings.

links_reviews_title: Simple long-sleeved dress with a good length that's perfect for work!
links_reviews_text: Saw this in the store and figured it was simple but a nice flare in the sleeve cuffs so I decided to try it on. They didn't have my usual size 4 but I'm glad I went with the 2! It does have an elastic waist that looks better with a thin belt over it. It's knee length so it's great for work and it's very comfy. It's cute with fleece rights and booties in the winter. Would definitely again for a more casual work piece but you can definitely dress it up with jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Not suited to short, curvy gals
links_reviews_text: I really should have seen this coming, but this ended up looking terribly dowdy on me. A shame, because the color and sleeve smocking details were lovely. Would probably look absolutely gorgeous on someone a few inches taller. :)

This dress is very cute. I wore it to work, and paired it with a thick brown belt. It's very comfortable and flattering. The fit was great and I felt great in it. I usually wear a 12/14 in dresses. I am 5'7 with an athletic build and very broad shoulders. Sometimes dresses tend not to fit well in the back and shoulders, but this was perfect. My only complaint is that the material is hot. I work in retail and I got very hot at one point in the day because I was walking around a lot and helping customers and the material does not breathe well. Other than that I really loved it. I would say perfect for fall or spring.

links_reviews_title: Would rent again in smaller size
links_reviews_text: This is a great work dress. Very flattering. I'm overall thinish but when dresses are too tight it's in the thighs/behind - but this is the perfect cut for that shape. After a few RTR dresses fit on the snug side at 4, I went with a 4 here but wish I had gotten the 2. Not bad and I wore it twice, but a little loose at the waist. Will get a 2 if I re-rent ever.

I love this dress. I wish I owned it! I am tall and this was a perfect length for the office! I ended up wearing this to work and then transitioned it to wear that evening on a date. I will definitely rent this again!
beautiful dress for work
The neckline felt too big, and the sleeves were too billowy for an everyday dress. Material, color and length were great, though.
Couldn't wear bc too big. Size down

This is a great easy dress that can go from day to night. Im petite so the sleeves were too long for me, but I was able to fix it by pulling the sleeves up to my elbow wearing the sleeves half length. It runs large, so size down.

Size down on this dress for sure. It was easy, comfortable, chic and great quality. Waist band is stretchy as are the sweet, frilly wrists. I wore it with bright shoes and fun earrings. Highly recommend!

I generally size up in formal dresses. I have a very broad back and shoulders. This dress fit beautifully. So many ways you can wear it. Would be great for a wedding or pictures as I used it for photos with my baby.

I got the 14L & 16L. The only difference I noticed was the top was looser in the bust on the 16. I am 5’9 190lbs and a 36D and the size 14L worked great. I didn’t love the tie in the front and ended up putting it in the back.

links_reviews_title: I loved the flowy material. Made dancing very fun!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little tight around my ribs but I probably should have gotten a bigger size. It's a lot of material on the bottom so I kept tripping up the stairs. Over all though I loved it. Excellent for a bridesmaid dress!

links_reviews_title: This was my daughter’s first prom and she looked beautiful! the dress was modest and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress - modest cut. You do need a strapless bra but we already had one. It fit true to size with heals on.

links_reviews_title: Wore this while 3 months pregnant to an office holiday party, got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I needed a dress to wear to my office holiday party when I was 3 months pregnant. This dress was perfect because the waist was cut higher than normal, so it was just all flowy fabric around my belly which was already starting to expand. (I couldn't bear the thought of wearing anything tight around my waist.) The color is a gorgeous soft blush pink and the skirt flowed really nicely. It was especially good for twirling on the dance floor. Before getting pregnant I had a 28" underbust and the 2R size fit just right. By the end of the night, after some dancing (and I presume some swelling from the dancing), it started to feel slightly tight around my ribcage but not super uncomfortable. I wore this dress with the Betsey Johnson "Lucy" embellished flats in Blush and the color paired beautifully. I will say though that with the flats, the bottom of the dress was already slightly grazing the floor, so I would not recommend wearing flats with this dress for anyone under 5'8". I got lots of compliments from my coworkers involving this dress and I'm so happy I picked it!

Definitely runs small. I usually wear a 14/16, and neither fit. Luckily i was able to get a replacement sent with sizes 18/20 - I wore the 18 and it fit great! Definitely keep that in mine when ordering and size up at least 1 size.

I love this alluring Pink Daniela Gown by Monique Lhuillier Bridesmaid. Running small with some stretch, I recommend sizing up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and straight at the hips. It works best for A-C cups. You are not able to wear a strapless bra with this gown so you should wear a strapless bra since it has a halter neckline. At 5'5, the length hit floor length on me. The pink chiffon material feels like a dream and it's a great choice for your bridal party. Pair with nude heels and dangling earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for my photoshoot. It flowed beautifully and the photographer loved it!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size and created a mini-train for me since I'm so short. The color was stunning also! Such a gorgeous soft blush. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Flows well and feels elegant on
links_reviews_text: Wore for a red carpet event. Chest runs a bit tight. Definitely need to size up. Loved it overall. Nice color and fabric.

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am a 36D bra and this dress was tight enough to keep them in place without a bra. I wore it all night and danced freely and comfortably! Highly recommend

I ended up actually not wearing this but NOT because it wasn't perfect, it came with some hot pink stains on it so I wore my backup dress. This was gorgeous, fit perfectly (snug waist really shows off your figure). I would have worn the tie in the back, I liked it better that way. This would be a perfect bridesmaid dress.
Way too long!

links_reviews_title: My daughter wore this for a prom she attended. She looked lovely. Dress fit was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Length was a touch long, but since daughter is in between regular length and long length, this was expected. Overall, a very beautiful dress.

Rented this for my daughter's prom. It's a beautiful dress but the zipper was super tricky - had to zip it only halfway down and pull it over her head. It was getting stuck where the waistband came into play. But she loved it!
Very pleased with quality fit and color of dress. A little long. Would order petite if height less than 5ft 5”.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fit and flair with pockets
links_reviews_text: My regular size is between a 6 & 8 usually, and ended up wearing the 8 as the 6 I received was well-worn and the pockets had been stretched a bit. The 8 was a little roomier and was in beautiful condition. The color is more teal than green, but gorgeous for a cool-weather event. It's heavier and more layered than it looks so it kept me warm on a cool night.

I rented this as my back-up style for a wedding and ended up not wearing it, but still thought it was so beautiful and would 100% rent again in the future. It runs pretty true-to-size, but the arms are tight. I'm between a 4 and a 6 and for this reason (the arm fit) I chose the 6. But fair warning, the 6 has a small snag on the front lace that I noticed right away. Dress it up with a chunky necklace and heels. The warm satin lining of the dress makes it a nice choice for winter weddings, too.

This was the last size left to rent so I'm so thankful it fit, although a smidge right. It didn't bother me at all. I do carry a lot of weigh in my arms and they were super tight sleeves, so be careful when ordering if you have bulky arms, this was my only problem with the dress bc it's satin lined and has NO give (and would be very hot in the summer time 80+heat so consider that!) but I loved it and would rent it again. Careful to check the lace, mine was ripped in the back when I got it but you could barely tell so I still wore it.

links_reviews_title: Green in honor of St. Patrick's Day
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a fundraiser luncheon on St. Patrick's Day. It was a bit tight,as the underlay is silk and didn't stretch. Unfortunately the size up wasn't available, or it would've been perfect. Vivid color, photographs we'll. Only other con would be that there are pockets that gape a little... it could be due to the snug fit on me, or a previous renter carried many items.
Great fit, good if you have hips, pockets always a plus. I'm 5'8" weight 130, and the 2 was great
I really liked this dress. I did think it ran a little small and was tight in the arms, glad I sized up for my backup size!

This was my #1 choice and ended up being my last option. The fit was not a good fit for me, the length was also an awkward length. Was not flattering on me and didn't provide the confidence I was hoping for. Looks great on slimmer girls in the reviews, but I did not like it on my curvier self.
I wore this dress for my sons baptism. Extremely comfy and the best part was the pockets. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! Got so many complements at the wedding I want to...also was super easy!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a size 2 Height - 5'4" Weight - 110

I loved this dress! The color is even better in person, and the material is heavier but super comfortable. I had no problems with the sleeves and was hugging people all night. I loved the style, the fit, and the fun pockets! Perfect for transitioning from an outside evening wedding to the dance floor of a semi-formal wedding. Received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit, color, and design... a picture perfect dress for a picture perfect evening!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream! The skirt is fuller than I normally choose, but I felt like a million bucks. The color is just gorgeous: the jewel tone lace over a thicker satin felt luxurious. And there were POCKETS. I'm 5'7" and it hit just above my knees. I wore it to a Michelin Star restaurant, and it could easily crossed over to any sort of semi formal to formal event. One of my favorite dresses ever!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful dress with a nice lining. The color is a deep teal that would work for summer or fall. Would definitely recommend sizing up though. The arms were a smidge tight as was the dress so size up from your regular size! Strapless bra also worked great. Overall really happy with my first RTR experience. Will definitely do it again.

links_reviews_title: Elegant Party Dress, Perfect for Weddings
links_reviews_text: The dress is not green, as pictured. It is actually a pretty teal color. The material is comfortable and heavy. The dress is a little tighter at the top, which makes for clean lines and a solid fit. The skirt is full and drops slightly below the waist, which make me look a tad bloomy but I didn't mind. Perfect for a Fall or Spring wedding with its delicate lace sleeves and comfortable fabrics. Overall this is a solid dress for a wedding and runs accurate to size. This dress will make you feel pretty all night long.

as others have mentioned, the tight sleeves caused me to wear the size 8 plus it was more comfortable. wore 3" heels and hit right above my knee. I was also able to wear my normal every day bra with this without feeling too constricted. I loved the color for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: Classy combo with my fave boots
links_reviews_text: Selected for a wedding held in a charming barn. To fit the theme, several of us donned boots with our dresses. So my goal was to find a dress to go with my legit boots that have teal horses in the leather. This dress did the trick. The color wasn't an exact match, this is a little mintier in color than teal, but it was pretty and very comfy. In fact, the most comfortable rental so far. The fabric is stretchy and the cut offers a lot of coverage, so you can shake your booty without risking indecent exposure. It was what I needed for this occasion - and did all the things that RTR does (easy, on time, clean, etc.) - so I gave it 5 stars, but this has been my least favorite rental because it's a fairly generic dress. My other rentals have definitely been standout and drew a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress was rented for my daighter’s Senior Pics.
links_reviews_text: The color was gorgeous and much more vibrant of a turquoise than I had imagined. The overall shape was very flattering. The fabric was a little stiff in the arms, shoulders and chest but still comfortable. Due to this, the size 12 would have been a better fit (we ordered a 10). It still worked well for photos, however.

links_reviews_title: I felt very special wearing a designer dress.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 14 and 16. I normally wear a size 14 but due to the sleeves fitting a little snug, I opted on wearing the size 16. I received many compliments on this dress. My only issue was with the color being more green than teal. Overall, I was happy with the dress.

I rented this dress for a semi formal indoor wedding. I was very nervous to order this because they only had one size left so I wasn't able to order a backup size. I immediately loved the dress as soon as I opened the bag. The photos really do not do the color justice. It's a gorgeous vibrant teal with a gold underlay. I was so relieved when I put it on and it fit like a glove! I also rented the necklace I'm wearing in the photo from RTR and it paired perfectly! I got so many compliments throughout the night and felt beautiful! RTR makes the whole process so simple and convenient. 10/10 would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for an afternoon wedding. The color was perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit fairly true-to-size but arms were snug. The lining is thicker which helps hold you in. I did feel that because the bottom flairs out so low on the waist, that it made me look 10 pounds heavier. I didn't think it was a super flattering on my frame. However, the color and pattern were great, and I did get a lot of compliments. It was also conservative enough for an afternoon wedding in the midwest.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved the dress - just too big
links_reviews_text: Dress definitely was a bit bit in the back and through the body. This was my backup dress, so I didn't order the smaller size. The dress was extremely comfortable and I got a ton of compliments! Super elegant and photographs beautifully.
Fantastic dress for a premiere! Super fun and flirty but also comfortable!

I rented this dress for a Bat Mitzvah at a country club and it was perfect for the occasion. It fit well although I kept pulling it down all night. I received a lot of compliments. I did not have trouble with the sleeves but I can see how, depending on your body, they could be small for some people. The color is gorgeous.
This dress is great! Wore it for a orchard wedding. Beautiful color, flattering fit. Still sexy without showing skin which is a feat. Wore it with shiny nude heels which looked perfect.
Super comfortable. Got lots of compliments. I would size one size up.

Fit was a little tight in the chest and arms, but overall it was a super cute dress. Got several compliments and was very comfortable! I was a RTR first timer and will definitely be doing it again for my next event!

I LOVED THIS DRESS. I was a little worried about the overall fit without a petite option, but it was perfect--hugged in all the right areas and wonderfully feminine, but conservative enough for my family wedding rental. There's a nude underlay which is nice, and the dress is a little hefty so I wouldn't do it as a summer rental. I got drowned in compliments all night! Rent this dress! :)

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the color of the dress, more teal than green.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I am petite and a lot of dresses dont hit me at the waist correctly, but this one did. I would have preferred it to be 2 inches shorter; it hit me right at the knee, but most dresses go below my knee so I counted it as a win. The color was beautiful. The dress was warm and thick, so I didn't bother to wear a bra with it. No need for lots of jewelry, just a simple bracelet. Great dress for the price! Would rent it again.

Very pretty color. I was a little concerned of the shorter length and the short torso of the dress (felt like it gave me a stockier look), but once I put on some heels, it helped to elongate the dress. Also, the arms are tight (I have muscular arms), so the 10 was the best fit. But the pros outweighed the two cons. Gorgeous color, lace was elegant, versatile, heavier fabric was great for a cool May evening and I felt amazing in it! Fabric was also somewhat stretchy, which can be a good or bad thing!

links_reviews_title: A lovely spring-y dress for a May gala!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a gala event in Chicago in early May. I loved the color, a pretty dark teal, and the double layering under the lace. The pockets were great, the weight was just right, and the length came to around my knees (I'm 5'2"). The only negatives were in the wear the dress is starting to show -- on the size 12 I wore, there's a hole in the lace right at mid-bust, and in some other places (upper right shoulder) it's starting to unravel. Otherwise, a gorgeous, comfortable dress.
Fit pretty true to size but a bit tight through the tummy and chest. I'm 5'4 and it hit right above my knees.

I could have worn my size but the safety size was a little more comfortable in the arms and chest. This was my first time and I loved it. The dress was totally lined and much nicer quality than I would be able to buy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was obsessed with this dress based on the images and reviews from the RTR app. The color was more blue-ish than I thought it would be based on the pictures (I was imaging more emerald green) but thankfully the blush pink shoes and bag I packed still worked with the dress. The arms were a little tight but I was comfortable throughout the night. It's also a little tight around the stomach area so if you're self conscious about that, I would look at other options. I'm glad I sized up based on the reviews because I definitely could not have fit in my regular size. Overall, beautiful dress and received many compliments throughout the night.
I wore this dress to a baby shower. It was nice, but if you look closely at it, you could see fraying in the material. Dress just looked a little worn out. Worked fine.

This was cute but I ended up wearing my backup dress. It was very heavy, so it would get really warm for dancing. I agree with the other reviewers that it was slightly tight in the arms, but the 6 still fit me well and zipped no problem. It was about knee length and comfortable in the waistline. I would say the style in person isn't stunning, it's more modest and classy, maybe better for a daytime event than a wedding.

links_reviews_title: This was a backup dress. Would’ve loved to wear it for an event.
links_reviews_text: Color was nice. Fit was comfy. Ideal to wear during cold weather since fabric was heavy. Loved to pockets.
Just your standard, lacy, wedding dress! No complaints here. The pockets were awesome.

This dress was exactly as pictured and fit beautifully. I received so many compliments. It was ideal for an early Spring wedding. My only complaint (and the reason I didn't give five stars) was the dress smelled like B.O. I had to use fabric freshener and spray perfume all over the inside to hide the scent. However, once that issue was solved it was the perfect dress!
True to size. I'm 5'2 170lbs and the size 14 was perfect! Lots of compliments!
I really liked this dress! I wore it for an April wedding. Sleeves were a little tight but I didn't mind. It was comfortable and overall a great dress for the price!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my sister's wedding in the mountains. She asked us to all wear a teal dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress! I received many compliments. It fit me perfectly and loved the pockets! I received many compliments. It's a lot prettier in person than on the website pictures. It fit me true to size and was great quality. I wore it at an outdoor wedding in Spring and was comfortable because it's thick material.
I wore this on Christmas day I received many compliments it felt great and was extremely flattering!!
Very comfortable. Great fit. Just pee before the party!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Christmas party. Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: High quality, Great for smaller top women. Loved the length. I'm 5'2. Looked great from the back also

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is FIRE!!!! Must have for a holiday party!!!
links_reviews_text: Loved the pockets, length and overall fit. Looking forward to ordering it again for a spring event. A must for a holiday party.

I rented this last minute for a company holiday party. I am glad I found something so festive, although it wasn't my favorite. There was boning in the back of the jumpsuit and since it was tight on me, it dug into my back. It also was tough to wear a bra with, so I didn't feel like there was much support. But overall a great red statement piece.

I didn't expect this to also require 2+ inch heels (I'm 5'6") so I wore black heeled boots that didn't quite match. The fit was good overall, though I think it squeezed out my armpit fat a lil, the sleeves were a bit restrictive, and you really can't wear underwear with this jumpsuit. However, the color was so attractive and it was a fun outfit! I tried to dress it down with my coat though.

I wore this for a date with my husband. It has a lot happening – and it was really fun to wear! I tend to size up for jumpsuits, and this was no exception. I am a size 8, sometimes a size 6, but I wore a 10 in this
Super cute jumpsuit, showed off my curves nicely and was super fun to wear! Got compliments allllll night.

This feminine but still trendy jumpsuit is your next piece to rent for your night out! I'm not a big fan of jumpsuits but this is right up my alley. First of all, the color is amazing and I love the trendy cold shoulders and also the tie around the neck to add a feminine touch. This does run true to size but I would size up if you are curvier in the hips. You will need a strapless bra or NuBra due to the shoulders and the fabric does not have any stretch so keep that in mind when choosing your backup! At 5'6, this was 3 inches off the ground while wearing flats. This would work best for A to C cups since there isn't any room in the bust. With some dangling earrings and your best strappy heels, this is your next must have look for your night out!

This was the perfect New Year's Eve outfit. You have to wear heels / tall booties since the legs are a bit long but otherwise the color is great. If you're not a fan of restricted arm movements this isn't for you, the loop in sleeves are a bit difficult to navigate at first (had to take off to do my makeup). Def recommend though

links_reviews_title: Extra fancy/fun/trendy for parties but fits a little odd
links_reviews_text: It's more formal than you expect, but can be dressed down. Tall/long for size and tight in mid-trunk
It was too short, had weird lines that shown through the belly area from the lining. I returned it without wearing.
It fits so perfect. Love the design and got so many compliments for the night. All my friends got surprised when I say I actually rent it!!
