I enjoyed wearing this - the ribbon around the neck was the clincher .....so many compliments.....it was a one and done wear for me....but that ONE was fun!
so unusual and different, i really like it
Too tight in the hips! No stretch in the fabric-but love the design.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my holiday party
links_reviews_text: The material is thick, which makes it good for colder months. The material was also stretchy and forgiving, very comfortable. The black on the sides make for a very nice hourglass illusion. I also liked that I could wear it with a normal racerback bra. Overall, I think it looked great and I was extremely comfortable all night long.

Great dress, i read it ran small and glad i ordered one size up. Length was good, i wore the long with 3 inch heels. Anyone taller than 5'9" probably cannot rent this dress if intending to wear with heels. Dress is very form fitting, recommend spankx. Would wear again!
Lots of compliments. Felt beautiful
I wore this dress on a cruise for their formal night. If I was to rent it again, I would try one size bigger because it was tight in the hips for my body.

It Fit great and was comfortable because I am always on the dance floor. I thought this would be an unique dress (due to the color scheme) and I received many compliments! Plus I was pleasantly surprised with how much better it looked in person.

links_reviews_title: Very slimming and comfortable. Favorite rental yet!
links_reviews_text: Ordered this dress last minute when the original one I wanted wasn't available. It fit perfectly and was very slimming. I'm not feeling slim at the moment, and this dress made me feel really good. Super comfortable and not too long for my 5'4" frame. It was thick fabric and a 90° day but I didn't feel too hot. Would definitely want to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Getting to get dressed up with all of my friends.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. It was long enough for me to wear heels and the fabric was thick enough to not wear a bra. The black sides are very slimming. I would definitely order again. I wouldn't wear it for a summer affair. Since the fabric was super thick and warm.
Loved this dress, fits very well

I received this dress because the one I had rented didn't get returned in time. This is not something I would have chosen for myself but my goodness did it look good!! I joke that I'm shaped like a boy because I have an athletic build but in this dress I had amazing curves. I was comfortable and received so many compliments all night long. I would totally recommend this dress!!
I wore a size 8, and it fit perfectly. I am usually a size 6. I was able to wear a racer back bra instead of a strapless. Very comfortable and flattering.

Wore this to a charity event. Dress is super flattering!! In a perfect world I would have worn a 2r instead of 0p but that was all that was available. So I lived off of broiled chicken, steamed broccoli, and green smoothies for 5 days and managed to wear the zero fine. I did have to wear flats to keep from looking goofy with the length but that was actually a blessing. So much more comfy! I received compliments all night and was stopped and asked for photos!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress! Fit very true to size for me.

RTR added this to my order since a backup look wasn't available. I thought it was stunning but at 5'6" the dress was at the floor when I was barefoot. I was better off with a different dress in a 2L. However, I would wear this dress if I can find amazing flat shoes to pair the dress with!

The fabric was great for the winter wedding I attended (warm and flexible). It was a little short for my height (5'6"), and the upper waist area/bust was a little loose. Also, I wouldn't consider myself to have curvy hips (alas), but the dress was a little tight in the hip area, so if you're particularly curvy, you might want to size up. Neither the 4L nor 6R were options for me when I rented, so I would have been curious to see if a different size solved some of my "fit" issues. Overall, the silhouette is very flattering. This was also my first RTR experience, and it was really great - very efficient!
Fabric is thick but stretches with curves. I'd suggest going with the long if you have huger heels or long legs to avoid your toes showing under bottom of dress

Fit is true to size but material is not stretchy so would be hard to squeeze into if you're a larger size 4. I'm 5'4 and was a little long even in high heels. Loved the dress. Perfect for our James Bond event! Classy!
After running into a problem with my original dress, I chose this one. It fit great & I got so many compliments!! I would definitely rent this dress again!

I did really like the dress but it was too short. I am 5"4, 140 lbs and I wore 4 inch heels. The fit was great but I should have gone with a 6 Long. The fabric was a bit thick which made it a little hot but is also did not show sweat. I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: My cousin's formal wedding was full of smiles, laughter, and dancing!
links_reviews_text: The dress I had rented was damaged by the previous renter, so the RTR stylists chose this dress as a replacement. I was heartbroken by the change and I never would have picked this dress myself, but in the end I am SO GLAD for the way things worked out. This dress was perfect. Everyone who saw it loved it. The color is stunning, it's comfortable, and the shape is incredibly flattering. Notes: (1) The fabric is thick and heavy. This was GREAT for my event but could mean discomfort for yours. (2) It can take some time to get used to walking, especially up/down stairs, due to the mermaid shape. (3) Either bring someone to the ladies' room with you to help you zip down/zip up, or hike it up by yourself and spend some time realigning the lining and dress afterward. Cons: (1) The arm holes are large! I had to be careful of how I stood because at times my nude bra showed. (2) Without the right undergarments there WILL be bunching and visible lines, so plan ahead. Pros: (1) The color is stunning! (2) It's so incredibly comfortable! I could sit, stand, walk (after some practice - I'm not used to mermaid cuts) and most importantly - DANCE all night long. (3) The thick fabric is perfect for cooler weather. I was the only one in my group who didn't need a shawl or jacket. (4) The shape is incredibly flattering. It will make you into an hourglass regardless of your natural shape. (5) It's versatile. I added some edge with a funky necklace, but it would be so easy to make it much more elegant if your event calls for that. I loved this dress, and most of all I loved RTR's attention to detail and commitment to helping me look GREAT!

Fit like a glove on my pear shaped body. I'm typically a size 4, so I found the dress to be true to size. It was super comfortable and easy to dance in! The material was perfect for a chilly, rainy October evening. I was slightly worried about the train initially, but I hardly noticed it all night. This dress definitely makes a statement. Extremely classy. Made me feel confident, sexy and beautiful. I got SO many compliments throughout the night. Cannot say enough great things about this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a black tie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress was wonderful. The wedding was in NYC at the end of February. The material of the dress was a little heavy, that being said when worn during the winter months, it was perfect. The dress fit true to size, and was perfect for a curvy body type! I got it in a "long" because I'm 6 feet tall so I wanted to make sure it was long enough with my heels, and it was perfect!
This dress fits like a glove. The material is slightly heavy, so it got a little warm throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit well and I received a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'0" and needed to buy sky high platform heels to make the dress work for me. I would recommend this dress for anyone 5'2" and up who is good with high heels. The bust was a bit tight for me and flattened my chest slightly. I wasn't able to wear a bra, but it worked fine. The material is very heavy and not very breatheable, but the weight helped the dress hang nicely.

links_reviews_title: When my original dress didn't fit they over nighted this gown and it was a dream come true.
links_reviews_text: For all the tall ladies with a booty this dress is for YOU!!! Perfect thick but stretchy fabric hugs every curve. I'm 5'9" and wore 4" heels and the front still skimmed the floor. Was easy to dance in and comfortable to sit in. This dress made me feel like a million dollars. Will rent again. My husband said he wished I could keep it :)

I wore this to my sorority formal. It was not my first pick but something happened with my other dress and I ended up going with this one. I LOVED IT. It was a little heavy for a spring event but it turned out ok! It really gives you a nice shape because of the black on the sides! I'm so happy I ended up wearing this one:)

links_reviews_title: An amazing fit, comfortable, and classy!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my sorority's formal (that explains the kite pictures). The fit was perfect. I have a big butt and boobs, so I get nervous about form-fitting dresses because they're usually too tight in those places and too loose in the stomach. The fit of this dress is perfect for anyone with an hourglass shape, as the material is the perfect amount of stretchy and structured. I got so many compliments on how this dress looked on me and my boyfriend loved it! The only complaints I have about this dress is that I couldn't wear a bra with it because it was tight but the material was thick enough that no one could really tell, and the dress was very plain. At first I wasn't too excited about it because of the lack of details, but after I added a necklace and did my hair I was more satisfied.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Very comfortable . Heavier fabric great because it was cold outside.
links_reviews_text: Wore it a Mardi Gras ball in New Orleans. Great dress. Fit great. Paired a statement necklace with it for a bit of flair since it is a simple color block style.

links_reviews_title: This dress is just as gorgeous in person as in photos, tons of compliments all evening
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4R and 6R, I went with the 6, I'm 5'5 and with my tallest heels the regular was too short so I had to down size my heels! Wish I would have gotten a long for my back up dress to compare! Overall it is an amazing dress that I wish I owned! Made my night unforgettable!

links_reviews_title: A Stunningly Simple and Sexy Dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is simple, classic, and sexy. It's perfect for a formal event that's not too flashy, but yet the dress makes a statement because of its interesting lines and figure flattering silhouette. I ordered a 2R as a backup size and opted to wear this instead of the 4R. The material is heavy and everything was held in place, and because I'm on the shorter side, the 2R hit right at the floor and was perfect. I highly recommend this dress.

The dress is very form fitting, but hugged my curves in the just the right way. It was a bit snug in the bust area for me (DD cup size), but manageable (I ended up wearing a minimizing racerback bra) The length was perfect with the 3.5 inch heels I wore. This being my first RTR rental, and a backup option, I was nervous, but was extremely happy with the outcome. I received many compliments on this gown

This dress was a definite success. This definitely flatters your curves. It does run a size too small so even though I normally wear a 4 I needed to wear the 6. I received nothing but compliments on this dress. I would highly recommend it.

I wore this dress to my sorority formal, and I absolutely loved it! It was not my first choice, but due to a mixup with a different dress I received this one...and I am so glad I did! The lack of reviews and comments should not turn you away from renting this beautiful gown! The overall fit was very fitted and tight, but in a good way! I am 5'10" 34D and wore the 6L while wearing about 2.5 inch heels. Throughout the night and the next couple of days people complimented how great I looked in the dress! I definitely recommend it!!

I loved this dress! It for perfectly to my body type and is very comfortable and easy to move in. It's not heavy, so it's a great dress to have on all night! The only thing that bothered me was the high collar rubbed my neck a little bit, but not a big deal! Over all awesome dress

links_reviews_title: The dress arrived on time and fit me like a glove!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so nicely and was very slimming. The purple is a beautiful color and the fabric really pulls you in. It is very form fitting but I had no problem dancing the night away at our friends wedding! I am 5'5" and the regular was the perfect length.

The dress runs true to size. I can be between a 2 and a 4, I stuck with the 4 because it is a snug dress, so if you're debating, go the size larger. The material was nice because it was thicker so it was still warm enough for a winter dress and it laid nicely. I received a ton of compliments on it!

Gorgeous dress. Really nice material and very flattering. Definitely accentuated my curves and I felt sexy without it being revealing. The dress was a little long, but I wore about 4 1/2 inch heels and that made it the perfect length. Highly recommend!

This dress fit me like a glove. My RTR rental was damaged, so RTR asked me for a top 5 list of dresses I would be willing to rent instead. This dress was on my list and I am so glad they chose it because it was PERFECT. I received SO many compliments and I felt fantastic. The fabric is really high quality and the shape is really flattering. My only complaint is that it was a bit difficult to walk up stairs. The length was perfect with high heels, so it may be too long for anyone under 5'6. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn stunning dress!!!
links_reviews_text: #glamorous. Due to the form fitting shape I needed the next size up and it was unavailable. Wish I could have worn. Fabulous cut and fabric.
It did not fit well thru the hips - and another dress was a better fit.
I wish I got photos of this dress. I loved it. Fit like a glove and so flattering and slimming. Considering purchasing. Only con is the fabric looks a bit faded. Was not an issue for my event.
Material didn't feel good, not to mention the cut and fit were off. Seemed like the mid-seam needed to be much higher. I did not end up wearing the dress.

I got this dress in XS and I was SWIMMING in it. This dress is definitely not good for petites, and I would suggest going down two sizes on this one. I was super sad cause I think it would have been a really cute, fun dress if it had fit properly.

links_reviews_title: A fun Desk to Drinks option!
links_reviews_text: Really cool print, fun skirt, asymmetrical hem, adjustable neckline, it's a win!
Compliments on the pattern. However this dress runs extremely big. Absolutely size down.

Fit well, loose fit around the waist which is camoflauged by the print. The neckline is adjustable due to the tie so you can make it low cut or not, depending on your mood. I opted for the work appropriate option. The hemline is work appropriate on one side, but quite short on the other. I wore it anyway and didn't get fired. ;-) I actually wore it with a white sweater in the office, but wanted the pictures to show the fit of the dress.
I wore this dress for swing dancing. It has a great twirl!
I read the reviews about this running large so I ordered an XS, but it was still huge. I usually wear a size 4 ...
Fit was perfect.

I wore this with a leather jacket and sneakers to run around NYC for meetings (I work in a creative industry), and with espadrilles on Memorial Day Weekend in DC. This dress was perfect for both. The XL was pretty loose on me, but it was still flattering with the cut and the asymmetrical skirt.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work. Not wild about it.
links_reviews_text: Fits well but way too big. I was swimming in an xs.

links_reviews_title: It's a perfect spring dress with the soft fabric~
links_reviews_text: Definitely size down, it was very flowy & comfortable - It ended up being too wide, so I didn't wear it out.

Wore this to my work holiday party. Almost wore the 8, but at the last minute went with the 6 because the lace on my upper back looked better and it held the back of my strapless bra in place. Received a bunch of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! And very comfortable. I had tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: I'm a 34A and it fit perfect ( with no bra) which I was thrilled because Usually it's hard to find something to fit my top half. I'm just not sure how it would fit a B,C,D size
#wedding

links_reviews_title: Great dress. A little more than a little black dress
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Unfortunately the fit wasn't the best. The lace was too low cut. It was a challenge to find a bra low enough cut with support.
The dress was amazing! Fit great and love the back. Will definitely RTR again!
I have a small chest so i felt the top was a little bigger than i would have liked.. otherwise the dress fit like a glove. It was very comfortable and easy to dance and sit in.

links_reviews_title: It was a great night wearing a great dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great! I loved it and got alot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Having worn such a beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect. It was so comfortable, and it was super elegant. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The dress in snug around the rib cage but kinda baggy in the butt.
links_reviews_text: The lace around the neckline does not lay flat.
Loved the dress but the top ran big- I'm a d/dd and it swam on me. Otherwise it was great but everyone seems to notice the back! Looks black in pix but def navy blue. Loved it.

This dress was perfect for the wedding I attended! I was worried that the length might be a tad too long on me, but when I tried it on, it was just right. I received several compliments on it as well!
Perfect for a gala. The back was beautiful and it received tons of compliments. Mostly true to size

This dress was very nice to wear to a fall wedding. The lace detail was pretty and I did not need much jewelry. Giving this 4 stars because the top of the dress seemed a bit stretched out. At 5'9", I loved the length of this dress! Appropriate without being frumpy

Dress was lovely and I received several compliments. Fit was very true to size. The lace was beautiful and made for a very cute keyhole back. The only negative I'd give it was the bust is a bit loose. I'm 5'5" and a solid C bust. I had to break out a push up bra to fill this out completely. No small feat considering the back of the dress. I don't think it's an initial issue with the dress. I think it is getting stretched out from wear. Otherwise very flattering cut and true to size.

links_reviews_title: Waist-cinching + open back. Classy and sexy at the same time!
links_reviews_text: The dress I received had some definite wear to it. The back clasps had snagged on the lace at one point and it was definitely used. The silhouette was lovely: it emphasized a little waist and gave good coverage to my chest. The neckline was more of a boat on me and that, with the open back, showed the right amount of the skin to keep it sexy.
The dress was a bit tight in the shoulders and back but it worked. The lace and color is beautiful and I received lots of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: This is my 2nd time renting "this" dress!
links_reviews_text: Confession - I rented this dress in white for my own rehearsal dinner last year and LOVED it. Gorgeous dress with delicate lace details, great length for any event, but very pretty and feminine with the cut out back detail. So when I attended a friend's rehearsal dinner, decided to rent it in navy! And so glad I did. Would highly recommend for any event.

links_reviews_title: Elegant dress to wear for a wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! It was sleek, elegant and sexy with opening in the back. The navy color is perfect for a fall/winter wedding.
Fit great and got tons of compliments. I used an adhesive bra and had no issues. My only complaint was that the liner was pulling past the lace on the bottom so I felt like I had to adjust.
I wore this to a holiday party, got so many compliments! The open back makes it sexy, but the lace detail on the front makes it very classy as well. Just an absolutely gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: Winning national awards made this event unforgettable.
links_reviews_text: The dress was high quality and made me feel comfortable and confident.

links_reviews_title: Being able to wear something different and elegant.
links_reviews_text: The only downfall for me was the top was not small enough for me to go without a bra. The size 6 fit better on the top but was too tight around the hips. The dress was very comfortable.

Super cute and elegant, sexy dress, perfect for a outdoor wedding. The fit was perfect hugged all curves in just the right places. I received a lot of compliments! The cut out back revealed just enough skin to keep it classy and sexy!

links_reviews_title: I was looking for a dress appropriate for both a church ceremony and reception, this was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit just right. I got several compliments on this dress, everyone loved it!

links_reviews_title: Gave me such a great shape!!
links_reviews_text: LOVED THIS DRESS SO MUCH!! I rented it for my best friend's rehearsal dinner and felt so great in it!! It has bones throughout to hold you in and give you shape, and the best part was I didn't need to wear a bra!! It felt super sophisticated and sexy and came down just below the knee. Loved this dress- wish I owned it!!

Fit perfect ! My only comment is that I'd definitely buy a backless style bra! I wore a strapless which was fine standing up but the back would shift down when I sat and expose the back of the bra. Other than that it was very comfortable and had some stretch. Easy to dance in and perfect for a wedding!
this dress was so easy to wear - comfortable and classy at the same time. paired it with nude heels and a quick updo. loved it, would rent it again in a heartbeat!

I am a very muscular, curvy size 6 and am always hesitant on wearing a dress as fitted as this one. But I must say, this dress fit like a glove. The details of the lace and the fit was perfect for a evening wedding. I received so many complements on this dress! Due to the opening on the back you may want to purchase a strapless, backless pushup bra but honestly if you are a smaller breast size you could go without.
This dress was beautiful! It was a little tight in the rib cage, but it fit my post-party belly nicely.
Nice dress. Wore a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit great and I received a lot of compliments! The open back details was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfect and looked great with nude heels! I recently gained some weight so the other reviews were very helpful in determining what size to order. I was worried about not being able to wear a bra with the open back but it worked out and the dress supported well without one. It did seem a little “well worn” around the edges but still worked out great. The whole process was super easy and worth it!

links_reviews_title: Great fit - perfect for wedding guest attire!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I'm usually a 6, and the 6 fit perfectly. Was slimming, hit in all the right places and was conservative enough that I could wear to a family wedding and still feel chic and glamorous. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: This was for a formal police dinner.
links_reviews_text: I went with the size 8 even though my backup size 10 was unavailable. It was a bit snug, but worked! I got a lot of compliments on the dress and it was the perfect color for this event (blue)!

Dress fit great and was beautiful! As others have said, the inner slip drops below the hemline frequently but it does not alter the overall look of the dress. I wasn't used to the knee length but it did mean I didn't have to worry about pulling it down or it being too short, which is a common concern for this short-torsoed/long-legged individual. Fabulous dress!

links_reviews_title: Fun, sexy cut dress. Unfortunately a little "saggy" in the bottom half.
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and perfect for my torso & up! I love the back cutout and the lace details were beautiful. Unfortunately, I am a shorter girl - 5'3'', and most dresses are made for much taller women. The dress hit a little long for my taste and just made my body look shorter, as well as losing its "form-fitting" style and just kinda swayed on the second half of my body haha. Overall, I was happy with how it looks, but will probably not wear again personally just because its not right for my body type.
Dress fit perfectly, lace at neckline was loose but overall was a great dress for a formal evening.
Fit great, i usually wear a 4 and i needed the smaller size in this. Got lots of compliments on it

Very pretty lace, but the dress was a touch boring to me for a date. I'd wear it for a work event. I felt like it didn't accentuate my waist because of my bigger hips. The back of the dress was by far my favorite part.

I loved this dress for a wedding I attended! The lace was really Pretty and the boning helped give my Apple bod a little more shape. I felt sexy and confident without feeling like I was too revealing. I couldn't wear a bra with it because you could see down the top through the lace but I didn't really need one with the structure of the dress. You could tell the dress has been worn some under the arms but nothing anyone not looking closely would notice. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Fits true to size. Very comfortable dress. I got alot of compliments. I am 5 ft tall and was worried the dress would be long but it was a nice length. Great dress!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a fun dinner party.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, especially since there aren't enough purple options on RTR :) Needed a strapless bra to wear it, and there was some extra room on top, which meant my bra was somewhat showing occasionaly, but I was ok with it. It was comfy, modern, and cute. I would rent it again. As others mention, the black band has no give.

The A line cut is particularly flattering and the side cutouts sit high enough on your rib cage that you won't have muffin top spilling out. The fabric was light and airy which was perfect for a rooftop birthday party. Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding in Hawaii and absolutely loved it! Fit is true to size. I did not wear a bra due to the cut.

I wore this for a work conference and received so many compliments. The waist is snug when sitting for long periods but I would definitely rent again. The cutouts are fun! The only thing this dress is missing is pockets.

This is a cute dress that can be worn for a variety of occasions. I wore it to a summer wedding and was really comfortable in it. I was worried that after sitting in the hot sun through the ceremony that the white part of the dress would show that I had been sweating, but it didn't! As other reviewers mentioned, the top was slightly on the looser side, but it wasn't too bad or noticeable for me. This was actually a last minute replacement rental after having to return my original dresses, but I've had my eye on it for awhile due to the fun print.
I wore this to my cousins wedding and I loved it so much I purchased it! The cut outs are well placed and the color is so pretty. Very flattering and can be worn with a standard strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Fun spring dress to wear to a wedding!
links_reviews_text: Others reviews I read about the top of this dress were correct that it's a little too loose and sticks out a bit on the sides, but I still really like it overall. The pattern is fun and the skirt is so flowy and comfortable. I could wear just a regular strapless bra with it and full underwear which was nice and kept me comfy all night long. Fair warning - the black middle band has no give (it's not elastic) so I had to wear the small so I could breathe. I like the black accent pieces though because made it easy to match a black clutch and black heels.
Perfect for any occasion . Can be dressy or casual and the comfort is amazing with a couple cute little side cutouts for some sexiness
So comfortable and cute! Works for almost any event.

links_reviews_title: Fun skirt length, but oddly cut top
links_reviews_text: The waist was very slim, which I have experienced with this brand before, so do size up for your backup. That said, the way the top is cut I have no idea who would actually fit it correctly. I do not have a large chest and had to wear a stick-on rather than a real bra, but it had extra fabric sticking out weird on both sides of the top. it's too bad since the cut outs are fun and the pattern / skirt is something different!

I wore this dress to a wedding and it was 100 degrees outside and I was cool! This dress is very comfortable! Please note the cut outs in the sides; they are adorable, but really impact the fit of the dress! I was unable to wear a strapless bra with this because you could see the bottom of the bra thru the top of the cutout. So I just went braless! And for me (and my 36DDs) that was a first! But the fabric is very nice and flowy and it fit perfectly so the tightness of the dress gave me some support! Great dress and I got many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and fun dress for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: I really liked the open sides of the dress and the way the top fit, it was fun to dance in and got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Didn't love it, didn't hate it.
links_reviews_text: This dress would be great without the cutouts. They are in a weird spot, especially the way they are cut. The black band also felt right when I sat down.

I rented this dress for my Masters graduation last weekend. I absolutely loved it! It fit great and I got tons of compliments. If I ever need a dress for a bridal/baby shower or a summer wedding, I'd definitely consider picking this one again!

links_reviews_title: The dress patterns and flow are beautiful
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful!! I felt great and so comfortable in it. However, I did have to make a few adjustments to make it work. The top originally fit very strange and baggy.

This dress was so cute and comfortable! The print is unique and the fit was forgiving. The cut outs added a little edge to an otherwise very classy style. The top is a little big so I do not recommend for very small chested women as it may be a little baggy. I sized down to compensate for this. Great material and overall fun and pretty dress!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress for dancing all night
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding. I liked this dress. It runs a bit tight in the top, so it probably wouldn't work if you are bigger chested. Was comfortable in this dress dancing all night. I'd rent this one again.
I wore this to 3 different events during my rental! I absolutely love the fit, design, length . . . the dress is one big WIN for me! :)

I really wish the black band in the middle was stretchy but it isn't. at all. The large size was fine and the medium was def way too tight. If you have a smaller waist then going to normal size would work fine. My waist is pretty boxy so it didn't fit all that great with the medium. Dress was very comfortable and pretty. The color on the website appears whiter than in real life, it is more tan than white. Wouldn't mind renting again.
Little gappy at side boob

links_reviews_title: Cute night time wedding with cute cut outs.
links_reviews_text: The middle band has zero give. I suppose I'm wider in the middle than most. Normally I'm size 6 and was pretty co fident the medium was going to work. To my surprise the Large was perfectly banded at the waist. Wish I had about 1/4 inch more to make it a little more comfy, but I made it work. Sticky bra is a must.

I have a small waist yet this dress still was pretty darn snug around the band. I was hoping it would hang a bit looser. Loved the neckline and loved how flowy the bottom was. If there was one size higher, I'd rent again for a bit looser fit. I normally don't have a problem with things being too tight around the waist, so that was a bit of a disappointment. Still photographed great though (also, it should be known that I was in austin eating tacos so maybe that's why it's so tight 😂) See more on insta of my unlimited subscription: @iamsarahwebb

Fit was odd. The black waist band had no stretch at all and that got uncomfortable after several hours, so size for your waist, not bust. I wore this to two baby showers on the same day and got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Worked out great for a photo shoot
links_reviews_text: This photo is the large, but actually the medium fit great too, this one was just a little more comfortable in the waist area although a bit baggier in the chest. I'm tall, so I liked the length. I wore it for a date night and a family photo shoot and loved it.

The dress is full coverage minus the cut outs- so you don't feel uncomfortable! I thought it was more flirty than sexy. Great length and a-line made it very spacious for my hips- meaning I could wear a size small when I'm a size 28 in pants.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a summer work dinner party and love it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a hot summer party outside. It was super light and airy! I had to try on several different bras to find one that was hidden but once I did it was fine. The side parts are skinnier then I thought they would be but show the perfect amount of skin. The length is a little long for my height but I wore high chunky black heels and felt beautiful! Lots of compliments!

Love the dress! The cutouts added a bit of fun. The dress is actually a cream color and not as white as the pictures look. My main complaint is at 5'2" the waist, cutouts and bust hit me at awkward/unflattering spots. I shortened the straps with black safety pins and it fit perfectly for me. Would recommend using a backless sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: A fun dress for a muddy VT wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding in VT. It wasn't as great as other dresses I've rented from RTR, but I will say its also the least expensive dress I've rented, so, you get what you pay for. The black waistband has ZERO stretch, so I would size yourself to that to prevent discomfort. It did mean it was a bit big on top (my measurements are 34A-25" waist-37" hip, and I went with Small). Up top there was definitely extra room/some slight gaping to the fabric, but a padded strapless bra probably would have solved that issue (I don't like padded bras, so I just went with pasties). The extra room on top also meant the cutouts were in no way cutting in to your mid section, which was really great and flattering, especially after eating wedding cake! Overall a really sweet dress, great color, nice hi-lo hem (which was perfect since this was an outdoor wedding that turned out to be VERY muddy!).

I wore this dress to a summer wedding in Long Island, NY. As previous reviewers mentioned it was a bit baggy in the chest area (by the cut outs especially) but overall I think runs pretty true to size. While it wasn't my favorite rtr purchase I definitely received several comments on the dress throughout the evening.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a wedding of two wonderful people!
links_reviews_text: Contrary to the look in my second picture, it is not wrinkly- no one told me I needed to pull it down slightly! ;) I loved this dress. Perfect for a wedding and reception because it's light and easy to move in. I'm 5'8" and weigh 140 and a small fit me well. I received many compliments- you need this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect blend of sexy and romantic
links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect mix of sexy and romantic. It was extremely comfortable but full of class. I loved it!

I rented this for a brunch wedding and it was perfect for this type of affair. It was true to size, although the band around the waist felt a little tight. That's the only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a daytime wine tasting in Charleston
links_reviews_text: Flattering and comfortable. Will rent again!
Loved everything about this dress, great fit and super unique

If you don't look good on peplum shirts you won't like this. Top was large and I am a 32D waist is not for girls with hips . Top was to baggy and the color is more of a yellow cream. I sent it back. Tall girl dress!
I loved this dress. It was very flirty and elegant at the same time. I loved the open sides. I used during a trip to Italy and it was perfect for a picture at the Trevi fountain.

Pros: I wore this for a wedding rehearsal dinner. We were moving around a lot and eating a lot and the dress was very comfortable. The pattern is trendy. I felt really pretty. Cons: The top was a little big for my small bust. I had to pin the top over my shoulder to eliminate the gap (so my bra wouldn't show).
#Easter
Despite side cutouts offers quite a bit of coverage and a classic feminine look.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but did not lay right when on.
links_reviews_text: May want to re-think this one if you are not tall and slender. Did not look right on my hourglass figure. Did not end up wearing it sadly.

I love the print! Soft silky fabric (no stretch) very good quality. I am not afraid of low necklines but I did have a hard time containing the girls in this dress. Next time I rent it, I may size up in Hope's for more coverage.

Wore this in St. Pete Beach, FL for my anniversary dinner. It was so form fitting and the perfect combination of sexy and classy. My husband likes it, it was comfortable, and the pattern was so fresh and fun. Very deep V and the chest had an odd fit that required a bit of fashion tape - but don't let that discourage you, it's an awesome dress!
Not flattering; too large under bust area (waist, etc), too small in bust, bridesmaids material. Okay for an everyday unlimited rent, but not great.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but too big in the bust. Alas.
links_reviews_text: A pretty dress that my bust just couldn't fill out. Darn.
So my favorite part of this dress is the way it was made. It tapers in at the waist and accentuates your curves. The neckline is low but I loved it. Overall a beautiful dress
Literally can be dressed up or down, I wore it to go surprise my husband for lunch in our first week of marriage and it didn't look of place at all in downtown Boston :)

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress unless you have a very large bust
links_reviews_text: This dress is extremely soft and it hugs all your curves. I think that it fits true to size if you have smaller hips and bust. I'm typically a 6/8 dress size (I'm 5'7 145lbs) and while it fit great in the hips and torso, my 34H bust was just too much. I suppose if it was something I was wearing to a nightclub opening it might work, but for this event it just wasn't going to happen. Extremely well made with a great cut, but I just couldn't do the deep plunge.

Absolutely one of my favorite rentals so far! I wore this to a bridal shower. The quality of this dress is impeccable. It feels expensive, and hugs you in the right places-but is still comfortable. You can wear it with a racer back/plunging bra but I ended up doing no bra because I didn't want as much cleavage. Even though I rent dresses so I don't have to wear anything twice, I'd probably rent this a second time.

Rented this for a girls day at the theater. I felt very pretty in it and loved the low bustline. It fit like a glove from my ribcage down, but the straps would have needed to be taken up a lot if this were a dress I owned as the top was a little baggy. I did not need a bra, the material was nice and thick, but fashion tape did NOT stick to it so I was on wardrobe malfunction alert all day. Overall nice, but not sure I'd rent again for the price. The zipper is damaged a few inches up from the bottom, but I was able to get it zipped luckily.

This dress was shipped as a backup selection when my original wasn't available. I was nervous about previous reviews stating how low cut it was, and they are absolutely spot on. If you are the slightest bit concerned with being too revealing, this dress isn't for you. With that being said, it is an absolutely stunning dress! The colors are beautiful for spring and summer time and the fit is very flattering. I did have to pin it to make it slightly less revealing, and used double sided tape to hold it in place. I was able to wear a regular bra and used something to convert the straps to a racer back look. I received a lot of compliments and was comfortable all night in it!!
Fitted very well, neckline was little low. I used double sided tape to be safe:)

I think this dress would be great with someone who had slimmer hips. For me, the waist and hips area was too tight and the bust didn't fit well - almost like I needed to have a longer torso. I'll try it a size up and consider updating the review.
Beautiful dress, fits like a glove! Super deep V and good for ladies w bigger bra sizes.
Very low cut. High quality fabric and beautiful print. Top is tight and hip area is more generous. Overall a wonderful fit.

Dress is very low cut! To unwed to either have super long torso or never slouch and use tape (what I did). Gorgeous fabric and print, absolutely beautiful. Very well made dress. I felt SO sexy and chic. Great for a night on the town!
Fit well and beatiful
I didn't wear the dress due to the plunging neckline. The fabric was thick & have a little stretch. The dress looks nicer with a fuller bust (34C, 120lbs, 5'3").

This dress is beautiful but unfortunately it's meant for a taller girl. If I could pin the straps it would have been ok, but they were too long which made the front pucker. It's a deep v already so when the front popped open, it was unwearable. So sad! Girls with longer torsos will probably be ok.
Too big in the hips
The fit of this dress is awful. It hugs your body like it should until it gets to the top. I rented a size 6 and am a D cup and it was HUGE on my chest. Disappointment.
This dress was beautiful and fit perfectly except for being a little loose in the bust. If I bent a certain way I would have flashed people but worth the risk because the shape and print was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress because it was too tight around my hip area.
links_reviews_text: I rented this Dress for a wedding but didn't end up wearing it because it was too tight on my butt/hips.

links_reviews_title: Not the best fit for large breasts
links_reviews_text: Too open of cleavage the rest of the dress fits hugs all the right places
The neckline was way too low, even though the dress did fit well
The dress was super cute. The only problem was the chest was huge!!! I ordered a size 8 for my hips but the chest was ginormous!
Very small, normally wear a 6 0r 8, could not zip up.

The top was too loose, I did not end up wearing this dress. Everything else fit great, and I would consider myself to have average/larger than average chest size, and my boobs were swimming in the top. It is a beautiful dress otherwise, but the reviews are honest, its very low cut.

I am not shy at all to show some cleavage but in this cas the V is so deep I was unable to wear the dress. The problem is almost more with the straps being too long than the V being too wide. That was the only downside to this dress otherwise it is gorgeous!!

I read reviews that the dress was low cut, but I have a long torso so I thought it might work. Unfortunately I was unable to wear it with a bra, and it was too low for my personal comfort. Beautiful dress though. I think you need a larger chest to carry it off if you don't mind some major Décolletage.

This dress is GORGEOUS in person. The pattern and the colors are so feminine but still modern. I loved the silhouette, which on me was straight without being super tight. I did have to pin the neckline a bit due to the incredibly low cut (I was wearing to a family party). I wish it had been cut slightly slimmer on the bottom half for a more flattering fit, but it worked just the same. Highly recommend this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Too small - going up two sizes
links_reviews_text: Absolutely stunning dress. Low cut as everyone has said but I'm determined to find a way to make it a little more modest for my daughter's graduation. I'm between 2 / 4 and I'm going to size up to the 6. The 2 was very tight.
Dress was beautiful runs small on the bottom. Did not wear will re-order larger size and try again
I'm all for a low cut dress that shows some cleavage, but this dress was borderline inappropriate. Didn't end up wearing it. The shoulder straps were also too long.

I was so disappointed. I couldn't get it down over my butt, and normally I am a solid size 10. This dress runs very small. The fabric is incredible, the print is gorgeous, but it was so little. Even up top, I wouldn't suggest this dress for somebody with large breasts

I am a generous DD and did feel a tad bit self conscious. The zipper is malfunctioning and needs to be replaced; however I made it work. I would not rent this again simply because of the cleavage factor, but I looked great in it
Very well made. Great dress. Low cut, I am a 34DD and so there was cleavage showing but I decided to wear it anyways... it was fun!

Everything about this dress felt pretty to me. It's constructed of beautiful quality fabric and the print is even prettier in person. The cut is exceptional. I felt like it had been tailored to me. I highly recommend it!

I love this dress, just not on me. It was very fitted throughout the waist and hips, but loose in the top on me -- which is the opposite of how dresses usually fit on me. It was also lower cut on me than I expected (as in I couldn't wear a standard bra with it because the middle part showed). On the right person this dress would be stunning though.

Let me say this dress is stunning and very well made. The dress does run smaller than normal which led to me not being able to wear it, but will rent again one size up. The front is much more low cut then it looks in the picture, so do not expect to wear to a family gathering. With that being said, since the dress is form fitting it holds the girls in.

links_reviews_title: Pretty floral pattern, runs small-- lots of cleavage!
links_reviews_text: Runs very small in the hips. I usually wear a 4 and size up to a 6. I could have sized up to an 8. The dress is VERY low cut-- more than just va va voom! I did not wear it because I was uncomfortable with the amount of cleavage. Very pretty dress, recommended to highlight a smaller chest!

links_reviews_title: I loved the shimmer of the dress and it's flattering shape! Perfect for a homecoming dress.
links_reviews_text: The one complaint I had read beforehand was that the straps could be big for those without large busts. I definitely found this to be true, however, it was nothing that some fashion tape/double-sided tape couldn't fix. The dress allowed me to dance around all night without worrying about anything falling or showing. The fabric was beautiful and high quality.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, for a Christmas occasion
links_reviews_text: The dress is nice, fits well. It has a deep V Neck which I found a bit loose to not wear a bra with. Ended up not wearing it because the color was too Christmas-y which is not what I was going for.
This dress was so out of my comfort zone but I'm so glad I chose it it's fun it's flirty and I got 1 million compliments. I didn't wear a bra with it just fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress-- great length, sexy v-neck, gorgeous color
links_reviews_text: So I am 8 weeks postpartum and needed a dress for my first wedding anniversary weekend getaway. That said, this dress runs small in the chest area. I ended up wearing the size 8 because it zipped over my PP boobs lol (typically a size 2 or 4). It fit wonderfully, and it was awesome to be able to look and feel good again. Got many compliments and considered buying it. I want to rent again!

links_reviews_title: It was my bestie’s wedding and I was the MOH. This dress allowed me to move around comfortably.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great but I’d suggest boob tape for those of us with smaller breast. It was cute with my strappy heels and my Kate Spade sneakers (a gift from the bride). I loved this dress and would highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that twinkled in the lights!
links_reviews_text: It fit so perfectly, I'm usually a 6 but i saw this can run a little larger and the 4 fit me perfectly. It looks beautiful when you twirl!
So many compliments! Just need a little fashion tape to keep the straps up. Super sexy and fun!
I wore this dress to Christmas Party. I got a ton of compliments. It is low, but it was perfect for what I was looking for!

Very sexy for a party , endes uo not wearing it. It was a little snug on the waist although if u size up it might be loose. Also You need a fashion tape for this to keep the straps from sliding off. But i would recommend.

This dress was truly amazing. I loved the color and subtle amount of shine on the fabric. I was complimented by literally every person I came in contact with. I would suggest some fashion tape because the top is quite low cut and I definitely flashed an old lady as a I was turning to say thank you for her compliments...woops. I would not recommend this cut for ladies with larger busts unless you don't mind a lot of it hanging out :-)

I loved this dress! I was wearing it for a family business party and forgot my fashion tape (a MUST if there is nothing underneath and your chest is smaller than a D). It was no big deal, I just added a black cami underneath and it worked out. I was able to dance in it and loved the way is swished around. The waist is really small, my waist is pretty small and it was tight..and then a little loose in the chest. Overall it was great -wish I owned this dress!

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night long, one of a kind in a sea of LBDs.
links_reviews_text: The straps did run slightly large but were comfortable and did not slide off. There is no padding in the top half so I used fashion tape to add padding in from one of my bras and it worked like a charm to get the shape and support I felt comfortable with. The dress shines from every angle and in all lighting. The quality is impeccable. Even though I have slimmer waist and larger chest than average, I thought the dress would be snugger but I still used a LOT of fashion tape to cover all possible wardrobe malfunctions. Overall, a great dress for my senior homecoming and was one of a kind.

It was cute for the occasion but I don't think I'll rent it again. It's superrrrr low cut so I had to use fashion tape to hold the dress in place. Might be better for bustier girls because the sleeves kept falling down. Other than that, it's a fun dress to dress in.

I think that this dress is made for people with slightly perkier boobs, never the less it photographed phenomenally. I really loved the fit of this dress, but my boobs were not as held up as I would have liked

This dress was absolutely beautiful!! I ordered it for my senior homecoming and could not have been happier! The way it shimmered in the light was stunning and the red wasn't too bright. My only complaint is that the straps were a little long, and I have a long torso. Wore it with a lace bralette to cover up a but more and it peeked out beautifully, would definetly recommend!

I rented this dress for a weekend in Vegas. It was so much fun, I didn’t want to take it off. Both the Size 0 and the Size 2 fit, but I went with the Size 0 so the top would be a bit more snug and have less chance of wardrobe malfunction. My husband loved the dress and found it hard to make eye contact with me all night. Will definitely rent this one again!

The pictures for this dress don't do it justice - the color is beautiful in person. I rented this dress for my company's Christmas party and got so many compliments! I'm 5'4" 140 lbs 34B and the dress fit nice and snug for a 10. My original size was an 8 but I'm glad I got a bigger backup because the dress fit very tight around the ribcage area like most reviews mention. The shoulder straps also kept falling since I sized up for the middle part. I used a lot of fashion tape and everything held in place! The length was perfect though and I'm very happy I wore this one to the party.

links_reviews_title: I’m on a quest to feel confident in my own skin again and this dress made me feel AMAZING!!!
links_reviews_text: The only complaint was the waist, it was soooo tight. However, I love that I didn’t have to wear a bra with it. Nothing popped out and everything stayed in place. The length was great too since I’m a little taller dressed tend to come a little short for my taste. I recieves so many compliments!!!!

links_reviews_title: It was such a festive color and I received a lot of compliments on this at my company holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Fit was good except you do need fashion tape on the shoulders and neckline. The dress was very flattering and the color was very festive. Just the right length for a company party. I would definitely rent this again.

I LOVED this dress. I originally rented a body-con dress for my event but after trying it on, I knew it wouldn't work. RTR kindly shipped me this dress instead and I was beyond pleased!!! It allows for all the eating and slouching in the world and no one will ever know because of the way this dress flows out. The metallic fabric is really eye catching and the length is perfect. #obsessed

I got so many compliments on this dress. I do have smaller boobs so I needed fabric tape to keep everything secure, but other than that it ran true to size! The color was perfect for fall and the occasion. I would definitely rent this again!!!

Rented this for my sister's bachelorette party. It was the right amount of flirty without being too scandalous. I did have to use double sided tape to keep the straps from falling down, but other than that it was very comfortable - perfect for a big dinner and dancing:)
Super pretty and something different for senior homecoming!! My only complaint is that the straps could've been a little tighter, but overall a great dress

links_reviews_title: Great for a formal, fall event!
links_reviews_text: This dress looked great and I felt very glam in it. I'd definitely recommend it for petite women. Like other reviews say, it runs small around the rib cage. I normally wear a 0 and ended up wearing my backup size 2. The 0 fit better in the chest, but I wanted to be comfortable for eating and dancing and the 0 made it a little hard to breathe. Because I went with the 2, the straps were a little loose and sometimes slipped off while dancing. Some fashion tape would have fixed the issue. The length was perfect for me - I'm 4'11" and it hit right above the knees. My only complaint is that the bottom looked a little raggedy. It was starting to fray and pill. I don't think it was noticeable unless you looked closely, but this particular dress might not have many more wears to it.

I absolutely loved this dress!! It fit so well, even though I'm didn't fill out the top as much as I hoped, it still looked great. I got so many compliments all night and the dress was so comfortable with such soft fabric!

links_reviews_title: It was a black tie optional event and this dress did a great job!
links_reviews_text: I would suggest going a size bigger than you think you need. Beautiful dress, lots of compliments!

This dress was perfect for a winter formal. I got several compliments on it. The waist band is very constricting but I found that helpful so I didn't have to worry about the deep v revealing too much. I thoroughly enjoyed my night in this dress and would rent it again!
I've rented a lot of Slate & Willow dresses and the 10 or 12 always fits. I couldn't even zip this up halfway! The fabric is beautiful and deep v would have been nice, but it was just too small.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, but is a little tight right under bust line if you have a larger bust like me. Nothing uncomfortable, it's just something you're aware of. Nice length - not too short, not too long. I have small shoulders and a short torso, so the straps were a bit long. Definitely lower cut in-person than it looks in the RTR photo, so keep that in mind!! Had to use double sided sticky tape to make sure my boobs and the straps stayed in place all night. No bra needed which is awesome! Overall, I got tons of compliments and the shimmery second layer of this dress made me stand out from everybody else there. It is so cute and made me feel pretty all night long!

This dress is really pretty and very comfortable. The only issue for me was keeping the straps on my shoulders. I didn't have fashion tape at the time, so I constantly had to pull the shoulders back to place. Otherwise, the dress and slip was comfortable, and I got compliments on the dress. I felt so pretty! :)

The material of this dress is AMAZING. It sparkles, it moves... Just gorgeous. A couple things: 1. It ran small. I normally wear an XS/0 and the 0 wouldn't even zip. The 2 was much better. 2. It was a tad bit low-cut, but not distasteful. It was hard to tell from some of the photos, but I felt like it covered my girls well and gave them some lift but didn't cross any sort of "tacky" line. I did not have to wear a bra, which was great. I wore it to my husband's Christmas party (a young startup), and I felt like it was completely appropriate. If you have a larger chest or are attending a very conservative event, this may not be the right dress. I was a big fan, though, and got lots of compliments. A perfect dress for a holiday cocktail.

links_reviews_title: The dress color was so amazing and it overall received so many compliments throughout the night.
links_reviews_text: It was a good fit, the only concerns I had were that it was tight around the ribs and the chest was too big. I put the 4 on and the ribs fit but everything else was huge. The chest was doable though, I used fashion tape to get it to stay on my chest (I am barely a B cup so that's of course why it was too big). It was overall a great dress, I got a ton of compliments and it was comfortable to dance in all night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work holiday party in NYC
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size Back straps were a little loose on me, so I used some fashion tape, problem solved. Zipper was sticky but I was able to get it up and down just fine. Dress was super comfy and beautiful - I had lots of random compliments from strangers, so that was fun!

links_reviews_title: Event was a new year's party themed "Ignite the Nite." The dress's red-gold shimmer was perfect!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was pretty much expected based on other review's thoughts-- there is absolutely no stretch in the dress, but the dress size I normally wear was good for this dress, too. The straps were a little loose, but I suspect how loose the straps are really depend on whether you have a chest to fill it out-- it's definitely not a dress for A or B bra sizes. I did use fashion tape to make sure everything stayed in place, and it was all good for the whole night-- got a lot of compliments and felt super confident in it :) (very low cut, which made me a little self-conscious, but it looked good-- definitely won't hide a bra, though). I ended up going with the same shoe style shown in the website photo, except gold, in order to emphasize the gold shimmer in the dress. Overall, absolutely loved it!!

Super cute dress. Fits right around rib cage so I had to size up. The top was a bit loose as a result do I had to wear fashion tape...very low cut and could not wear a bra... but it was a lovely dress.

I rented this dress for a work holiday party. The fit was true to size, I wore the 6 and had ordered the 8 as a backup. As the other reviews state, the dress definitely works best on someone with a bigger bust and wide shoulders as the straps can come loose. I wore this with a deep plunge strapless bra and had no issues. The lining underneath needed to be ironed on cool, as it was wrinkled from shipping and caused the dress to poof out in the hips. I would absolutely rent this again.

As a busty woman, I was very nervous this dress was too informal but I was pleasantly surprised. I received compliments on the dress all night and felt amazing! I would definitely rent it again, but would wear tape next time! Also, I did not wear a bra and was totally fine.

The dress was gorgeous, super pretty color, fun to dance in, too. It definitely is cut small at the waist with no give. Also, lots of tape! I went with the bigger size because of the right waist so then the straps were bigger...tape was a lifesaver.

I wore this dress to my boyfriends holiday work party and got so many compliments! Based on other peoples reviews, I would agree. It runs a bit large in the chest, which worked fine for me because I have a fuller chest for most people with my body type. It is also snug in the rib cage area, so be aware when choosing your size. Otherwise, it was perfect! The almost metallic material of the dress was perfect for the holiday party, and it was a very comfortable dress to wear for an extended period of time.
Dress fit perfectly. Went with the 8 because of my athletic build. Wore it to a Christmas ball and got so many compliments from everyone including total strangers.
Rented for a college formal. It's very youthful, which I loved. It runs true to size, but size up to the larger size that you normally go with

links_reviews_title: Rented for Party, But Worn To Dinner & Las Vegas Show
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a party in Las Vegas, and ended up wearing different dress. This dress looks cute, but it is really, really short. I couldn't have danced in this without my whole behind showing - heck I could barely walk without the walking motion kicking the dress up and showing my backside. My waist is 27.5 and the size 6 was tight at the waist. After dinner it was worse, but it did look nice on. Size up for sure!

Like most E&J dresses, this style ran on the smaller side-which is why I like this designer, since I'm so petite (my measurements are about 32/23/31) I wore a 0 and it fit like a glove (was slightly tight in the waist when sitting- but fit more comfortably without a bra). I'm just under 100lbs so finding dresses that fit right is often difficult. At 5'2 this dress hit about mid thigh for me, but with the flirty flare of the dress it felt a little shorter than that (wore Nike pros underneath for my own comfort). Beautiful deep teal color. Loved the subtle side cut outs. Received tons of compliments all night! Paired with a simple necklace, RTR's Jenny Packham's spring splendor earrings, & RTR's Loeffler Randall's pink envelope clutch.

links_reviews_title: This was actually my backup dress! Loved the neckline! I sized up from a 10 to a 12!
links_reviews_text: So comfy!

I sized up based on other reviews, and the fact that I didn't want the cutouts to look unflattering. I'm glad I did - I normally wear an 8, and ordered the 10 & 12. There wasn't that much of a difference between the two sizes, but I went with the 12 just so I would feel more comfortable and relaxed. It's a thick, quality material, and a great color for a fall wedding. I felt very confident in it!
The dress fit me perfectly, the material was super comfortable, and I got a lot of sweet comments on how people loved the color and style. Really great dress.

links_reviews_title: Slits in the side are super cute!
links_reviews_text: My best advice is size up! I've rented Elizabeth and James before and wore a size 0 but in this dress I had to wear the 4! I'm so glad I considered all of the reviews instead of assuming I'd also be a 0 in this dress too. The dress is comfy and you can wear a regular bra! I also really liked the color.

I ordered this dress for my daughters homecoming dance. It fit perfectly and the openings on the sides gave extra flare. She's tall so she had to make sure to bend appropriately but other than that it was perfect!

This dress fit like a glove! The cut outs were sexy and the teal color was gorgeous. I loved that I didn't have to wear a bra, I just wore pasties. It was super fun to dance in. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Vegas party dress. Size up!!!!!! Good dress to hide pear shape!!!
links_reviews_text: I sized up from my normal 6 to an 8 in dresses for this one because of all of the reviews. Glad I did! The 8 was tight in the chest and I’m a size A!! The fabric is thick and the length is great. I’m 5’9” so I have a hard time sitting in short dresses and keeping my bum covered. Ha. The cutouts are cute but if you bend over you may get a little fat popping out. Didn’t bother me. The hem was starting to fall apart in one spots but no one noticed.
I thought this dress was so comfortable and cute! It fit me well and was the perfect dress to do a lot of walking and moving, but still look formal enough for a day time event. Cute!

links_reviews_title: The hubs loved the cut outs!
links_reviews_text: Great dress/ a bit short but hey rock it anyway!!

My daughter wore this to her 8th grade formal. Super easy and super cheap and looked great. It was smaller than expected and she had to squeeze into the bigger back up dress but overall very enjoyable.

I wore this for an outdoor wedding and it was perfect. It was light enough that I wasn't hot but thick enough I didn't need a bra. It was a little short in the back so I couldn't really bend down but I got lots of compliments and really loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly, was a good length and color. Quality fabric without being too heavy.
links_reviews_text: Fit well without making the cutout parts look as if it was too tight

I got so many compliments on this dress! It definitely runs small, so make sure that you get the back-up size one size up (especially with the slits in the side)! The color is a nice green that is perfect for warm weather, and the dress can be worn without a bra. The material is a bit heavy, but not too hot for summer! I wish I owned this dress

Love the shape of the dress! Fun and flirty, short but not TOO short for a wedding. I've rented E&J before (with cutouts) and I did feel like the cutouts were in unflattering places as compared to other dresses. Also runs way small - I normally wear a 2 or a 4 and a 6 fit just right! Overall lots of compliments and a great rental.

I was really happy with this dress, perfect for a summer wedding. Like other reviewers, the cutouts fit very tight and made my skin bulge a little- and a lot while sitting. Also, the hem was slightly unfolded but it wasn't too noticeable. Overall I loved the dress and would recommend. I rented the necklace as well.

links_reviews_title: Aces at Opening Day at the Races
links_reviews_text: Love this Fit. Very comfortable! The color is a bit darker in person than it appears in the picture.

links_reviews_title: LOVED the dress.. got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Def. runs small especially with the cutouts.. I'm originally a 4 and thank goodness I got a size up to a 6. I think I would even had been more comfortable in a 8. The cut outs kind of cut into your side and it appears that you are bigger than what you are. It is also REALLY short, I had to be careful when I bent over because you could see it all... all in all such a great dress though. 5'5 128lbs 34DDD
Rented this for my daughters homecoming. It was gorgeous on her! Advice is to go one size up as the cut out areas are not forgiving for anyone larger than the Olsen twins!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my 25th birthday and couldn't ask for anything more in a party dress. Ended up having to use backup size 2 as 0 was a little tight; after sizing-up though, it was comfortable enough to dance and dance until the clubs closed, and still flexible enough to chow down on tacos afterward! Many compliments and made my evening all the more unforgettable. (Necklace & earrings also from RTR)

I go between a 2 and 4 in dresses. With this dress I went with a 4 because the zipper sticks and the cut outs would not be flattering if the dress is too tight. Plenty of compliments all night! Perfect for a casual wedding rehearsal.

My daughter wore this to a homecoming dance. She's 5'5, 120, 32D. Wore 6. We went with the size up as it was a tight fit. She absolutely loved it tho!!! Perfect for a 15.5 year old. She felt beautiful while not trying to look older than she is.
i wore this to a florida fall wedding. absolutely loved it! the twirl factor was perfect & it was so flattering. i was able to dance & have an awesome time in this adorable dress!

Runs small and the hem was wonky BUT I wore it anyway! I loved the color and the way the dress flared out. The material is thick and a bra was not needed. I'm normally a zero or a double zero, but the zero didn't fit and thank God I had the back up of size 2.
It was ok the 6 was not available since even the 8 was tight at the waist. Dress has fun movement. Loved the high neckline but, depending on how I sat, the side cutouts weren't always flattering.

links_reviews_title: I was worried about the peekaboo sides but I LOVED them! Such a beautiful color too!
links_reviews_text: The dress does run small. I got a size 6 and I'm glad I got a back up size 8 or I wouldn't have been able to wear it. It fits tight in the stomach section.
Fit perfectly. The cut outs were a little tight so I bulged through it when I was sitting but other than that it was perfect! So many compliments.

I rented this dress as my free birthday dress for being an RTR pro member. The color is beautiful in person, and I loved the side cut outs. The top is fitted, so maybe go a size up for your 2nd size as you could spill out of the side cut outs which would not be flattering. I'm a 34 D so I did have to go up a size due to the fitted top of the dress. I would rent this dress again.
Super cute dress. Love the fabric. Normally wear the zero but had to wear the 2 this time. I'm 5'6" and this wasn't too short.
Awesome I loved it

I love Elizabeth And James dresses, and this one did not disappointed. Rented this for a backyard wedding, and I think it fit perfectly. I've never worn a dress with cutouts before, but these were cutouts were just the right size, and didn't feel inappropriate at all. This dress was the perfect length on me, but I'm quite short, so watch out if you're taller!

The color, the details, the fit- I absolutely love this dress and would rent again. I received so many compliments, I would even buy it! Perfect dress for a cocktail party! I wore with block tan heels.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Beautiful bold solid color and is easy to accessorize. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It is so flattering because it is snug in all the right places and flares out for a beautiful silhouette line. I felt great in it! It's a gorgeous color and the cutouts are trendy but not too revealing. The size 2 and 4 were pretty close but I felt the 4 was a little too long. The only issue I had was that the hemline folded over in one spot and hung down a bit lower so I had to keep trying to fold it back a few times. (Maybe ironing it would have helped it stay.)

links_reviews_title: So thankful we found this dress on RTR!!
links_reviews_text: We rented this dress for my daughter's 8th grade dance. We had been to every mall, store and online site until it dawned on me to go to RTR. We got this dress for a fraction of the cost if we had bought one and it arrived on time (actually a day early) which was great so she could try it on and with all the accessories and shoes before the big night. The color is stunning! She got so many compliments on it. I was concerned about the side cut outs but they were very tasteful and not too flashy at all. Even her father approved!! ;) We had to go out of town the next day, so I just brought the package with me and found the nearest UPS, walked in and the guy immediately took it from me and I was on my way!! The process couldn't have been easier or more seamless!! I will never forget this option ever again in the future when looking for the perfect dress for future events. One side note - the dress runs extremely small! My daughter normally wears and size 2 and the size 4 was snug, but she got away with it. She probably could have worn a size 6. Regardless we were VERY satisfied with our selection and the whole process in general. Thank you RTR!!!! -A Relieved and Extremely Satisfied Mother

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my little brother's high school graduation and the dress was stunning! :)
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I normally wear a 0 or 00 petite. This dress ran a bit small and so I wore a size 2. It fit perfectly! The only down side was when I was sitting down it was a little snug in the waist, specifically where the cut out part were located. So I was slightly uncomfortable during those times. The dress was very well made, and the color was beautiful :) I would highly recommend this dress, but I would definitely order a size up!

Loved this dress but much more green than in the model photo - honestly the 4 and 6 didn't feel that much different in the waist near the cutouts, but the 4 was tighter on top so I wore the 6. I suggest a strapless bra as well. Overall, great rental!
Fits true to size. I ended up wearing a size up only because I didn't want my love handles to squeeze out of the peep holes. Received so many compliments. I loved dancing in this dress! #wedding

I wore this for a bachelorette party - it was cute. The cut-outs were fun but very tight in the midsection so it kind of looked like flesh was bubbling out - minus points. No bra needed for me. Nice thick material.
I loved this dress and will rent again. It was the perfect balance of flirty with the lace trim but also classy.
Comfortable, flattering, sexy neckline

links_reviews_title: The dress fit beautifully and I got compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: This fit well, and true to size. Including the sleeves since I have athletic arms. It was perfect for the occasion. The only unexpected thing is you can’t wear a regular bra with this, the straps show in the back. So have a good strapless on hand.

I am between a size 0 and a size 2. I rented both sizes and ended up wearing the size 0. IMO, size down if you are between sizes. This dress is a great length if you are anywhere around 5'5". I loved the lace. The material is thin. It shows everything. I am NOT busty but this dress really accentuated that area. If you do not want to show cleavage, do not rent this dress. It was a good choice for me and I loved it but do note the material does not help hide anything and your chest will be on display.

Overall the dress fit well. The length was perfect! It was fitted enough where I didn't have to wear a Spanx and didn't emphasize my belly. The only thing I didn't like was the lace wouldn't lay flat. Otherwise great dress! Super comfortable to dance in!
Fits true to size. I wear an 8 normally and wore an 8. Complimented all night long.
Beautiful, flattering and subtlety sexy. The dress was comfortable and looked great. Wish I got more pictures in it. Just waiting for another event to rent again !

Overall really liked this dress! Arms were a little snug, no give because of the lace. Good length, but did have to keep adjusting the chest area and pulling down the dress. FYI - A normal bra may poke out the top, need a bra with smaller cups.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, wish it was a bit longer (I am tall though!)
links_reviews_text: Very revealing in the chest area, so if you’re busty be prepared (I am not so it didn’t feel too showy for a gala event). Shorter, but I am 5’10”... sonif you’re tall be prepared for the dress to be 5” above knee.
Picked this up last minute for an event. Totally in love with it! I will 100% rent again. Nice thick material, very smart and unique! Good length (im 5'4)

What a perfect dress. So flattering and unique in every way. Regarding sizing: I am 5'3" 125lb, 34D athletic build. I rented a 4 and a 6 and ended up wearing the 4 because the 6 was far too large in the bust. I felt pretty snug in the mid section with the 4, but it worked out fine.

I wore this dress for a NYE wedding reception and it was perfect for the occasion. I was able to dance comfortably and received several compliments. I am 5'8" and 145 lbs with an athletic build. I wore the size 6 and it fit perfectly.

I rented for a girls trip to tuscany and wore this on our fancy night out. It's a perfect stretch and so forgiving from the waistline to hips. It contoured my bum without looking too 'kardashian'. The length is modest for the leg conscious but the lace makes it fun and flirty. The top is quite lower than expected and finding a bra that doesn't show is tough. I opted for a very thin black lace bra so if it showed it looked like part of the dress. Same goes for the back. The opening is just low enough to show minimal bra band so I would suggest nubra or a low back. Over all I'm in love with this perfect dress. Also to note: the customer service at rtr is seriously unbeatable.

This dress is awesome! It's sexy, but the long sleeves and high neck make it appropriate for a more conservative occasion. The fabric has a nice weight to it, so it works well for fall and winter events. The only downside of this dress is that I couldn't raise my arms higher than my shoulders because the lace sleeves confined my movements. For this reason, I'd say not to rent it for a wedding or any other event where you'll be dancing.
Perfect fit. The only issue which may be because it was never worn was the button in the back. It was very tight to do and undo. Other than that I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Very cute step up from basic black dress
links_reviews_text: The dress ran big and was definitely not made for my petite frame. Loved the style and lace detail at the top and bottom! Glad I had a few others to choose from.

This dress is so beautiful, I have a pouch unfortunately it's just the way my body is built but the material and the fit was perfect to hide that bump. It was low cut enough to be sexy but I think it covered enough to be classy too...overall one of my favorite dresses from this site to date. I am 5'3 with an 32B and athletic build.
