Very flattering without being exposed or worrying about anything falling out. Lots of compliments! Would rent again. It was hard to give back! Great for curves.
too Depressing. Nice cleavage with the top of it but the waist was too big and overall looked better for a tad older age group than i wanted p
My 3rd dress I've rented and another success. It fit perfectly and I received many compliments like the other two.
This runs small, in my opinion. Very tight on the stomach and chest. unfortunately, I didn't get to wear this one/

I am 35, and I felt like I was going on at least 45 in this dress. I ordered this for a formal event, but between the neck and sleeves and lace hemline, I just felt like this dress aged me 10 years. Not for me, but could work for someone else.
Perfect for work Christmas party!

links_reviews_title: Dress was really pretty , couldn’t wear it.
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress , but is ran small through the chest area . I wasn’t able to wear it , was just too tight . I normally wear a 10 , and I could barely get it zipped . The size 12 wasn’t available and I’ve worn a 12 so I didn’t think that it would be a problem.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was small overall and the dress quality was subpar. Not impressed.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress snug under the arms
links_reviews_text: Love this dress going to size up one size and see if underarms are better. Just hoping it's not too big everywhere else

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress, just ordered too small
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful, but because of the cut around the bust I would need to order a size up

links_reviews_title: I looked like I stepped out of a fashion magazine. Loved the dress, it was all me!!!!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 but the 8 was a more comfortable fit.
I loved how it showed off my curves. The lace details are gorgeous.
It showed to much cleavage. I did not like the material. A larger size may have been better. I am just not impressed with it enough on me to try it again.

links_reviews_title: We went out for a small dinner party with friends for our anniversary.
links_reviews_text: I was skeptical when I realized how much décolletage this dress would display, but it wasn't actually low cut. The lace isn't scratchy, which is usually a problem. I received lots of compliments and would rent it again.

I wore this to my engagement party. I'm normally a 4 or a 6 but those sizes were unavailable. I managed to wriggle into a size 0 and got more compliments than I ever have in my life. It's got some give in the waist, so if you're wider-hipped but narrow-waisted it'll fit like a glove and flatter the hell out of you.
Fit like a glove and frames cleavage.
The dress was very nice. It was too big for me. However, i run between a 4 & 6.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a formal wedding! It was such a unique dress. Recieved many compliments!
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: This dress is supr beautiful. Its super sexy yet classy
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a christmas party and the dress was fabulous. It looked amazing and received any compliments. The chest and back details were sexy but refined. Would love to rent this again
I loved this dress so much I rented it twice! One for a photo shoot and another for an evening affair.
Simply loved it!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear due to fit issues
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress, but the fit was overall just not right. Although it seemed to fit everywhere, it bunched up creating an odd bulge in the stomach area. Also, the arms were quite tight, so would be difficult to dance in at a wedding. Definitely disappointing about the fit issues since it could be a beautiful dress!
I absolutely loved this dress, but was so disappointed that it did not fit in the bust. The hips and waist were perfect, but my 36DDD's were smashed. I wasn't able to wear it.
Billowy, made me feel a bit wide, but not very different than photos.
I looked like a circus tent. I am 28 weeks pregnant, still have a fairly small bump and this made me look enormous. Didn't wear!

Like the other dress by this designer that I tried I am wondering if they have every actually seen a pregnant lady? This is more like a tent, with an awkward waistline... no size would have helped. It was not wearable for me at 30 weeks at all.
Rented this for a luncheon. The color and fabric is great. The cut is extremely unflattering. The small made me look gigantic from the side, even my husband said it was a definite no-go.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wear this dress to a fundraising gala. It was perfect for the event! I felt beautiful in this dress, it was very slimming! It does fit true to size, maybe a little snug. It does not have give or stretch. It you have hips it will be difficult to put on because it does have any slits at the bottom. I would order one size up from my true size next time. Even though it was snug, I was super comfortable the whole night and would wear this dress again.

links_reviews_title: The interesting lines made this LBD special.
links_reviews_text: Refreshing to be able to go braless and wear a dress that does not highlight my uncomfortably large chest.

I rented this dress for a wedding - a wedding that didn't tell us too much about the dress code or the "feel" of the party. So, you can't really go wrong with a black dress. The asymmetrical top and bottom (which isn't captured in this photo) are flattering designs, but the fit is pretty tight, with a little bit of stretch in the body. The overall feel of the dress was comfortable, and despite my size being a 4 in most dresses, the 2 fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I felt pretty in my RTR dress!
links_reviews_text: Pros: In this particular style of dress it ran true to size. Because the material & style "hugged" make sure to be sure of your size & know there is NO room to play. Otherwise I was complimented on the style & fit. Cons: The zipper was difficult to work with. Not sure if it was due to wear & tear but would get stuck.

First experience with RTR - loved it! I'm often a size 2, however the hug in the bust area moved me to wear the alternate size 4, which fit wonderfully! The silhouette of this dress is elegant and feels alluring. I enjoyed the length and interesting asymmetrical angles. I received several compliments at the event!

links_reviews_title: Sexy. Sleek. A great little black dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR dress. I felt sexy and classy. It was a little tight zipping up through the ribs but fit great. I'm hooked to RTR!

links_reviews_title: Loved the angles on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Not much stretch in the material. It was a snug fit, but just right

links_reviews_title: Dancing, drinks, and desserts with some of our favorite people.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress to wear. I would definitely rent this dress again. The side zipper seemed a bit fragile.
This dress fits like a glove! I wore it to a restaurant for our anniversary dinner it was just the right amount of sexy.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very firm fitting and flattering. I've rented it again for a wedding next weekend!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is nice and has some give. I am not used to showing skin at the waist so I was worried about the sheer panel at the waist with my 'foundation garments' so I wore black spanx and the panel just disappears. Beautiful and sexy dress with lots of coverage. Great for curvy girls!

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and classy! So many compliments on the dress and how great I looked in it
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR dress! I had a great experience! Loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Curve-hugging sex appeal, but classy enough for a wedding. Great for hourglass gals!
links_reviews_text: Copied the RTR model's look and paired this with the Kenneth Jay Lane Polished Crystal Drop Earrings and Polished Crystal Ring. The look was perfect. The top covered enough, and a conservative enough length for a wedding- but it still hugged my curves in all the right places. SUPER flattering cut. I am a DDD, and didn't have to wear a bra. The material has a little give, which is good, because it JUST fit. I am a size 12, so that's why I put "true to size", but if you've had a big weekend of partying and eating I would recommend sizing up just for a little more room. The backup size 10 did not fit me. Comfortable to wear dancing all night! Would rent this LBD again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my master's graduation ceremony and then to a nice dinner at the Signature Room
links_reviews_text: I got both a size 6 and 8, and ended up going with the bigger size simply for comfort reasons. The dress was classy and elegant, but still sexy. Perfect LBD.

This dress used angles to define each are of interest. It calls attention to the neckline with the angular drape. The waistline has a sexy cutout covered in chiffon. The legs scream for attention in this dress as the lower angle exploits the sexiness of the legs. Show off your assets in this sexy demure number.

First time to use RTR and was so glad I did. I usually wear a 6 or 8 dress but the bottom was a little snug in the 6. The 8 fit perfectly. If you're a pear, like me, go with the bottom size. The top drapes beautifully and both the 6 and 8 fit at the top.

This fit like a glove in the 6, I am a 32F bra so that can be a challenge, but this didn't smoosh me in the least,I wore this to a Hollywood Awards ceremony and had many people comment on it, it's stylish, beautiful neckline and really comfortable, my first RTR experience was perfection and will be using again. If you need a dress that is elegant , rather than flashy, and has enough details to make it edgy and more interesting than a basic LBD then pick this one, I will rent it again no doubt.

This dress is sophisticated with a dash of sexy with the asymmetry and mesh cut out. I was really nervous that the dress wouldn't zip but it did and it actually fit really nicely. It was a little tight but that's because I usually wear a size up to be comfortable. It was nicely tight though because it kind of pushed everything in. The big thing was that I needed to be able to sit since I was at a work awards ceremony. The necklace and earrings were also from RTR! I would rent again for sure, especially after I lose a bit more weight.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I received tons of compliments on it and felt pretty glamorous.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Looked great and I received many compliments
links_reviews_text: I had this dress delivered to my hotel and wore this dress to a business party in Las Vegas. The dress fit perfectly and the fabric is durable enough so there is no need to wear shape-wear. I felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: not just the perfect LBD...but one with edge
links_reviews_text: I typically wear an 8 or 10 but find myself in a size 12 when wearing a more tailored dresses. The 10 fit but was just a bit too snug for my liking. The 12 still hugged my curves but gave me the room I needed to dance in and last all night. Loved the quality and feel of the fabric. This was a very well made dress. Wore it to my office holiday party and it was a perfect fit! Received several compliments too. Felt great wearing it.

links_reviews_title: This dress got rave reviews from everyone!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like it was made for me. I'm scouring the internet, right now, trying to find one that I can buy. It's elegant, incredibly comfortable, sexy but not "revealing." The asymmetrical neckline & hem make it stand out from your typical LBD. The crepe fabric has enough give that I didn't feel corseted, and the whole look just worked well. Highlighted my best features, minimized the features I usually worry about.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated LBD (killer fit for pear shaped women)
links_reviews_text: This is a *great* dress for pear shaped women. The design of the arms creates the illusion of a balanced top & bottom. The asymmetrical, sharp V-neckline is dramatic & sexy without being too revealing (excellent for professional as well as personal events). I wore a size 8 (didn't get another size in this dress, so can't compare the fit differences between sizes), and was lucky that the dress' waistline hit at my own, the curves over the hips and butt hit at the right places. [Since women's dress sizes vary, I'll give some additional measurements to help others decide what size to order: 14-1/2" collarbone to waist, 19" collarbone to top of hip, 26" collarbone to widest part of thigh, 28" around waist, 35" around widest part of belly, 36-1/2" around at hips, 39-1/2" around both legs at widest part of thigh.] The dress was fitted, but not sausage-like. The material was heavy enough that there could be room in the stomach (yay! comfortable sitting down) without there looking like there was extra room across the stomach. The angled hemline has a slight slimming effect on the legs, cutting across the knees, but mainly it's an interesting detail (like the neckline) which saves the dress from being dowdy. You can't see it in any of the pictures, but at the high side of the hemline, there is an additional 2" slit. It's helpful to be tall because of the length of the dress. Heels make a dramatic difference. If you're looking for a similar fit, but shorter hemline, search this site for one of the Black Halo Jackie O dresses (RTR should always have one in their inventory because of its killer fit). As others have mentioned, you really don't notice the see-through panel in the dress in normal or low lighting.

links_reviews_title: The dress was fantastic. It was my first time to use RTR and I was very impressed!! Everyone loved!
links_reviews_text: The size zero was too tight around my chest, the size two fit perfectly!

i'm definitely more top heavy so the dress was a little tighter in the bust area. i usually wear a 10 and my girls barely fit into the 12. its a side zipper (usually a problem for bigger chests). however, it was amazingly sexy and fun! i loved it otherwise!

links_reviews_title: This dress was classy and I got lots of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: There isn't a lot of extra room near the bottom, so I had to be careful getting in and out of the car. It fit a little loose in the mid section and the side sheer panel wasn't noticeable. I like that I was able to wear a regular bra with it. I am 5'8 so it may seem long on anyone shorter!

Fit: True to size. The 10 fit me perfectly without spanx. Pros: Classy, subtly sexy. I got a love of compliments on the sheer cut out in the midsection. Interesting neckline. Flattering length (hit me just above the knee). Cons: Weird sleeve length, not quite a cap sleeve.
The mesh slit at the middle of the torso wasn't very noticeable. The draping and asymmetrical cut made the classic LBD more unique.

OK, so selfies are not my strong suit, but I felt like a million bucks in this dress. It just fit like a glove, and made my figure look fabulous, yet it wasn't showing a ton of skin. My husband took me to a very nice restaurant and the symphony that night - he even wore his tuxedo, and with me in this dress we were quite a pair.

links_reviews_title: The neckline of this dress added extra flare to the LBD. Rave reviews!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Fit great overall. I'm top heavy, so it was a close fit. Totally forgot about the sheer panel. Not noticeable, for those conservatives, like me.

links_reviews_title: Very user friendly website, great price, great convenience. Will definitely do this again!
links_reviews_text: I was undecided to get the 8 and 10 or the 10 and 12. The 10 was the best fit overall with just a little big of looseness around the waist and the shoulders (one shoulder slipped off on occasion). The sheer panel is not noticeable at all, but you do need to think about what undergarments you want to wear to avoid peekage through the panel. Got lots of compliments. Very classy, sleek look. The fit was tight through the abdomen, so I didn't need spanx, but it was very comfortable. The full body picture makes it look like it wasn't form fitting, but that's just the shadows from photography, it's very form fitting, but not in a bad way. The close up of the upper body shows how it lays on your body. The asymmetrical cut is very flattering. There is some gappage in the under arm area, where if you move your arm a certain way you can see the side of your bra, but again, just wear black and it's just a minor flash from time to time, no one noticed. The return was so easy, I couldn't believe it. Just slip both dresses in the bag and drop off at a UPS store or drop box.

links_reviews_title: Very stylish for a rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: I loved the cut of this dress! I normally wear a 10 or 12 depending on the designer and tend to have thicker thighs so I went with the 12 and it's a good thing I did. The skirt of the dress was form fitting but definitely not too tight - I could move easily. Because I went with the 12, the midsection was a little looser than needed but since the dress was solid black, it wasn't obvious. I did wear Spanx with it. The sheer part in the side wasn't very noticeable but the dress still looked and felt great! I would recommend this dress for a more stylish party!
This dress is comfortable, sexy, and easy to wear. Felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: Modest but still sexy! Not your standard LBD
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my husband's JAOBC Blues Reception and LOVED IT! The mesh panel is not nearly as noticeable in person as it is on the model. I was comfortable in it all night and received lots of compliments-- I definitely recommend it as it can be worn for many different occasions!

links_reviews_title: Many compliments and I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: It would not let me upload a photo no matter how hard I tried. I loved this dress. I am really glad I had the size up as a backup because my usual size 10 was too snug. There is not a ton of stretch to this dress so I definitely recommend sizing up one. I was not comfortable with the sheer section on the torso so I wore black shape wear so that it wasn't visible. Loved that I could wear a normal bra and that there was more coverage than most dressed up top. HIGHLY recommend. The only issue I had was going to the bathroom, it was challenging... so drink minimal fluids and prepare to look like a total smoke show in this dress!

The dress is very nice but It runs very small ,the bottom was fine I’m normally an 8-10 ordered a 10 ,probably needed a 12 but could not get a back up size because they did not have one available.Im new to RTR and did not know I could actually get a back up style. I’m a 36 D and couldn’t zip the top part. Visited the San Francisco store the ladies were wonderful but I could not find anything to wear on my size in such a short notice,so I returned the dress , and will have to wear something else

This was my third time renting from RTR and I was so excited to wear this dress. Unfortunately it was crazy small. I couldn't even pull it on. I was so disappointed and surprised that i checked the tag 3 times to make sure it was the right size! Be sure and order at least a size up, maybe 2 sizes up. (To put this in perspective, I went to the store and tried on 13 different dresses in the same size and they all fit. I have no idea how or why this one was so small. Super disappointing).
Weird fit and no stretch

links_reviews_title: Thin fabric and runs very small
links_reviews_text: Bad fit
Was way too small, but also the draping on the neck line seemed like it might be almost frumpy if it were any bigger
This dress was waaaaay too small. I usually wear a size 10 and I couldn't leave the house in this.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Bump-Friendly Dress for Baby Shower
links_reviews_text: Felt like a gem in this dress for my baby showers and it was super comfy. The top/bust was loose, but nothing a safety pin couldn't fix. My normal size is 4/6 (130 LB) but wore this 30 weeks pregnant (148 LB)

Love this dress. Very comfy, fit well. The sleeves did slip down a couple of times but they do come with the things to clip them to your bra straps. It was a bit on the long side, but was perfect for me once I had shoes on. Romantic and beautiful.
It was a bit dressy for brunch, wore a jacket to dress down a bit. The regular was very long I am 5'6 and with 4 inch wedges it was still sweeping the ground. Might rent again for a special occasion.

Wore this while 30 weeks pregnant. It was "snug" (there is a side zipper and the material doesn't have a lot of give) but there was plenty of room for my big bump! I also liked the sleeves. Required some ironing and lots of double sided tape but I like the overall effect!

Loved this dress for my baby shower. The waist was a little tight on my pregnant belly so I had to wear the large when I'm still a medium in most clothes. I had to pin the top (since I'm a medium) but everyone couldn't stop complimenting the dress. So comfortable! I'm 5'6" and I wore flats, the dress just covered the shoes but wasn't dragging on the floor.

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the length
links_reviews_text: It would have been perfect if it was smaller in the breast part or was at least stretchy, I had to pin it to keep it closed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a magical baby shower
links_reviews_text: This dress fit beautifully for my baby shower. At this point, I was 7 months pregnant and the dress flowed beautifully over my bump and made me feel very glamorous while also being super comfortable. Cons: I will say I must not be the first pregnant woman to wear it so seems a bit stretched out, but the medium would definitely have been too tight. Also, i did the Kim Kardashian boob trick (lots of tape) to keep everything up and perky but also had to use toupee tape to keep the dress in the right place. As long as you're ok with these small maneuvers this dress works wonderfully.

Loved the flow, very flattering fit, dress is long I'm 5'5 and had to wear heels so it wouldn't drag. I wore in winter so threw a sweater on top and worked great open back so can't wear raceback bra with it. Also shows a bit of Cleavage so had to wear a n undershirt. If it was a summer wedding i wouldn't have bothered

I rented this for a brunch wedding and LOVED wearing it. I got many compliments and was so comfortable all day. The only thing is that I had to safety pin the front closed otherwise it would have revealed a little more than I was comfortable with. I also ended up safety pinning the ends of the sleeves because it was a chillier day and I wanted my arms to be slightly more covered. Overall, LOVED this dress!

The dress fit great!! I wore it for my baby shower at 32 weeks pregnant and it was SO flattering on the bump! I felt so beautiful in this dress! I did need to pin the top closed because it was extremely low cut, but that was fine. This may be my favorite RTR yet!

links_reviews_title: Able to wear early in pregnancy
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress 12 weeks pregnant (with my second so I started showing early). It was flattering and comfortable. It is quite long, as mentioned by many others. I'm only 5'4" though and was fine with a 3 inch wedge. I planned to get my usual medium and a large as the backup size but after reading that it ran large, I went with a small as the backup. I'm glad I did because even with a little bump, it fit better. The bodice wasn't that much smaller than the medium but the shoulders and length were better. I did have to pin the front to my bra because it wouldn't stay closed. I LOVE that it has little clips inside the shoulder that you can clip your bra strap to- definitely helped keep things in place. Overall, a successful rental!

Good length and I'm 5'10". A friend wore it while 7 months pregnant and her boobs were out and proud. Mine not so much and I have Cs right now. A bit loose in the shoulders and they kept sliding off. Overall great for the occasion. Not as tight fitting in waist as I would normally like.

links_reviews_title: Garden Wedding on a rainy day
links_reviews_text: Was great and warmish. I am 5'10 and even with heels it was still pretty long. Comfortable fit but not baggy.

This dress was so light and comfortable, it felt like I was wearing a feather! I normally wear a size 0 or 2 at RTR but I am 6 mos pregnant and have gone up one dress size in my overall wardrobe (from size 2 to size 4). I ordered the SR with backup MR and was able to wear the S, which fit like a glove! The fitted part sits right under the bust so there was plenty of room for the bump. I am 5'8" and preferred the look of the dress touching the floor so I wore flats, which was fine by me, as I was also going for comfort! Only con: although I generally have pretty wide shoulders, the shoulder kept slipping down. I almost expected there to be snaps inside for holding bra straps but there weren't. For that reason I would recommend strapless as I was adjusting a lot to hide my straps.

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful but very loose on top
links_reviews_text: Definitely need to pin the top or wear a camisole underneath. I received a lot of compliments but I was glad to take it off. The top is not secure so I was constantly shifting to make sure it stayed on my shoulders.
Runs large. Shoulder kept falling off and length is super long. This is covered up with a long sleeve for the mosque purposes

This dress is really beautiful and fit perfectly. I pinned the back just because I didn't want it to be as open (it's a "V" similar to the front but pins easily). It was really flattering and I got a ton of compliments. The length was perfect with heels and barefoot. The color is more of a slate gray than navy blue, and photographs beautifully. I wore this as a bridesmaid dress. It hits at the upper waist and has plenty of room for a fuller bust and hips.
Cute maxi dress! Very comfortable and flowy. Great for day time, it does run a little long in length so consider wearing heels. A standard bra may be worn with this dress which gives this an A+.

This dress fit like a glove and was sooo flattering. I have a very large chest and the dress did perfect all night long. Bonus - It can also be worn backwards for a little more coverage. Wish I owed it!
The dress was slightly long, but I wore some chunky mules and it worked well. Great fit and got a lot of compliments.
Loved this dress, great length for only being 5'5", loved the top that included inside holders for bra straps
I rented this for a maternity shoot at 9 months pregnant. I sized up 1 size. It ended up too large in the bust, but with a cami underneath it worked perfectly. I felt like a goddess.

Was really comfortable and I got a lot of compliments. It's a bold outfit while still being quite laid-back. Loved the dark grey color. One thing was the dress likes to slide down your shoulder but luckily there are bra snaps on the shoulder to make sure your bra straps aren't exposed. Overall great dress for daytime or relaxed evening.

Wore this for Thanksgiving dinner with the family and it was perfect. I felt super comfy. It is still warm where I live and the fabric is thin, so it kept me cool. It was a bit long, but I didn't want to wear high heels, so it's not too bad. I am 5'6". The opening in the chest can shift a little bit when sitting down, so you might want to use tape or a safety pin to secure it. I just checked and pulled it in when I needed to, but it didn't feel too big in my upper body. Everything was in the right place. It has openings on the sides of each sleeve . Very forgiving dress. Color just as pictured. Very airy and beautiful dress.
I wore this dress for my brother's rehearsal dinner at 21 weeks pregnant. It was so comfortable and very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Looks so great on my sister!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my sister to wear to a baby shower. She doesn't love looking super girly, or her arms, so this elegant understated dress was perfect. Very flattering on her! She also said it was comfortable. Her measurements- 5'8", 190lbs, 36B.

links_reviews_title: You know you did good when someone else asks you where you got your dress!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Moves well. Looked great.
Vintage classic vibe. Grey background with soft floral pattern. The cut is scandalously, the waist line hides body flaws. It arrived wrinkled, when I steamed it the dress reeked of BO.
Way too long! I’m 5’5 and with a significant heel this dragged on the ground.

links_reviews_title: Large on top and a lot of fabric overall.
links_reviews_text: Doesn't quite work for small chested women - the top portion of the dress is too big, falls off shoulder and front flap requires tape or a pin to stay closed.

Wore this to a spring wedding. I got tons of compliments on it! I'm 5'10" and it was long enough that it went all the way to the floor with flats. I wore a lace cami under because the cut was pretty low, but it worked out in my favor since I'm breastfeeding and it allowed easy access! The bra strap holders on the shoulders were key to keeping everything in place.

links_reviews_title: Tried it on and way too long!
links_reviews_text: Tried it on and way too long!

links_reviews_title: Perfect vintage feel for the beach wedding
links_reviews_text: I felt absolutely perfect in the dress. It was classic, flattering, and was just what I wanted for a beach wedding I was attending. Don't forget to latch your bra straps to the helpful snaps with the dress because as you wear the dress, it stretches a little and the shoulders can slip. If I could buy this, I would.

Loved the fabric! The design was nice but I could not get the sleeves to stay up while sitting down! I was constantly having to keep pulling them up after they'd drop off my shoulder! I usually wear a 10 and am 5'10" so based on their sizing, I ordered an XL...way too big but float so made it work. Super long though...at 5'10" I had to wear 4" wedges to BARELY keep it from dragging on the ground. Still...wore it twice as I loved the style & comfort.
based on reviews i thought it would work as maternity dress but it was too narrow in the rib cage to zip comfortably

The dress was gorgeous and I was really sad I had to return it due to fit issues. I ordered the size that was suggested for me, but it was way too big and too long. I am 5'3" and even with heels, this was going to be too long. I suggest sizing down.

Perfect for what I wanted. Top was a deeeeeep V, which would have been fine, but I had kids pulling on me and just felt better with a little cami underneath. This is VERY long too, I'm 5'6, wore tall wedges, and I was still dragging a bit. Got loads of compliments. Wrinkles easy though, if you're travelling with it!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable material--easy to move around & dance in. Also very flattering, accentuates the bust area. Was a little loose in the shoulder/bust area for me but was easily fixed with some clothing tape. (I'm a 36D) The dress also had straps for you to attach to your bra straps-- a must!! Loved that I could wear my regular bra with it as well.
This dress is so lightweight and comfortable. I am 6 mo pregnant and the fit of the dress left plenty of room for baby.

I rented this for a friend to wear to her baby shower. She is well into her 3rd tri and this dress made her feel pretty and feminine. She got loads of compliments. Note that the neckline is more of a loose wrap style and comes lower than pictured.

This dress is very flattering but the lace is extremely delicate. I had to be super careful not to snag it on jewelry or other items and therefore found it uncomfortable. I also picked this style because it seemed elegant but modest, and was surprised at how low cut it was. It did not fully cover my bra but i did not want to make it dowdy by wearing a cami, especially given that it hit below the knee. It required constant adjustment and tweaks to avoid flashing. All in all, an uncomfortable dress.
Worked for shopping on into dinner on vacation!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Dress made of Roped Lace
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a night at the opera. I got so many compliments. I would rent it again in a heartbeat

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a Bat Mitzvah!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly, was very comfortable. The cut is very slimming!

I rented this dress for my birthday and was heartbroken to send it back. I got complimented constantly all night, and I felt comfortable and gorgeous. I am curvy, and the dress was extremely flattering on both top and bottom, while nipping in well at the waist. Will be stalking the internet in hopes of buying this dress for keeps.

This dress was great quality material however the crotchet material doesn't have much give and I wasn't able to raise my arms all the way up without feeling I'd rip the dress. I generally wear a size 6. If I were to rent again I would size up to be more comfortable. You must also be very careful as this material snags easily. Overall I received many compliments on this dress.
Large in the waist and tight above the hips with an odd flare I didn't anticipate.
Dress ran large pretty much everywhere. It was long and loose. Didn’t end up wearing.
It fit perfectly and was great for a winter work event.
Couldn't wear it. Too small.
I didn't end up wearing this dress. It is adorable and sassy! I also think it runs a little small. I usually wear a size 10 and wish I would have ordered a 12.

links_reviews_title: Fabrics quality and overall look disappointing
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this dress but once on, is very blah. The V neck is actually too conservative and there's nothing special about this dress.

links_reviews_title: It was a great fit for a petite, busty figure.
links_reviews_text: It was a flattering fit - forgiving of a bigger bust and a bit of a belly.

links_reviews_title: I decidedly not to wear this to the Symphony. Felt a little to Stevy Nicks.
links_reviews_text: If you have larger thighs, consider shape wear

links_reviews_title: Lots of music, lots of laughter
links_reviews_text: Not your average lace LBD! Lots of pretty details on this one: flamenco-flavored hem, multiple lace patterns, bracelet sleeves. Nice heavy lace and stitched-in lining ensure you won't be fussing with it all night. You'll need a strapless bra -- shoulders are quite exposed. TTS 8 but no disguise for a tummy, it's pretty form-fitting. I'm short-waisted & the hem just grazed my kneecaps. If I owned this it would be in heavy rotation for nights out.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress, but nothing that stood out.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, just a little conservative.

links_reviews_title: Dress was nice, but had an odd smell.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing either dress.
So comfortable and great for the arms. The neckline was so flattering without being too much. May have to buy one if i stay at my current size for a year.

I tried this dress on originally and hated it, i thought it was really unflattering but since it was in my unlimited order I decided to wear it anyway. I ended up really warming up to it. The length was great, hitting just above my knee and it worked perfectly as a transition outfit from work to an evening event. I received a ton of compliments on how flattering the fit actually was.
It was too tight around my middle but oh so lovely. I may size up if I rent again.

This dress worked out very well for a wedding I attended in November. I fluctuate between a 4 and a 6 in dress size; I wore a size 6 and it fit great. It was very comfortable and suited the occasion perfectly!

I rented this for a wedding and got many compliments on it! I was worried about the length because I'm only 5'... it hit at a good enough spot to where it wasn't too long or too short! The cut outs gave it a sexy but classy look!
Fit was comfortable- not so tight that you could move and wear all day! The slots on the side gave it a little sexy look. Perfect dress! Loved the lace detail all over. Fun and flirty!
Dress was perfect. Flattering, fun and comfortable. Had plenty of tacos, churros and margaritas at the wedding and still felt gorgeous in this dress.

I wore this dress out to a nice dinner with my husband and in-laws, and it was perfect for the occasion. Very classy and subtly flirty, I think it was nicer in person than in the photos. My measurements are 33-26-35, and the size 0 fit me perfectly. It may accommodate a slightly larger bust or waist, and there's a nice flare that would definitely accommodate larger hips. I wore a racer-back bra because the top is a narrow style that showed regular bra straps.

I wanted to love this dress but unfortunately neither size worked for me. Overall it looks great on a hourglass figure but if you have fuller hips it may run tight. I normally wear a 4 or 6 depending on the style. The small was too tight on the bottom and the slit went up too high. The medium was too loose and the slip underneath wasn’t lining up with the lace and kept flipping up. An in between size and would have fit perfectly. If you’re worried about the chest area, it actually does a decent job with support and looks great!
I loved this dress, it was long enough for my very long legs. The fit was super comfortable and pretty true to size.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, and the dress fit like a dream!
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous about the cutouts, but they hit at the ribs and were flattering. I got SO MANY compliments in person and on pictures. Would definitely recommend this dress, it fit like a dream even after a night of eating, drinking, and dancing.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my daughter to wear to her Homecoming dance.
links_reviews_text: Beautifully made dress. I was told it was very comfortable (worn by my daughter). Great coverage and the cut outs on the side are very modest.
Loved the dress, very comfortable and received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, sexy and fun dress!
links_reviews_text: First off, this dress is super soft. It is a lace but it isn't itchy or scratchy at all. Feels very quality nice on the skin. It fits like a glove, but not in a bad way! I wore a size 2 (regular size) and felt great in it! Not too tight in any parts. The skirt is fun and flowy. And, I love the sexy cut-outs. I wore with a regular bra, used a little tap, and had no issues with showing. Overall a perfect dress to throw on and go. Many compliments. It's a dark navy (my photo is filtered).

links_reviews_title: Great for an outside summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I go between size 4 & 6, I went with the 6 on this dress mainly because I did not want the dress to be tight on me in the heat, the 4 fit great, I just wanted something loose in the summer heat. The 6 was loose but still fit well and looked great. I received a lot of compliments !
I was concerned about length since I'm only 5'1 but this length was perfect. I think the fit is pretty true to size. The cutouts were tasteful and not over the top. I definitely recommend this one!
I was able to dance in this all night long! I'm 5'4 165lbs and 38DD size 10 fit perfect! Loved this dress, would totally rent it again

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress with a bit of sexy
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for my birthday dinner and it was perfect!

I absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments on it. The cutouts were the perfect amount of sexy and sass but keeping it classy for the outdoor wedding. It was a little shorter then I am use to but the flowy lace helped make me feel more comfortable in the length. The fit was perfect and I would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Great, classic little navy blue dress
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 and the 2 fit perfectly. For someone with short legs, the dress was a short but fun length. The cutouts and lace detail at the bottom made the dress more interesting and festive without being too much. I wore it to a Memorial Day wedding with nude heels and it was perfect; I received a lot of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Fun/flirty dress, maybe tricky for someone with curves!
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely worked well for the event I wore it at--a spring wedding in a beach town. I got a few compliments, especially on the cutouts. There were two things I noticed about it that made it less than a 10/10 for me. 1) I didn't really notice the way the skirt had a second 'tier', it's not so obvious in the photos but I typically prefer skirts that are either straight or flare from the waist, not the mid-thigh. 2) Because of my curvier figure and the way the cutouts/bodice are built, I think the waist hit a little higher on me than intended to. There was some gaping in the front because of that--not that noticeable though. Overall, I think this dress would work best for someone with a pretty straight figure, but anyone could rock it if they wanted to!
Great fit, comfortable. Classy with the little edgy cutouts. True to size.
This dress was very comfortable. I loved the way it fit. The cutouts gave it the perfect edge.
Loved everything about this dress!
Great alternative to the LBD with some sexy cutouts.
Great dress--compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Loved the shape, and sassy cut out detail.
links_reviews_text: It was a little big, I wish I had the 4, but the 6 worked. It was a fun wedding guest dress, everyone loved it! Def recommend.
Just the right amount of skin showing through cutouts and length dress has a little movement at the bottom, so it was perfect for dancing the night away!
This dress is the perfect combo of classy and sexy. Fit great and was super comfortable!! Loved it and got tons of compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Actually got this as a back up and ended up loving it more than my first choice!
links_reviews_text: True to size!
Really love the concept and the navy is beautiful, but cutouts hit at a weird spot.
This dress was perfect for my friends bachelorette party! Super flattering and the cut outs were in perfect spot!
This dress was extremely tight. Did not wear it because I could barely breathe. Definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: Not made for a tall gal
links_reviews_text: This dress was just ok. It just didn't fit right for my height.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not good for a larger chest
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an upcoming wedding - I loved everything about it and it fit well, but the cutouts aren't placed well for women with larger chests. I am a G/H cup and the cutout definitely showed the bottom of my bra. Unfortunately I won't be keeping it to wear to the event.

I honestly have so much trouble finding dresses that fit me due to my petite frame, so I was a little nervous ordering this. That said, to the other petite ladies who reviewed this dress previously: *thank you*. The dress is the appropriate amount of fun and pretty that you want for any cocktail attire event. I wore this to a wedding, and got a number of compliments. The lace is soft, and the dress length was perfect even for a girl who's just shy of 5'2". I opted to wear a strapless bra (couldn't find one that didn't show otherwise), but that's never really a deal-breaker for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer wedding/cocktail party
links_reviews_text: This dress was for a wedding where I was a date. I ordered a size 8 and a 6 but ended up wearing the 6 due to the extra room at the waist from the cut outs. I was worried that the cut outs would be too risque for a cocktail attire wedding, but they were subtle and I got a ton of compliments. This neckline is very flattering and the top was fitted so if you didn't want to, you didn't have to wear a bra (which is always a plus.)
This dress fits beautifully and is flattering! The cutouts are slimming but not too sexy.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress and it can be really complimentary if you have rib tattoos.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, classy, not revealing, a smidge short (I'm 5'4"), but overall, great for my work holiday party!

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for a wedding, loved the fit and the cutouts!
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect for a wedding, it was a bit short so ended up wearing the bigger back up size but fit great and got a lot of compliments on it. Would definitely rent again!

Loved this cute and flirty dress. The length was perfect, as I am 5'8". The top was a little tight and hard to zip all the way up but I managed. I loved the colors and felt super pretty when I went out. I would definitely wear this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but a little long for petites!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Bridal Shower and received so many compliments on it. Very form-fitting in all the right ways! The material was thicker than I anticipated, and the dress was a bit long for us short gals!

I rented this as my birthday dress for dinner and a show. The print is very pretty and the hemline is unique/fun! Like lots of other rentals, it was very difficult to get the zipper up over that seam at the waist. Adjustable straps are nice, though!

I loved this dress. I wore it to a casual daytime summer wedding. Since it is loose in the midsection I was able to size down to a six. With that and the adjustable straps I was able to get a pretty nice fit. Extra points for being able to wear my normal strapless bra! I paired it with nude heels and curly hair, and received compliments from my friends and even perfect strangers! I was sad to see it go.
Great dress for an outdoor wedding. The material wasn't what I expected, but it looked flattering on and the color and print were perfect. Would definitely recommend.
I got this dress for a trip to the Bahamas. Wore it to dinner and absolutely loved it. Fits really well and the flows bottom is very flattering.
A bit of summer whimsy for a Friday at work! The fabric is linen-y and very textured, so it feels fairly casual. Very comfortable without a bra! Lots of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: High quality fabric. The cut is classic and flattering. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: True to size. If you think you may be between sizes, or if you are busty, I would suggest sizing up.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect if you go up 1 or 2 sizes. The fabric is beautiful. Once pressed it stayed perfect all night.

links_reviews_title: Great choice for beach chic attire party!
links_reviews_text: Fits well thru chest. Linen like material is breathable for summer. Fun dress!

The dress was perfect for our friends Luau. It was definitely a bit tight around my rib cage. I am normally a true 4, but I sized up to a 6 and I am happy I did. The colors are beautiful in the dress. At 5'4, it hit the top part of my calf. The fabric is heavy, so it was perfect for a cooler summer evening. Overall, worth the rental!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fun dress for "smart casual" wedding
links_reviews_text: Fun and comfortable dress for a fall wedding. The colors are "fall enough" but the print is a bit tropical so it's a good in between option. Love that you can adjust the length of the straps. The material is easy to wrinkle though. In fact my dresses arrived wrinkled. The zipper on my dress won't lay straight but besides that I loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer bbq!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a semi-formal summer bbq. I felt the dress looked great on and was comfortable to wear. However, looking back at the photos I feel it made me look a bit heavier in the mid-section. I'm usually a 4/6, but with a small ribcage was able to squeeze into the 2 (the only size available), but a 4 probably would have been more comfortable in the chest.
Very comfortable, light dress. Wore it to a rehearsal dinner. I wore a size up and was comfortable, but could have probably gone a size down. tightest on ribs, but not hips.

Was a nice fitting dress. Fitted through the top with swinging handkerchief hemline. Pretty colors and print. Glad the straps were adjustable. Linen made it a little classier. Wore on my Hawaiian vacation. :)
This dress is hard to zip on your own but it fit nice. I didn't have to wear a bra and it felt light but well made. I love the length and it was a great flirty wear for a date with my hubby.

Many compliments- great medium weight material - light colors perfect for spring or summer- the straps are adjustable for bust! Im a little larger up top so it fit just fine as I loosened the straps and didn't have a problem zipping it up and tightening the straps to lay flat - the neckline was not bothersome at all ... easy and fun

The fabric does not stretch so if you're busty, you might want to size up. I'm a small 34A and 4 fit perfectly with a padded strapless bra. Got lots of compliments on a vineyard hopping day. Appreciated the adjustable straps.

I rented this dress for a cruise to Bermuda with friends from work. I normally weat a size 0 and this is the size I wore. It was large in the hips and top. I liked how it has straps to adjust. I am 5' tall, and weigh 115 pounds. I wouldn't rent again because I felt like it was way too large on me, but a pretty dress.
Everything about this dress is beautiful and flattering, but unfortunately the straps are uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Too tight up top. But big on bottom
links_reviews_text: Wasn't flattering
Definitely very nice just not on me.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and comfortable for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: Simple dress great for a beach wedding or day party! It works fantastic for a trip as I actually packed it into a backpack to travel for a wedding and had minimal wrinkles at arrival. Big win! I tend to not like tube top dresses as you spend all night pulling the dress up, so having spaghetti straps with a strapless bra worked out well. Note that the fabric and color is more on the "vintage" side (zoom in on the dress!), so I wouldn't wear it to a cocktail party or the like, but works well for more casual settings.

I loved the look of this dress but couldn't zip it up! I'm normally between a 6 and an 8, and the 6 didn't work at all! The 8 probably would have been okay, but I would suggest sizing up to your larger end.
Great fit. Perfect for going out to dinner.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress but tight on chest.
links_reviews_text: This dress is the perfect summer getaway dress! However it's too tight around chest area. Fit is a bit weird.
fits well. straps adjustable.

The dress was nice quality but I wound up feeling more 'cute' than 'beach sexy' like I was hoping. Still a great dress just not for me. I wore it with no bra as there was any extra room In there for me

links_reviews_title: The dress had no give to it.... very tight if your busty... also smelt like cigarettes
links_reviews_text: Very tight fit... rented for a baby shower, I just had a baby 2 months ago and it barely fit
Perfect!

love the pattern. i'm typically a 4. joie usually runs v large, but i stuck w t he 4 for my chest and i'm glad i did! any smaller and i would be bursting out! love the pattern and pockets. really fun hem. adjustable straps, not bra needed. highly highly recommend. hit below the knee, can wear w heels or w flats. i'm a fan!

links_reviews_title: Second time I've rented this one!
links_reviews_text: Great dress, especially for shorties! Although it was a bit tight on my bust (could've been the margaritas!). Okay too more tell stuff-the fabric is a thick linen and there's little details that you can't see in the photo that are lovely and make this peice feel high-end. After this dress, I can't help but to notice quality of other summer clothes at shops and how they often don't stack up to my RTR rentals

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Too busty. Wasn't flattering on me
links_reviews_text: The dress fit but I was uncomfortable with the low cut look at my bust.
I really liked this skirt! Like others said, a little tight when you're getting it over your bum, but once it's over, zips easily and is comfortable to wear all day.
Wore this to Disneyland for the day. Work it slowly over your hops, and you'll be thrilled with the fit. I have small hoops, so if you're curvy, go up at least one size.

The waist is tight on this skirt and the zipper is short so there is not a lot of give sliding this over the hips; once it's on however, the waist is true to size and the fabric is stretchy and soft. Lots of compliments on this! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: not too long not too short--perfect
links_reviews_text: I reordered in a 25 after having originally ordered in a 24. I am noticing as we are back to high wasted that i should error on the side of the larger size of the 2 sizes that can work for me. i got the 24 on and zipped no problem but did not like how snug it was for how i like to have my clothes look on me. the 25 still snug as there is little to no give. a jean material with fun detail a very small back zipper that i have to carefully not fully unzip on this 25 as the zipper tooth has a tad of an issue. This was great with tights and booties and was the look for thanksgiving. totally love the versatile ways this can be worn. it is high quaily material that feels great on very soft jean like material.

I was worried at first that I wouldn't be able to zip this up passed my middle, but thankfully the material is thick and stretchy. Once I got it up, it was snug and very comfortable. The skirt is shapely but not skin tight. I wore with an oxford and charcoal sweater jacket. Felt great all day.
Perfect fit. Comfortable and zipper detail made it fun. Dressed up with blazer and was great for work.
It was comfortable and made out of a soft stretchy material. Runs small so I went a size up. Casual or could be dressed up.

Absolutely love this skirt. I wore it to work with a black turtle neck and boots but I could also see it dressed down with white T or wherever creativity goes. I usually wear a 25 in slacks/ jeans but always size up pencil skirts for work (I have a bit of a bootie). The 27 was perfectly work appropriate for my preference.

links_reviews_title: Really nice skirt to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed this skirt and would have kept it if it had been just a bit smaller. I am very petite and the smallest size (24) was just a bit too big in the hips and a tad too long on me.
More casual than I wanted! Didn't wear but would be cute for a date

I ordered up in the skirt according to the reviews it ended up being too big. Also the skirt was closer to Knee length instead of mid-thigh. I just didn’t like the style. You need a booty for this skirt to look good.
Runs small. Hard to get up cause i have a booty. It has no stretch.

From the photos, I thought this would be a cute skirt to wear to work. When I received it, I realized my error. The material is a type of denim, which is fine. There is NOT stretch to this skirt and the fit was very tight. Definitely size up! Anyway, the material is kind of faded, which I believe is on purpose. And there are double silver zippers on each side of the skirt. The fabric is kind of mix between animal print and camo. I didn't wear this skirt as it was tight and stiff and it looks a bit Junior to me. I'm sure it will be darling on other women, it's just not for me.

I ordered a size up like the reviews suggested and it was still not fitting properly for my body type. The skirt was poor quality, it looked overly worn and not like other pieces I've rented from RTR. It seemed like something a teen girl would purchase from Forever 21, not from the runway.
I'm a size 4, slender but curvy hip bones-- couldn't even get this on and I wear pencil skirts all the time. It's very straight up and down, with no stretch in the material.

links_reviews_title: Way too small - could not even wear
links_reviews_text: So I rented this for work, however I didn't realize it was denim material. Strike 1. Then I could barely fit it over my hips, and I go between a 6 and 8. Size up 2 sizes for this casual skirt.

links_reviews_title: So small I couldn't fit over my thighs!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear between a 2 and 4, but this skirt was so small I couldn't even inch it up over my thighs (which are actually pretty thin!). It definitely wouldn't have fit over my hips either! I am bummed I couldn't wear it, but am worried to re-order given just how tiny it was! I would probably need to go up 2 sizes, but it's hard to know. The material has ZERO stretch and the zipper is so short that it barely makes a difference in helping you get in it. Print is great though!

I sized up per the recommendation- Glad I did this is slim in the hip area and for a curvy girl it may present some issues. The fabric does have give and it is a high waist - very slimming. The material's pattern makes it versatile. You can dress this up or dress it down. It has a jean feel/texture if you are really looking closely. A very awesome find. I got this for everyday and ended up sneaking it into a few work outfit options as well.
Denim-like stretch fabric. Cute zipper detailing. Cannot fit over hips, had to be pulled on over the head. I paired with black turtleneck and black booties.
Runs a little small.

Beautiful details all over; the ruffles on the sleeves with sheer back and shoulders gives a sneaky peekaboo. Runs a little small on wrists; no stretch but it worked. Seems to be cut a little small but I'm on really between a small & medium; Wore with black skinny pants and black pumps. Red nails and lipstick finished it off. I'd wear it again! You have to be ok with a crew neck. I loved it.
Easy to pair with any pant. Professional work top.

Beautiful top!! Absolutely loved this, perfect for a night out in Savannah. It's just the right touch of sexy with the sheer back. Would love to own this piece! The M fit perfectly, wore it tucked in the front with skinny black jeans and heels and felt great!

I picked this top as something I wouldn't normally wear but decided to try something a little out of my comfort zone. When I went to put the top on I thought it would be too small but it ended up fitting perfectly, I could work throughout the day without feeling like it was pulling or right, and i could move around easily. Got a bunch of compliments too! Very flattering top.

links_reviews_title: Amazing sleeves! Can't wear a bra
links_reviews_text: Amazing sleeves! Gorgeous sheer back! You could wear a bra but it will show through the back. It is a little short so better for petite girls or high waisted pants! True to size! Great navy color! Great way to dress jeans up a bit! I wore this to work.

links_reviews_title: Worked perfect for a speaking event - dressed up but not too much so.
links_reviews_text: LOVED this shirt - the detailing is exquisite. The sheer back is a great detail. I am a 32A so I did not have to wear a bra. Perfection.
Cute blouse- the back is completely sheer so i wore a navy camisole underneath. The sleeves were annoying AF. Impossible to eat or wash your hands without them getting in the way.
Loved the cut of this top. Flowy and flattering... Great for a big NYE dinner. The back is prettty sheer and shows your bra.

This shirt is adorable. Perfect length in the waist and arms. It is slightly fitted in the arms if you feel like you have thicker arms. The arms may be long on someone shorter. Paired with black leather pants. Love it!

I love dramatic sleeves! Rented this as part of the 3 for 1 deal and wear it at work. The top runs true to size, except that the sleeves are a bit long on me, but I'm relatively short (5'3) so I think it would be more flattering on taller ladies. I didn't mind the long sleeves until I had to eat. All in all, a very pretty and lightweight top with unique dramatic sleeves that is worth a try.
Loved this top, the sheer back was sexy but subtle enough to be worn anywhere
Sleeves are a little tight if you workout. But overall it fit fine. Loved it with black slim jeans and low black stilettos.
Very striking blouse. Back is all sheer. I didn't wear it with a cami but you could.

links_reviews_title: Great top but not for petites!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit long and though that's the look per the model's photo, they were definitely hanging /covering my hands. The fabric is really great. The back is see-through so you don't have to wear a bra but the front coverage is pretty good so you don't have to worry about anything showing.
This can be dressed up or down but is feminine and flattering.
Fits and looks like the photo.
Wrists and arms are tight. Not for a super busty person. Really cute shirt. I almost bought it!
Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: It's a great top, I tucked it into a pencil skirt and received several compliments. Buying it!
links_reviews_text: Con: seethrough back if you don't want to appear sexy

Fit great, however hard to zip up the back by yourself....also you many need a cami underneath. When my top arrive, it was dirty and the sleeves were damaged, due to the delicate nature of the blouse. I ended up wearing it; however was disappointed when I opened it. I spot cleaned the top and tucked the sleeve under, so no one would be able to see the damage. I think you should look more thoroughly before sending the top.
Love love love this top, it's great to wear with a cami under for work and stunning top as is with jeans and cute heels for date night

links_reviews_title: Lovely top - wore it dressy once and casual once.
links_reviews_text: Fits well and nice fabric.
I love this blouse. The fit was perfect. I wore it to work and then out on the town for the evening. It is elegant and the sheer back makes it just sexy enough for wearing out.
Runs small.

links_reviews_title: I loved it, it looks great with high-waisted bottoms!
links_reviews_text: Very classy

I loved this top! It was a little tight to put on my my wrists. I only wish the back of the shirt wasn't see through. I felt it limited the places I could wear the shirt and I didn't care for adding a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: Fun for night out. The sleeves are great and the back is open sheer. I wore a tank underneath
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, sleeves tight

links_reviews_title: Wore it out to dinner with my husband. Loved it. and still have it in my favorites!
links_reviews_text: Bell sleeves were a little much on this one...best to plan accordingly. But all in all, a great blouse!
Really pretty and flattering. Received many compliments.

Loved this top. Fit great, true to size. The sleeves are a great detail and aren't too long to get in the way while eating. I wore this out one night and also to work so it is versatile. Would definitely rent again!

This top has that subtle glam vibe i adore. I wore this to a job interview (and got the job!) and for the rest of the day as well. All my friends liked it and when they looked closer and saw the details they loved it! The sleeves are a little short on me and i'll probably get a large instead of medium if i rent again
I wore this to work with a navy camisole underneath. The top is beautiful, however, ran a bit short in the torso for my preference.

The fit is a bit tight. It's a bit of a crop top, so you definitely need a cami underneath to help with the length when sitting or moving. From the images, I did not realize it was so short. Also, it was a bit tight around the chest. I always wear small, which works for me, but this was exceptionally small and almost did not fit. Definitely order up one size!
It was a beautiful shirt but it run s small

I paired this with jeans and felt good in it. It is a little too girlish for me but it is well-made and on trend with the ruffles and the transparent fabric. 4 stars because it had no stretch and I didn't love it.

links_reviews_title: Business in the front, party in the back
links_reviews_text: So adorable for a friend's birthday party. The sheer back makes it sexy without being over the top.
Great top, wore an undershirt for work
Cute top for a night out. Paired with jeans and tucked in with belt. Sheer back, which i somehow missed in the photos, so not really work appropriate.
Absolutely loved the look of this!
Very forgiving dress! I hiked it up to make it a little shorter since I paired it with combat boots for the concert. Very comfortable and fun.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to move around and dance in! Flattering and stylish.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, flattering. Super comfy and easy to move it.
Loved this dress, the only thing that bugged me was the sleeves always wanted to slide up so I was always pulling them back down.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress but a little awkward.
links_reviews_text: This dress is cute and funky but I found neither size fit me well. The M seemed to be too small in the bust but the large was droopy and too long on the bottom (perhaps it was stretched out?). I ended up going with the M but found I was pulling the smocked upper down constantly which was annoying.
Loved this - rented to go dancing with girlfriends super flattering and stripe pattern hides any problem areas.

This dress was so comfortable and flattering at 35 weeks pregnant. My only complaint is it does look really funny in pictures with the stripes and my pregnant belly. In person it was fine but in pictures it definitely starts to look like there is an optical illusion on your baby bump. If that doesn't bother you though, I would definitely recommend renting. It's very stretchy and comfy material.

The fabric is stretchy and you can "bunch it up" in areas where you may need more "coverage"-- IE: Tummy area for me! It's an fun and cute pattern. It's snug fitting but the fabric and style is very forgiving. Would love to own this dress! Fits true to size. You could dress it up or down ... SO FUN!
This dress fit my curves perfectly. I wore it to a work event. It's very stylish and unique. It hit right below the knee.

can't say enough great things about this gorgeous dress. It is soooo flattering. Form fitting, yes, but it bunches up in the right places and accentuated my figure. Husband loved it, and I might end up buying it. Was surprised that the XS fit me because I would have ordinarily gone with the S, but it wasn't available when my event was. I wore this dress to a wonderful dinner and a play and even with eating quite a bit, I didn't feel self conscious because of where the dress has ruching. the length was very appropriate too. You won't be disappointed with this dress!

I adore this unique yet sexy dress by Nicole Miller! Running true to size in a very stretchy and curve hugging fabric, I recommend ordering your usual size. This style is fitted and comfortable throughout the whole dress. It works for all cup sizes and you should wear a strapless bra. At 5'3 the length hit knee length on me. Such a unique and fun date night dress! Pair with black pumps and a black clutch to complete your outfit!
This dress was so comfortable and stylish!! The fit and material is perfect. I wore it during our vacation and gotten many compliments. I would definitely rent this dress again!

Pros: fit true to size, cute print with black and primary colors, knee length or longer depending on height, top can be worn on or off the shoulders depending on the setting Cons: unlined, smocked bust has a narrow ruffle that hits just below the breasts (but I had to pull the dress down frequently to keep it there) While cute, I don't plan to rent again.
The dress can be shorter or longer as it is snug and you can bunch it up. Very cute!
25 weeks pregnant and this dress was awesome.
Fits exactly true to size.

links_reviews_title: So much fun! Easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: It was a scrunchie dress that could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a work event. Good balance of professional and fun.
links_reviews_text: Very stretchy rouching around stomach and bottom made for an easy fit. The print is cool and not too distracting.

I wore a medium although my usual size is 6/ small and it fit well. It accentuates curves due to the ruching. The dress is much more casual than it looks in the picture. It's made of cotton/ t shirt material, so is best suited for daytime or a casual event. You have to constantly pull down the top to maintain the off the shoulder look.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for night out and was super comfortable. I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I am usually an XS or an S and the S fit me perfect.

I really wanted to like this dress, but it bunched in all the wrong places and was very unflattering, especially in the stomach area. Perfect maternity dress, lots of stretch. Runs mostly true to size if not slightly large. Great in theory, just didn't translate as I'd hoped.
Wore this to a Broadway show and felt just dressed up enough but not overdressed. This dress was super comfortable and hugged all the right areas
Nothing special. Good for a baby bump but I didn't feel amazing in it so didn't wear it.
Great fit!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this dress because it was very snug, in a flattering way, but just not for the event.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute if you want to show off your body. I didn't think it was appropriate for the event but it was very cute and hugs all the right areas.

links_reviews_title: a bit more summary than i had expected. but would rent again for summer!
links_reviews_text: body consious but forgivable fabric

links_reviews_title: Cute concept but rode up all night.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress, and I did as long as I was standing perfectly still with zero arm movement. But as I'm not a mannequin, I did move and the dress moved with me. I spent all night pulling it back down after the top rode up. Definitely not a good option if you have larger boobs.
Fitted, off the shoulder dress. Gun and flirty
Definitely made my 2nd tri bump look huge. But was super cute!

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty, on trend and comfortable
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an evening summer wedding in Newport, Rhode Island. This dress is so cute, flirty and comfortable. I could have worn the extra small or the small; there is lot of stretch in the dress. I opted to wear the small for comfort. The length of the dress is tasteful , three inches above the knee for me and most of my height is in my legs. The spandex in the dress enables you to lengthen or shorten the dress. The array of colors in the dress lends to many options for shoes and accessories. The design makes this dress form fitting yet a little forgiving all around.
nice overall

I thought this dress would be thicker and more structured than it was - I was actually pleasantly surprised to find out the body material is really thin and airy. The chest part is the one-size-fits-all ruching. I didn't think the dress was flattering to my midsection so I decided not to wear it.
Great dress!

I had a hard time getting the stripes to lay right. There is one diagonal stripe that seemed to fit right under my abdomen and highlight that it's not perfectly flat. Also, the gathered top was a little tight across the bust. Just felt like there was a lot going on in the dress and it didn't complement my curves but competed with them.

links_reviews_title: I wore this out for my 30th birthday.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super flattering and comfortable! The fabric feels great and it is form fitting, but not too tight.

links_reviews_title: Cuter and more comfortable than jeans.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy. Runs one size small. I loved it. If you want to look cute and be comfortable running errands and hanging with the kids this is it.

This dress is fitted, but hides imperfections nicely. It's a fun pick. The pattern and color combo make it a little less dressy than it looks on the model. Received compliments and enjoyed wearing this one.
On the tighter side but was comfortable. Unfortunately it washed me out completely. I wore it for 30 minutes before changing into something different. Would look good on darker skin complexion.

links_reviews_title: cute and easy. I wore it with the sleeves on my shoulders, and that was fine.
links_reviews_text: easy, stretchy fit.

I wore this at least three times in the run up to my wedding and on my honeymoon. This dress is so comfortable, flattering, and versatile--can be dressed up or down and hides any lumps and bumps. Very tempted to buy.

Loved this dress!! It is very tight and form fitting but the material is thick and with the ruching, it hides any flaws. I thought about keeping it. The dress I got still had tags on and when I first put it on it was super snug but it relaxed a bit during the evening. The only complaint I have is that I felt like I was adjusting the neckline a lot. But overall I felt great in this.
This jacket is super fun and adorable. I'm considering just buying it. Great to dress up or dress down.
Great fit and very flattering!
Love this jacket!! Very warm, fun, and cozy. I like that the sleeves are 3/4 length because it is a nice contrast with the oversized look of the rest of the jacket. I'd rent again

links_reviews_title: This is a great jacket to wear multiple ways with its classic retro look! Dress it up or down.
links_reviews_text: I wear a 4-6 and the medium was a little big but I like that for over sweaters. I wish it had a closure in front, like a hook and eye, but it looks great belted with a black leather sash, too! This is the perfect topper for a weekend wedding. It is lightweight an you can wear it with everything from jeans and a tee to a LBD. I love the black leather piping on the pockets and the leopard pattern is perfect.
Comfy coat that was the perfect touch to my leopard costume and kept me warm outside on a 45 degree day.

This is a very cute jacket and in great quality! It will keep you very warm but in terms of wearing it out on a city night, it's a little too puffy for my taste. If you're going out in the snow then this would be great. I just wish it was a little more slim fitting.
This fur jacket is adorable! Super cute for any occasion. Runs true to size recommend going one size up for backup. Would've loved to pair this with a pair of jeans and some knee high boots!

I rented this through unlimited and I absolutely loved it. But at the end of the day, I sent it back because it just wasn't my style. A little too loud for me. But I felt like a million bucks. It is so high quality. I'm sure I will rent it again when I go through some other unlimited options. It's styled a bit oversized. Hated sending back . Regrets as I'm writing this! Ah!

links_reviews_title: Cute , boxy, warm enough for autumn days , milder winter days .
links_reviews_text: Cute jacket / boxy fit / sleeves are wider and short . Nice pockets . Shorter than I thought it would be . Not exactly my style -- the boxy , shorter fit, but very fun, soft , well made . Defin stands out .
I thought this was a coat when renting it but it does not close. Still really cute though

links_reviews_title: Perfect topper to dress up a basic maxi for a winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, a little big on me but site was out of size S when I ordered. So soft, big pockets.
Loved the 3/4 sleeves. Perfect for chilly fall days.
Bought this cuddly jacket

links_reviews_title: Love how much of a standout piece this is
links_reviews_text: High quality - loved the fit. Was able to wear with black denim and also as a more formal jacket over a dress
Had the structure of a bathrobe/pajama top and turns out the label is indeed a lingerie/pajama company. Kind of weird. Wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great fun and perfect for LA winter weather.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments received with this one. 3/4 bell sleeves and styling are very "retro". Not very warm, as the jacket doesn't close- it really is more of a cardigan. Loved it!
Wanted to love this, but the fit is really oversize - huge collar, huge bell sleeves, which you can't really tell from the model photo. I think maybe best for someone tall.
Collar has a beautiful style
I love this so much and would have bought it if it wasn't 800 dollars.

links_reviews_title: It was fun for a backyard party.
links_reviews_text: It was warm.

links_reviews_title: Nothing says fancy-old-lady quite like this...
links_reviews_text: After a recent birthday, I figured done comic relief might be in order. Enter this. Over the top. Fuzzy. Short. Warm. Iconic. Would cats-eye glasses be too much with this?
Fit is perfect. 3/4 sleeves. LOVE! Lots of compliments. Will rent it again.
love it! Want to buy!
This is just a fun jacket to wear. Makes any boring outfit feel fancy.
I wore this to work with a pair of Leopard print horsehair mules and I looked FINE! Got so many compliments from random peeps on the street. Headturner! Rent..and enjoy!

links_reviews_title: loved it and received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved the jacket but the main issue is that it SHEDS!! By noon - my black pants were a mess since the jacket continuously shed. Bring a lint brush.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but doesn't allow for any flaws.
links_reviews_text: Dress is super cute. I wore the small but if I rent again I would get the Medium. Bc it is very form fitting no room for flaws or errors. Definitely need to wear a Spanx and be sure to size UP. Also it does run up just bc of the material so I am thinking a size up would help with length. Overall cute dress for everyday, party or football party.

I could have worn the Medium but because reviews said it was short I only ordered the large, so it wouldn't be too short, and it wasn't. This dress will not forgive any tummy! I wore spanx to make sure nothing showed.
Such a fun dress to wear on my Spain vacation. Short!!!! And I would size up, as it's a little tight (even though it's stretchy and the material expands.) so cute - must rent
This was a great summer work dress. It is very tight and hugs every curve so I wore spanks. It is also a little short but I'm 5'4" so it wasn't a huge deal for me.
Fits great, moves great when you walk. Loved the sleeves. You do have to be adjusting it all day because it rolls up.

Loved the way this dress hugged my curves! It such a unique color and cut, which is exactly why I love RTR! I would never have picked this in a store but was able to be adventurous with a rental! Dress is a little short (especially in the back if you have booty) but was able to wear with sneakers for a casual work look and then changed into heels to go out to dinner.
Very pretty

links_reviews_title: Cute dress in a sophisticated color
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. Well made. Interesting color. It is a bit short, and I found myself having to tug it back down halfway frequently when walking to keep my rear from being exposed. Be aware it's very unforgiving in the mid-section. I am carrying just a touch more weight there than I'd like to be at the moment, and this dress did nothing to hide that.
