I'm normally a size S but grabbed this dress in a Medium from the nyc store just for casual wear. From the front it looked fine but the fabric bunched up awkwardly in the back around the waist. Although the small would've fit better in the body, I'm afraid it would've been too short for me..didn't end up wearing

links_reviews_title: Color looks great with my complexion
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute and flirty. The material of the body gives a nice fit
This was really cute but too tight for me personally. I wasn't comfortable as it hugs a lot and can be unflattering.
Fits great. Super comfortable and flattering. I think better in person than in photos
Shows every little bump

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this but if you're any taller than me I don't know how you'd do it
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute on, it does really suck you in it's pretty tight. The skirt is also really short so if you're any taller than me I'd be cautious.

links_reviews_title: Love how the dress fits. Only issue is it rides up.
links_reviews_text: Love how the dress fits. Only issue is it rides up.
This dress fit beautifully. I loved the adjustable straps, length, and shape. It was really comfortable and I received a lot of compliments.

I loved this dress! It fit perfectly - I had originally ordered the size 14 because I wasn't sure, but they weren't able to send it. RTR has such great customer service- they sent me two other dresses to make up for it, but I ended up not needing them. The dress is fitted on top and a bit roomy on the bottom, so I was comfortable all night long. I got a lot of compliments on it! The color is gorgeous and was really nice for a Christmas party!

links_reviews_title: I knew it was perfect when I saw it!
links_reviews_text: Attended a charity event where I was an honoree. Needed something that stood out without being too sexy, too formal. The dark green is lovely with the lace details. Also Trina Turk is based where I work, so keeping it local! I wanted to accentuate my shoulders, but cover my chest. I also have no waist so the bodice was nicely fitted to keep my tummy looking flat and draw the eye to the halter (has adjustable straps in back) and the drop waisted flare skirt. It fit just right. Perfect for the occasion!
Great for longer then I expected

links_reviews_title: Incredibly comfortable and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Great dress. True to size. I'm a 34DD and the top was tight enough that i didn't need to wear a bra. easy to dance in. I give it a 10!
This dress fit very well and ran true to size. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: All of the compliments on my dress!!
links_reviews_text: Top fit great - nice and snug for my C-cups. Perfect for dancing the night away without pulling it shifting.
Easy and pretty! Love the length and color.

The dress fit great. I'm a 36 D and the 12 was form fitting but not confining. I also did not feel the need to wear spanx because of the looser lower half. The straps are adjustable. A very nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: My husband and I attended a spring "black tie optional" wedding, so I rented this dress to wear. I really liked the color of the dress, the length, and the lace. I also liked the high neck - I wore a strapless bra and had no issues. It was comfortable and overall I really did like the dress. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the weird stomach seems. Instead of a cinched waist where the dress flares out, it's like a double cinch where the band goes right across your stomach. It isn't super noticeable, but it's very odd. Overall it's a great dress, but be aware of the stomach area because it could be unflattering on some body types.

This was originally my back-up dress, but it ended up being the best option for the wedding I was attending. The size four ran true to size, if not a little large. This dress was fairly conservative and there were many exactly like it at the wedding. I felt good enough, but definitely not like a knock-out. Great back-up option, would not rent again.
This dress had just the right amount of stretch to be comfortable all night. Great length and gorgeous color!
Loved the dress and the color for a winter wedding. It fit great and the lace was classic and simple. I normally wear a size 2 and it fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: The color was amazing and it was such a flattering fit!
links_reviews_text: Fit was very flattering, it was true to size and the length was perfect for a winter wedding.
Lots of compliments! Felt like the bust fit a bit strangely and created creases, but still very flattering.
Definitely snug on top, adjustable straps were awesome. Absolutely beautiful in color and fabric. So flattering to my figure.
I rented this dress for a black-tie optional wedding. It ran pretty true to size and was comfortable. I found it to be very flattering.

Got so many compliments on this dress. I wore it to a wedding and paired it with nude pumps and a leather jacket. Wish the slip/underlining of the dress stopped a few inches above the lace overlay but other than that the dress is perfect!
I loved the color! I wish I would have sizes up to allow more room for comfort and flexibility. Very easy to style and the lace pattern is beautiful. Loved he hemline as well and the drop waist.

I love this summer dress by Trina Turk ! Running true to size , I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up especially for bigger bust. This style is fitted all around and gives you a nice classy summer look for any occasion. It works best for cup sizes A-C and can be worn with a strapless bra . At 5’2”, the length stops me at knee length and with a nude color pair of heels this will complete your outfit! Adding a nice handbag and light jewelry accessory will also give it its fashionable touch.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun and flattering dress!
links_reviews_text: The size 4 fit perfectly. I was able to wear a strapless bra very comfortably even though I probably could have gotten away with out one. The only thing I didn't like about this dress is the VERY high neck line! It was awkward and uncomfortable. If it was just a little lower...this was be a perfect dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was very flattering and I enjoyed renting it for a friends black tie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and material of this dress as well as the high neck. Only thing I didn't love about it was the weird seem in the middle of the dress, and the fact that I couldn't wear a bra.

This dress was tight on my chest and quite loose around my waist and hips, sitting a bit awkwardly. I have a short torso, so the seam didn't hit in the right spot and it was a bit longer than ideal. Overall, I liked this dress, but wouldn't wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Very fancy wedding, perfect springtime weather!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, tons of compliments. The color was perfect for a spring wedding, but would be great in winter also. I ended up wearing the size 6 (my usual size), but I ordered an 8 to be safe. The drop waist is forgiving of your booty. It also helped that the straps were adjustable. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Backup dress, Gorgeous but not for me
links_reviews_text: This dress is lovely and fit me well buuut I'm a little too short for it. The drop waist hit right at the wrong place and just didn't work for me. Didn't wear this but I love the idea of this dress, just didn't fit me quite right.

When it comes to dresses I normally wear a size 8-10. For this dress I wish I had gone down to a 6. I do have a larger chest and it fit good up top, but the waist was a little big. It worked for the event because I was able to eat and dance comfortably. I did like that I could wear a strapless bra as well. The lace detail was beautiful and I liked that the color was a dark green, almost black looking when inside.

The dress was amazing! I got both a 6 and 8 and I chose to wear the 8. The neck line is a little high but didn't really bother me. The lace was subtle but very pretty. Was perfect for the charity ball I went to with my husband.

links_reviews_title: A great dress for a banquet!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, very slimming and got a TON of compliments! Hid trouble post pregnancy tummy spot.

I rented this dress for a formal event. The dress was a true fit, it was forgiving around the mid section, the straps are adjustable and the length was perfect. Danced all night and felt very comfortable.
I loved this dress it was a little Longer then i expected but i am also very short the fit was flawless

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, great fit! Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! I took my typically dress size in this style and really liked the fit. It does have sort of a drop waist which I wasnt sure I would like, but ultimately I did. It gave it a bit more interest. I don't have a super flat stomach, so I wanted something that flatters my figure and this was perfect with Spanx underneath. I got loads of compliments and would absolutelt rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Not my style, watch out for the hems
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress, there are hems on the waist that make it look "pioneer women”/country style which was kot what i was expecting from the professional photo.
Nice fit anf perfect color for thr holidays! Great for tall and slim gals!

I LOVED this dress! And to think it was my back-up. I rented to wear to a holiday party and it did not disappoint. The photo does not do it justice- it is a lovely dark green color with lovely accents. The best part is that the straps in the back are adjustable so you can wear it as low or high as you are comfortable. Because the fit was so perfect, I personally did not need a bra (just some adjusting once it was zipped) but you could easily wear it with a strapless if you wanted that option. Also the length was great, it hit me right at mid-knee and I'm 5'7". I would not hesitate to rent this dress again.

This was my favorite rental yet! This dress is great quality and a perfect color for a winter holiday party. It was a very flattering fit! I would definitely recommend!!! I fit well in the 6, however wore the 8 for more coverage on top.

links_reviews_title: The green color was beautiful and perfect for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: Fit was pretty true to size. I usually wear a M or 8 but in party dresses i usually wear a 10. The lace was nice and had a vintage vibe. I got a lot of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit really well. I'm 5'6" and the dress hit just below my knees. Waist hit at a good spot ... not too high or low. Straps are adjustable which was nice. I'm smaller chested and did not have to wear a bra. I'm between a 12/14 right now. The 14 gave me breathing room in the dress (not much stretch) without feeling big or unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but very tight in chest
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and I wanted it to work but it was way too tight in the chest area (which is surprising for me because I am a 34A). It was pinching just below the armpit and not at all attractive in that area.
Wore this for a dinner and it was so comfortable! And sexy! Will rent again!

I felt amazing in this dress, and received a ton of compliments! The halter top allowed me to show off my arms but also was flattering for my smaller bust. The A line worked very nicely for my pear shape as well. And the hunter green color was gorgeous - a nice break from the typical black or red tones. This was my perfect dress! I might buy it :-P

links_reviews_title: Casual but fun baby shower dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my baby shower at 35 weeks pregnant. It was super comfortable. A bit casual for my usual style, but the fun slit helped and you could totally accessorize more to make it dressier. It is soft and easy to wear. I wore a strapless bra and maternity spanx because it would have shown underwear lines. At 189 lbs and 35 weeks, I wore the large and it was pretty perfect for my size. Would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for wedding or party- I also wore to work
links_reviews_text: This is flattering! I wore to a Funeral, wedding, party, and to work- Perfect for all Of t!

I rented this dress as an option for my August baby shower and ended up going with it. It was super comfortable and had a nice long slit up the side that made it feel slightly more special than just a typical summer maxi. I rented some fun earrings to spice it up and really liked how effortless but fun the look came together for the event. I'm 5'2" and wore 3-4" wedges and it was the perfect length with a 31 week bump - not too long at all.

I love the stretchy fabric on this dress by Susana Monaco! It runs true to size with a lot of stretch. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size. The style is roomy throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra so you should wear a strapless bra. At 5 ft, the length hit me floor length. Pair with a comfy shoe!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable- a bit tight on the bust
links_reviews_text: My bustline has gotten much bigger with pregnancy, so this was a little tight. Otherwise very comfortable for a summer evening.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a graduation. It was very comfortable at 26 weeks pregnant.
links_reviews_text: I am a 34D and was able to get away with wearing a bandeau with this which was so nice. I am 5'6 and this was a little long on me, but with high wedges it worked. I was 26 weeks when I wore and was comfortable on night and received lots of complements!

The material is thin, so you need major Spanx to cover any lumps and bumps. The elastic under the arms is very tight and gives you that “underarm flab” look. The leg slit is actually pretty high and when you sit down you have to constantly adjust.

I did not wear this as I found the cut very unflattering. It highlighted my arms in a negative way and it didn't hug the bump in the right places like most maternity dresses. However, the color is very deep and pretty.
This dress was the perfect length, and was especially flattering in the bust area, which can be challenging for me, especially in dresses.
Not long. Had to wear with flats which I preferred anyway.

links_reviews_title: very comfortable on a hot day
links_reviews_text: straps just a tad bit long but otherwise perfect fit for the 3rd trimester
This dress was adorable. The only negative for me has nothing to do with the dress itself. I am top heavy and it was a little tight in the chest, so maybe order a size up.

links_reviews_title: loved the dress. super comfortable, very different. Great for cocktail/evening
links_reviews_text: I didn't want to return it. the fit was great and comfortable. totally felt like a movie star.

I'm 5ft tall 126lbs - curvy and this dress fit great! It's light weight so comfortable. Has a flare bottom and deep v neck . It was stunning and I got tons and tons of compliments! I'm actually considering buying it!
This dress was cute and comfortable. I wore it a few times, once to my friend's rehearsal dinner. I found it very flattering in person, although not quite as A Line as it was on the model

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to opening night of a Broadway musical. The dress code was "Epic Attire."
links_reviews_text: The dress was really comfortable and much lighter, stretchier fabric than I was expecting. It was not too short. The colors really stood out with my pale skin and the helpful woman at Sephora suggested a red lip to contrast. I paired this with open-toed block heels and a faux leather side-zip jacket for the chilly April NYC weather. I got the 4 as a backup and while both fit when I tried them on in the morning, by the evening I was glad to have a bit more give in the size 6.

Loved this dress. Wore it for a a night at the theatre and it was so flattering and comfy. More cleavage than I thought there would be. The black of the dress is raised and it really adds to the overall look of the dress.
Great length a petite girl. Comfortable. Wore with a regular bra. Added a black necklace and ended up wearing black pumps. In a scale of 1-10, I’d rate it a 7 or 8.

I rented this dress for a NYE party. I absolutely loved it! So did my Husband. I am 4'11, 34C and weight 114lbs. I wore a size 4. My back up was a size 2, it fit but I wanted a little bit of room. The size 4 was perfect! The length hit right above my knee. I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: I liked the black pattern on the blue. Was very pretty color combination.
links_reviews_text: I rented the dress for a New Year's Eve wedding. Was perfect for the occasion. Very comfortable and flattering.
I am 5'7 124lbs and the size 0 fit perfectly! A little tight in the chest area (32D), but I would absolutely rent again. The details are amazing!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress for winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'1" so it hit nicely above the knee (although it does it run on the shorter side). The V-neck top was flattering and allowed you to wear a regular bra. The fabric was also thick and stretchy, and felt very nicely made. Overall I thought it was really flattering, comfortable, and fun to dance in!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my 20th reunion and it totally wowed!! I wish I could keep it.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is stretchy, which makes it super comfortable, but it is also thin, so shapewear was necessary. I could have worn the 8, but then I would have been in full body shapewear, so I opted for comfort, even though there were one or two places where the dress was a touch big. It was a super classy look, and I highly recommend it!

I wore this dress as a backup to my first dress that wouldn't arrive on time. I honestly wasn't wowed by the dress when I first saw it online and in person, but knew it would be a "safe" bet. The dress was very comfortable the whole night as it fit me perfectly overall. I added my own sparkly accessories which helped make the outfit pop and help me stand out more. I received compliments for how I put it all together!

I was concerned about what size to get after reading reviews, at the time I wore this dress I was 167 which is a higher weight then normal for me, I usually wear a 8. The 10 wasn't available so I went for the 8 hoping I could squeeze but turned out to fit perfectly, it was even a little loose! The material is nice and thick and has stretch. The chest is a bit low cut but it's great because you can wear a normal bra with it. I will say while the skirt didn't feel short while standing, when I sat down it didn't cover my butt so I was glad I wore little spandex shorts under it! Overall I really liked this dress and would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite, but it worked for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is quite short; while sitting, my bare butt touched the seat! This dress is nice, but I wouldn't rent it again.

This dress was the best. I ordered two and there wasn't even a doubt this was perfect. I wore it to a benefit for fallen law enforcement officers. The blue was the perfect color. The fit was sexy without being too short or show too much cleavage. I wasn't adjusting it all night and it for like a glove. I am 5'2" and it hit me perfectly at the knee. I am also a (old navy) size 8, and this (I felt) for true to size. I would highly recommend this super comfortable, lovely dress.

Like others have commented, this dress is on the short side and lower cut. With that being said, it is such a great dress. The design and colors are perfect. The material is thick, so it's forgiving and the skirt stays in place. It was so much fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect dress for a black-tie optional gala.
links_reviews_text: The dress was easy to wear and fit perfectly. I dressed it up a bit with some jewelry.

I thought this dress was great, but my husband really loved it on me. He usually doesn't notice clothes too much and I get the standard "you look nice". But this time told me how great I looked and how much he liked my dress so many times. It made my chest look great with out being too out there. The fabric was nice and soft, the details were nice up close. I'd definitely rent again!

After reading some reviews I decided to get the size 2 and it fit me really well. It is super comfortable, I felt really pretty on it and got tons of compliments! I rented it for a cocktail attire fall wedding in New Mexico and it kept me warm as the fabric is thick. Loved every part of it!

I LOVED EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS DRESS! The embroidery was so pretty and the dress was sooo comfortable! The material was a little stretchy which made it comfortable all night! I wish I could wear this dress all the time. I got so many compliments!
Great fit and loved the details on the dress! Perfect for a wedding.
Dress was so comfortable and received so many compliments.
Everyone loved this dress. It was comfortable and easy to wear. Flashy but easy to dress up or down. Loved it.
It fit perfectly and was very comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for my sister's rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: The dress is a lovely dark blue with black details. It hid my belly very well, and I received many compliments. I have a large chest (34DDD) and the 8 was a little tight across there and at the arm holes, but I'm glad I chose to wear it over the 10 as it relaxed during the night and was very comfortable. I had no problems sitting and eating in this dress.
Perfect fit! Loved the intricate details. Beautiful shade of midnight blue with black details on top. I wore it to work and I liked it a lot!
I liked the dress - it fits like a glove, so I'd say it runs a bit small.
I rented this for my anniversary with my husband and this was my first time using rent the runway. I loved this dress! It was a perfect fit. I ordered a Medium. I will be using RTR again

links_reviews_title: I rented this actually as my backup dress and ended up loving it more than the other style!
links_reviews_text: The details of this dress are beautiful! Although the pattern doesn’t photograph quite as well as it looks in person. The fabric was great quality and it fit true to size. I’m 5’3” and it fell above my knees- it might be a little short for taller ladies. Loved this dress and would definitely rent again!

Loved this dress! Cut was flattering and colors aren't given justice in this picture but it's a really pretty blue! I normal wear a sheath-style dress so with this being loose, it felt shorter than I'm used to, but it wasn't bad. I'd recommend this!

I'm obsessed with this dress! So much so that I tried to find it after I returned it so I could own it. It really sucked me in a made me look fantastic. I felt sexy but wedding appropriate. I ordered the 2 but ended up wearing the 4. Both of them fit but I had more breathing room in the 4. The material is stretchy but definitely sucks everything in! I wasn't planning on wearing the dress with tights and boots but the weather ended up being super cold that day, but the dress still looked great! I think this is perfect for a fall or winter wedding/event. I highly recommend this dress!
Sexy but classy, comfy dress

links_reviews_title: Very fun dress - did not wear for New Years Eve, however was able to wear on Jan. 1st dinner.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, flattering style for lots of body types. The dark blue and brocade detail is hard to see, except under strong lights. I would definitely rent again, or prefer to just purchase this dress for my closet.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress. Loved it! Wore it for NYE.
links_reviews_text: A little low cut but appropriate for a party. Fit true to size for me.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my company holiday party. Flirty, fun and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, true to size. It's really meant for ladies with a smaller chest (B/ small C cup or smaller), as I needed to wear a camisole underneath to look less exposed. The pattern is really pretty (think faux leather paisley against a dark blue background). I was really comfortable and loved the fit and flare silhouette, and really happy I could wear a regular bra underneath.

This wasnt the original dress i rented, but was a replacement. The dress was a little shorter than what I'd normally wear, but wasn't bad. When you sit in this dress it surprisingly wasn't short. Very comfortable and flattering. The picture makes it look darker than it was, but it is a very pretty blue!
LOVED the color and cut! Ran just a bit small but the 2 (my usual size) worked fine. Would rent this again!!

links_reviews_title: This was a fun, comfortable dress for a late Fall wedding. Loved wearing it!
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size and was incredibly comfortable. Not too long and not too short and the shape is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for an indoor fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my pear shape. The top was tight enough to be flattering while the bottom was flowy enough to be comfortable. The photo does not do the color justice. The black design on the royal blue fabric is so beautiful and unique! The fabric has a little bit of stretch to it, so it fit like a glove! It was true to size for me. I'm 5'5" and the length was perfect for me, but taller women might find this a little short. This was my first RTR experience, and I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Unique print and perfect maxi length on a petite frame
links_reviews_text: I wore this maxi for a lunch out with a friend. We sat outside and it was easy, cute, and comfortable. It was the perfect maxi length on someone short. It looks great with a jacket to make it more casual.
Great dress for everyday, brunch, date night, etc! Loved the colors and fit! Will rent again!!

I would suggest sizing down as the sizing runs a bit large. I wore this to a friend's bachelorette weekend in wine country, and while we wound up cancelling plans for that evening, I felt great in this dress. It was easy and light, and despite sizing down (I am typically a true size 4 but rented the extra small), my shoulders didn't feel restricted. I would rent again when I have an opportunity to wear something pretty but casual.

This was a stylist-chosen replacement for one of my rentals. I would never have rented it--but it was a surprisingly fun dress. Comfortable for dancing and very light material. Unfortunately it was a replacement for a dress that "runs small"--and this dress definitely "runs large." So overall, it was 1-2 sizes too large on me. I had to find a belt to reign in some of the material and give it some shape.
This dress is really beautiful and super comfortable. Love that it can be dressed down with sandals or dressed up with heels.

I wore this to a songwriter's brunch in Austin. Not only was it beautiful, but the compliments were flowing AND...big bonus...it's sooo comfortable! I didn't pack a belt for the trip, but it may be a good option.

links_reviews_title: I'm 6 ft and this was a a good length for me. It was super comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Love the off the shoulder look and it stayed in place all night unlike a lot of other off the shoulder clothes that ride up.

I enjoyed wearing this one. I almost always need a size large in off the shoulder styles because i cant stand the feeling of tight elastic on my arms. Sometimes that means the dress is too big elsewhere - but with how this dress is made it worked out fine.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for work. Pretty dress.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy. Good length for someone who is shorter (5"4').
This dress was beautiful and comfortable, and a great way to still feel cute while pregnant! The dress is light weight and easy to just slip on and be out the door.
This dress is really cute , I just didn't find it special. I was incredibly comfortable and flattering. Runs a bit large

links_reviews_title: Versatile, beautiful, flattering - Amazing Stretchy Fabric - Love It!!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous print, beautiful colors. Fabric has this thin meshy-ness to it that with its lining included is so soft and stretchy it doesn't wrinkle, it moves really nicely and is perfect for casual or dressy occasions. Waist makes is slimming instead of just saggy/baggy. Just rent this is so true. It's the best!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for packing, comfortable and cool.
links_reviews_text: LOVE Wore this 3x with my unlimited subscription. Once to an outdoor evening concert, once out to dinner on a date night, and to church on Father's Day. Can be dressed up with heels or down with Flip flops. This dress would be flattering on so many types of figures. Doesn't wrinkle, great fabrics, lightly lined. I wore a strapless bra but with the ruffle, you might not need one. Great colors and quality. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Incredible dress! Flattering, even when 7 months pregnant.
links_reviews_text: I definitely wore this dress a little differently than designed - I pulled the natural waist up right below the bra line. Because of this, it worked great as a maternity dress! The flow is beautiful. The pattern is stunning. Because of the fabric and double layers, it was a little uncomfortable in 90' heat. Will rent again the moment I'm not pregnant!
The fabric has a lot of stretch which made this dress a dream to wear! I'm only 5'1 and I was able to wear this dress with flats which I also loved.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, a bit too costumey
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Comfortable and hung nicely. A bit too much like a costume but color was nice and off shoulder trend worked.

THIS is the way to do the off the shoulder trend, because it also nips in at the waist to give a perfect hourglass shape! This is a great length to wear with bare feet or sandals (I'm 5'4"). I'm keeping this dress all month on my Unlimited subscription to wear on the patio at home, on a beach trip and out during the day or night! I love how it reminds me of the Mexican style dresses my mom and grandmother wore in decades past. But it's WAY more comfy given the soft and stretchy fabric. My hips are a size 8/10 and my top is a size 4. I'm pear shaped and I'm wearing a size small in this dress and comfortable as can be!

I wore this dress three times in the week I had it. I had to. It just felt perfect from the moment I slipped it over my head. Strapless bra and all. It' was a delight and I felt like a folk princess with bare shoulders and ruffles. The fall of the dress is straight but not restricting in any way. It was a comfortable bohemian look perfect for my arts tour of Haiti. I stayed cool and confident with it on.

links_reviews_title: shoulders stayed just where they needed to be.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress. Comfortable.
Perfect fit and great for vacation

links_reviews_title: easy for my daughter to wear. She looked beautiful- BTW she hates wearing dresses
links_reviews_text: Fit well, skirt loose. The top covered her arms and she loved that
Loads of compliments. Very comfortable & cool for our vacation. Can dress it up or down
This dress was a great dress for an evening party in Florida. Fuzzi fabric has great stretch, and the fabric was a beautiful print that was perfect camouflage for this 3 month postpartum Mom!
A+ Rented for Caribbean vacation. Fit was perfect, loved everything about it. Will rent again.
Beautiful dress. Put a large black belt w it. Tons of compliments.
Wore it to a lunch date and received a ton of compliments, easy fun and different then other dress I buy or rent.
I loved the dress but didn't like the pattern

I was surprised by this dress, that is the poly mesh material. I expected a typical boho cotton style (yes even though description states poly...) the mesh is actually stretchy. The poly mesh has a different flow and hang than a cotton boho. Initially I found the mesh scratchy but I've gotten over it; I've worn this dress several times now. Very easy to wear, near ankle length on me, I've worn with wedge heels. Shoulders can be worn up, or off the shoulder.

Such a great dress for summer. Can dress up or down. At 5'3" one of the few dresses I can actually wear with flats and not be dragging on the ground! It is definitely a stand-out piece, so be prepared to turn heads wherever you are!!!
This dress is so beautiful. I wore it to a casual birthday party and received many compliments. It seems to run a little big so maybe order a size down if you're in between sizes.
A little large, but nice to have the extra room

Super stretchy so it runs a little big. If there's any question size down. I wear a 4/6 and wore the XS in this dress. Had lots of seams which doesn't look the best on my body type. But it was cute and comfy anyway.

links_reviews_title: The most amazing fabric I ever felt
links_reviews_text: So in love with this dress. I was worried it would run small and went a size up, it end up being too long and a little too big. The fabric was amazing, like silk gauze. I never felt overheated or sweaty in this dress. Breathable, flowy, amazing!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, perfect for daytime baby shower
links_reviews_text: Cute, casual dress. No stretch so it was a little snug at the natural waist. Lined and comfortable. Wore with strapless bra and black heeled, sandals and a denim jacket.
I wore the dress with dress on shoulders not off. (sorry I did not take any pictures)

This is the perfect summer dress! I loved how this dress fell on the body. The off should look is perfect and comfortable for the warmer weather. We recommend going a size down for the backup for this dress as it is a little roomy. There is comfortable room in the hips and is not restrictive at all which makes it great for any body type! This can be dressed down with sandals or even dressed up with wedges and a statement earring. You will love this look!
Lots of compliments. This dress is adorable! Not really stretchy.

First impression: the fabric is a very wrinkly cotton blend. If I'd decided to wear it, I would have had to spend some quality time with my steamer. I ordered the L and XL. The large was uncomfortably tight around my 26-week belly, but the XL was huge on me, especially in the chest. I was so excited and hopeful that it would work, but it just didn't.
Fit was true to pre-maternity size. Perfect fit for third trimester bump. Very well made. Lined and gorgeous fabric.
I liked it and felt comfortable but in pictures it washed me out.
I wantes to love this dress but it was just OK. Pros: beautiful, airy fabric. Loved the color. Cons: straps too long so I had to wear a blazer. Fabrics wrinkles immediately when you sit down.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: So soft and it made me happy no matter my bump size. Went to an extra large so I could wear it no matter how big the bump gets. Love love love it
I wore this dress at 29 weeks and again at 31 weeks. It is comfortable and cute! I sized up based on other reviews and am glad that I did - there is not much wiggle room!
Teeny tiny; may fit for first trimester but was too tiny for second trimester
Dress was snug through the stomach but huge in the best and shoulders!

links_reviews_title: I wore this just out and about when I was 8 months pregnant.
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable and fit around the belly nicely. The only thing I didnt like was that it wrinkled pretty easily- but not a deal breaker.

links_reviews_title: Definitely size up--I would recommend two sizes.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as an option for my baby shower but ended up not wearing it because it wouldn’t zip. I thought I had ordered accurately based on reviews, but apparently not! Cute dress but am glad I got the backup option I did!
Amazing dress ! Fabric was great quality and showed off the baby bump perfectly. Was a little tight but very flattering

links_reviews_title: Rented for my baby shower - not a good fit
links_reviews_text: This fit absolutely terrible. All of the reviewers said it ran small but I think it ran huge, even with my 30 week baby bump. It looked like I was wearing a big, poor fitting baby blue trash bag. I do not recommend this dress to anyone.
Ran a little large which make it a bit disappointing but overall liked the dress.
Nice color, runs small in the chest area on bigger chests. Wrinkles very easily after sitting.

links_reviews_title: It made me look like I'm wearing a bag.
links_reviews_text: It was very loose on me and was not flattering on my body.

Agree with other reviewers that this was a bit bigger in the chest/has long shoulder straps. Wore when I was 38 weeks pregnant and loves how it fit the bump! Just needed a bit of help filling out the top as well.

links_reviews_title: I don't think this is actually maternity...
links_reviews_text: This might work for 2nd trimester. I'm 35 weeks and not enough room in the bump area at all and I've only gained 18 lbs at this point so I think it probably runs super small!

links_reviews_title: Great at 16 weeks; way too tight at 21 weeks!
links_reviews_text: My bump is juuust too big at 21 weeks to look cute in this dress. But I know if I size up, the straps & length will be too long. There's a small window in the second trimester when this dress looks cute. I rented it for vacation at 16 weeks and loved it. The color is such a pretty light blue. I'll try to squeeze into this one more time this week and then say a sad goodbye. Wrinkles relatively easily, but not enough to bother me.

I ordered my prepregnancy size small and it was way too tight in the belly at 32 weeks (I'm 5'6, normally 120, currently almost 150 at 32 weeks). The material has no streatch. The excess fabric at the bust was not flattering and the straps were too long. Had to return unworn.
I'm currently 6 months pregnant and the dress did not fit around my bump. Not the right fabric to wear during pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect winter dress for a fancy NYC dinner!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a fancy dinner out in February in NYC for my boyfriend's birthday. It was a great stretchy material so the XS fit my curvier hips just fine and was perfect for my smaller top half. I could wear a skin toned strapless bra and not worry about it being able to really show even if it popped up a little under the cut out area. It was a nice length so not too short as some of the XS dresses can be on me if they creep up, and it was nice and warm for a colder night out.

links_reviews_title: Fun and classy for a night out
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a bachelorette party at the casino in November. At 5'1" and 115 pounds, I was happy with the XS because it didn't cling to my butt and legs, but sucked in my stomach with the thick scuba material and came to just above my knee. As other reviews note, the cut outs come down very low in the front. I wore a strapless black bra and accepted that it was slightly visible. This was a fun and sexy but still classy enough option for a winter night out.

This was my "night out" dress in my RTR Update & it was great! The cut is VERY low, so I ended up wearing a black bra that made it look like it had a sweetheart under layer. Was warm enough with tights in the winter. Nice dress that isn't too fancy for a nice dinner out.

I wore this dress for a NYE event and it was great! The material is very thick, almost like a wet suit (think scuba material) but it was very stretchy and I felt it was very flattering. I love the cut outs in the neckline and sleeves. Paired with a pair of sparkly silver flats and it looked great! Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments!!! I really love it!!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5 and 150 lbs I usually were M size but it runs big hopefully I ordered S and the M as backup! It fitted perfectly the only thing is it goes up when you walk but it's feel comfortable maybe if the dress were shorter wouldn't happen . Overall I love it!!

links_reviews_title: Very fitted dress. Not for women who carry their weight in the stomach area. Runs slightly small.
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress, but didn't love it. It is an extremely fitted dress that shows every bump. I don't carry my weight in my stomach, but this dress made it look like I did. I needed to wear spanx and to hold in my stomach throughout the evening to carry off this dress. Other neoprene dresses that I have rented at RTR didn't have that issue. Also, the sleeves are quite long. In terms of fit, I would say it runs fairly small. I am a size 10 in RTR dresses (5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and this dress in size Large was quite fitted on me. Also, because there is only a very short zipper in the back, it takes some wrangling to get into that dress. The dress is unlined and made out of a sturdy neoprene material. The design is via laser-cut cutouts. I wore the dress with a regular nude bra rather than a strapless bra. As long as the tone of the bra matches my skin tone, I found that one couldn't tell what was my bra and what was my skin.
Very flattering. Runs a little bit big. Cute and simple but nothing spectacular

I wanted to try this dress for a NYE's dinner. The forecast called for temperatures in the low 20s so I knew that a scuba material dress would be perfect. I typically wear smalls and size 4 but the small in this case looked bad as it bunched up around the stomach and made me look like I had rolls! The XS actually fit better because it hugged me everywhere. I wore a deep cut strapless bra and you could still see a bit of my black bra but it worked with the dress. I went bare-legged to the restaurant and wore a long coat and felt fine! Even if you overheated in this dress you wouldn't be able to see any sweat because of the material but I didn't have that problem. I would buy is dress!

Dress is awesome. Material is heavier so it was VERY hot in the club we were in. Fits true to size BUT was a bit large due to the stretch. Overall I got TONS of compliments on the dress and would rent again!

This dress is slimming but not super forgiving. It's made of scuba material so it's thick however it's tight so it's going to show everything. I wore the large because the medium showed my bra line more than I wanted especially for the event. The medium did however fit. It's a bit difficult to get into since you have to pull the it over your head. Also warm so great for evening or fall/winter.

links_reviews_title: Good if you're worried about being cold
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a birthday party. I didn't end up wearing it because I knew I would be melting in it. It is a very thick almost scuba suit material. It will compliment your figure and keep you very warm.

Although I don't have a perfect shape, this dress is really great. I rented the large and the medium and chose the medium because I liked the glove fit better. The large had too much material. Be aware, the cut outs on the top are low, I put a black bra because you could see my nude bra if I didn't. Great rental!
A few areas felt like there was extra fabric but overall fit well and was fun to wear out. It was a little longer than I would have liked but I have short legs.

Beautiful dress, I wore it for my husbands birthday dinner. Like other reviewers, the cut outs at the bodice are low, so I just wore it with pasties instead of a bra. The cutouts make the dress special without it being too over the top. The fabric is thick and prefect for cold weather nights. The dress rode up a bit, but that was expected for me. I would rent this again in a heartbeat.
I wore this to my mom's all black masquerade party and I received compliments all night! This was one of my favorite rentals and to think I got it as the backup dress.
Thick material - fun date night dress. Not as fitted as other Clover Canyon dress - but this is perfect for a chilly night!

Wonderful dress for a February wedding. Very comfortable and received tons of compliments. I rented a M and a L and ended up wearing the L because the M was very tight. It's snug dress, so get your spanx ready!

links_reviews_title: Little Black Dress with a Twist
links_reviews_text: I actually end up wearing the other dress instead of this one. The dress is great, but it was easily outshined by the white Dress the Population dress. My husband told me I looked like I was going to a funeral instead of out for a night on the town.
This dress fit me like a glove. The material is so flexible....but still hugs your figure. I received many compliments.

This is obviously me trying it on in my bathroom, so that explains the shower curtain. Loved this dress so much. I wanted to stand out in what I knew would be a sea of lace dresses at a fall wedding. This material is very tight, thick and yet forgiving. The cutouts are so sexy. My husband loved this dress more than me. I wore dark nylons and black pumps. I would wear this again.

links_reviews_title: So sexy without being over the top
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size medium, but it wasn't available so I decided to "suck it up" and get the small and I am so glad I did. Don't get me wrong I was wearing two pairs of spanx with this dress since it definitely clings to every inch of your body, but, I have never felt so slim, so gorgeous and so festive! It is made of that scuba material so its warm but also contours with your body. My fiancé couldn't keep his hands off of me.

links_reviews_title: Cast a spell on fellow guests!
links_reviews_text: Body con, sexy, very warm! It was a bit longer than I wanted, but I'm a shorty. Have so much fun in this stunner.

links_reviews_title: It was hot, I was sweating the whole time
links_reviews_text: This dress is a perfect cut for a bachelorette party, except for the fabric is thick and I was literally sweating the whole night. Did a January bachelorette in Manhattan and I thought it would be cold, I had serious regret!!! Runs sort of small so I sized up. I am 5'9", 150, 32 DD. (I wore a medium in this dress in the past but I think I was approx 140 lbs then)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Very comfortable, beautiful detail.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my cousins sweet 16. It was a great dress, I received so many compliments. The only issue is that the cutouts are very low in the chest. I wore a nude strapless bra and it was hard to notice but a little annoying. I am very small chested so it might fit better on different body types.

links_reviews_title: Photographs well and is a flattering cut!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Warm, thick material. Wore a size up for length and comfort. Worn at a formal corporate dinner, perfect choice!

I wore this dress to a dinner party for my husbands work. Overall this dress was great. It fit well and wasn't too short. It hit me at about mid thigh. I have arms a little on the muscular side so the sleeves were a little snug but not uncomfortable. Great dress if you want to make a subtle statement.

The fabric of this dress is thick, so it's nice and warm except for where the cutouts are. You almost definitely have to wear an adhesive bra with it, as the chest cut outs go quite low. A normal nude bra was much more obvious compared to an adhesive bra. I also taped up the hem since I'm short and didn't like the length. Loved this dress, and the date did too!

I should have worn the medium for fit, but the cutouts were so low, even with a black strapless bra it looked weird. I have the medium on in the picture and you can see a peek of the blue bra (just to show where it hit) and thats after a little adjusting to see if i could make it work. The material was great, wedding was October 1 near Cleveland, OH, and outside in the evening, didnt need a jacket, felt comfortable all night. The cutouts were very cute and different than the standard LBD.

links_reviews_title: Awesome LBD with a little edge!
links_reviews_text: I'm a true Medium in most things and this number fit perfectly. So fun, so fierce for a night out in Vegas. Love the "scuba" material- I felt confident even after dinner ;-)

links_reviews_title: Thick forgiving fabric. Cute and warm!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my stepsister. She is always cold, and since we were going out in Seattle in March I wanted to make sure she would be warm enough. This dress did the trick! The fabric is very thick, and as some have mentioned it feels like scuba material. That said, it is a chore to get on and off. We were laughing pretty hard the first time I had to help pull it off of her. And she did have to wear shape wear underneath, because on her it was quite tight. She probably could have done and XL, but that wasn't an option. The one strange thing about the dress was how large the arms were. Now I assume it's this way so your arms don't bulge out of the laser cut, but it was a little strange. They were also VERY long. All in all a cute dress. Probably not for short people though, or for those afraid of showing off their curves.

links_reviews_title: Awesome laser cutout arm detail and incredibly comfortable fit!
links_reviews_text: I will definitely rent more Clover Canyon because of the neoprene material and how it fits and holds your body amazingly well. Doesn't wrinkle and is easy to wear! Wore to an outdoor wedding (60 degrees) and it was plenty warm for later in the night. Sleeves are longer but I just folded them under an inch and it was undetectable. Great flattering and unique little black dress!

This is a really beautiful dress - that being said, the length was a little awkward on me. I am 5'9 and pear shaped, so it didn't fit exactly how I imagined. I am a true 4 and the medium fit very well, but was a little loose up top and it did scrunch up a little bit. I ended up being able to wear a low cut bra with straps without it showing. Definitely put this on before you do your hair/makeup as it doesn't zip all the way down. The arms do take a little bit of getting used to but were fine once I did. Photographs well!

links_reviews_title: Classy but sexy dress...perfect for chilly weather!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband's work event in Las Vegas. It's unique and easy to wear. The thick neoprene-like material is warm even with the cutouts. Although it's definitely sexy, it's not overtly so which was nice for when we were with colleagues but it was also easily dressed up once we hit the bar later. I typically wear a medium but wore the large (back up size) as the medium was really hard to get into (zipper does not go the whole dress and I was worried about my hair). When I tried both sizes on though, they were nearly identical (the only difference was that cutouts on the large displayed more chest). I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Stylish take on the classic LBD. Received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!The dress is slimming, the cutouts are sexy and elegant. This dress fit like a glove, I wore a bra for my own comfort, but most women probably wouldn't need one. I only gave it 4 stars because since this dress is basically a scuba suit, it gets HOT! It was a cold night (30 degrees and windy) so it was great outside but once I was inside any type of dancing made me feel like I was in heating up. Also the cutouts tend to snag. The dress came on time and in great condition. This is my 3rd or 4th experience with RTR and as usual it was great.

Rented this for a work party and it was great. The cut outs provided a fun twist in the sea of black dresses. I could wear a standard low cut nude bra with no problem. The sleeves were a little long but I just rolled them under. Nice dress overall.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for colder weather! So comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for Valentine's Day. It ended up being very cold it with the wind chill it felt -30 outside! While my legs where cold, I was very warm under my coat in this dress! It's stretchy and thick! The neoprene is very warm! I went with the size l as I have a butt and the arms were a bit more fitted. Only problem I had was with the bra as the cut outs do go rather low. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my daughter's high school winter formal.
links_reviews_text: Initially ordered a medium but ended up wearing the back-up in small, which was a perfect fit. The material is neoprene so it's warm enough to wear alone, and it fits skin tight like a wet suit. Although the dress is advertised as mid-thigh it hits just above the knee if you're 5'1".

links_reviews_title: So easy and convenient! Love the service and would def use it again.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and was a nice comfy material. The only thing that was annoying was the zipper in the back- it only goes to mid-shoulder blade length, so you have to pull the dress over your head; it was hard to get on and off. It got a little warm at times when dancing, but was great for the rest of the dinner! No shawl or cardigan needed. I thought this would be short on me, but it was knee-length. Overall thumbs up!

Literally scuba wet suit type material. Holds you in. Felt amazing and sexy on. Was very tight (which I loved). I didn't wear it because I didn't think it fit the crowd I was going out with that night. I will definitely rent again and wear. My husbands eyes about popped out when I walked in the room wearing this!!! ( blush***)

Loved the dress. It fit well and looked great. The material was thick and kept me warm at the New Year's Eve party I was at. I didn't wear a bra and went with pastie's instead and it worked out perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful deep blue gown with a wow factor back. Love the pockets in the skirt. Very well made.
links_reviews_text: Many compliments on this well made gown that felt amazing to wear to a formal wedding at the Notre Dame Basilica and formal reception. The back is the wow factor and wore an adhesive bra to not complicate the beauty of the gowns's open back. Nice crystal silver accent on the gown that I accented with a crystal cuff bracelet and a fur for this January wedding.

It fit great. I normally wear a 10R but wore a 12R for this dress. The top part was a little big but not too noticeable. Love the pockets and the open back!! Very comfortable and it didn't drag the floor with 3 inch heels.

I ordered a size up on this because I ran a marathon the morning of the event and I wanted to be as comfortable as possible while being fancy and the fit of the dress hid that it was a little big in areas. The dress is very classic and somewhat conservative in the front, but the back makes it extra fun and sexy. But it's not the type of dress you need to fiddle with, it stays in place. Silver-type heels look best with this to match the waistband. I'm tall and the long did not hit the ground.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, but it was tight in the waist and baggy in the chest. Love the pockets! I sized up significantly (10) compared to my usual pant size (4-6) due to wide hips and rib cage. This dress was definitely made for a body with different proportions, but was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Rented for a black tie wedding. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and I fell in love it's true to size. I rented it to wear to a formal event the straps and the back make the dress. Received tons of compliments will rent again

links_reviews_title: Pockets!! Great dress for Black Tie event!
links_reviews_text: I really loved wearing this dress!! I like a dress that is fitted through the waist and this did just the trick. The only thing I would caution is that there is a lot of fabric, so if you have a larger behind there is a tendency to accentuate this. As others mentioned the zipper is stubborn and I found myself using a bar of soap to make the zipper slick as others recommended (great trick!!). If you are pear shaped and on the fence about a size I'd recommend ordering based on your bust and waist measurements, as I would have preferred it to be slightly more fitted on top.

I am 5 2, 120 lbs, wore a 4R. It was a tad long and caught under my toes with flat shoes. With heels, it fit perfect. I ended up tightening the straps at the "X" - after that it fit perfectly around my shoulder and chest. The zipper was very difficult to operate. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because of the adjustments I had to make. Everyone commented on how great it looked. I would definitely rent a similar dress again.
It fit perfectly!! So simple yet elegant, I got lots of compliments on this dress! Highly recommend.
Dress fit beautifully! It was difficult to zip but once it was on, it was effortlessly worn. Perfect for a formal affair!

The color, the detail, the pockets! So much to love! Would absolutely wear again. Great for a pear figure. I received so many compliments on this dress. There was a duplicate at the event, but we had fun with it.

The dress was so comfortable to wear all evening long and was beautiful! Loved it! The only problem was the zipper was difficult where it met the pocket. It took two of us to zip it up past this point, but once on it was fine and no issue unzipping it. Just looks like it's stitched tightly around the pocket area and it was catching there. Otherwise wish I could have worn the dress for more occasions!
Runs small, I am usually a size for and the 6 fit pretty well, slightly loose on bust. Needed a strapless backless bra, which wasn't terrible. Dress wasn't tight enough on top to go without.

links_reviews_title: The cross back and beads are elegant
links_reviews_text: This dress is so elegant. It is a mix between understated elegance and fun! The beaded belt, although clearly missing some jewels, elevates the dress.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect fancy dress for the event I was going to!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I don't usually buy clothes online because I need to try it on to see if it fits all in the right places, so I was nervous whether or not this dress would like good. Lo and behold, it fit like a glove! The material was really nice, the back was to DIE FOR, and the ladies were nice and covered. The zipper was a little tough to zip up (I'm a little squishy), but once it was zipped all the way it was really snug. There was a little space near the armpits but not enough to where you can see the ladies or anything. Other than that, it was a really beautiful dress! I fell in love with it when I was browsing the site, and I fell even more in love when I put it on. I felt so elegant and regal and got so many compliments on it! My date liked it too ;) The description is correct in that the zipper falls around your waist, so if you have fuller hips (like me), that won't be a problem with this dress. I stuffed the little padding things from one of my sports bras into my dress to cover the ladies, so nope I did not wear a bra and it was okay! Reading the other reviews helped me to order this dress, so hopefully this review was of help for you!

We had a work Christmas party, a masquerade ball. I wear 32a in a bra, weight 94 pounds, a little over 5 feet tall. I had to make the dress temporarily shorter but it was easy. I decided not to wear a bra and it caused a little gap on the sides but you couldn’t tell. This Dress made my night. I was happy to be wearing it and when my husband saw my st first his reaction was: wow!

Love this dress!! And it has pockets!!! I rented a 6p and 8reg. I thought the 6p would fit because of other reviews. I'm 5'3 and 135 pounds. The 6p was very tight around my rib cage! Apparently I have a wide rib cage! The 8reg felt sooo much better. I received compliments all night. Truly felt amazing in this dress! I will definitely rent from y'all again.

links_reviews_title: Mother of the Groom told me it was her fav bridesmaid dress
links_reviews_text: Absolutely lovely, runs true to size. I got lots of compliments. It also has pockets which made for an easy bridesmaid dutiful day, as i could hold anything and no one could tell in pictures haha Sticky zipper made for a momentary lesson in patience. Highly recommend this dress, just make sure you focus on posture-- it really helps the neckline lay much more perfectly for pictures.
Dress fits true to size, because my torso is a little smaller the top was a little loose. Overall a great dress!

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful outdoor wedding held in Prospect Park, Brooklyn New York
links_reviews_text: This dress was more beautiful than expected, and I expected beautiful! Typically I wear size 6 or 8 and in this dress I was an 8. It is comfortable and I loved how the fabric flowed as I walked. Glad I saw the reviews about the zipper that does not zip. Soap fixed it. Will use Rent the Runway again.
I ordered that dress for my mom. She loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: i looked gorgeous and felt fabulous
links_reviews_text: perfect fit and length... comfortable quality fabric

links_reviews_title: Loved being comfortable at the wedding!!!
links_reviews_text: BEAUTIFUL style, fabric and feel. I received so many compliments on this dress! Because of the relaxed fit, it wasn't necessary to wear spanx--definitely a plus in June. Loved the feel of the fabric AND the bonus pockets. I rented 10R, but wasn't able to do the side zip, so wore the 12R. Enjoyed not having to tug/pull every time I moved. I would definitely recommend renting this.

The fit was perfect. The gown is extra comfortable. I'm super short but it wasn't too lengthy when I had heels on. It seems like a simple gown but the back design and the jewel accents give it a special touch! I absolutely adored this gown!

I usually wear a size 8 but it was alittle tight so I wore the 10. The top was alittle loose, but I was able to get away with it. The length was perfect, I didnt want to wear heels and didn't need to. It was very comfortable to eat and dance in and I recieved so many compliments!
Gorgeous dress with a beautiful back. Fit like a glove, TTS. Simple yet elegant beading around waist and it has pockets!! Received loads of compliments all night long!

I had the best experience renting this dress! It was comfortable and the perfect length with small heels (I'm 5'6"). It photographed beautifully and I received so many compliments. Plus, it had pockets! I would highly recommend renting, and even buying, this gorgeous gown.

links_reviews_title: Attended Wish Ball to raise funds for Make A Wish Eastern NC
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable to wear - love the pockets and the full skirt - didn't have to worry about it clinging in the wrong places! Had to get a sticky bra as there's no way to wear a normal or even a strapless bra with this because the back is quite open. So glad I ordered a Petite, because the other two dresses I received in Regular length were too long. I cannot wear really high heels. I was able to wear comfortable wedges with about 1.5-2 inch heels! I would definitely order again, but would make sure I always get a Petite!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! And it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and the back of this dress makes it a show stopper!

I originally rented a different dress by the same designer, and unfortunately it was too snug. I had worn a size 6 last year of a different dress, and the 8 was too small of another design this year. So, rent the runway happened to have this blue dress in stock at the store in a size 10. And it fit perfectly.
Loved the dress. Fits true to size. I am tall and the dress length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Hugs curves in all the right places and has a great beaded accent around the waists.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for dinner at a fancy restaurant and the dress wasn't too tight. I felt comfortable eating in it, which was a big plus. The dress has a plunging back, which creates a conservative front yet sexy look. I got sooo many compliments that night.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress for black tie party!
links_reviews_text: I had my eye on this dress for a full year (ever since I saw someone wearing it at my boyfriend's law school ball last year). This year it was my turn! The zipper was literally impossible to get up at first, so I thought I was going to have to wear my backup dress, but we rubbed a candle on it and that solved the problem. It's a little tight around the waist, but that might have just been because I'm tall and have a long torso. I felt like a princess all night! Plus: pockets!

The dress was beautiful! The material was of good quality and a lovely blue. As others have mentioned the zipper was a challenge, but not a game changer. The pockets were great and I was able to carry my phone and ID without anyone knowing. The length worked out perfect with my 3" heels. The top of the dress was loose around the armpits, but not so much that caused an issue. I received several compliments on the dress and would recommend to others.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a prom or wedding
links_reviews_text: Didnt end up choosing to wear this dress but it was comfortable and fit great

links_reviews_title: I received multiple compliments on the dress. It was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I rented the dress for my husband's hospice gala. I ordered a 10R & 8R, as I read on the reviews the dress ran long. I am pretty tall, however, the R's were perfect. I wore the 8 and was very comfortable. The dress has pockets, however, I didn't use them. I did not wear a bra and didn't feel uncomfortable. The belt isn't too much bling and the back is flattering. I have nothing but positive things to say about this dress. This is the second time I have rented from RTR and would recommend them to anyone and will rent again!

Fits true to size. Material is thick enough no bra is needed. I LOVED that it had pockets. I got compliments on it all night. The nack was stunning. I am fairly short (5'1") so I shortened it with double sided tape.

This is by far my favorite rental from RTR! It was so flattering, and I received compliments all night! The high neckline perfectly offset the open back, and the jeweled waist had just the right amount of bling. I ordered the 6 and the 8, and the 6 fit perfectly. The zipper does like to get stuck, so you'll have to mess with it a bit, but dang, it's worth it. Also, the pockets are just perfection. I'd rent this again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Ive used rent the runway for the past 4yrs. Im never dissapointed
links_reviews_text: Its true to size. Love love the pockets

links_reviews_title: I truly loved this dress and was so excited to wear it.
links_reviews_text: The zipper on this gown is a nightmare! I ended sizing up to get the zipper up but that made the bodice loose. The beaded “belt” sits high on rib cage which was a little uncomfortable. I did receive many compliments at the black tie wedding I attended in the dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a wedding rehearsal - 27.5 weeks pregnant!
links_reviews_text: Fitted dress, worked just perfectly for my pregnant belly because it was stretchy! Love purple!
Size up, and this dress is awesome. Even though it's tight, it's the most slimming dress I've worn all pregnancy. Hugs all the right places, comfy to wear to a party or work. Highly recommend!

Very cute, comfortable dress, but I'd recommend for a night out and only if you're really comfortable showing some leg. I wore it to work and was constantly pulling it down to be a few inches above my knee instead of a miniskirt.

Wore this dress to a friend's wedding. Originally ordered the xs- I'm 6 mo pregnant, 5,1", 125. Had to exchange for the small bc it was a tad tight and I was nervous it would ride up as I moved and I didn't want to spend the whole night pulling it down. It was super comfortable, the color is great. I got countless compliments.
I wore this dress when I was ready to pop and it was super comfortable. The material is very stretchy. It does ride up a bit when walking but nothing that can't be handled.

links_reviews_title: Really cute, great color, but a tad small in the hips/butt
links_reviews_text: Ordered this for a saturday even baby bash, it was an option but was a bit short/tight on my hips and butt so decided to go with someone more comfortable that I wasnt going to be pulling down all night. If you are less hippy, this is a great cocktail dress.

I wore this to an Italian dinner for my birthday with a few of my girlfriends, while being 8 months pregnant. It was stretchy and fit well. I wore this in the Atlanta summer heat and despite sweating my butt off, you couldn't see it through the dress. Thank goodness!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not really work appreciate
links_reviews_text: I tried to wear this to work and my boobs were hanging out! This was a beautiful dress but is more for dressy event
Great drape, super flattering, comfortable - what's not to like? I really like this dress. Easy to dress up or down. I like how the neckline stays firmly in place even as you move, bend over, etc.
Amazing dress for a fun summer day. A little low cut, but amazing material and beautiful look. Loved it!!
Doesn't wrinkle, dress up or down, flowing and flattering for pear shape
Runs a little big on top.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - works for everyday or an event
links_reviews_text: Wore this at 8 months pregnant by pulling the waist up. My only complaint is there is no button or hook on the chest so I felt like I needed to wear a cami underneath to make it work appropriate.
A bit tight at waist and in no way work appropriate. But it was nice for a date.

links_reviews_title: Really cute; super tight elastic tho!
links_reviews_text: I love the concept of this dress, but couldn't figure out what to do with the super tight elastic band under the bust. Granted, my ribs are pretty wide, but this wasn't comfortable as an empire OR just above the natural waist. Just too tight.

This dress is made out of layers of lightweight, gauzy material. It flows nicely from the waist down, very forgiving to my post baby body issues. The v in the front is pretty deep, but with enough material to feel covered. If you err on the more conservative side it might be too much. I'm short, so it was a tea length in my, hut it still worked. The material doesn't wrinkle, so this travels well. The waist band is a strong stretchy band, which was fine most of the day but started to twist up by the end of ten hours.

links_reviews_title: Great, comfy fabric. Funky but trendy. Stretchy waist band
links_reviews_text: However, when walking the fabric rode up a bit and got bunched in the front. There are a lot of layers to tame. This dress is best if you're standing for awhile, not walking around frequently.
This dress is just perfect and I will likely be renting it again. It was comfortable and flattering.

I liked this dress enough. The black/pattern idea is neat. It was good on a hot summer day. However, it felt a little long on me and I felt like there was too much fabric. I think this would work on someone taller and maybe broader in shoulders. But as is, I felt like it was just okay on me.

links_reviews_title: Nice but did not like one me
links_reviews_text: Great dress but did not look good on me.

Nice print on dress, elastic waist is just under the bust so left room for my 8 month belly. Plenty of room in the bust , might want to wear with a cami. Rented for a concert, but ended up wearing it to work instead.
The fit was fine, but the dress was not as flattering as I thought it would be. It clung a little.
This dress has a flattering shape with a high waist and the neckline isn't too revealing, even though it's low-cut.
Easy to wear, comfortable and fun.
I love Fuzzi and was surprised this one did not work for me. Mesh fabric was nice and lightweight.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress - it fit perfectly, was comfortable and forgiving.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Tight enough to be flattering, but didn't draw attention to my tummy. It was perfectly dressy for a winter wedding I attended. Would recommend.

This dress fit great but def runs small. My hips measure at 33" and the small was so tight around my hips I felt like I would rip the seam. The medium fit my hips better but was pretty loose in the bust area. (32D). Overall because of the dark color and forgiving fabric the dress looked great

I am a bit bigger on the bottom so the top was a bit more loose on me, but that often happens with fitted dresses. Overall very flattering dress, easy to dance in, sexy without being inappropriate, which made me feel confident all night!
The dress fit try to size. It did not show any sign of previous wear. I received many compliments on the dress.
Great fit, true to size. Loved the detail of the lace.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a hit!! It was very comfortable and easy to dance in.

links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! It fit like a glove, I would keep it if I could!

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredibly comfortable and flattering! I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: You can't wear a bra in this dress, but it wasn't a problem because of it's snug fit (I'm a 34C). It does run small and is form-fitting, so if you're curvy like me, size up!

This dress is true to size. I wore this for a rehearsal dinner. I loved it and felt amazing in it! Tons of compliments and it was very comfortable. The only thing was the zipper was hard to zip up. Other than that- it was a nice fit. I ordered the 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 4. The color is beautiful and it's light enough to keep you comfy if you work up a sweat on the dance floor!! I highly recommend.

I am 5’ 4 about 155 lbs and wore a large. Fit was perfect. The neck was a little tight so I only buttoned one of the three on the neck line. Could never tell though. I am also a 36D bra size and did not wear a bra. Not uncomfortable at all. Definitely recommend!!
Got lots of compliments.
This dress was super comfortable and got tons of compliments. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Favorite rental yet! Beautiful dress, fit like a glove
Classic style and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The reviews are accurate - this dress is a little snug in the hip area if you're curvy but overall runs true to size. It seemed to have a little more give as the night went on but I'd rent this again!
Looks better on than in pictures. Fitted really nicely but I needed to go up a size as the material doesn't stretch at all. East to wear without a bra. Got tons of compliments
Beautiful dress, runs true to size
Good fit and flattering. Looks way more expensive than it is and I got so many compliments.

If you like to dance, and you have hips or a butt, DO NOT RENT THIS DRESS! I rented this for a wedding out of town and did not have time to return it for a new dress to wear. My solution? Duct tape. I had to duct tape myself to squeeze into a pencil shape in order for it not to bunch weird. The lining is cut weird, so it runs way small on the bottom but fine on top. Also, here is the kicker... half way through the wedding the slit in the back of the dress ripped all the way up the back that my butt cheeks hung out! I had to safety pin the dress closed for the rest of the evening. I've rented from RTR three other times and have never had an issue until now. Needless to say, the dress was a hot mess!

links_reviews_title: Unique statement dress - perfect for an urban chic gala event!
links_reviews_text: Loved the unique aspects of this dress - showed just enough skin to be sexy but I felt comfortable and supported all night. I'm larger chested and this dress provided enough support to make me feel confident all night. Doesn't photograph as well as it looks - but I got lots of compliments. Fits true to size/not much room through the hips - since I'm fairly straight through the hips this was OK for me!

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress for a winter wedding, however there is little to no stretch.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and the lace details. Did not end up wearing as I preferred the other back-up option that was sent. Might have had to size up as there was little give in the fabric and may have been difficult to sit in.

Loved this dress! Fit well except for the straps in back- I have a smaller chest & torso so they were a little loose & not adjustable. But overall fit was great, dress was comfortable, and I received a lot of compliments!

I loved the dress overall, but it didn't fit well enough around my thighs and backside. Great dress if you've got a flat butt! Fit my chest and waist almost perfectly, though. I'm 5'0" and 145 lbs. I carry most of my weight in my thighs, so this just didn't work out for me.

I would definitely size up. I'm usually a small but in that size, the dress wouldn't make it over my thighs. There's really no give in the dress, it's not stretchy. I was able to wear it without a bra with no issues, the top of the dress had enough support. It was slightly snug on the bottom for me, but if I'd gone larger, the top would've been huge. I did get so many compliments on it though, and the color and lace pattern were lovely! I would still rent it again.

This dress was amazing. I received two sizes: small and medium. I ended up wearing the medium, as the small was a little too snug in the hips like the other reviews stated. The medium was slightly big, but I was happy I had room to move throughout the day in the dress. Would wear this dress 1,000 times again.

The dress is really pretty. However, if you are someone with curves, the dress may be a little uncomfortable. It took me a lot of fashion tape to make sure the the top laid flat and stayed put. You won’t be able to wear a bra with this dress, so you either have to go braless or wear an adhesive bra. The inner lining was also very tight. Overall the dress was really pretty, but it was a little uncomfortable to wear, and took some effort to make sure everything stayed in place.

Beautiful, but be aware the cut out down the torso and around the waist is open. I wanted this for a charity affair, but was unable to wear it because of this. If it weren't for that...this was a great dress.

Such a cute dress. After reading comments from previous renters I decided to go with the size of pretty much all dresses in my closet. Mistake! Should have chosen the 2 size option. This dress was too small on the bottom. I could get it on but it didn't lay right and was uncomfortable. If you're questioning I'd go a size up.
Fit was great, forms to the body well and wasn't super tight.
Gorgeous dress. I suggest this dress for people comfortable showing their back, arms and bust. I am large busted and was very flattering. Love the dress. Will rent again
I did not end up wearing this dress. Fit is very slim. Larger size zipped but I couldn't move. No give. If you have a booty - not the dress for you. Top was too big.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments. I usually wear a size 4 and the small fit great. Im 5'3 and 125lbs
links_reviews_text: a little snug in the hips at first but i got used to it. perfect everywhere else.
not as flattering in the picture.
