links_reviews_title: I loved everything about this dress! The lace detail was so pretty. The dress was sexy and classy!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I wore a medium and normally wear a size 8. I am 145 pounds, 5'7", bra size 34 B. Need to wear an adhesive bra that is strapless otherwise it will show.

I ordered this and another dress and ended up wearing the other dress because this one was way too long . It was also pretty baggy in the stomach area and tight around the legs (i don’t have a flat stomach by any means lol) Really pretty dress and color just not for my body type. I’m 5’3 125 lbs.

links_reviews_title: The ease of rent the runway!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but it was way too tight in the hips in a medium and then too baggy in a large so, I ended up not being able to wear it. Luckily I rented another dress along with this one and that one worked.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a tea party the fit was perfect. It was an unforgettable dress. I'd rent again
links_reviews_text: The detail is gorgeous. It fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this dress- was very ill fitting
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was awful. Slip underneath pulled funny and it was too large on top and too small on bottom.

links_reviews_title: If you have a booty.. it will not fit in this dress.
links_reviews_text: I am about 40" in the hips and I didn't fit into the medium.. AT ALL! and I'm normally a size medium
Loved the for, made me feel like a million bucks. Needed the right bra for the dress so I couldn't be seen.
I didn't wear it. If you have curves, it'll fit very straight. The top was large and waist was large but hips small.
I rented this for vacation. It is a little short so I had to wear it with flat sandals but absolutely loved it and received many compliments. You can definitely dress this up or down.
This is a fun, bright dress for spring or summer. I am quite petite, and it did however make me look a bit like a little kid !
I loved the dress but the lining was hanging lower than the dress and I had to use fashion tape to hem the lining up.

It is very short!! I could have worn the medium, but it was so short that I ended up wearing the large which was a little big everywhere else but very comfortable. I got lots of compliments on it. I loved the bright colors!

This Trina Turk summer stunner is perfect those days where it's 100 degrees with 200% humidity but you still have to onboard four new employees for your tech company. Find more #reallife reviews on Instagram: @renttherunwayreal
Rented for the heat wave in NYC and it kept me relatively cool all day.
This is a nice thick quality dress, but you can see it definitely runs short on my 5'7" frame. Super cute though and runs slightly on the small side especially in the hips.
I received many compliments on this dress when I wore it. Very comfortable and unique.
Loved the fit and colors. A tiny bit short in length but otherwise was great. Will need a strapless bra or halter type. Very comfortable for the outdoor wedding we attended.

I wore this dress to church for Easter. It is pretty boxy with no shape so after losing 40 lbs I should have selected something more form fitting. I also should have ordered an 8. But great print, fabric and cutouts.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress to the event.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit too large and looked dumpy. It'd look better on someone who carries weight around the middle. Also, the lining was hanging below the outer layer. That wasn't acceptable.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! So cute and comfy.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected. A little short for tall girls.

This dress was perfect for our island vacation. It is not form fitting, but the open shoulder gives the dress a sexy vibe. Vibrant colors and a fun print make this dress perfect for any summer occasion. It's also extremely comfortable!
I normally hate the cold shoulder but figured Trina knows how to do it right! Loved it! Strapless bra required

This dress was so comfortable and flattering. It ran true to size and I got a lot of compliments on it. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and honestly wish I would have work it to the wedding instead as the other dress was less flattering. I would absolutely rent this dress again.

This dress is unique and eye catching. Compliments galore and it's very comfortable! The only draw back is that it's very short and when I got the chance to sit, I struggled with it coming up too far (showing too much).

links_reviews_title: Did exactly what I needed it to do
links_reviews_text: Wore the dress to a semi-formal daytime wedding and was perfect for it with sandals. The large, colorful flowers and the length (mid-thigh on me) made it wedding-acceptable and I wasn't washed out (always a concern for a pale blonde). Went with the 0 based on some other reviews but I think the 2 would have worked as well - the style is very forgiving. Even with the 0, it wasn't tight, so I could eat and dance without any concerns. Wasn't 100% sold on the sleeves but overall, got the job done and was very pretty and flattering.
The size 12 fit, but was a bit snug through the tummy area. The 14 was simply more comfortable and relaxed.

links_reviews_title: One of my faves from RTR update!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this 4 times this month, we had a very packed schedule of events and it was perfect for dinners out with friends, golf tournament receptions and date nights. Loved the details and print!! The straight fit isn't my usual silhouette but it was so fun! The length was borderline short on me but worked. Would rent agin! Sleeves were extremely comfortable as well! Did not disappoint!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer baby shower!
links_reviews_text: As the other reviews mentioned, the dress is blousy in the middle, so I sized down in my back up size and actually ended up wearing the smaller size. The dress is comfortable and very cute.

links_reviews_title: Too many negatives. I did not wear it. Dress is short and runs 1 size large. Polyester lining.
links_reviews_text: This dress had the potential to be a cute summer dress, but there were too many small negatives that I ended up not wearing it. Here are my negatives: - dress runs one size large; I rented my usual RTR dress size 10 (I am 5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and it was at least one size too large everywhere, including the chest; it made the dress look frumpy; in the photo, I am pinching all the extra fabric on the side; I recommend order one size down; - the dress is too short for me (I am 5'8"); better for shorter women; - bra issues: my regular bra showed the straps on top; my racerback bra showed the strap in the back through the peek hole; I did not feel like wearing a strapless bra; - the material description by RTR is incorrect: the dress is made out of 70% cotton/30% nylon and the lining is made out of 94% polyester/6% spandex; why put a polyester lining into a summer dress that is supposed to breath in hot weather?

Loved the floral print. Was hoping for a more sheath type fit but this dress was snug on my hips. The sleeves were more loose than I wanted on the 12, but it was the sacrifice I had to make rather than going with the 10 in order to not have it tight in my midsection.

I rented this dress for an outdoor wedding. I was so pleased that I chose this short and sweet floral one as the temperature was 108 degrees. HOT but I kept my cool in this beautiful Trina Turk dress. It's lined and fits true to size. I wore a strapless bra so that no straps were showing. I received numerous compliments and many inquiries as to where I had purchased.
I've never worn a size 0 before - yay! - but it fits like a 2-4. Super light & comfy, just really nothing very special. Great for vacation dinners.
Wore this dress for a Bridal shower and it was great. I'm 5'2 and it wasn't too long like a lot of other dresses are on me.

links_reviews_title: Such a perfect dress for Derby party
links_reviews_text: It runs a little large in the middle but is overall very comfortable. I love the colors.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress worn to derby party
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments. Rented four dresses and this one was the only one that fit in the bust. Super comfy. Great length. Beautiful colors.
Great summer dress. Runs true to size, but a tad short on me. I really liked the flowered print. I wanted to pair it with a cardigan, but the sleeves were too puffy.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and flattering for a brunch!
links_reviews_text: Good length for tall girls.

links_reviews_title: It was colorful and fun, just in time for Fiesta in SA.
links_reviews_text: I was able to wear half bra with it. I wore it with flats to work.

This ran a tad big on me, so I wished I had sized down to a 2 instead of a 4. It wasn't terrible, though, and it was fine to wear for a speaking engagement. It received many compliments and was comfortable. Great length for a 5'4" gal like myself, as it hit right about my knee. Modest, but put-together. Great combo.
Fits true to size, very comfortable and forgiving!!

I wore this dress for Easter and it was perfect! So cute and it fit really well. The only complaint I have is that the clasp in the back kept coming undone, but that was the only downside for me and it wasn't noticeable since I wore my hair down.
Used for Easter. Very cute and light weight. I would say it runs a tad big I wore a size 6 but probably could of worn a 4.
The dress was very pretty! Not form fitting at all very breezy. A little short but all in all I liked the dress! The size was true to size. No zipper just a hook and eye at the top of the neck
not what I would call "flattering" but it isn't unflattering either - just a fun, comfy dress.
Super cute dress but if you're tall this is not the dress for you. Also, the slip is too long for the dress and shoes in the front and back.
next time I might try size 2 but the 0 does fit well too

links_reviews_title: I do love Trina Turk dresses, short and loose. I received compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: It fir well everywhere. The only problem was that the lining at the collar would show, maybe the stretch of the chest area pulled in how it should lay on the chest. Otherwise, my husband thought we should buy it.
I loved this dress. Super comfortable. Short but it worked well for my height and chest size (5'5" and 36DD.)

I wore this amazing dress for an event and the after parties. It fits true to size, but was slightly large for me around my waistline. I was very comfortable in it regardless and it's just gorgeous in person with the color/lace detailing. I had so many people come up to me and compliment me on it, so if you want to feel like a goddess rent this dress! I will most definitely rent it again.
#current #sexy #cool

Dress was so comfy and fit perfect no need for a bra as it hung right without it looking too obvious. Back was see thru so keep that in mind. On the shorter end but with high neck it was fine. Would size down or you might drown in it.

I got this as a 'backup option' for a going out dress on a trip. I like the chic and simple design. It is a little short, but it's also not skin tight so it still looks pulled together. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Subtle, Sexy great for Las Vegas!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely a must to travel with! Took this across the country packed in a suitcase for hours without a wrinkle! So comfy and fit perfect. I am a size 10 and do have a larger bust area and this was a fantastic fit! It is short above the knee and gets a little looser on the bottom so it's not a tight fit! The minute I put this dress I knew it was amazing! A night out in Las Vegas I was super comfy and trendy. On a side note you need a t-strap or strapless bra. Beautiful fabric that is not thin.

The dress is really flattering in the hips and tummy but the arm holes were HUGE on my A-cup chest. Took some serious fashion tape Houdini magic to be able to wear the dress with my bra like 4 inches lower in the back. But, once the magic was complete it was chic, comfy, and fun.
Rented to LBD night on vacation..It ran a little small. The material was nice. Not too heavy for Jamaica weather..
A bit short, fit snuggly around the neckline, but roomy in the middle. Wore this knowing I'd be enjoying a big meal!
This dress is simple and cute. True to size. My date loved it. It made my legs stand out. Good rental for date or dinner.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of sexy!
links_reviews_text: Rented for my cousin's bachelorette party. Good length and comfortable!

This was the perfect dress for an evening, fall wedding. The 4 could have worked for a nighttime cocktail type affair, but I went with the 6 in order to have a little more length for the afternoon church ceremony. I didn't realize the back was sheer when I ordered it, but a backless sticky bra did the trick. Would highly recommend!
Really cute comfortable dress!
Very comfortable dress! It was flattering enough to not have to wear spanx or even a bra under it.
Simple, felt true to size. Arm holes a little baggy as previous reviewers stated. Wore with a sticky bra and was comfortable dancing all night

Oh em gee!! I loved this dress (so did my hubby). Very classy, great length. I loved the high neckline- but it did feel a little tight at first. Lightweight too! I didn’t feel that this dress was constricting or too tight, it was just the right amount of fitted (I could eat without worrying!). I did wear a strapless bra and had no issues. Another great dress! I love RTR!
It was a little large around the underarm area but otherwise the dress was flawless. Super comfortable and perfect for a little black dress!

This dress was great for the rehearsal dinner I went to! Lots of compliments. I ordered a size up like a lot of commenters said, however, I wish I would have ordered down. I found that this ran big and was not tight in the legs like some have found. It was a little big in the arm/bust area so I did wear a backless sticky bra, but it turned out ok! This dress is great if you need to hide your tummy! I am 5'4 and about 130.

links_reviews_title: Fun outfit to wear to friends rooftop party!
links_reviews_text: It was a great look. I paired it with dangling earrings (black/silver) and black heals. I tried the dress on at the flagship store and it looked great so I ran with it. With that said- I usually range between a size 10-14 (most of the time 12) and I wore an 8 (I thought it 10 initially) so I suggested sizing down. Either way- fun and classy/sexy going out outfit. Loved the neckline!
Dress was very comfortable. It was a little big under my arms and you could see my strapless bra sometimes so i didnt like that. The rest of the dress fit great.
Love this dress! Comfy too. It is a little roomy up top so i ended up going with a sticky bra so it didnt show.

This dress was very light and extremely comfortable. I’m 5’3” and 145 pounds. I rented the size 10 and really wish I had rented the size 8. The 10 was too big. I would definitely have been happy with a size down though. I was able to wear it very comfortable with a normal strapless bra. I enjoyed this dress and would recommend it.

I absolutely love this style! Not only because it's comfy, but the style is so original. You can't really say it's just "simple and black." It has a fun vibe to it as well! Great for any cup size. I wore it for a date night in the city, and extremely glad I did!
What a great dress. It fit so amazing. When i first received it i thought it may be too short, but it wasn't! I would buy this dress if I could.
Wore for a night out in Vegas. Top was a little loose but overall fit was great!
Awesome cut and the back doesn't really allow for a bra but I was good without one because the lining was thick

links_reviews_title: Classic LBD that fit very well and was still comfortable
links_reviews_text: Classic LBD that fit very well and was still comfortable

I wore this dress to an awards show and it was perfect. Unlike others, I didn't find the arm holes to be too big and was able to wear a strapless bra with the dress. The dress is wonderfully comfortable and hid problem areas well. My only issue is that the dress was a bit short on my 5' 11" frame, but I was okay as long as I paid attention to my hemline as I went from sitting to standing. Overall, I would rent this dress again.
Overall great dress

links_reviews_title: This dress did not work for me.
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this dress. It just did not work with my smaller bust. The chest area and arm holes were too large. Otherwise, it was a nice quality dress and I liked the style.

links_reviews_title: Loved the neckline. Runs a little big on the side.
links_reviews_text: It's a little big on the sides by the bust.
Large top, tight at hips
Bachelorette party
I loved this dress. Lots of compliments. Super comfortable and easy to wear. I ordered down a size so the fit was just right.
Cute dress but way too big around the waist and hip area for me to wear
This is a classic LBD. It does run big. I am typically a 6 but I ended up wearing the 4. It is a really comfortable dress. It is not fitted but still flattering.

As others have stated, the armholes are rather large and tend to show even a strapless bra. I pinned the sides of the top to my strapless bra as the dress was showing too much otherwise. Other than that, it's a great dress that I enjoyed wearing to a bachelorette party. I received plenty of compliments, and when the dress was delivered by FedEx to the wrong address, I appreciated that RTR sent me another one almost immediately!!!

links_reviews_title: Big on top tight on the bottom
links_reviews_text: the bottom was a little too snug for me, but if I had sized up the top would not have fit at all. It was already a little baggy under the armpits, so another size up would have given the chest area too much fabric.
Great dress - I could have worn a 6 or 8, but chose the 8 for the length.

This was my just in case dress, I am usually a 12 and a 10 fit great. The draping is perfect and VERY forgiving this dress is modest with still being sexy and stylish. I would choose this again for a party or summer wedding

Wanted SSOOO badly to wear this dress, as its ALMOST perfect. The idea of it is amazing, nut the chest runs HUGE for the size. I wear a 32DDD bra and it was STILL gaping open on either side of my boobs...Was so bummed
I wonder this to a formal event. Was comfortable, ran a little small in chest area .

Picked this out for a Texas winter wedding that took place at a formal country club. I was the date of a groomsman, who was wearing a tuxedo, so I wanted to compliment him. This dress was really comfortable to dance and move in. Though marked true to size, I likely would have gotten this altered a little in the waist area if I owned it - I have a fairly hourglass figure, so it was a little looser around my waister and tighter around my chest and hips (not in an uncomfortable/constricting way!). I received multiple compliments on this!

I wore this dress for a friend's semi-formal wedding on September 1. It's the perfect dress for late summer. I kept getting compliments on how well the dress for me, on the fabric, and just how great it looked in general. I'm usually a size 4/6 and went with the size 8. The dress definitely fits small, but it's great for a curvy figure, just be sure to order up a size or two.

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and fit true to size. Very good option for a semi-formal party.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and is not uncomfortable. Good for a semi-formal party! Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Elegant with a fun flare of ruffle
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress overall but it was a tad small in the chest.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful details, love the lace! Felt comfortable and elegant at a formal fundraising gala.
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up dress for a fundraising gala, and part of a replacement order when none of the items in my original order fit. I originally ordered this dress in a size 2, and while that did technically fit, the back was so tight when zipped up that I did not feel comfortable. Ordered the 4 in my replacement order, and it fit nicely. I'm 5"2, 120 pounds, with an athletic/swimmer's build. Got lots of compliments at the event, and my kids said I looked like a fairy princess! The lace and layers at the bottom of the dress are my favorite features and felt very elegant.
Great dress, but not super flattering in the hips. The lace overlay is lovely and I like the ruffles on the bottom. Very comfortable to wear.
This was my first RTR experience and I loved it! The dress, which I wore to an evening wedding, was beautiful and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I felt confident in this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was a good pick for a long night. Comfortable and easy to walk around in.
With wearing a double D bra I did order a size higher than I usually wear and it ended up being perfect! Very comfortable, perfect wedding attire, very classy and elegant look!

I usually wear a size 6 and this dress fit really well. The arm holes were a little snug as was the bust, and it was a close fit around the waist and hips but I was comfortable the whole night. I wore gold shoes and accessories which were suggested by other reviewers and they were right!

links_reviews_title: It was great to be fancy for a night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great! It wasn't too snug and fit well and didn't gap.

links_reviews_title: Loved the bottom of this dress, very slimming.
links_reviews_text: Overall I liked this dress, the top was a tad snug On me or I could have worn a 2. I typically am a 4/6 depending on brand. 5'4" 135lb, 34 D.
This dress was really comfortable, fit well, so many compliments on it! I said to my husband as I put it away "I wish I could buy this!"

Rented this for my work formal holiday party. The pattern and the style is gorgeous - it's actually black and navy so it looks great with black shoes/accessories. It was a little long on me, but not terrible. Doesn't have any stretch though - the 2 wasn't super form-fitting when I was standing, but when I sat down I certainly wouldn't have wanted it any smaller.

I wore this to my black tie optional work holiday party. The texture looks amazing in person and the cut is fun yet conservative. I really enjoyed wearing this dress but my only critique is that the 4 was incredibly tight and 6 (which I wore) was a tiny bit big.

I wore this to a winter wedding and enjoyed this dress. Most importantly, I was still able to dance (though not as much as other RTR). I am usually a 10 at RTR but wore the 8 in this for a more fitted look.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. The fit and cut is very flattering. Great for a holiday party, wedding or event. I wanted to keep it.
Dress for true to size I got a ton of compliments. It is black underneath which is hard to see in the pictures.

links_reviews_title: Loved the way this dress fit me. It was very flattering and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, shows off curves very well. Great comfortable material, with beautiful lace details.

I rented the 6 and got the 8 as a back up but wore the 8 cause quite frankly I am more of an 8 right now. The 6 fit but the 8 was more comfortable. I loved this dress!! I was beautiful and made me feel beautiful in it. It was a great quality and worth every penny. I can't wait to rent again!

I wore this dress to a wedding. It was comfortable with a slight stretch and flare at the bottom so I could move well. It was slightly large and I could probably have worn a 4 but i was still able to wear it and receive compliments. Nice lace pattern!

I typically wear a size 4. It felt a little snug so I opt for the size 6 although it was not as fitting it felt more comfortable. As other reviewers mentioned the zipper sticks a little bit. Overall I felt so good in the dress. The wedding was in Newport, Rhode Island and was just perfect.

This was my first RTR rental. Initially for a wedding that turned into a night on the town. I loved this dress so much I would buy it! I wanted to wear it all night! My body shape is quite boxy, however the fit was very flattering enhanced my curves in all the right places. It was a bit challenging to zip up past my chest and shoulders, but I'm busty and have larger shoulders anyways. Other than that, it fit like a glove and was so comfortable to wear the entire evening. I received so many compliments in this dress and will definitely consider renting again!

links_reviews_title: Curve-hugging lacy number perfect for fall wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress really hugged my curves and highlighted my figure in the best way. I didn't wear a bra and was super comfortable. A bit tighter in the hips that I typically wear but still a good fit.
I enjoyed this rental as it was completely comfortable. I was able to eat, dance and move around freely. The colors went nicely with fall.

I loved this dress! I am somewhere between a size 8 and 10, but ended up wearing the 10 because it was just a bit roomier without looking baggy anywhere. I did not need to wear a bra because the top is structured enough to provide support. The quality of the dress is outstanding and I thought the overall fit was flattering to my body type. I had never used RTR before, but will definitely be a repeat customer.

links_reviews_title: Almost as beautiful as the wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a wedding at a castle in England (no joke), so semi-formal was necessary and this dress is perfection! Fits beautifully, very flattering, and I had compliments all night. Comfortable for dancing into the wee hours of the morning too!
Fit perfect. Sexy yet conservative. This was my back up dress.

I rented this dress for a wedding and it was perfect for the event, I got so many compliments! It definitely fit true to size! If I ever see this dress for sale on the site I'm going to try and snatch it up!
Great fit! Easy to dance, sit, eat and enjoy!!

Dress is cute, but for me the lace was too peasant like. Stiff with a pattern that would go with a peasant blouse. Also, the zipper was very sticky; hard to zip and unzip even on the hanger. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, not much wow factor.
links_reviews_text: This was a pretty dress, but just kind of boring in my opinion. I ordered a size too big, so that may have had something to do with it, but I just wasn't wowed. It was well-made and had good details, just not the dress for me.

I was pleasantly surprised at how well this dress fit. I had some concerns with no stretch in the fabric, but I was comfortable both sitting and dancing all night. I wore with black suede pointy toed pumps as it was a November night wedding, but would have looked great with strappy sandals as shown on the model. Would absolutely rent again!

I had intended on wearing a size 12 which is my normal dress size but due to my 36DD bust could not zip it up. I ordered the 14 as a back-up and it fit perfectly! It's a beautiful, comfortable dress but has no stretch or give to it. My tennis bracelet and purse kept getting snagged on the lace so beware of that. Would definitely rent this dress again!
Dress was perfect for a cocktail wedding event. It was classy and suited for curves. The black and blue lace looks great. Husband loved the dress too.

links_reviews_title: Classy and elegant navy blue formal lacy dress
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit with black and navy blue combination of applique flowers. Very beautiful dress for an evening party. Wore it a few times. The lace and applique work is classy looking. The frills at the bottom and the high-low look is very trendy. Top with no lining add the right sexiness to the overall look.

This was a replacement after I misjudged my size on an original purchase. While I was really bummed my first choice didn't fit this dress Was Amazing. I got so many compliments. Flattering fit and super sexy.
Very flattering cut and comfortable to boot!
This dress was my back up and I did not wear it. The fabric and cut is gorgeous but I felt it was very matronly in person. Too “mother of the bride” for someone my age.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! Great fit and classic shape
links_reviews_text: Definitely a fun one for the office… I loved the fabric, definitely a little bit more like a sweatshirt than I would've imagined so it was very comfortable. The pattern was beautiful and I got tons of compliments!

This dress is very pretty and easy to wear. The fabric is very thick and stretchy so it's quite forgiving. The length and neckline are nice and modest for work, but the fit and design are pretty and feminine. I came close to buying this one My measurements are 33-26-35 and the size XS fit great.

links_reviews_title: I loved the pattern on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The material is not what I expected. But the pattern is what drew me in and blue is my color.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my masters graduation ceremony!
links_reviews_text: (Please note the pink around the neckline isn't part of the dress, it's my masters hood.) Well made, fabric is quite thick as is mentioned in other reviews so was pretty warm on a sunny Georgia spring day, but was manageable for this event.

This dress is simply amazing. The fabric is thick and rich. It also has a little stretch to it. The stitching and embroidery are flawless. This paired nicely with tights and a sweater. You can dress it up or dress it down. I would not recommend it for a warm day.

links_reviews_title: Worn to a themed formal event (Kentucky Derby)
links_reviews_text: I loved how this dress fit and the way it looked in person. I was hoping to match my husband's suit coat he found on Amazon, and this matched perfectly! The material is nice and thick, and it hit well at the waist and flared out. I would totally rent again!

I rented this because everyone kept commenting on the stretch. I was pleased! The only thing I'd say is, if you're pregnant, it hits your belly at kind of a weird place. Otherwise, great dress, great length, very comfortable, no wrinkles with this material
Loved the color, quality and fit!

links_reviews_title: I rented for a photo shoot
links_reviews_text: Stretchy fit, super comfortable, thick fabric- wish I could keep it!

My 15 year old sister wore this dress to church. The rating is based solely on her option. She said she gives it a three star because the material was unexpectedly odd- like a thin sweater. Also, the design seemed too "grandma-ish." She wore it and liked the color and zip back but would only recommend it to some one older.

I had both the small and medium, and ended up wearing the medium--fit better in the bust. I did notice the shoulders were a little big though. Not a huge deal, but if I owned the dress, I'd have that altered. Overall, a pretty and comfortable dress to shake up my work wear.
This was such a flattering dress. It is a thick knit that lays beautifully on the body.
Perfection. Comfort. The fabric was awesome. It was exacly what i needed for this low key party. I loved the exposwd zipper in the back. I would rent this again

links_reviews_title: This dress was super comfy & easy yet stylish! Got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The material has a nice stretch to it and was great to wear for our special daytime event for my daughter's Bat Mitzvah. I would happily own it and wear again for a party. It's a little short for sitting down though there's plenty of extra material in the skirt part.

I added my friends baby shower during October when the temperature dropped in NY. The material was heavier so worked out perfectly. The dress gives which was great especially because I 36DD and not too high above the knee (5'4"). Really comfortable and highly recommend it!
Pros: super comfortable! Perfect length Cons: not super flattering on the chest area (kinda tight and flattening) Overall-- love and would rent again for work

This dress is great. I rented it to wear to present at a conference in Vegas. It was a little tight on me, but I might have ordered the wrong size (when in doubt, size up). There is a dashed pinstripe in addition to the pattern. I felt like it worked for the professional event but also would be great for a summer wedding or shower.

This dress fit great on top and is made of fairly thick material. Thick enough that I felt comfortable not wearing a bra with it. I have wide hips (pant size between 10-12) and the dress did cling a little tighter than I would of liked throughout that area, but it must not have been noticeable because I received many compliments from co-workers. The design is very flattering for pear shaped I would say! Would rent again!

This was cute, but seemingly casual dress. I was hoping for something a bit dressier. The dress was well above my knee on my 5'9" frame. The material will show every curve, so chose undergarments wisely.

The material is a nice weight and makes the dress lay nicely and not cling in the wrong places. There wasn't much a difference in the sizes- both fit me and I wore the 1X size because it had slightly more room in the waist which made it more comfortably to dance in.
Rented this for work - love love love it! Fits well, cute style and I love the detail. Medium weight in terms of material, good length as I'm tall Will definitely rent again!
Great dress for my mom to wear to my bridal shower. Both sizes fit and the dress has some stretch to it. Material is solid and the dress is well made.
Fits great , could've worn the 1x but it was a warm day .. this is a thick dress ... very comfy

links_reviews_title: Flattering and comfy. My only non-issue was the hole in the sleeve gapped showing bra.
links_reviews_text: My 1st choice dress came in size 8 and this stylist pick came with it because my size 10/1st choice came back damaged. I loved it and was able to wear it too! Fun dress. I dressed it up with heels and then dressed down with cute flip flops in the evening for a casual dinner.
COMFORTABLE AND ELEGANT!! TWO THUMBS UP

This dress runs true to size but it is possible to size down because the material is stretchy. The material is lighter than expected but holds shape well especially in the skirt. The pattern is not actually embroidered and does not show up as bright as it does on the model. Loved the pattern and comfortable fit. This dress is perfect for a semi-formal event or party and gets lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It looked great! It was the perfect amount of glitzy and comfy.
links_reviews_text: The material is thicker which is forgiving. Also very easy to accessorize. I went with silver pearls and black boots, silver tights and a leather jacket.

links_reviews_title: My husband told me to keep it!
links_reviews_text: My hips are a couple inches wider than my chest but this dress give you an almost perfect hourglass shape. I wore it to a backyard bridal shower and I got so many compliments! It was my back up dress and had to be overnight delivery but it worked perfectly. A little tight on the bust but i am a ddd so thats expected. Didnt need to wear spanx. Ill rent this dress again

This dress is perfect. It flatters every body type. I usually wear a size 14W and would recommend the 1X. I originally ordered the OX but would have been too tight. It is comfortable and fits well. I am big busted but didn't make me look too busty. I wore black heels and a white bolero jacket. It was for a Bar Mitzvah. I would highly recommend this dress for the flattering cut and comfort. If I could buy this dress if I could.

The thick stretchy fabric was interesting and fit tightly but not constricting. The overall length was awkward for me - too short and I am only 5'6". The white design on white navy was striking. I have it a 4 star rating because I was just not fabulously comfortable in it or with the length.
Beautiful dress! Received many compliments! Very fitting for curvy body. Rented this to wear to my daughter's baby shower. Wish I could keep it! Love it!

links_reviews_title: Overall, an ok dress. It is pretty and flattering, but shorter than advertised.
links_reviews_text: Maybe it is because I'm 5'10" or maybe it's because I am plus size, but this dress looks far shorter than the other reviews said. It was a good length for standing, but when I moved or sat, it would show more than I would like. It was also WAY darker of a blue than pictured.

SUCH a great dress! I found it to be comfy, flattering, and fun. It's a heavier weight, almost like a sweater, so it was great for a wintertime dress-up girls' day. Beautiful detailing starting on the bottom and reaching up the dress and on the neckline, sassy exposed zipper in the back, and fun, faint dots (almost like a pinstripe) take this frock from simple to stunning. Would rent again, in a heartbeat.

Nice thick fabric, great for the winter. Beautiful embroidery and details. The medium was a little bit tight around the waist so I ended up wearing the large, which had more room. Also great for fuller busts.
I usually wear 16w dress and the 2x was a good fit. You can wear a regular bra which is a plus. The dress is very stretchy and forgiving. It was comfortable and I received compliments.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and I felt great in it.
links_reviews_text: The dress felt heavy when I initially put it on. The fabric is thick which I was thankful for later (beach sunset wedding). Stayed in great shape all night. Perfect dress to dance in.

Cute dress! Because it's fall I wore leggings and a cardigan with this. It is a little stretchy and a nice thick material. The dress had a few snags and I called to document it. I was absolutely able to wear. I joined rtr to get a wider selection of work clothes. So far it's been great! This is a more casual dress.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, forgivable, very comfy!
links_reviews_text: My tummy wasn't feeling at it's flattest, but this dress was a perfect cover. It was also very comfortable and a slightly different choice from my usual! The design elevates it from a normal dress to something quite lovely. I did get quite a few compliments :)

This was my first RTR experience. I ordered a Badgly Mishka dress that was unavailable. So after picking 4 "favorite" dresses 2 days before my event I received this one and a Jill Stuart dress. This dress fit the best. The fabric is on the thicker side, but has some stretch so compensates for any "problem areas". I liked the color, a true navy, and the white accents which I think are unique. I added a navy and rhinestone necklace and earrings to dress it up a bit for the wedding I attended. The nude wedge heels I have did not look right so I wore navy suede booties. I felt very comfortable all evening and did a fair amount of dancing. Overall, I would say this was a good experience even though I did not get the dress I originally requested. The event was for my husband's co-worker's daughter so I did not know anyone at the event. If I were to have a more personal event I am not sure I could be satisfied not knowing what dress was being shipped 24 hours in advance. I do like this option of renting versus purchasing.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me the highlight of graduation!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! The texture of the dress is probably the unforgettable part of it! It was so comfortable that I didn't want to take it off! I am a teacher and I wore this to the senior graduation because I was one of the MCs. I received an insane amount of compliments on the dress and almost made me feel like it was my graduation day!
Super flattering! Of all the dresses I considered wearing for my shower, I picked this one bc it didn't require shape-wear and made me look so pretty!

Very pretty dress -- was looking for a dress for my engagement party and engagement photos. I selected this as my backup dress but did not end up wearing it because the sleeves felt a little too tight. Nice dress for someone less curvy and maybe for a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my courthouse wedding in the fall and it was an absolutely perfect dress! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: A little long compared to the one in the photo - as someone 5'2", it hit around my knees. Other than that, fit perfectly. Slightly itchy where the lace hits around the neck and sleeves.

I wore this to my bridal shower. It's very pretty and very flattering. There is absolutely no stretch to any part of this which is why I think it's better to go a size up. The arms were a bit snug. It is a good length and the pockets of course are every girl's dream. The blush undertones are very Rose goldy and have the dress a really pretty hue. I received so many compliments and overall just felt really pretty.

I loved that the dress had a little bit of bounce to it in the skirt. It felt like it was going to be tight in my arms, but I didn't notice it all night! I definitely want to rent this dress in other colors.

This dress worked perfectly for my medical school graduation. I'm glad I ordered a back up size 8. I am 5'8 and 135 pounds with pretty broad shoulders. I previously rented a Badgley Mischka dress for a friend's wedding and the size 4 fit perfectly, but for this dress, the size 8 was snug but comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Sweet little dress for a wedding shower
links_reviews_text: True to size ft and appropriate length for a family wedding shower. Felt very cute and bridal

This was perfect for my bridal shower in Canada. Since Canada is a little cooler than the states, it was nice to have the sleeves to stay warm. This was a beauty and the pink underlay was extremely feminine
I usually am a 6 and this one was smaller in the chest so I wore the 8 it was more comfortable. Overall cute fit and lots of compliments.
I wore this for my bridal shower, and it was perfect. It was so comfortable and pretty. I did think it needed a belt, so I added one I had, and it made a huge difference!

Fit was great from the waist down- fun, flirty, pockets! Surprisingly the top was where I experienced a little tightness- fabric doesn't have any stretch. I felt secure and overall comfortable in it. Would recommend a size up if you have a bigger chest.

I wore this dress to my bridal shower brunch and it was nothing short of amazing! I received so many compliments and the underlay complemented my color scheme perfectly! The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is the arms were tight. I ordered a 6 & 8 ..tried both on and they both felt equally as tight in the arms/ shoulders but the 6 fit the rest of my body better. It was nothing I couldn't deal with though. Overall you will not regret renting this beautiful piece!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for winter bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my bridal shower. It was a perfect dress to wear in winter: the lace wasn't stark white, the lining was heavy, and the sleeves were winter-appropriate. I'm normally a 0 but wore the 2 for better range of motion in the arms (the sleeves we're SO tight in the 0, and I have small arms!). I got so many compliments on the dress and was very pleased with how it looked in pictures.
A little tight around the rib cage but overall a great feminine dress. I loved the color and the lace.
The perfect bridal shower dress! Loved it! Really flattering, comfortable, with POCKETS!!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my bridal shower- it was very pretty!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs true to size- I wear between a 2 and a 6 in dresses, and I ordered a 4 and a 6 and wore the 4. My only complaint is that the pockets make the dress flare out a bit at the hips. But the fabric is very pretty and I got a lot of compliments on the dress! It was also great for winter bridal shower, as it has sleeves and was warm. It is also more of a peach than a pink, just FYI.

At first I didn't like the color as much because it wasn't as white as I thought. My fascinator was WHITE but it still looks pretty. The other dress size had some fraying and both dresses do look more worn. Got lots of compliments and will consider renting again but hopefully other dresses aren't as worn.

This dress was perfect for the rehearsal for my Catholic wedding - beautiful and fashionable, but conservative and classic. Both the size 4 and size 6 fit, but I ended up wearing the 6 because it was a bit tight in the bust. Overall, though, a very comfortable dress. I also appreciated the sleeves in late November :) The length was perfect for me at 5'1", with the dress hitting right above the knee.
Beautiful, reminded me of my wedding dress! Definitely size up, it run small in the chest/bust. I had trouble zipping up in my normal size.

links_reviews_title: I personally did not like this dress on me.
links_reviews_text: Because of how the sleeves are scrunched it made me look boxy at the top. The lace was very pretty as well as the color but it just wasn't flattering on me. I am 5'3 weigh 123 and I'm a size DD34 ( in Victoria Secret bras).

I'm normally a size 4, but the arms were super tight, so I had to go up a size to the 6! Fits true to size everywhere else. If you have a more athletic build/muscular arms and shoulders, I'd definitely recommend sizing up. Received so many compliments, and it was the perfect dress for my wedding rehearsal dinner!
Perfect bridal shower dress!

So glad I read the reviews of other ladies who wore this for their own engagement photo sessions. This was the perfect choice! I wore the 12 rather than the 10 so it would be a little less restricting in the arms, and the rest of it fit comfortably, as well. It was the perfect length, and the white lace over the blush photographed beautifully. I did add a belt just to break it up a bit and to add an element that would match my shoes. If you've got a bridal event coming up soon, you will not regret this rental!

links_reviews_title: Engagement photos call for a special dress, and this was it.
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing! This dress was comfortable and beautiful. We got caught in a freak snowstorm, but it held up beautifully and was still looking perfect after an hour of running around in the weather. Absolutely love this dress, I'd rent it again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Engagement photo dress for the bride
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my engagement photos and LOVED it! The fit was great and I loved how the lace photographed! My photographer, Laura Ann Miller recommended texture over color for a dress and the lace on this was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Lovely blush under lace (with bonus pockets)
links_reviews_text: This garment was an excellent pick for my wedding shower outfit. It can be dressed up or dressed down. I am 5' 7" and was thrilled with the length of this dress (about an inch or two above the knee). It also has pockets, which is a huge bonus. Why don't more dresses have pockets?

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - but beware of fabric that does not give!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and perfect for a royal tea-themed baby shower. It photographed amazingly and was very on-theme. As other reviewers said, however, the fabric has ZERO give, so although the 2 fit fine (generally speaking), the fabric was tight across my shoulders and around my arms, so it was very uncomfortable (and my backup sizes were not available to I had to roll the dice on the 2). The satin under layer is also really hot - it was a 95 degree September day in Florida so this wasn't particularly comfortable. The dress was very pretty but I probably would not rent again.

As so many of the other reviews say, it is kind of snug in the arms! I'm normally a size 4 and wore the 4 in this dress. Other than that the dress was perfect! The length is perfect for someone who has a longer torso.
•Fun and flirty •Gorgeous dress •Very flattering •Comfortable •Pink slip underneath •Heavy material
This dress was absolutely gorgeous and super comfortable. Wore it for my wedding rehearsal dinner. Highly recommend!

I rented this dress for my bridal shower in sizes 10 &8, I'm normally an 8, but I wore the 10 instead so I had some room. The fit was still very good. I got a ton of compliments on this dress at my shower, and it has pockets! That was the best part. The arms are a little tight, so sizing up worked out in my favor. If you're looking for a dress for your bridal shower, this is perfect.
This dress was comfortable and easy to dance in. It was simple and fun to wear. It is fitted on top but not too tight and looser on bottom, fun to twirl in! The pockets are an extra bonus.

links_reviews_title: What a beautiful, romantic yet flirty dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my engagement photos and it was perfect - just the right amount of formal. I'm 5'7" and weigh 145 lbs, and the dress fit like a dream.
Cute outfit for courthouse wedding photos. The back and arms are very tight but overall really cute. Glad I rented this!

links_reviews_title: This dress was PERFECT for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my bridal shower & I received SO many compliments. The fit was true to size, but the arms were a tad snug. The blush color with the white lace overlay was the perfect style for a shower. Plus the quality of the dress was great! Highly recommend to all of the soon-to-be brides out there!
Absolutely loved this dress it was so comfortable and the pockets were amazing !
Wore this for my bridal luncheon. Fits well, but the arms are tight. If you have muscular biceps, might not be the dress for you!

Overall, I really loved this dress and my photos for our engagement shoot turned out great! Only complaint was that it was snug in the arm area and limited my movement. If you have broad shoulders or thicker arms, I'd size up.

This dress is gorgeous and worked so well for graduation. The arms were a little tight but other than that it fit perfectly. For curvy girls, it really hugs the figure but is still comfortable. Wish I didn't have to wear the gown so people could see more of the dress!
Rented this dress for my Bridal Shower and it was amazing! The fit was true to size and is very flattering. I received so many compliments about this dress.
Such a fan of this dress. I rented it earlier in the year on a different beach trip but in blue. The red is fantastic too. Such a cute fit. Beautiful cutout back as well.

I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas and it didn't disappoint! The fabric has some stretch and moves with you as you dance. The fit was great and I got a ton of compliments on the dress. It was very flattering.

I'm 5'6 and 135lbs with a small top and tick legs. I loved the fit and it was very comfortable. It did ride up throughout the night which was a little annoying but no more than any other body on dress. The hips have some mild touching which is very flattering. This is my second time renting this dress and I see myself renting it again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Easy fit for a night out in Vegas
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, I didnt wear spanx and I was comfortable all night. I’m 155-160 and 5’1.5” bigger booty and barely there boobs. No bra was worn either. The dress wasn’t amazing but it fit the bill for a chill night in Vegas. I wore it under a leather jacket and some flat booties. It rode up when I danced so I had to tug it down a bit.

Had to wear leggings beneath due to how cold it was the night of the party. Glad I did because I wasn't self conscious about how short the dress is. Man though is it flattering and comfortable. I think the way the top is cut was also flattering for my upper body as I am quite broad through the top half and torso. Was very surprised how much I liked this dress and it is very form fitting which I tend to shy away from. Highly recommend.
Fit perfectly in all the right places! Can't wait to rent again :)
Stretchy and thick material. Great for dancing all night.
Loved wearing this dress to celebrate turning 30! It was sassy and comfortable. It was definitely form fitting but surprisingly easy to dance in.
Ran big and not as form fitting as I was hoping for.

links_reviews_title: Back up dress - cute but not my favorite.
links_reviews_text: My original red dress couldn't be shipped so this was my backup. I'm always a fan of Parker and knew it would be great quality. The fabric was amazing and it held me in. Bonus that I didn't need a bra. It was very short though. At 5'3" and 42 years old I didn't love the length. Not sure that a medium would have helped. I'm guessing a medium would have been too big. That being said, I got so many compliments. Great quality, beautiful design, just too short for me.
Fit great, but way too short. I am 5'2, 110 lbs. Nothing is too short for me but this dress was! I did not end up wearing it. Beautiful dress if you are 5 feet or under
Dress was thick and TIGHT. My husband loved it but I felt super fat in it- hence the fact I don't have a full length photo.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, easy to wear dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well and was comfortable! Lots of compliments - great for a bachelorette party.
I loved this dress! it was super comfy for walking around downtown for dinner and drinks. I loved the pattern and the open back. I paired it with some funky earrings.
Fit like a glove. Nice lining. Back was higher than expected and front less halter than expected. Gorgeous. Would rent again.
Got this for a bachelorette party weekend! Loved it!

Rented this for a night out in Vegas. It was perfect. Fabric was very thick and flattering. It was short, but expected. I'm 5'9 so most things are short on me. It fit well and had a cute cutout in the back.
5'9 and fell just right for length not to short or to long for the club. Heavier material to hide flaws honestly perfect dress
Fits a curvy hourglass figure great! If you want a hot dress for a sexy night out this is it!
Super cute dress! A little on the shorter side but the fabric is think and flattering (even didn't have to wear a bra)!!
The material is awesome a kinda thick. I was unable to wear a bra but the material made it okay. I would rent it again. The back was beautiful. Perfect for a sexy night out!

links_reviews_title: Perfect date dress for Portland Blazer game
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress because it was our team's colors and it showed off my curves. I wore with over the knee boots and got lots of compliments.
It's just a fun and awesome dress. the material is thick so it made me comfortable in the stomach area. I had fun in it and felt like it looked pretty cool.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a hollywood premiere. I had to look like a celebrity
links_reviews_text: This dress is great. Super comfortable! With the open back, the bra wasn't happening, but with the material, it wasn't a problem. It was perfect for the hot LA summer weather as well. Loved this dress!!

So comfy! The material is stretchy so you don't feel confined. It hugs curves so nicely but will show any bump or imperfection. The back is what makes this dress; it is soooo open and so pretty! No bra for this one!

I rented this for a date night with my husband at a casino. The small fit, but I wore the medium because it was longer. (It was still snug since the fabric is very stretchy.) No need for a bra for the small-busted. Fun to dance in. Loved it! Not something I would usually wear, so it was a fun rental. Excuse the TOMS ... I got blisters from my heels lol.
Great fit, stretchy and comfortable. Perfect mini dress with a partly bare back. I loved it and got a lot of looks and compliments. :)
I wore this for a bachelorette party, and loved it. The dress is surprisingly comfortable. Fits nicely (a tad short) and very flattering.

links_reviews_title: The dress really stood out and I got so many compliments! I also felt great wearing it.
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered the medium but ended up wearing the small because the material is very stretchy. It is super comfortable and the detail/design on the dress is very flattering. I also wore it on quite a warm night and the fabric wasn't too thick or heavy.

I rented this for my birthday celebration and I can't tell you how many compliments I received. The dress fit like a glove...didn't ride up when I sat and was great when I danced. I'd highly recommend this dress to anyone looking to blend in yet stand out a little.

links_reviews_title: I felt so sexy in this dress and I got so many compliments! It was perfect for my sorority's semi.
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect to show off an hourglass figure, but I'm sure it would look great on anyone!!! It fit me perfectly and wasn't too short or too tight.
It felt short when I was walking, but probably because I'm not used to wearing this length. My sisters assured me that it didn't ride up while I was walking! Comfortable fit and no bra needed!

This dress is soooo comfortable for being so short and tight. The material is soft, thick and stretchy! The back is amazing! Wish I had a picture of it. It does ride up when you stand up from sitting like most short dresses do. Seriously so great, got so many compliments. I wore a sticky bra with this dress but you could get away no bra if you're perky enough!

I loved how unique this dress was and also the open back! It was a bit short but didn't ride up too bad. The material was nice and thicker so I didn't need to wear a bra...and I always wear a bra! Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: We felt gorgeous and danced all night long in these dresses!
links_reviews_text: I rented this (in Medium) for my girlfriend, who is about 5'3" / 130lbs / 34DD, and it fit her perfectly. It is a body con, so it's purposefully snug (she looked great!). It's more of a woven, heavier dress than you'd expect, but that makes it easy not to have to wear a bra with it. The cut and fit of the dress was nice, didn't have any problems with it riding up, and it was easier to move around in than you'd expect. We didn't get any full-body pictures, so I took a picture with it on right before I returned it. I'm 5'7" / 145lbs / 34C and it fit me well too. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, perfect for the occasion. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I felt very confident in it. With no mediums available, I ordered the large. I'm glad I did - my only issue was that I didn't wear a bra with it because of the open back, so the top was a little too big. It wasn't noticeable though, and I'm sure fashion tape could have fixed the situation if I had some on hand!

links_reviews_title: Little red dress will turn heads!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 or a small but this was a true small. I'm 5'6 and wouldn't have worn it if it was any shorter. I would get a medium the next time.

I wore this to a concert and got complimented all night long. The material is thick yet stretchy and so so comfortable. It rides up with a lot of movement but I still felt comfortable. I'm tall and the length was still sexy but not too short. I want to own this dress. Perfect!

links_reviews_title: Great Bachelorette Party Dress for a Beyoncé Concert
links_reviews_text: Went to a Beyoncé concert for a Bachelorette Party, and this dress was perfect. I wore the small, and it was definitely tiny, but I was going for the short dress look. It was comfortable and kept everything in.

Wore this dress to a nice dinner date for New Years as it had been one of my "hearts" for quite some time. I loved the way the straps cut in across my collarbone, keeping the high neck (classy) and showing off a little skin still. At first I was self-conscious about some side boob coming out, but the dress material is thick and weighty, so it lays flat and keeps the gals secure. Wore the small and it was still short and tight. Maybe too short - beware if you're sitting down for a long time and you don't have a table to cover you up. Overall great dress and would rent again for another date night.
A little low cut but I made it work!
Perfect for causal beach wedding. Ended up keeping it.

I would purchase this dress in a heartbeat. It was fun, flirty, and flattering. I received so many complements on it! I purchased Nippies Skin on Amazon to wear with this (those are a game changer and I HIGHLY recommend them), and I felt comfortable and covered all evening long. I am a 36C and I found the large to fit perfectly around my rib cage—not too tight nor too loose where I felt I’d be exposing myself.
Rented this for a girls beach weekend. Wore it out to a fancy dinner and loved it. Very flattering, fun fit.
Flowy and fun, fit true to size, fun to wear!

I normally would not have picked this dress out, but I needed an outfit and I was at the NYC RTR store and this was the only dress that I liked that fit. I enjoyed wearing it was flowy and comfortable. Loved the fabric and floral print. The clasps that cold the back of the dress are impossible to close on your own so make sure you have someone around.
I wore this dress the my bridal bruncheon. This dress was beautiful and fit perfectly. I received a ton of compliments!

I loved this dress! It could be a bit tight for ladies with bigger breast size, however fit great for 32A. Love the ruffles, and the back is gorgeous! The color of this dress has a slight greyish hue, so it is not bright white. This dress has 2 slits in front, which makes it comfy. The price was good, so I ended up buying it)
Light, comfortable, flattering and absolutely gorgeous! I did not wear a bra with it but it felt a little risqué, petals would have been better but I didn't pack them. Great vacation dress!
Great summer dress. The back is lovely. It was very comfortable and a great length. I'd definitely rent again

I'm usually a size 2-4 so the small worked great. You will need someone to help you button the top buttons. I couldn't do it by myself. The color is not white; it's almost a very pale blue. Was comfortable to wear. A good amount of cleavage shows so don't wear in conservative environment. It's got a low back and very flattering.

I love this classic floral print dress by ASTR! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. Curvier women should consider sizing up for full hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a nubra or no bra because of the open back. At 5'4, the length hit tea length on me. Painterly bouquets and flouncy ruffles bring feminine romance to this flowy V-neck dress. Pair with cute sandals and a fun bracelet to complete your outfit!

I rented this for my birthday dinner and it was perfect! I am between a 6 and an 8 and the medium was perfect. I am not chesty, so I didn't feel like this was revealing at all. I just inserted some little bra pads to wear with it since you cannot wear a bra. The slits give it such a cute look, yet still do not make it too risqué when sitting. This dress is definitely for a more narrow upper half.
I absolutely loved this dress and the back was absolutely adorable. It was comfortable and flows and overall looked amazing on. The lining on the inside is a bit short though for taller women

links_reviews_title: Cute floral, great for summer or special occasion
links_reviews_text: I tried small in store, but the fabric is chiffon and doesn't stretch so I had to size up since I'm bottom heavy. The picture doesn't do it justice. The back is beautiful, but you'll need a pretty bra back and someone to help you with the two buttons. Can definitely accommodate bustier ladies.

I'm obsessed with this summer dress!! It fits TTS but is on the lower cut side in the front. I'm fairly tall and this dress fell longer on me but still looked great. The back of the dress is to die for. I received a ton of compliments on this from random ladies. Honestly thinking about buying it!

This dress was a replacement for a romper gone wrong! What sold me on this dress was the back. It was airy, summery, and made me feel pretty. The top is fairly structured, so I didn't have to wear a bra (I'm usually a 34 DD). The ruffles were a nice touch and not over the top. The background is really light grey (not white) and a little see-through, so skin color undies are recommended. There are two slits on the front, but are tasteful. I dressed this down, but can see it dressed up too with heels and nice jewelry. Overall, good selection for my birthday celebration!

links_reviews_title: Better for someone tall and thin
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress but it wasn't flattering on my 5'2" curvy figure. I think it would work well on someone who is slender. The fabric is somewhat sheer so nude undergarments are needed.

I loved this summer dress! It was slimming and fitted in all the right places, but had very good flow. The back is gorgeous - you'll need sticky boobs or petals! I used the former. It ran pretty true to size - i ordered both the XS and the S and went with the S. The buttons on the back require someone to help you in!
Easy to walk in and it looks great with flat sandals

Adored this dress! I wore this to our pre- wedding welcome dinner for a look that was fun and not overly bridal. I did have to wear a stick- on strapless bra, but I still gave the dress 5 stars cause it's just that dang cute. The skirt is lined far enough down that a slip or shape wear aren't needed.
I loved it! Not something I'd wear on just any night, but it was great for a summer evening out. The back was sexy, but impossible to button myself!

links_reviews_title: Ordered as potential rehearsal dinner dress, loved it enough to keep it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as a potential rehearsal dinner dress, but it is more of a light blue than a white color! But I LOVED it, and ended up purchasing and keeping it! Highly recommend for any fun, formal event.
I wore this to my bridal shower. The only tough part but buttoning it by yourself and it’s a little see through. I wore a medium but probably could’ve worn a small (I’m usually a size 4)

links_reviews_title: summer dress for a pool day
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect....very simple but extremely flattering

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: This was a free backup dress and thank god I was able to have that option. The other dress that I ordered ran too small overall. This dress fit perfectly to size and was flowy and comfortable. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: The back is gorgeous and the fit is almost perfect.
links_reviews_text: It's the perfect amount of flowy, without being oversized. It's both pretty and sexy. It's a winner.
This dress is gorgeous - but runs small in the bust and the slip underneath is super short. Didn't find this easy to wear, would recommend sizing up!

The back of this dress is so pretty. It was comfortable and kept me cool all night at a small concert. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of 5 is the neckline was a little low and made for someone with a bit of a bigger bust than me. A B cup would probably have looked best. I had to wear a special stick on bra and it sometimes showed.

Absolutely gorgeous dress. I was excited to wear it. I ordered in a medium which is typically a little loose on me. This dress was so tight I couldn't even zip it up. I love everything about it and would definitely recommending a size up.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it for a rustic summer wedding, it's more of a very pale blue, so acceptable for weddings. I'm 5'3" and 115 pounds and it fit perfectly! I do have a small chest and slightly broad shoulders, it was a little tight in the chest area, but mostly because of my broad shoulders. Below the chest it is light, flowy, and cool for summer. The back is a beautiful. Immediately after putting it on, I wanted to buy it!

The back was amazing. The dress is flowy and flattering. It was perfect for a day party. I don't know if it would be too tight at the top for someone with a bigger bra size since it fit perfect for my small bust.

links_reviews_title: Summery & easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Super cute, I dressed it down with flats and a Jean jacket for a casual summer dinner, then dressed it up with wedge heels for a night out. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress! Great for a summer wedding-- light, flowy and fun.
links_reviews_text: Overall very flattering, especially on the waistline. If you have a wide back go for the size up. Bra was the only tricky part as it is a bit see through without one, but you can make it work! Great dress.

links_reviews_title: was more of a bluish white color... better for a beachy, casual event
links_reviews_text: Low & showed cleavage and the back was uncomfortable... not impressed
Very lovely dress. I like the sheer overlay and shorter bottom which makes it flirty. The straps were a bit long so would require pinning
The back of the dress is the best part.
Gorgeous. Great fit. Elegant but still flirty.
Dress ran a bit small but the design and intended fit are beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Cute but funny gap at the back kept it from being amazing
links_reviews_text: This gapped at my back, which looked kind of funny from the side. Otherwise it was cute and comfy. Got a few compliments, but not the same amount I normally get from RTR. Overall, it did the job but probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning! It fits great and attracted so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress is wonderful. I wore the size 4 and it fit great. The zipper is really hard to manage right around the waistband part because of the extra fabric, but fit comfortably once we got it zipped. There is a little room in chest area for women with smaller breast (I am a B cup). It was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I had so many compliments on this dress. I absolutely loved everything about it!
I got many compliments on the dress. It's very flowy and comfortable.
My daughter wore this dress for homecoming. It's super cute & was the perfect dress for the occasion. The pockets were great for a phone, lip gloss & a small wallet. Would definitely rent again!

The fabric on this dress is beautiful - deep rich navy color with some shine but not too much, mid weight but not too heavy. However, the dress itself is poorly designed. The bodice of the 4 was way too large, and the 2 was too small in the ribs. In addition, the zipper is not strong enough to match the weight of the fabric, and so it was nearly impossible to close either size dress. Clearly someone else had struggled to fit into the 4, as the fabric was ripped along the ribs by the zipper.
I rented this for my 16 year olds Homecoming dance. It was beautiful! She loved it and felt so confident! She got so many compliments.
I rented this for an awards ceremony. I loved the color and the pockets. Nice material and the back is fabulous.

This was my first RTR rental. It took me 12 dresses to find the right fit for my slender, petite figure. Only drawback: it fit a bit tight in the torso around the beading area (an issue I had with most RTR dresses I tried on bc I have a wide rib cage) so if I could I probably would've gone a size up so I could be comfortable. All you need is a pair of big dangly earrings and a pair of great pumps and you're set! Best part was the sexy crisscross straps in the back! All in all, LOVED this rental!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: This dress was true to size and fit me like a glove. Having said that, it had ZERO stretch, which is important to keep in mind for the waist area. The size 4 juuussstt cut it for me with a little bit of room up top but wasn't so gappy that I needed to tape anything down. You could use nipple stickers or a nubra but the fabric is also thick enough that those could be optional. If in between sizes, go up one size - not down - but keep the chest area in mind if you're pear-shaped. I loved the color, the jeweled waist detail, and how the fun, criss-crossed back balanced out the more conservative front.

links_reviews_title: Everyone liked it, and it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: 5’5& 130 lbs. Luckily got help with getting straps over my head and with the zipper, because if your hair is done up for a wedding, it’s a tight squeeze getting into the dress. Dress is comfortable for dancing/ sitting/ standing, only cons are: my dress had a long tag still attached and I didn’t wanna cut it off but when you try it on it sometimes pops out and looks off, & the front of the dress didn’t sit perfectly flat for me, had to keep pulling the straps away from my neck to have it sit right.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal wedding. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Very comfortable.
Great dress for a formal affair. It is a fit and flare style, the bust is a little large and the waist is small. Fit well for one night
Fits true to size. Loved the pockets. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything I was looking for! I was so comfortable all night long!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! A touch loose around the neck area but I also have a small chest so that could have been the difference! The pockets were a life saver and made me feel comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: The jeweled waist trim & large cross back straps & full skirt made this dress a standout.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit large in the bust for my 15-year-old, but was otherwise a perfect and unforgettable dress. Other girls had dresses from the juniors department and were too tight/too short/too similar to everyone else's; this dress was pure class & beauty. My daughter got a million compliments!

This dress was great! It flares out a lot under the belt. The belt section was a little tight as it had no stretch, but it was an amazing dress. Hugged at all the right places and the back and the pockets were a bonus to this dress!!

I went up a size in this dress so the hips would lay right because it has a pleated bottom. It was a gorgeous dress and I received many compliments. It was backless and sassy and I didn't have to wear a bra because of the cut.

links_reviews_title: This was for my daughters Winter Formal.
links_reviews_text: It fit her perfectly and the size was right on. The length was a tad below the knee and she loved the pockets. It was bulky and the back was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, zipper was a pain in the neck, great length and beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my daughters high school dance. Shes 5’8 and 125 lbs. the dress looked fantastic on her and it fit her nicely. The zipper was really hard to pull up but it worked fine after a few tries. It was snug around her waist but not uncomfortable. The back was one of the nicest aspects of the dress and tons of people loved the look

links_reviews_title: I love that it had pockets!
links_reviews_text: It was very comfortable and cute. I got a lot of compliments on it. The pockets were the best part. It was a little hard to zip up because of the beaded waist, but overall I loved it and definitely recommend it.
This was a fantastic dress bit of a challenge to get into but perfect once on!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! It has POCKETS!!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Zipper was a little tough but I got it up. Lots of compliments!

I wore the size 10. The 8 was too tight in the bust because I'm a 36D. I wore it to my husband's Christmas party and I felt regal. I don't get dressed up often but when I do, I love dresses like this. The back is the show stopper. I added it for show in the pictures. The pockets are a plus and I didn't even have to wear a bra because the dress pretty much held the girls in place...bonus. Only thing I didn't like was you had to keep straightening out the neckline because it will bunch up. I think that might be due to the looseness of the straps in the back. That is the only con. The color is just gorgeous. I paired it with silver shoes. For reference, since I can't save my information for some reason, I'm 5'2, 36D, 151 lbs. I would definitely rent this again!!

I rented this as a backup dress for a company holiday party. I ended up wearing it because I liked it better. It was perfect for the cocktail attire dress code. The color was great and the fabric felt expensive. The beaded belt detail was the perfect amount of visual interest. The back was so pretty I wish I would have taken a picture. The best part? Pockets!!!!!!!! I didn't have to carry a purse and worry about where I set it down. My hubby was pretty excited that for once he didn't have to walk around with lipgloss in his pockets. The only bad thing I can say about it is that I couldn't wear a bra because of the mostly open back.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: Pros: Pockets! Color was great for the holidays. Back was pretty. Cons: side zipper was tough for my dress. Sizing was tricky for me. Smaller size was too small to zip up, but bigger backup was a tad loose in the top straps. Went with the larger size and it worked okay, but wouldn't rent again because of my own personal measurements.
The dress fit well and was perfect for the wedding. I needed to wear a stick bra but it worked fine.

I was a bit hesitant to get this because I read that it was right around the waist, but I ended up loving it! Everyone said it made me look so elegant and was perfect for pictures. I loved the fit and look of the dress I would def rent again!

This dress was perfect. It fit well, was easy to wear (did not require spanx), and I received many compliments on it. I loved the flare skirt with pockets. The back was unique and fun. The dress did wrinkle easily, but it arrived in perfect shape.

I rented this for my daughter's homecoming dress. She LOVED it. It was the perfect balance of modest and flattering to make us both happy. At 5'4" it came to just above her knees, the waist cinched nicely without being too tight, and the neckline covered everything it needed to cover without being too high. Her favorite part: pockets and the twirl factor. Great for dancing. No issues with the zipper or feel of fabric. She would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect details & fit.... Loved wearing it all night!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! I rented this one as a back up style to another dress for a black tie wedding in NYC. I ended up wearing this one because of the details, fit, and pockets. (Who doesn't love a dress with pockets?) I had twins 5 months ago and was hoping to find a dress that helped to mask the baby weight and stomach area that I have yet to loose. This dress did the job perfectly while also allowing me to feel sexy and confident. I got several comments regarding the dress (especially the back!) and loved dancing the night away in it. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and great first expereince!
