links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience. Rented for 14 year old daughter freshman homecoming. It was age appropriate. Classy and fitted beautifully at a size 2. Beautiful navy blue fabric, has a nice sheen to it. Paired with super fun shoes that were comfortable all night and had personality. Wore hair up to show off back. Only issue is that the hem on the front right sagged. Tried to attach with fabric tape but didn't hold. It wasn't terribly noticeable though. Initially selected the Tracy Reese Charmed By You Dress, and back upsize was not available. Chose this as the second option when offered for no additional cost. The Tracy Reese dress was a little short and my daughter didn't like the fabric--compared it to curtains...and she didn't like how the shoulders had to be worn a bit off the shoulders. Had she worn that one, the size 2 fit fine.

links_reviews_title: Classy, cute, and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9, 130lbs and this dress (size 4) fit great! It was absolutely stunning and perfect for the occasion. I don't know that I've ever felt more beautiful! You won't be disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. The perfect short dress for a formal event - I received complements all night!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6", 127 lbs and flat chested. The size 2 fit perfect.

I rented the 8 and the 10, and am usually an 8 in dresses. I ended up wearing the 10 because the waist was a more comfortable fit. Both sizes were big in the chest, but it wasn't terrible. The dress was flattering, with great color and high quality fabric.
The dress is beautiful, photos do not do the quality of the fabric any justice. The beading is beautiful while being subtle. I wore with a Nu Bra and that worked nicely.

I wore this to a wedding where cocktail attire was required. I loved how it looked in the end, but did have a couple of issues. I wore an 8 and I typically wear a 4 or 6, but decided to opt up based on the reviews. But, truly I needed the 10...this probably fits perfectly if you have a smaller waist and tummy, my trouble areas. It's definitely fit and flare. The color and fabric are gorgeous, and it doesn't show when a little tight. The zipper was also SO HARD to zip up even when putting on the hanger, but on it took two of us for sure! It was large in the bust, but I found a strapless/backless bra at Soma that worked well and helped me fill it out enough to look great for one night!

Obsessed with this dress! I am a solid 8 but often a 10 in many RTR dresses. I wore the 8 but it was rather tight at the waist band, but it fit perfectly everywhere else so I went with it. If you have a larger bust or don't want to deal with a super tight (ie 2 people required to zip) I'd consider sizing up. So many compliments an the back and pockets are amazing!!

links_reviews_title: Classic elegance a la Audrey Hepburn
links_reviews_text: My daughter wore this (sz 2) to a homecoming dance. She paired with Slate & Willow silver crystal earrings (RTR), shoes and clutch were purchased on Zappos. She's 124#, 5'2", and a 32C. She wore her hair up so you could see the beautiful back to the dress. However, you will have to wear a special bra (she bought her's at Walmart) since the back is open. The beading was good on this dress but we'd accidentally ordered two of these and the beading on the other dress was in serious need of repair! Also, the bottom layer was longer for some reason than the outer layer of the dress and showed underneath. Fortunately, I had hem tape I purchased for another daughter, problem solved! It's a lightweight dress with pockets, which she loved, & she looked BEAUTIFUL.

links_reviews_title: Simple, fun + with a flirty back!
links_reviews_text: Loved this rental! Fabric was of good quality, moved easily, didn't need a bra and had pockets! Zipper was a pain, but I have found that to be a reoccurring theme with most RTR rentals. Back was a showstopper and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit & flare, straps too long
links_reviews_text: This fit was very flattering and worked great for my body type, however I am 5'5 and the straps were too long on me. I ended up tucking them in and wearing it as a strapless dress! Prepare for this if you are a shorter girl, or use bobby pins to shorten the straps.

links_reviews_title: All the compliments I got on my outfit
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, the only thing that bothered me was the straps kept trying to fall down. Beautiful, well made dress.
The dress fit perfect beside the unadjustable straps were slightly big.

I rented this for a November wedding. I rented the 4, and sized up for my backup. Unfortunately I was right between the two sizes--the 6 had much longer straps that were falling off, and the 4 squeezed my underarms. I picked the tighter option so I didn't have to worry about flashing anyone. No bra required, and pockets were a huge bonus. I love the fabric--I called my outfit modern goth Victorian. Great rental, would totally keep it if I could.

I couldn't speak more highly of this dress! Corset like feel to the top with flowy skirt. It was a perfect length (being tall I often find similar styles too short), the material was thick and comfortable so I didn't need a bra, and it had pockets!!! I'd echo what the others said in terms of the straps falling every so often, but it really wasn't a big issue and I'd happily rent it again.

links_reviews_title: A wonderful dress for my daugher's homecoming dress! A well made dress appropriate for a HS dance.
links_reviews_text: A great dress to wear with or without heals. She really liked the pockets and and dark color blue. The straps are a huge issue if you on the smaller bust size. We had to go a bigger size dress so that we could cinch the straps up at least 4 inches. I'm sure if you had a bigger chest the straps would not be an issue. Overall my daughter loved the dress and rental price was great!

The dress was very flattering & elegant. I got many complements about the waistline and the bodice; it fit & flared at just the right point to give my otherwise "straight and narrow" shape a little bit of curve. The only downside was that the straps fell off the shoulder repeatedly throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Straps too long, but very flattering!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable and the quality fabric makes it versatile for casual or formal events. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it has pockets! Unfortunately, the straps were way too long. I used safety pins to shorten them so they would stay up. I would be prepared to do some self-altering to the straps like I did if you choose to rent this dress.
Great for a wedding, got tons of compliments!

The straps a little long. They fell off from my shoulders from time to time. But it was a little tight on the boobs so the dress was holding up perfectly. I love the dress, it's very high quality. Nice black & blue color coordination. Perfect for an event or date night, if you want to look elegant and stylish
Loved this dress! Super glamorous. No bar needed. Straps were long but I didn't have to pin, just adjusted them higher on my shoulders every once and awhile.

This dress was very nice. It was my backup dress that I ended up wearing to a Valentine's Day wedding in 2014. The color is a very dark blue/navy that works great with a black shawl or black shoes. The dress was comfortable and even had pockets. The thick fabric was very helpful for the cold weather.
straps were a little loose.

links_reviews_title: Not flattering on petites with small hips
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress was way heavier than I expected, and I think it ultimately affected the way the lower part of the dress draped. It looked extremely unflattering in the front. May not be suitable for those with straighter hips. The straps were also very long, but shortening them would not solve the fit of the skirt portion of the dress. It looks fine from the side and back, but very awkward in the front. I did not end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, long straps, heavy material
links_reviews_text: It has pockets! Who doesn't love that! Worn by my teen daughter for a school dance. Fits slightly on the small side. Thick fitted material did not require a bra. Straps are very long and had to be pinned to be wearable. Mix of front and back side of fabric for different parts of the dress was an interesting subtle detail

links_reviews_title: Love the dress and fit!! Super comfy!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely fell in love with this dress! I am pretty petite with a bigger bust and it's hard to find dresses that fit well. The only downfall was the straps, as they are weirdly long. I had to make them shorter by pinning them down in the back. The pockets were great for holding my chapstick! Best part is no bra is needed for this dress. Very supportive and forgiving dress! Wish I could keep it!

Cute & fun. I'm giving 4 stars because the straps were so long. They fell down all night. I still had so many compliments and felt cute all night. If you are large up top you will need a strapless bra as the top panel is quite low. On the best side POCKETS!!! Loved them.

This dress is made from a satiny navy blue fabric with back velvet detailing, it looks and feels so luxurious. I felt like a princess and received many compliments on the dress. It is very fitted at through the bust, ribs, and waist and then widens out (perfect for small-waisted gals with regular/wide hips).

links_reviews_title: Dress is very flattering and the material is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit but definitely runs small, especially if you're busty! Overall it was the perfect dress for my friend's wedding and I had lots of fun dancing the night away in it!
This dress was okay, the straps were very long and I had to keep adjusting them, besides that the dress was very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Nice dress not too fancy... AND IT HAS POCKETS!! :)
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable, true to size, and it had POCKETS! Lol which was awesome not having to go into my purse constantly. It does have a nice pattern which is hard to see in the picture, and I did have to pin the straps as they were a little long (that's the only reason I'm not giving it the 5th star).

links_reviews_title: Pretty and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my 15 year old daughter's homecoming and it worked perfectly. Reading the reviews, I expected the straps to be too long and they are, but with careful and thorough pinning, the dress fit beautifully. She received tons of compliments and found it very easy to dance in. The pockets were super helpful to keep her phone. She looked gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Perfect homecoming dress for my freshman daughter.
links_reviews_text: The picture doesn't do the fabric or color of the dress justice. It is a beautiful blue and black contrasting pattern and is gorgeous. The straps were definitely too long, but otherwise the fit was perfect. We had to pin about 4" of each strap, but in my opinion it was worth it for a well-priced rental, and definitely not noticeable at all. My daughter loved the pockets so she didn't need to carry a purse. She was very comfortable all night. Lastly, she didn't wear a bra, but she put some padding and then used tattoo tape (our best friend for any formal occasion) to have the dress fall nicely against her chest. I have personally rented dresses several times for myself, but this was a first for my daughter. She is a ballerina with long legs and a thin profile. After having read other reviews I decided to take the chance and I am so glad that I did!

Absolutely adored this dress. Incredibly comfortable, didn't even have to wear a bra! Biggest flaw: straps way too long as other reviewers noted. I had to use a bracelet to tie it together at the top under my hair. Fabric is high quality and beautiful in person. Wish I owned this dress and had the straps altered :)

links_reviews_title: We rented this dress for our daughter who was a guest at a Bat Mitzvah party. Looked stunning!
links_reviews_text: My daughter is just 13, but I can imagine this dress would work for a range of ages. She is a competitive swimmer (5'-10" tall with broad shoulders and rib cage on an otherwise small frame). The 8 fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a short girl
links_reviews_text: This dress was so flattering and the color and detail was just beautiful. I've never felt so classy! The best dress to wear for a classy San Francisco wedding!
It fit like a glove, i loved that it has pockets!!! The only bad part is, the straps are long so you have to pin them. Other than that i was very pleased!
I loved wearing this dress and it lots of compliments. It's hard to see from the pics but there are two different patterns and they are both beautiful. It felt perfect for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly and the embroidery was unexpectedly detailed and beautiful. Great cocktail dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, the sides seemed to ride up a bit but otherwise snug feel

Overall fit true to size but as everyone else stated, the straps are so long, I had to pin them about 3-4 inches to make it work! The dress was a great length for a formal wedding and I loved the pattern. Would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: It fit great, and I loved the pockets!
links_reviews_text: The picture doesn't really show the details of the dress, but it's a great baroque pattern that goes well for a night out at a party.

Gorgeous fabric on this dress! It's hard to see in photos, but visible in person. It's a black and very dark blue. I love dresses with thick fabric. I'm 5'7, about 115 and I'm fairly certain I ended up wearing the size 0. The straps were definitely long. I pinned them before leaving the house, but I couldn't get it to stay pinned when sitting down and getting pulled, so they just ended up being droopy. The dress still stayed up due to a tighter fit in the torso. You can see the straps that are loose in my car photo. Overall, pretty party dress!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, it had a beautiful pattern that went well with black and blue.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my schools winter gala, and it was amazing! Like others said, the straps were long.
fits very well, straps a little long, great thick fabric.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and pockets made this a stand-out dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great for my hourglass shape - small in the waist with plenty of room in the hips. I ordered a size up from my usual size to make sure it was comfortable. I'd say the fit is somewhere between small and true-to-size. The straps - as many have mentioned - were really long, but a couple of safety pins on each side kept them where they belong. I had to use big safety pins due to how thick the material is, but was able to pin them inside the dress so they weren't visible. The material is very thick but does have a little bit of give so it fits and flatters really well. The pockets were a great added bonus! I rented this for my company holiday party, where all the employees get to perform at a music venue. I spent the evening running on and off stage, playing instruments, etc, and the dress was so comfortable I didn't have to spend any time adjusting it. I was able to keep the set list in the pocket so I had a copy all night. This was my backup dress, but the fit and fabric were so great, I'm glad I got it and chose to wear this one instead!

links_reviews_title: Lots of dancing and good pictures!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR dress and the reason I use this site so often! Overall flattering fit, perfect length, and photographs well. The material has a cool pattern and very rich color that I was complimented on all night. I wore this to a friend's Sweet 16, so I danced all night. This dress was easy to move in and wasn't restricting at all (didn't ride up/down, squeeze, or cinch weird). The one problem I had was that the straps were too long (probably because I have a small chest)- but it was an easy fix with a couple of safety pins. Would definitely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: It worked well for a mad men themed party
links_reviews_text: I rented it for a mad men themed party. The fabric of the dress even matched the background of the photo booth! I wore it with a tulle petticoat underneath for extra poof, and a pair of long white gloves. There are a couple of little issues with the dress: 1) the straps are too long so I had to safety pin them -- for reference, I am 5'5" with an average length torso; 2) the dress runs large. I wore the 6 (backup was a 8), but would be better off in a 4.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and super fun dress to wear.
links_reviews_text: Straps may have been the tiniest bit long but they managed to stay on my shoulders. Pockets were awesome for my phone and the dress was so comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. The colors were amazing and you could really wear it with tan or black shoes
links_reviews_text: I originally was going to go with the size 6 fit, but it ended up being a little bit too loose in the bust area, especially the straps. Someone must have altered the straps on the size 4 and it fit perfectly. Very comfortable all night and the pockets were amazing. Would definitely recommend this dress! And definitely order a backup size in the next size up!

It has pockets on the side seams! So awesome! Okay, it is also gorgeous. Nice heavy brocade fabric. Looks like RTR had tried to take up the shoulder straps but still needed to pin them up another 3/4 of an inch. Lots of compliments. :-)
Knew this was technically a maternity dress but tried it anyway and was not disappointed! Fits pretty close around the neck. Gorgeous smooth fabric but thin--definitely recommend for a hot day.

links_reviews_title: Happy Flowy Dress...just super thin and see thru
links_reviews_text: Rented for my "What will it bee?" themed gender reveal. The material is thin and see thru would def recommend wearing a slip and in the spring or summer months. It runs large, I wore it at 6 months pregnant and definitely could have sized down.
Fun colorful dress! Looks great on its own or layered.

links_reviews_title: Love it- great color - nice and loose.
links_reviews_text: I wore it as a normal dress not maternity- it was great.

First, this dress runs HUGE. I'm 7 mo. pregnant and I could have sized down from my pre-pregnancy size. Second, the dress is completely see-through - I was able to make it work with nude undergarments but be warned! Third, wrinkled extremely easily. Finally, the dress showed water spots - any time I washed my hands (or my bump hit the sink) and water splashed on the dress, it would leave spots after it was dried. Luckily there was enough excess fabric that it wasn't too noticeable, but still. Dress was a little too short in the back to be work appropriate with heels, so I wore flat sandals. One pro is that it was extremely comfortable!
I loved this dress! It fit so well, was very comfortable and stretchy (great for dancing!), and I got so many compliments! Felt like a million bucks.

I have rented this gown twice because it is so beautiful, classy & comfortable! I wore it once for a charity gala & again a second time for my husband's formal holiday party, and received so many compliments each time. The deep purple color is unique and the stretchy lace fabric is comfortable and not restrictive at all! At 5'9", the long length is definitely better. My husband commented on how classy this dress is, and the back detail is a very nice touch.
Comfortable to wear all night. Heavy fabric.
Wasn't too long since I got the petite version. Got away with wearing 2" heels and I'm 5'2"

links_reviews_title: I was a bridal attendant for my sister's wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2", 135 lbs and slightly curvy. This dress fit me perfectly (size 8R with 2 1/2 inch heels). Everyone loved it. I received many compliments and inquiries for where I found it. "Haven't you heard about renttherunway?" ;-)

links_reviews_title: Length was an issue but beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 2 petite and 2 regular. I am 118 lbs and 5'2". The petite length was too short and a bit small around the bust. The regular length was too long and when I tried pinning it up, I found that the hem was uneven which made it tricky. It was also a little big in the back at the top. I had to pin it at the shoulder blade area. Overall, it's a beautiful dress and I loved the lace detail! Be prepared to show some cleavage!
Great fit, very comfortable. Was told by many guests I looked like I was ready for the oscars. Many compliments through the night.
Loved the stretchy material and the lace. ❤️ I would rent it again and again but I don’t if they still offer it.

I loved this dress! I wore it for my company's Christmas party and it was perfect. It was classy and elegant, but different from what most others were wearing. The lace overlay is gorgeous and the deep purple color was beautiful. I was worried it would smash my chest and look weird, but it was fine and I loved the shape it gave me!

Fit awesome, though I'm not sure if I ended up wearing a regular or long, since I received two dresses that were the same length. It's a form fitting dress, but also stretchy! I have a small chest, so no issues with cleave at the formal event, but could be an issue for some.

links_reviews_title: Hugs the curves and beautiful color
links_reviews_text: This dress was everything I wanted it to be! It was simple, gorgeous color, curve hugging yet forgiving. The lace details were perfect. I'm short waisted so I found the shoulders to be slightly loose but it wasn't bothersome. At 5'2", I wore 4 in heels that gave me just the right height for the dress to slightly sweep the floor. While the fabric isn't "thick" it was adequate enough to not require a bra.

Classy, looks expensive, just the right fit. Felt very comfortable all night having this dress on....My skin is very sensetive and normally I would get some skin redness wearing lace...not this time!!!!!🤩🤩 Loved the dress and got so many compliments.
Lots of compliments on this dress! You definitely need to wear a strapless bra but otherwise it was comfortable and fit really well

I LOVED this dress! I'm 5'9 and the long was perfect with heels. Just touched the ground. I could move easily and the fit was amazing. With some stretch in the material I think you could probably size down. Worn with a strapless bra. Wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a Fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This is a really lovely, classy dress. I received a ton of compliments on it and was comfortable in it all night. I rated it only 4 stars because I feel the length options were awkward. I don't like to wear tall heels, so I preferred the Regular and still felt it was a smidge short, but the Long was too long. I am 5'8" for reference.

This dress got compliments all night! It hugs fairly snug and I wore spanx and nipple covers. I was able to move on the dancefloor all night and it stayed in place and looking great! Probably best on a tall slim/athletic build.
Looks great with the bump. wore this one for an elegant dinner - 7 months preggo. Received LOTS of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for black-tie wedding reception. Super comfortable. Traveled well.
links_reviews_text: I have an hourglass/athletic shape with a very small waist and it was a little big through the middle, but fit well on the top and bottom. It has tiny round buttons on the top/neck and I could not get those opened so I slipped that over my head. I wore 2 1/2" heels and it was just the tiniest bit long (like 1/4 to 1/2"), so it worked out just fine. It was super comfortable and was easy to pack...no worries about wrinkling.

I was concerned the dress may be too long as I'm just over 5'1", but with a modest 3" heel, the 6R was perfect! The dress was very comfortable, but fits snug with stretch. You'll want to use shape-wear if you're concerned about smoothing your curves. The lace over the shoulders, which forms the keyhole back, is a bit tall so I pulled the back of the dress a little lower to accommodate for the extra fabric. There is absolutely no structure in the bra area, so I recommend a strapless bra or no bra, if you're up for it. Overall, this dress was absolutely beautiful and it was also comfortable enough to move and dance in.

This is my 2nd rental and it was amazing! The dress looks beautiful and it fit amazingly! I did the 12 long because the 12 regular fit the same but it ended at my ankles and I wanted it longer with my heels. The dress fit and felt so comfortably. The back lace was a tad loose but overall it wasn't noticeable and it never slipped down. Give this dress a try, you won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Perfect for a formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my step-daughter's wedding and it was perfect. I usually a 12 or 14 in dresses and this one had enough give that the 12 fit perfectly. It was elegant and easy to move around in. I received a ton of compliments too!

I received many compliments. The body fit perfectly, but the lace sleeves were a tad stretched out. It did not keep the dress from looking beautiful though. I am 5'2" and wore 3 1/2" heels, length was just right. I wish it couldve stayed in my closet!
I received so many compliments on this gown! The neckline is beautiful and the fabric is very forging making it comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!! Excellent first experience with RTR
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much! I wore it to a black tie event for rhe University I attended. Its a beautiful eggplant purple and rhe lace detail is fantastic. I wore it with shimmery dark gray heels and it was perfect. Fabric is somewhat stretchy. I have a petitie athletic build and small frame and the 0 fit perfectly. Highly recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: If you want to make a statement, this is the dress for you!
links_reviews_text: So the dress did run a little large. I got a 2R which is my usual size and definitely could have gotten a 0R. Got the 4R as my backup size because I saw some reviews that said it ran small. I would say if you run smaller in the shoulders and chest area, go a size down. I had to pin the dress at the back so it would fit. That said, it was absolutely gorgeous, easy to move in, and bold, bold, bold! Great for a formal evening wedding.
I loved the fit of the dress. Was slightly long for my 5'2" frame but didn't interfere with dancing all night long. Nice stretchy material.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful deep purple for formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fitted but forgiving. I wore spanx to feel more comfortable but i wore my normal dress size. Easy to dance in & loved the color. Wore with short chunky heels.

I wore this as a bridesmaid to my sister's wedding. I received so many compliments on this gorgeous dress! The pictures do not do this dress justice. The only issue I had was that the straps were a bit long, but I just used a little fashion tape to hold them in place (picked it up at CVS).

This dress was great, I wore it to a black tie optional weddinn. I wore a 2L with 3-4inch heels, it was a tiny bit long but better than being short! Super comfortable and flattering fit. Would recomend.

Three U.S. Marines voted I wear this dress to the ball when I asked their advice on dress options. I wanted a much prettier dress but RTR had none of my other selections available. But it was very classy and matched the Marines' dress blues. It was a bit big on my petite frame which was disappointing but I am very nitpicky when it comes to my dresses. It's a really fine dress. A bit darker in color than I would hoped or liked but suited its purpose.
Dress fit pretty true to size. I normally wear a size 10 but the bottom was torn so they sent me a 12 long and it worked well for me.

I rented this gown as a backup. Loved the detail on the back side of dress. The front of the dress, around midsection kind of pouched the fabric and could have been more snug there. Still a pretty gown although I did not choose it for my event.
The dress runs large cause it has stretch. I ordered the 10l and 12l. The 10 fit but went with the 12 cause it was longer and didn't feel so stretched out. Couldn't wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to take this dress off!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal wedding. I rented an 8 and 10. I'm not tall, but I'm glad I ordered an 8L after reading some reviews. My only qualm with this dress was that the dress kept "shifting" off center (but it could have just been from all the dancing). I had so many compliments about this dress and would definitely recommend it!!

I ordered a 4 but ended up wearing my backup size because the 4 was stretched out. The 6 was perfect and the length was much better. However, if you are wearing higher heels go with the long. I danced all night in this dress and never felt uncomfortable! I loved the open back detail!!

links_reviews_title: Dress felt comfortable, elegant and was easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: Overall it's a tight fitting, but flattering on the chest. I'm 5'10" and ordered the Long, but just be prepared to only wear 2" heels MAX...otherwise it'll be too short!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my nieces wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am 5ft 10 , 175 pounds. I wear a size 36DD. I wore a 12L and it was a perfect fit with 2&1/2 inch heals. The material is very light and slightly stretchy so it's very forgiving. The plum color is very flattering and the dress hides flaws well. I recommend a low cut bra. A full coverage bra will show. You will need help putting it on. It would be tricky to put on by yourself. The rental and return process was super easy absolutely no effort at all! I got a ton of compliments on the dress and they were surprised when I told them I rented it. I will definitely rent gowns again!
I wore this to an Alzheimer's purple gala. Perfect fit. The complements! Truly felt like a queen.

links_reviews_title: The Event was Unforgettable because it was an absolutely beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: This event was the perfect dress for the evening. It was comfortable, cute, and classy. I received numerous compliments throughout the evening. The color was a purple that was not as deep as I thought it was going to be, but I still loved it. I would definitely rent again.

I chose this dress after my first choice has a zipper malfunction. I'm so glad it did. Loved the color. Loved the fit. Loved the lace. Loved it all. Seriously.... rent this dress. Necklace and earrings are also RTR!

I absolutely loved this dress. I received so many compliments on it. People couldn't get over the color, the style, and the details. I'm going to have to find more reasons to wear it before I have to return it (or buy it!)!

I loved this dress. Has a little stretch. I was worried it would be too short or that the top part would be too tight but it was ok. I wore size 10. I am 5'9, 145, 32DD. I wore it during the day with wedges then changed to gold strappy heels for dinner, which dressed it up nicely. I rely heavily on other's reviews so I hope mine will help others.

This dress fit like a glove. I'm normally shy about wearing bright colors, but the orange hue really popped and the detail made it eye-catching. Only drawback was the zipper (I needed assistance getting zipped up!). Otherwise, got lots of compliments throughout the evening. :)

I usually wear a 4, but at 5'2" with a bust size of 34G...I am used to sizing up. The 6 was perfect! I wore this to the theater on a Thursday evening. I got so many compliments on the color, style and fit!! I would definitely recommend!!
Perfect dress for a spring wedding! Fit perfect, was very comfortable, and got lots of compliments!

Great dress with little details that make it extra special. Those cutouts looked fabulous and I got plenty of compliments! The color was great too. I wore this for a work event in the evening outside.
Perfect fit, even for someone like me who is bustier.

links_reviews_title: Received the dresses in timely manner.
links_reviews_text: I was really impressed with the color and fit of the dress...better than I expected and received many compliments. I wore a white tank top underneath, since it was for work and it still looked great. Im petite and it was a good length. Thanks Rent The Runway!
This dress is amazing. Love the color and material. I wore a nude bra and you couldn't see it, even with the cutouts. Love.
The 6 was perfect, maybe a tab short but I'm 5'9 so that's usually the case. Tons of complements and the cut out is classy and sexy at the same time!
I loved this dress. It fit perfectly. Wasn't too short. It was so bright and fun, perfect for standing out.

I LOVED this dress! I ordered a four and a six and the four fit perfectly. The color was a little more coral than in the online picture (I think the picture looks more orange) but I wasn't disappointed at all. Looks great with a tan! My only complaint was that the top in unlined - but I wore those floral petals and they worked great. Would definitely recommend this dress!!!

The dress fit perfectly and was easy to put on. I wore a standard bra that was flesh colored. It did not show through. The dress is super comfortable and felt great. I would buy it if it goes on sale.
I loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. Very comfortable and the fit was perfect!
I'm a solid 6. This dress fit but was a little snug. Size up if you're not sure. Adorable dress!

The dress is not quite so dark in person. I had no concerns with the lace trim, the holes in front are relatively small. A little tricky around the trim with the zipper. I'm 5'11" and the dress wasn't too short.
Got lots of complements. Very flattering! Loved the detailing! Considered buying this! A hit!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on the dress! Perfect for the rehearsal dinner I attended.
links_reviews_text: The dress is not as bright of an orange as it looks on the website (which I thought was a good thing). Fit like a glove!
Very pretty. Got lots of compliments.

I LOVED this dress!! Fit great, good length, the material was breathable, the cutouts were sexy but not over the top. Very flattering! I probably could've worn the next size down, but didn't want to risk it. It is a more neon orange than I anticipated, but it still looked great.
The six fit perfectly, and I love the details.
Fun bright dress worn to party. Love the detail showing skin around the waist.
Fits true to size. Loved this dress! Perfect for a wedding :)

As noted in other reviews, the cut outs are 100% sheer/open. The cut out panel running down the middle didn't bother me and I had zero qualms about wearing a strapless bra with the dress. The waist panel is more challenging. The waist is open to skin and the embellishments are literally string. I was most concerned about tearing the string. The tie ring in the skirt is adorable on.

I love this feminine, classic dress by Rachel Zoe! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for most cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'0", the length hit above the knee length on me. This dress was super cute and great for the Spring/Summer season. Pair with strappy heels or sandals to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliment lbs... wore this 3 times before returning.
links_reviews_text: Such a fun dress and perfect for office to date night! I'm a true 2 and this was slightly big so if you're on the line, I'd size down.

Fun color, brand new, interesting design. This was a nice youthful pick by my 15yo to wear for Easter Sunday. Warning though - the mid section and seam down front of dress is see through/bare! We got a nude tank and that kept her covered. The zipper in back is a bit challenging to get past the ribbon-like mid section - you definitely couldn't zip this yourself. She's 5'4" 145' 36C.
Fun color and cut
I look best in bright orange, but this was more of a melon or peach. Pretty dress, but be advised it is not the color pictured.

This dress is so pretty. It fit perfect. A little difficult to zip up, zipper kept getting stuck mid way. Top was snug but not tight. I'm a 32 C so for a larger bust I would definitely consider sizing up. Color is so pretty and skirt flows. Received many compliments.
Darn it! Love the dress but it is see through in the middle showing bare skin connected just by threads. Can't wear to work

links_reviews_title: dress was just ok, probably because the fit wasn't what i expected.
links_reviews_text: was nice and bright but a little large in the waist and bust. but i like my clothes to fit very tailored to the body.
I wanted to love this, but once I had it on, didn't like it at all. Was very large and the skirt length was odd... I am 5'2" though, so maybe it's better for taller ladies?

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and bright pop of orange!
links_reviews_text: I'm not a fan of ruffles... but this was just the right amount. It didn't look frumpy. You can wear a regular bra with the dress, which is always a bonus!
This dress is very cute although it is much shorter than I anticipated. Color is very nice and the opening at the waist is not overly revealing.

links_reviews_title: I got this for my sister's bachelorette!
links_reviews_text: While the majority of the fabric was stretchy and comfortable, the open portion below the bust was a bit tighter and more difficult to zip.
This dress is more of a neon orange/ coral than a true orange. So flattering and comfortable. I was complimented all night!

I loved wearing this dress, and it looked great! The ruffles on the skirt were so flattering and perfectly placed, also helped to create a beautiful silhouette. The cutouts along the waist and down the front were a little peek to my skin but I never felt exposed. I am a 36D, so there is no chance to go without a bra. I wore a nude strapless and it was not easily noticeable - if at all. Would absolutely wear this dress again. It was perfect and true to size 12.
Much too frilly for me. A little bit big and color was a little dull- never actually wore it

I usually wear a 12, sometimes a 14. I could have gotten the dress on but it would have been so constricting and uncomfortable. I'd recommend going up a size. Really pretty dress otherwise, the peekaboo crochet detail is really nice

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my outdoor bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about how this dress fit! The top fit me perfectly and I have a smaller chest. Bodice/waist also fit snuggly. The wrap style skirt laid beautifully and the flutter cap sleeves were so fun! I felt chic and feminine at my outdoor garden party bridal shower!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not flattering on me.
links_reviews_text: I wanted this for a weekend in Cape Cod and didn't like the fit in the chest area a ton. Good for a shower or something more conservative

I was a little concerned about the chest after reading and seeing other reviews, but I went for the rental, and I'm glad I did! I have a small chest, long torso, and larger hips. It fit really well, and the movement of the dress was to die for. I had so many compliments all day. Wear a bra that fits you well, and you should be good.

This dress gave me LIFE. It was so perfect and easy to wear, size was on point. Tons of compliments. Rent it, you won't be disappointed! Also, despite other reviews I didn't have an issue with the top pushing boobs down in a funky manner! This dress was everything!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for hot days but odd fit.
links_reviews_text: I loved the concept of this dress, but the fit in the bust was weird. It was tight in the chest and pushed my chest down. Might work better for people with short torsos. The fabric was light and comfortable on a day exploring a new city.

I loved this dress for work, and got a lot of compliments on it. I felt really good in it, which is rare for me these days - I'm currently in the middle of losing baby-weight (after 5 mos I'm down 50 of the 80 I gained, but I'm still in a size 12 when I'm usually a 4). I wore this on a hot, muggy day in NYC, but this dress was nice and light - it's usually hard to find work-appropriate clothes that are comfortable on those days, but this dress was.

Tons of compliments on this dress! It's not my typical style, so I'm glad I got to rent it and try it out! I wore this with cute ankle boots at work and flip flops for the holiday weekend and it was so versatile and fun. It's great for hot days but NOT humid days. The fabric has a nice liner and very good quality. As a smaller bust, I didn't think it was too revealing and the hemline was perfect for (5'4") me

links_reviews_title: Felt so beautiful at my nephews graduation!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on my dress. It was a perfect dress for a hot graduation day; all linen. It runs small so I would def size up; normally I’d wear a small but glad I opted for medium. Just be prepared to iron it but so worth it!
Loved this really flattering dress! Ties made it slightly adjustable and the neckline was very flattering on me. Slit in front is a little short but was Perfect for a graduation celebration!
I really like this dress! My only problem with it is that the underskirt slip was a bit short for my liking - but overall it's very flattering and fun!

I wore this for my birthday brunch, and I liked it so much that I seriously considered buying it. The linen was very comfortable, and it fit like a glove. I love that it had pockets too! You truly cannot beat a dress with pockets. I highly recommend this for an easy breezy charming look.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Front wrap was too short to be appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: Liked this dress, but the way the wrap cut up in the middle made it way too short to feel like I could wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Very small in the chest, so much so that it squishes the ladies down.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress but size up

links_reviews_title: The upper part of the dress fit odd.
links_reviews_text: The dress was really cute on, but I ultimately never wore it because the stitching on the breast part was too high and just fit really funky.

links_reviews_title: Rented the dress as a back-up for my engagement photos. Looked and felt amazing.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Very flattering if you are not in love with your arms. A perfect combination of fun and flirty with modesty as well. I loved this dress so much I bought it to keep.

this did not fit AT ALL. I ordered a size large which I typically find works well, and this was MAYBE a size 6. There is absolutely 0 chance a large will fit you if you have bigger than an A cup. It was also very short at the peak in the front.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear but didnt fit.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a large and I couldn't even begin to zip this dress. Even if I would have gotten it on the slit up the front goes up way too high and V-neck is way to deep.
This dress is really cute but it is VERY short in the front and it is hard to zip it over the belt in the back. The material is stiff so there wasn't much give.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT Spring dress. Light in fabric and color, fun ruffle accent
links_reviews_text: The cut and style of this dress is flattering, with a waist tie, pockets, and ruffle sleeves. However, the top did not sit well unless you were standing, so I often had to pull it down and taut from the back. Perfect for standing and mingling, less comfortable for sitting at dinner.
This dress was adorable, but did not fit in the top due to my busy size. I also felt that it was very short in the front.
Bought it
Like it a lot, a little tight in the waist line
Way too tight on the top, I am a 34 DD and would barely squeeze in. Fit well everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to meet the parents and a friend's engagement party
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit - make the waist look tiny. Not super low or high cut. Fabric is linen-like but I didn't have any issues with wrinkles after sitting.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but very fitted in the chest and ribs.
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but it definitely fits tightly in the rib/boob area. I still wore it, but it pushed my c-cups down in a pretty weird way - right around the middle it was really tight, pushing my chest either down into the empire waist seam or spilling out above the top. Otherwise, really cute! You might want to size up if you are busty, but it should be noted that this has POCKETS! 8/10 recommend to rent.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering but too tight to wear :(
links_reviews_text: I am so sad! I ordered a size 4 and unfortunately no back up sizes were available. The 4 fit like a 0. Gorgeous color and the cut of the dress is very flattering! Unfortunately I had help zipping the dress that was already snug and it was still so tight I couldn't sit down (very important for dinner haha). If this dress is available for another occasion I would probably order a 6 and 8. I would say two sizes above the usual fit is the way to go. Until we meet again beautiful dress <\3
Beautiful dress! Easily could have worn a 6. Definitely runs small. But nice stretchy thick fabric! Loved it and received so many compliments! Truly felt glamorous all night!

LOVE this dress. I ordered a size 0 and a size 2 as a backup size. I am 5'2" and currently 110 lbs and normally wear a 0. This dress runs VERY SMALL, so ended up wearing the 2. It looked great but was still pretty tight (I had to completely take it off to use the restroom). I felt gorgeous and classy and received complements all night long! I loved that it showed off my curves while still keeping me covered.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful! I rented this for a wedding and it was perfect! As other users have mentioned, it runs small and is snug, so sizing up may be good idea. I'm small-chested so I was still able to wear a strapless bra with this dress, but I think you could get away with no bra as well. Overall, I loved it and felt great in it and would absolutely rent it again!

This dress was tight no matter what size. I'm between a 0 and 2 right now and I ordered a 2 and 4 because everyone suggested ir ran small. The 4 was still super tight in the mid-section - both were tough to walk in - but it also was not tight ENOUGH int the chest and the length was past the knees so I woret the 2. I felt a little too tight / restricted in the middle but loved the top and got quite a few compliments. I'd give it 4 out of 5 stars!

links_reviews_title: I wore this during the Private Interview portion of the Miss Virginia USA pageant!
links_reviews_text: The previous reviews are pretty spot on. I am typically a Size 2, and although I wore a Size 2, it fit more like a 0. I lost weight for the competition, but had I not, I would've wanted the 4. To edit my normal profile measurements, I was a 34B at the time this was worn, and was 122 pounds. Be sure to get your free backup size (one size up) in this dress :) Also, its more of a berry color in person than a dark red. Beautiful all around though! I received so many compliments!

Very pretty dress- even more flattering in person. Warning that it runs small and is very very slim fitting, all the way down to the knees, so much so that I had to take the whole thing off to go to the bathroom! Still, happy with the choice for a work holiday party.

I'm typically between a 2 and a 4, so I ordered this dress 2 sizes larger, as suggested. It does run small, but I wish I would have ordered the 4! I didn't quite fill out the top, but didn't have much wiggle room in the waste. The dress was a great material, and looked good all night!

I love this dress, so comfortable but sexy and I got so many compliments all night. I had to size up because of the "girls" and I needed a friend to zip me up completely once I got to the party but I felt amazing and wish I could just keep it!! It comes in black too so it's definitely on my favorites list!! I didn't have to wear a bra and the fabric is thick so I wasn't worried about showing too much.

Absolutely perfect for a formal wedding. Received compliments all night! The color is stunning and the fit couldn't have been better. I did have to wear a strapless bra with it but it was snug and stayed in place all night. Comfortable for dancing too. Will definitely be renting this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The size of this dress is perfect. It is fitted and sexy but not too in your face. The color is a gorgeous cranberry color which is perfect for a winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: Not the most comfortable but a really nice dress
links_reviews_text: Tight fit but definitely enhances the curves the right way. Got tons of compliments. Size up for sure.
Dress definitely runs small! I couldn't be happier with the "backup" size. So glad I discovered RTR, will definitely be a return customer!

This dress was beautiful! I am normally a 0-2 in dresses. After reading all the reviews I ordered a 6. (4 wasn't available). The 6 fit like a glove but was a little loose in the bust. I'm a 32C. The color is a gorgeous dark cranberry. No stretch in this dress but I could sit and walk comfortably. I'm 5'8 and it hit right at my knee. You do need to zip the dress down to use the bathroom. That was the only flaw it had. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Classic, classy and sexy. Runs small. Bottom slit can be high.
links_reviews_text: Agree with all the reviewers - size up. I usually wear a 6 and the 8 was snug. I probably could have gone up to a 10 but the bust was already loose on the 10. Needed Spanx for comfort - just helped smooth everything out - but the dress itself has great construction. A thick and reliable material, good cinching at the waist. This is a very fitted dress so if you're uncomfortable with super tight, then pass.

This is a really great looking dress and good quality. I sized up because my normal size was very tight and the neck line was just a little too restricting. My one issue with this dress was that it is not easy to use the bathroom in! It is too tight to pull up so I had to unzip it every time and it's not the easiest to zip/unzip on your own so it was a process. Also quite tight to dance in. I would rent again but not when I'd be dancing!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and received so many compliments all night! A few things to note - I'm 5'2" and 125 pounds and definitely had to size up. I normally fit into a 4 (sometimes 2), but I went up to a 6 in this and could have maybe gone to an 8. It fits snug and the butt doesn't have much give. The color is also more fuchsia than the red pictured, but I loved the color and neckline. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very sexy dress but runs small and isn't the most practical
links_reviews_text: This dress is super sexy and looks great on. It was perfect for a celebratory date night! Was out celebrating my boyfriend and he loved it, couldn't stop staring. I have a very small frame and usually wear a 00 or 0, and was nervous about trusting the other reviews and sizing up, but I'm so glad I did! I ordered a 0 and 2, and wore the 2. Fit like a glove, looked exactly as it should. Unfortunately, due in part to the cut of the dress but mostly the fabric (not a lot of stretch)--it's not the most practical. You definitely can't pull it up over your hips to use the restroom (have to take the dress off entirely to do so, and it's difficult to zip up efficiently yourself), and I even had some difficulty walking (have to take smaller steps), standing up/sitting down/getting in and out of cars, and taking stairs. Told my bf I just wouldn't drink any water at the restaurant and would just use the restroom when we got home, ha! So not the most practical, but it'll make you feel so sexy! :) Oh, and this is not a true red--more of a dark berry.

I wore this dress for a wedding. I ordered the size 8 & 10 and I wore the size 10. It is definitely snugger in the hip area. I recommend ordering a size up just to be more comfortable. Otherwise it was a great dress and received tons of compliments.

This dress was beautiful - sexy yet classy. But like the other reviews have mentioned, it runs small. I was able to wear a strapless bra underneath but you could definitely get away with not wearing one because the material is pretty thick and holds everything in place. Also, it was quite challenging to use the restroom in this dress - luckily I was able to pull it up without ripping it!

links_reviews_title: Very fashionable but not at all functional
links_reviews_text: I chose this dress for a rehearsal dinner and ordered a second dress for a wedding I would be attending. First off, the color is gorgeous and the fabric is a nice thick material. Very flattering. Other reviewers who were smaller in the chest area mentioned that it didn't fit tight enough across the breast, which I found to be true for me, but I simply threw on a strapless padded bra and that resolved the issue there. Overall I have to say I really really wanted to love this dress. Aesthetically everything was perfect. The fit, however, was horrendous. I'm usually a 0 but ordered a 2 as a backup size based on the reviews. I probably could have actually ordered a 4 and it would have been a better fit (although I suspect the chest would have been much too roomy). The seam that runs around the top half of the dress made it difficult to zip once I had it on. I didn't think it would zip, actually. Once I got it closed finally I found I was really unable to move at all. You have to have good posture and so I found it difficult to breathe because if I didn't the dress was very unflattering on me in the midsection. The slit in the back didn't provide any additional range of motion for my legs so I couldn't move about easily. I also discovered that I would be unable to put my shoes on once wearing the dress because of my inability to bend in it. Furthermore, there was absolutely no give in the fabric so if I needed to use the restroom I would need to take the dress off completely (which is nearly impossible to do on my own). In the end I decided that I would be unable to wear this to my event due to it being so impractible and uncomfortable. It was a shame because it's a really beautiful dress and was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color & style - very flattering!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, sexy but classy. Definitely snug in the hip area so size up.

I ordered this dress in my normal size 2 and a backup size 4 because other reviewers said it ran extremely small. While I agree it runs a little small, I really don't think it's that drastic. I did end up wearing the size 4 purely for comfort reasons. The 2 fit, but I don't know that I would have been able to sit down in the dress had I actually worn it out. The dress is very tight through the hips, there is no give. I wore it to sing at an event, and it's not really made for moving around or dancing a lot. It was a hit looks wise, but I wouldn't recommend you wear it if you need to dance or move around a lot!

I love LIKELY and have splurged to own two of their dresses. My normal dress size is 8 and I normally wear 10 or 12 in likely but this 12 was too big in the bust but weirdly too small in the cup? There was a weird fold over line where my bra would have been suggesting too much fabric but I felt I was spilling out the sides. I felt if I'd gone down size it might be too tight on my back and stomach. It's a no from me!

I loved the dress! After reading all reviews I ordered size 6 and 8, normally wearing 4/6. Size 6 worked out perfectly! It was right on the bottom but I was able to walk without any problems, though going up the stairs was tricky yet manageable. Hugging curves, this dress will boost your confidence! Technically I wouldn't have to wear spanx with it but decided to do it last minute just in case. Taking it off in the bathroom is not a big deal when you receive so many compliments! My boyfriend loved it! Definitely recommend, would rent it again!
I wear a size 0 normally and it fit perfect! This was my first RTR experience. Can't complain!

links_reviews_title: This dress worked great for the event I rented it for!
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress a lot. However it did have a lot of problems. FIRST: the dress was not the correct color when it arrived though it pictures as such. This dress is more of a purple red than bright red--my boyfriend couldn't wear his RED bowtie because my dress threw it off so much (which was really frustrating). SECOND: the dress is really constricting.. like couldn't walk up the stairs or take normal sized steps. I had to remove the ENTIRE DRESS when I used the restroom because the bottom is just so tight. Not to mention for women with thicker lower bodies your thighs will be stuck together all evening. It was very uncomfortable. THIRD: I received this dress and was shocked at how worn it was. The slit in the back was slightly torn and the clasp at the top was broken. The material was not fresh or new--dress showed a lot of wear from previous renters. Despite all of this, I still liked this dress! It was very flattering and I felt good in it. The bottom of the dress is very tight with little give but the stomach area was not as restricting? I ate an entire meal from start to finish and I didn't feel any tightness around my stomach area. I didn't have to wear a bra because the material was plenty thick and very supportive. ALSO: size up size up size up! If you decide to rent this dress you need to size up! I can typically wear a 2 or a 4. Those are always the two sizes I fluctuate between, however I went with what other women said and got a 4 and a 6 to be safe. I ended up wearing the 6!

links_reviews_title: Looked stunning, yet respectful, for a courthouse wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit: I'm 5 ft nothing, 105 lbs. Pretty athletic, 32A. Could barely breathe in the 0. I was afraid if I did anything other than stand, I would tear it. The 2 was perfect, and I was infinitely grateful that I had been able to order the back-up size for free. Pros: The dress looks exactly like the picture. Form fitting, sleek, hugs even a lack of figure. I got compliments all day on the design of the dress. Cons: Wow, does this run small. The 0 was extremely tight, and unless you are very, very, very slim, I suggest ordering up a size. Reference earlier this paragraph for my measurements and how I could barely breathe, yet alone zip up, the size 0. However, the 2 was perfect! Don't be afraid to order this dress. It runs hella small so just be ready to order up a size, and prepare to feel extremely good in what you're wearing.

I loved the way this dress looked, however it was very snug. Pretty challenging to use the bathroom in. You'll need someone to unzip you each time. I usually wear a size 4, and I'm glad I opted to get the second size 6. Received a lot of compliments!
I normaly wear size 0. As many people shared, this one did run small. I took size 2 and it fit perfectly. I wore this dress to celebrate my husband's birhrday. Very elegant design. LOVE it!
It was a snug fit but I planned to wear this dress to a rehearsal dinner so it was perfect for not eating/drinking too much.
Overall the dress was very nice. The fit and color are unique. The dress was also pretty comfortable. I typically wear a six and the 8 was still tight. I would have worn a 10 if I had the option.

links_reviews_title: Very tight in the butt. Loose up top. I'm 5'4" 118 pounds, 32A chest. Order size up
links_reviews_text: If you are small chested with a little waist and bigger butt this might NOT be your dress. It fit fine but I am normally a size 2 and sometimes zero. They were a size 4. I love the dress but it was just too tight if you want to move around or even easily use the bathroom.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Harry Potter themed engagement party
links_reviews_text: This is my #1 favorite RTR dress that I've rented so far! I rented it for my engagement party and it worked out perfectly. I have no complaints whatsoever- color, fit, length- all great. Not to mention it was very comfortable. I was able to wear a normal strapless bra with no issues. I received compliments all night. I will 100% rent this beauty again!

This dress was beautiful! Luckily I read reviews before renting and ordered the size larger than my usual size of 0-2. I ended up wearing the 4. You had to remove the entire dress in order to use the bathroom which was a pain, but I got nothing but compliments all night!

Beautiful fit! Cons: it was a little complicated to get in the car and had to unzip the dress to use the bathroom, but I didn't mind. The dress is too pretty to care. Pros: Nice winter color and loved the fit. I am even currently 10 weeks pregnant and was able to wear size 2. I tried size 4 but was too big on the hip area. Rent it! You wont regret it.

Goegeous burgundy color and super flattering. I am 5"2' and it hit me right below the knee. There is a slit in the back but hard to walk up stairs or take larger steps. Overall loved the dress and would rent again. Very similar to the feel and fit of the Elizabeth James dresses I've rented before. Cons: I usually wear a 4 and I decided to size up to a 6 and got the 8 as a back up. I could have worn the 6 but it was way too form fitting. I wore the 8 but if i had the 10 i probably would have worn that. Definitely size up...maybe even 2 sizes bigger than you normally wear.

I ended up not wearing this as it was my back up style and i loved my first choice, but i wish i could have kept this for another event. Color was beautiful, it fit very snug (and im very petite). I hope to rent this again.

This was a comfortable Bridesmaids dress for a country wedding. The fabric is thick which made it nice for winter. Doesnt show flaws....however it is super small!!!!! I am normally a 2 (sometimes zero) and the 6 was tight on the bottom. I would have tried an 8 but based on the reviews i only ordered a 4.6. Other than that its comfortable to wear for a long time, easy to get on by yourself and an awesome Dresss.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress. Beautiful and great quality. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This definitely fit small. I typically wear a size 6 and ordered a 12 based on previous comments. I am really glad that I ordered this larger size. It fit almost perfectly and I felt great all night in it.
So flattering and comfortable to wear. I would consider buying this because I loved it that much!!
Nice purple color, was a little to short in the torso for me.

I wore this twice, once to my school's graduation dinner we do every year and once out in Vegas with family. I seriously considered buying it because I loved it that much, but the price point was still a bit too steep for me. I'll be watching for it again. The jumpsuit was super comfortable with a pull-on styling, forgiveness at the waist, and pockets! I wore a strapless bra with it. I loved the tapered legs because I'm short, so often jumpsuits don't hit me right or are way too long. This was perfect. (I'm seriously regretting not splurging on buying it.)
Fits beautifully (I have small torso with bigger hips and butt). Adjustable strap is great and ruffles are cute but not over the top. Got a million compliments on it

I got so many compliments on this outfit. I added a white jacket I already owned since it was a cooler day. The straps could be a little tighter, but I used a pin to help with that issue. Would rent this outfit again!
This jumpsuit fit perfectly. The top stayed closed the whole night, which I'm often concerned with when I wear a wrap-front type outfit. It was easy to move in and I got TONS of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this!!! So flattering for hourglass shape
links_reviews_text: I am a true 10/12 and this 10 fit perfectly even with my huge thighs :) Conservative enough for work but still feminine. I have considered purchasing.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit, but photographs not great
links_reviews_text: The fit is great. Can be dressed down w flats or dressed up w heels. My only con was the way it pictured! Ugh did not like the way I looked in those pics

links_reviews_title: Great for a date or rehearsal dinner guest! Curvy girls with big bottoms & smaller tops--perfection!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a rehearsal dinner & a date. Separate occasions--at both it was a hit! Very flattering and accentuated my curves without being too much. Also comfortable, easy to move in & Spanx are hidden well in it (in case you have a little pooch like me).
Fits true to size. Light material, but not too light that lumps and bumps can be seen through. Pockets make it, of course! Comfortable and flirty. True to size.
I felt like I was wearing my pjs out for the night, but looked put together!

This is my second time renting this jumpsuit and I live it even more this time than the first. It is so comfortable and stylish. It's easy to get in and out of it has pockets! It's a great summertime piece or can easily be worn with a blazer for cooler temps. Definitely my favorite rental ever.
Im 5'3 and usually have to hem tape everything. This was perfect length for flats or heels. I traveled by plane in this and it was super comfy.
Definitely is navy, though, not purple like it looks in the photo. Has pockets. Overall comfy, cute and easy to wear!

I love this feminine style type by Parker! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing a size down for your primary size. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A-C cup, for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this apparel category so you should wear a strapless bra, nubra or no bra since cut of jumpsuit. I love how chic the frills are on the shoulder. Pair with type an open toe heel and bright earrings to complete your outfit!

Love this jumpsuit! There is an elastic waist band, you will need to wear no bra or petals because the v-neck comes down pretty low. I also like that it hit me at my ankles, this way my heels can be seen.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for spring/summer & lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm a sucker for a romper and this one was perfect for the suddenly warm Los Angeles weather! Super comfy, a great color and neckline. Lots of compliments!

Snazzed it up with some silver shoes, but wore a jean jacket over it so it wasn't totally fancy. Love that it has a clasp so you can choose how low you want the front to be for cleavage. The bunching at the shins is also perfect and makes it feel a little more sporty!
Loved loved this jumpsuit! Felt sexy and elegant! Wore it for date night and it looked great! Would rent again!
It was too small so I didn't wear it. Need a 6 but love the look and material!
I'm usually a 10 or 12 since it has an elastic waist I decided to size down to an 8. I should of go down to a 6.
Needs to be pinned shut in the front, but great fit and comfortable
Fit well! Good for short girls.
Loved it so much! If fit very well!
Loved this romper! It fit fabulous and the gathered legs were adorable and made it not too long (a usual problem with jumpers for me.) I got compliments all night!
Such a nice romper I wore it as much as possible when I got this! I didn't want to return it. You can totally dress it up and down.

links_reviews_title: This was the most flattering jumpsuit I have ever worn!
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Would have liked another inch in the torso, but the pants and neckline were very flattering! I loved it so much that I purchased it in black from the brand’s website!

I would have given this jumpsuit a 5, but the clasp kept popping open at my chest. I probably would have purchased the jumpsuit, if it wasn't for the clasp not staying shut. This jumpsuit may suit a smaller chested woman. Either way, I still loved this jumpsuit. The color is a gorgeous purple and it was extremely flattering on. My husband isn't one for compliments and he loved this jumpsuit. You will definitely stand out, look beautiful, and be comfortable in this rental. It can be dressed up or down. I wore with silver flip flops shopping with friends and then at night, i wore a silver sling back sandal. Multiple compliments from strangers. Worth the rental and constant checking to make sure the button is clasped.;)
This is a bit large on me but I will wear it anyway. Pretty color and well made.
It fit big for me kept riding down. Plus it was loose around waist I felt like I could go down to a size 8 instead of a 10. Got many complements too.
This is a great fitting romper. I love it.

links_reviews_title: LOVED it! I'd easily buy this so I could wear it again and again!
links_reviews_text: Loved the casual feel of the jumpsuit with the classy look of a more formal piece. I dressed it up with fun jewelry, got several compliments all night long!
It was true to size and fit like the best running sneakers ever.

links_reviews_title: I only tried it on and it was very nice.
links_reviews_text: I didnt have a chance to wear it as the company sent it as a replacement and I had planned to wear something else.
Made really well, perfect fit and very flattering. Tons of compliments.
I was so bummed that this romper simply did not work for me. The top fit okay but the bottom was way too big around the hips on me and just looked sloppy.
Loved the fit of this jumpsuit but just didn't have anywhere to wear it to! Hope to rent again through my Unlimited. The legs are a more cropped length, so if you're leggy, be advised!
So cute! Rented for an engagement party. It was so comfortable and easy to match with accessories! Highly recommend for a semi-formal or formal event.
This was my favorite rental thus far. So cute for a night out.

A 4R fit me perfect and I have a big butt, small waist, and a small bust (34A) and am 5’3.5. With 3 inch heels it hit the floor just a little, but it looked elegant that way. It’s true, the sequence irritated a bit under the arms but I was able to move the sequence so it was more smooth and less annoying. But for the look it was worth it! I didnt want to take it off
I wore a 12R to accommodate the triple D's It was slightly bigger on the bottom for this reason. Overall it was beautiful and the cameras loved it!

links_reviews_title: I ordered this dress for my prom
links_reviews_text: Absolute show stopper! Received compliments left and right! Dress was amazing, absolutely gorgeous! Sequence under the arm is pretty itchy but definitely bearable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie masquerade
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress! Wore to a 70s themed black tie masquerade. The fit and details were gorgeous
So beautiful. Wore for prom. Went with the 4r. It was slightly big around the waist part . Wore sticky bra and black heels. There was nothing else like it at the event. Comfortable and special!

GET THIS DRESS!!! I can't tell you how many compliments I received wearing this dress. People would stop me and comment on how beautiful and unique the dress was. I wore it to a black tie Mardi Gras themed Gala and it stood out among a sea of black and purple dresses. I originally ordered a 6R (my normal size) and a 4R; unfortunately RTR couldn't fulfill the 6R and sent the 4R. I was pleasantly surprised that it fit. It was a bit tight under the arms and the sequins did rub a little, but nothing I couldn't deal with. I did wear a strapless bra, only because it made the girls look a bit perkier. The length was perfect with 3" heels; I'm 5'4". It was a nice material, not super heavy like most sequin dresses. The cut outs on the side were sexy but still classy. I would suggest ordering either TTS or a size down. Do yourself a favor and rent this dress!! It's beautiful!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! I'm a 34DD and wear a size 4 in pants. It was perfect!

I wore this dress for a sorority formal and I absolutely loved it. I wasn't too sure about this dress at first, but as soon as I put it on, I immediately fell in love. This dress fit me perfectly, and I honestly felt the prettiest Ive ever felt. I got compliments alllll night and it definitely stood out from the rest. I love this dress. Wish I could of kept it!

I would recommend going up a size in this dress. I normally wear a street size 6 and had tried on the 6 which fit fine and I planned to wear but was in a rush getting dressed and accidentally wore the backup size 8. (I only realized this when I went to pack up the dresses for return.) Honestly it was for the best! The weight of the sequins makes the dress still hug your curves but then it was extremely comfortable! I’ve never been comfortable in a fancy dress before and it was great! Also, I wouldn’t recommend squeezing into a dress with cutouts because you don’t want a ‘muffin top’ effect. Go up a size and dance the night away!
Fantastic dress. The top fit a bit tight and occasionally rubbed uncomfortably but overall an awesome. The 2L was perfect (125lbs, 5”6)

First off.. this is definitely one of the most beautiful dresses I've ever worn! 3 days before my event the dress sudden became unavailable in size 0.. which made me really upset. The 2p ended up working, but a 0 definitely would have fit better. Because the fabric is so heavy it still hugged me the right way even though it was a little big. It was the perfect dress for my NYE event. It really stood out and I got compliments on it all night long!

Originally I wanted to get a 6L, but it wasn't returned in time, so I had to attempt my backup 4R. I'm 5'8" 125lbs and definitely would not have needed a long, regular was plenty long. Fit seems tts, but I did manage to squeeze in. This dress feels like a million bucks. It absolutely made my night!

I am 5’1” and 105lb, athletic body, 32D bust for reference. Dress fit perfect! I ordered this for my work Christmas party. If my bust was any larger, it would not fit. Dress was definitely long without heels, but I wore 4” platform heels and it was perfect. Just long enough to walk and not have to hold it as I moved. It was comfortable. Got tons of compliments all night. Definitely a head-turner, and a way to be a bit sexy with the cutouts, but still classy and elegant.

This dress was so fun and festive for a winter wonderland themed holiday party! I was able to dance in the dress; however, the sequins under the arm did irritate my skin. I'd recommend putting on body glide under arms if wearing this dress.

I loved this dress I wore the nubra push-up bra but I could have went braless. It's a thicker fabric so it wouldn't show anything. I'm 5,5 and I wore 4 inch heels. It was the perfect length for that. One of my favorites

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a gala and it was perfect! I had a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit is good. Maybe a little bit on the tighter side on for the top. I was wearing high heels and realize now I should have worn the long size (on the picture I have the regular)

links_reviews_title: Very well-fitting! Not too heavy. The design is prettier in person. Loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: Only con would be if you didn’t enjoy wearing sequins

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress to wear
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small
Fit was true to size, comfortable and will order again

links_reviews_title: By far the most unique dress at my event!
links_reviews_text: From the very first time I came across this dress I knew I wanted to rent it. However, I was hesitant bc some reviews said the sequins scraped under your arms so I waited a little too long and missed out on having a size 6L available. I' 5'7" and the 6R was still a bit short with 1 1/2" heels. Also, the sequins did NOT scrape me at all. Received a ton of compliments all night long.
I was coming off 5 weeks post baby, so this dress was able to distract from my not quite flat stomach yet!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that fit true to size
links_reviews_text: I rented a 4L and 6L. 4L fit perfectly and worked well with 4inch heels. I am 5"7. I received so many compliments on the dress! It was also comfortable for having all those sequins. Great dress!
I felt like $1 million and Received compliments nonstop highly recommend this dress it's comfortable and fits so well
I rented this for a fundraiser gala. It was BEAUTIFUL. I received compliments on it all the time! It's red carpet fabulous!

I'm 5'6," 125 lbs and the 4R fit great. I could've done the 2R but it was a little snug, plus with ~3" heels 2R would've been a little too short. I was worried it was a little too flashy than what I'm used to but it was perfect for our "fire and ice" themed holiday party and people were obsessed. The only con was the dressed rubbed a bit under my arms as others have noted, but nothing crazy and I was having too much fun to notice anyways.
The reverse sparkles made people shook. SO MANY COMPLIMENTS! very comfortable. only got a little hot after dancing all night. 10/10 recommend

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect, it also got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Dress was true to size , right length & perfect fit .

Worn for a black tie wedding. The cut out is cool but it's too necessarily suited for long torsos, which is why I wore the 6 instead the 4. The sequins are fun to play with and shine bright like a diamond. However are rough on under arm skin when moving, etc. 5'6 and the R did not touch the floor with heels. Probably won't rent again but glad I gave it a go.

links_reviews_title: Magical dress for a magical night!
links_reviews_text: Felt like a mermaid coming out to the water in this dress! Loved everything about it. I wish I did get 0R rather than 0P because the 0P was a little short for me since I am 5'4 and wear sky high heels but that's just me being picky. Everything else was fabulous!!

links_reviews_title: I haven’t felt this stunning in a dress in a long time. I really felt like the bell of the ball.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits almost perfectly, it was a little loose in the waist but if I had sized down my bust wouldn’t have fit. My favorite part besides looking AMAZING was the act that I did not need a bra, and I hopped around all night on the dance floor. I also love the dual sided sequins, I flipped them back and forth all night. I got so many compliments from girls and guys alike. You will not regret this rental. My only real drawback was that my fingers were soar the next day, but I’m sure that’s from flipping the sequins/
Loved the fit and how you can customize the pattern on the dress. Very easy to move in. The only negative is that the sequins scratch at your sides a but beauty is pain.
