I rented this dress for an outdoor charity gala. The dress was comfortable and fit well. I am pear shaped and take a 2, 4, or 6 depending on the fit through the thighs and bottom. The 4L fit okay, but it was easier to walk in the 6L! I am 5'9 1/2, though, and the 6L was still too short for heels, so ladies taller than 5'10 might want to consider another dress. I wore very flat sandals, and the length was perfect. The light caught the sequins and made the dress really stand out, especially after the sun had set. I got loads of compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for prom
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous with renting and I had it delivered the day before prom but with all the reviews it was very helpful, and having a second size was nice too just Incase, it was delivered in the AM and the first one I chose to put on fit perfect! Even the length. I will be using this site again, everything was so easy and affordable. I told everyone where I got the dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved how you could flip the sequins over to go from silver to deep navy blue.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable and I loved how you could make your own design with the sequins. It was very shimmery and I received many compliments.
Nothing bad to say

I am in love with this dress. If there was an option to buy it i would. My regular size (6) was not available but the 8 was great, even if a tiny bit big. I felt super comfortable, and had room to enjoy the dinner at the wedding. Everyone went bananas over this dress. It's a showstopper. Only drawbacks were the sequins under the arms are chafe-city come 3 hours in, and the dress was really hot after being on the dance floor. But beauty is pain- and this dress was totally worth it!

I selected this dress for a masquerade party and I loved it. The fit was true to size. I wore the size 12. I sometimes have a hard time with dresses on my wide hips. It didn't fit too snug. My only complaint is that the sequins were very itchy on my arms so I kept feeling like I had to adjust. But I don't regret getting the dress. I felt very fancy and fun!

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments! I woule rent this again, and I would recomend this for a fromal occasion
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly, the only thing that was slightly uncomfortable was under the arms where the sequence from the dress woud scratch your arms.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses I’ve ever worn!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove! Nothing I didn’t like about this dress! Holds everything in nicely and hits at the right places!

links_reviews_title: Should have done this years ago!!!
links_reviews_text: Everything was made easy. BEAUTIFUL and fit perfectly. The dress is fitted but fit true to size. I am 5’3” - 114lbs. With heels on the 0R length was perfect. A little itchy but was such a fun dress. Loved how you could change the sequins to make it either more blue or more shiny. ;)

links_reviews_title: Happy Holidays sexy baroque pattern and gorgeous details at chest line.
links_reviews_text: I would size up if you have lager than DD.
I loved this sparkly dress for NYE! I wore it to dinner. This dress fits true to size and has just the right amount of shimmer for the holidays! I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Looking for a classic 1960's Vegas look
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, fit the criteria for the party, BUT it didn't fit. The material has a little stretch however it never zipped. If you have boobs this dress might not be for you. I wish it had fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! & Even better customer service!
links_reviews_text: This wasn't the first dress I ordered. The 2 sizes didn't fit in the original dress but with 2 days to go before the wedding they overnighted this one and I loved it even more than the first dress! The fit was super comfy, it was breathable, and had a little stretch to it which made dancing all night easy. Very elegant and very wedding appropriate. This dress fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: My dress arrives ahead of time and I had a great experience.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. I wore a strapless bra. Lots of compliments !! I'm a 14 and 200lbs and this dress fit well for my body shape :)

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my thirty-tenth (40th) birthday
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully. Showed off my shape without exposing parts. I felt beautiful and would wear again. Compared to other Theia dresses I have worn, this was a bit more snug for their size 8, but I did not need a bra. Would work for a party, date, or business formal event.

This was my first unlimited order so I definitely should have followed the advice of others and sized up. While the 12 fit, I would have been more comfortable/more able to breathe in a larger size. The quality is top notch; I can see now why there's a big difference between designer prices and lower quality options. Pattern is beautiful. I have big manly swimmer shoulders and this managed to make them look feminine. Would rent again a size up.
Loved this dress! Perfect for our event!

Very tight fit. Not much difference between 6 and 8. Larger suze may have been too big in bust. I wore a strapless bra with the t back without a problem. Not a dress fir fancy accessories. Very pretty and classy
It is thick material but fit perfectly and was dressy enough for church and more. The jewels at waist were elegant, would buy if price went down!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. Flattering. Sexy but classy.
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Goldish color. Comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous and very comfortable! it was perfect for a New Year's Eve wedding .
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and I felt great in this all night long. I would love to wear this dress again!! I wore a strapless bra but you could wear a T strap bra as well.

links_reviews_title: Loved everything about this dress. Simple, elegant and the back is sassy!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size Comfortable The dress is more beautiful in person Elegant Need a strapless bra

This was my first time using rent the runway and I was very pleased!. The dress arrived on time and I loved all the compliments I received . However, the slit was higher than expected maybe because I'm 5'9 with long legs, but when I sat down, I had to strategically place my clutch on the slit area also, the dress is more silver than gold. Besides that, I felt very comfortable!. If you are tall like me or taller and ok with high slits then I recommend this dress. As far as the slit goes, shorter ladies would have no problem!.

So I wasn't sure if this dress was supposed to be form fitting or kinda loose. I tried on the size 2 first but when I took pictures the dress looked baggy on me so I changed to the 0. The dress was really comfortable and its hits all the right curves. Loved this rental.

links_reviews_title: First time using rent the runway and it was hassle free and amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and I got a lot of compliments on it! Rented for a black tie optional wedding and it was perfect. The dress is more silver than gold, and runs true to size. My only complaint was that the zipper was very difficult.
Fits true to size, very flattering. Gorgeous material and color.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress. I did not wear it this time but I will definitely rent it again
links_reviews_text: The dress is made of very high quality fabric. It is very shiny with golden platinum hues. Very dressy.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, very flattering and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: True to size, is more silver colored than gold as it appears in the picture.

links_reviews_title: The dress was great for celebrating my engagement!
links_reviews_text: The slit is a little high when you sit down. The middle belt piece is not as shiny as pictured in most--which really helped for my occasion in dressing it down a bit. It was a little on the tight side. I would size up if getting this dress again.

I loved the dress and the feel of it, but I had problems with the fit of the top of the dress. I wore a strapless bra, however you could still see some of my bra around the sides and the back. Overall I was yet satisfied with my rental experience and I am already looking for my next dress for the Mardi Gras Gala.

links_reviews_title: Great for a New Year's Eve wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was my first rtr experience and I loved it! The dress fit pretty true to size. I went with the 2 because the bust fit better. I thought it was a beautiful dress and I got many compliments on it! A strapless bra worked perfectly! Nude shoes were the way to go since the dress wasn't really silver or gold. I had some trouble with the zipper getting stuck but eventually got the dress on over my head. Overall I loved the dress and would definitely recommend it!

I think I have to acknowledge that I'm no longer a size 4 as the last four rentals I've needed the upsize! Ah well. Anyway the fabric was lush and a bit stretchy, making it very comfortable. For the first time in eons I went without a bra and got away with it! I was not looking forward to using those stick on things. I wore Spanx hose, FYI .

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I wore it to an awards dinner & it was definitely a stand out.
links_reviews_text: True to size. You'll need a halter or strapless bra with this. I has shiny brown shoes that looked perfect with this dress

links_reviews_title: This dress is unique, classy and versatile.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. It is form-fitting and not forgiving. You just have to go for it. Works with a strapless bra no problem. I was very comfortable in it sitting, walking and dancing. The material is a gorgeous metallic color and the beading at the waist is not flashy at all.

links_reviews_title: Great service, perfect dress, easy process.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a cocktail party and loved it, even though it was one size too small. The size 8 wasn't available! This would have been perfect in an 8, and I wear a 10. So be sure to size down one size. The color is awesome, it's very glam, and I can't wait to try another dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous! A little long, but if you're petite helps off set the proportions.
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress out at the store after the one I ordered didn't fit. If you are looking to show off your arms and back, but slim your mid-section this your dress. The fabric is very luxurious and I received tons of complements. It's perfect for an upscale cocktail or black tie optional wedding.

My original RTR dress did not work out. Customer service was excellent and my stylist Bobby, suggested this dress. This dress was perfect - I received compliments all night. The fit was great and the dress looked amazing. Love RTR.
I loved this dress, but it was a bit snug on me, so I didn't end up wearing it. I hope I can find another event where I can wear this and order up a size 4!
Everywhere but the chest fit great. It's a dress for the very small chested. I don't have much, but smooshed in this dress and another from sand brand.

links_reviews_title: Requires some one with a long distance between the bust and shoulders. The shoulders were too long.
links_reviews_text: I also had a large gap at the sides of the bust despite being a 36G. The fit just wasn't right for me.

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning. You must see it and try it on.... Beautiful in person.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. You can wear a bra with a t back. Stunning color and style. Size 0 , 105 pounds 5'3. Perfect fit
Didn't wear this. The top was too big - arm holes gaped, neck came down farther than in photo. Also fit me tighter than the photo, which made it feel like it would ride up. Nice looking dress.
Great material but dress runs small which makes the front slip look awful.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a try on before the big day.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, love the look for second wedding.
Wore this to a work gala. Dress fit well. A little loose on my waist. Lots of compliments all night.

I wore this dress to my Office Holiday Party and it was stunning. This dress is true to size and hugs every curve. It made me feel glamorous and I got compliments all night long. I did not want to return it. The styling is classic hollywood glamour. I can't wait to rent this one again.
The dress is gorgeous! However, I was unable to wear it because the shoulder/armpit area seems a little baggy for me. Everything else fit well.

I wore this for my daughter's wedding. It was the perfect neutral color, with enough glitz to be special but still MOB appropriate. The back of the dress is lovely, I thought the slit in front was a little high but since I was hardly ever sitting it worked out okay. The only issue I had was the strapless bra I have was a little too high to be concealed under the arms and in the back. If you plan to wear a bra make sure it's very low profile. My stats: 5'6", 130 lbs, 32DDD and the size 6 fit beautifully. The size 8 was actually too big on top.

links_reviews_title: Perfect holiday cocktail dress, compliments all night long
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! Even better in person. It fits like a glove and the color was perfect for the holidays - in some lights the color is platinum, at other times it looked gold which makes matching accessories very versatile. I wish I could've kept this dress.
It was comfortable and very pretty. Lovely color and loved the neck design. I received a lot of complements and the baby bump looked great!

This dress fit perfectly for me at 35-37 weeks pregnant. Would have kept it for longer but I wore it so much at higher profile work functions that it would have started to repeat audiences. Neckline is very slimming. I found I had to wear my hair up to highlight the dress and the buttons on back. Always had to wear a strapless bra. Love love love this dress.

I wore this dress when I was 37 weeks pregnant, so it definitely has enough room to accommodate a third trimester bump. I am 5'2" and this dress was a little bit longer than I would have liked. My pre-pregnancy size is a 4 and I wore a 4 in this dress. I would recommend renting your pre-pregnancy size for this if you are toward the end of your pregnancy.

I like this loose preppy dress by Sail by Sable! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up size. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and the hips. It works great for all cups size.

links_reviews_title: It was amazing. I felt like Audrey Hepburn.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great - I'm 32 weeks and not feeling like my old 128lb self, but this made me feel like a princess. It hugged in all the right places and people commented that they couldn't even tell I was pregnant.
This was a flattering and comfortable dress for my 27 week belly. The cut is a loose A-line, that is not form fitting.

I really wanted to wear this to a formal affair at 8 months pregnant. After renting size 8, 10 and 12 none of them worked. The size 10 fit better than the size 12. The size 10 was only slightly tight in my bust. The size 12 was too tight everywhere. Definitely get a back up or two for this dress.
Love love loved this dress!

I rented this dress for my Goddaughter's baptism and loved it. The neckline was very formal and it accommodated my 37.5 week baby bump quite well. I would size up though, as the buttons could potentially get "bunchy" on the back if the dress is the slightest bit tight. Would definitely rent again!

I loved the color and design but it wasn't the most flattering maternity dress. The collar made it seem like I had no neck and the buttons could fully open all the way down the back. Otherwise pretty color!

links_reviews_title: Wonderful maternity dress for all trimesters!
links_reviews_text: Got many compliments on this dress, perfect for a wedding or nice date night out. Not form fitting but doesn't feel like you are wearing a bag either. Would be a nice dress to conceal a little bump if you wanted to. Buttons down the back were a really nice touch.

I wore this for work/evening event. The deep red color, neckline, and buttons down the back make it feel like a classic vintage dress. The fabric leans more toward formal than everyday. The lack of waistline helped minimize my 6-month bump, and I felt super cute! Would definitely rent again, especially toward the end of/post-pregnancy.

I got so many compliments in this dress, people loved the detail in the back! I wore this at 32 weeks (with my 3rd child so I have a big bump) to a cocktail charity event, I could comfortably wear my maternity support shorts underneath without any of it showing, I wore flats because I was on my feet the whole night and felt awesome in this dress! I highly recommend this dress for a comfortable flattering fit. I sized up to an 8 thinking I would need it but I did not, stick to your normal size!
Wore this to a wedding rehearsal dinner and got tons of compliments. The buttons on the back truly make the dress. And plus! It's super comfy!

I honestly loved this dress - by far one of my favorite maternity rentals. I wore my pre-pregnancy size at 8 months pregnant and it was only a little snug in the chest area (I'm around a 36C at this point). Probably would have looked better with heels, but my swollen ankles were not having that. Length was work appropriate with flats.

links_reviews_title: Work to Date in One Easy Step
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work with a blazer then took it off for my husbands birthday dinner. So cute! I felt great for the first time in weeks.

links_reviews_title: Good option for maternity, not right for my event
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a backup. It fit fine (I'm 35 weeks pregnant and have gained about 20 lbs) but was the wrong color for a spring wedding and I liked the other dress more. I was able to rent the size that I wear when not pregnant and since it is maternity-specific the hem didn't ride up.
Very flattering and comfortable, while still being stylish and professional. Great for being pregnant at work in the summer.

Liked the dress, although at 23 weeks (144 lbs) I could have worn a smaller size. I ended up wearing a different dress, but only because I didn't have a strapless bra in my maternity cup size. Color and material were really nice, and the buttons were a fun touch.
Very loose fitting. In my 25th week, so it was very comfortable. Fabric draped nicely and it's a pretty dark red color. Could go from day to night.
I little big in the arm pits, but very comfy.
I generally am a fan of loose-fitted, shift dresses but this dress was too "tent-like" for me. Did not end up wearing.

I love this trendy dress by Sail to Sable! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going down for your back-up. This style is loose throughout the midsection and at the hips making it super comfortable. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a strapless bra since the cut of the dress will expose your bra straps. At 4’8”, the length hit knee length on me. The super soft material and comfortable while the neckline and buttons add a touch of sophistication creating an effortlessly chic look. Pair with nude pumps and the Margaux Medium Satchel by Kate Spade to complete your

I rented this for a company party at 29 weeks pregnant, and I just couldn't bring myself to wear it. It fit just fine, but I felt like it made me look MUCH bigger than I already am - which is pretty big! I opted for something tighter so that I didn't feel so huge.

links_reviews_title: I loved it in person, couldn't stand it in photos
links_reviews_text: The dress fit nicely -- wore my normal pre-pregnancy size for my baby shower at 35 weeks. The color is really pretty. However, the cut of the dress photographed horribly. In pictures it looked like a tent! Didn't feel that way in person, but I wasn't super happy with how it looked in the pictures.
This dress is so comfortable, elegant, and chic! I absolutely loved it and would rent it again and again!
The dress flows over a baby bump very nicely. It was comfortable and stylish. I would recommend this to any 3rd trimester working mom.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, runs big, so I would size down.
links_reviews_text: I like the cut of this dress, I ordered the 4, but didn't wear it because it looked too big. Pre-baby I wore either a 2 or 4 in dresses, usually more of a 4. I'm at 22 weeks and have gained 16 pounds, so I'm at 148 now. I'm 5'6"... I really haven't worn a size 2 in many many months in ANYTHING! This dress hadn't been reviewed so I wanted to give you guys a sense of what to expect.

Loved this dress. The 8 was tight around my chest so I sized up to the 10. The color was so delicate and beautiful, as were the lace details. The dress was still comfy enough to dance all night in. It is a little on the heavy side but falls beautifully. I might have liked it if it was a bit shorter and hit closer to or above the knee but was still happy with this rental. Though the back details aren't pictured they're very cute and add a fun element to this dress.

Rented this for my rehearsal dinner and loved it. The color, cut, and style are all fun and flirty without being too much for a formal event. Love the back. I usually wear a 4, but I'm glad I went with the 2 in this case. The waist was a smidge tight for me in the 2, but I think if I'd gone with the 4 the bust would have been too roomy. For a few hours going a size down was the right move in terms of getting the fit I wanted.

links_reviews_title: My most complimented dress I've worn!
links_reviews_text: I got the 14 and 16 dress, turns out he 16 fit better. Comfortable and pretty much a perfect fit. I went to an outdoor wedding so the cutout definitely helped!! I think the only down side was that the dress caught on my bracelet a lot and you definitely need help zipping up! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, I wore this to a wedding and got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Only a 4 was available and I usually wear a 6. It was a bit tight, so true-to-size would probably have been perfect. I'm a tall girl and the length was appropriate which is always a nice surprise! The lace was a bit itchy on the back but that was probably because it was a little small.

Overall, great dress. Rented for a wedding. Like others have said, the top runs a little larger, while the waistband is quite tight. I felt more comfortable in the 4, but my chest simply couldn't fill it out. I chose to wear the 2 and have the waist just a tad tighter than what I'd consider comfortable. Would be absolutely perfect for someone with a tiny waist and larger chest.

Overall, I thought the dress was very cute. I liked the color, the lacy flowers, the length was good, and I thought the front of the dress was flattering. What I didn't like was the back of the dress. The open back design on the back is not made for gals with short torsos or girls with a bit of extra cushion on their back....both of which I have. (I'm 5'3" and 185lbs.) I just felt like the back was not flattering at all and that it didn't fit correctly on me. It made me uncomfortable and self-conscious for part of the night. Otherwise though, I thought it was cute and appropriate for the occasion. I just wish it didn't have that darn open back!
Got so many (and repeated) compliments on this dress! Loved the pockets and lace details. Some wear, but nothing noticeable. The skirt is full and has several layers, so a little warm.
Really cute dress! Love the material. The only trouble was the open back. It was just a bit too snug, so it cut me off kind of funky. I ended up wearing a cover up so you couldn't see the open back.

This dress was great for a Labor Day wedding! Very comfortable, no need for bra, easy to get in and out! Wish it was a little tighter underneath the bust but overall for very well.. true to size. Looks great with silver accessories!

links_reviews_title: Loved it from the front! But from behind... back fat.
links_reviews_text: If you are like me and insecure about back fat, this is not the dress for you. The dress is beautiful and delicate from the front. The back is fun and the reason I got the dress. What I forgot to consider was my back-fat. If you are happy with your back and or don't mind then get this dress. I am 5'5, 170 lbs, 36B, wide hips, a true pear shape. I ordered a 10, and 12. The dress is true to size, I wore the 10. The dress is super cute. This was more my hang up than anything else.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color and shape of the dress. I got lots of compliments on the cut-out in back too!
links_reviews_text: The color was lovely, and the shape was very flattering. I had a lot of people who came back to find me during the wedding to tell me they loved the cut-out detail in the back. It was so much fun to dance in, and pockets are always an added bonus. Only issue I had was that I found that the waistline fit tight along my rib cage. I was surprised that it was that tight since I usually wear a 4 or 6, and the 6 was the size I chose to wear for the wedding (mostly because of that issue). I'm sure that tightness helps for not having to wear a bra with the dress (a bra was absolutely not necessary, but I'm also small-chested), but the fit was great otherwise, so I was surprised at that issue. Either way, I would definitely rent it again.

Great for a daytime wedding. The dress is such a beautiful pale green with same color lace and lining. Just above knee length on 5'5". Nice open back detail that is not too revealing and still appropriate for a church wedding and daytime reception. Dress has pockets!
The dress was a success for the rehearsal dinner. The lacy was a little itchy, but the dress was fun!
Lots of compliments all night. The lower half of the dress is very full, so if you're already big on the bottom you might want to find a different dress.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED it. I got lots of compliments & it was nice wearing something so bright for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I am glad I got both the 12&14, I ended up in the 14 because it was just more comfortable. The 12 was a little snug for arm movement. The dress did have an alteration of a new clasp, but it didn't make a big difference in the back. It's is poofy, but I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for the shower I threw for my cousin's "60's inspired bridal shower"
links_reviews_text: Reviews said the waist was small (and I have a small waist) so I ordered a 4 and a 6 (my two usual dress sizes). I have a small waist and the 6 fit well, but was pretty snug. Unless you have a superrrrr small waist, I would suggest ordering the size up and have your back-up size be two sizes up. I'm a 34C/D and can rarely go braless, but I went braless with this dress and it was perfect! I had some cleavage, but the flowered overlay covered it nicely :) I also rented the earrings from RTR and they matched perfectly!!!

I received SO many compliments at my rehearsal dinner. This dress is beautiful, though I received it with a broken clasp. The skirt is very full, but the waist is fitted with no stretch. No bra is needed, as there is boning in the top and padded cups.
It is a gorgeous dress, but it is very very full from the waist down which made me look fat! On positive side it has pockets which I loved.

links_reviews_title: High School Formal. I had a lot of fun with my friends.
links_reviews_text: I am shorter so this dress was great length. I also liked the pockets.
The color and cut were very flattering. It has pockets!! Super comfortable
I wore this for my sisters wedding. I was worried I needed a bra but did not. I received compliments all night long

As soon as you pick up the dress you can feel the quality. Good lace, lots of layers giving it an extra poof, and an appropriate length for us tall girls. I wore it to the Travers S. In Saratoga and felt like the belle of the ball.

Wore this to a summer wedding. It was perfect for both the church and reception. The lace is beautiful and the color is somewhere between robin's egg and Tiffany blue. The waist is tight, but flattered my hourglass figure perfectly. The lining is boned to provide stability and no bra was needed. The dress did get hot while dancing, but I was able to move well. Got many compliments throughout the night. Just a classy dress!

The original dress I picked was damaged so this was my second option. At first I was nervous because I wasn't sure how it would look/fit but I actually really liked this dress! The skirt is full, but not so much that it is overwhelming. I loved the open back detail. The waist was a little tight on me, but it wasn't so tight that I felt uncomfortable. I carry more weight in my hips/legs so if you carry more weight in you stomach area I would size up for comfort. No need to wear a bra because there are built in cups. Really liked this and would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable beautiful and I love pockets
links_reviews_text: Absolutely wonderful waist is fitted, fabric will catch on everything, but it was great.

links_reviews_title: Fiance's Sister's wedding at their family winery in Napa.
links_reviews_text: Pros: pretty and sweet, did not have to wear a bra, was the right color for the wedding, good quality fabric and well made Cons: not flattering felt a little promy
Loved wearing this dress, it looked great and was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my Alice Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress because it's lace blue flowers fit with Alice tea party bridal shower. The dress was gorgeous and even with 34DD I was able to go bra-less to show off the beautiful back. Everyone commented on how beautiful it was. Definitely has some poof and width in the hips so if you're self conscious about your circumference you might want to pass. Deep pockets were a wonderful touch and I was able to stash my phone and a gloss with no added bulk. Absolutely love this beautiful dress!

Fit true to size, very beautiful color, the open back detail was absolutely perfect! The skirt was very full, the layer of tulle added more fullness than expected, but it was still beautiful. Overall I was very pleased with this rental and would consider it again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was worn to a formal racing event. It was perfection.
links_reviews_text: The skirt is full and it has pockets. The material is very high quality and not one bit flimsy. The dress came on time and in perfect condition- it did not look worn at all. I am a 34D chest and I would recommend that bustier girls size up as a backup just in case. I think it runs true to size but definitely not small so for the backup- go a size up.

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress but expect POUF.
links_reviews_text: Fit was slim but not an issue. The dress is tight around the upper waist and then has a huge pouf. I tried straightening out each layer of tulle and it helped but still, the pouf made me appear much wider than I prefer, especially since I already have hips. I wore this to a Christening and had no issue with the bare back, I loved the back of the dress. I did receive a lot of compliments that day of but I think it was prettier in person than in photos. The color is great in person and you can see the detail of the lace but in photos it's a bit washed out. All in all, I probably would not rent this dress again but it was fun for the day.

I wore this to a Mother's Day brunch. RTR sent me this dress when my order wasn't going to be here in time due to a shipping delay. I ended up wearing it and loving it. It has pockets and it comfortable! The size 2 fit, but the size 4 was more comfortable for a long car ride

links_reviews_title: The most compliments I've ever received on a dress!
links_reviews_text: I go to weddings almost every other weekend so I wanted to finally try RTR so I didn't need to buy another dress that I probably wouldn't wear again - and boy am I glad I did! This dress was amazing!! I was a big nervous when I first got it, because it was heavier and more puffy then I was expecting, but in the end it just made the dress that much more fun. The color was beautiful, the dress was super comfortable, and I seriously received more compliments (both on social media and in person) than I've ever received on a dress. I felt super pretty - which every girl should always feel. The dress is very true to size and looks very much like the many pictures posted. 5 stars, 2 thumbs up and highly recommended from me!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so elegant and I loved wearing it!
links_reviews_text: Based on the reviews, I ordered a 4 and 6 because of the bust area. I ended up wearing the 4. The dress fit so nice and I received tons of compliments. I am a 32DDD and I didn't need to wear a bra with this dress which is good because of the cutout on back. Although it fit well, I did have to adjust on bathroom breaks because the cups on the inside are small.

links_reviews_title: Cute with a fun surprise in the back.
links_reviews_text: This dress has it all! Perfectly fitted with a built in bra since the back is open. And POCKETS. I loved it. My husband loved it even more. Sorry about the bad picture of me. I hadn't done my hair or makeup but the dress was to cute not to take a quick picture.

I LOVE THIS DRESS!! This dress came to me as a backup when the second size of the dress I originally chose was unavailable. I didn't end up wearing it because it wasn't right for the night wedding I was going to, but it was so cute and comfortable! LOVE the full skirt, and the interesting open back detail. Will DEFINITELY rent this again!

A little tight in the waist for me (but I've got a pretty straight waist). A classic look, surprisingly comfortable, and bearable in southern July humidity ( A HUGE PLUS ). I received endless compliments and the color is a beautiful Tiffany blue. I would definitely rent again.

I wore this as a bridesmaid in a wedding. I loved it. It was flattering and a fun. It runs a little big, possibly because of the back of the dress being open. I did not wear a bra and felt like I had enough support.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress, especially the back! More poofy than expected but still loved it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Cons - zipper , the lace kept getting stuck on things

For a short girl like me, it was a little bit longer than I'm used to, but otherwise this dress was really well-made and comfortable. I loved that it had pockets but be aware that you can't wear a regular bra because it is essentially backless. I got a MASSIVE amount of compliments on this dress.
Comfortable and great fit.

Haven't worn a Badgley Mischka dress I didn't love. And never have to wear a bra which is a huge plus, especially with a large chest. Highly recommend! I've also worn the floor length version and I love it all.
This dress is beautiful. The color pops and the cutouts are very flattering.
Gorgeous stunning cobalt blue dress. Lightweight, great fitting dress. Perfect for the summer! Would highly recommend!

I wore this to a friend's wedding and received so many compliments. The color is a true bright blue, and the cut outs on the side make it unique. The dress is fully lined, and the fit is very flattering. I would consider the fit true to size. I'm 5'7" 115#, and the length hit me right about the knees. I would highly recommend this dress and will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and cut outs sexy yet sophisticated
links_reviews_text: I went out of my comfort zone with the cut outs on this dress, but as other reviewers noted shape and placement of the cutouts are really flattering. The dress was the perfect blend of sophisticated and sexy and the color is lovely!
I wore this dress for a wedding and had doubts that I could squeeze myself into it, but we made it happen! It was very comfortable and the cut outs added a little sexy touch :)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color that's classy and a tad sexy
links_reviews_text: I love the cut outs on this dress because they hit me on the skinniest part and are super flattering! Many compliments and I stood out in the sea of LBDs! Fit true to size and super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfect. Was simple yet stylish. So flattering on!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. I rented size 2 (my typical size) and 0 as a backup based on other reviews. However the 0 felt too tight so I went withy the size 2. It fit so comfortable and was easy to dance in. The dress was simple yet stylish. So flattering on! Loved the knee length and the cutouts.
The 8 hugged my curves just right. Perfect for a friend's bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: Simple but pretty dress in an awesome royal blue
links_reviews_text: Overall very flattering dress that hit right on top of my knees (I am pretty short 5'4) and fit true to size. The cut outs were in a flattering spot right below the ribs. Not a ton of give in the material but had enough space to be able to comfortably sit. The only tiny thing I didn't love was the scrunched material under the cutouts that made the dress pop out a little on the sides.

links_reviews_title: Great color! Comfortable and flattering. Hem hit at the best spot-just below my knees.
links_reviews_text: The 2 was perfect in the waist but my back muscles were just too much for it so I had to go with the 4. I felt cute with a bit of sexy. The cutouts help break it up and give you a waist.

Awesome dress. Fabric had a tiny bit of stretch and hugged all the right places. Great length as well just above knee on me. Fabric thick enough to not have to wear a bra. Hubs kept saying how great I looked. This brand is quality! Would rent again !!

links_reviews_title: Loved the cut of this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for a summer wedding. The skirt was fitted and didn't allow for wild dancing, but I loved the curve-hugging cut and the cut outs on the side were a nice addition. I didn't wear a bra with this dress, but you could wear a strapless bra.

The color is beautiful. Fabric is kind of stretchy and very comfortable. I have very large hips but a small waist/bust - my normal dress size (8) was a little too tight on my hips. If you're a pear shape too, I recommend going a size up. The cut outs are sassy, but don't show too much skin.

I wore this to a summer wedding and felt so glamorous all night. The best part was that I felt sexy with the cut outs but covered enough to be comfortable dancing all night. I wore the larger size because it was a little roomier in the tummy area but either size would have been fine.

A great dress - i went with 14 over the sz 12 just for a little more wiggle room. Didnt need to wear spanx and i wore normal strapless bra. I am 6 foot tall and it hit perfectly on my body. So pleased with this rental!
Perfect dress for the wedding I attended. I wore a size 10 and it fit perfect. Normally I am between a 8-10. I didn't need to wear a bra and I'm a size 38C.

This dress received so many compliments. I felt very comfortable in it. I did have to get some double sided tape to keep the cutouts in place so they weren't showing more than I wanted. If I went a size down I think they would have stayed in place on their own. Loved the color and would definitely suggest renting!

links_reviews_title: Great color and fun cut outs - not too risqué
links_reviews_text: It fits as it should and is flattering, I'd say. Works for a tall frame.
Love the subtle cutouts, thick fabric, and how it fit! Would definitely rent again, lots of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Dress was a stunner! Will rent again
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic frame and my normal dress size is a 2. Dress fit as expected, arrived on time, and in perfect condition. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: 30, flirty and thriving in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Stunning fit, great stretch and beautiful color.

I loved this dress! The length balances the cutouts, which are well-placed to both avoid any spillage and wear a normal strapless bra. The color is bright and beautiful, and the dress is super comfortable to dance in all night.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and unique without being too showy.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so fun for someone wanting to show off without feeling self conscious. I got so many compliments. The fabric is thicker so it hides imperfections and is quite flattering to your shape. I was worried my stomach would roll through the cutouts when I sat but it was all good. The ONLY bad thing is that I am large cheated and often times the bottom of my bra would show through the cutout because they land right there at the same spot. You may be able to keep it from showing with fabric tape.
I'm usually a 2-4 and wore the 4. Fun dress for a birthday dinner date with my husband!

links_reviews_title: Don't Let the Cutouts Scare You Away from This Dress!!
links_reviews_text: When I rented this I figured it would only be appropriate for a date or party, but I was pleasantly surprised to find the cutouts are not at all significant and lay in a very modest place. They add interest to the dress without being revealing. I would even wear this to work. As with every Badgley Miscka dress I've tried to date, the fit is superb, classy, sexy and super comfortable. Don't be on the fence with this one, it's a keeper!
This dress is super comfortable. The material does have a tiny bit of stretch to it. The blue is so bold. I loved it!

The fit is AMAZING. Since it was a work related event I was concerned about the cut-outs, but they were a nice extra detail. I have broad shoulders and a long torso, so the high neck and more Racerback cut were perfect. Didn't wear a bra but everything was held in place. Lots of compliments. Wish I could have kept it.

I'm about 110 lbs, 5'5. I rented the 0 and 2. Both were roomy in the bust, but that is normal for me because I'm pretty small up top. The 0 actually fit better but the seam along the left breast area laid weird so I went with the 2. I've worn 2's from RTR in the past and this brand just seemed to run a little bigger. Even with a padded strapless bra with a Nu Bra insert, it was roomy. The dress itself is cute and has a beautiful blue cobalt color. Overall it was a good rental, but wasn't my favorite RTR mostly because I couldn't fill out the bust. The cutouts are very tasteful and still felt like a classy dress.
True to size. Solid fabric. Make sure you help zipping dress up as it is heavy duty. No bra needed for the girls! Easy to travel with and easy to dance in!

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Super comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: Great fit, beautiful color, I got many compliments even days later. I would size up if you have a larger chest. I'm a typical 8 or 6 and the 6 was fine but was a little tight in the top so I ended up wearing the 8. Super comfortable dress, I felt great dancing the night away! This was my first RTR and I would totally rent this dress again!
I really like this style of Badgley dress - there are also ones without cutouts in red and navy which I've rented before. Great, flattering cut. Will rent again

I absolutely LOVE this dress and wish I could buy it! The 10 fit like a glove and it was super flattering for my body type. I received sooo many compliments from both men and women. It made me feel so sexy and classy!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and easy to dance in. Simple elegance.
links_reviews_text: comfortable and easy to wear with strapless bra
I wore this dress to a wedding an received compliments on both the color and style. The side cutouts make the dress unique without showing too much skin. Would definitely recommend!

I am a true size 4 and rented both a 2 and 4. The 4 fit perfectly - it was snug in all the right places yet still very breathable and comfy which was perfect for a long night of dancing. The color of this dress is gorgeous but very intense so only rent this if you're comfortable with a lot of attention. I received compliments all night. Would definitely rent again!
Super comfortable and super flattering. I wore spanx that hit right below the cut outs but the material was thick enough to cover most imperfections.

I loved this dress. It was very comfortable even though it was fitted and I loved the edginess of the cut outs on your waist. The length was also great since I'm tall and I hate shorter dresses (the butt always makes it ride up more). The color was great as well, always fun to wear something other than black. I was able to wear a strapless bra with this, however my bra had a little extra material on the bottom so I made sure to yank it up a couple times just to be sure it didn't peek through the cut-out. I got a lot of complements as well! So I now ordered the coral color of the same dress for another upcoming wedding.
The cutouts made this dress feel sexy for being a classy dress. The form fit showed off my body and the cut outs were in a flattering spot. Comfortable easy dress for dancing and partying.
I wore this dress twice on vacation. It was comfortable and just the right length for me. I got lots of compliments
Fit very well, super flattering. The material is THICK so careful if you'll be outdoors in the heat!

links_reviews_title: A fun, form-fitting dress that I wore to the iHeartRadio Music Festival in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: With a busy pattern, this dress fit right into the concert atmosphere, and while it was form-fitting it wasn't inappropriate. The back dips down a bit in the back so I wore a strapless bra I had to push down. If I wasn't at a work event, I could have gone braless. Super comfy dress that didn't wrinkle because of the material.

links_reviews_title: Such a cool dress and look.
links_reviews_text: SOOOO comfortable, and even though it is quite fitted, I think it hid my little pooch on my abdomen quite well. It does bunch up above the rear which is why I included 3 pictures in my review, so you can truly see where the fabric hitches up. I never had any problem with it riding up, and I wore it for a long night. The back harness is a bit strange which is mentioned in several other reviews. The length is nice, but what I really enjoyed was how it made me feel and the fabric is thick, so no need for a bra either.

I loved this dress and it definitely fits true to size!! It has a very stretchy material to fit all body types and the high neck is good for bustier women who want to cover up a little. The dress was very movable and I received tons of compliments. Would definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: I loved the feel and look of this dress! One of the best I've rented!
links_reviews_text: I'm on the smaller side of a 6 and the dress in size 6 fit well. The material is super soft and the dress has a flattering cut (especially the slightly lower cut in the back). I LOVED the colors and felt so comfortable in this dress! It rode up a tiny bit, but much less than other dresses at this length and style typically do on me. LOVED it and do highly recommend!

This was a cute dress. To me it definitly screams more of a summer feel, however it is made very well and fits perfectly and true to size. The back strap is a fun little detail that i felt was cute. It was figure flatering and the material had just enough give or stretch to make fitting comfortable but still structured. My only mistake was renting this in January as i feel it looks like a summer dress.

I LOVED this dress so much I would even purchase it. It fits true to size and very form flattering. I'm always nervous about having enough chest room but this dress was a perfect fit. I would definitely recommend it for a bustier woman. The pattern was interesting and very pretty for a summer wedding. I loved everything about it, I'd definitely recommend it and rent it again.

I loved this dress, especially the pattern and the length. I am only 5'2" so many dresses are longer on me than they are meant to be, but this one was a great length -- not to long, but not too short. The only criticism I had was that since I like my dresses to be more snug, the back v-cut puckered a little bit. The back clasp was also a little cheap looking -- it was different on the size 2 and the size 4, so I imagine that it needed to be replaced on one of the dresses.
Absolutely fabulous
Nice dress, thick material. I thought I would like it but I did not like the strap in the back thing. It kept coming apart. But otherwise very beautiful. Wore it to a photo shoot, and rocked!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding, loved it!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well and looked great! The material was supportive enough that I was able to forgo a bra, which is typically a concern for me. My only complaint was that shortly after I put the dress on I noticed a small tear in one of the seams. Totally unnoticeable so I was still able to wear the dress, but it did make me a little more self conscious. Overall though I loved it and would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Runs small but loved the print
links_reviews_text: Loved this print so much but the dress is super tight and runs small so it wasn't comfortable to wear all night. I would size up for regular size and then another size up for backup size. I'm a true size 6 and wish I would've rented an 8 and a 10. I know this dress is meant to be form fitting/bodycon/tight but many normal size 6 did not work for me. Still a very fun dress and the pattern pops even more in person than in photos!
Overall, this dress was great. Fits true to size mostly... I am between a 0-2 and the 0 fit well. Fabric is thick, comfortable and wrinkle-free.

Beautiful dress. The back is really cute and unique. The scuba material makes it easy to dance but it definitely hugs curves and lumps so be warned. I wish I would have worn some smoothing stuff under so I didn't feel like I needed to suck in.
This dress was great for a party I attended, it was a little tighter than I expected so I was glad I sized up from a 4 to a 6, but other than that I loved it and received many compliments!
The material is stretchy and really easy to wear. The length and overall fit was perfect. I received so many compliments on the color and shape of the dress :-)

Great dress super comfy material. Wasn't like any other dresses there. Back is sexy, perfect length not too short. I did feel that the pattern highlighted my tummy area (slight baby pooch from 2 kids) because of the light color next to the black. Wasn't my favorite dress I ever rented but was nice.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: Not only was this comfortable, but the combination of colors in this dress made styling it more fun! So many options! Ended up wearing black sheer tights, light brown booties, the black jacket and carried an orange handbag. I would ABSOLUTELY recommend this dress.
Loved wearing this dress. The material was thick and forgiving, while still being form fitting. I'm busty and it held me in well. Got lots of compliments all night.
Stretchy thick fabric makes this dress easy to wear and really flattering. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Classy and fun - a great party dress!
links_reviews_text: SO many compliments, very unique dress with a sexy V back, the material is thick and feels very secure! Definitely stood out in a crowd of black dresses - wish I had another place to wear it!
Best fitting fun dress! Love the back clasp

links_reviews_title: Hugged in all the right places. Sexy but classy
links_reviews_text: Fit great Didn't even wear a bra, just pasties because of the cut out in the back.
Fun and flirty! Thick scuba material helps to show a sleek silhouette. Great pattern!

This dress fit great. I'm pregnant and was worried about my bump but it stretched over it nicely. The back is low so you can't wear a normal bra but the material is thick enough i didn't need one. I got compliments all night. It fit normal on me for length, but a taller person this may wear a little short.
Wore this out. Super fun and flattering. Fits like a glove and for lots of attention. Really like the pattern. The only downside is the material is thick and can be kind of hot.

I would say this dress is true to size. I originally ordered a size 0 and 2 for a back up. But due to some issues with the previous renter of the size 0 I received the size 2 and and alternate dress. The size 2 was a bit baggy on me, which was expected but I still wore it over the alternate dress because it was the dress I truly wanted to wear. This dress was beautiful and very well made. I would defiantly wear this dress again just in my true size! #birthday

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress! So comfy and sexy same time
links_reviews_text: Love the fabric and the way this dress hugged the body. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because the straps in the back kept opening.. Wouldn't stay put. Other than that totally recommend. Had many compliments and felt great in it.

I usually wear a 10 and could have fit in it but was going out dancing for a bachelorette and wanted more room. I added spans underneath as it was a little snug in the middle. I was a little self conscious about it through the night. The other thing I didn't like about it was that the lining kept coming out by the arms and neckline. A pretty dress by a little unforgiving in the middle section. Wanted to try something different, and it would probably be a great fit for someone without a little extra around the middle.

I love this dress. It is stretchy and comfortable and definitely unique. I loved that I didn't look like every other guest at the wedding! I had no issues with the back clasp coming undone, and since the material is so thick and I'm not very busty, I was able to go without a bra and was totally comfortable! I never rent the same dress again but I'm seriously considering this one for another wedding! I loved it so much!

I wish I had a better photo to do this dress justice. The neoprene is so comfortable and surprisingly flattering. I wore his out celebrating in Las Vegas in May. My only complaint was the lining. The clover canyon dress my friend is wearing didn't have it and we both agreed that was better. It was a bit of a nuisance. Otherwise, amazing dress. One of the few I would consider owning because it's so versatile and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!!! Would definitely rent it again!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Easy to rent, fast, and extremely comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!!! Fit perfectly and was great for dancing!

links_reviews_title: Interesting dress for when you want something different.
links_reviews_text: I rented both the 2 and the 4 and ended up wearing the 2. This dress fit beautifully and had stretch so it wasn't too tight. Made of thicker fabric, it hid certain flaws if you are worried about any part of your body. The back is open, which I loved. I would rent this dress again.
Dress fit well. Loved the back details. Good quality material and comfortable to wear

links_reviews_title: Work retreat cocktail hour. Needed to make a great impression.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!!! I would buy it if I could. The strap in the back was broken so I just tucked it in. Didn't need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to wear to an awards' ceremony for my boyfriend's work event!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and got tons of compliments! Easy to dance in and sit in! Definitely a snug dress, so if are worried about a tight dress, order a size up... Loved the back of the dress design, too!
Easy to wear dress. A little short on me but not scandalously so

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a birthday party and it was a hit. Dress was comfortable, breathable and great fit.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, I order the 6 and 8, there was not a big size difference between the 2 sizes. The 8 was a little loose, the 6 was not that tight, but moveable.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable & got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: I loved how this dress was so comfortable.. I danced all night in it! The fabric was heavy & felt like it was great quality
This was a nice dress and can dress up an occasion. Something is off about it though that doesn't make me LOVE it, but I don't say you shouldn't rent it for everyday or to the office

This dress is gorgeous, and the ruffle strategically hides a problem tummy. I received a ton of compliments in this dress and felt very classy. This was a business networking event and it fit the occasion perfectly. I would say it does run small, and if you have an hourglass figure you might even consider sizing up twice. I typically fall in a 14, but ordered the 16 as my backup. It fit, but revealed every single line. I had to wear full non control top pantyhose (in a very muggy September in VA) to avoid vbl and shape-wear lines. The zipper also had a strange bulge in the middle of the zipper, pulling the dress up or down didn’t help either. The dress also wrinkles pretty significantly when you’re seated... this picture is at the end of wearing it for about 4 hours.

links_reviews_title: I love the color and the accents in this dress.
links_reviews_text: I love the color and the accents in this dress. I'm a 6/8, and I fit into a 4. But if I were to order again I would get a 6. The material had a bit of stretch to it. But it was snug on my tush. It was double lined as well.
I loved this dress! I felt so great in it and received many compliments on it. It is very flattering and fit me just right.

links_reviews_title: Perfect color, nicely finished, but the armholes are weirdly big
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color. Nicely finished with a thick satin lining so nothing rises up. Perfect fit. Very flattering. No vent in back so walking and going up stairs is slightly restrictive. Armholes were strangely low and narrow so my regular bra strap and even the side of the cup kept showing and I kept having to readjust.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved this dress, the color is absolutely stunning. It's a sky blue color, very fresh.
links_reviews_text: The fit is a bit smaller. I suggest renting your size and a size bigger, as it has a low stretch. I panicked the day before as it didn't fit! But the morning after when I had no breakfast the dress fitted. Girls with large boobs, please rent a size larger :) And skip the meal for a day! But overall it is a comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! Fit great!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size for me I usually wear a 2 or 4 and I went with the 2. Not tight across the shoulders which some dresses are sometimes on me., This dress was one of my favorites I have ever rented!
This dress is very well made. The fabric and cut are beautiful! Would rent again!

The satin lining on this dress means that it is SO COMFORTABLE. Soft and elegant, yet a total statement dress. Only qualm is that it greatly shortens stride length, but is fine for wearing high heels. Got lots of compliments on it! Wore it to work and felt like a (modest) bombshell!

Beautiful color, fitted but thick, slightly stretchy material. Run small. I am usually in 8 in dresses and needed a 10 in this dress with little room to spare. I am rather busty (36DD) and was unable to wear a bra, this is the only negative for me, but the thick material made it supportive. I would definitely rent this again!
Little tight up top for busty gals! Overall beautiful dress. Wore for an outdoor wedding in 100 degree weather but no sweat spots. Solidly lined dress even if it doesn't look like it.
This dress is flattering and classy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, and sexy (but demure) fit.
links_reviews_text: I thought I was wearing this to my son’s “semi-formal” house warming party but found out it was my “mother of the groom” dress at his surprise wedding! He was so pleased with my choice (made with his bride’s help!), he’d like me to buy it! Top fit tighter than bottom (5’5”, 150#, athletic/hourglass, 36c), but the 10 worked with my regular demi-bra.

I needed a last minute dress for a special event and rushed to the showroom in NYC. After trying on several other dresses, went with this one. I loved the color. Of course the size I needed wasn't avail, so I SQUOOZE into this 2, but really needed a 4.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: I got SO many compliments on this dress!! I had to do a reading for the wedding and I was so nervous about people looking at me, but it was a hit! I loved the flowy pieces, they fall really nicely. Don't get confused by the shoulder, it works out. You do need a strapless bra, and not one that sits too high- the corner dips pretty low! It's a thick material and lined, so it hides lines well. It is snug but it holds you in. Also tight around the legs so a little difficult to walk. I LOVE THIS DRESS!

I absolutely love a statement piece! This dress along with the color stood out all night long! It does not have the best stretch but it is fully lined & great for chiller nights! It hugs the dress in all of the right places & most importantly I felt beautiful! At first I was not a fan of the dress, but I gave it a go & ended up loving it!
Sorry I didn't get a pic w out the jacket. This dress has some give & is fully lined! Felt like good quality & loved the color! Interesting lines w out feeling overdone.
Super comfortable! Dress has stretch!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Spring Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a coworker's wedding and received many compliments on it! It's a gorgeous color, comfortable fabric, and overall very flattering. I usually am a size 4 but I could have gone down to a size 2 in this dress- the fit was slightly loose- but it was tight in the bust so keep that in mind. The hem hits right at the middle of my knees, so doesn't allow for a ton of movement, but I found I was able to dance fine at the wedding once I got comfortable in it. I wore an adhesive bra with it- all others would have shown. Highly recommend it. Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great if you're not a busty girl!
links_reviews_text: fabulous dress but was too tight around the chest area and shows armpits.

links_reviews_title: Not for the short in stature
links_reviews_text: I opted not to wear this dress. Warning - if you a petite woman (I am 5'2") it hits at a very awkward length, making it look rather dowdy. Not good. Also, the color is a bit off from the photo. It's more of a grayish blue than the periwinkle of the picture.

The top of this fit brilliantly but it showed every lump and bump on the lower half, even with shapewear and the thick fabric, it was very unforgiving. Went up a size and still felt self conscious. Did not wear.
I absolutely loved this dress! It fit beautifully, I would suggest sizing up 1 size as the fit is snug. I used for a wedding and received several compliments. 1st time using RTR and I will be back!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for spring office party
links_reviews_text: Color and fit is very flattering, I enjoyed wearing this dress
I sized up to an 8 based on reviews and it was too large. I should have stayed with my true size, 6. It was too long for me too. Hit below my knees and I am 5'4''.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so small I was not able to wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: I was extremely disappointed by how small the dress runs.

I wore this, dry cleaned it, and wore it again....and truly didn't want to send it back. Gorgeous periwinkle color! My only slight issue was it's tight in the bust I had to wear a very minimal strapless. Straps show. Tons of compliments all day long... even at church. Rent it, you will LOVE it! Flattering

links_reviews_title: stunning.color is fresh & fit amazing. the ruffle covers any puff- lol! enjoy-you will look fabulous
links_reviews_text: smooth, comfortable
I rented this in size ten because one viewer said it was stretchy. Don't kid yourself. I squeezed into and it looked good but i was afraid to rip sitting down
It is a bit snug around the hips and butt, so if you are an hourglass shape, you may need to size up.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made but didn’t work for my body type.
links_reviews_text: Didn’t wear. Too tight in the booty.

links_reviews_title: The shoulder ruffle type detail is fun.
links_reviews_text: Fits curvy girls well. Stretches a bit
I wish I had ordered the correct size. This was such a great color and good cut.

The dress runs small, I ordered a size 10, my normal size, too small in the hips and chest. Nice fabric. the asymmetric cut on the shoulders would require a strapless bra. I would order again in s larger size
I loved this dress, the color, the style... but it was soooo tight I couldn't zip it! I am 5'3 155 lbs and I ordered an 8. It was tight in the boob area, but ok in the hips
Color was pretty for spring.

links_reviews_title: Turned out to be not quite what I wanted - too many little "pieces" of the dress
links_reviews_text: Fit fine. The cut makes it so you have to wear a strapless at least for the right side of the bra. Didn't end up wearing it because the color is darker and less attractive in real life, and the style is a bit out there with all the flaps of the dress.
Excellent fit and very flattering - was a surprise how great it looked!

links_reviews_title: Excellent dress for a wedding event
links_reviews_text: I was surprised how much I loved this dress, which was thick enough to provide warmth, hugged the right ways, and beautiful with the lace accents. Would definitely rent again and recommend for a winter bridal event!

I got tons of compliments on this dress. I normally wear a 4 so I was a little upset when RTR sent me a 0 and a 2 however the 2 fit perfectly! It was actually a little big. The zero fit my curves a little better however I wanted to be able to eat and drink while wearing it
I rented this dress to possibly wear to the courthouse for my small wedding. The hips were oddly too big. This one was meh, just not memorable.
I absolutely loved this dress. I felt so rich and clean. I received a ton of compliments. I wore it twice, with and without a belt. Both were stunning looks.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. The black lace arms were an elegant touch to the white dress. The arms were not too tight and the dress was a great length. It runs a bit big in the stomach area but I was able to make it work. True white color and I wore nude undergarments and you couldn't see through. Very happy with this rental!
The lace detail on the sleeves makes this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a daytime derby watch party.
links_reviews_text: Received many compliments; I'm an athletic/hourglass--so tiny waist with the volume on top and bottom. It can be heaven or hell to wear a dress. This one fit beautifully--definitely recommend, if you want something that is fitted, but not too tight so it is sexy but classy.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel stylish and elegant.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress -- I wore it for a special dinner party. It is really different, elegant and fun to wear. I received lots of compliments. I am not that curvey so there was extra room in the hips of the 4, but it still fit well. The fabric is thick, so nothing shows through. I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: So cute! Loved to wear during my flight
links_reviews_text: Not too warm because of the lace sleeves. It was fitted in the arms, but loose in my stomach and hips area. I should have worn a 2 but it was not available in store. I received early AM compliments. Thick material and very comfortable. Light winter white color.
Great fit and style! I was so worried I would stain it but I made it through Vegas without a single mark!
Perfect fit!
Lined thick for cooler weather. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Classy, modest, and sexy all in one dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. The length was perfect for me and the event, and I am 5'11. The dress hem was in line with my knee, and I wore 3 inch heels. The detail on the sleeves was eye catching, and the overall fit.. well it fit like a glove but not too tight. When you figure everyone will be wearing dark colors, rent this to stand out and receive endless compliments- I did!! I want to keep this!!

Loved this dress!! Could have sized down but wanted to make sure it would fit my 8.5 baby Bump! Received so many compliments. Material was thick but stretchy and dress length was great (not too short)!

links_reviews_title: Perfect! This dress was a hit!!!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to our company cocktail party, and where everyone else was in black. It's a great material and fits perfect! The dress doesn't have much stretch, but the lace on the arms does so it helped since I have larger arms. Was comfortable and easy to move in. Would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: The dress was amazing! I felt so beautiful and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit snug, which I loved. It's scary wearing white when red wine is being drunk, but I managed! I wore normal undergarments, which was great. If you're short, it might be a little long so make sure you're comfortable wearing high heels. I was excited to wear red shoes which worked with the black & white.
Great fabric and fit.. runs a bit long especially if you are short!

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress for my engagement party!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic! A little big, but did not look bad with a little room!
Fits well, and you can wear a normal bra with the way the dress was made. Being short, I worried it might be too long, but it was just fine.
I wore this to church. I loved this dress! Seems so simple but very chic. It's not see through at all, the white fabric is very thick. I wear a 6 usually and this fit like a very "tight glove."

links_reviews_title: The black lace makes this dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a "white party" and the lace selves made the dress stand out. So many compliments! True to size and comfortable.

This isn't the kind of dress where you can raise your hands all the way over your head and have plenty of room to dance or reach, but if you need to look good, this dress gets the job done. Wearing white dresses is always a toss up because you never know how see through they will be. This one is well-made and is not see through. Even though I normally wear a 6, I thought the shoulders and sleeves were a tad loose. It's unique and stands out in a room.

links_reviews_title: Classic with a great fit and comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress if form fitting but the fabric is thick which helps with wearing tights. I wore this on my wedding day and wouldn't change it ever. I would definitely go down one size when ordering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my rehearsal dinner the night before my winter wedding and absolutely loved it. One minor issue was that it felt just a little long for me (even at 5'8") so I used fashion tape to hem it about one inch. This seemed to take care of the problem and lasted for the whole night.
Beautiful dress! Sleeves are a little snug and scratchy but otherwise no complaints.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for my baby shower.
links_reviews_text: I am 32 weeks. I am typically a 4 non pregnant and went with the 6. (I have really only gained in my belly thus far). The fit was great. It bunched a bit in the back because, well it's not a maternity dress..., but that was hardly noticeable. It was very comfortable. Tons of compliments!
Gorgeous shift dress! I wore it for my rehearsal dinner. My guests and my fiancé all loved it. Quality material with gorgeous lace overlay.

links_reviews_title: Super-comfy classy dress with stunning lace detail.
links_reviews_text: The dress was gorgeous and super-comfy. It was a really thick material, so kept me perfectly warm for this winter black & white-themed cocktail party. I was afraid it would be see-through, but it wasn't at all. It was slightly stretchy and gave a little. Length hit right at the bottom of my knee, which was a little long for my personal preference but still worked. Ordered a 6 and an 8 for backup and feel like the 6 was perfect, if not a little bit roomy in the hip area. Got tons of compliments on the lace sleeves!

links_reviews_title: My favorite RTR dress thus far! Perfect for our elopement reception!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, so comfortable, and photographed well. The white with black lace detail is simply gorgeous! May be best for taller girls. I have a long torso, long arms and long legs, and it fit perfectly! Both the 6 and 8 fit but I went with the 8 to be a little more comfortable. I pared it with drop crystal earrings, black pumps and a plum lip for winter! Loved it!

This dress is beautiful, well made and comfortable. Runs true to size and flattering on all areas. I felt like the lace wasn't overly slimming on my arms, but I have thin arms so it was fine. I am 5'8" and the dress fell to the bottom of my knees. You can wear standard undergarments and I didn't need shape wear underneath as the fabric is nice and thick and it isn't cut to be overly tight.

links_reviews_title: White Stood Out Among a Sea of Black
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. I did forget how white doesn't hide things as well as black. I had to remind myself to stand up straight. I also wore the four so things looked a bit smoother. I got a ton of compliments and while white is harder to wear I definitely stood out and was memorable with every other woman in a dark shade.

links_reviews_title: Great pick for a day in office turn night on the town!
links_reviews_text: Edgy, classy, glam... A little bit of everything in one babe dress! Wore it to the office for work with tights, booties and a leather vest during the day then swapped to some sexier heels and a sparkly necklace to meet my girlfriends out for a 30th celebration. Great universal dress! I do have to say, although the material is clearly high quality, it is not forgiving in terms of undergarments. My tights seam showed through the dress front pretty noticeably (hence the vest for some camouflage). Didn't stop me from loving it though! :)
Great fabric!

links_reviews_title: I love the heavy fabric. I would buy this dress
links_reviews_text: Sleeves run a little long

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for an engagement party!
links_reviews_text: I received the 0 and 2, but ended up going with the 0 because I needed it a little more fitted in the waist. Gorgeous dress though...nice thick material and very figure flattering! :)

So the black and white on the dress compliment each other beautifully. I'm not a hippy girl so it was a bit big in that area. We had formal photos taken in it so my husband just grabbed a bit of fabric in the back to make it look like it fit better. Overall beautiful especially if you have hips!

The Mikayla Sheath runs true to size and I would suggest going a size up for back up. The bust area is comfortable and is great for any cup size. The dress is fitted throughout the midsection and is stretchy at the hips and the length ends at the knee. This swan like dress defines sophistication, it is great for a formal affair. Paired with minimum accessories and black or nude heels.

This is definitely a form fitting dress! I order this dress for my son's baptism in a 4 and 6. The 4 felt snug all over and the 6 was large through the bust but still snug through waist and hips. To be fair, everything I've worn in the past three months has been stretch. I got lots of compliments and it photographed beautifully. I did need to take about four or five inches off the bottom with hem tape.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my San Francisco City Hall wedding.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the sizes 2 and 4 and when they arrived 2 days before my wedding they were both too big. I was a bit stressed out and when I called renttherunway they were SO helpful and amazing. They shipped the size 0 to me overnight along with 2 backup dresses just in case. The dresses arrived at 9am on the day of my wedding and the size 0 fit perfectly! I felt so glamorous in this dress! Thank you rentherunway for making my day!
Wore this to my office Xmas party. Sexy without being revealing. Fitted but not tight. Not see through. So pretty & comfy - highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: The day was picture perfect to officiate a beach wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, flattering, flowy, and sexy without being over the top. This dress was stunning and subtle all at the same time

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and accommodating stretchy and thick fabric.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7" and pre-pregnant size 4. The stretchy and thick fabric of this dress accommodated my 25 week pregnant body very well. I felt comfortable in it all day.

links_reviews_title: Love how elegant and comfortable this dress was

links_reviews_text: Wore this for my nephews wedding. Great fit, comfortable and classy

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true. I loved how the color complimented my boyfriend’s suit. I ordered the 2&4, the fit was close to the same. Went with the 2 as it felt more snug in chest.
Many compliments on this dress! It was very comfortable. The perfect mixture between sexy and professional! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my nieces sweet 16.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’8” and 150. I wear a 36c and typically wear a size 8 but the 8 was too snug in the hips so I’m wearing the back up 10. This dress was very comfortable and flattering. The blue isn’t as navy as I had expected but a prettier blue with a brighter cobaltish hue.

I loved this dress enough to want to buy it. It fit like a glove, was comfortable to wear and I had so much fun dancing in it. It was perfect for the event and I got so many compliments on it. I did have it get stuck in the folding chair once because it has that extra fabric, but it didn't rip. Just something to be aware of that it can get caught places sometimes.

I wore this to a black tie fundraiser for work, and got compliments all night from colleagues and guests alike! As other have said, the blue is beautiful and much brighter in person- between a navy and a royal blue. The dress was somewhat form fitting, but the material was stretchy and soft like a jersey while concealing any lumps and bumps. The flutter sleeve was lovely, and the way it cut across the back on the bias was incredibly flattering. The hem hit me an inch or two below the knee- I'm pretty short so I usually worry about longer dresses making me look even shorter, but I actually loved the silhouette it created. The bust was a bit more low and revealing than I might typically wear to a work function, but I have to say my bust has perhaps never looked better in a dress!! I would absolutely wear this dress again if the opportunity arises.
