Really liked this dress. The material has some stretch, so comfortable and good for dancing. I liked how one shoulder had a sleeve - didn't make my shoulders look so broad. And the dress is gathered at the waist which I like cause it helps to hide you stomach/underwear lines.

This dress was SO comfortable! No zippers, stretchy and easy but still looked formal enough for a wedding in a theater. I loved the asymmetrical neckline, and the navy blue was super easy to pair with silver jewelry and neutral shoes, though I think gold would work too. For $30, you really can't beat it. Would absolutely rent again!

This dress is amazing. It's jersey-like material, so it's comfortable and slimming. It can be worn with regular undergarments. It hit me just at the knee. I actually wore it with the ruffle in the front and it looks gorgeous!

I didn't really care for how simple the dress was once I received it. It was not fancy enough for my gala but I would definitely wear this to a summer wedding! I am super self-conscious about my large biceps so I was a little uncomfortable in this dress when trying it on. I will consider this dress again for future events that are more on the casual/formal side than cocktail. (I do not have on support garments in the photo so you can see how the dress hangs on normal skin.)

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! It was the perfect combination of sexy and classy!
links_reviews_text: I loved the material, I felt loved me it hid my flaws.
Wore this for a New Years party and everyone loved the dress. It was so comfortable and soft. I really recommend this dress to anyone for any occasion. I really felt beautiful and sexy in this dress.

This rental gets 5 stars because of how versatile, classy and easy this dress was! You can wear with regular bra, and it has the snaps to keep the straps hidden in place. There are no zippers, so it is super quick, and a stretch fit that means the size will work for a variety of women. I sized down and glad I did. Loved the assymetry details with the frill spiral in the back.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an evening out!
links_reviews_text: This was the first time I have ever received a new (with tags) dress from RTR! It was nice to be the first to wear it. :-) The dress had a thick, high-quality material and was super comfortable. I wore this dress to a Christmas Party and there was a lot of dancing going on! The fit was great, hugged me in all the right places but was forgiving in areas that needed forgiveness. :-) The only recommendation I have is that you'll need a lower profile bra. I kept having to pull on the neckline because my bra would peek out a bit. Other than that, it fit true to size, was flattering, and I highly recommend it.

Great material that was flattering and comfortable. The color was unique and the ruching on the stomach made it fit even better. There is a little rhinestone on the sleeveless arm which is nice too. The length was a tiny bit too long, but overall great dress for a great price.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and classy! I would definitely wear it again!!
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove and the material is stretchy so it moves with you (great for the dance floor) The shoulder has a cute silver brooch detail and I love the flowy piece too!! I wore spanks but the ruching detail on the side was super flattering! I am 6'2 and the length was perfect!!! highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Glamorous yet simple little blue dress
links_reviews_text: This dress hit me in all the right places and made me feel gorgeous. I loved the asymmetry of the sleeves and how the cape of the sleeve continues to flow on the back of it. The neckline wan't too low, but I did have to hoist it back into place after bending down or sitting sometimes. The material was a little thick and was perfect for a November wedding.

Wore this to my nephews wedding. Very classy dress. And huge bonus, it travels very well! Was packed in a backpack for most of the day while flying out to the destination and it didn't even need to be steamed or ironed when I unpacked it! I'm 5'6" , 122 lbs and size 6 fit perfectly.

This dress fit great and it was so comfortable. I wore an adhesive bra with it, which worked best so I didn't have to worry abut straps showing although the one thinner strap is enough to hide a bra strap. I rented this for a work related dinner dance event so this dress was perfect in that it had a little flair with the flowy sleeve and embellishment on the strap, but it was still on the conservative side.
I got many compliments on this dress. It fit exactly how I anticipated it to fit. The material is heavy but tolerable. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: I didn’t end up wearing this one for my event as the concept wasn’t for my figure. I like the color.
links_reviews_text: The back is interesting, and the small detail at the shoulder is nice, but the cut wasn’t for me. Loved the color and length.
I ended up wearing a different dress, but wish I had an excuse to wear this one too. Very pretty.
A great dress for a formal business dinner. It was modest too.
Nice dress, but it fits and shows all your curves (including my 2 baby belly) which was not too flattering. Overall, not bad

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and will rent the same dress again!
links_reviews_text: Flattering for all shapes.
I found this dress to be a bit outdated. The material is forgiving, so it did fit well. Overall, didn't like the style.

I rented the 2 and 4 since I fluctuate between those sizes, and wore the size 2--both were tight in the waist, but the size 4 was a bit loose in the straps. I was able to wear a regular (smooth, not textured) bra, but I had to tuck the hanger loops into the inside of my bra so they didn't create a lumpy texture on my chest. I also recommend seamless underwear without any texture (not even lace). This dress is tight all around and does not hide any stomach rolls, so if you think you would be self-conscious, I recommend a different style. I paired it with pearls got compliments ranging from hot to sophisticated--a rare find for the lower priced rentals. I loved the asymmetrical style and the flowy fabric over one arm and around the back to the other side--this made it feel fun, especially when it caught the breeze. It was a good choice for an outdoor wedding in sweltering heat, but I also think it would have worked for an indoor winter wedding. Even though there are so many options out there, I think I would rent this one again!
Very happy with the dress
This dress was gorgeous. Thicker material made it perfect for the winter wedding I attended. The material was slightly stretchy, which made it super forgiving for my postpartum body! I felt gorgeous!
This dress is very well made. The rhinestone detail on the shoulder is an extra bonus. The color is beautiful.
Wore it with a relaxed up-do and received dozens of compliments. Great length on long torso. Flattering on apple figure. Complimentary and not overexposed on the neckline.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is super flattering. I got so many compliments wearing it. It has some stretch and the fabric hid all my imperfections. This was my first time using RTR and it won't be my last!

links_reviews_title: Fit like it was made for me.
links_reviews_text: Seriously I felt like a million bucks in this dress. Really looked lovely on my hourglass figure and was so comfortable. I rented it for a wedding but opted to take a different dress instead, still it's gorgeous and would be a great option for a wedding or a classy date night.
I rented this dress for my company holiday party. The fit was perfect, and complimented my curves. I felt like a million bucks and got so many compliments!

This dress was incredibly flattering. I am 5'10", size 12, with a 36 D chest. The neckline was just right to highlight my cleavage, hit just above the knee. Also the ruffle down the back was statement worthy while giving more of hour glass shape to my inverted triangle figure. Awesome dress!

links_reviews_title: The ruffle across the back and on the sleeve gave a nice design detail to this dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit more snug than I was hoping and mixer in the front than I expected. Maybe a smaller chested woman would not mind the lower cut. It was pretty with good design details just tighter than I wanted.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress and comfortable fit, but not for me.
links_reviews_text: This dress felt great on, but there was too much cleavage for my taste. I wore my back up dress instead.
So cute. The low cut is very sexy, and length isn't too short. And the pockets are everything.

This dress was amazing. Was nervous to wear such a low cut dress, but glad I pushed myself out of my comfort zone. Felt super sexy in this dress, and loved that it had pockets. The only con is the top of the dress didn't stay put in the right places as you moved around. I attribute that to the straps being too long and not adjustable. Body tape fixed that problem perfectly. Wear pasties or backless bra since the the dress is backless.

links_reviews_title: Great silhouette. Liked the flare and the colors
links_reviews_text: I'm typically a size 4 and rented this on a size 2. Glad I didn't take the size 4 as the chest area was pretty roomy one this one. I had to stuff myself up with extra pads to fit into this. Holds on the waist and compresses it, so it is still flattering. If you're small chested, this dress might be an issue. If you're bigger up top, this will work for you.
This dress fit perfectly. Was perfect for the wedding I attended. Was cut lower than what I typically wear but it looked great and I was very comfortable. My husband loved it too.

This is my favorite RTR dress of all time. Wore it to a wedding and it was a huge hit. The straps are pretty long, had to use some fashion tape to hold the top in place but otherwise this dress is perfect. I have a smaller bust so the cleavage wasn't an issue. The skirt is amazing and the pockets are clutch. It's well made with amazing thick fabric but not too warm. This dress is so flattering, I wanted to keep it!

links_reviews_title: Fun, stylish, super comfortable dress! Loved it.
links_reviews_text: Top of the dress ha very loose straps. If your not full busted it may be hard to pull the top off.

Very comfortable dress with pockets! I had to go with a smaller size than my usual. Straps are very long, which was nice to know in advance from previous reviews. I have a small chest, so I had to wear sticky boobs, because the chest area isn't meant for A cups. Very low cut. Overall great pick as a replacement!
Runs large. Normal am a 6, but the straps on the 6 were very long so I ended up squeezing into a 4. It has pockets! Need I say more?

links_reviews_title: Weekend get away for a close friendsl's wedding! Perfect weekend for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I recently had a baby and my body isn't back to normal yet. This dress was perfect! It says it's meant to be worn with a strapless bra, but I didn't wear any, you could still see my bra. I had to tack the straps, they were a little too long, but I have a short torso and have to have most straps adjusted. I was a 6 before ingot pregnant and I wore a 6 in this dress. Not sure if the dress runs big or if because it's an A-line that it was true to size. Either it was super comfortable, I got tons of compliments, and it has pockets! I would definitely rent this again!

I wore this dress for dinner out on vacation but it didn't work well with my bustline - top was too big and didn't hold me in. Straps not adjustable. Fun that it has pockets, but didn't find the way waist fit and fullness of skirt to be figure flattering.
Pros: Beautiful color. Fun dress (on the shorter side) with POCKETS! Cons: The top is way too low cut for my taste. I am still breast feeding and my breasts would have fell right out had I bent over.
Nothing special. Wore to a graduation, but needed to add a jacket because it was so low in front and back.

I tried it on for a formal graduation as I am president of the alumni board for the institution, but because it ran big in the top I couldn't wear it at all. It was a bummer because I LOVED the blue bottom with pockets. If the top had come up higher, or if there was the ability to safety pin the top together, I would have. Thankfully I rented another dress as a backup - one that was less formal - but it served its purpose. My advice: it does run large, so go a size down what you might think. And the top is revealing, so if you don't think it's appropriate for tour event, don't rent it. Otherwise, I loved wearing it and trying it on.
Had to shorten the straps not adjustable

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress-loved the pockets! Got a ton of compliments and hides post baby belly well!
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit large in the bust so ended up sizing down. Had to wear fashion tape to ensure top didn’t slip. Only complaint is that straps are really loose-would have been perfect If they were adjustable!

links_reviews_title: Rehearsal dinner dress—lots of compliments, surprisingly comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I loved the colors in this dress and how comfortable it was. The pockets came in handy! This dress was a little longer than I anticipated, as I am tall—so short women be aware. The top is a bit on the loose side, so I wore a sticky bra to help secure my chest since I had some extra room in there. Overall, I got tons of compliments on this dress and would recommend it to anyone who wants to look classy and be comfortable at a formal event!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, classic, and a little bit sexy.
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this for a cocktail attire fundraiser. Pockets were convenient and the cut was flattering. This fit me really well in size 6, but I'm typically an 8. I wore a strapless/backless sticky bra to create the curves i wanted with this low cut number.
I wore this for a Derby party. Badgley Mishka never disappoints! It fit perfectly!

This dress was perfect for a fundraising gala! I received many compliments, and the pockets were a bonus. I am 5'1", so I did have to pin the straps to make it fit. Otherwise it was so comfortable and fit everywhere else. Highly recommend this dress, even for us petite girls!

Very pretty and I loved that it has pockets!! The straps are super long and cause the front to drop very low, if they were adjustable this dress would be much easier to wear. I took a black ribbon and tied them together and formed a racerback -which helped pull the front up and take away some of the droopiness of the dress. Overall very nice, but don't think I would rent it again. Great for a one night party dress!

I rented this dress for a wedding, and overall really loved it. I wore the 12 and had plenty of room in it. I probably could have done the 10. The only con is, as mentioned by others, that the straps are a bit long and not adjustable. I was having to pull up on the chest all night to avoid having my bra show. That part was a little annoying. The dress does have pockets where are nice, and it's very comfortable.

Really loved this dress! The solid, textured top with deep v-neckline was very flattering as was the fuller skirt. The colors and patterns in the skirt were beautiful and the style was very comfortable. I felt great in this dress and received compliments. With respect to the top of the dress, I couldn't really find a bra that worked, so ended up going without a bra, which gave me anxiety, but ended up working out just fine. The spaghetti straps were WAY too long but I solved that by pulling the two straps together in the back, like a racer-back style and securing them with a safety pin. I then tied a black ribbon around the pin so no one could see it!
Fit wonderfully and was so comfy to wear.

This dress was very pretty and comfortable For an outdoor spring wedding in Florida. Though it fit well through the waist the bust was too big and the straps a bit too long. I had to use fashion tape and was still adjusting straps all night. Fun skirt is full and sways nicely when dancing.
Beautiful dress. Love the pockets! Need to be cognizant of your bust. I'm small chested but even the 2 gaped on me a bit.

links_reviews_title: Spring-y and fun - and even prettier in person, BUT.....
links_reviews_text: First off - this dress was more gorgeous in person than online. The pockets were amazing, and the skirt was a heavy almost tapestry-like fabric. I am so petite I typically cannot wear these full skirts as they eat me up, but this one was perfect (and hit the little food baby belly after enjoying a great dinner and a glass of wine!). The downside - what everyone said about the straps was correct....I'm not sure who this was made for esp not being adjustable! I ended up double safety-pinning both sides, taking it up approx. 3 inches. I wore a black strapless bra but still wished I had used fashion tape as well. All-in-all, as long as you have the patience and time before your event starts to tailor this, definitely worth the rental! I would consider buying this dress and having it tailored for me!
I liked this dress as it's very versatile. If I wasn't on vacation I would've needed a special bra.

links_reviews_title: Worn to a star studded event
links_reviews_text: Fit well - is a very deep cut; I needed fashion tape to avoid accidents. But I got compliments all night

Loved this dress, after eyeing it for months now! It has everything you'd want - comfort, luxurious materials, flattering but secure straps, and POCKETS! This is a dress that lets you eat, dance, and pose without giving it a second thought, and I love it. Would rent again!

this dress was perfect!! I got it for my formal and was getting compliments all night! not only was it pretty, IT HAD POCKETS. I wish I could keep this dress because i didn't want to take it off. the only issue I had is that it runs slightly big if you have a smaller chest!

I wore this for one of my good friends wedding. I love this dress! Super cute, comfy and it has pockets! I usually would wear a size 16/18 depending on the designer but I wore this dress in 14. I ended up wearing a cardigan over it even with fashion tape because the cleavage area was very loose due to me being small chested. That was the only downfall! Other than that I would totally rent again!!
I rented a few dresses for a wedding this didn't make the cut it was cute but didn't flatter my body shape; also my mom hated it but she didn't have a good reason on why she did.

I need to start by saying I'm typically a very conservative dresser. I read all the reviews about the top showing a lot of the girls, but that most women had been successful by taping the straps up etc. I really loved the idea of this dress so I went with it anyway. I was SO uncomfortable and self-conscious the whole evening! Lol. I did use fabric tape and a NuBra but still felt as though I was on full display. In addition, the cut of the dress isn't quite right- it showed my small waist but the skirt cut made me look pregnant and cut off at a weird spot. Overall, I wish I had stuck to my gut of being more conservative for a good friends wedding. Pretty dress, just not for me. Hope this helps!

Don't rent this unless you're super comfortable with your girls being on *full* display. Super cute dress but much more revealing than I anticipated. The straps are longer than they need to be but the pockets and the fabric are lovely. It would have been better for a date night rather than a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Loved - top runs big - size down.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress - it was just as I hoped for. The 4 was unavailable so I rented the 2 and 6 - thankful I ordered the 2 - the top runs big and I was swimming in the 6. Perfect for pear shape. Straps were a little long but nothing two safety pins could not fix. No bra needed with sticky bra inserts. Totally recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfectly and was fancy.
links_reviews_text: I️ wore this dress to an award event in Nashville and it was perfect. It was fancy and very comfortable. The straps were a little too long but other than that the dress fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend saying how nice I looked before we left the house.
links_reviews_text: The straps are loose so tape pasties or tying the straps (which is what I did) to tighten them up a bit. It fit great. It didn't poof in front like it looks it actually lays flat. It has pockets (huge plus) and I felt great dancing once the straps were tightened.
Beautiful dress would def rent again. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the straps were way too long. Otherwise perfect! Received many compliments and very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Dress worn for a friends wedding
links_reviews_text: Overall I liked the dress and don’t regret the rent however the top felt very exposing , especially for a church wedding. It was a little too big on the top. Tits out for the boys. The pockets on the dress we’re prime and the length was perfect for being petite.

I often wear a size 4-6 in dresses, but I'm glad I sized down for my backup option, as I wound up wearing a size 2 (which fit like a glove!). The bottom flows away so you'll be sizing mostly for your chest and ribcage versus needing to worry about the rest of the dress. As other reviews have mentioned, the straps are long, but this worked well for my long torso; I was also glad to have a skirt that went to my knees. Finally, the fact that this has pockets makes it extremely practical, as well. I loved wearing this dress!

I chose the 4R as my main size, and the 2R as my backup and I ended up using the 2R. The 4R felt comfortable but it was too long for me. Although the 2R was tight I decided to wear it so I wouldn’t be tripping over myself all night. The dress has wiring in the front, which gives it a beautiful shape, but makes it especially challenging to sit down if it’s already tight. Even though it was uncomfortable (because I CHOSE to wear the tighter dress) I was glad I wore it because it was super form-fitting. I got so many compliments, and I really loved how I looked in it. In hindsight I think a 4S would have fit me perfectly and been comfortable.

This dress definitely runs small, I'm typically a 6 most often (sometimes a 4) but sized up to an 8 and the dress fit well. I had to use double sided tape to keep the top of dress from flipping down/forward, but this worked like a charm. The dress was appropriately heavy and formal- perfect for the gala I attended. Would happily wear this dress again!
The fit is true to the size and it looks great!

My 1st experience with RTR for my daughter's Cotillion was perfect! The in-store stylist found the perfect designer for my body type and the selected gown was sheer perfection! I felt beautiful. Thank you RTR!!!

This dress shows off every part of your body. NO GIVE AND NOT STRETCHY. Fits like a grove. If worried about sizing ...size up. You need to tape the top or it will sag down. Overall, loved the dress and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: people actually thought i was curvy!!
links_reviews_text: the dress itself is so simple but so classy and pretty! it was exactly what i was looking for for a prom i got asked to. it's super flattering to wear but a little bit uncomfortable. i ordered a 2R and a 0R for backup but the 2R itself was a little tight when that's usually the size that would be bigger on me. the quality of the dress was really good too except for the zipper breaking off when it got stuck on a tag :/ all in all, really pretty dress that i got many compliments with!

This was a beautiful dress. Fit perfect. Sexy and elegant. I gave it four stars vs five for the following reasons: It was quite long. I'm 5'7" and even with 3 inch heels, I had to hold it up quite a bit. Also, the top was a bit loose. I had to pull up the top often throughout the evening. I'm a 34 C and was wearing a padded stick-on bra so I was surprised at how loose the top was.
Flattering, looks fitted. Only thing is you can't really bend over but looks great.

links_reviews_title: Junior Prom! Attended with my best friends
links_reviews_text: I loved this color! Even though it's strapless, it never fell down. I'm 5'2" and it ran maybe 4-5 inches too long for me, so I'd recommend it with heels.
The dress fit was really nice, the top kept slipping a little though but not all the way down, I'm just not as used to a strapless dress being low. I got so many compliments wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great for Straight & Narrow Body Types!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress as a back up option for a wedding in which I am serving as the MOH. The dress itself is fantastic and gives us less curvy girls a shape, which instantly boosted my confidence and made me feel sexy and proud of my new "shape". It fits TTS with slightly more room in the hips and bust. I likely also would have worn spanx for photos. The con: Unfortunately this dress came wrinkled w/ some soiling at the bottom of the dress to the back of my knees. The structured bust line had seen better days and had essentially collapsed as it was hanging down. The bust in this dress new fits beautifully. I was in Chicago & was able to return this in person to the very friendly salespeople and believe this specific dress has been taken out of rotation or repaired. I would not have been able to wear this dress in the wedding due to the condition that it arrived in. Dress itself, fantastic. QC leaves some to be desired.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for an amazing night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect. The dress fit like a glove and hugged me in all the right places. The simplicity of the dress really shows off its elegance and I received many compliments. The only complaint I have is that the dress on the bottom came a little wrinkled so if you're iffy about those things you may wants to rent it for two days before your event so you can get it steamed. Other than that the dress was super comfortable (a little long but I am very short) and really enjoyable to wear.

I ordered this dress three days before my prom. I was super worried that it would look weird or odd because I wouldn't be able to hem it or get it taken in. But when I tried it on, it fit perfectly to my body and height! Yay!

This dress was the BEST! I used it for prom. It was very tight and fit in all the right places, kind of hard to sit down at first but then you figure out how to situate it and stuff. I got so many compliments! I was unable to wear a bra with it because the zipper wouldn't zip with one on but it was very supportive and it had no trouble staying up even through a whole night of dancing!

Everyone complimented all night! Even the waitress at the restaurant! I usually wear a 4 and the 4R fit perfectly! It was a little long, so I had to wear heels. Loved it though! Definitely recommended!
It fit very well, I was scared about the length, thought it might've been too long but was perfect. Not too tight. The only con would be the top would fold a bit but nothing too bad.

links_reviews_title: The bride gave us the freedom to choose our dress as long as it was blush so this was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great for my body and I received so many compliments!

Absolutely loved this dress! Wore to a Mardi Gras Ball. I had picked out another and had a weird feeling so ordered this one too. So glad I did! Always go with your gut! It fit so well and accentuated all the right places. Toward end of the night the top got a little loose but not anything to fret over. Ordered a 2R and 4R. Didn't even try the 4 on because 2 fit perfect. At 5'5, 120 pounds, and an A cup it was perfect. Didn't even wear a bra. Bonus! I would love to actually buy it! It's nude with pink undertones and just so pretty. Everyone said it was "made for me." Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: very flattering & received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: my bust is on the smaller end, so my only con is that there was a little too much space there. but it didn't look bad in that area, and overall it was a great dress for my black tie gala.

links_reviews_title: Really phenomenal dress. Wore it to a Navy ball.
links_reviews_text: My only issue was that the 2 was a bit to big and the 0 was a bit too small. Relatively easily solved with spanx.
I was a little nervous to try RTR but ended up loving the experience. The dress came on time and the 0R for perfectly. It was exactly what I had hoped for! It hugged my curves flawlessly.

links_reviews_title: Best strapless dress I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress from the fit and flare at the bottom to the tight top which didn't need constant tugging to keep it from falling down, it was perfect. The material is thick to prevent any sheerness and it is so comfortable for a strapless dress.

Gorgeous fit and perfect color. Was disappointed with my experience with Rent the Runway. Ordered another dress *months* in advance. Was told a few days before that it wasn't available. Ended up loving this dress but it has nothing on the herve I had intended to wear.
The dress was well made and fit great, I'm a little sway back so i used a small piece of tape to make it hug my back other than that it was comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Wrong color sent, but RTR fixed it
links_reviews_text: I made an appt at RTR with a stylist a month before the event bcs it was a black tie wedding and I was 5 months postpartum. I wasn't sure what I would fit into. I chose this dress, although it took guts to wear lol! They initially sent me the wrong color, (this dress comes in two different shades of "nude") but they had the correct color/size sent via overnight when I called them about the mistake. No questions asked. Great customer service. (I would've been happier if I had lost more of the baby weight in time for this dress, but it's just taking it's sweet time to come off.)

The top of this dress is pretty structured and I ended up with a bent seaming placement (not sure how to exactly describe) but very form fitting and would be better for someone with more to fill out the dress on top. The dress is a very light almost sandstone pink color

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess for the night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear as a bridesmaid's dress and it was amazing! I was a little worried about the fit since most reviews said the gown runs on the small side (it does). I usually wear a 2 so I ordered a 2 and a 4. The 2 wasn't going past my hips but the 4 was much better. It fit comfortably without a bra, but a strapless bra made it a little tough to zip. My fiance was able to zip it no problem but I didn't want to rely on him all night so I got the adhesive bra and it was perfect. With a three inch heal the length was great, even when I switched to flip flops at the reception it was only slightly too long. Not a big deal at all. Walking and dancing were not a problem; sitting was a bit of am effort but the plus side is the dress encourages excellent posture :). Also, the color of the dress is exactly as shown. I got so many compliments on this gown, one guest even said she hoped I got to wear the dress again because of how stunning and flattering it was. This was my first time using RTR and after such a great experience I will definitely be using again!
Awesome dress!! Sooooo flattering I ditched my spanx. Opted for larger size for sitting comfort. Curvy girls do not be afraid of this dress. DO make sure you have some color.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and others thought so too! Received a lot of compliments. Love this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was rented out for prom and it was a beautiful fit. Although very tight until my knees (a perfect example of a mermaid dress), it was easy to dance the night away in! Just don't count on sitting down comfortably. The fabric wasn't too heavy and the color was exactly what was shown online! Completely recommend.

This dress fit true to size, although throughout the night it did loosen up just a bit. The length was great, I am 5'6 and wore 3 inch heels. The material was just thick enough that no undergarments were needed. We attend a ton of military balls where there is a dress code and this was the perfect gown, form fitting but offers plenty of coverage.
(My friend wore this dress) Fit great! Really beautiful and simple but stood out

links_reviews_title: Great dress; perfect fit and color!
links_reviews_text: I was really worried the dress would not fit; this was my first RTR experience. The dress was amazing, though! The color was exactly as in the picture and it fit true to size. For me, it was loser up top and a little tighter in the thigh area, but overall amazing. I am shorter, but the 2R length wasn't unbearably long. People complimented the dress all night and it was pretty comfortable. 100% recommend! (All my friends used RTR for prom and we were all really happy with our dresses.)

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to prom and I was so happy. It fit perfect. And the return was super easy.
links_reviews_text: It was true to size

I got this for my junior prom, and it fit me perfectly everywhere except the bust. I'm a B cup, so a little on the smaller side, but I still expected the dress to fit better than it did. I managed to work it out, but I had to be pulling the dress up all night. Other than that, I adored it. I felt incredible and got so many great components all night, including one from someone who said I looked like Grace Kelly! It was a little hard to dance in because it's form fitting, but I didn't mind because it brought out curves I didn't know I had! The material is great, nice and thick but still feels light and flowy. It was the perfectly length with my heels, so I'm glad I didn't get a long like I considered. I highly recommend this dress and this whole site!
Loved the dress but it was not the material I originally thought. It fit really well but I did have trouble pulling it over my hips.

Originally I ordered a 4R because thats my original and regular dress size, but I actually ended up wearing the 6R because the other size would not even get over my hips! I was overdressed for the event, but I didn't care because the dress that I was wearing was classic and super flattering on. I wore a strapless bra with it and it was perfect. Highly recommend getting a spray tan or applying some self tanner so that you don't look washed out with the nudeish-tan-pink color !!

I ordered this dress because I wanted to rent the same Jill Jill Stuart in blush but they didn't have my sizes for the dates I needed. I was really happy with the dress!! The color is definitely more of a beige with pink tones than "pink" (although the flash in these pictures makes it look much more pink) still it was perfect for spring. I ordered the 4R and 6R based off of reviews from the blush color, the dress fit everywhere well except it was a bit tight on my chest which unfortunately is quite common for me. I am 5'3 and a 34D, the dress zipped up and I survived the night, but was one of those situations where I couldn't exactly take in a big deep breath all night. This dress does NOT have much give, I wore this to an opera event so I was essentially sitting all evening.. definitely would not recommend it if you plan on dancing the night away. I opted for my shorter more comfortable heels for the evening so in the picture it looks like it's dragging a bit on the floor but it wasn't an issue, would be normal length with average heels. All in all the dress was beautiful! So glad I chose this dress.

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress and was super flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit was amazing - hugged my curves in the right places. I am bigger up top (32 DD) and was super nervous about fitting into the dress but it was perfect and I didn't have to wear a bra. At 5'2 the dress was way too long, so I would rather have gone with a petite option.

Beautiful gown that will give you that hourglass silhouette. Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for backup. The bust is definitely more fitted and has a built in bustier, so it's best for smaller cup sizes. The waist and hips are more fitted with little to no give in the fabric, so I'd recommend sizing up for curvier hips. At 5'7" I would have preferred the long length to accommodate 3-4 inch heels. Pair with gold jewelry!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my daughters first prom...she absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 0 and 2...the 2 was a perfect fit. With 4in heels on, the length was perfect as well.

I LOVED this dress! I wore it to a gala with my coworkers and it was perfect. I'm 5'3, 120 lbs, and I wore the size 2. It was a little longer than I would have liked (hit right above the knee), but the classiness made up for it. I have a pretty small chest (32B) and this fit me perfectly, so it could be tight for anyone with a larger chest.

I wore this to a gala and got so many compliments. Was told it was the perfect lbd and it was! My only wish was the the bodice had some stretch - by the end of the night it felt a little uncomfortable due to being tight. Overall so so pretty and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this beautiful dress during my pinning ceremony. I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress simple yet elegant. It is a perfect little black dress.
This is a great dress for Apple shapes who feel good about their legs. Quality, heavy fabric. This dress stayed put for a lot of dancing.
Material is very nice. Very flattering. I could fit Into the 8 but was a little tight in the chest, so I wore the 10 for more comfort. Loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great take on the little black dress! Fun for a company holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and got lots of compliments. Super comfortable; well fitting; light, soft, stretchy fabric. Could have been a run-of-the-mill LBD but the asymmetrical skirt and peep of petticoat made it fun and stylish! I'd recommend wearing a bra if you're over an A-cup, otherwise you get spread out in an unflattering way.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, practical dress for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and let me move without any hang ups! It is a super fun dress but not too flashy and offers full coverage! Wore to a work party and felt perfectly dressed! I'm short at 5' 2" but the size 6 still fell wonderfully at mid-thigh. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to cocktail causal event for work.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly on my petite frame - not too long in the skirt or torso. Perfect flare at the waist. I would have preferred not to wear tall boots; however, I was working this event and wasn't going to be sitting, so comfortable shoes were needed. This dress was comfortable all night, perfect for an event with lots of people - didn't get hot or cold, and I got tons of compliments. Highly recommend, and there so many options for accessorizing.
Great dress, incredibly comfortable and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Great take on a little black dress.
links_reviews_text: this was my first rent the runway experience and it was super smooth. the dress fit great, arrived ready to wear, got lots of compliments, and was really comfortable.
I love this dress so much! I wore it to an indoor/outdoor wedding. I didn't want to be too formal and this was perfect. The lace adds a fun flair.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was very classy for a wedding and I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'0", 120ish lbs. and it fit right above the knee. I got size 4 and size 6 but ended up going with the 4. I paired it with a gold necklace and it really tied the whole thing together!
Everyone complimented it and it's super comfortable and flattering! The shoulders were a little tight for me but other than that it was great!
Dress fir comfortably. True to size.

I ordered this for graduation. I wanted something elegant but comfortable for the entire night. I looked at all the customer pictures to help me select what shoes went best with this dress. This dress was beautiful, comfortable, easy to move around in and fit so nicely!

This is the second time I've rented this style of dress by Slate and Willow. I previously rented a blue one. I am in love with this dress and will be purchasing either this one or the navy. It fits me perfectly, is so comfortable. The length is perfect for work or a wedding. Basically this dress is just the best!!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a black-tie event for my job.
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress! I was working this event versus attending it, so I needed something that was easy to move in. I ordered a 4 and a 2 and went with the smaller size, but it still had plenty of room so I didn't feel like I was suffocating. The only bummer is that this dress doesn't have pockets. If it did, it would have been that much more amazing.
Fit was great for my body type and the length was perfect!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a wedding
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! It was super comfortable and so flattering. I got a ton of compliments wearing it.
Wore this for a baby shower. Comfy LBD with a minor twist. Nothing crazy but an easy dress to wear if you want to dress up a little.

links_reviews_title: This little black dress is perfect for a cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect for a cocktail party or work event. The fabric was fantastic! It was both thick and stretchy and the length was not too revealing. I received several compliemnts throughout the night.

I really loved this dress. I wore a size larger than I normally would have, since I'm still trying to lose the rest of my baby weight. Anyway, it made me feel closer to my pre-pregnancy body. I received so many compliments. The only con ( which really wasn't too bad) is that I'm a 34DD and the dress was a little snug around my chest. However, I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my husband's formal work party.
links_reviews_text: The dress was super flattering. I received lots of compliments. I am 5'4" tall, 132 pounds, and a 34D. The size 6 was a perfect fit.
Pros: Size, Comfy Cons: None

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun dress with just the right amount of lace
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a "jewels and jackets" party, very big, very fancy. The dress looked lovely. I danced all night!
I wore this for a gala that was cocktail attire. The fit was perfect and flattering! It hid my tummy which is my problem area and it wasn't too short. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for my boyfriend's work holiday party. It was fhe perfect amount of classy and fun
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the bust when zipping up, but i felt comfortable and good in it all night!
Fun dress for a night out - wore it to a comedy show then dinner. Fits well and not too tight. Good length - will rent again

The dress is beautiful enough to be worn to a cocktail party, but i wore it to work. I got so many compliments and my fiance really loved it! The chest area felt a little bit tight at first, but when I switched to a lower profile bra, it fit beautifully. The length is perfect for my height - it hit just above my knee. Still respectable for the office but not too long to shorten my frame. Would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Felt so beautiful! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a formal christmas party. This was my backup dress. I received so many compliments, which sold many ladies to RTR. It was a fun and comfortable dress!
I rented this for a rehersal dinner for a Catholic Wedding! The dress is so flattering and I felt comfortable all night! It runs true to size and you can wear your normal bra underneath!

The dress is really cute and was a perfect, flattering fit on top. I'm a 34C and have a narrow back/shoulders. The skirt part was a little too flared and i felt it made my hips look larger than they actually are. I chose to wear a backup dress, because of this. It's a really nice dress and would be perfect with someone who isn't as 'hippy'.

This dress is so gorgeous. I wore it for my husbands work party and it was the perfect mix of class and sass. It is very comfortable however, a little tight on the arms but nothing major that you couldnt wear it. I have a larger bust and broader shoulders so this may not be an issue for everyone. Great dress!
This dress is simple but so flattering. It's also very classy and goes well with gold accessories. On top of that, it's super comfortable.
I loved this dress! I did end up using the backup larger size as it did run small. I would also pair with a statement necklace as the neck line is quite simple.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments. Great for dancing.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Friday night wedding at a country club. Paired it with some sexy black heels. Very comfortable material. Cons: Lining under sleeves keep poking out (due to the way it was pressed) and a minor snag in the lace in front, but only noticeable to me.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. Cute dress can be worn for either work of evening.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8 but got the 10 just in case. 8 was too tight around the back. 10 fit perfectly. Very comfortable.
True to size fit. Just enough details to separate it from the standard LBD.

I rented this for my 14 yr old daughter. It was perfect for a conservative military event. It was flattering and comfortable and, most of all, age appropriate. She's 5'8" and 140lbs, very athletic. The length was great for her. She thought it was a little plain but I thought she looked beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Classy with a hint of fun
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I rented it for a work fundraiser casino night. I fit into both the 6 and the 8 easily, but wore the 8 just for comfort-sake because it was a bit more loose in the arms and chest. It was a great design - simple, classy, and modest, but also with a little bit of fun to spice it up with the lace on the bottom. I wore it with black tights as you can see, so I had no issues with the length but at 5'10" it may have been just a tad too short for a work event without tights (at least my preference!) Fun rental to dress up with statement necklace or shoes!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and fit true to size
Loved this dress. Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit amazing! I wore with a strapless bra to help keep it up, but could have gone without it. Comfortable to sit and dance in!

I am usually a size 6/8 in dresses and the L was super tight. I sucked it in the entire event because this was my last option. I am petite 5'2 and weight 150. I could not believe how tight the dress was for a size L, don't get me wrong it was beautiful i got so many compliments, but trust me when i say SIZE UP!

I love this flirty dress by Yumi Kim! It runs true to size so we suggest going one size up for your back up. This style is fitted at the waist and hips but is not too tight. Its great for any cup size and can be worn with a strapless bra. At 5ft, the length hit tea length on me. Pair with nude heels and a bracelet to complete this look!

The dress fit tightly and if I was willing to wear spanx I'd have worn this to the wedding I am attending this weekend. I'm going with a different dress with thicker fabric, but perhaps for a shorter event I'll rent this again.
The dress was too big in the straps and chest area. Couldn't wear it.
Dress was cute but too tight
Beautiful dress for a spring wedding. Runs small so would suggest sizing up. Very curve friendly!
Beautiful color, nice fabric. Wasn't able to wear it to my event due to it running small

links_reviews_title: Event staff voted me best dressed of the evening....
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress, but I LOVED it! It is the perfect combination of "fancy" and "comfy". The lace and strapless top, as well as the illusion hemline made it fancy. The fact that I didn't need any spanx, bra...and don't have to yank up the strapless top all night is what made it comfy! I got compliments all night. Easy to dance in, and easy to dress up or down with jewelry/shoes choice.

links_reviews_title: Classy, well-made, and comfortable dress - would recommend.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit, and loved that it had pockets!

I wore this for a wedding and got tons of compliments. My husband was in the wedding party and in a tux so I wanted something classic and chic. The fit was flattering and the strapless made it through hours on the dance floor. I usually wear an 8 or 10 depending on the fit through the hips and the 8 fit well. Highly recommend!
This dress fits me perfectly. I love the fabric and workmanship and look forward to wearing it to an upcoming wedding. The photo doesn't do it justice.

As a person with a small bust I was worried this would slip but it was perfect! The details in the dress make a black dress go from plain to beautiful and everyone kept asking where I had gotten the dress from! I sized up fearing that it would be tight at the waist and hips seeing that I have big hips but I don't think that was necessary at all. Definitely would recommend this

This was my backup and I ended up wearing it to a recital. It's style & fit was just so fun! It did fight a bit tight in the rib cage- I had to switch to a less padded bra to get it to zip up! The rest of the dress was flowy & fit normal. No spanks needed for this one! I loved the sheer lace on the bottom- it really gave it a modern style. It was comfortable & never fell down or showed too much cleavage. There's an elastic strap & hook inside near the waist that helps it stay in place- clever design idea! I would love to rent this again! It's a great dress.
The dress fit perfect! I loved it so much!!!

This dress fit perfectly. I rented this one as a back up, and was super happy I did. I wore it with a strapless bra. It stayed put all night. I didn't have to keep pulling it up. The material is thick and heavy, but flattering. The details are really pretty. No cons to this one. Would def. rent again!

links_reviews_title: The style is flattering, party perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: Pros - super flattering, snug in all the right places and flared in all the right places.

So sad I didn't get to wear this. The "recommended" size was an 8 but for me I always size up if its a side zip because side zip just doesn't like my bigger chest. So this was too small. I honestly think a 10 would have been too small too. But it's a very pretty dress..

links_reviews_title: Cute but not a show stopper
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress. It had pockets, was extremely comfortable and stayed up with no concerns. The lace is heavy so maybe not for summer. Also I've notice with this brand that the top is very fitted but the hips are wide. I rented one other one and had the same issue only due to the style the extra fabric in the hips was more prevalent. This was my back up and it worked out well.

With the inner band cinching the waist in I felt like a snatched queen. It was my first time trying out a strapless dress and I didn't have to pull it up once throughout a nice of dancing! Gave it 4 stars because after dinner I couldn't really breathe anymore and the dress does not stretch but that's a personal overeating problem.
Nothing special except v comfortable and love pockets. High quality
tight in the waist
The dress was great. I usually wear an 8 or a 10. There is a strap around your waist so it doesn't fall down at the top. Super comfy and flattering.

I really loved this dress but had to wear a larger size because the rib cage area is really narrow. I wear a 36C and could not zip up the 8, the 10 was tight, but able to zip. This gave me a more blousy fit on the skirt. Overall, I loved- maybe the cut isn't quite right for my shape.

I rented this for my kid's sweetheart dance and it did not disappoint. The fit was true to size and the pockets were a major plus. I did wear a bandeau bra as mentioned in other reviews for more coverage. I danced the night away and it was super comfortable.

Fit was true to size and maybe the slightest bit bigger than expected. Length hit me right at the top of my knees. The cut is low so be prepared with the right bra or tank or cleavage! There is a slight black sparkle underneath the red jacquard. All-around, it's a pretty, fun dress!

Wore this to an evening wedding in the fall. The dress was really cute and mostly fit well. I found the straps to be quite long though, which lead to WAY more cleavage than I was comfortable with. I was able to pin the straps to be shorter so it was less revealing but, as you can see from the picture, it was still quite a lot of cleavage. Otherwise, super cute and it has pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Tasteful texture in a plunging cut with a great flare
links_reviews_text: I didn't have enough cleavage without a bra which was definitely visible in this plunging cut. The dress has a great texture to the dress and a beautiful flare to hide my lack of hips. It was a pleasure to wear.

The fit was true to size in every way except in the bust. I’m a small-chested woman so I ended up wearing a padded push-up bra to help me fill the dress out. It is lower cut in the neckline than I expected, as well, but luckily the bra I had worked well. Pockets were an added bonus! Super cute and I got tons of compliments on the color and pattern.

links_reviews_title: 16 weeks pregnant! Super flattering, loved the pockets.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was super comfy and the pockets were amazing. Also I was 16 weeks pregnant for this November wedding and the dress made me feel great. I wore a black tank underneath even though I didn't think I would because the cut was a little too low for me for a wedding, but it was also really pretty without it - as long as you have the right bra for it. This dress material really isn't stretchy at all, so don't expect it to give. Overall I really liked it and thought it was perfect for what I needed it for.

This dress is surprisingly light weight and I love the woven pattern. It is much cuter in person than what comes across in photos. It's actually a sparkly blue instead of black accent which surprised me but great for fall! I wore this to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding and it was the perfect length. The dress did have some fit issues for me- it was extremely tight in the waist (I am usually an 8 but this one I wish I had a 10) and hard to zip but then was huge in the busy and shoulders. I had to pin across the back to bring the straps in and then tape around the bust to keep everything in (and I am not large chested at all). That being said it was great to have pockets and I got so many compliments! The dress did have some pulls in the fabric when it arrived so just be careful about tucking those back in if you rent it.

I thought this dress was perfect for the winter wedding I went to. It was a little snug up top but I have a broad back and shoulders so that's normal for me. I wasn't able to wear a normal bra due to the fit and how low cut the dress was on me but I did wear a low cut sticky bra and felt fine!

Was a great heavier material for a very cold new years eve wedding and it was nice to not be in all black like everyone else! The chest runs a little big at the clevage area and the lining rolls out around- especially when sitting. But i kept messing with it all night thinking i was going to fall out. If i had gone down a size it wouldnt have fit right under my bust. I supposse double sided tape would have taken care of it but i didnt have time to grab any. Overall very cute, flattering and wonderful dress and experience.
Great dress for the office Christmas party. But the reviews did war that there would be ample cleavage. Easy fix with a bandeau top. Thicker material was nice too in the winter temperatures.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: This dress was BEAUTIFUL! I got so many compliments on it. It was a bit low cut, but i'm pretty gifted in the chest area so it filled out well. The material wasn't heavy. It was flowy and easy to dance and move around in. The only issue I had, was in the chest area. The black from the inside of the dress was popping out, if that makes sense? Almost like the fabric from the inside was rolling over onto the outside... but it wasn't anything that would make me not want to wear this again. I actually wish I had another reason to wear it!

The fabric is heavy and perfect for colder weather. Easy to wear with a lower, plunging bra. Flattering and comfortable, but a very low neckline. Be advised that it is a good amount of cleavage. Otherwise, a beautiful print and great dress.

This was a backup dress when my original couldn't get to me in time, but I surprisingly liked it! My only complaint about it was that it was VERY low cut, and I had to wear a camisole underneath because I felt uncomfortable showing so much skin at a wedding. If I hadn't had to wear that, I could've definitely gone down to the 6. Overall, it was comfortable and fun for a wedding!

I wore this dress to a Casino Night and it was perfect! There's even diamonds on it! As you can tell, there's opportunity to show some cleavage if you want. I just used one of those sticky bras. I loved this dress! It fit true to size and was a great length. No cons to this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress is super comfy but the lower neckline made it feel dressier and sexier.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear for a fall wedding, warmer due to the heavier fabric but not too warm because of the sleeveless style. And pockets!!

I loved this dress! It fits true to size for a less well endowed woman as myself. The pockets were a huge plus. I didn't even carry a purse. The only con is that there was a small snag in the dress that I remedied with a safety pin.

I wore this to a work event. Runs pretty true to size. I have a smaller chest and it was very low cut so bigger chested girls be careful! The only thing I didn't like was the skirt had more fabric then it needed. It did tend to poof out in some areas. Overall happy with the way it fit and was perfect for the event.
Beautiful dress and I received many compliments but a little tight in the bodice. Great fabric, structured yet light weight, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take this off!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a date night at the theatre and didn't want to take it off! It squeezed in the right places and was the perfect length and fabric for a chilly night. I want to rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great holiday dress - lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. It has a plunging neckline but is nice and snug (not too tight though) so that I wasn't afraid that I was showing too much. I wore this to a military holiday party and did not feel like it was too revealing. It was a fun party dress and I loved it. The material is thick - it was great for winter.

I got this dress thinking it was a print on silk fabric, but the whole thing was embroidered. Such great attention to detail! The cut was very flattering, and I love that I got to show a little skin without it being too revealing. Oh! And the best part? THE POCKETS! I'm a huge fan of dresses with pockets. Not to heavy, not to hot (for dancing). Overall, it was a fantastic dress.
Loved the fit and color, but especially loved the pockets! Perfect for my formal office holiday party!

links_reviews_title: POCKETS. Just can't beat a comfortable party dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and perfect for a Christmas cocktail party. The cut is a little lower than I expected, but it made it seem a little more elegant. The shirt is much more full than I expected it to fall, so some angles don't look great on this dress! The material is woven, and the dark blue sections have a little bit of a sparkle/shine to it. I wished the waist hit a little lower - but this would be PERFECT for someone with a little bit of a stomach (or even a lot of one). The pockets were deep and I carried my phone, lipstick, gloss and a hair pin without it showing. I am 5'5, 32DD-34D and weigh about 140. Depending on the dress/style, I can sometimes be between a 4 and a 6. The 4 was perfect - maybe even SLIGHTLY large. It does have a little give to it - but do not plan on it melding to you. The 6 was way too big and VERY low. I didn't wear a bra and was comfortable all night. The material is a little thick, perfect for a cool (not cold) night without a jacket. I'll definitely keep this in mind in the future.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove, fabulous winter material!
links_reviews_text: This was the first dress I've rented that I genuinely wished I could keep. It is super comfy, festive without being too flashy, perfect for family Christmas party. The material is embroidered without feeling heavy at all, and it has pockets which I absolutely love! It has the tiniest bit of shine to it in the dark blue undertones, and just glints when it catches the light. It is low cut, but not to the point of feeling uncomfortable- and you don't need some kind of special bra. You can wear a pretty standard low. It bra. Awesome dress!

This is a very flattering dress and much more luxe in person. It's very low cut so you'll either need some tape to keep everything in place or (if you are attending a more conservative event) a cami. Easy to wear and I loved the pockets!!!

I wore this to a mother daughter concert in a nice hotel. It was stylish and chic. I'm short so maybe it was a bit longer (under knee) than I would've liked but I loved how I looked on it. Didn't need a bra and having pockets is always a plus. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Tight in the chest but super cute
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress since it was a bit too revealing in the chest for my personal taste. The pockets were a big plus and the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great holiday dress. Deep red color and a little bit of sparkle!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 4 because the 6 (my normal size) wasn't available. I thought it would be ok since it was quite flowy in the hips. I was able to wear it but the area around the rib cage was very tight. I'd recommend going true to size for this one.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress - unflattering if you have a pooch!
links_reviews_text: I still have some lingering baby weight in my lower stomach and this dress highlighted that in a very bad way. If I didn't have that, this dress would have been lovely.

It fit great, and was perfect for a fall wedding. I HAD to wear a cami underneath because I have a very small bust. It was also a little longer on me, it came down below my knees. It still looked nice and got a lot of compliments on the dress. And the pockets are always fun! I would rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear - did not fit (too small)
links_reviews_text: I bought this dress in the size I normally wear, it would not zip closed.

links_reviews_title: This dress is really cute and comfortable. It was my 2nd choice and the 1st fit so I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: It was a little short on my 5'8 frame, and was really low cut. Very comfortable and pockets are always a bonus!

links_reviews_title: ended up just wearing for work, not for an event
links_reviews_text: Lowcut a bit and the skirt was a bit unflattering- largely due to the pockets!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear but very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Very cute and extra flattering. The fabric is a bit more stiff than I expected but not bothersome. Very low cut in the front. I'm busty so I felt uncomfortable showing that much cleavage and would not be able to wear a bra.
It was comfortable and a great fit!

links_reviews_title: gorgeous dress, very nicely made, sexy neckline
links_reviews_text: slightly large, probably could have used a 2

links_reviews_title: This was a gorgeous dress with thick fabric and great detailing. Loved the pockets!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for church for a Christmas program. It is very low cut and shows lots of boob so I wore a black camisole under it and a black cardigan over it.
Not a lot of give. Tighter fit in the ribs and back but beautiful dress. Absolutely loved it!
Plunging neckline didn't feel comfortable so I never wore this dress. Loved the fabric and fit.
It was super comfortable! It's a nice heavy fabric that hangs nicely and has a side zipper for easy in and out

Really comfortable stunning gown. The bustle and skirt detail make this a really fun black dress. I wore this to a black tie optional wedding and dressed it up with shoes and jewelry. The length was perfect on me, I'm 5'4". The cascade came to my ankle. Fits true to size or a little big- I wore a 4 and normally wear a 4.

This photo does not do justice to how gorgeous and chic this dress was. It fit like a glove. I wore it to a black tie gala and while it fit in perfectly, it was edgier than other more formal gowns, which was perfect. I didn’t want to take it off! LOVED this dress!

This is such a unique piece from ADEAM! The style is a LBD with flare. The back folds and then ties to create an awesome structured train. It runs true to size and I would recommend sizing up for your back up. It is fitted at the natural waste and flared at the bottom which give comfortable room at the hips. The fabric has no stretch and at 5"10" the lowest part was above my knees. Dress this style up or down!

I rented this dress for a gala with a steampunk theme and this dress was perfect because it gave it a modern edge. The hem and the bustle on this dress is amazing. The fabric has some stretch to it and is on the heavy side--great for winter. I loved this unique dress.

This is my favorite dress in the entire NYC store at the moment. It's structure and architectural details make for quite a statement. I wore this to work and had everyone gagging. I paired it with the Asilio Moto jacket. RENT this dress for a fun play on your everyday wardrobe. Bravo, ADEAM!
The fabric had a good amount a stretch and the was think and heavy. It felt fabulous and funky with a ton of elegance. Loved it!

This dress draws lots of attention. I was stopping ladies in their tracks. So many lovely compliments. I think this dress is a bit conservative and maybe for a more mature woman, but I love it. The fabric is thick and a bit heavy. Great for fall. There is a high slit on the shorter side, but easy to keep closed. I will rent this one again! It fits roomy for a 6.
So obsessed I wish I could keep forever!!

I wanted to love this dress! Very cool, fabric is substantial and great quality, you don't need Spanx or any other fancy underwear to wear it comfortably. However, the skirt/tie thingy was a stumper. I could not figure it out--this dress needs instructions. I sadly had to send it back.
I wonder if I just didn't figure this dress out. Wasn't sure what to do with all the fabric and the side buckle. I tried a couple of different ideas but nothing worked. Sent it back.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments all night. Super cool look without being too sexy. For a work/evening function.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, very cool.
I didn't understand the bustle, was a distracting ribbon/silver ring attachment. Seemed short-waisted on my tall body. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Sexy & love the craziness of the style, very versatile
links_reviews_text: Sexy & love the craziness of the style, very versatile and fits beautifully. great fabric
I think you need to be tall to work this dress. It was not figure flattering and gave saggy look. Did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Woukd have been ok, but therewas a different dress that fit better.
links_reviews_text: This is a great style but didn't fit me well. Needed to be tighter in waist to show off the design. I probably needed a zero rather than a 2.
Beautiful statement dress! Had some stretch and very comfortable to wear.
Didn't end up wearing.
A very unique dress. I did not think I would like it, but it had a lot of movement and interest developed in the lower half. It was a dr as you can feel "cool" in.

So, I didn't actually wind up wearing this dress because the bustle made it a much "bigger deal" than I needed for the occasion I rented it for. It's an incredibly fun and visually interesting dress that might feel costume-y if you don't wear it confidently. Also, it weighs a ton. I'll rent it again when I have the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, unique and fun to wear
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect and had a nice stretch to the fabric.

Loved this dress and wish I had a picture of it. I'll be sure to take one next time I rent it - and I will rent again. Stunning dress that was very unique. It is a heavier dress. It hangs perfectly with the weight but definitely not something for hot weather. I am 5'3" so the low parts of the dress was almost floor length. Paired with edgy strapped booties and got compliments all night.
Super comfortable. Runs a little short so I went up a size. Lots of compliments!
Loved the fit. Very comfortable. A bit short which is ok by me!

Wore for a night out in NYC for a friend's bach. Since the bride was going to wear black, we decided to wear something different, so went for a pop of color with this amazing dress. Was so cute and super comfortable. Probably don't actually need to wear a bra, but did due to NYC summmeeerrrr. The dress fit really we on me since I have large hips, but fell nice and didn't ride up.

I wear between 8 and 10 in dresses. This was a tad big but it worked well. There is no zipper so that is always nice in case you eat too many chips or something prior. It is very comfortable and well made with a slip built in. The color is vibrant, highly recommend! I am 5'3 135 lbs.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful fit and overall look!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous! I have three kids to chase around. It was comfy but pretty!

links_reviews_title: Cute. Wore it with flats because it is very short but that meant it was dressed down.
links_reviews_text: Runs on the small side. The medium was very snug and it is pretty short.

links_reviews_title: Great color in a sea of black. Classy but sexy.

links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Received so many compliments. Form fitting but in all the right places. Great for curves. Very comfortable!
Loved this dress! It was so comfortable and the slip and lace are 2 separate pieces which ended up working really well. I got so many compliments!
Fits very well, hides bulges and enhances curves. Comfortable fabric

links_reviews_title: I love love loved this dress! It's such a pretty color & I got compliments all night
links_reviews_text: This dress is two pieces: a slip and the lace overlay. The lace is super flattering and I didn't feel like I had to suck in like I normally do which was a plus haha. It runs SLIGHTLY big. I usually wear a size 6 and had size 8 as backup but I probably could have worn a size 4. The arms were loose on me but other than that it looked great and I felt great wearing it! The color is exactly like how it is on the screen - the first photo just makes it look darker because of lighting.

I loved this dress and wore it to the wedding of a close friend. I loved that it was super flattering on my figure but was still conservative enough for me to be a reader and stand in front of the crowd at the Catholic wedding

links_reviews_title: This gown was perfect for a Richmond, VA wedding and was the Bride's favorite color!
links_reviews_text: The Bride choose this beautiful deep purple for her Bridal party and folks thought I was in the wedding! It was very comfortable. I rented a size 6 but could have probably gone with a size 4. This was a very classy rental, and I highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: My friends who attended made the night special.
links_reviews_text: I am usually in between sizes 6 and 8. I went with the 8 because I do like like overly tight fitting clothing. The 8 fit perfectly in every way. The color and style were gorgeous! My picture is making the dress darker than it appears, but it is true to the color in the model picture. The length was also perfect. Not too short and not too long.

This dress is really beautiful. It is TWO separate pieces, the slip underneath and the lace overlay. I accidentally wore the size 14 slip (my backup size) and the size 12 lace overlay, and I was pulling up the slip all night, whoops. And the slip does have adjustable straps, which I really appreciated! The overlay can be tricky-the first time I didn't put it on correctly and I did NOT like the dress. I tried it again a few hours later and did it correctly and was so, so happy. I wore to a late October wedding in Connecticut it and it was perfect for the occasion. I'm in between a 12 and 14 and the 12 was the idea size for me. The lace has nice stretch which I appreciated. Highly recommend!
It's 2 layers and the lace overlay made it a bit more conservative.

This dress was beautiful and super comfortable. It comes in two pieces - the slip and the overlay, which was a gold style for my large bust. My only complaint was that the sleeves were a tad big on me, but not a deal breaker at all! Received many compliments on this one!
I loved this dress because it was sooo comfy!! Lots of compliments too. It comes in two pieces - a slip and a sheer lace dress. You will be cold in cold weather!
I wore this for a gala. The dress was very comfortable. The area where it was knotted was a little bunchy. Overall very nice fit!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and color! Perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The lace is a separate piece from the slip underneath. The lace is not too tight and I was able to move my arms freely and did not feel suffocated. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the DC wedding I attended! Fit really well and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! It flattered my figure well. Definitely good for a winter wedding since it was long-sleeved, but the lace makes it breathable and not too cumbersome. I tried it on in the store, so I already knew how it would fit when it arrived.

I Rented this for a New Year's eve wedding. I normally wear a 10 or 12 and I will typically size up in most of my rental dresses. I rented this in a 12 and a 14 anticipating that the lace could potentially be tight on the arms. I was pleasantly surprised that this dress runs small and the lace has a good bit of stretch and give to it, it actually ended up being too large and rent the runway was unable to overnight me a size 10 due to the holiday, but it worked out nonetheless the lace was just slightly too baggy. This dress was so comfortable and so beautiful, I will definitely rent it again for another event.

links_reviews_title: I was able to get into the smaller size due to the cut of this dress.
links_reviews_text: Really classy for a wedding!

I had a backup dress sent to me in the wrong size, so this was my emergency "backup" dress overnighted to me by RTR. I was a little concerned it was look too mumsy but it was really elegant even though it was conservative and I received many compliments. It's a beautiful deep plum color. Easy to wear shapewear under because the slip under the lace exterior covers it all. It was great for the swanky nighttime Holiday party I attended.
For well, comfortable and classy for a wedding
This dress was so pretty and I wanted to wear it but the sleeves were just too big and baggy looking

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but I couldn't make it work in either size.
links_reviews_text: I tried Rent the Runway for a formal event last year and I loved this dress; however, I couldn't make it work because I am a petite size and the torso length and sleeve length just looked odd. I wish the company carried dresses in true Petite sizes and not just including "petite" as a body type to filter regular sized dresses.

I loved the color & how flexible the lace was - would have made it really easy to dance at the wedding. & loved that the slip was a separate piece. But I ordered my regular size 8 & it felt a bit loose overall. There was a lot of fabric bunching at my hip where the wrap skirt came around which just made it look a little frumpy on me. I ended up going with a different dress that was more sleek on me...& a size 10. so I think this just runs a little big.
Great dress to conceal figure flaws.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous!! It fit perfectly. Fell mid thigh and I'm 5'8" so sometimes dresses that are mid thigh on
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous!! It fit perfectly. Fell mid thigh and I'm 5'8" so sometimes dresses that are mid thigh on other women are mini dresses on me. I got compliments on it all night long.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfy dress! Would wear again. Dark plum color is amazing.
links_reviews_text: In my opinion it runs large. I first chose a 10 as that is a normal size for me and a backup 8 was not available so I chose a 6, really thinking there was no way I would ever fit into it. I ended up wearing the 6 and had plenty of room. Sleeves are a bit long if you are short armed. Slip is underneath and then lace overlay. I’m 5’4” and it hit me just above the knees.

links_reviews_title: Not flattering- loose sleeves, side rouching lumps up
links_reviews_text: I saw other reviewers photos and they look great, but my experience was not the same. I ordered the 6 and 8, but I was swimming in the 6. This dress is intended to be skin tight. Wearing it like a sheath looks terrible. SIZE DOWN! the arms are very wide/loose and if the fit isn't super tight, the side rouching adds weight to the look. It's a beautiful color and the lace is gorgeous, but the fit was just wrong
Loved the dress. Being 2 months postpartum this dress had the perfect amount of give in the right areas. I was comfortable all night and received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and was comfortable

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, not the right fit for me
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but it showed more cleavage than reasonable as I was in the wedding. The lace is lovely and the color is very flattering, but no matter what bra I put on it felt like I was on display because of the dip in the middle of slip's neckline. I'd rent it again if I were going to an evening event or something where I didn't mind showing more skin. I'm just under 5'3 and the length hit perfectly just above the knee. The quality seemed great to me, and because of the overlay design messing around with corsets and slips won't be necessary. Pretty comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but a tad too large
