links_reviews_text: I should have ordered a size smaller as this was too big around the bust. A pretty color -- although I'd have preferred it in black. Basically, it comes in two parts: a 'modesty' slip (with adjustable straps) and a lace sheath over-dress.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments with this dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and the details on the dress. Definitely renting again! I rented a 10 and 12 and could have worn either one but just went with the 10. I'm 5'4 and it was perfect length for me.

This dress is beautiful excellent quality but I didn't wear it because the sleeves are too long ! I'm only 5'1 rented the size 14 and the sleeves were almost 1 inch too long for me. If not this dress would have been perfect.
Beautiful fit and color
Lovely dress!! Rich color. Very classy.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much, I rented it twice!
links_reviews_text: This is the most flattering and comfortable cocktail dress I've ever worn, especially if you've had kids and have midsection issues. It's a gorgeous plum color - I got so many compliments!

This dress is very flattering. It is comfortable and the lace is stiff but not itchy. The slip is separate from the lace, which is great because it is adjustable. I will rent this again. Purple is brighter than pictured. Very pretty
I am 5'4" and 156 pounds, bra size 38 D. I wore the 42 and fit perfectly. Beautiful blouse
Liked this top I'd rent it again. Fit well.
Nice fit and pattern. Wore it over jeans for my bday party.
Very lightweight and flowy. Matched RTR perfect!

I thought it fit a tad small. I knew exact what it looked like but I don't think I like that much floral in the print. I️ thought it was a little busy so it kept you from being able to notice the pretty sleeves. Probably won't rent this again, just not my taste.
Perfect for the changing weather. Loved wearing this with my millennial pink accessories.

links_reviews_title: This brand can do no wrong! Stunning top!
links_reviews_text: Loved this floaty, dreamy blouse! The colors and details are stunning. See by Chloe has yet to disappoint me with everything I've rented. High quality materials and beautiful designs, they can do no wrong!
A fancy top, great for work but I can also see it dressing up jeans
Love Chloe and this was perfect with jeans and sandals!

Pretty feminine top. Great sleeves as pictured from side. Runs true to size but a little to the small side. Comes with separate dainty white silk slip. For me it only looked great paired with jeans and it was way too hot for jeans so I returned unworn. Would definitely have worn if not middle of hot summer.

An elegant and casual top! Love this for a date or weekend trip. This runs true to size and is great for any cup size. There is not stretch in the fabric, so if you are worried about fit we recommend sizing up. This may be worn with a standard bra! Pair this with a simple bag and simple earrings!

I rented this for a breast cancer charity event to dress up with jeans and it worked perfectly! Love the detail on the sleeves and the interesting multiple patterns. I did find it just short enough in length and it was slightly large on me so I may size down next time if I rent it again.
Wore this shirt a few times because it was breezy and comfortable. I never used the camisole. I didn't think it was that see through and the neck was very conservative.

links_reviews_title: I loved this shirt, it was perfect for work and a very cute top to get a happy hour in after.
links_reviews_text: The fit was just right for me. I'm 5'5'' and the shirt came just a little below my waist, if I was any taller it may have been too short. I would definitely rent this again.
Great top. Comfortable and stylish.

links_reviews_title: This is a great blouse to wear during the day or for date night.
links_reviews_text: I wore this blouse a lot and received lots of compliments.
it wasn't very flattering and they forgot the undershirt

Definitely puts me in the mood for spring! This top fit great, I wasn't sure what to expect but the fit was perfect even with my large boobs. I wore it with jeans to work and got lots of compliments. Great top!
easy shirt to wear. The undershirt was a little short but overall easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but a bit too frilly.
links_reviews_text: The blouse was sent without the under slip, and was quite sheer. The shoulders were narrow compared with the rest of the fit, which was loose. The quality of construction was exceptional, truly beautiful.
Love this top, fits perfectly and is so adorable! Would definitely rent again
Couldnt even get this over my head andi am petite
Runs a little short

links_reviews_title: Wore on a date: the top was better than the company!
links_reviews_text: The shirt is lovely, very pretty. It is really short, though. Did not come to the top of my jeans and when I was sitting it left my back exposed (high waist jeans). Not recommended for those long of torso.

links_reviews_title: Cute, flowy, very floral top -- a little short waisted
links_reviews_text: I rented this to have something festive to wear during the day on Valentine's. It was very floral, maybe a little too floral, also flowy and fun. I received several compliments. I'm tall and the shirt felt a little short on me, like I needed another couple of inches of material to hit my waist. The camisole for underneath was rather short. I liked it well enough but woukd not rent again.

This was absolutely beautiful! I received both the main size and backup without the attached cami, so RTR graciously also sent me back-up options, but I still wore this with my own cami. It is beautiful and fits well, perhaps a bit tight and short. I loved this and would totally rent again.
Great casual easy to wear and pair top! Very light weight and flowy, but not see through -- best for warmer weather!

Beautiful floral top. It arrived with out the inner vest - as did the back up size 42 they sent me - innconvenient... I wore the 40 eventually, with an inner top of my own. I didn't like that it was sent with out the inner top especially since we were in communication about it and I specifically said if the inner top was missing then don't send it. Anyway, it is a lovely top. If you dont't mind getting it without the inner top then I would recommend it!
Gorgeous print, easy to wear, comfortable, versatile. Dress it up pr dress it down. Flattering style for nearly everyone.
fun feminine detailing
Fit great, prettt details.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't sure about the mixed florals, but it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, and felt amazing in this blouse.
Great fit. I ordered one size up because I wanted it to be flowy. Received many compliments.
Runs a little on the short side. The ruffled sleeves were awesome. Lovely fabric and design.
I felt very on trend in this top. Super cute, super comfortable, and it feels upscale without feeling dressy.

I thought this would be a little to girly, but I loved it! The ruffles on the sleeves were the stars and the contrasting print made it unusual. Wore it to work with a pair of pale pink pants and nude mules. Received so many compliments. Wasn't able to get a pic but will next time as I will definitely get again.

This gorgeous bohemian dream is perfect for so many things. Pro: loose fit, well placed ruffles Cons: cami was missing (I was informed in advance and wanted t anyway) I wore to work with skinny jeans and nude rockstud flats I wore to a BBQ with olive green shorts and rose gold gladiator sandals. I wore to a cocktail hour with white linen capris and snakeskin heels
Love this top hope to keep it.

I wear a large top and size 44 fit perfectly. This blouse was comfortable and light. I immediately received compliments. I felt pretty while wearing it. It's very versatile, I wore it with jeans and cargo pants.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, floaty top that works perfectly for day or night. LOVE IT.
links_reviews_text: I love this top! Super lightweight and cut perfectly, it is so flattering. I wore it three times before returning, and want it back! ;)

This dress is simply stunning! I teeter-totter between an 8 and 10, however decided to go with the 10. You don’t need a bra with this dress which is amazing. As you can see, when sitting the slot rides up a bit. The only gripe I have about this dress is the small buttons above the zipper in the back, the button holes were so small that it took a while to button them in. The dress is easy to move in and super comfortable.
This dress was PERFECT! I am 5 feet tall and the 0p was the perfect length. I was nervous because we wore sneakers in this wedding, not heels, and the length was great.

I loved this dress, it was actually my back up dress. I’m 5’6 and so I order the long and it was perfect how I liked it covering my feet. It was extremely comfortable. It was nice and flowy which was great for hiding the tummy area. The slit gave a touch of sexiness when walking and dancing.

I love this elegant dress by Watters! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted at the natural waist and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a strapless bra with this dress. At 5’3, the length hit floor length on me. Very beautiful for a gala, wedding or any formal event.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my formal work party!
links_reviews_text: True to fit. I'm a 38DD and didn't wear a bra, but it held up the girls well. Very comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: The dress worked well and was easy to rent.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like it was suppose to and looked nice on me.
Only fault with the dress was the bra padding. It was awkward and unflattering. Overall, the dress was beautiful

Flowey, elegant dress. Waist is tight and there is no give. Very hard to button. But the top is lined and I didn't need a bra to feel safe in this dress. I wore the neck sash behind as more of a halter.

links_reviews_title: Didn't choose this one for the wedding.
links_reviews_text: if you are of a certain size the arm area may make you look like you have 4 breasts.
It was too long for my 5' height and too small around the waist. I couldn't get it zipped and was unable to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Top is very flouncy makes you look larger than you are . Did not wear
links_reviews_text: Color is just as pictured and the material is very nice.

I love this whimsical Stone Fleurette Gown by WATTERS. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size as your primary size and going one size up as your backup. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cups sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this gown so you should wear no bra since it has a halter neckline. At 5'5, the length hit floor length on me. The grey crinkle chiffon material is flowy and the color is a great dark neutral if you're looking for an effortless look for your event. Pair with black heels and diamond earrings to complete your outfit!
Runs very small. Extremely tight around waist

I did not wear this dress. It was my back up and thank goodness my first choice dress worked. This dress works well if you are tall and thin especially in the chest area. Not good for ladies with a short torso.
Loved it! The sleeves are a must to give a special flair to the dress. It's a tight dress and I should had use a spandex to hold the tummy.
Beautiful red, great fitting and flattering dress

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, beautiful shade of paprika dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress arrived on time and was cut a little small in the bust area so I sized up to the 8. I wore this to a patriotic inspired charity event and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Received complements all night. The dress is so fattening and fits just perfect. Loved it!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit for petite ladies

I wore this to a Fire and Ice themed holiday party, and the sleeves were super fun and fiery. The material feels sturdy and was comfortable. My arms did feel a little restricted in movement but I don't really dance so it didn't bother me. This dress does run small; I wore the 6, whereas I usually wear a 4 but it was a very tight zip.

links_reviews_title: THIS RUNS SMALL!! But so cute!
links_reviews_text: The dress zips at the largest part of your body, the shoulders. So even though I'm usually a 4/6 I wore the 8! If they wouldn't have been out of stock on the 6, I would have been out of luck. Dress received so many compliments all night long. The material doesn't wrinkle too easily but once you sit you get those line marks. Pretty color, great fit, fashion forward.
Very tight in the arms. I went with a size 6 because of tightness in arm. Then the waist and butt was a little baggy. I couldn't raise my arms. I still felt beautiful and didn't mind the sacrifice.

I'm generally a true zero and this dress fit is perfection. It was snug around the shoulders to keep it in place, and slightly loose/structured through the waist which made it super flattering. Color is beautiful and received tons of compliments.

This dress is gorgeous! I received compliments all night long. The color is between a red and an orange - which I LOVED. I definitely stood out as a wedding guest! The only con that this dress offers is that there is restricted arm movement - it’s difficult to lift your arms any higher than your shoulders. But I barely noticed that as an issue! I would recommend this dress to anyone!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Wore it to emcee for a fundraiser and felt very confident. Sleeves a bonus!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 6, but found the bodice too tight, even with my little boobs. Size up as a backup if you're worried - glad I did! Because of the cut and fitted quality, I wouldn't recommend trying to get into or out of it yourself. Or trying to drive - you have limited mobility. Finally, the slit is wonderfully sassy, but my usual spanx shorts were too long (and don't try to roll those suckers up unless you want to harsh your own vibe). Otherwise just loved it.

links_reviews_title: I looked great for my son's graduation day.
links_reviews_text: It was tight in the arms and shoulders, but that helped keep everything in the right place. I am a 34 DDD and NEVER go without a bra and I was able to with this dress and was never worried that the girls were in the wrong place. The 8 was tight, but the 10 I had as backup had a faulty zipper that came off track and I had to get into the 8. Once in it though, it was fine and I didn't feel like it was too small. I received lots of compliments. This dress is more orange than true red.
Fits true to size. The only con I have is the slit on the side is higher than I thought. It still worked great, but definitely shows some leg when sitting down.
Loved the dress, a little difficult to move in though. Would rent again.
You can't move your arms, but who cares when you look that good
The fit was perfect, I got a size 0 and I have a smaller chest but thicker thighs so I was worried it would be tight but it was perfect.

Dress was on the smaller side, however I do normally wear a size 6. I was at my husband's work banquet themed as Havana Nights... the dress was perfect for the evening. I received a ton of compliments and I felt amazing. There is some restriction in the movement of your arms above your head but I had no trouble dancing. This was my first RTR rental and will not be my last!

links_reviews_title: I fell in love w this dress and wish i could have worn it more than one day.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for my rehersal dinner and ive never been more complimented more. I loved it! True to size..maybe a tad small but im a size 6 and was able to wear a 6.

links_reviews_title: Color is great, comfortable - Havana Nights!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear at 4-6, but I am large busted (34 DD) and the 6 was VERY tight in the chest. Fit everywhere else fine, but if you are big busted, I would go a size up unless you want to be smashed. You don't need to wear a bra for sure, but I wore spanx. You definitely need a backup size, because there are lots of areas to "fit" - chest, arms, hips. But I loved it, and would definitely rent it again. I looked at all the accessories - and it was common to just wear big chunky earrings and no necklace.
Love this dress! It feet great just a little tight in the bust. I would totally recommend getting this dress for any formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but go up one size
links_reviews_text: Unique and flattering but runs small. Color is also more coral than true red.

The neckline, sleeves, and slit make the perfect mix of classy and sassy. I received compliments all night and didn't want to return it. The dress does run rather small in the waist and hips so I sized up. It also is more orange than it appears in the picture, but that might be from wear and tear (the dress was pilling in a few areas). Overall, a great rental but would love to maybe see the one I wore retired and replaced.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper and looks great on women with curves.
links_reviews_text: The fit is tight. I knew I was pushing it with a 4, but that was all that was available and completely worth it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing and I received a ton of compliments. Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: True to size. I liked how the 6 fit in the hips and waist but was tight in the chest area. Went with the 8 and felt super comfy- could eat and drink :)

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. Don't wear this dress unless you want to get attention! I wore this for an outdoor wedding in the English countryside and I was bombarded with complements all night. It was fun and formal, sophisticated and sassy. The shoulders were a bit restricting, but not uncomfortable. I ended up changing into a different dress before dancing so I could move better. The sleeves made eating slightly more challenging, but it was worth it.
Compliments all night and was very comfortable! Wished I could keep this dress. Fits true to size.
It was a bit tight but stretched very well . Super comfy, great on dance floor

This dress is an incredibly beautiful color - a true poppy red - and really looks stunning. Make sure to size up if you have broad shoulders. I was worried that the rest of the dress would be too big, but it was still very flattering without being super fitted in the hip area. (Also, the fabric is that nice thick holds-you-in kind.) The tightness of the shoulder area still nipped the waist in well. Also, it was surprisingly comfortable! An important thing to note - your arms are pretty pinned down so don't wear this to an event with a lot of dancing.
I wore this to a Havana themed work event and it was perfect. I loved the sleeves and the length was just right. It was tight in the body, so if you are a curvy girl like me, definitely size up.

This dress is beautiful, the color really pops, but I was unable to wear it for the event for which I had rented it. The shoulder area is so tight I wasn't able to lift my arms to dance. Also, the sleeves are lovely, but would make it challenging to eat without making a mess! Wish this would have worked because I love the look of this dress!

The dress definitely brought attention. It was pretty flattering, however the bust is designed a little odd. I think it would have been a little better with a larger bust. It also doesn't stretch too much, and the length runs a little long. It would be nice for a colder-weather event.

I rented this dress for a Christmas party and it was a hit! The sleeves were a title hard to move around in, but not too bad. Got lots of compliments! The color is more of a tomato red, vs a true red.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for company awards ceremony
links_reviews_text: Felt beautiful! Runs small if you have large busy or booty

links_reviews_title: I was told this dress was made for me!
links_reviews_text: Endless compliments from the fit to the sleeves to the color! It is tight and like others have said you can really only lift your arms up a little below shoulder level. But when I put it on my husband goes "that one" (I had a backup dress). I usually wear a 4 or 6. The 6 I could put on couldn't zip up without fear of ripping - so I opted for the 8. I'm a complete pear. Spanx will be your friend. No need to wear a bra. Black stilettos with chunky statement Kate spade earrings.
This dress was perfect for a wedding with great food and lots of dancing. It was easy to pair with any shoe or accessory. I highly recommend this dress.

Cons: That neckline. Because of the off the shoulder and how it's stitched to the torso, you cannot lift your arms to vertical. Hands on hips was actually rough. Couldn't put on my own shoes. No high fives. No passing a napkin. We didn't dance, but there was no way I could have my arms where they should be in a partner dance (salsa, waltz, whatevs). It was longer than I think it should be, but the slit helps. Pros: That neckline. It was in the perfect spot, it didn't dip down and accented my neck and face was a clean, sharp line. & those sleeves though. They are so pretty. Beauty is pain ladies. And not even pain in this case, just annoying. Those sleeves are gorge and this sexy pirate look was getting a lot of attention. Fit perfectly, hugged my curves correctly. Color was perfect. Think burnt orange-red. It stands out SO much that it's really a wear-one-time kinda dress. But with that neckline, not sure I want to wear it 2 times anyways. Would wear it ONCE though, for sure.

links_reviews_title: Fun and festive for a patriotic gala!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Sleeves are amazing and fit was great!

links_reviews_title: The dress was to die for!! I got so many compliments like best dressed of the night!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly in an 8. I'm usually a 6 or a 4, but went with the 8 and it was amazing!! Only thing was when dancing I couldn't lift my arms up very high as it was pretty snug in the arms, but The dress was so perfect I didn't care!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a knockout! I got so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Th dress is more orange than red. I got a 0 and it ran true to size. It was not as fitted in the waist and butt, which was fine. The arms are a little restricting, you can't lift them overhead, but they were still comfortable and you can still boogie and dance. I am only 5'2, the dress length was fine on me. I definitely would recommend this dress to a friend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - fit like a glove and perfect color
links_reviews_text: This dress is definitely unforgiving. But OMG. It is beautiful! I wanted to buy this dress after renting - I got so many compliments! From the color to the dramatic sleeve, etc. it is the perfect statement dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress is an absolute show-stopper!
links_reviews_text: Go with your size and a size up to be safe. the smaller one fit but I was much more comfortable in the size up. This dress is a no-brainer!!!
Dress was great! I had to wear flats with a long, so if you're 5'9" ish definitely get a long! Felt a little tight in the shoulders but didn't look tight. Very comfortable through waist

links_reviews_title: Loved the richness of color and texture
links_reviews_text: Wore the 6R and could have worn the 4 if not for the lack of room in the chest area. I wear a 34D and the 4 was too tight across the girls. I wore a racer back bra and it worked like a charm. The color was perfect for a November event and the satin material was so soft and comfortable. I was a bit worried about the satin material not being forgiving but the ruffles detract from any unsightly bumps. Overall it was gorgeous and flattering!

Gorgeous dress, green color was amazing. I rented the 10long and 8 long. I wore the 8 long. I am 5'9" and it was not long! If you are above 5'6" I'd say get the long if you plan on wearing heels. The dress fit well, but the seams were a little funky but not too noticeable. I wore this for a black tie wedding in early October. It was perfect.

links_reviews_title: This was my back up dress but I loved it so much that I wore it rather than my first choice!
links_reviews_text: The fit is incredible - it hangs beautifully and I was able to wear a normal bra with it (crossing the straps in back). The material is so soft and the color is gorgeous. I was literally stopped multiple times while walking for people giving me compliments. I have never received so many compliments on a dress. I’m 47 and have had 3 kids so that’s saying something! Mind you, I did wear two pairs of spanx lol. I shared with a few women that the dress is from Rent the Runway! The dress looks so much better on than in the photos. I did wear a bit of double sided fabric tape to keep the ruffles from folding over onto my chest. It worked great!

I needed a dress last minute for a formal event I was attending. This was my first experience with RTR so I was a little skeptical but the dress arrived quickly and in great condition. I'm 5'3" and 115lbs and the size zero fit perfectly! I loved this dress because you could wear with a regular bra (didn't need a strapless bra). It felt so comfortable and the color was gorgeous.

Loooooved this dress! Got many compliments on it throughout the night. It fit well, was beautiful, very comfortable and easy to move in. Wish I could buy and keep! But would totally recommend to anyone!

This dress was super flattering to my hourglass shape, and the ruffle was a nice touch. I got so many compliments on the dress, especially on the color. I am 5'9" and ordered the Long, which just touched the floor with 3 inch heels. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of some gaping in the back along the zipper line. The dress fit great everywhere else, but there was a lot of extra fabric in that area, which was not very flattering.

I am an 8/10 with lots of post baby curves. This dress made me feel like a million bucks. The V neck and cascading curves were extremely flattering. The fit was loose around my hips so I could sit and walk without a problem. I would absolutely recommend this to any other lady! I wore 2.5” heels and it was perfect for my 5’ 4” height. Could have gone up to 3” as well.

Rented this dress for a work gala. I liked that the fabric was silk but didn't wrinkle. The length was good on it as well. Only reason i didn't give it five stars is because the back was a little off from where the zipper has been pulled so many times. Overall a good choice.
The 4 fit great except a little snug in the bust but it worked. I stood out among all the black dresses and loved the shimmer of the fabric. I would definitely rent again!

This is one of my favorite RTR rentals ever!! I got compliments all night on the color and fit and I felt like a million bucks. The dress hugged me in all the right places without accentuating any trouble spots. Love!
I ended up renting this as a backup and not wearing, but it was a beautiful material and color. I'd wear this if another formal affair came up.

links_reviews_title: The dress is very elegant (perfect for any black tie affair), and was as comfortable as a nightgown
links_reviews_text: If you are narrower, I'd consider going down a size. I'm about 5'9 and the regular length was plenty long enough- with heals. I'm small chested and wore bra inserts to add some shape to the gown. I would also suggest wearing seamless underwear to avoid panty lines.

I wore this last night to a black tie-optional wedding. I received so many compliments. The color is just gorgeous, and the material is beautiful--heavy and fitted without being at all clingy. The bottom sort of swishes while walking...super elegant. I didn't have to wear a bra, because it was very supportive on top...which NEVER happens for me. For reference, I am 5'7", 36D, 175 pounds. I have a very broad back and shoulders. I normally wear a 10/12 in dresses, but sometimes a 14 in formal dresses. The 12L fit perfectly (with 2.5" heels), so I'd say this was very true to size.

I usually go for black for a formal affair but decided to go with this beauty. I do not regret it! I usually wear a 6 but the 4 was perfect. It was very comfortable, does not wrinkle and you can wear a racer back bra with it. I got lots of compliments and felt really good in this dress. The only issue was that the zipper didn’t lay completely flat- but it wasn’t enough of an issue to subtract a star.

links_reviews_title: Amazing, amazing dress. Picture on the model does not do it justice!
links_reviews_text: Color is stunning. Fit is flattering but not stuck to your body so you can indulge and enjoy your evening. Plus, you can wear a regular bra. Just the cherry on top of this rental!

Such a great dress for a fraction of the retail price! Great design hides any imperfections of one's physique. Can wear a regular (racer back) bra with it. Doesn't need a lot of accessories. I would rent this again!
It fit great! Not too low cut and very flattering!

links_reviews_title: Great color to wow at a black tie event.
links_reviews_text: Don't let the ruffle in the model pic fool you, it looks great on. Color stood out in a sea of black dresses too. Comfortable, great fit, and you can wear a bra with it. I was worried about the length, but with tall heels I could walk in it without holding it up.
Perfect fit, color and style for a black tie wedding. So many compliments !

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress is stunning!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs large and even the long was not long enough for me (5' 6" with 3 1/2" heels). Now I just completed the whole 30 challenge so I might be totally underestimating my outcome because I was amazed when the size 6 zipped AND was comfortable. You can also see the seams of the dress' lining which was a bummer because I wasn't expecting that type of flaw on a dress of this caliber. The color was absolutely amazing though!

Rented this dress for a work event & it was perfect. Conservative enough to feel comfortable around my boss, while not feeling frumpy. This dress is very comfortable & easy to wear. I was very pleased with the color of this dress, as well. I would rent again.

This dress fit like a glove and felt amazing! The zipper didnt lay flat and it was a little short. But otherwise I felt so glamorous. Also the ladies at the chicago storefront SAVED THE DAY! amazing customer service.

I️ wore this dress to my friend's wedding. Everyone was complimenting me on this beautiful dress. I️ loved I️t. I️t fits wonderful to your body and the length is excellent. Since I️ am tall I️ got a 10L.

Worn for a black tie wedding in NYC! the fabric and color were very glamorous and the cut was very flattering. This was not the original dress I rented but ended up being a favorite. The design and lay of the ruffle draws attention away from your hips. However, I would highly recommend spanx to hide under garment lines ! Work with 3" heels which worked perfectly !

I could not have been more pleased with this rental. The color was more gorgeous in person than in the photo. Fit was as expected. It was snug enough that I didn't need to wear a bra, but you certainly could if needed. Definitely need to wear seamless underwear though with this fabric.
Great length, beautiful color and great from someone with a dull bust.

Dress is true to size, it's a bit long so you do need high heels if you are not tall (I'm 5'5"). The ruffle down the center creates a sexy look without revealing much skin. The color is deep and rich which allowed me to use shades of purple/plum for make-up and accents. Wore the dress to a gala and got compliment after compliment all night. The material is very comfortable, however wearing shapewhere is an absolute must for a smooth look. This is a great dress if you've got curves.

This dress is a GORGEOUS emerald green and exudes class and elegance. SUCH a beautiful color, really. Received so many compliments. It's also SUPER COMFORTABLE, like wearing a silk nightgown. I never felt like I had to suck in and the dress hung beautifully on my frame. It's easy to walk in and sit in. Not tight at all anywhere, yet appeared fitted and hugged my curves beautifully. I'm 5'3", 105 lbs, 32D bust, and I wore size 0R with ~3" heels. I did not wear a bra, but you easily could.

Most beautiful dress I’ve ever worn! I had to order a size down because my usual size wasn’t available, but it fit perfectly! The long size was perfect for my 5’-8” height with heels. Received many compliments and was comfortable all night long.

This dress fit PERFECT! I wore this dress to a formal party and I received so many compliments. The green is beautiful. I ordered this in black at first but decided to get the green as well and I fell in love with it. I got a 10 and 12 to be safe but ended up having to get an 8L because the 10 was a little too big. Go with your true size, it fits like a glove. I also did not wear a bra with this.
Fits a little big but overall it was a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: Ran a 500 person gala in this without an issue!
links_reviews_text: Loved loved loved it!!! So flattering, so elegant, and perfect length for my 5’4” self!

links_reviews_title: Show stopping. Very flattering. Ruffle creates an illusion.
links_reviews_text: Need a full body strapless undergarment.

links_reviews_title: the comfort of this dress was great, especially because i was 4 months pregnant
links_reviews_text: super comfortable and flattering

I got this as a backup but didn't end up wearing it, but I hope I get invited to another event so I can rent it again. Beautiful color and fabric, drapes nicely, figure flattering. Long is quite long - I'm 5'7 and with 2-3" heels this would have dragged.
Rented as a back-up option but didn't wear. Dress was a bit big and loose fitting. Also the long length was too long for me, even with heels. Color is beautiful though.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! Perfect for Mardi Gras. I’m 4mos post-partum so the ruffles were flattering!
links_reviews_text: I could have worn a long but regular was fine. I was able to wear a regular bra.
I ordered this in the longer length, but it was still a pinch too short. I'm 5'7 and this hit right at the bottom of my ankle, which is not my preferred length, and not how it looked in the pictures.
My boobs looked great in this dress. I did have to go up a size to make them fit though.
I rented this for a rehearsal dinner and loved it! Super comfy, great color. I wore a 2, could have had a 0 but still fit well.

links_reviews_title: Such a Flattering dress and made me feel so confident!
links_reviews_text: The 4 fit perfect (like a glove). Loved the color but would only wear it with a little bit of a tan. I have a fuller bust and generally wear a size 27 jeans and the proportions were just right. Got a ton of compliments!

Fit good, a tad bunchy in the front, but didn't look bad. Wore with a strapless nude bra and you couldn't even see it. Lightweight material which was good for a hot outdoor reception. Great bright blue color
Beautiful royal blue color. Flowy dress.

Got so many compliments on this dress! The blouses top and nipped in waistline make your waist look tiny. The skirt flows out when you spin around, so it is perfect for dancing. I wore a halter style flesh colored bra and could have used a bit of fabric tape to help the dress cover it, but it did well and my hair helped too. Would totally rent this again!!!

links_reviews_title: This color was smashing this dress was perfection...I want to own it!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was very comfortable and flattering on a curvy girl like me. It hit in all the right places, wasn't too short, easy to zip up myself and such a light weight, pretty dress for the start of "unofficial summer." I actually wore this to my 41st birthday celebration and received so many compliments. This dress is made well, cleans well and has the little bit of lace to take it to the next level of classy, simple and stunning. This is a definite rental and may be on repeat for me.

Loved this dress for a date with a BFF a Mexican restaurant in San Marcos California. I was on a vacation / business trip. Since I'm a DJ and active on social media for my business, I wanted a dress perfect for a social post. Loved this and got so many compliments. It def was more casual type dress but it could still be perfect for a summer wedding. Hope this helps! - @SoundsByShelly.
This dress was easy and fun to wear, required no spanx or bra and incredibly lightweight. Got lots of compliments. Would definitely wear it again.
A little loose but beautiful dress

Loved everything about this dress, especially the color and the mesh/lace portions. It was also super comfortable, and a cute short length. I am pretty petite, and felt the 2 might have been a hair too big in certain spots (some gaping under the arms). It wasn't noticeable, and I still felt super cute!

links_reviews_title: Dress is adorable.. and a little sexy too
links_reviews_text: Color is amazing... the lace insets are sexy but not too revealing... I wore a strapless beige bra and it did not show.... I'm 5'5" tall and the skirt fell to about 2 inches above my knee
Fit true to size. Loved the color!
I loved everything about this dress. It was fitted but allowed for much movement and hours of dancing. It was easy to accessorize too!
The fit was true to size and I LOVED the color and how it fit my body! This picture doesn't quite capture the beautiful blue color but it was a hit and I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and fun! I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size, was very comfortable and great to dance in!

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable dress with a big pop of color!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my cousins quinceañera. It flatters all over and it was very comfortable. You can dance all night in this dress!

I LOVED how lightweight the material was on this dress; it would have been perfect for the outdoor wedding I'm attending in the middle of August. However, I felt like the dress looked a little "frumpy" on me and wasn't very flattering. I thought maybe I just needed to go down a size but the next size down wasn't available. I did keep this as my backup just in case though!

This dress was really cute and I received a lot of compliments. I usually end up sizing up on dresses because I don't like things super tight but this dress runs large. It was comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: cute flirty dress for a summer outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore a smaller size (than normal) for this dress. Super flirty with intricate detailing. I am larger in the chest (36D) and it may have been the strapless bra, but there was some interesting tugging happening above the chest area (see in picture). Still, the dress was super comfortable and fun to dance in - very flapper/20s vibe. Nude strapless bra worked fine with this dress (area b/w breasts is 80% sheer, so a colored bra will most likely show through).

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I picked this dress the day before I needed it when my original dress was no longer available and it ended up being my favorite one from RTR yet! So comfortable and light yet still dressy enough for a wedding! I would buy it!

links_reviews_title: Great shade of blue for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Super comfortable and even prettier in person. The blue shade was very vibrant, the length was great if you want to show off some leg. The "band" in the middle was forgiving and I probably could have gone a size down, but RTR only had the 8 available. I would recommend this dress for a summer/spring event! I chose nude heels and bag to match the lace.

I'm 4'9" & couldn't wear heels to this wedding because it was outdoors (dirt + gravel) sooo this dress looks a bit long on me. That's not the dress's fault, I'm just tiny! I liked this dress. Lightweight & fun, great color! I just wore a nude bra underneath and it worked for me.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color & the dance floor twirl
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, lovely fabric & color. Fit was as expected; I felt comfortable in the 2, but if I were any taller or bustier I would have worn the 4. Only critique was the wide band waistline; I felt like it was a bit unflattering to my shape. Needed a strapless bra. I am 5'4, 128 lbs, 34B.
I have broad shoulders and am rectangular through the torso (ie no well-defined waist.) This dress was really flattering to my body and a beautiful color. It does require a strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Dance floor fun and pop of color for a CA wedding!
links_reviews_text: As you can see from the pic, I looked really box'y in this dress :( However, the movement on the dance floor was super fun and the color was magical! I dressed it up a little with bright earrings as well, cause it was a tad plain for my taste. I should have ordered the size 4 but I didn't see any reviews that it ran small and I wanted to be able to eat haha I think I just need to learn to pose better haha Lots it compliments and very comfortable for a long night of drinking and dancing!

links_reviews_title: Royal blue with tactful lace cut-outs
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a charity gala for Autism Speaks to Young Professionals (hence, the blue). Everyone really seemed to like this dress (a few people went as to far as to comment on my dress in the photos I posted online). A lot of people were in blue that night, but the cutouts of lace in the dress seemed to make it stand out. The cut-outs are a little see-through, but as most of the reviews indicated, if you have a nude colored bra, it is no problem at all. I wore the 4, because there was too much bunched fabric in the chest area with the 6 (although the fit around the waist was a little bit more snug in the 4-- nothing close to being unbearable, though). I was happy I went with this rental.

I ended up wearing the smaller size which is always great! The smaller dress fit better up top, whereas the larger dress was loose and showed by bra underneath near the armholes. This dress has a cute and flouncy skirt and the cut is very forgiving. It was a little hard to zip up. I was bummed that it was cool and I ended up having to wear my cardigan the whole evening!
Fun dress looked great. Wore it for an office party. Runs true to size .
I rented this for a birthday dinner and the flowy style let me pig out and still feel comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. It was comfortable to dance in all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress was great! It was so comfortable to wear and dance in all night. I ordered both the 0 and the 2 and when trying them on, didn't notice a huge difference between the two sizes. The 0 was smaller on top so that was the reason I chose the 0. I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Descendants Dress Up party for friends kiddos.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so vibrant and comfortable. Love the halter neck.

links_reviews_title: I got a bunch of compliments on this dress, it was a lot of fun.

links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable and true to size. I'm short and have an athletic build so it is hard for me to find a dress. Its a great color and good for all seasons. You can feel comfortable eating and dancing in this dress!
I'm 4'11 and 107 lbs great dress!

links_reviews_title: The cake? The cake made it memorable!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to an outdoor wedding and it was perfect. It was light, airy, and so fun to dance in. It runs pretty true to size but it was snug in my bust. I'm a 38D. If I were just an inch smaller around, this would have been the perfect dress. You can see in the photo that there is some bunching but nobody else noticed and I received so many compliments on it. If it weren't for that issue, I would totally rent it again. I didn't want to go a size up with the whole dress because it fit so well everywhere else. I wore a strapless bra that was not visible at all through the lace in front or by the arms. Loved this dress though. I do recommend it.

Best rental to date. The color was vibrant and beautiful. The dress for true to size. I was able to wear a strapless bra without it showing. The dress appears short in photos but was a great length without being too short. I would love to purchase this dress.

I ordered the 0 and the 2. I ended up wearing the 0 and it was still a little big in the chest. Overall it was absolutely beautiful and perfect for a wedding! I received a lot of compliments. I would absolutely rent this dress again.
Loved the color and pattern. Beautiful cut and length Was slightly baggy in the waist/ rib area but overall great fit

After getting over the initial thought that i look like a cheerleader (the shape of this dress and skirt made me feel I needed some poms), this was actually a really cute dress. Nice color, unique design, the lace was kind of cool, beware that the front slice of lace is actually fairly see through. I did actually receive compliments on the dress.

I loved this dress! I wish I had it in my closet. I wore it to a summer wedding. The color is fantastic. I was nervous the mid section of the dress was going to make me look wider but it was super flattering, photos don't do justice. I put the 4 on and it fit perfect I didn't even try the 6 on.
Summer / spring, casual dress. Thinner material than I expected. Felt very daytime.

links_reviews_title: Great print, fun and laid back dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work with a cardigan layered on top, but it would be great as a more casual piece as well. The pattern is really beautiful and the color combo pops. I found the fabric to be lighter than expected; it would work really well on a very hot day. Check out all of my rentals on my YouTube Channel. I also talk about RTR tips and tricks. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique

Loved this dress for running around in on my vacation this week - would have purchased but still high price for me. Easy going dress with cute details at shoulder and pockets. Nice soft cotton material.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to a school function with a cream sweater.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. I would rent again in warmer weather. The dress was in great condition.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress - got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress!
Normally I wear a size 12. This dress in a size 10 foot well except the shoulder straps kept falling down. Comfortable gauze like material. Has pockets. Has loops for narrow belt (not included)

I like this dress but it was too big. I think I'll rent it again when the smaller size is available. I paired it with a cardigan so the extra fabric around the middle wasn't noticeable but I'd prefer a more fitted look.

links_reviews_title: Great details and amazing fabric design!
links_reviews_text: This dress is incredibly comfortable for everyday wear. It was perfect for a summer concert evening, backyard dinner party and a trip to the seaside. I do have to wear bras with all items, but I just wore one that blended with the straps on this dress and it was still totally fine, unlike spaghetti straps. The details on this dress are darling and make the fit even more special. I am glad that I went with a 0 - this fit and length were perfect. If in between sizes, I would suggest going down and not up, the 2 would have been too large and baggy in this dress. Note that it is unlined (bit of a bummer for designer dresses) but did not change the quality or wear of the dress.
casual yet very pretty. loved the pockets.

links_reviews_title: I'm on a weight loss mission and have gone from solid roomie 16 to a snug 12. So happy to fit a 12!
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely, through waist. A little tight at chest. Fabric is light. It feels like it's missing a belt. It has the loops, but I second checked the picture and done see a belt. still very cute
Easy, comfortable and cute

I don't know what to tell you: This dress fits well, it's got an interesting cut/pattern, has a light, breathable fabric, is comfortable AND form-fitting at the same time...it's literally EVERYTHING you want in a summer dress. The only "con" is that I was stupid enough to return this instead of keeping it for the rest of the summer. Rent it if you find it!
The dress fit nice. I wasn't fond of the color on me.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress that was very flattering and fun for a spring day in the city
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, comfortable for all day wear and received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Not for shortwaisted gals. The straps are too long and make the waist hit to low on your bottom.
links_reviews_text: Frumpy
I wore this dress to Coachella. It was perfect for the hot weather and looked great with a jean jacket in the evening
Material was very light and airy, but a little scratchy. It was a little loose on my chest, probably would do better on someone larger chested than me.

links_reviews_title: Sort of dowdy; didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well, beautiful fabric, but just a dowdy look on me at least.
Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Nice pattern and love the pockets, but I wasn't able to wear it because the bottom was semi-sheer.
links_reviews_text: If you have a slip to wear underneath, it's great. Unfortunately, I didn't so could wear the dress. The bottom half was slightly see-through. It also runs small.

this dress is light so great for summer, but also looks great layered so great for spring/summer. i'm typically a 4, but this runs large and the 2 was better all around. i have a large waist and still had room. didn't bother w a bra, but a strapless wld be best if you wanted to wear one. hit around the knees. pockets were great. really cute pattern, wld def recommend!

Didn't have to wear a bra and felt very comfortable. I'm 5'6" and wore 3inch heels and the length was perfect. The slit is pretty. I just had a baby and didn't know what size I'd be. The top is form fitting but the layered detail in front gives you an extra layer of comfort.
I wore this as a bridesmaids dress and got lots of compliments. The slit made it fun & flirty. I wish it would have been just a touch longer when wearing heels.
Great fit! Long enough and fit through my wide hips. Material was very flowy and flattering. The slit was a little high for my taste but still a very nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Love the whimsical look of this dress.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely not true to size. I had to order a replacement 3 sizes up.
Too small. Could not wear.
This is a perfect dress except the waist seemed frumpy.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning, and in my color! I would buy it if I could for all winter parties.
links_reviews_text: If you have a little extra in the tummy this does accommodate it, but spanx are recommended otherwise it will show. Do not forget the stick-on bra; strapless will still show through the lace on the back. I had to get creative and use clear packing tape and bra fillers. The bust of the dress does not have enough structure to go bra-less unless you have a bigger cup size and could maybe fill it out. I recommend hair up with earrings and no necklace as there is so much detail at the neckline.

Loved this blue dress. The color is beautiful. I received many complements on this dress. The only downside is that is does run small. The arms are very tight so I had to size up. But overall I am so happy with my choice.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. Loved the color and it had just enough embellishments to make it not over powering! Absolutely loved it and received a TON of compliments

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Couldn't wear a bra because of the lace in the back going too low for a strapless. Lace on top was very tight in the arms and was hard to lift my arms over my head. Waist and length were too loose to size up so I made it work.

I’m not a big fan of lace but this dress was beautiful. I ordered size 10 ( my regular size) and 12. The size runs small so I ended wearing 12 and it fit like a glove. I have full bust but was able to go with no bra. Overall great dress and color. Not my favorite RTR rental but I would definitely recommend it.
I’m 5’2” and 130 lbs. A size 6 was perfect.

Loved the lining and quality fabric. Hard to find an undergarment to wear with it so I just went braless. Be careful raising your hands if you go braless, because the sleeves don't have much give and you might have a nip slip! It wasn't really an issue for me, I just noticed this when I was adding some last minute curls to my hair at the hotel. Very comfy.

Dress fit beautifully. I have had 3 kids and didn't even have to wear a bra!!! Obsessed. Lace on arms is not stretchy at all so it's a bit difficult to move arms but I would still wear it again. I can't wait to rent again!!
True to size, shoulders were a little tight, but expected when wearing that fabric/lace
Beautiful dress! Very flattering, as are all of the things from rtr. Love rtr!!!

Overall this dress was great, it fit snugly and I chose to wear the 6 to make sure it sucked everything in all nice like. The sleeves are snug but it wasn't bothersome and I was still able to move around. This dress made me look a LOT thinner than I was at the time. Would rent again. In fact I wish it came in a bunch of other colors too because I would've worn them all to every one of the following weddings I had hat year. Lol. Give this one a shot but be prepared for a snug fit.

links_reviews_title: Be ready to turn heads in this stunning blue dress!
links_reviews_text: This was the second time I rented this dress! Pros: stunning blue color, flattering fit, beautiful lacework, no bra needed! Cons: arms are narrow/don't stretch (didn't effect my movement too much) As a side note: the second time I rented this all of the padding in the top (padding is minimal) was gathered into a knot/ball on the right side of the dress. I was able to smooth it out with some patience but it took several minutes since all the padding is enclosed.

I loved the fit of this dress! It was right without showing everything. I was a little nervous going into it because I've never done a cutout dress but with the lace, it's a great look! I felt incredible all night! This is also perfect for winter because of the sleeves (although I still wore a jacket).

Loved the color of the dress and the material is thick so it hides the extra belly fat. A little bit in my hips and a little tight on my arms. The zipper was really tough so I had to have help getting it on and off. I normally can zip and up zip dresses myself but this one was just way too hard. Overall I loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Stunning blue dressed shined at Veterans charity event!
links_reviews_text: My back up size in this dress became unavailable and I received an email the day before delivery was supposed to take place. I was panicking, but RTR shipped me 2 replacement dresses for free. This long sleeved wonder fit true to size. For back up sizes I'd recommend the next size up compared to your normal size. I received compliments all night on the color and style of the dress and it was comfortable. The laced sleeves and higher neckline give it a classy appeal and the cut out and length make it just the right amount of sassy. Definitely rent this stunning blue number if you have a cocktail type of special event. #renttherunway #gabriellesaustin #parlour3nashville
I am pretty top heavy but I didn't have to wear a bra with this and I received compliments all night! It was a smudge shorter than I probably would've wanted but still loved it and would order again!
The dress fit perfectly and is such a beautiful color. I received many compliments.
Fits true to size, really comfortable, color is very vibrant.
The body of the dress is true to size but the arms do not have much elasticity or give. The dress was a fun look for a holiday party.

The color of this dress is absolutely beautiful, I received a LOT of compliments. The size was perfect throughout until the shoulders. I couldn't lift my arms up for fear of ripping the lace - so if you have broad shoulders for a lady like I do, be very careful in this dress! The only complaint I have was that when I received it, some of the lace in the back was missing/slightly ripped. It wasn't obvious, just a little disappointing. Overall, it's a stunning piece.

links_reviews_title: Very family-oriented wedding where I was a +1. The lace and cut-outs made it fun but still modest.
links_reviews_text: The lace has very little give. I couldn't raise my arms above my shoulders so if you want to spend the night on the dance floor I would opt for something else.
Fit was perfect! The quality of the dress was amazing and the color is just gorgeous!!

I got a size 4 and 6. I ended up going with the 4 . More fitted looked better. I recieved tons of compliments on both the color and the style. I wore this to a black tie event that I didn't want to wear a long dress to.

links_reviews_title: Like so many others have said, this dress draws the eye and I received multiple compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Wish I had kept the photo that my husband took of the back side. The full lace back side is beautiful and a bra wasn't necessary due to the thickness of the bodice in front. I am a 34B. You can't go wrong in selecting this dress!!

This dress was extremely beautiful and comfortable! However, it definitely runs small! I'm so glad I went two sizes up- could probably have gone up another size to make it longer. You don't necessarily need a bra to wear this dress, but I did because I'm so small on top (a nude strapless one). You couldn't see it. I received so many compliments on this dress! Love RTR!

links_reviews_title: 5'4", 165-170, Hourglass. It was a nice dress, but it ran a bit small. Usually 8, but wore 10.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves itched a bit and I definitely wore spanks. However, material it thick which is nice.
Fit great but a bit long for my taste and the arms are very tight but looked super classy!

This dress runs true to size. The color is beautiful. The length was perfect for me. I am almost 5'5". My dress arrived without cups and there was no way to add any or wear a bra. That was the only downside for me.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress and Great Customer Service
links_reviews_text: This was my first experience with RTR and I was so impressed! This dress was sexy but also elegant and perfect for the charity gala I wore it to. I knew that the dress would be form fitting but it was much tighter than I expected. I ordered a size 2 and back up 4. Both were WAY too tight up top and I could hardly move my arms which I was not expecting since I have a small bust- I am 5'2 and 130 lbs btw. I had to have a size 6 over nighted (shout out to Sorayda for her excellent customer service) and it fit like a glove. I got so many compliments on the dress and felt awesome in it all night!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!!
links_reviews_text: I rented both the 4 and 6. The 4 was a bit tight across the shoulders and i felt a little more Comfortable in the 6. I did wear a backless strapless bra to make muself feel more comfortable, but overall the fit was fantastic! I had so many compliments and would totally rent again!

Loved this dress-was perfect for a winter wedding. I was worried about it being a bit small but size 2 fit me perfectly. Lace detailing was beautiful. Was form fitting but not too tight-still had enough stretch when sitting down and dancing.

This was my first time renting from Rent the Runway, and I loved every minute of it!! I wore this dress for a work Christmas party and I got compliments on it the whole night! My boyfriend couldn't stop commenting on how amazing I looked also ;) It was the most comfortable formal dress I've ever worn and it was great for a winter evening. The solid blue fabric is a little stretchy, but the lace does not stretch at all. Overall, I would absolutely rent this dress again and recommend it to anyone!
This dress has lace in all the right places! Sexy dress!

links_reviews_title: Being perfectly dressed for the occasion
links_reviews_text: I was really nervous about renting this dress for a wedding, specifically about it being too risqué for a wedding. It was a perfect combo of sexy and classy for a wedding. I was able to wear a sticky strapless backless bra but I could have gotten away with not wearing one. The dress is not stretchy and has little give, which resulted in me wearing the bigger size (8) (for measurement purposes I'm 5'3" 140lbs and am between a 6 & 8, typically wearing a 6). It is thick which made it perfect for the weather which was in the high 30s and rainy. Would definitely recommend!

This dress is beautiful but does run small. I normally wear a 6 or 8 but with this one I wore the 10. I was able to fit into the 8 but the bodice had absolutely no elasticity so it was very hard to zip up. The 10 fit perfectly & I got so many compliments! You can't go wrong with this one!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress brilliant blue! Sad to send this one back!!!
links_reviews_text: Wedding, fine for dancing, little uncomfortable in armpits but overall fine. Runs a little small, I squeezed into ten but spanx helped. lol! I truly hated sending this dress back, blue was mesmerizing and tons of compliments. Always a good experience RTR!

Arms were a little tight and the dress was a bit difficult to bend over in. Not too short and comfortable (and supportive) enough not to have to wear a bra or worry about popping out anywhere. The zipper was a bit broken and there were a few holes in the lace. It was a beautiful blue color and a great dress for the occasion and weather. I would still recommend and order again.

links_reviews_title: The dress was amazing! Color was beautiful! I got compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: I don't wear dresses very often so I didn't know what sizes to order, I went with 10 and 12 for the back up. I ended up wearing the 10 though I wish I had ordered a 10 and an 8 now, because the 10 was a little loose fitting but at least I was still pretty comfortable. This was my first time renting from Rent the Runway and I don't think I'll ever buy a dress for a special occasion again! This dress was amazing! It was perfect for the my themed Bridal shower and I felt Amazing in it! I received compliments all night long on the dress!
Ordered this for a cocktail party but it was a bit too conservative so I ended up wearing this to church on Easter Sunday instead. Classic fit and perfect for the occasion. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Love the color, love everything about this beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable, the color is beautiful. I will definitely buy this dress.

Really liked this land almost wore but just slightly off. It was too big in shoulders and would have had to pin straps. Requires a bra or it looks like you're wearing a sports bra (makes you flat if you have a chest). Worked with regular "third love" bra but definitely would have been concerned with having to tuck in all night. Clearly has been rented a lot. Not in the best shape (the lace)

Fit very well. Loved the stretch and fabric. It was a good length, although usually I need a petite as I am 5'5". Only minor complaint is that I kept having to pull up the bust so my bra didn't show. I received many compliments!

This was my 8th rental and one is my favorites. The dress was not only gorgeous, but it was a perfect fit and very comfortable. There were two additional layers under the dress so it kept my legs warm (wedding was at the end of December) without it being too heavy or hot on the dance floor. It was easy to zip and form-fitting, but the dress stretched. I also loved the color. I received so many compliments throughout the night. Don't delay, rent this dress! (I'm 5'6", 125lbs., and I wore a 6R.)
Fit was a little looser than expected, but not bad. Color is fabulous, and cut is just right to emphasize all the assets without revealing too much.
Loved this dress. The color was gorgeous! Material was soft and stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, amazing pop of color!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely beautiful, and I enjoyed every minute of wearing it. The color is sensational, especially for a summer event! I wore it to a wedding back in June and received compliments all night! It is very form-fitting, so ladies who like to show off their curves and figures ....go for it! It is rather busy-minimizing, which I don't usually like. But I wore a strapless push-up bra to give myself a little shape, and I was go to go!

links_reviews_title: Worked perfectly as a maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: I've worn this dress twice - once pregnant and once not. I've loved it both times. When I wore it 5 months pregnant, I chose one size up. It's incredibly comfortable and I got lots of compliments. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the last time I ordered it, the buttons on the back/neck closure were missing.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so elegant and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Hugs in all the right places, comfortable, slightly stretchy. The straps were a little loose on me, but I think only I noticed. It was a little long on me. The 2 and the 4 both fit pretty well. I went with the 4 because the straps were less stretched out. The cutout in the back is beautiful. Overall, I loved this dress! I felt so elegant. Would definitely recommend!

This dress fit like a glove and the color was so pretty against my skin. I will say that I am happy I got the L instead of regular length. 5’6 in height and the L stopped in the right place with 3” heels.

I rented this dress for a formal wear Murder Mystery dinner. I am just under 2mos pregnant with my 4th child and this dress was SO COMFORTABLE! The fabric is stretchy and very easy to move in. I wore 3.5inch heels and the dress hit the floor perfectly. I am 5'6" about 130lbs. I would surely rent this dress again! The 2L fit, hit the ground nicely but with being newly pregnant I felt more comfortable in the 4L. My only complaint is that it is winter in MN and the cold air went right through the dress, luckily we were not outside very much at all!
Fit perfect but a little long.

links_reviews_title: Perfext color for Blue tie gala
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! The length was perfect with heels. It was a little snug but it was stretchy. The shoulder straps were way too loose and had to be safety pinned.

links_reviews_title: I am 5'7 and the regular length was way too short. Luckily, I also had a Long that was much better.
links_reviews_text: The top flattens your chest quite a lot, an extra bra helps to look normal, it will flatten a C cup to almost nothing. Very form fitting and a nice dress. Not uncomfortable at all. I was able to breathe, which is nice for a formal dress.

links_reviews_title: Exactly what I was looking for!
links_reviews_text: Dress arrived early, which gave me extra peace of mind! Fit like a glove and received tons of compliments. Color stood out amongst those all in black dresses, which I loved. Long length was perfect for a taller person!

The dress looks exactly as pictured in person. This dress was incredibly flattering, hugged every curve, and camouflaged most of my tummy. The royal blue was bright and beautiful. As, I'm short, my only caution is too stay away from stiletto heels wearing this (for others that are vertically challenged). My heel kept getting caught in the bottom of the dress all night.

links_reviews_title: A lot of compliments on this dress. Perfect for a black tie event
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 4 and 2. I am 5'4" and weigh 120lbs. I have a medium to small frame. Originally I was going to wear the 4 but my daughter told me it was too big in the back so switched to the 2. Although it was very fitting I am glad I went with the smaller size. It was a bit tighter than I typically wear but in the end it was the perfect fit. The material is very giving and easy to move around in.

Stretchy ! Worried it would drag since I'm 5'2". Perfect length with heels. Had problems with zipper and back lace was kind of lose (not tight to skin). Overall, I got a lot of compliments and it was a good experience.

I got so many compliments wearing this dress! I usually don't wear very form fitting dresses, but this one changed my mind. I usually wear an 8, but wore the 10 due to the fit. Don't think about it, order it!

links_reviews_title: felt beautiful and comfortable all evening
links_reviews_text: Fits torso like a bathing suit, but very comfortable Because of the stretch lace, it is best not to hang it up as that stretches the shoulders and could make shoulders loose and the dress longer. I did use a sticky bra which gave more form. Loved the dress

links_reviews_title: Arrived on time and ready to go!
links_reviews_text: The length was good for me. I like to wear minimum three inch heels. The straps were a little too long in the back and I couldn't pin them. It wasn't overly noticeable but I spent most of the night needing to pull up the front because of the straps. But I received complements from everyone and they all asked where I got such an amazing dress!
This dress was a blast to dance in, super beautiful and very comfy! The color is breathtaking. The 0R fit so well it's like it was made for me. Would 100% recommend for any formal event!

I usually wear a 6-8 when not pregnant and I ordered the 10 and 12. I could fit the 10, but it was right and too short by like 6 inches, so I wore the 12. It had plenty of room for my 33week baby bump and looked gorgeous. The straps were a little loose, but I think it still looked just fine.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing! It fit so comfortable all night and I felt amazing in it!
links_reviews_text: I was able to eat, drink, and dance with no issues. It was comfortable, fit true to size, and it was absolutely beautiful. I received complements all night, and my husband loved it. It's a beautiful royal blue and stood out from the crowd. The cut and lines are very flattering.

links_reviews_title: More compliments than I could count
links_reviews_text: I was stopped by complete strangers on the way into my event that just had to tell me how much they loved my dress. This out of the blue complementing went on all night. It was both flattering and a wholly new experience for me. This was actually my 2nd choice for the dresses I ordered, but I loved this one in person much more than I originally thought I would. I'm basically 5 feet tall so I always have to hem things and a petite did not come in the size I needed. I wore 3.5 inch heels but still had to use hem tape to take the dress up another 2 inches and it fell just to the tops of my shoes. Even with my inexperienced hemming the dress still moved beautifully. My only true problem with the dress is that there was no little plastic straps to hang it up by so after all the hanging it's done the lace that forms the shoulder straps is stretched out and causes the straps to have an odd gaping in the back.

This dress was so beautiful and so comfortable! I felt great in it. I wore it to my best friend's black tie wedding, it was breathable and my husband loved it so much he asked how much it would be to buy it! Because of the cut in the back I wore one of those front only sticky bras and it was snug enough to keep me comfortable and "held in." Just be aware that for some reason the site shows the dress as a royal blue, but mine was navy - which I preferred, but the reviews show it in different tones so just know that you may get Navy and you may get royal blue. Customer service was no help in clarifying which color I would receive.

links_reviews_title: I had a great time chaperoning our high school's prom at the Mile High Stadium in Denver!
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning! It is form-fitting but is stretchy, comfortable, and easy to move around in. I had no problems getting low on the dance floor! :-) I received compliments from students and colleagues all night long. This dress will not disappoint! I highly recommend it for your next formal affair.

Gorgeous dress, fit perfectly. I am 5'7 and 149 pounds and wear between an 8-10, bra size 34DD. I went with the 10L and had 3" heels and the fit was perfect. Tiny loose in the back but nothing crazy. Got lots of compliments. Dress had a little more wash wear than I expected that was my only complaint.

links_reviews_title: Very classy dress, but comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my 16yr old daughter to wear to prom. She is 5'2" and about 105 lbs. She loved the dress! We ordered a 2P and a 2R and she ended up wearing the 2R. The dress her friend is wearing also came from RTR, and was a hit as well.

I had selected the 10L and 12L and just now realizing they sent the 10R so that explains why the dress was shorter than expected. I am 6'1 and definitely needed the long, but made it work. The dress hugs your body but stretches where needed. I received so many compliments on it. It runs true to size and the top can get very loose if you go up a size.
This dress was super comfortable! I had so many compliments throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and perfect for a black tie event
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit for my curvy body type. Exceptionally flattering. Comfortable and easy to dance in. Loved the deep blue color.

I wore this gown to a 20 year wedding anniversary celebration. The fit is true to size. I am 5'2" and I wore 4 inch heels and the 4R skimmed the floor perfectly. I received compliments on the dress all night long! Nicole Miller fits your body wonderfully and is extremely flattering. This is definitely not the last of her dresses that I'll be renting.

Beautiful, form fitting, comfortable, and very flattering!! I'm pregnant so I had to go up 2 sizes to fit my baby bump! But it was still comfy. Only con was the straps were loose and didn't make a square shape, but it was probably because I wasn't wearing the right size for normal me. I safety pinned them down and made it looks amazing. I got tons of compliments for the wedding I went to, and it made my baby bump look so cute for people to rub!
The fit was perfect! And the dress itself was so beautiful. I received so many compliments!

I rented this dress to wear to my brother's wedding and I'm usually between a dress size 8 or 10. I ended up wearing the 10 bc the dress is a stretchy snug dress. I say if you are between dress sizes and don't want the dress skin tight, opt for the larger size. It's still form fitting and hugs you in all the right places. I got compliments from my mother and even brother! That's huge because they are the most critical people I know! And my brother never ever gave me a compliment in my life lol. I would definitely rent this dress again. It's sophisticated sexy.

This was a great dress, super comfortable and beautiful. I received compliments all night long. I would have given it 5 stars but a button was missing from the back of the neck. I used a safety pin so it worked out fine. My hair covered the safety pin so no one was the wiser. The dress is tight from the top to just past the butt. The material is spandex or spandex like so it was very comfortable and moves with you. The regular length was perfect with about 3 inch heel. It can be worn with a strapless bra or a bra with clear straps. I would rent this dress again!
This dress is royal blue and looks better in person then in photos. It's made of stretch lace and very comfortable.

What a lovely dress! It was definitely form-fitting and flattering; I wore it to a military all and received a number of compliments on it. I'm 5'7" and wearing heels was a bit tricky - I probably could have used a 12L to make the dress more heel-appropriate. (My toes were definitely poking out the bottom when I had 2" heels on.

This dress is awesome. I received soo many compliments and my husband absolutely loved it. It's fitted and hugs your curves in all the right spots and super comfortable. I'm 5' ft, so the dress was a little long on me, even with 4in heels.
This was a very beautiful dress. It fit me well. The top was a bit big for me so the back hung a little loose. But other than that I loved it. I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering fit and comfortable all night!
links_reviews_text: 5'4 130lbs, hourglass shape and it was long enough to wear heels with

links_reviews_title: Loved the look and was comfortable too!
links_reviews_text: True to size. A little long, had to wear my highest heels.
This little jumper was adorable! I loved wearing it!

I found the jumpsuit very flattering--elongated my figure and was very elegant for a fall wedding. I have a large bust--36D and did not feel overexposed. I did have trouble with the zipper near my rib cage--it seemed to be the zipper and not the fit of the dress. Jumpsuits are difficult for events--especially at an outdoor wedding with port-a-potties! Still, I got a lot of compliments and it was worth the extra trouble getting in and out of it.

links_reviews_title: Both my cousin and I wore RTR outfits to our Grandma's 80th birthday party and both fit great!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 10R and it fit perfect. I am a curvy girl in all the right places, 5'4" 170lbs and this outfit was a great choice!
Very pretty and lightweight great for summer or a hot destination! Will rent for the summer!

links_reviews_title: Great dress alternative for a winter gala
links_reviews_text: So comfortable I almost felt like I was cheating at dressing up. Many many compliments all night long. Because my event was in the winter, it was really nice to have my legs covered. The material is flowy and elegant. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the gather at the waist seems a little weird. Others have worn it with a belt, which I think would have helped. Overall, felt awesome in it all night. 6 fit perfectly. I'm 5'4.5", but if I were a couple inches taller I think the inseam would have been too short.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it. Not a way I wanted to look.
links_reviews_text: I did not like this one. Its high waisted and wasn't flattering on me.
Fit nice.
easy fit. pockets! really fun to wear. Comfortable yet super stylish

This was my first rental from Rent the Runway and all and all it was good. It was very easy and came on time! This jumper was so cute and exactly what I wanted however the quality was disappointing. The zipper was 1/2 broke and very hard to zip. I had to wear this size so just dealt with the zipper all night. Overall though besides the zipper issue it was good.
I wish I wasn't so short or that there was a "petite" option as it was suuuuper long! Heels couldn't pacify
I felt very glamorous in this and got a ton of compliments. It's a pretty basic piece so it was fun to play with how to accessorize it - definitely considered buying. Will rent again!
Loved this piece. Very comfortable. Can be dressed up or down.
