links_reviews_title: Advertised as for pregnant women, I beg to differ.
links_reviews_text: Just FYI, this romper would be darling on a not-at-all showing person or a non-pregnant person. It was in the RTR maternity section, and I am only 4 months pregnant (albeit showing). No way this was gonna zip. Made me feel huge! I obviously don't recommend for pregnant people.

links_reviews_title: adorable on and very comfortable, also hides any tricky winter weight problem areas
links_reviews_text: fabric is a little on the light side (wore in winter) but you can easily throw on some spanx for added warmth. non-shoulder side did gap a little, but used double sided fashion tape to keep from any unwanted side boob viewing.
Con- I am 5'9'' so this was a little short with heels on

links_reviews_title: comfy outfit for a fun party
links_reviews_text: I am small on top , small waist with thicker lower body--this was very flattering and comfortable.
Elastic waist was ill-fitting on me, with the asymmetrical top pulling on it strangely. The waist also looked oddly unfinished without a belt. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: A great look for an elegant dinner.
links_reviews_text: I am 5"7 and 140lb....the 4R fit perfect! I loved the one shoulder detail.
I rented this for my birthday but couldn't wear it - the fit was odd and narrow in the waist but short in length overall (I have a long torso and short legs). Would be fun if it worked for you!
This looked great from the waist up, but the inseam was at least 6 inches too long. So disappointed that I could that I could not wear it. Not recommended for shorter women.

I thought this was a super chic outfit. It wasn't my original choice and was sent as a replacement. I was only given one size which was a 4R. I think a 2R would have looked better because it was a bit big in the shoulders and around the stomach. I didn't end up wearing it because my other option was cuter but I did think it was very chic and could even be used in a business setting... just a size down for me!
I wore it to a birthday dinner, it was comfortable and looked great.

links_reviews_title: Cute but the shape is a little tough
links_reviews_text: Very cute pattern, super light for summer, but the drop waist would be really tough if you're short. Luckily it hit me at an ok spot. I probably wouldn't rent this one again but it was cute for a workday dress!

This dress was perfect for a hot day while also being work appropriate (I threw on a denim jacket over it). It's so light and airy. I've never been more comfortable at the office. It's a little longer than I would like, but clothes rarely hit where I want them to since I'm shorter.
I wore this to a baby shower and received many compliments. It is comfortable and pretty.
The colors are really muted and then the volume makes me feel it's a bit risky. Might not be great for pear shaped or anyone not wanting to draw attn to the lower half.

This is a peasant dress and fits as such. The color palate and pattern is unusual, which is a plus for me. I loved that the straps are adjustable (why don't more dresses have these?!); this allowed the top to fit me. There was lots of extra fabric in the back but I wore it to a cafe and felt super comfy. I couldn't pull this off for a work look but would definitely rent again for the beach.
The overall fit was true to size, yet the mid section was awkward and bulky.

links_reviews_title: super light and airy not too long for a short girl
links_reviews_text: a tad small in the bust, i'm a 34C and wore a 4R and was a smidge tight but still worked
Fit: fit great everywhere but I felt like it made me look rounder Fabric: soft and comfy Style: cute but not amazing?

links_reviews_title: Loved it for every day/office wear.
links_reviews_text: Breezy, light, and colorful.
pretty pattern, nice material

i'm typically a 2/4 but even in a 0, these was tons of fabric left. this is supposed to be large, but i wld say to skip this is you're smaller than me. i used a wide brown belt to cinch and it looked much better. cute w higher shoes. bra optional. overall, just ok
Perfect for my work holiday party! Stylish jumpsuit and the silk fabric made it perfectly formal. Really flattering on my curves! Wore my regular size.
I love this jumpsuit. It is fitted and tight and absolutely adorable!!

Super comfy, cute black romper. Interesting neckline and details. But it runs large, and I needed to size down. Regardless, I still wore it, just had to be mindful that the shoulders didn't slide down. Also, it has those hanger straps, which normally I would cut out (if I owned it) but obviously left in tact here. Was annoying, as they were constantly slipping out all day. That said, I would rent this again, but I would size down.

Wasn't crazy about I️t when I️ first tried I️t on, material was much thicker than expected and more silky than expected, but I️ ended up wearing I️t and loving I️t. I️ received so many compliments. Fits true to size, but with the thicker material I️ would size down. I'm 5'8 and length was perfect :). Worn to rehearsal dinner.

Fit great, a little tight in the bust, but the collar concealed that. On the right hand side, in the front and the back I had a little difficulty completely covering my bra, but I stopped fussing with it and decided not to care. Overall, it was awesome.
I love this romper! It is super cute and flirty. Major plus is that you do not have to wear a bra with it. I am keeping it a little longer because I just am not ready to part with it.

links_reviews_title: Fun look! Not the right proportions for it
links_reviews_text: Definitely meant for a taller gal, this fun piece was just a little to long in the legs and big in the chest for me to pull off. Probably would hit the sweet spot between 5'5" and 5'7". Also the bottom half had this diaper effect, which frankly, isn't what I go for as far as flattering looks. Still a fun piece, but wouldn't wear again. True to size- not stretchy fabric

links_reviews_title: It was impossible to put this jumpsuit on. There is no zipper and the fabric has no give.
links_reviews_text: I can't comment on the fit, I couldn't actually put it on.

links_reviews_title: This was the most unflattering thing I've ever rented.
links_reviews_text: This was the most unflattering thing I've ever rented There was too much ruffle on the top and the bottom made me look like I had a gut.

links_reviews_title: runs a bit small. nice jumpsuit but not the the best material for summer
links_reviews_text: should have gone up a size
The pant bottoms were too tight, but the top was way too large. Could not keep one shoulder on. I think you have to be very long waisted for this to fit correctly. Cute on the model not on me.
Really cute jumpsuit. But couldn't zip it in the bust area.
Nice satiny fabric and cool top- I'm pretty tall and the length was perfect. Definitely size up if in between sizes- this wasn't too tight but just fit.
This is every bit as cute as the photos, but it was very snug in rib cage. I'm pretty flat chested but I could hardly zip it up.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't even able to wear this. The fit & material was anything, but flattering.
links_reviews_text: I followed people's reviews & picked my normal size, however, the fit was awful. The pants were grippy in my thighs plus around my stomach. The shiny material emphasized just how horrible the pant suit fit me. There was no way I could wear this. I was so disappointed & had to figure something else to wear. I honestly wouldn't suggest this for anyone to rent.

links_reviews_title: Wanted something for a dressy cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: Shinier fabric than I wanted, but it felt great on. However, since I'm only 5'4, the ruffles felt disproportionate to my stature and the pants a little longer than the model. I could've gotten away with wearing it but it was just OK. Returned without wearing.
Wow. Such a gorgeous jumpsuit. The top is so flattering on & it all fits perfectly. Even comfortable to sit in. The photo with the model doesn't do it justice. Amazing fit. Will order again!
Runs small.

links_reviews_title: I loved this Jumper, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great fit, comfortable, easy to move in, but flattering and the ruffles make it fancy.

Was torn between this and my free backup that was sent to me, and decided on the other just due to comfort. As far as the fit goes. I am a B cup, and this just fit on top. Anyone larger may have problems. Also, women with a petit torso may find it bags a little in the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Fun design for someone with a longer torso than mine
links_reviews_text: Cute but longish.

links_reviews_title: This one has been worn to many times.
links_reviews_text: I loved the top of this jump suits. However I could see that it had been dry cleaned many times, the bottom of the left pant leg was coming undone and the suite runs small. Ugh!

This jumpsuit is so flattering, especially in the back the way it is cut out. You need to wear a strapless bra with it, but it is very easy to wear. It was a little fancy for work but definitely ok to wear. Loved it!
I set my filters for my petite build and go this thinking it was cropped its 5 inches too long. my height is 5'1". Also, right shoulder of this outfit keeps falling off mine.

links_reviews_title: Too small for a large rear.
links_reviews_text: Basically, do not rent if you have a small waist and large backside. It was comically tight around my hips / butt and the zipper wouldn't even go over that area - but I had plenty of room through the midsection. BUT I am a very specific body shape and I think this would look nice on different body types.
True to size
This would be great for a wedding or formal affair, but I rented it for a work reception that was far less formal. It was too small and short for me.
Very flattering and formal. The length is a little long it will not be ankle length unless you are 5'8" or taller. It is a good length though , I wore a 2-1/2" heel .
Great quality, great fit, compliments all night.
Great fit. And great for any occasion!

links_reviews_title: Cute Romper, too small did not wear
links_reviews_text: This was too tight in the hips for me. This is a very nice fabric which dresses up the romper all more than I was expecting.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but the bust is narrow.
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit is cute and fits well everywhere except the bust. My breasts looked smooshed!

This grew on me as the night went on - it wasn't my first choice of Jumpsuit but they were almost all taken :). I wore it for a cocktail Gala, and it was completely appropriate. I was the only one wearing a jumpsuit, and I felt a little bit invincible! It is a bit strange to take the thing all the way off to use the restroom - odd to be totally naked in a public place - but it wasn't too hard to get on and off. I'm pretty exactly an 8 in dresses/jumpsuits/jackets, and this fit really well, and even had a little bit of wiggle room, but the six probably would have been uncomfortably tight. No need to wear a bra, as the ruffle covers the bust. I did have to adjust the shoulders on and off throughout the night, and the zipper was a little irritating under my arm but I got used to it as the night went on. Overall, it worked great. I would rent it again without complaint if another event came up and none of my other choices were available!

Its a very cute jumpsuit but the fit wasnt perfect. The legs were a bit long on me but looked ok with heels. The should strap kept flopping over. Not for someone with a long torso. Note the fabric is heavy polyester satin with no give at all.

Slipped this jumpsuit on and it was perfect...except that the small ruffled sleeve kept slipping off my shoulder. With a strapless bra there was nothing to pin it to and a regular bra showed. I may rent it again if i can figure out a solution. May have been a size issue or just my shoulders. Its a wonderful outfit so dont hesitate to give it a try.

The waist of this jumpsuit hit me at a weird place (like right on my love handles) which made it look wider than it looks on the model. It would have been better if I could have pulled the front of it up and pinned it in place, but it's not really possible to do that with this style. Also, it looks like the pants are short on the model, but on me they went all the way down to my ankles (I'm 5'5").
It fits really well. Received a lot of compliments.
A little loose in the stomach area.
I should have ordered it in a petite, I am only 5"0', just wore bigger heals. It was very comfortable and looked great with the jewelry I used to dress it up.

It's a beautiful jumpsuit. The material is satiny and has a substantial weight. I really like the neckline. For me, the fit did not work, in either size. I am typically a 4, sometimes a 2, but have a very straight/athletic figure. The waist on the size 4 was too tight (there is no stretch), although the rest of the garment fit well. Moving up to a 6, the waist had plenty of room, but everything else was much too big, giving the bottom a wet diaper look. At 5'6" the size 4 ended at my ankle bone.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, comfortable. Got lots of complements!

links_reviews_text: You guys. What is up with the shapes of designer dresses? I'm a size 12 in everything I own. I'm a bit more Apple shaped after three kiddos, but still within normal human woman proportions. Allllll of the dresses are meant for hourglass shapes. So there's that. After 10 dresses tried at home, I ordered this size kind of as a joke in a moment of frustration... and it fit like magic. Petite was the way to go... but I'm 5'6"... so yeah. 5'6, size 12? Cool, size 20P then. Perfect. So, that's why there aren't 5 stars. This dress will remind you that you're not a Barbie shaped creature, but - I felt like a princess on the red carpet. Brand Carlisle said she loved the lace :) Sorry for the name drop, but how cool is that? xo

I heard about this site from my cousin. I was stressing to find a dress to wear to a Mardi Gras ball, since I'm so short, it's had to find a petite in a size 14. I ordered the last minute, but it's true it arrives on the same day you choose. I'm 4'11" and with heels the dress was the prefect length. And was true to size, only thing I had troubles with was the zipper towards the top of the dress. So that part is a two person job. But it was a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Wonderful night out in this dress for a black tie event!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10, so finding long dresses is challenging, tall girls want to wear heels too! I wore the 8L with a 2.5" block heel. I would have preferred it to be another inch or two longer, but overall, I was very happy with it! If you have a larger rib cage, I would size up one. I loved the ease of the bottom of the dress, and the slit was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I loved this gown...many compliments. I have a large busy and it fit very well!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, good feeling fabric... the lace was not itchy.

This dress was absolutely gorgeous and fit extremely well. It was flattering but not tight around the stomach and hips so it was comfortable to wear all night. The slit added an element of sexiness to it without being over the top. The very edge of the lace neckline did rub my neck a bit throughout the night, but not enough to leave a mark, just enough to be slightly annoying. I would definitely wear it again.
This dress was so beautiful and a pleasure to wear. I rented it for a formal photo shoot that I did with my husband and child. It was absolutely perfect.
Loved this dress! Very elegant and fit comfortably. I felt beautiful and elegant with a hint of sexy. I'm usually a size 2, but I wore a 4. No bra, the dress is padded.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and modest enough to officiate a wedding
links_reviews_text: Had fun in this!! Lots to love about this dress: the slit, the bodice part below the chest, plus the V back and front lacey part. The boob coverage is kind of loose and doesn't shape very nicely if you aren't really busty plus I had to mess with the pads inside because they were folded. But all in all felt sexy yet modest & classy enough to officiate my girl's wedding!
This dress is very comfy and fits well. I just had my baby two months ago and the dress looked great. The only con I have is that it's hard to pull up the zipper. I needed assistance.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for full bust & so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got tons of compliments! I typically wear a 14 but I had to size up to a 16 because the bust area is tight. I worried about not being able to wear a bra but the dress provides perfect support without being overly tight and uncomfortable. The only negative I have about this dress is the zipper. It is super difficult! It is definitely not a dress you can put on by yourself.
Loved this dress! Small zipper hiccup, but felt so comfortable and gorgeous in this.

This dress was very comfortable. Had built-in cups so no bra needed. I wore three inch heels and it was the perfect length. There was a band that fell around the lower part of the bust that was tight and offered no flex. I recommend ordering a size up as a second size.

You will not be able to wear a bra. But has built in bra ..and was not a problem. Nice flowing style and much nicer in person. Very high waisted , almost an empire waist. Could be very tight at times at the band.. makes you stand up tall. Large chest ladies beware you will appear bustier. Good for all bra sizes. I believe this dress appears conservative even with the low last neck line. At 5,5 150lbs 36d cup - 31 waist 43 hips. The 8R was perfect and was the perfect length for my 3 inch heels.
I rented this for a party and ended up going with my second pick, but this was cute too. It was definitely a bit small around the waist and a bit large in the shoulders

links_reviews_title: Flattering design. Seemingly understated but actually super fun
links_reviews_text: Band at the waist/ribs was definitely tight with no elasticity so I had to size up to a 4R (normally 2R). 4R dress was a little long but additional height from heels made it ok. Also very easy to pick up given the slit design which is a flattering unintentionally sexy detail that I enjoyed. I'm not busty at all and was worried about chest area being too empty but the padding + sheer lace detail at the v-neck held the look nicely.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for my formal event
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Marine Corps event and it did not disappoint. The dress was quite comfortable and the flowy feel to it was nice, plus that leg slit is perfect. I'm top heavy so wearing a dress with that sort of see through top without being too inappropriate was great. My only complaint is that the waist band has ZERO GIVE to it so it was extremely tight around my rib cage. I had to go up one dress size just to even get it to close. Also, as other reviews stated, the zipper is impossible to zip up without the help of someone. Just a couple things to keep in mind.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress so much!! Looked amazing, fit perfectly, felt great! Could not have been happier!
links_reviews_text: The dress material was amazing... I was fairly hot all night... but not so bad I was suffering. The length of the dress was perfect... I wore maybe 3" heels. With my large chest... it was difficult to figure out how I was going to tame these girls without a bra... but I found a bralette that was just lace all the way around... because the front of the dress was lace... the back of the lace bra just looked like part of the dress. The zippers... on EVERYTHING that I tried on SUCKED!!! They were hard to zip up and would get jammed all the time. But... I got it to work and was in love with this dress. I suggest this dress for any and everyone!

links_reviews_title: It was my first formal Mardi Gras Ball and I fit right in!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Especially for the price (with my $30 off). I returned the $130 dress I didn't need that I had as a back-up just in case I didn't love this dress. It arrived a day earlier than expected and the free second size really allowed my to decide what I liked best. The fit was true to size in my opinion. I actually wear a 12 or large in everyday clothes (slacks, jeans, t-shirts, etc) and both the 12 and the 14 fit me but I had a bit more breathing room in the 14. I carry my weight in my stomach and thighs so the flow of the dress hid that beautifully. I loved the sexy, not-too-revealing top and the occasional peak-a-boo of the leg. I got so many compliments!! It was a little long for my height as I am not comfortable in super tall heels. I wore 2 inch heels and the dress lightly swept the floor. Another inch would have been perfect. The ease of the return was awesome!! Will definitely use the service again!!

The dress fit perfectly the length was perfect for my heels. The back of the dress is cut low, very elegant. I felt so beautiful in this dress. The slit was perfect height, and just enough sexy to be formal.

This dress was really comfortable, the flowy skirt makes it great for a pear shape. They did not have my originally requested size of 6 so I went with the 8 but I think this fits true to size and I would have been happier with the 6. My only issue was what bra to wear because the sheer V goes so deep that you can see even a strapless bra. I ended up going without which made me a little self conscious. If I could figure out a better bra option I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I felt extremely confident in this dress! Absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: Loved it! It ran a little smaller than I expected so I ended up with the bigger size.. which was slightly big on but worked! I loved the lace front and the back and the slit.. and everything about this dress! I felt so glamorous at our Oscar themed charity event!

links_reviews_title: The leg slit added major zest
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a tribute show to female music artists-- 2nd year using RTR to be Adele! Great choice this year-- comfortable, though fitted just below the bust line. While the deep-v is made more modest with a nude underlay (underneath the lace), the slit adds some extra va-va-voom. Just barely skimmed the floor in 3+ in heels

Just as the other reviewers mentioned, the dress is extra tight in the rib cage. I could fit the 12 but wore the 14. Getting the dress zipped is a two man job. Use candle wax for difficult zippers. The front slit gave the dress a little something extra. I was unsure about the open back initially. The padding in the dress kept everything in place. The length of the dress was perfect with my 4 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size, and very comfortable. I have worn this designer before and all of her dresses are made incredibly well and are very comfy. I wore this to a wedding at an art museum and it was perfect for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: Stunning, chic, flattering dress perfect for formal wedding.
links_reviews_text: Normally wear 18/20 - went up to a 22R. Great length, I am 5'5" and it was perfect with some 2" heels. - Great padding and support in the chest - was able to wear without a bra. (Typically wear 44 DD") Got so many compliments on this dress - I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Black Tie evening
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a black tie event and it was perfect (pic is from trying it on - photos from the event are pretty dark!) flattering on my midsection and for nicely in the bust. I did wear a backless bra but only because I've had two kids and my bust could use the extra support. I definitely could have gone braless though. Received many compliments throughout the night. Was a little long even with 3.5" heels

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Very sheer in the bust area.
links_reviews_text: Dress ran small and shows a lot of cleavage!! It did work for the Gala I was attending. I wished I would've seen how sheer the bust part was in the photos because I probably would not have chosen this.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a gala. Everyone loved the slit
links_reviews_text: Had enough structure to wear without a bra which was great. Love the slit for a little sexy but still very classy for a fund raiser/gala event. Very flattering to hour glass shape.
I wore this to a black tie wedding. I was comfortable all night long and it was truly stunning.
The dress was perfect and this was my first rtr experience! Definitely renting from rtr again!

links_reviews_title: Overall was comfortable and I didn’t have to sit and adjust it constantly!
links_reviews_text: Very tight where band sits below bust and then ran big above band line (both in bust and shoulders). Was very happy that I ordered a long!

links_reviews_title: Perfect combo of sexy and classy.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress. It fit true to size and was comfortable to wear for an extended period of time and while dancing. I am presently nursing a 3 month old and needed to pump occasionally during the event while I was away; I appreciated that I was able to unzip this dress without assistance back in my hotel room. The dress also provided enough support to my DD-size-Milk-Filled tatas. :) I am 5'7" and found that the regular length dress was an appropriate length with 3 inch heels. This dress is also flattering on your mid-section (if you're 3 months post-partum like me and feeling a little pudge); I think it would also work for a first trimester pregnancy. The attention is definitely drawn away from your tummy/hips/waist area.

The dress arrived on the exact delivery but quite late in the evening. It's great RTR gives you a free second dress size because I needed it. I received lots of compliments and I was very comfortable. Felt like a princess!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Bridesmaid's Dress or for a Formal/Black-tie Event
links_reviews_text: I was the Maid of Honor in my Best Friend's wedding and it happened to be out-of-state. Not only could the bride and I search RTR together, but the dress arrived on time with no issues. I never had to pack it! The fit was perfect since I used the RTR guide & other user reviews. Thank you for making me look #glamorous in my own skin. I got so many compliments! Would definitely use this service again. Also, drop-off was beyond easy mailing the dresses back. Thank you, RTR!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a black tie wedding and I absolutely loved it!! The slit kept it fun but was very classy overall, I received compliments all night! Ran true to size and fit perfectly!

I sized down on this dress because I have a small bust and waist. I loved this dress because it was comfortable yet glamorous. However, there's a big risk of looking frumpy so definitely accessorize in the right way.
You can go braless in this dress. Snug fit right around the waist and then a free fall from waist on down.

I wore this dress for a black tie event and got a lot of compliments. It was very long and fit perfect with my heels. My only complaint is that the zipper in this dress was difficult to get up past the belt.

This dress is very flattering. I loved the slit in the skirt and the open back. There is no stretch to the dress so I would recommend sizing up. I'm smaller chested and wore it without a bra with no problems. For bigger chested women i think it would be difficult to find a bra that would work with it since the back cuts so low. I wore it with a backwards necklace and got a ton of compliments.

This dress was lovely. I rented the 4L and got the 6L as a backup and ended up wearing the 6--the 4 was just a bit too snug around my 32DDD chest, and I find breathing is a real necessity. But! If you're not top-heavy, this will probably run a little more TTS. No stretch. The long size was just long enough for me to wear 1-inch heels and it softly brushed the ground. If I'd done the regular size, it would probably fit closer to the model's length, but I was going for flowy drama and I'm 5'11" so...long generally works better.
I'm 5'5" and wore a 3 inch heel, the dress was still too long. Over all I loved the fit. It was comfortable. I had to wear a strapless bra with the dress. The zipper was a little difficult to zip.

I love this trendy dress by Monique Lhullier! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and have room in the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’3”, the length of the dress hit the floor.

I absolutely love this elegant dress by Monique Lhuillier Bridesmaid! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection with comfortable room at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with the dress so you should consider a NuBra or strapless bra since the neckline will expose your bra straps. At 4’8”, the length hit floor length on me and was sadly too long for me to wear. The material is lovely and flows nicely on the body. Pair with nude heels to complete your look.

links_reviews_title: Got this as a free back up. Thank goodness as my original choice did not fit whatsoever.
links_reviews_text: Fit overall pretty well. I ordered the long but it was very long. I’m 5’8 and wore heels and still too long.

links_reviews_title: This was our steps sons wedding and the dress was beautiful. This was my second choice pick for dres
links_reviews_text: This dress was very beautiful. It fit perfectly and it was very flowy. I am 5’3 and it was a little long but with Heels the length was great. I got so many compliments on it. I loved it.
Dash is too short. Zipper does not lay flat.
Too small. Could not wear.

The dress was beautiful and the color was great. I was given the option to wear any gray full length dress as a bridesmaid. This was actually my back up dress, but thank god I got it as my first choice did not fit right at all. I usually am a 4 or a 6 depending on the brand and the 4 fit but the 6 was definitely more comfortable. so if youre borderline size up. my big frustration with rent the runway is that i feel that they really dont cater very well to shorter women. I usually avoid this by only renting short dresses, but this was a bridesmaid dress for a wedding so I was required to do full length. The dress was beautiful and i loved it, but even in heels I was tripping everywhere. By the end of the evening I had tied the dress up because i just couldnt handle it anymore. I'm 5'2 and the regular says it caters to that size, but realistically it does not unless you're wearing 4 inch heels.

I am 5'3" and pear body shape. I usually wear 2-6 and I often try to order P. I ordered a 4R because there was no 4P available. This dress was suuuuuper long on me. There was no heel that I could wear to make me tall enough for it to look good. I think this dress would look beautiful on a taller, busty person (5'7"+ & D+). I am a small C, and the top looked very saggy on me. Not my style at all, but I think it could look great on someone with the opposite body type that I have. The dress itself was good quality.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on dress. Very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fit very well. The long is quite long. Needed to wear tall heels and I'm tall to begin with, but it looked wonderful on.
Lovely dress, flattering fit. I ended up not wearing it because I had another dress, but this was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful flowy dress, but a little large
links_reviews_text: I rented this lovely dress for my baby shower when I was 32 weeks pregnant, in my third trimester. The dress is a vibrant color, and the silk material feels really rich with a good weight. However, the dress did flare out a lot, making it way too large for me. I wore a size small, but had also rented the M. The M was like a tent and the keyhole front was really large, and gaped below my breast line. The S fit a little better where the keyhole did not gape as much, and ended at a decent location on my chest. I did use some bobby pins to pin in a placket down my back to try and gather the material closer to the torso and belly so the dress looked more fitted, which worked in a pinch, especially as I had my hair down for most of the shower. the neck ruffles also helped conceal the placket as well in the back. I'm usually a size small so I'd recommend renting your normal size and a size down for this dress, and try my temporary pinning trick to get a better fit - each person's belly is different!
Fit great, super comfortable. Great for any trimester (currently in 3rd).

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and such a pretty pink!
links_reviews_text: Loose fitting...I could have gotten a small (I was 31 weeks pregnant when I wore this) but the flowy fit was really pretty. I did not find it to be too low cut as other reviewers have mentioned...but I am also relatively large busted (36F) so perhaps it would fall lower on a smaller bust. Was very happy with the look!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Baby Shower!! The color was beautiful and definitely baby bump flattering at 32 weeks.
links_reviews_text: Baby bump friendly at 32 weeks. Dress was comfortable, light and beautiful color. Received lots of compliments! Wore a large maternity but could have gotten the medium and still fit ok.

Dress fit well at 9 months pregnant - wore my pre-pregnancy size. Was a little short, but still work appropriate with flats. Note that the fabric is quick drying, which is a plus when your stomach constantly hits the sink every time you use the restroom...

35-37 wks preggo//32DD// 5'2// 139 lbs Great color dress for summer. It runs big so I had to wear camisoles under the dress to keep from showing my undergarments. I'm not above a little cleavage but the dress was so large that you could see into it if I wasn't careful.
Really cute, flattering and comfy! Wore for a friend's baby shower and it was perfect. The deep pink is festive. I felt great in it at 21 weeks pregnant.

I am at the beginning of my 2nd trimester and rented this to wear to a wedding shower, but it was far too big for me to wear. Large in the belly. longer than I'd like and just big all around, didn't feel like an XS.

links_reviews_title: Right amount of cute and sexy
links_reviews_text: The keyhole is a bit larger than expected but o think this also doubles great for maternity access
Fit true to size.
A bit on the big side but still looks cute
Dress runs very large
Very comfortable

This would be great for a date night, but for a church or work event it definitely is too low cut. I wore a tank under it so that my bra wouldn't show which i think altered the look of it. It would have been fun for a wedding or other special event.
ran big

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for first day of school.
links_reviews_text: Keyhole is large and can show bra. Size down.
Loved the color , is a cute dress for a day affair or work

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments. Super comfty and great looking in the 3rd trimester.
links_reviews_text: I gave this dress 4 stars only because the opening in the front was a little too open for me (although I am small busted). And when I bent over, which luckily I only did at home, it was really short. Besides that, I loved it! The fabric felt amazing! I got tons of compliments. I loved the color. I would definitley rent this again! Super comfty and great looking in the 3rd trimester.
I didnt like the neckline it wasn't flattering

I'm almost 5 mnths pregnant and I'm still able to conceal the bump and was looking for pieces that would help with that. I guess technically this did that, but it was way too big in the arm holes and too long for my height. I don't know why RTR won't save my measurements, but I'm 5' and pre-pregnancy weight 107 and bust 32D. Now, I'm about 114 lbs and bust 32DD.

links_reviews_title: Didn't even wear it - has a tent like shape
links_reviews_text: This dress is cute, it just wasn't right for me. I rented it at 34 weeks pregnant and didn't even wear it. My pre-pregnancy size is 0 and I'm pretty much the same build but with a basketball in my belly, so this dress looked like a tent on me. It was too long and just really unflattering. Just a heads up if you're planning to rent! Other than that, it's a great color and if your build is more like the model in the photo, go for it!!

Dress was beautiful, received a lot of compliments, great color. I wore this dress to a friend's wedding. Cons it fit a little small, especially in the arms, so it is a good thing I ordered the alternate size. I normally wear an 8, but wore the 10, because it fit better. Overall the dress was very comfortable for a formal type dress and length was appropriate for me, I am 5'2. I was able to dance the night away with no issues. :-)
Runs small. I'm normally a 12, ended up wearing the 14 and it was on the tight side. Pockets stick out. Overall beautiful dress though. Great color, beautiful lace. Lots of compliments.
I felt beautiful in this dress! It fit perfectly. 10/10 would wear again.

links_reviews_title: cute dress for work, would size up
links_reviews_text: beautiful color and cute design. the length is okay to wear to work. very comfortable to wear.

This was an excellent dress! I should've worn the 18. I saw the reviews ran small but I ordered the 14 and 16. The 16 ended up working as you can see but the 18 would've been more comfortable. Arms were snug but overall it was a terrific choice for my size and event. I am 5'3, 190lbs.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work formal affair
links_reviews_text: Received so many complements at work award banquet. (Hard to zip on your own)

Great dress for fall wedding. I wore with boots (outdoor/country wedding). I didn't realize the arms would be so SNUG...but you don't need to lift your arms to do the wobble, so it turned out okay. I'd rent it again, but in the next size up for the arms.
This dress fit perfectly. I also wasn’t too hot in the dress (wore it for an evening wedding in June). Would definitely rent this dress again!

So the dress was gorgeous HOWEVER i have very skinny arms and i could not even get them in the size 4 dress sleeves. I wound up wearing the 6 just for the sleeves. I had to rate this dress lower because of that reason. Also, i noticed some of the taller women saying the length was good but at 5'11 i had to be aware of my rear catching a draft..

Wore this to a opening reception for an event and loved it. I have a bigger chest but didn't feel restricted and felt like it fit well. The arms are a bit tight but once you're used to it, it's not bothersome. Loved the length and felt comfortable for several hours. Would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments...but a bit too warm...
links_reviews_text: The 8 fit and made me look trim but it was difficult to move my arms up (partly because of the dress design). The 10 also fit with more flexibility for dancing and arm movement but I still couldn't pick my arms up above my head because of how the armpits are sewn. I wore the 10. The dress was absolutely beautiful in person and I received SO many compliments about it and the color. I felt stunning! Pockets were a great addition. Warning: the lining of the dress made it extremely hot (for me). I live in a cooler (northern) climate and wore this on a cloudy day that was about 55 degrees outside. Once inside for dancing, it was wet with sweat and stayed that way all night. I dance A LOT but sweat is usually not that much of an issue for me. It was a bit uncomfortable. Overall, I would absolutely get this dress again!

Fit great, not too tight, and very comfortable. Loved the lace, the color, the skirt. I'd consider buying this if I needed a good dress for fall/winter. Hit right at knees for me, a shorty (5'3), which I loved.

This dress was perfect! I've wore the purple style last yr but now that I have dropped a few more pounds. 'This dress felt even better, it has great movement at the bottom. a little tight at the sleeves but bearable. However, it's a great pick and to add with pockets :)
Beautiful color and lace. Flouncy flare to skirt. Comfortable and flattering

Love love love this dress!!! I seriously may have to buy this dress. Loved everything about it- the color, the fit, and it had pockets. Ladies, it has pockets! I loved it and it was very comfortable. True to size , although I had to wear a smaller size than what I probably needed because the larger size dress wasn't returned in time to be shipped to me. It ended up working out and I loved wearing it. Highly recommend!
This dress was soooo comfortable! I wanted to keep it! It was extremely flattering as well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with a pop of color!!!
links_reviews_text: This was a replacement dress for a baby shower that I attended but it should have been my first pick! Gorgeous blue color and compliments for days! I was worried the sizing might be too small but it fit perfectly!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and great color of blue!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable and overall fit well. I'm short so anytime there is a fitted waist it always sits Lower than I like just have to pull it up higher which adds a little fold. And the sleeves under lace were continuously out and visible. Durable and good material. Would still rent it again if needed. Maybe a bigger size to see if the sleeves fit better?

This was my first Rent the Runway experience and I loved it. This dress was perfect for a January wedding. It fit great, was beautiful and I received so many compliments on it. My favorite parts were the sleeves and pockets!

I wore the bigger size because the arms were tight. Pretty dress, comfy and love the pockets. One disappointment was that I received 2 different colors- my primary size was blue and the back up size purple.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a December wedding in FL
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, I got so many compliments!
Fit as described, was comfy and a vibrant blue. Being 5'3", it hit almost at the knee. I would totally wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress just very heavy and a little snug.
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit small and the fabric is really thick so it was pretty heavy.

links_reviews_title: Love the blue color of the dress and how comfy it is!
links_reviews_text: First time renting a dress from RTR and my experience has been a breeze. I'm glad I ordered a second size 6 which fitted perfectly. One thing I noticed after taking it out of the plastic bag was a small tear of the lace on the left sleeve. Besides that I love the color, fit, and pockets. Got compliments as well. The return process was also a breeze.

This was my backup style for a dress I wore to the wedding- I really liked it so I wore it the night before! The fit was true to size and worked for me. It is on the warmer side, which worked for me in October, but might be uncomfortable for an event with dancing.
I am large busted and wear 14/16 bottom but wore size 18. Very comfortable and who doesn't love pockets!
Pro- comfortable, easy to wear, decent job of hiding the baby weight that I'm having trouble getting rid of Con- jewelry easily snags on it

This dress was so much fun! I received compliments all night on it. It was fun to dance in, the pockets were amazing and the color was rich. Only complaint - the arms were a little snug. I mean, they were lace, so I sorta understand why, but I don't really have "thicker" arms. Other than that - amazing dress.

links_reviews_title: Worn it to a friend's wedding. The dress was really comfortable and flattering. I'm hooked on RTR.
links_reviews_text: It's a little tight in the arms, but other than that, the dress was perfect. Really comfortable and I had no problem dancing. It didn't ride up or anything and flowed nicely.
Fit perfectly all the way around

Dress was comfortable and great for a fall wedding. I put on the first size i grabbed which was the 6 and it fit fine, so I'm not sure how the 4 would have fit to comment on how true to size this dress is. The 6 had some room so the 4 likely would have fit. The dress was a very pretty shade of blue, the underlay has a slightly gold tint to it.

I wore this dress to a wedding in August and it was perfect. It's a beautiful color and I loved being able to keep my lipstick and phone in the pockets! It was easy to dance in it too even though the sleeves are a bit snug.

I was not crazy about this dress it was very well made and gorgeous but, not the right dress for my body type / short frame. The arms were a bit tight, but not restricting. The color and detail were gorgeous but I prefer simpler dresses.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for a small chest and wide hips!
links_reviews_text: I have trouble with dresses due to a small chest and wide hips. I normally wear a 4 or a 6. The 6 fit just fine, but I knew I'd feel more comfortable in the size 4. The fit of the size 4 was perfect, but the arms where just a little tight - they were bearable, so the size 4 was the winner. I received compliments on this dress, and I felt beautiful. This was my first RTR, and the customer service - alone - will bring me back. I won't tell the whole story, but the gist is that they didn't have to send me the size 4 at the last minute, but they did, without even a question.

links_reviews_title: I received a TON of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and had a wonderful time dancing. The only con I could think of is that there is no give in the sleeves/armpits so I could not raise my hands above my head while dancing BUT not a bad problem to have. Would rent again!

As others have said, the arms are fitting. I have larger chest, so that combined with arms meant I wore the size 12 instead of 10. The color of the 10 was more blue than the 12 as well. Love the pockets and the stretch.
Overall, it fit true to size and was comfortable. It was a little wide in the shoulders and tight on the arms though. It was very flattering and received a lot of compliments.
It fit very nice and received many compliments. The arms were tight so I couldn't really extend my arms when my fiancé was turning me on the dance floor. But overall it was a great fit..

links_reviews_title: The color was so perfect for fall outdoor venue!
links_reviews_text: The color just POPPED! Dress was true to size (after reading so many reviews, its true the fabric doesn't have any stretch and the arms are a bit snug due to cut and lace fabric). My dress had no snags or tears in the lace. It was super comfortable, the layers were not too hot. The sleeves were a great choice, especially when the sun went down. I paired with nude peep toe pumps and BONUS, I carried my phone in my pockets most of the night without ever appearing bulky! I was very happy with this dress choice.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress, looks like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress that is easy to dress up or down depending on the event. Wore it for a work function and got rave reviews. The material is a little heavy and it ended up being a hot day, but I was comfortable in the A/C. The pockets can make the hips seem stick out a bit but that didn’t show in the photos. Would definitely recommend this dress!!

The outfit was true to size with some room to move. For larger hips/bottom I did not feel the dress was to tight which was important as the event was for a work awards ceremony. I felt AMAZING and am seriously considering purchasing as the outfit was so classic.

Loved this rental for a fall wedding weekend! The overall material of the dress was amazing as the fit was stretchy yet sturdy. With the weather being sunny but cool, the lightweight of the dress + long sleeves made it the perfect wear for outdoor receptions. It was a major hit!

links_reviews_title: Great customer service got me a second size just in the nick of time!
links_reviews_text: such a comfortable and flattering dress! Used it for holiday photos and it photographs and looks amazing in person. Perfect fit.
This was my back up dress and I loved it! The fabric is great, flattering silhouette, love the sleeves. I got tons of compliments on this dress.

First of all, this was such soft and comfortable material and so flattering on! I really loved this dress and thought it was a perfect choice for a wedding with my boyfriend's family. I hadn't met a lot of them yet so it was a nice dress to make a good first impression in! Wish I could have hung this back in my closet instead of having to return it, but I can't wait to rent a new RTR dress for the next event!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a Gala. Perfect for the black tie affair.
links_reviews_text: Fit was pretty true to size. Fabric was stretchy & forgiving. A little long but I always have that problem at 5 feet tall. Got a TON of compliments on this dress. Great for a curvy or athletic figure. Actually. I think it made my athletic figure more curvy in appearance. Great dress.
Received a lot of compliments on the style of this dress! The liner underneath was a bit different sized and got bunched up. Otherwise a great dress for a work function.

links_reviews_title: The off the shoulder flared sleeves
links_reviews_text: The unique style of off the shoulder flared sleeves really calls attention to the wearer. I felt gorgeous and special. My dress stood out against most every other woman at the event. LOVED it! The size was right, the fit was great, the material was high quality, comfortable, and didn't wrinkle despite a 1 hour-long car ride. Before getting it, I feared the sleeves would be too tight to hold on my arms but they weren't! It was totally comfortable.
I chose this dress for a formal evening and am still getting compliments!! I almost chose to keep it. I usually wear a 4 but can fluctuate between 2-6 but the 4 fit perfectly.
I rented this for a wedding! It was beautiful! Great fabric which helps provide coverage and extremely comfortable. I danced all night!

I haven't felt so good in a dress in a long time. This dress was really flattering and comfortable. It was easy to dance in and the top didn't bother me one bit. There's this rubbery lining that keeps the dress in place. It was my favorite LBD yet.
It's a great dress. Runs true to size. I am 5'3 and did shorten it with fashion tape but otherwise I was obsessed with the dress. It is stretchy and comfy. Enjoy!
Perfect fit
This dress was perfect for my husband's holiday party! It fit perfectly and was so comfortable. Very true to size. I could have worn a size smaller.
This dress covered all the right places. It was easy to move in. The only issue I had was the very top inner band. It kept showing. Luckily it wasn't too noticeable.

This dress was a nice thick material. Perfect for a fall wedding. It does have a little give so I fit in either 0 or 2 but opt it for the 0. I received many compliments and felt beautiful. It is sexy but not exposing. I would rent this one again.

links_reviews_title: Wore the dress for a charity gala for aviation
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable!!
Great dress. Honestly didn't find the sleeves as restrictive as I had expected. It was perfect for a chilly November wedding in wine country

links_reviews_title: pleasantly surprised...you will not regret this rental!!
links_reviews_text: I was hesitant to rent this dress because it is very different from my usual style, I don't normally go with form fitting. But I read the reviews, and people of all shapes and sizes seemed to love it so I went with it and I'm so glad I did! It may be my favorite rental to date! It just fits so well and really makes you look amazing! I didn't need to wear a bra with it and had no issues with it staying up or anything. Easy to move in unless you need to raise your arms up high. My husband couldn't close his mouth all night, it is a stunner! I actually want to buy this dress, it's so great! If you have any hesitations, but them aside and get this dress, you won't regret it!

this dress was very flattering. my only complaint was not being able to raise my arms for dancing. the dress stayed up great. i like to raise my arms to dance, but if you're not a crazy dancer.... this dress is a hit!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfectly classy with some edge to it!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so amazing! The material was forgiving yet flattering, I felt amazing in it. I got so many compliments and I just felt like a million bucks! I danced in it all night long! I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, not great for dining
links_reviews_text: Nice dress, great fabric, wasn't too fitted in the mid-section. 4 months postpartum, and I barely had to suck it in in this picture. However, the neckline made it difficult to enjoy dinner, I would not recommend this dress for a 7+ course meal.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Made my night!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! Love the off the shoulder neck line! Really complimented my figure!

This dress was perfect! Great fit, beautiful style, and so comfortable! The size 8 wasn't tight so I felt comfortable standing and sitting, but it was fitting enough to be perfectly flattering in all the right places. I'll definitely rent this again!
This should've looked good, it looked so good on so many people in the reviews, but for me at 5'5" the length was incredibly awkward. Kind of church like or matronly. All in all not good on me.

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable, easy to accessorize, and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size.
Wore this dress to a company holiday party. It was super comfortable, fitted in all the right places, and very flattering. I got so many compliments too!

links_reviews_title: I felt elegant and sexy in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautifully made with a wrinkle free, flexible material. It does run a lil snug in the sleeve. The dress hit just a tad below the knee and I didn’t have any problem walking. It’s a nice thick material but wasn’t hot and it never lost shape! I will definitely rent this one again and I highly recommend it! This was my first rental and it was an A+++ experience!!

This dress was awesome! SO flattering. The material was a little heavier (not significantly, but just enough) and hid flaws masterfully. Has a little bit of give, but not much. Felt very comfortable - even with the off the shoulder style. Recieved tons of compliments. I want to own this dress.
The fit is tight through the butt and hips. I had to wear the larger size which made the top slightly large. But i still LOVED the dress and received countless compliments.

This dress was perfectly elegant for Christmas. I was alittle nervous about the fit around the shoulders but I had no problem moving my arms around (and picking up my kids). The fit was true to size and the material was thick enough to hide any imperfections. I would definitejy rent this dress again!!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a formal charity event. I felt sexy without overexposing legs or cleavage
links_reviews_text: There are no negatives to the dress. The off the shoulder and dramatic sleeve details are stunning. The fabric is very forgiving and slimming. It is very comfortable and sexy.
So flattering. Stunning dress that hides problem areas like arms, hips, and belly well. Did wear spanx ; )

I loved this dress and received many compliments. Material is high quality and hugs every curve. I would have liked to try a size smaller to see if it addressed some of the excess fabric up top (I'm pear shaped), but you could barely tell and it was very comfortable for sitting and dancing. Plus, the Stevie Nicks sleeves!!
This dress is fabulous. Classy and beautiful. I am 5'1 with an hourglass figure. I think I could have worn the size 2 and it have worked a bit better, but the dress was still absolutely stunning.
Fits true to size. Great dress for a wedding! You can dress it up or down. Great length. Fun dress!

I loved this dress! It was very flattering on my 5'3" frame. I'm an hourglass shape and it was perfect! I do have slightly bigger arms and it was a tad tight in the arms, but not terribly uncomfortable. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: i had many compliments on this dress throughout the night!
links_reviews_text: i had many compliments on this throughout the night!
Loved this dress! Got a ton of compliments. It was comfortable and classy. May have to rent it again next fall for anther event!
Great fit, I went a size up but it ended up being a little big, still worked for my event and got tons of compliments. Loved it, so comfortable and easy to wear.

Such a pretty dress! The model pictures were a little deceiving to me because it looked like the dress would be a stretchy material and it was not, but it was still so comfortable! Mine came with a small tear in a little bit of the lace on the front, but it wasn't noticeable once the dress was on.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments. Perfectly unique and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! totally unique, both the colors and the way the red lace lies over the silky fabric underneath. I had to rent a 2L because it was the only size available, and I pinned up the bottom. But the bust, waist, and hips fit perfectly.
I wore this dress to a "woodsy glam" wedding and it was perfect. The lacy overlay was a nice touch and the color is a muted coral. Fitted in the waist and hips but this made me look tall and thin!

links_reviews_title: My backup for the backup saved the night!
links_reviews_text: I had originally rented another dress and a backup. Unfortunately, neither of these worked. RTR to the rescue! They sent 3 alternates by the next day and this one was my favorite! It was comfortable, easy to move around in, and I got a ton of compliments all night long. I wore this to a Holiday Black Tie event and the red was perfect!
Fit me like a glove, I wore 2-3 inch heels and the length was perfect!! I received so many compliments. It is even prettier in person and the color is beautiful!!

LOVED this dress! I'm 5'2" and rented a Petite size - wore 3.5" heels and the dress was the perfect length. I'm hourglassy and the top of the dress was perfectly fitted for me. I would definitely order this one again! The lace overlay is a bit delicate, so don't wear shoes or carry a clutch that might get snagged.

links_reviews_title: It was a gorgeous wedding in Savannah, GA and I felt so beautiful and unique in this stunning dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit is pretty straight forward - the dress isn't too tight but it has clean lines and drapes nicely on your figure, I didn't have to wear Spanx even.
I loved this dress! It was comfy, flattering, and such a beautiful color. Perfect for a black tie wedding!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for A Night of Magic
links_reviews_text: We went to a magic show and dinner where the dress code was cocktail . This dress was perfect for the evening . It is was comfortable to wear and I loved the color and fit . I wore a 12r and I needed a little assistance zipping it up in the back , it needed a little persuasion but once I as zipped in , it fit great and I didn't feel constricted . For reference my bust size is 36Cand measurements under the bust is 38( area I needed to persuade the zipper )

I absolutely loved this dress!! The color is so vibrant in person I received endless compliments all night! Very flattering due to the lace and was so comfortable! I danced all night and it was perfect. I'm very petite but with my 4" heels it barely hit the floor so it was fine. I'd certainly rent again!
I loved the dress but it wasn't very flattering on me. It was a beautiful color and I really liked the lace. The dress seemed a little too "used", but overall, I was happy.

Loved this dress! Fir tts and really well. It was fitted but I could still move and eat in it. Length was great - I'm 5'5 and with 2 inch heels, I didn't run into any issues with he length. Really a standout dress and perfect for a black tie event. Would 100% rent this again!
Fits great. Would have gone a size down but wasn't available

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an early spring wedding. Super comfortable and beautiful detail.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 but glad I got the 8 for back up because it fit much better. This was my first experience with Rent the Runway and I'll definitely use them again!

I rented this dress for a formal event on a work trip. It was comfortable all night long. I was able to wear a regular bra without my straps showing. The dress flows nicely, a little snug through the bust but then it flares out. I am 5'7" and wore a 2 inch heel and stepped on the dress a few times, a 3 inch heel would have been perfect. I received a lot of compliments. It is pretty but it's not my most favorite RTR dress.
-works with a normal bra -stunning colors -comfortable dress

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing, but loved this dress.
links_reviews_text: So I didn't end up wearing this dress to my event, but it was a really hard decision. I decided the other dress I rented was fancier for the occasion. But this dress was gorgeous and I want to rent it again to actually wear. It fit perfectly and was super comfortable. Not to mention gorgeous in person.

links_reviews_title: Great for a summer evening wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved that this long dress came in a petite length. Felt comfortable and pretty all evening. The venue was a little more formal, so this was perfect. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing another dress, but this one was absolutely beautiful on.
links_reviews_text: I have an athletic build, and this dress was very fitted through the bodice. It didn't look bad per se, but it hugged every curve. It was very comfortable, and with 3" heels I didn't have any issues with it dragging on the ground. There was another woman at the party who wore it, so it worked out that I didn't end up going with this style - and it looked great on her, too!
This dress is more beautiful in person than in picture. Very feminine, beautiful overlying lace material. Fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: RTR made getting a beautiful dress simple and painless.
links_reviews_text: Very good fit, a bit long. This dress was comfortable and I received a lot of compliments.

Loved the color and details of this dress. It was comfortable and easy to move in, and I got so many compliments. I normally wear a size 4 but the 4 that was sent had a pretty sizable tear right in the front so I wore the size 6. For the most part it fit the same, but it was pretty loose up top. I spent a lot of time adjusting and making sure my bra wasn't showing.

links_reviews_title: Not as formal in person as I anticipated from the pictures.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this dress, but didn't end up wearing it. From the pictures I thought the material was more formal. It wasn't dressy enough for our military ball. Up close it looked more like a fancier sun dress (to me and my husband).

This dress was perfect for the wedding I went to at the end of September! It was very lightweight and flowy, and the color was gorgeous. I sized down (0R) for my backup and could have went with either from a fit perspective but the 2R was a slightly longer length and worked better with the heels I was wearing. Definitely recommend!
Received many compliments
Loved this dress. I'm 5'6 and ordered the long. It was perfect w 3 inch heels.
Very comfortable fit and can wear a racerback bra. VERY long so tall shoes required.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal, festive wedding
links_reviews_text: The color and design is even better in person. The cut is amazing and the fit was perfect - just gotta hold in your stomach as it's more skimming than forgiving. The fabric is super lightweight and flowy.

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed this dress! It was different, fancy and fun. Would have liked to try a 14L.
links_reviews_text: Although I am not unusually tall (5'6") I opted for the long and it fit great with 3 inch heels. The dress fit pretty well, but I think a 14L would have been even better.
Beautiful and comfortable dress , fits like a glove , wore it to a wedding .

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a beautiful wedding in Saratoga, NY.
links_reviews_text: This dress is even more beautiful in person. I loved the fit, and received a ton of compliments on it. I normally wear a size 4, but after reading reviews decided to size up to a 6, and it fit PERFECT. I was nervous about the length, because I am short (5'1), but it was perfect with 3 inch heel. I also was so happy that you could wear a regular bra. If you are considering this dress, do it, you won't be disappointed!

The dress is very comfortable and a pretty color. It's not exactly red thanks to the white lace overlay, so it feels less "lady in red" for a wedding. It was fitted nicely at the top. The bottom is a little bulky feeling and I thought it looked a little heavy for me, but it's not unlike the picture shows, so it wasn't a surprise. Also, I was between the R and the L, being 5'8". I opted for the L and wore higher heels, however I did find myself holding it off the floor a lot, especially while dancing, in order to avoid tripping or stepping on it (myself and/or others!). I paired it with nude heels and a nude bag, and my grandmother's necklace sitting on the neckline. The pattern makes it so you can keep the jewelry simple without looking unfinished. (I don't weigh myself for personal health reasons, but I know it can be helpful for reference so it's somewhere between 127 and 140 lbs.)

This dress fit perfectly. The waist fit perfectly and was super flattering on a busty figure. It could be worn with a real, regular bra and you could dance all night without worrying about anything falling out, it was perfect!
Loved this dress! Perfect length with my 2" heels. A little snug in the chest but I'm busty. Received many compliments and I was comfortable all night!

It fit true to size for me and I loved the way it flowed. The lace detail on the top is gorgeous. So comfy, you can wear a regular bra and I wore spanks but didn't even really need them. Loved it. I got so many compliments!!!!

links_reviews_title: RTR made planning for an out of town wedding a breeze!
links_reviews_text: Pros: This dress is beautiful! Its even more beautiful in person! I'm typically not one to wear red but this dress incorporates nude and hints of coral as well. Its easy to wear and is conservative yet sexy at the same time. I received so many compliments! Cons: Let me preface these cons by saying the design of the dress is not at fault here. The 4P was not available so even with a heel the 4R was a bit long for my height. I just had to be mindful to pick up so I didn't trip. The second con was that about 3/4" of my bra wanted to show on each side. I was able to remedy this with double sided tape. Again, not the dresses fault, it was recommended for up to a C cup and I am a DD. I just loved the dress so much that I was willing to tape it where needed to make it work.
Felt tight across the chest, but overall very flattering for my figure. And I could wear a regular bra.
Color and detail is gorgeous. Easy to wear!

links_reviews_title: Slightly long, but so beautiful! Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Dress was too long in the 2R, but I'm short so I guess it's inevitable. I used fashion tape and it worked out fine. The detail in the back fades near the bottom so it looks ombre, which was not shown as much in the pictures and it's GORGEOUS. Loved this dress!
Wore for engagement photos. It's absolutely gorgeous, and not too heavy!
Based on reviews I ordered the 6 and the 4 as my back up size. I wore the 4. It fit nicely and I received many compliments. It was the perfect choice for a holiday party.

Loved this dress! Really fun and comfortable. I am usually an 8 but I wore the 12 because I was 14 weeks pregnant at the time. I could have worn the 10 but the 12 felt better (huge pregnancy boobs haha) Great dress and I would rent again-pregnant or not!

links_reviews_title: Love this red key hood dress. Very flattering! Easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress. Got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Who doesn't stand out wearing red?
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, not too tight in the hips, and very flattering at the top. I had to wear a strapless bra with it.
Dress for great. I usually wear size 4 but ordered an 8 for my pregnant belly. Had plenty of room and the color was great!

links_reviews_title: Festive Christmas Party Dress, I could dance all night long!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little big. I wish I had gotten the 2 instead of a 4 (my regular size) plus a 6 as backup. I rented this for my work's Christmas party. Overall, it was cute and comfortable. It's definitely not form fitting but that meant I could eat and dance the night away!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and great for Christmas holiday!
links_reviews_text: Overall the fit was good, but I normally wear a size 2. It was a little bit long, but an appropriate length for a work function. I had many compliments on the color.

Wore this beautiful dress in Vegas for a night on the town. Was very happy with it! Fit a tad snug through my thigh area but a size up would have been too big, so pretty true to size. Loved the color and feel!

I chose the size 6 based on other reviews, but wish I had gone with a 4 because I feel it did run large. I had to position it a certain way so my (strapless) bra wouldn't hang out for this photo, and then I was so uncomfortable that I wore a cardigan throughout the event. There's nothing special about this but if you're looking for a simple red dress, this will do the trick.
This was my backup dress and I loved it more than the original dress choice. Throw in red lipstick and you're set!

Loved the dress! The only issue I found was that you could not wear a strapless bra with this dress, and I ended up getting stick on petals. The dress was great for a summer wedding, and I got a lot of compliments on the color. I wore the bigger size due to it being tighter on the top! Definitely would rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Fun yet elegant summer wedding dress
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! It was comfortable and flowy and still had a nice shape to it.
Loved this dress. Comfortable, didn't wrinkle. Ended up wearing the bigger back up size & probably could have even wore 1 size bigger for the chest area. Perfect length too.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a patriotic concert!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. A little tricky with the crepe material when it is hot outside. I loved the color and enjoyed this dress.
This was one of my favorite rentals ever. Very flattering. Hid my first trimester baby bump. I want to buy this dress. I feel like it could be a closet staple- dress up or down for any event!
Beautiful color! The shape is flattering, without being too frumpy or too revealing.

This red dress was simple but darling! I loved the key hole front and the back was also very flattering too. I wore this dress for family photos and really wish I would have had another event to wear it to as I really wanted to wear it again.
I loved this dress! A high neck line usually makes me feel like Im choking, but this didnt, very comfortable. Bump friendly for sure! I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: came the day before event and it fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: perfect length and material - not clingy. Not tight up top

links_reviews_title: Murder mystery masquerade where everyone came in costume and played their character well.
links_reviews_text: This dress was my "back up style" but it was so comfortable and vibrant when I tried it on that I decided to wear this dress instead. This dress was much more complimenting to my body shape and I could move around more freely. This dress would be difficult to wear with a bra that's not strapless. Also the collar felt tighter around the neck when sitting down.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super comfortable! The color is very fun and I got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It's a little tricky to wear a bra, but I used little pasties to keep me from feeling self conscious
Kind of underwhelming but fine for a date night. It's definitely flowy so it's not super flattering but I don't mind that look

I loved this dress! I ended up wearing my typical size - size 8, though most people said to size down. This size fit my hips best and was so comfy! The fabric of the dress is pretty thin and my strapless bra wouldn't work with it so I ended up wearing petals and it worked great. Such a breezy, gorgeous dress for a gala! I felt so pretty!

I chose to wear the size 6 because it fit my curvier backside, however, the size 4 fit my top half much better; so, if you aren't curvy at the bottom, the dress does run large. The material also shows a lot, so be mindful of undergarment choices. I had some adhesion issues on my "sticky bra," so there were lines every so often. If you are lucky enough to not have to wear a bra, go for it! Overall, I really loved the dress! It was a great lightweight material that was easy to move around in, accessorize...and left room for extra dessert ;) For the short ladies, it is a great length, despite what it looks like on the model.
Can be dressed up or down. Fits well in bust and then rather loose like a shift dress overall. Color is gorgeous. Fabric is not too heavy at all. Flows pretty.

I usually wear a size 4 in my RTR dresses, but I didn't even order the 4 this time as I was feeling more fluffy. The 6 was a good fit. Looser and super comfortable. The material was so lightweight. It was a great dress!

I'm between a size 8 and 10.. wore the 8 and it fit perfectly. I was worried it wouldn't be long enough but length wasn't an issue. Couldn't wear a bra with it, so had to find an alternative. Overall, really loved the fit... even being pregnant in the photo :-)

This dress made me feel fantastic. I am 5'5" and 135 pounds. I ordered the 4&6 and the 6 fit my broad back and shoulders a little more comfortably. I was attending a cocktail and dinner event for work and this was perfect. So many compliments! This is the perfect red - not an orange red, more of a blue red so really perfect for me. I would buy this if I could!

I received many compliments on this dress and the color really popped. I have broader shoulders so the smaller size was a little tight there, but otherwise would've fit. I recommend ordering your size and one smaller as the back up. Very comfortable too!

Wore this for a summer Fourth of July wedding. Was able to dress it up with some white drop earrings and heels, but could definitely be dressed down with stud earrings and sandals. The thin material kept me cool in the summer heat and I wasn't yanking or readjusting it throughout the day. Highly recommend!! Stunning red color.

Really wish I owned this one! Usually, dresses this shape are tough unless you are tiny (which I am not) but this one was so flattering, I thought. Great color, nice and cool for an outdoor wedding in the summer in the south! Definitely runs a little large - prob could have gone with the 4.
Love it
Loved this dress! Very flattering dress on a curvier figure

I wore this dress for a wedding and it was a great decision in that the dress fit loose and was comfortable for dancing (and eating). The length was great and the material was really light/thin (lighter than expected). I do wish that it had more shape to it though. Overall, this was a great choice!

Hello comfy town! This dress was so easy to put on and leaves you tons of room to move around. It's also surprisingly great length for a six-footer like myself. Debating between this dress and another to wear to a bachelorette party. Will probably go with a more form fitting one, but bringing this on the trip! You could 100% wear this to a wedding, work party, or more family-oriented/church event.

I rented this for a rehearsal wedding. It was comfortable and right on trend of high neck/cutout. It is a very thin fabric so be careful with undergarments. Due to fabric/material it needed alittle steaming upon arrival. Sized up in this rental. I was alittle loose in some areas, but I think a size down would have been snug across hips
Loved everything about this dress!
I really like the fit and feel of the dress. Already planning to rent again for an upcoming rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Wore it in NYC for my 40 th birthday celebration and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size and didn’t gap at all
Flattering on all body types - perfect to wear as a guest to a summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: I had a stylist that helped me find a dress that would fit my pregnant belly.
links_reviews_text: I would usually wear a 6 from RTR but since I was 36 week late pregnant I ordered a 8R and 10P. The 8 felt too snug and the straps were way to long. The 10 fit a lot better and the straps seemed to be already altered. My belly made the dress shorter so I went ahead and wore flats. I received a lot of compliments throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress for a gala. Had so many compliments, especially the color!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size and is very comfortable. Danced the night away in it! I'm 5'4" and the dress was a little long. Had to wear a 4" inch heel. If you want a lower heel and no worries about catching the hem, maybe go with the petite.

links_reviews_title: didn't end up wearing it as I liked my other choice better, but it was very pretty on.
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit big, the 6R was large and I usually wear an 8. Especially loose around the chest for me (36C cup). Very pretty and classy gown. One thing I thought was strange, and maybe I missed it in reviews or the description - on the side of the gown, where the zipper is, the top layer of the gown (with the embellishments) is seperated to make room for the zipper. this creates a gaping area under your left arm, which I would have tried to close up with a safety pin if I had worn the dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress is GORGEOUS! I got so many compliments all night long. Breathtaking highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable and fit like a glove. Danced all night with no issues. Length was great not to the floor which made it easier to dance! Straps were a little big but other then that perfect fit.
I wore this for a fancy rehearsal dinner and felt so pretty and comfortable in it! Perfect for a spring/summer occasion because the material was light and airy.

links_reviews_title: Everyone said how beautiful I looked
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful but, the straps were way too long and kept slipping off my shoulders all night. The dress runs true to size, despite the others reviews...
