Dress fit perfectly, no issues with the zipper. The straps are pretty long though so I ended up clipping them together in the back. Sparkles and is very comfortable to wear.

Absolutely loved this dress! I'm all about comfort and it was great to wear to a wedding that was an all day affair! I got so many compliments asking where I got the gown and you bet I raved about Rent the Runway! The only thing I have to say is that the straps were very big and unadjustable. Other than that, great rent!

Overall great fit, though the length was still a bit short even in the Long--hit at bottom of ankle instead of true floor-length, and I'm 5'7". But waist hit just right and the silhouette was great. The backup size I ordered was not in good condition. The straps were completely stretched out so I couldn't wear it if I wanted to, so that was disappointing as it would have been a more fitted look.
Fit true to size although a little short so I had to go with a long to wear with heels. Was comfortable (for a sequin gown) and looked great with my husband’s blues.

Wow. I LOVE this dress. It is so simple but uber elegant. I rented this for a fundraising gala and received compliments all night long. I'm 5' 4" and 3" heels made this dress the perfect length. I tried on the 4R also, but it was super short; I think someone must have cut off the bottom. The 2R was about 3" longer than the 4R! Some reviews said that the straps were too long, but I don't agree. You cannot go wrong with this dress.
This dress fit true to size with some flow which made it all the more comfortable. 10 out of 10 will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and a great fit (with some tweaking)
links_reviews_text: I rented both the 0R and 2R after looking at reviews and seeing that the sizes ran large. I was a little surprised how snug and without give the middle was. I am currently a bit larger around the middle becuase I am only 3 weeks post-partum, but with some parts of the dress running so big, I expected the middle to also be a bit bigger. It was a bit snug for me, but not uncomfortable. The straps were super long so I had to pin them back, which was fine. The sequins were beautiful and there wasn't any wear on the sequins or stitching. The length was perfect for me, I am 5'2" and I wore shorter heels. This dress was great for our event and made me feel beautiful and comfortable, even at a few weeks post-partum!

links_reviews_title: Ordered for my daughter looked great on her!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Mardi Gras Ball!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Im 5'2 and 125lbs. I wore the 2R. Length was perfect, top was a little loose but felt great on and easy to dance in.

The dress fit really well and was beautiful in person. It ran true to size, the only issue was that the straps were WAY too long. I had to safety pin them down to keep the dress on, and had to deal with that all night. Otherwise loved the dress and got a lot of compliments on it at my work holiday party.

I rented this dress in an 8R and 10R. The 8R was actually more stretched out and loose than the 10 was. I wore this to an outdoors wedding in upstate NY and loved it! This was actually my third choice as my first two options didn't end up working out but received lots of compliments. The regular length was perfect for my 5'2 height with some mid level chunky heels.
I had recently had a baby so I was worried about the size but it runs large so I was able to wear the 6 instead of 8. The color was a little darker than I'd hope but overall it was perfect.

I loved this dress (and so did everyone else!) It was just the right balance of glitz and glam without being way over the top. The sequins are matte but they shimmer just enough in the light. The 10 was just the right length for me (I'm 5' 3") and was just loose enough in the body to be comfortable and wasn't feeling like I was going to explode out of it. I was getting compliments on this dress all night and felt fabulous! There were a few cons. The straps on this are WAY too long and WAY too flimsy. I definitely had to use safety pins to shorten them and I was freaking out all night that one of the straps were going to snap because they were so thin. I rented the 12R as my back up and let's just say the sizing between the 10 and the 12 is baffling. The 12 was HUGE everywhere, the straps were at least 4 inches longer, so at 5' 3", there was no way I could wear it because there was about 10 inches of dress at the bottom. The sequins do catch a bit on other fabrics so you should be careful with that. But I didn't have any issues or irritation under my arms from them so that's a plus! Despite the cons, it truly is a beautiful dress and would certainly rent it again!

Nice dress. Great fr any cup, I felt that it did not anchor enough for me in the bust. Would recommend wearing a strapless bra Dress does fall to the group, due to my height I would definitely have done better with a Long rather than a Regular. The dress does not stretch however the slip does. Dress fell comfortably at my natural waist. Would recommend taking the next size up as a back up.

links_reviews_title: Great color, flattering fit, NO ZIPPER! :)
links_reviews_text: Fit great, I went up a size so it would not be too tight and would drape like in the stock photo and I'm glad I did. The straps were EXTREMELY stretched out so I did have to pin them back, but it was worth it. Also, there is no L (long) option...I ordered the 14L and just got a 14. It could've used a little more length, but I was ok with it. I got so many compliments and felt comfortable and confident all night.

links_reviews_title: The dress made me feel beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great, got lots of compliments, thought the dress felt cheaply made, but no one knew that. The straps kept falling, but I just kept dancing and I danced all night in this dress!

It was very big on me, I had to safety pin several areas of the dress to stay up on me. I ended up getting them to overnight me a 16 which is what I'm wearing in the picture and it was still too big. It's huge in the chest area. I am tall so I ordered up a size because they were it of long!
Definitely wear high high high heels!

I rented this dress for a last minute prom and I could not have been happier. I was initially going to wear the 8L, but the sparkles were faded and and it didn't seem any larger (I think it's been through dry-cleaning too many times). The straps on the dress were very long, but all it took was a couple of safety pins. I would not have gone any shorter in length because the L grazed the ground when I wore heals. The 6L was still a great fit and I got so many compliments throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: Sparkles beautifully--perfect for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my law school formal and it turned out perfectly! The dress is a beautiful dark blue and photos don't show the full effect of its sparkle. If you have a large bust, it has ample space up top without being huge everywhere else. The dress was a little on the short side though-- I am 5'3" and it was a perfect length on me, but would be too short on someone a few inches taller. All in all, I would definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! Definitely would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! I wore a 6R, but the dress runs large and probably could have worn a 4. The straps on the dress were long, but they could have easily been pinned to make them shorter. (I didn't do that because I was afraid it would damage the dress, but I'm sure it could have been done.) The only other thing is I would be to order a long if you want to wear tall heels... I'm 5'4" and my heels may have been 2.5 inches and you could see my shoes under the dress. Overall, the dress was very comfortable and fun - lots of compliments on the dress! I would definitely recommend this dress and RTR! First experience with RTR and this won't be my last!!

links_reviews_title: RTR was the perfect choice for this event. Will def. use again!
links_reviews_text: The fit and length was perfect for what I wanted. The straps were too long but I fixed that problem with 2 small safety pins. I love that they send two sizes. The original size I chose (2 reg) ended up being way too big so my backup size (0 reg) was what I wore. Being only 5'1 I was afraid the regular length would be too long (petite length was not available for my event date) but with 2 inch heels it was the perfect length. I'm actually barefoot in the full length picture w

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Love, love this dress! This was my first RTR rental and I received endless compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Loved the color and the detail. Only con was that I couldn't keep it!

The dress was a little large in the back but overall fit very nicely. I'm 5'9' and was very happy that I got the long because otherwise it would have been too short. Also, I had to pin down the straps because they were way too long:

I wore this dress to a Christmas party. The sequins are beautiful in person, but not as crazy sparkly as normal sequins. The muted shine was subtle and not over the top, exactly what I wanted. I selected the 14R and the 16L since those were the two available for my delivery date. The 14 fit well, but definitely was a bit shorter than I preferred and was a bit snug in my tummy area. I ended up wearing the 16L and was so comfortable all night! The only thing I would've changed are the straps. I had to pin them together with a safety pin in the back to keep them from falling down. Other than that, I loved the dress! Would definitely rent again and would absolutely recommend!
Fit was very comfy and easy- you won't have to be adjusting it all night. It was very pretty. I don't know if I'd call it a showstopper but you won't be disappointed!

Overall i was pleased with the order as it worked perfectly for he black tie wedding I attended in November. The prior reviews were helpful, so I was sure to order up on size. The fit was good & flattering. The proportions of the dress were a little unusual. For instance, the straps were too long, but someone who had rented it before me had pinned them & it worked well for me. And I am 5'6", but the regular length was about 3 inches too short. If the long had been available I would have ordered & it would have been fine. I was comfortable all evening & got lots of compliments. The ordering, shipping, & return set up for RTR is so easy - I will definitely rent from them again!
Beautiful dress and perfect fit. I loved wearing this for a great Gatsby themed party.

I loved this dress! I am a full figure, I wear a size 16-18, 210 Lbs and a 42DD bra. This dress was actually a little larger than I was expecting! I was able to wear the smaller size! It fit great, was comfortable & the sparkle was lovely. Bought this for a wedding my husband and I sang at and it looked so beautiful under the lights. I will say that if you are over 5' 4" or 5' 5" to go with the Long option on this one. I am 5' 4" and it was the perfect length for me,

This dress was great! As others have said, the straps were long, but as long as I kept decent posture, it wasn't a problem. The length was perfect with my 4" heels (as expected). The sequins are matte, which I didn't expect, but I loved. Also, there's a side zipper that gets very smartly concealed by snaps in the top portion of the sequin fabric. All in all, I felt very comfortable in this great dress, the bride was happy with it, and I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful for black tie affair!! Tons of compliments and beautiful color!!
links_reviews_text: Size down for your backup. I normally wear a 4R, but wore a 2R (I am 5ft4in, 135lbs, and B bust). It is very comfortable!! Moves beautifully and looks expensive!! Awesome experience for my first RTR!!

links_reviews_title: LONG STRAPS, have a trick up your sleeve to adjust
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a 1920's fundraiser (and took my own selfie in the bathroom). The dress was totally appropriate and mild, for the theme. I'm 5'6" and today 190lbs. Additionally, I'm probably rocking a size 14 dress. That being said, I sized down to a 12, and also a long (not that long ladies). I had plenty of room, and probably could go down to a 10. I wore 2.5" shoes and the dress barely grazed the ground. I'm not sure how truly tall women would do with this dress. My shape is very rectangular, and this dress wasn't particularly suited to flatter me. HOWEVER, I felt amazing in it! My only complaint is how darn loose the straps were. I messed with them all night. In short, order a long and size down 1-2.
Though the dress was a little long (I am 5'4"), it fit well everywhere else. I got compliments all night!

I'm a curvy girl so it's hard to find a sleek dress that doesn't make me look pregnant lol. This dress is so flattering. The inner lining has a nice stretch to it making it comfortable to wear. Only complaint is that the straps were really long and non adjustable. I ended up having to safety pin them or the straps would have fallen down all night. Overall I received a lot of compliments and I felt good wearing it.

links_reviews_title: So flattering and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding and received so many compliments. I did buy a back less (sticky) bra to wear . The dress is beautiful and so well made, the top part is stretchy and comfortable. Loved this dress and wish I owned it to wear over and over!

Oh my gosh. I felt like a million bucks in this dress. I wore this to an Art Center Gala. So fantastic. It's so flattering and fits in all the right places. Normally I wear an 8 - but I wore a 6 in this. Back is open and I got soooo many compliments. If I could have bought this dress, I would have. Highly Recommend! Warning though: you can't really wear a bra with it. I wore those sticky cup things.

I was sad to return this dress. The material on top is so comfortable, I wore a sticky bra, but really didn't have to wear one if I didn't want to. The clasps on the back are so stylish and the bottom was so flowy and eye catching. I could see this dress working for so many different events. I received compliments all night, and hello, there pockets!?

I have a petite frame (32 bra strap) and the clips on the back were just a hair too loose. Everywhere else fit just right. Dress was pretty, classy, and I received compliments. Family-friendly and festive for a winter wedding.
It was a great fit. A fun party dress! Very comfortable and flattering. The top clasp was a little problematic and opened up twice. (But that was my only issue.)

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and people insisted I buy!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a work holiday party and received so many compliments! I've been very self conscious of my weight gain post-college but this is the most flattering dress; it made me feel like all my bumps were hidden in the best ways. You can totally wear a regular bra with this, or if it fits right, the fabric is thick enough I felt comfortable without. Classy enough without jewelry, but a simple long gold necklace added the perfect glam. And the best part? POCKETS!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and lots of complements!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Friday night wedding in October. I wish I could have kept the dress! It fit like a glove and I received so many complements. I wore a size 2 and it was true to size. No need to wear a bra which is always a plus! The only con was that I wasn't able to hook the clasps on the back of the dress on my own, so make sure you have someone around to help you! Overall I rate this dress 10 out of 10! I can't wait to rent it again!
A great flattering fit and pockets!!

links_reviews_title: Stunning, fun, and fabulous dress, with pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me like a glove! It was snug around the rib-cage, but not uncomfortable. It was so well-lined and made out of thick, good-quality fabric. The dress gave me a beautiful silhouette. I didn't need to wear a bra, but I am pretty small-busted. I was comfortable dancing in it all night long. It was actually my back-up dress, but I loved it so much I just HAD to wear it and I'm glad I did! I wanted to keep it.

links_reviews_title: It was black tie optional wedding full of dancing. Beautiful, slightly windy night.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. The clasps were a little difficult but once I figured it out, no big deal. I was able to wear it without a bra and got complimented on the dress multiple times!!

The middle strap was slightly loose on me but it was not noticeable to others. Super flattering. My first high low dress and I loved it! Thicker fabric so it keeps you relatively warm considering it's backless. I didn't read that it had pockets in reviews so I discovered them during the Macarena and it made my night. Would recommend this dress. I would debate purchasing it.

This dress was a dream, I felt so comfortable and pretty in it. With bigger boobs, it was actually incredibly supportive and fitted without a bra. The flowyness and asymmetrical hem was really cute and fun to dance in. I was sad to have to take it off, and it was perfect for a fancy formal wedding.
Need at least a size smaller. The dress was gorgeous but it did not flatter my finger mute as well being bottom heavy. Pockets!!

Absolutely perfect. I'm 5'3", 127 and this dress fit like a glove. I ordered a 4 also, but there's just enough stretch in the bust to fit my stick on cups (haha)! It was seriously just so easy to wear. Good length for a formal affair, and had zero issues or even thought about it all night!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a friends sparkle birthday party, fun dress!
links_reviews_text: Flattering fits true to siZe

As soon as I saw this dress on RtR, I knew I had to rent it. Depending on dress sizes, I wear a 0 or 2, and the 2 fit me perfectly. I didn't even need to wear a bra! It's elegant but also flirty, and the high-low skirt worked perfectly with 4" heels.
I have a short torso, so it was too long on top and gapped at the sides. I used a a safety pin to pull it up in the back. Other than that, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: A fancy dress that is sexy and has pockets!
links_reviews_text: I received compliments all through the night on this gown at a Make a Wish Fundraiser. I have a back tattoo that was perfectly framed by the dress (not my purpose but hey it worked). The dress is relatively comfortable, hardest part for me, as a tiny chested lady, was finding a sticky bra that fit. I will say "true to size" because it fit in the body well and the neck held the dress up with no fault. Now the one lower back strap was a little loose, but that's the only part that ran large.

Won a "best-dressed" award in this cute little number. Loved the length, even for someone as petite as I am. Pockets were a huge bonus as I didn't have to carry a clutch. The top puckered a little around my underarms/side cleavage, but it wasn't noticeable with my hair down.

The 6 fit me just about perfectly. It gapped a tiny bit under my armpits and the strap across the back was slightly too big but nothing noticeable. I wore a sticky bra more for my comfort. The dress was so comfortable, I wasn’t pulling at anything during the night. The high low was perfect- not too short in the front and not too long in the back. I got so many compliments on it! I wish I owned this!

It fit great, however, I would say it ran a little big for size. I haven't worn a 2 in years but could have with this dress. I don't know if it is because it was sleeveless and somewhat backless, which is wear a 2 is often tight on me. I am a petite shape with a small waist. I was able to wear this braless with pasties since it was backless-ish. Didn't want to deal with a sticky type bra. It was so comfortable. Very soft, not itchy. Was breathable. Oh AND POCKETS!! Just loved the simplicity of it, the material, the high-low style, and the back looks and clasps. Lots of compliments.
This dress was super comfy (the black top is stretchy and comfy material) and the bottom was a nice poof with pockets. Got lots of compliments at my friends wedding
Perfect dress for a cocktail wedding. Got so many compliments, comfortable, elegant. True size.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! The gold was winner! Loved the cut, and pockets. Received many complaints
links_reviews_text: Top fit was better on size 4. Size 6 was a little loose for smaller chest. I am usually a size 6.
This dress is unbelievable! I put it on and instantly felt amazing! I did end up going with my second dress but I would recommend this dress to all body types! Love the high to low!

I am 5'7 and 135lbs with an athletic/slim build. I ordered a 2 and 4 which I usually am either just depending on the dress. The 2 fit better in the back area since it's open with some pretty closures. I got so many compliments and the pockets were so great!
Cute dress really pretty and very comfortable. Went down a size and wore a 0. Order smaller as your backup.

This dress is amazing. So fun and comfortable. I rented for a company party and it was perfect for dancing all night long and I received a ton of compliments. I would size down for your backup size. I typically wear a 0 or 2 and wore the 0 so the straps in the back would have a tighter fit.

Loved this dress!! The open back is beautiful and I didn't need to wear a bra with it, which is not usually an option for me. The top is stretchy and the skirt sits above your hips. I received lots of compliments on this dress and it was very comfortable to wear. Loved the high/low skirt.

I wore a 4, however, I do think I could have worn a 2. The straps in the back were a bit lose which made the bust area a bit big. It's stretchy, comfortable (wore for 7 hours), and very form fitting. Received so many compliments. Would recommend and wear again!

This dress was perfect for a new year’s eve wedding. It was festive and comfortable and I got tons of compliments. I wore a size two so it would be snug on top. The high low hit me lower because I’m shorter. Overall great dress and would 100% recommend.
The straps in the back were a little loose on both sizes, so I went with the smaller size. Got lots of compliments all night! Great, quality material. Would love to wear again!

Perfect fit! Thick material. I am a 34DD and was able to go braless. The gold on the skirt is stunning. I was worried this dress might be a little boring but it was so fun! Wore it to my work Xmas party and danced all night.

links_reviews_title: This is the best dress! Perfect for a winter wedding. It has pockets!
links_reviews_text: I wore the 2 it fit like a glove. It was comfortable. I received a ton of compliments all evening. I didn’t wear a bra with it but I am smaller chested.

I rented for my husband's law firm holiday party. It fit like a dream and was so flattering! The asymmetrical hem was perfect for my 5'0" frame. It was comfortable with just the right amount of glamorous, and POCKETS!!! Got tons of compliments all night!
I usually wear a 2 but the 0 fit nicely. Beautiful back and the pockets are a fun detail. I got a ton of compliments
Perfect fit, loved the high-low cut for a different style, and pockets were a plus.
I wore this dress to a wedding and it was beautiful, fun and perfect for dancing. I felt comfortable the whole night and would definitely recommend for weddings, holiday or NYE parties.

This dress worked out perfectly! I was a little nervous with it being my first order. I didn't even open my backup size because the 6 fit perfectly. Very comfortable, beautiful (especially with the open back), and great for dancing!
Great fit and perfect for the dance floor. Lots of compliments and jealousy over pockets!

links_reviews_title: What a beautiful color and fabric!
links_reviews_text: A beautiful dress!! My only complaint was that you could see the slip way more than I thought you would and I, personally, did not love that. However, I also have a short torso and a large chest so that may be why. I'm 5'3 and it was a little longer than I prefer but with heels, and the hem, it was unnoticeable. I got so many compliments! I'd rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect casual comfy blue dress for my engagement shoot
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and light with a beautiful popping color and quality material. I recommend pinning together the neckline like I did, because if you're busty an under layer with a different color and material shows through and messes with the beautiful lines of the dress.

Rented this for family picture which was postponed due to unforeseen circumstances. Decided to wear to work instead and it was extremely comfy. Fits great if you are normally size 2. The fabric gives a bit so it was very comfortable to wear.
Light weight, flows nicely, great dress for a dance party.

links_reviews_title: Flattering in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. The bottom was flowy and fun and the top gave me just enough coverage without being too modest. Perfect dress for my husband's holiday party.
I wore this to a holiday party and a dinner party. Comfortable. TTS. Vibrant color! The slip attached has the little buttons for bra straps!

Received a ton of compliments! Loved the color, and the pattern detail. Flattering and like how the material flowed below the waist. Only critique was that my bra straps popped out. Thought I could wear a regular bra with it as they didn't show when I tried on. But with moving/dancing throughout the night they crept out. In hindsight I would have worn a strapless bra. But I definitely recommend!

I really liked this dress with a few minor complaints. The wrap part in the chest area didn't sit very well on my chest and gapped a lot when sitting down. There are also some weird spaghetti straps in the back that kept sticking out which makes the dress seem less classy (I wore a strapless bra so didn't have to worry about bra straps - not sure if that would have had the same issue). Other than those two minor details, I loved how flowy this dress was. It's a super flattering fit and color. It wasn't tight around the ribs/arms which are normally my problem areas. Another successful RTR experience!
Great at waist, very flattering. A bit tight in the arms.

I rented this dress for my recent college reunion. The color is stunning and the texture makes it visually interesting. Unfortunately at 5'3" it hit me at an awkward length. It would've looked better either shorter or much longer.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for cocktail cruise pre-wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a gorgeous color in person and I liked the material. I rented an 8 and a 10 as backup, ended up wearing the 10 due to bust size. The only complaint I had was the straps for the under slip were really long. I had to fidget with them alot to get them to stay hidden. Dress was lightweight and and felt very good on. Lots of compliments too!! Was able to wear a bra underneath without issue too - always a bonus!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a wedding across the country.
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful, it fits my hourglass figure perfectly without showing any unwanted skin, and the best part is it doesn't wrinkle. I packed it in a suitcase for a week as I traveled, and it came out of the suitcase looking ready to wear. I ended up buying it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress to wear all day and night, even while wrangling a toddler!
links_reviews_text: This dress was my backup, but I ended up liking it way more than my first choice! It was comfortable, even in 90 degree heat with 90% humidity and I liked how flowy the outer skirt was. The neckline also didn't plunge too far, so I didn't have to worry about flashing everyone all night. In fact, I didn't have to worry about this dress at all, which is the highest praise I can give for any clothing article. Plus, I got a lot of compliments on it.

I didn't like this dress as much as I thought I would. The built in slip under the dress kept riding up when I wore it and the dress has little tufts around the edges of the zigzag pattern, which looked somewhat shabby when I received it in the mail. The wrap portion of the dress didn't flatter my chest either. However, this dress is comfy comfy comfy - I only wore it to dinner, but I could have worn it all day and not been bothered. The skirt is beautiful and flows in the breeze nicely, and despite the dress's dark color it felt very cool and light. Not a bad dress, just overall not for me.
I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it for a friends bridal shower. It was very comfortable and I got so many compliments!

I rented for my brother's wedding and this dress did not disappoint! Compliments all night. The cobalt blue is fabulous, photos don't do it justice. The top is fitted with little to no give. You can wear a regular bra, but consider a nude colored one because it could show through depending on your bust size or color choice. The a-line skirt floats away comfortably and the waist hits at your natural waistline. It was hot and muggy, but I never felt overheated from wearing a heavy material.

links_reviews_title: Perfect style & weight for casual summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a casual BBQ wedding!! The style made me feel completely adorable without being overdressed. The slip with sheer overlay was perfect in thick humidity, but the dress also held up nicely when we got stuck in a sudden downpour. The color is beautifully rich and the handkerchief hemline is a really fun twist.

While not as much of a show stopper as some other options on RTR, this dress is a solid performer. Comfortable and well-constructed, with a feminine silhouette and flirty hemline. I didn't find much difference between the 2&4, outside of the bust, which is why I decided on the 4. Overall the dress runs true to size based on your bust and waist and gives a lot of extra room in the hips, which makes it an excellent choice for hourglass figures or fellow big booty gals. Also, the color is much richer in person. I'd definitely recommend this dress.
Wore this dress for a wedding. Many compliments on color. Comfortable material but the chest as a little snug. The dress didn't looked damaged at all but did look used.

links_reviews_title: Pictures do not do it Justice, lots of great detail in the dress and comfortable
links_reviews_text: Really pretty dress, the fit was great, not too tight but just right. I think it also hides the mom tum pretty well too. Its a beautiful color as well. My only issue was the zipper...OMG seriously took ten minutes to try to zip it, and it was not because it was too tight, it was because the zipper was janky. My husband ended up getting his needle nose pliers out and that did the trick. The other thing I would recommend is wearing a bra with it, I did not because once I got the dress zipped up, I was too afraid to try to unzip dress to try a bra on with it.

links_reviews_title: Ordered the day before event - so good!
links_reviews_text: This was a gorgeous last minute find when my original option didn't work out. The slip underneath creates a flattering neckline with the herringbone overlay. Got compliments on the color and the handkerchief skirt. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore for dinner cruise w heels, then put on sandals. Easy for dressing up or down!
links_reviews_text: Wore 10 barely!! (I have wide back) had to take my bra off due to top looking awkward. The dress is light and flows w the wind! Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn longer!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a formal rehearsal dinner. It was really comfy and I got a lot of compliments in the 2 hours that I was able to wear it....I was really sad to take it off! But, the event was super short and I kept the dress on around the hotel for a little while after just because. The fabric is interesting and flowy but not too flashy. Loved it.
This was really fun to wear - very twirly skirt, good for dancing. I loved the hem and the length. It did run small. I usually wear a 10, but the 10 was large so I was glad I also ordered the 8.
Ran large but a great dress overall

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous detail and color - perfect for a formal or casual event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for an outdoor summer farm wedding. It was breathable enough that I was cool during the late afternoon ceremony but still kept me warm in the evening. I loved the asymmetry of the hemline - it was a really interesting detail. I'm 5'5" and it hit just below the knee for me. My only minor complaint is the the bust is sewn together and gapped a bit on me (size 34D bust). The size up was too big around the waist and hips so I stuck with the size down despite the gapping. Ladies with larger busts but narrow hips may notice more gapping at the top of the dress.

Loved this dress and also received many compliments! The color is great! I wore the 8, which is my typical size. I was surprised that I had no issues with the fit in the bust. I'm a 34DDD, but this fit just fine, and in fact, there was a little extra room! I wore a regular bra. (My back-up size was a 10, which was too loose, but I don't think the 6 would have worked as it might have been too small in the armholes.) I added a brown leather belt and wore brown high-heeled sandals with gold jewelry. The dress was fun to dance in and very comfortable. Highly recommend.

This is the first rental I've actually considered buying. The blue is a vibrant royal, pics do not do it justice. The over-layer has a chevron-like pattern that is partially sheer, and it hit me about mid-calf. The fabric is wonderfully soft and flowy - so much fun to dance in! The under-layer is opaque and hit me above the knee. It did run a little large - I normally wear a 6, and I wore a 4 in this dress. I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: It was so fun to dance in, as well as sit and chat with other guests!
links_reviews_text: It was so comfortable and a flattering cut of a dress.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a Goddess in this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super comfortable and photographs really well. I got tons of compliments. I was afraid to rent this dress because of the color and I thought it wouldn't work with my skin tone, but I was wrong.

This dress was so pretty and easy to wear! I'm a 36DD due to nursing so finding something that fits right is hard. The 6 was a tad tight in the chest but overall very comfortable. The blue was beautiful and came out amazing in pictures. Although not a good dress for actual nursing (I had to unzip and take it partially off), it fit my body shape great and was comfortable to sit, stand and carry a baby in. It's also a nice length on my 5'8" frame.

This was a great dress to rent for a wedding! The color is a really beautiful vibrant blue, and it was overall comfortable and flattering to wear. The waist actually had some room to give, but for those with a larger chest, I would still not recommend sizing down. I am a D and it was a little tight/snug (very slight gaping there). If you are bigger than that, I might not recommend renting, but otherwise loved the dress! I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty Dress. Would be good for warm weather, outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: This fit ok- it was a little tight in the chest and arms. The length was too long for me (5'2). Light material would be great for warmer weather or summer outdoor wedding. Color is beautiful!

This dress has a great fit, especially for a church wedding or somewhere you want to be a little modest, but still cute. The dress is light and has a great flow. Its also super comfortable and flattering (I didn't even need Spanx!). No complaints. Would definitely rent it again.

Ended up loving this dress so much that I kept it! It is a beautiful shade of blue, so flattering. The lining did not ride up on me like many do (I have wide hips), and this was professional enough for me to wear at a work training but I also plan on pairing this with hot heels for a date some time.

links_reviews_title: ALMOST BOUGHT IT - FLATTERING AND COMFORTABLE
links_reviews_text: This dress is flattering, comfortable and a beautiful color. I love the unique design of the hem. I almost bought it. Definitely rent! It's great for work and for play.
I want an occasion to wear this. I rented it for vacation but thought it was a little dressy so I didn't end up wearing it. But I will definitely rent it again for the right occasion.

The fit was a bit looser than I expected, and the hem was longer than what I usually prefer, but the way the waist hit made it very flattering nonetheless. Because of my small bust, the faux wrap front didn't lay quite right - one side kind of sagged at the bottom. The lace is lightweight but feels high quality, so I stayed nice and cool. Despite some of the fit shortcomings, it ended up being perfect for the somewhat-casual outdoor wedding I attended!
Great, easy-to-wear dress. Much more cobalt blue in real life (beautiful color but bright!).

This dress is so beautiful in person! The color is a deep but bright blue and the fit is very flattering. I got a 2 and 4 and went with the 4 because the 2 was too tight in the shoulders. There is an attached slip underneath and a normal (nude colored) bra can be worn. Unfortunately the dart keeping the neckline closed was ripped off on my dress so I had to return it without wearing it. I didn't like the way it looked with the slip showing and the bust had been stretched out also. RTR was so helpful though and gave me a full credit on return. Great customer service as always and I would rent this dress again!
This dress was comfortable! The only issue for me was the shoulders kept falling down. Other than that the fit was good. Maybe a little in the big side.

links_reviews_title: Glistened in a se of boring black dresses
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Stunning colors. Appropriate with a shall over the back for the ceremony(used a purple pashmina) looked great. Husband wants me to buy this dress. Tons of compliments!! This was my 3rd choice. Pics don't do the unique color scheme justice. Looks purplish. Red and navy blue. Interior slip underneath. Don't need to wear bra. Pasties.

links_reviews_title: Odd fit on top , and it's actually red & blue (not purple)
links_reviews_text: The dress fits oddly on top, and the back hanging portion is weird. The colors don't photo well - I thought the dress was purple, but it's red and blue.

links_reviews_title: It made me feel beautiful and fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Show stopper and stunning. Tasteful and daring all at the same time.

Pros: I'm close to 5'10 and 180 lbs. the length was perfect, just to my knee. The size fit nicely (I'm usually in between 8-10 dress) It's like a navy blue and cranberry colored sequence - very pretty Plenty of stretch and comfy! Cons: The back drape was faux and kinda awkward The sleeves are narrow and didn't cover my armpit crease (pet peeve)
The dress was a tad long for me but the open back is sexy! I received a lot of compliments.

I'm busty (32 F) and I'm always wary of dresses where I can't wear a bra. I bought those stickies that promise to lift boobs up and I have to say, I'm pleasantly surprised! The dress is so forgiving because of the sequins and I got compliments all night! I would definitely rent this one again.

I wore this dress to an all sequins attire party and I felt super glam! Also, this dress is COMFY! Cannot believe how comfortable this dress was. I didn't need to wear a bra because the sequins and fabric were very thick and I felt supported. The front felt very conservative, but I loved the dramatic back so much that I went for it! A little bit big on me in the chest/shoulders, but I'm pretty much an 8 on the bottom and 4 on the top, so the 6 split the difference nicely! Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Sent back for something more flattering.
links_reviews_text: True to size but not very flattering on me. The sequins are not bothersome (at least not for the 5 minutes I wore it). It appears purple in the pictures but at actually red and blue sequins.

I got a ton of compliments on this dress! The color is super versatile, I could have worn black, gray, or nude shoes with it easily. The low back with the cowl was just the right amount of sexy (I'm a major fan of a sticky bra, which was perfect). The 4 wasn't super tight on me, I could have gone down to a 2. But I have bigger shoulders so I was more concerned with the dress cutting at my arm pits and giving me the dreaded arm pit fat look haha.

I loved this dress, very comfortable, didnt have to wear a bra and i have big boobs!! Wore it to a wedding and received loads of compliments. I wore the 6 for extra room but wish i would have worn the 4 because the shoulders kept slipping. No complaints though, i would definitely rent this dress again!! Husband loved it as much as I did. I am 5'0" 123 pounds i usually wear a 4 or 6

links_reviews_title: Great dress for weddig, would love liked something for my arms though
links_reviews_text: This fit me great, and hid extra buldge around the stomach. I wore spanx and a backless bra from target. I didn't particularly care for the draping back piece. Other than that I thought it was a great dress and very comofortable.

The dress was very comfortable amd very flattering. I received many compliments and fell fabulous in it! It is a very low back so you need to either go braless or find a bra that can be very low in the back. It is perfect for a holiday party or winter wedding!

Great curvy fit. Wear spanx to smooth everything out. Need nubra for bustier women like me. It took a few tries to get the nubra on in a way that looked good with the dress on but it worked perfectly. Wore with black strappy heels and hair up to expose the back. Got lots of compliments! Usually am a 10 in jeans and some 8 in pants so the 8 felt better than the 10. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to two weddings (in one day!) and got LOTS of compliments! It was a wedding hit!
links_reviews_text: This was actually not the dress I rented (there was a problem with the dress I had originally rented) but it was FABULOUS! I got so many compliments! It's sexy but not TOO sexy. I'm usually a size 4 (sometimes a 6), but the 4 fit perfectly. It's pretty stretchy so if you're between 2 sizes, I would go for a size down! My bf and I forgot to take pictures (I know, worst millennials ever) but I have one that I'm posting (though you can barely see the dress). If you're wondering whether or not to rent this dress rent it! It's worth it!
It fit great! I'm 4 months pregnant and I was able to wear the size 4. The sequins were beautiful! The colors were unique and it was perfect for the casino theme charity event!
Beautiful dress. Perfect fit. Runs true to size. The sequins was not scratchy. No complaints and I received lots of compliments.
This dress was noticed by many and I received compliments all night.
GREAT dress, flowed and was lose in all the right places, yet fitting and flattering in others. Compliments galore, special event perfect dress! 145lbs, 5'8, 36C and wore great with no bra or support

links_reviews_title: Wore to a formal work Christmas party in Newport. The dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The color was a little more of a berry color than I originally thought. I wish I ordered a size down for the backup dress as it seemed to run a little large in the top. Could not wear a regular bra as the back is low, wore a nubra. Received lots of complements and was a lot of fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Forgiving on Curvy Women and Felt Elegant
links_reviews_text: This dress is a little heavy because of all the sequins. I felt so glamorous at my boyfriend's holiday party! I'm a curvy woman at 5'5" weighing about 175lbs, with a large bust of 32H. A size 10 fit perfect around my hips and bust with enough breathing room to eat and sit through the rest of the night. Cons: The sequins on the side rubs on the inside of your arms all night which can cause chaffing. I ended up spraying some "pre-heels" which prevented friction, I'm sure deodorant will help as well! Because the dress is filled with sequins, it at times gets stuck on each other when trying to sit down. Other than that, the dress was gorgeous and I felt so glamorous! Will definitely rent again.

Loved this dress! It was true to size and fit well. Lots of sequins which was why I wore my hair up, to prevent snagging. I was obsessed with the open back! I felt so beautiful. Thanks for another great runway rental!

I received this as an alternative for the dress I ordered as it was unable to ship. While I was disappointed to not receive the original dress I ordered, I was very happy overall with this one! The dress runs true to size, both the 8 and the 10 fit, but I felt more comfortable in the 10. The color of the sequins are beautiful and the open back makes a statement. Received tons of compliments!

I rented this dress for a work Christmas party. I usually wear a 6 but ended up wearing the 4. There was no much size difference between the two, the 4 was a little shorter. I did have to wear stickys because it was backless but I loved the dress. The sequin was navy and maroon, I wore red shoes to be more festive!

Fun dress! The colors for the sequins are really rich and unusual; tough to match jewelry with but easy to match makeup. Tall girls rejoice - I'm 5'11" and this hit just a bit above the knee. The back really gives no way to wear a bra, and I didn't wear anything for support (38D), although admittedly my event didn't have dancing. I was planning on taping myself up but once I put the dress on, I didn't feel at risk of anything slipping out - the back is open but not the sides, and the texture of the sequins keeps anything "personal" from showing. The draped cowl back is not structured the way I expected - it's a separate sash of material, which looks a little silly on the hanger but I think is fine in person.

Excuse my messy background! Any who, I wore this dress to an evening wedding. It was not the original dress I ordered, it was a replacement after my original order was never received. Yikes! Although, it was a pain to have to find another dress at the retail location, I will say most of the retail Chicago staff were amazing along with customer service via phone. The back is out in this dress and I wear a 36d bra. Yikes, again! Because everything was so rushed, I ended up having to duct tape these bad boys up and viola! As the night wore on, the dress grew on me and I ended up loving it. I received tons of compliments. It was sophisticated yet sexy and sparkly! I wore a size 12 and it fit a bit larger than most RTR dresses.

This dress runs true to size, but go one up for back up. will work best for A-C cups since the bust is fitted. Fabric has some stretch, but Spanx is needed since it is mostly fitted. A sticky bra is also necessary since the whole back is out
Simple sequin dress with an open back. It did the trick, but wasn't as stunning as I had hoped.

It was beautiful and it fit fabulous, ended right or a little below the knees for me. It was true to size except for the arms, I felt it was a little loose but wasn't nervous anything was going to show.
Ordered the 8 and 12 (10 wasn't available) 12 way too big, 8 felt tight and itchy in the underarms from the sequins. The sway in the back is not attached to the dress which I didn't like either.
Beautiful dress and perfect for a black tie wedding.
Fit great! If you're going to wear spanx, make sure they sit lower so you can't see them in the back. Otherwise I had multiple people rave about the dress! It was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Fit really well and was very very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Loved the bit of stretch that allowed for perfect fit. Great dress.

This dress was super comfortable and stretchy. Loved the bare back. The only thing is the pictures don't show that the draped part in the back is actually separate and attached to the dress only up top so I didn't love that but you could really only tell up close.
Moves well and stays put.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear the dress, but would rent it again. Very beautiful and surprise BACK.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: I wore this beautifully sequined dress to a Gala. I received so many compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs a bit big, so it would be wise to size down. The back is low, so backless bra is recommended. Very comfortable, has alot of stretch, and fully lined.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Pretty comfortable, especially for a sequins!
links_reviews_text: As mentioned in other comments, the top of this dress runs kind of big because of the back. I ordered the back up dress a size (or 2) smaller than I would usually wear and that was the dress I wore.
Was a backup dress, and ended up not wearing it because my main dress fit me better. This dress is gorgeous and I loved the back, but felt it didn't show off my curves as much as I would have liked.
I ordered my normal size and a larger one but it's true to size.

links_reviews_title: I fall in love with this dress very cute,sexy and classy at the same time
links_reviews_text: #Classy #Party #Dinner #Sexy
Originally rented for a wedding but then brought it on my honeymoon instead! It was great for date night with a fabulous backdrop!! Runs extremely small but love the T-back style!

This dress is super fun! I wore it for Labor Day in Vegas and loved having a bright color in contrast to all of the black that everyone was wearing. In terms of fit - this definitely runs very small, I'm typically a 2 or 4 and the 8 fit me well (as you can see in pics). I did find the length to be a little weird so I actually rolled up the longer layer a bit at the waist to make it a couple inches shorter which I found to be more flattering/more in line with the style. In terms of quality - honestly this did not feel like a $1700 dress at all. The zipper felt chintzy and the lace felt a bit well worn. Could just be that this particular dress had been worn a bit more than others but I did find quality to be a bit lacking. I don't think that necessarily shows, but you can feel it. Probably wouldn't rent again necessarily but I did really enjoy it while I used it! Definitely got lots of compliments.
Loved this dress so much! Wore a size 8 in the pic, (size option only listed size 12), and it was true to fit. Runs on the shorter side, but if you're mindful it's just a bonus for your stems!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color yet a little too skimpy
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress though the combination of the super short length and low cut on top left me feeling a bit too exposed.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Broadway show in New York. The color and fit are amazing. Love this!!!
links_reviews_text: David Koma can run small in the waist, in my opinion, but this dress is very true to size. I am a US size 2 and the 6 fit perfectly.

The color of this dress is to die for!!!! Super bright and vibrant...definitely a wow dress. I paired it with Steve Madden strapping heels in the same color for an extra pop. It is short, but that didn't bother me and since it's not fitted on the bottom, it was comfortable even while sitting. I didn't wear a bra but did use sticky tape to hold the top down since it was a smidge big in the bust. Will rent again!
Felt absolutely glam in this David Koma frock. Absolutely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit is interesting on this dress. The top was very large and the waist would barely zip. The material was beautiful, and I love the design, but I believe it would only fit shorter women with large chests and tiny waists.
Odd fit. Perfect at waist but loose on top. Dips low in front, and at sides. Felt very exposed. Couldn't wear it.
I didn't wear this dress. It's too short for me and my boobs were hanging on the side. Love the color though.
Dress is a lovely, vibrant blue and fits very nicely. I actually did not end up wearing because it was a bit too revealing for a work event, but for another event, I certainly would rent again.

links_reviews_title: This was supposed to be my New Years Eve Dress- but I went up 2 sizes, next time 3 sizes.
links_reviews_text: Sizes very small - I ordered 2 sizes larger than my usual 6. I think I would need at least a 12.

It was loose under the arm but I was able to clip and use fashion tape to make it work. I received lots of compliments on the bright color and fun details. I definitely felt pretty wearing it and would consider renting again.
Pretty but extremely small. Unfortunately, didn't get to wear.
Beautiful color and style, just too small so ended up not wearing.
It's amazing dress. It's a little shirt to dance in but I got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Gorgeous dress that needed to be longer (I'm 5' 7.5")
links_reviews_text: It fit me, though it was uncomfortably tight at the band which hit my lower rib cage. However, the length was crazy short. It just covered my butt--and it flares a bit. It felt like a cheerleader skirt that requires special underclothes. I thought it looked shorter on me than on the model photo.
The chest was big but the waist small, only exactly where the ribbon surrounding the natural waist houch
Beautiful Dress. High Quality. Not wearable if you have large breasts as they will hang out of the top.
It was super cute! I got tons of compliments and will probably rent it again. It was a little large in the chest so I'll size down next time.

This dress is beautiful. The color is striking. If between sizes I would say order down a size, but if you are 5'7 or taller this dress is pretty short. I might have gotten away with it but knew I would be too uncomfortable so sent it back. It's a great dress and I wish I could have worn it but it was too close to a wardrobe malfunction for me.

#worktodinner perfect dress. I switched out of my work heels into dinner heels and the vibe of this dress went from work friendly to dinner ready. Match with your favorite bag and accessories and it'll go well with any color since it's grey!!!
Not my favorite, but not terrible. I'm 5'11", so fit is always an issue I couldn't decide if it was better with or without the belt, so I ended up wearing something different.
Cute, not as fitted as I prefer, but okay for work.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and think it's one of my favorite rentals so far!!!
links_reviews_text: It looks so plain but it is very flattering and comfortable to wear! It's super easy to dress up too! It's a timeless piece for any occasion. The cold shoulder makes it modern and relevant.

This dress was amazing for work. I would say this dress was true to size. It has a relax fit which made it great for the office. If I would to order this again, I would try one size down just to see if I would like the fit better. It wasn't bad, just not as fitted as I expected. I also found the dress a little longer on me than the picture on the model.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a work event 39 weeks pregnant, it was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I'm 39 weeeks pregnant and sized up one size from my normal size. It fit perfectly. Plenty of room for my baby bump and very flattering everywhere else. I received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and stylish cold shoulder dress
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress - perfect for work and so on trend. The dress runs large, and as people previously mentioned, has a wide waist. So I opted to wear a belt with it. I think it looked nice.
From the gorgeous navy tweed material to the cold shoulder to the flare skirt, got soooo many compliments from colleagues! And, was so comfortable while looking like a million bucks!
Perfect work dress. Nailed the fit, fabric, design, length....this is a winner!
I wish the dress was a little more fitting in the waist, but otherwise a comfortable, light dress.
Basic, very functional for a busy day around town or at the office. Was a big baggy for my style, but my still a great choice
This dress is long enough for work with a flirty shoulder to make it fun. I got tons compliments and you can accessorize this lots of ways. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and forgiving dress! Great for everyday, date or casual event.
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed this dress! It was so comfy and easy to wear, and since we were having a family dinner I didn't feel like I needed it more fitted. If I had worn this to a reunion, it would be more flattering fitted. I'm 5'2" and about 125 lbs in this pic but I did have to wear a push up bra to make it look more fitted and flattering. If you have skinny arms then the sleeves may hang down annoyingly, but if you have really beefy arms, they may be too tight. I'd recommend getting this with a back up size depending on yours. It isn't really too fitted anywhere else, if anything, it's a bit baggy. I don't know how this would look on a really petite framed person, especially if they have narrow or sloped shoulders. In that case size down. This definitely would look great on hourglass or athletic fit. If you are pear shaped, it will depend on how much difference the shoulders and the hips are, the greater the difference, the less likely, as you need to size up to hips but the shoulders/arms/ribs will start getting too baggy looking.

This dress is killer...! Omgosh. Men went crazy for it. Most comfortable dress I can recall ever putting on and I wore it on back to back trips to NYC. Perfect for all seasons-the fabric is a sturdy knit that smoothes imperfections but is light enough for the warmest day. Devine!!

This dress is gorgeous! It hit me right at the knee, and I am 5'9". This dress was comfortable, I threw a blazer over it for work, then uncovered for a wine tasting that night! I wish I could keep it forever!

Derek Lam is on fire with this. I seriously cannot imagine a figure this doesn't flatter. You can wear a regular bra, the material is stretchy and textured such that it hides flaws. Add a little bit of shoulder showing and a much prettier color than pictures relay and you will be so happy to have. Wish I owned it, I say I'll rent again but Unlimited has so many good choices I may not find the time!
Fit is good. Fabric texture is awful. Scratchy. Couldn't do it.

This is a nice dress for work but it does run a bit loose. Also since it was loose the back of the dress (where the zipper is) kind of jutted out because it didn't fit to my body properly. I know some other customers have paired the dress with a belt (I regret not doing that as well) which I assume would eliminate that problem. But it is a very comfortable and professional looking dress I would definitely recommend it for wearing to work but not a formal event because the material is kind of a stretchy jersey.
I am usually a 2 or a 4 in dresses but I think this one runs large. I got a 40 and it looked nice but honestly I could have worn a 38. Great sleeve detail, got lots of compliments!
Didn't wear
The fit is normal in size but the cut is a drop waist so does not emphasize figure in the least, very baggy in the middle. Fine for work but wouldn't wear anywhere else, unlikely to rent again.
Loved it
Great material, beautiful dress.

This was loose enough at the waist with enough stretch to be very comfortable for a mid-2nd trimester baby bump (without feeling like I was stretching it out or struggling with the zipper and without sizing up). It was perfect to pair with a blazer for a client meeting, though I felt comfortable in it with the shoulders exposed at my law firm. My only compliant is that the zipper material runs really far down the back, so it stuck out funny on my bum in a not very flattering way.

I ended up wearing it out to dinner -- not bad, accurate fit, but just nothing special. I think it needs some "pop," and my husband thought the cold shoulder sleeves looked funny. Not my favorite. I didn't even take a photo.
This dress fit perfect, is very interesting, has wonderful fabric and was very comfortable. Loved it.

i'm typically a 4 in derek lam, this dress fit great w a comfortable amount of room. since i'm short it hit below my knee, but i put on high heels and it was fine. i wore a razorback bra and no lines were visible. material is very comfortable and not too warm. great for work and then drinks after. highly recommend!
This dress runs a little large. It is a beautiful design, but it didn't compliment my figure.

links_reviews_title: Romantic feel but a little loose.
links_reviews_text: Loved the 'look' style. Which that it had been a bit more fitted through the middle but it was comfortable and if you like a bit of that flowing romantic look more than super tailored this might work for you. If I rent again I might try a small instead. Normally I get mediums because of my chest size but I think the stretch in the fabric would forgive them and still let me have a little better fit in the waist.
Loose on top

This is a lovely knit dress, and really well cut, but I can't understand how previous reviewers said it would work for any body type. Though the knit is thick it is still clingy, and I had a hard time stopping the top of my tights from showing and making a little bulge. If you are self-conscious about that sort of thing, this is not the dress for you. Otherwise though it is elegant and hangs super well. It was really fun for dancing in. It has stretch and fit really well on the hips and shoulders.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work one day and then to a daytime charity event.
links_reviews_text: This fit very well, just like the other pieces I have rented from this designer.

I really liked this dress, but it was a little big on me even though I got the smallest size (I usually wear a 2 or a 4). Otherwise it was a comfortable dress, and even though it is a little loose, it was still flattering.
I got so many compliments on this one! So pretty and flattering. I wore it to work and out for drinks afterwards. This dress would work for so many occasions.

links_reviews_title: Stop saying I look fly, I know!
links_reviews_text: The compliments were plentiful in this dress. I just wish it was more fitted in the waist. I'm in love with this garment.

links_reviews_title: Cute and Feminine but not as much as the stock photo
links_reviews_text: I wanted to loooove this dress and I did think it was pretty and feminine; however, it wasn't as fitted in places I thought it should have been and maybe I received an overworn dress but it seemed a touch baggy in unnecessary places.
Very comfortable, ran a little large- I'm typically a 6- thin and airy in hot weather- flattering lines and quality material.

It fit perfectly and was super easy to put on. It's super comfy, but a little long for shorter people like me. I'm 5ft. 4in. so I did have to wear heels with it. The only downside is the dress I was sent was ripped at the shoulder. The part that comes off the right shoulder wasn't attached to the strap like the bigger size I got was, so it kept falling all night. Other than that it was a great dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it but it's a beautiful dress. I'm usually 4 or 4P
links_reviews_text: It's not too long so ok for people 5"4 like me

I wore a 6R with 3 inch heels. I could have worn the 4R but the 6R was more comfortable. I am 5'2" and 138 lb and 8 months post-partum. The dress is forgiving in the front. The sequins did not bother me under the arms. I wore a regular bra with this dress. I was able to dance and sit with ease. The dress is thick material so was a little warm for hot September Texas night.

links_reviews_title: We had an outdoor wedding and as the mother of the groom, I loved how the dress made me feel special
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable! I was able to wear a regular bra and there is plenty of stretch everywhere. The length was just right! Got lots of compliments. My only regret is that I didn't wear a necklace, but otherwise loved the color, fit and movement of the dress.

First time using RTR and couldn't be happier! This dress was spectacular - it fits true to size, has stretch, stayed on my shoulders and I felt great in it all night! I was even able to wear a regular bra! This was my back up dress, I chose to wear it only because I felt more comfortable in it than my original choice.

links_reviews_title: Everyone, especially my husband, loved the dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fantastic! I received so many compliments, and my husband loved it! This dress fits true to size but I did order a size up because of the bust size. The dress hugs your curves in all the right places! Dress is equally sophisticated and sexy.

This dress is amazing. It was very slightly stretched out in the midsection, but the ruching masked it. My short hair didn't get caught on this dress like it did when I wore the red gown, and my hair was really long. This gown simply fit better than the red one - not as tight, more flattering sleeve "capelet". The only reason I rented the red one more recently is that the bride's colors were navy and gold.

I absolutely loved this dress! It may be my favorite rental to date! All night I was receiving compliments from strangers. So as great as it looked on it was how comfortable it was that really sold me. The dress has amazing stretch and holds you in. I didn't have to wear a bra and could dance so comfortably all night at the wedding. The size 2 was oddly short and I'm only five feet tall so that never happens so I did wear the size 4. I highly recommend this dress to anyone!!

The dress made me feel beautiful! The material had a little give/stretch to it, which made it very comfortable at 30 weeks pregnant. I'm normally a size 6R and I only ordered the 8R since the 10R was already reserved. I really lucked out! The length and the size were perfect with heels and I was able to wear a regular bra which is always a plus when pregnant. Overall win!

I loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. It was very comfortable and unfussy to wear, i could just wear a normal undergarments underneath it. I personally think this dress runs large because I received another Badgley Mishka dress as a back up in a 4 , and a 2 in this dress resembled the fit of the 4 in the other dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was my most favorite dress that I have rented from here!
links_reviews_text: I ordered both the 12 and 14. The 12 was unavailable so I opted for the 14. It was a little big, but just left room for dancing! I loved this dress! I received tons of complements!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the company Centennial Ball!
links_reviews_text: I lost a significant amount of weight this year so I wasn't sure what size I wear. I used the online guide and prayed a 14P would fit. It did, and like a glove! The fabric had a bit of stretch and was very comfortable. The dark blue color and sparkle were gorgeous and stood out. This was the first time I've dressed up since my senior prom in 1992!
Absolutely LOVED this dress! Fit perfectly and I got compliments all night! It was very heavy but stI'll very comfortable. Highly recommend!

This dress was amazing. I received so many compliments. It was fantastic for my hourglass figure, comfortable and flattering. The petite was actually a bit too short, the regular was great with small heels and would have been perfect with a bit taller of a heel. Thank you RTR!!

links_reviews_title: I normally wouldn't wear something this sparkly, but the invite said for the ladies to sparkle!
links_reviews_text: Fit was one size up from my regular 12. Ther cape on one shoulder wasn't there, which was odd, but the dress looked smashing anyway! 14R had a perfect length with 3 inch heel. I'm 5'6, 170lb.

This dress was perfect. I'm 27 weeks pregnant and have gained 25-30 lbs. Rented the 8 R. I'm usually a size 4-6 when not pregnant. I kinda' wished I had gotten the "tall" dress, or something longer, b/c this floated above my feet while I was wearing flats. However, way better than the other Bagley Mishka dress I had rented (the 10R "Putting on the Glitz" dress in black) that wouldn't zip up around my belly, even though it was "bump friendly" also!). This dress worked out so well, some people didn't even notice I was pregnant! Maybe the sequins blinded them. :) Very happy with the American Liberty Gown for a black tie event during maternity. :) My friend wearing the black dress in the picture also used RTR for a diff Bagley Mishka dress. We had a great time.

links_reviews_title: This dress was Amazing! So comfortable and extremely flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to the Marine Corps Ball and received so many complement on it. It was very comfortable and not too constricting, yet flattered my shape. The sequence were not irritating at all (that was my main concern), and I loved that you could wear a normal bra with it. I am 5'6" and 120 lbs and would recommend ordering the king size so that you can wear heels with it without it being An awkward length.
Was worried about the fit at 5 1/2 months pregnant, but ordered a size up from my usual and it fit perfectly!

Fitted, yet stretches. Doesn't cling to you, feels great and looks great! Best for indoor wedding during the hotter months. We took pictures outside and the sequins look beautiful with the sun and water behind us.

I read all of the reviews before ordering and most said that the dress ran a bit big and long, so I ordered a smaller size. For my back up I wanted to order a 6R but they only had a 6p available. That was the one I wore. I didn't have a problem fitting my 5 month pregnant belly in it but it was a little shorter than I had wanted. Overall it was a great dress & I would recommend to anyone especially if you're pregnant!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a princess, perfect for pregnancy!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my husband's annual work awards banquet. I was nervous to find something to fit as I would be 6 1/2 months pregnant. The other reviews made me feel confident that this dress would work. It sure did. Fit like a glove and made me feel so glamorous and beautiful. I got so many compliments all night long. I didn't notice any scratching from the sequins. The regular length was perfect for me as I only wore 2 inch wedges since I was pregnant. Without the baby belly the regular length would have worked with my usual 3-4 inch heels. Love, love, loved this dress.

I'm currently 21 weeks pregnant and have gained 20 lbs so far, so I was looking for a dress with give near the bump area. This dress hit the nail on the head! I'm glad I read reviews beforehand otherwise I would have ordered up two or more sizes; no need to with this dress. Since the zipper is mid back and higher it doesn't hinder the bump area. Dress is super stretchy so I was comfortable all night. I wore low heels, so the regular length was perfect...higher heels would have required the long length in this size. A must for pregnant women that need a nice gala dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous gown for a formal wedding. Hollywood glamour! Easy to dance in! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: #wedding #hollywoodglamour #gorgeous MADE ME FEEL GORGEOUS ALL NIGHT!

links_reviews_title: This dress is awesome and even better than any picture can show.
links_reviews_text: The color is a beautiful deep Navy blue and it sparkles so much. It was very comfortable and hugged my curves but without feeling like I had skin tight spandex on. I could move comfortably, sit down, lean over, get in and out of cars - the material just moves with you. It is a very well made dress - it's actually heavy on the hanger and I was impressed with the workmanship. Even though I got a regular, I still had to wear 2 inch heels - which was no big deal. The dress is a little tricky to get in and out of. You have to put it over your head so watch your hair style. The cowl really made the dress but that was the part that make getting in and of the dress a little tricky. I only wish this dress came in more colors and I am definitely going to use Rent the Runway again. Everything was so easy to do. Great experience!

links_reviews_title: First time, really great experience from beginning to end.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4, the R was a little shorter than I would have liked. L was available only down a size, so I went with the R and a little shorter heel than I had planned. Overall very comfortable (with the exception of the sequins under arms but no biggie) and flattering.

links_reviews_title: I served as Mistress of Ceremonies for a High School's formal event. Needed to look my best! :-)
links_reviews_text: The dress looked great. It was comfortable, which is important as I spend a lot of time either walking around the event or standing at the podium. The sequins weren't too itchy as I recall and the cape/sleeve over the one shoulder stayed up all night, I didn't have to fuss with it (even on the dance floor!). I'm full-busted, and had no trouble getting it in, also able to wear with a regular bra (that's a plus!). It also sparkled more than the website pictures reflect.

links_reviews_title: I received a dress, same maker, different style and they didn't fit. This one overnighted was great
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little big. I had ordered a size 8 and 10 In a different style, same designer and didn't fit. This one caught my eye but they didn't have size 12 for my rental period. I decided to try the 14 and it fit with no troubles but a big big . I would say this designer runs small in size. Love love loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress with 3" heels and the length was perfect. Baby bump friendly.
links_reviews_text: I wish the 6R was available bc it would have fit perfect. I couldn't zip the dress up the whole way in the 4 R. Luckily, the back was covered up by the attached shawl and no one could tell. The dress was quite comfortable and the sparkles weren't scratchy under the arm. I got compliments all night and felt really elegant with my 6 month bump!

links_reviews_title: My first RTR experience, and I loved it!! This was a replacement dress and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. Very flattering, and extremely comfortable!! I am 5'5 and the 14L was just a little longer than I needed, but a regular would have been too short for my liking. If you like your feet to be covered in a formal gown then the long is needed.
I wore my usual size at 5 months pregnant and this dress worked beautifully. I'm petite and it is a lot of fabric for a petite person, but it worked wonderfully for pregnancy and is a gorgeous dress.

links_reviews_title: This sequined dress for perfect for A New Year's Eve black tie affair.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly. I was able to wear a small heal with the dress. It was comfy and I received several compliments.

Great dress, heavy stretchy fabric that hangs well and is very forgiving and flattering. Arm holes a bit small as others have pointed out and combined with sequins that can be a little annoying but it was fine. Loved the dress.

I'm 5.5 months pregnant and this dress was perfect! It was very comfortable, elegant, and I got a ton of compliments on it. It was perfect for the military Holiday Ball my husband and I went to. I'm 5'3 and wore 3 inch heals, it was about 1-2 inches too long but still doable for the night. I loved the sash that drapes over the right side. I wish I had this dress for all of our military events!

links_reviews_title: The dress was fantastic and I felt like my best. I got complements all night long.
links_reviews_text: The dress looked great and was really comfortable - I could sit at dinner and drive to the event and move around without worrying about lines or bulges or tears. So stylish yet really easy to wear. Cowl neckline was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a Mardi Gras event and it was very comfortable, gorgeous and stood out!
links_reviews_text: Only drawbacks are that if you are petite, as I am, it's gonna be a smidge long.. just enough to be annoying. But the overall fit and look was worth it. Also, when I first got it on the hanger, it took me about 10 minutes to figure out how to put it on properly. I had to refer back to the website pictures to see what it was supposed to look like. Once figured out though, all was well!

links_reviews_title: This was the most comfortable dress i have worn in ages. It fitted perfectly and looked super chic!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit though needed someone to zip me up but overall it has a stunning appearance. I wore a 2" heel with it and looked great. Many people complimented me on my look.

Beautiful color. But it looked almost black in the pictures at the bottom. It is a pretty navy almost royal blue. Not too heavy, very nice drape. I am 5' 1" and had to tape the hem about 8 inches which took a little longer than I thought. I only wore 2 inch heels but was very comfortable in them. It was fun to wear. I wore my mother's blue sapphire jewelry and it was perfect with it. I received 4 sequinned dresses from Rent the Runway. After trying on all 4, there was one sequin on the floor. It is very well made.

This gown was amazing to say the least! I wore it at the SAG Awards and was an assistant for my husband, a photojournalist working the event. It was true to size, the color was fantastic, it was unbelievably comfortable and allowed me to move up and down stairs all day into the night with ease. It was very form fitting and I was wild about the draped piece across the chest. I received compliments right and left wearing this one and will likely rent it for a future event. If I did not mention before, I LOVED THIS DRESS!

I wore this to a friend's wedding and got so many compliments! I was worried about getting a dress to fit since I'm 6 months pregnant. This dress accommodated my bump amazingly. The fabric is stretchy, and with all the ruching I didn't feel like I was squeezing into it at all. I love the drapey thing on the shoulders, I disguised my bump amazingly. I'm normally a solid 8, and wore a 12. The 10 did not fit. I wish I had ordered the 12L so I could wear heels, I am 5'6" and the dress barely hit the floor in flats. The sequins were a little itchy around the armpits but that's a small price to pay for looking and feeling amazing for a night!
Comfortable fit, has plenty of give. I am 35 weeks pregnant, normally would wear a 6R or 8R - this 10L was great and I could even pull off flats.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a military retirement party. I received a lot of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well! It was a little low cut for me, but it was fine. It was a little tight in the ribs, but not uncomfortable. I loved the pockets and the subtle sparkles in the dress!
I wore this to court for my daughter's adoption (with a sweater). The top was a little big/gapey (I have a small chest) so I probably could've gone with a 6, but it was very cute and comfortable.
