This dress was perfect for my husbands holiday party. I have a more athletic build with wide shoulders and minimal bust- this dress gave me cleavage! My only gripe was the rib cage area was quite tight, if you have a large rib cage size up!

#party #workevent This dress was a little shimmery, fun, and comfortable. It fit great and allowed me to enjoy every detail of the event without worrying about a thing. Consider sizing up if you have a bigger chest. I wore my back up size because of that. The pockets were great!
Loved this dress!
Got lots of compliments! I love that the dress has pockets too, so no need to carry a purse. This was my backup dress, but I ended up wearing it, so I am glad I had it.
I got several compliments, the neck line was a little low for a family wedding with my 6-year-old son as a date. Otherwise I was very comfortable in the dress and I loved the pockets!
Fit great, low cut so looked pretty busty.

For a small chest this would have been subtly sexy (a look I love) but on me it looked a little Dolly Parton wannabe. I tried on every bra I owned and couldn't find one to wear with this dress that didn't make me look like I had on a push-up. This dress is definitely intended for small chest (A-cup)! I realized later I should've worn without a bra to de-emphasis the cleavage. Also wore this to a NYE wedding as I loved the subtle sparkle. The sparkles don't photograph well. The dress was very comfortable and I loved that I didn't have to wear spanks.

links_reviews_title: This was my first experience with RTR and definitely not my last.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit and very comfortable to wear. Quality fabric and construction. The dress has just the right amount of sparkle. I rented the dress to wear to a work Christmas party. The dress showed too much cleavage for the occasion so I wore a plain black bandeau with it and it worked out perfectly. I would have felt comfortable without the bandeau had I worn the dress to a wedding, party with friends/family, or other non-professional occasion. Highly recommend this dress. I received compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a Holiday Party
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for a holiday party. It had a little bit of sparkle to it and some flare to the skirt but is wasn't over the top. The "v" in the front is a little lower than I expected but I pinned it in place and it was fine for a work event. The skirt has some structure (which I loved) and it has pockets. Mine fit true to size. If I had gone up a size, it would have been way too big.
Material thicker than I expected it was nice. However it was lower cut than I anticipated I ended up wearing a bandeau

This dress was just the right amount of glam for a small wedding. The pockets were amazing! The v-neck plunged more than I expected, but fixed that with some fashion tape. I am 5'1" and the dress hit me mid-shin. All around comfortable dress and fun to wear. There wasn't much size difference between the 2 and 4. I opted for the size 2 as the size 4 was faded in comparison. Thanks!

Rented this for Beetlejuice the Musical! It fit the theme perfectly as well as dressy enough for a formal dinner at an upscale chop house. Comfortable, loved the pockets. Didn't need to wear a bra as it held the girls up nicely. The zipper is a little tough, but over all loved it.

Fits true to size. There is a deep V, as others have mentioned, but being fairly flat chested, it wasn’t an issue for me. Not overly sparkly and loved the structure of the skirt- gave the dress some personality and it held up great all night. Very comfortable and I received tons of compliments on it. Thanks, RTR, for making my first rental so easy and fun!
This is true to size - I love the pockets! I have a larger chest so it was a little tight in bust line.
Love this dress . Went to a fall wedding
This was perfect for NYE! So comfortable and had pockets. I would love to wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: It was a beautiful dress and the heavy, shimmery fabric looked very classic. It was lower cut than I expected when I put it on, but held it's place all night so nothing was revealed. It was a perfect dress for a work holiday party. Plus, pockets! I was able to carry my phone, lipgloss and ID with me all night and never needed a clutch. I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Fun and classy dress - with pockets!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie fundraiser dinner and got lots of compliments! The neckline is low cut but still appropriate. I normally wear a size 4 and the wore a 4 in this dress. It was snug but not too tight. I don't normally wear dresses with a big skirt but really loved it. The pockets were perfect! I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and especially the pockets!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfect! The length was great and it did show a little cleavage but not too much that I couldn't wear a regular bra. Got tons of compliments!

This dress was exactly perfect for the event I attended. (Police officer award dinner) The fabric is great and lined very comfortably. I am 5'2 and normally wear a 34b bra. None of my bras worked with this dress because it is somewhat low cut but still conservative. It was slightly tight in the rib section until it warmed up. But I loved it and it was very comfortable. Slightly long for my short legs but still so cute. I ordered the size 0 to wear but wore the size 2 back up. I wouldn't have minded trying on a size 4. Loved it though!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and I love the pockets!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a fundraising gala and while it was unusually warm for the end of September (90's) I was still very comfortable. The fabric is heavy and thick and it fits true to size. Deep V so expect some cleavage if you are bustier. The pockets are awesome but you can't tell there are pockets just looking at it. The skirt has volume and no spanx needed! I loved this dress and got so many compliments. Wore with black pumps.

This was my first RTR occasion and I am now hooked! I am usually between sizes and got the 8 and 6. I wish I had gotten a size up since the 8 did seem a little snug. This dress had pockets which was amazing and I got compliments all night! I wish I could keep this dress!!!

Love this dress! The colors were great, and the subtle sparkle dresses it up. I had compliments all night. I didn't find the chest to be too low cut at all. The 4 was a tiny bit tight in the waist, but the 6 was too big overall. Pockets!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering , perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: There wasn't much difference between the 8 & 10 size wise. This dress is very low cut and will show cleavage especially if you are busty. Perfect for wedding and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with a great fit!!
links_reviews_text: 6'1" and 155#. Often hard to find dresses long enough but this Dress was perfect. Great fit and comfortable. Had a little sparkle in the fabric which I was not expecting but it was not to much for a wedding. Would have bought this one!

Very pretty dress but I was surprised about a few things-first of all, the "girls" were very much on display, it definitely gave me a lift and some extra oomph in that department. I was also surprised at how big the skirt was-it is made to sit away from the body (see full length picture). The dress was made of thick fabric with not a lot of stretch, but figure flattering if you don't mind the big skirt and cleavage. True to size.
Dress was so pretty and fit great. Size 10 and 8 were very similar I wore the 8.
Be prepared for a deep V and in my case some cleavage. Loved the pockets and fabric.

links_reviews_title: I had a last minute invite to a ball and no time to shop. Ordered it on Wednesday arrive Thursday.
links_reviews_text: Dress was much prettier in person. Shimmery and a deep blue and black. Super comfortable and thick material. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Sparkles, flattering yet secure fit for dancing!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a work holiday party that required cocktail attire. For possibly the first time in my life, I was one of the best-dressed people there. I'm four months post-partum, and this dress covered my remaining bump and allowed me to securely show off my cleavage while wearing a regular bra. It was great for dancing, the sparkles were super fun, and I got lots of compliments.

I loved this dress! I'm just over 5'10", 140lbs and have a 34D bust. This dress fit phenomenally. It was a fun party dress. It has a structured cut and thick rich material, hold its silhouette and screams quality! Just enough sparkle to be fun, subtle striped print and simple iconic cut. Has a classic 'Mad Men' vibe while still feeling relevant and modern. I gravitate towards Audrey Hepburn/ Jackie Kennedy inspired cuts and this dress hit that note. Super classy and fun. I received compliments all night, and felt perfectly dressed while at a cocktail party held at one of the most exclusive clubs on Park Ave. My figure runs long and lean (sharp prominent shoulders, narrow hips and modest bust) but this would work with most body types because of the full, stiff skirt. If you are really busty or have a broad rib cage/back I'd order up in size to avoid mashed disfigured boobs or zipper malfunctions. This may not be the dress for my very well endowed sisters or those who are super petite! I'd buy this dress in a second! Great RTR experience.... this was an impulse pull I came upon in the flatiron store when trying on my first choices. I fell in love!
Super comfortable and packable. Fit great, loved the pockets and got a ton of compliments. Would def rent again.

links_reviews_title: This was my back up so I didn't wear it but it was super bubbly and cute!
links_reviews_text: A little tight for 34D with bra. Kind of flattens chest if worn without one though. Would def rent again if my chest goes back to pre-pregnancy size :p

I usually wear a size 4, but had bad luck with 2 other RTR dresses that I got in that size. Having a slightly smaller chest and being on the shorter size, I went for a size 2 hoping the top of the dress would fit better, but also hoping I could zip up the dress. Luckily it all came together! The dress is low cut enough that I needed some fashion tape to keep my bra from showing. Great dress for a fancy wedding!

links_reviews_title: Nice but I did not wear
links_reviews_text: I rented a couple of dresses for a rehearsal dinner and this one had a bodice that was too small.
Got the 8 and 10, even the 8 was too big. I am a 32d but still had a lot of space in the chest and waist. Otherwise a flattering dress, just seemed to be quite large.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for work Christmas Party
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Sucked in where I needed it to and was still roomy enough. I was 9 months post-partum and it was the first time really dressing up. Such a great dress with its pockets, semi rigid skirt and form fitting mid-section. Hit all the points I needed it to. The top was a little lower than I was comfortable with but I just paired with a black bra for a peak-a-boo. The sparkle on the dress was an added bonus I was not expecting. I wore black lace printed stockings and black wedges to tone it down since it was a work party. I would totally rent this again!
This dress had a super flattering fit with the bell sleeves. It was a little tight in the arms and definitely form fitting but I have a big bust and was comfortable. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Bought this one!! Loved this dress, I had to have it!! Felt so beautiful wearing this!!
links_reviews_text: I wore it to dinner with the girls for my birthday. The fabric does have a little stretch which makes it so comfortable.
A little short for me, so I had to wear black stockings

This little number had me feeling confident, comfortable, sexy, and feminine. As I'm still losing some post baby weight and still breastfeeding, finding clothes I feel "ok" in besides leggings and a hoodie is pretty impossible. When I put this dress on my husband was like "WOAH! Damn girl!" It hugged me in all the right places.. I didn't have to worry about it being too low cut or too tight in my tummy area. It was JUST RIGHT.

Beautiful dress and very forgiving of any lumps and bumps! If you are between two sizes, I would size up. I'm a true 8 and had to wear the 10. Also, if you have broad shoulders or arms that aren't stick thin, the arms will be restrictive. It was a bit tight on top, but nobody else would notice. Overall I loved this dress, especially with these earrings I also got from RTR!
Very cute dress. Warning: very short (especially for a mid-thirties mom), I would not have felt comfortable without tights on. 5’6”, weight 140-145, size 6 fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Great LBD, runs small through arms and bust.
links_reviews_text: I liked the look of this dress, it was comfortable and flattering. The sleeves were tight and the fit under the arms was tight. I wore a size 8, it fit great everywhere except the arms and bust. I'm a 36D and it was too small across the bust. I wore it but felt my bust was flattened by the tight fit. Lots of cleavage but not too much for office holiday party or wedding.

links_reviews_title: I definitely stood out in the crowd!! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Dancing with the Stars night out. The dress was flattering and really stood out amongst all the other LBD's in the room. My only complaint was that the shoulders were very tight. I would rent it again.

I wore this to a high-profile funeral, and it was elegant and stunning, yet perfectly understated. At 5'4", the length was perfect... any shorter and I would've had a hard time sitting. I have curvy hips and butt, so I went one size up.
Rent this dress

This is by far my favorite that I've ever gotten from RTR and the second time I've rented (first in the blue color). The fit is perfect for a petite girl (5'2) and it receives so many compliments for the sleeves. Shows just the right amount of chest and leg and can be dressed up for black tie. I could have gone with the 6 but the 8 gave a little more room for flexibility on the dance floor and sitting down.

links_reviews_title: Such a comfortable fabric and cut! Perfect conservative, yet sassy black dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous and I would absolutely wear it again! The only negative thing is that it's a bit hard to dance in. I wore it to a wedding and at the reception, I had to be careful not to lift my arms on the dance floor because the entire dress shifts up quite a bit.
Dress fit great

This dress fits great! The arms are a little tight but I am a fairly athletic build. Be careful with lifting your arms. The 2 was a little large in the body but that was all that was available and it still fell well so it wasn't a big deal. I want to own this dress!
The sleeve is flipped in this photo so ignore that, but fit great! The red and black dress is also RTR.

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD with beautiful sleeves and deep v
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress as I wore it to my husband's work Christmas party. The extravagant bell sleeves were such a great and unique feature while the length of the sleeve didn't get in the way of anything. I was not expecting such a plunging v-neck but loved it once I put the dress on. The fit was true to size while being a bit loose in the waist area which gave room to drink and eat! I loved this dress and would rent it again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Very sexy dress for almost any occasion.
links_reviews_text: A little short but so classy. Sleeves are amazing. I received compliments all night.

I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner and my older sister loved it so much, she wore it the next day for her company's holiday party (she's pictured here). We are both size 6, but with totally different builds. I'm 5'7" while she's 5'4" and we both got lots of compliments! It's a great party dress and very on trend with the statement bell sleeves. It was a little short on me but I had a great time wearing it.
Great fit, wore it with black tights and booties to be a little warmer.
Rented this dress for a cocktail . I have no words to describe the amazing fit, fabric and style , one of the nicest ones I have rented .
Beautiful dress, tight fit, everyone loved it. Terrible picture, I know, those are the kind of friends I got.

Probably one of my favorite RTR dresses ever! This Milly dress was a heavier fabric that really flattered and was warm enough to wear to a December office holiday party. The big ruffle sleeves were dramatic, fun, and made this dress so much more than your typical LBD. I received so many compliments! The fit was TTS and I loved that no special undergarments were necessary. Would 100% rent this dress again!

I ordered both a 4 and 6 as I'm in between sizes right now and the 6 was a good fit for me! I'm small on top and bigger on the bottom so the top was a bit loose, but I was the only one who noticed! The dress was comfortable and was a really nice and heavy material which kept everything where it needed to be! This is one of my favorite dresses I've rented and received many compliments!

I wore this dress for a bachelorette party and I received many compliments. The material is super comfortable. I did feel warm with the long sleeves and had to use fabric tape on the V neck line, but other than that I loved this dress. I wish I could own it!

links_reviews_title: Sexy post-baby dress with great sleeves!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding, got lots of compliments. The size 12 just fit me (2 sizes larger than my pre-baby size - worked well for full bust and not too tight on stomach). The sleeves are awesome and the short length was sexy without showing too much skin. I wore bike-short underwear underneath just in case of accidental flashing. Like in other reviews, I also thought the upper arm / shoulder area was a little tight.. but it was wear-able. No dance floor at this wedding, but if there was I wouldn't have been able to dance with my arms up without the bottom of dress coming up. Overall - high quality fabric, overall fit was good, chic modern statement dress.

links_reviews_title: This is the 2nd time I have rented this dress - that is how much I love it!
links_reviews_text: It is very short, so perfect above knee length for someone 5'2" like me. All the drama is in the sleeves, which are fabulous.

links_reviews_title: Classic elegance with a little flair!
links_reviews_text: I'm a huge Milly fan, so when this dress came out I wanted it in every color! Instead of spending $400+, I decided to rent for a winter wedding and was NOT disappointed. Though it's black, the cut is flattering on all body types and the sleeves gave it a fun edge. I also wore with chunky gold jewelry and nude/ gold stilettos which gave an extra pop to the outfit. The material was a little heavier than expected, so I wouldn't wear it during the summer if you're hot-natured like me. But for an indoor event, this dress is classic, yet sassy perfection!
I love the feel and look of this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Other the beautiful bride, this dress was a show stopper. Loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 8.. it was tight in the arms, but other than that, it fit perfectly. I would rent this dress again.. almost hate returning it :(
I'm breastfeeding and my boobs are huge right now! This hid them well. 5'3" 115lbs (usual size was 0, but only 4 months post partem now so the size 4 fit well.)

This is the PERFECT LBD and one of my favorite rentals! I would absolutely rent this again. Though fairly conservative, the v-neck and flared sleeves give the dress a bit of an edge. I'm generally in between a 4 and a 6, and the 6 fit perfectly-- the 4 was tight around my shoulders and fit a bit uncomfortably under my arms. The dress falls fairly straight, but is flattering around the hips and the thicker fabric is very forgiving. I highly recommend this dress-- you'll be receiving compliments all night!
The sleeves are very cool! Material is great! The top part of the sleeves are a little tight but overall the dress was super cute and comfortable! Loves it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Night Before the Wedding cocktail party for a friend.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, I am usually a 6 or an 8- I ordered both, wore the 8 only to be a little more comfortable. It's pretty short, but not so short that you could wear without tights, but I have no tan right now, so I wore sheer tights. I felt great all evening and received many compliments on the dress. I was going to wear pumps, but ended up wearing booties. It was great for a Feb party in the mountains!

I adored this dress, and got a lot of compliments on the fun bell-sleeves! The fit was perfect in every aspect aside from being a bit tight in the shoulders (I have broader shoulders). I had a back-up size though, so it ended up working out fine. It's a great length and cut, and worked perfectly while dancing at the wedding.
This dress is AMAZING!!! The upper sleeves are a little tight so size up if you need to have a little more room there. It won't detract because the fabric drapes fantastically.

I LOVE this dress, very flattering and a great fit. Wore for my anniversary dinner on a chilly February night in Chicago. Super fun detail with the sleeves. It was a tad tight in the upper arms, so if you work out at all and have muscular arms I would size up, but I wasnt moving or dancing so it wasnt an issue. I am a true 8 and the 8 fit perfect. The sleeves did not get in the way at dinner, which I was a little worried about. Fabric is great quality. I felt great in this dress!

When I saw this dress online I was in love but read the length was only 32" so I made it my backup. This is the one they sent and it was so much fun. I'm 5'9" and I never felt like the dress was too short. It is definitely 35" and hit 4" above the knee. The sleeves are amazing but I can see how other reviewers may be tight on some. Plenty of room in the hips and stomach. So much fun to dance in. I would rent again and maybe purchase.

links_reviews_title: I wore a medium and it fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: LOVED IT

This dress was a fun take on the LBD. It fit a like a shift, not tight anywhere. The sleeves were so fun, it made the dress a bit classier and more fun. It hit me a few inches from my knee. Anyone taller than about 5'5" might have issues with the length. Can be worn with any undergarments.

True to size (I usually fall within the 2/4 range for dresses), however was slightly snug in the shoulders. I got this dress as a backup and was nervous as there were no reviews yet. Wasn't sure I could pull off the bell sleeve- (they are definitely "dramatic"!) but when I put it on with makeup/strappy heels, I didn't want to return it.

So the dress is beautifully made. Sadly, there was a rip right by the zipper. It also ran a little small, I'm between a 12 and a 14 but this I definitely would've needed the 14. Sad it wasn't available to rent. Would've been perfect for the fall wedding I was attending.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress party dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: I feel like the dress actually ran slightly big but don't think going a size down would've worked. I also looked a little wide but think it was due to the tool in the skirt. It was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Elegant fit and the perfect length for my tall self
links_reviews_text: So cute and simple! I loved this green and it was super comfy

links_reviews_title: Difficult zipper requires an extra set of hands.
links_reviews_text: When undoing the zipper from the hanger, I knew this dress was going to be trouble. I was home alone she trying the dress on, so the zipper only made it to the waist before I couldn't get it to budge. I feel like the dress probably would fit nicely, but that zipper won't do when dressing solo.
A bit snug, no stretch at all but beautiful color and material. I got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable dress! Pretty color as well.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a gala for a local professional hockey team. The dress was really comfortable and easy to move around in. The color was really pretty too. For wise I am a 36D and I almost feel like the top was a tad big for my bust but the arm holes for well as did the waist. I do feel like it was a little boxy, but I don't think a size 12 would've fit my waist. I wore Spanx, but really they weren't needed for the dress because of the shape. The length was just past my knees and I am 5'6". I wore 4" heels and the length was still good. The zipper was sticking a bit so getting it on and off I was thankful for the little additional wiggle room in the bodice.

When I originally tried on this dress I didn't see much difference between the 4 and the 6. 4 was maybe a little tighter in the ribs but not uncomfortable. They both did up easily. I decided to go with the 6 just to be more comfy at the holiday party I was going to. However as soon as I sat down in the dress I could feel the fabric on my ribs digging in. This dress doesn't have much stretch on the waist and as soon as I started eating I could feel the fabric digging in more. It wasn't a very comfortable dress to wear and although I thought it looked really nice I probably wouldn't rent it again.
The lace detailing just gave the dress a really posh look. I'm 5' 8" and the skirt hit just above my knee, so not too short not too long.

Very pleased with this dress! Worked perfectly for an office holiday party and was a nice contrast to all of the red dresses that other women wore. I loved the fit- it was flattering and I didn't have to worry about any special undergarments. I wish I had a full length shot! I wore it with nude strappy sandals. Would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband's office holiday party. The color was gorgeous, and the pockets were a huge plus. It was comfortable and hid all of my problem areas, so I felt very confident in it. I got multiple compliments throughout the night

I loved the color of this dress-a deep emerald green. It worked well for our semi-formal family photo session. I am a bit busty, and it was a bit tight and uncomfortable up top, but it wasn't a deal breaker. The length on me was perfect, it hit at the knee. For reference I'm 5'1, 133 pounds. The zipper was a bit of an issue and I need assistance from my husband getting it up, not from being tight, but just from being a difficult zipper. I had this issue with my back up that I tried on as well.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a friends wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, probably the best made dress I’ve ever worn. Quality was stunning and I received compliments all night! I’m quite busty but it fit like a glove.

I absolutely love this dress! I am busty and needed something work-appropriate for an office holiday party and this was perfect. This dress is so classy and photographs beautifully! The top material was a tad scratchy around the arms, but nothing terrible and so worth it. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with more depth than expected
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. The fit was almost perfect (a little long for my taste, but that's to be expected with a person of my height), and it it had more depth than the picture on the model shows. The skirt has a very fine, delicate lace that's adds another dimension to the dress, which I LOVED. The dress is a little heavy, but even in Southern Mississippi late-summer heat, it didn't bother me too much. This dress made my junior homecoming a great one!

I rented this as a backup dress but ended up falling in love with it! I wore it to a winter wedding with my boyfriend where I was meeting his family and many of his close friends for the first time, so I wanted to find something that was pretty and tasteful, but not too flashy. As other reviewers mentioned, the fabric doesn't have a ton of give. I measured in between the 0 and 2 on the ML size chart, but the 2 was already reserved. It took a small army to get me into the dress, and it took some restraint at the reception, but it was totally worth it.

I couldn't tell in the other pictures but the skirt part of the dress is also patterned. Really a fun dress and a great green color. The pockets were great! The top fabric was a little tight but had a good fit. And I could wear a normal bra! Always a plus!

I wore this for my saint patricks day engagement party before changing into my wedding gown for the surprise. Perfect dress for the occasion, it's much prettier in person. It's got so much intricate detail and is the richest emerald. I got tons of compliments. The dress had some wear.. snags and things but you couldn't tell at all by just looking at it. I was so pleased with the dress.

links_reviews_title: Backup dress worked well for rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress that came with a dress I rented for a March wedding. Since both dresses fit, I decided to wear this to the rehearsal dinner. It was comfortable and fun and I got a lot of compliments on the color. The mother of the groom said it looked like I was wearing a tutu - lol! I'm around a size 16 (in the process of losing weight) so I ordered the 14W and it was just a little tight in the waist, but not to the point of discomfort.
The color and detailing of the dress are exceptional. The length is prefect for tall people. Would definitely rent again

I usually fit a 14, but this runs a bit big so I ended up wearing the 12. I'm a 36D and it fit really well. I could move in it, and the material was beautiful! The pockets are always a big selling point with me, and they hid my keys and cell phone in the flowy skirt well!
This green was a perfect for my engagement photos. It was even more beautiful than I thought it could be! It was comfortable but structured and looked great!

links_reviews_title: The NYE wedding was an awesome time with some of my favorite ladies.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color. Ultimately, I wish I could have rented the 2P because that's my size across the board. I am pleased with my RTR experience and I will definitely be doing business with them again soon.
Pretty dress! Perfect for holiday party

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size, including for someone with a pear shape. The color was gorgeous and perfect for a Christmas party. The fit of the top allowed me to wear a normal bra and the dress was very comfortable. As a bonus, it has pockets, which is one of my favorite things with a dress.

Rented this as a bridesmaid dress for my friend's wedding. Love the color and the pockets! The skirt is pretty poofy, so I kind of felt like it made me look bigger than I am. The middle seam is really itchy, and I found myself grabbing and pulling it frequently throughout the night.

So i normally wear a 10 and tried on the 10 before deciding to wear the 12. The 10 fit well but the bust area was a bit tight and therefore i went with the 12 to have some more room. The color was gorgous and appropriate for the holiday season and a winter wedding. I'd rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a fancy work holiday party in NYC.
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress is vibrant and beautiful, perfect for the holiday season. Love the pattern details on both the bodice and skirt of the dress. I enjoyed having pockets in the dress too, but they were a bit hard to find since the skirt of the dress has a lot of fabric. You'll need someone to help zip up the dress, and I recommend hooking the top of the dress together first for easier zipping. Overall, this is a great dress for the holiday season, would rent again!

I was the only person in green in a sea of mostly black and red for a holiday party. Its a cute dress and was comfortable. Only 4 stars because it seems a little high for the price point and i wasn't sure that i loved where it hit on my waistline. My husband thought I looked cute which is what ultimately matters :)

It was a little big in the chest, but the length wasn't too short. The material was thick, but not in a bad way. The shade was beautiful, and there is a pattern on the skirt that you can't see in the pictures. Plus, it had pockets :)

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color & fabric, but style not for the busty
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress - the color was incredible, the fabrics were gorgeous. But as a busty hourglass, this style did NOTHING for me - I felt very frumpy in it. It would be wonderful and ladylike for pear shapes though. I thought it ran a little big - I'm a 38G hourglass, 45" around at the bust, and the 16 was a little big. Wish this one would've worked out.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so perfect! It's classy, has an amazing intricate design, and is so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The dress is a bit brighter in person than in the photos, but still a phenomenal color! The zipper does tend to get stuck a bit, so you may need to get someone to zip it up for you. Overall, and amazing dress, fits perfectly to size!

Rented this dress for a semi-formal gala (not black tie) and the dress was perfect! Received a ton of compliments. Ordered both a 6 and an 8 but ended up wearing the 6. Dress was a little snug around the rib cage but gave me more of a waist than the 8 did. Length was perfect. Very high quality material. Would totally rent again!

I'm the first to go for the LBD but this one was the perfect color for my skin tone and hair. It is tighter around the rib cage and there is no give so I would size up for your back up, you'll also need help getting it zipped. There is enough support that I did not need to wear a bra. The top and back is lace and if you needed a bra you could probably get away with wearing a nude one or a low back strapless one as the lace is see through but it's hard to notice unless you're really paying attention to it. The lace on it was the perfect touch and really sets it off. It also has pockets, which was great! I was able to carry my phone with me and lip gloss and you could not tell at all. This was my first time using RTR and I was definitely happy with my pick.
The color and detailing of the dress was beautiful! The skirt was a bit puffier than I was expecting, making it feel pretty girly. Overall, I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: No one had a dress like mine
links_reviews_text: It fit really well and the color was beautiful, especially in pictures! It photographs beautifully and it has pockets!!! I'd definitely recommend it

I wore this as a bridesmaid dress. It was difficult to find a dark green in the beginning of the summer but this was perfect! I'm glad I rented the larger size as my free second option, dress definitely runs a little small, but the 8 was great! Dress was heavier than I expected, but did not feel too heavy at an outdoor wedding in June! Best parts? Pockets and I didn't have to wear a bra! Perfect dress for the occasion.

A romantic green lace dress! This style runs slightly large, if you prefer a fitted waist feel free to size down for your backup. Great for any cup size. The fabric has no stretch. On my 4'11 frame this style was tea length. May be worn with a standard bra. This is great for a cocktail party, I would pair with a gold tone statement necklace or clutch.

links_reviews_title: This dress was just perfect for the wedding I attended!
links_reviews_text: The length was just right, as it hit just above the knees and the lace was comfortable to wear! Highly highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: It was for my engagement photos and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I wanted and emerald green dress and thats what I got! I normally wear between a 0-2 so it just depends on the fit. I ended up going with the 2 and it worked perfectly. I am 5'4 1/2 and the dress was a bit longer than I expected but worked none the less. The fabric is thinker than I thought but the quality is great. Overall my first rent the runway experience gets a 10!

I wore this dress to my high school homecoming dance. I loved it! The color, fabric, and material are beautiful and classy. Up close, there is gorgeous pattern on the skirt. Pockets are a great plus. I got many compliments. This dress overall had no flaws- it is relatively heavy but not stifling. Make sure you have someone to help you zip up/unzip. It looks a little short on the model, but I am 5'6 and with 4 inch heels it was not too short. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and Polished- probably not work appropriate
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautifully made and flattering. Runs a tad small- I initially ordered a 2 for a wedding but it was uncomfortable. Swapped it out for a size 4 and was much happier. Normally I'd wear a 0-2. Zipper is a bit tricky. I wouldn't recommend for work- the back was a bit to revealing. But lovely for a cocktail event, wedding or date night. (Though my husband didn't love the "cape" or wings on the back of the dress)

I am usually between an 8-10. Went with 10 based on reviews and size chart for this brand. Fit perfect. Received a lot of compliments and felt comfortable dancing all night. Material is thick and did not need to wear a bra.
Sized up so it wouldn't be tight, got so many compliments on such a simple dress!

This dress was so flattering! I received a ton of compliments and had no problem wearing it all night. Very comfortable and easy to move around in. My only complaint is that the zipper is difficult to get up but, other than that, loved it!

Overall I LOVED this dress but I'll start with the Cons; the zipper is oddly placed and true to other reviews, was a pain to pull up all the way. My husband had to help. I honestly don't think I could have worn this dress if I was flying solo to an event. On the Pro side; the color is stunning and the design with the open/cape back will catch eyes. I ordered this for my Rehearsal Dinner- I almost wish I wore it to my wedding!! I went a size up (usually size 10, went with a 12) and the overall fit was very comfortable. I was able to sit down for dinner without any pulling or tugging. I do have a large chest so the dress hugged just a little bit in that area. Bottom Line, I am so happy with this beautiful dress. I recommend it for any formal occasion but just make sure you have extra hands nearby just in case.

The dress was great and fit very well. I received all kinds of compliments on it. RTR sent me an additional package of dresses because the original order was delayed due to a mechanical error with the plane. RTR was so great to deal with and did not charge me for the additional package they sent. Timing was a little tight but it all worked out in the end.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, definite pros and cons
links_reviews_text: I’m usually a size 4 or 6 in dresses, but I wore an 8. This dress has very little stretch and runs small. The material is thick and it’s lined so it’s hot (beware!). The dress is very flattering and I got lots of compliments. For reference I’m 5’5 with an athletic build (big booty), 36DD, 150lbs. Now for the bad...the zipper on the garment bag I almost had to rip it open, it was seriously stuck (stressful!). The zipper on the dress itself also sucked and it took my husband and I 15 min (no joke) to work the zipper and get it up. Lastly, I could definitely tell the dress had been worn many times. There was obvious wear under the arms and down the side of the dress there was a little pulling. It wasn’t terrible but it didn’t look new like I expected. I’d rate it a 7/10 experience overall, it was good but there is room for RTR to improve.
Great dress. Form fitting. I sized up based on the reviews and was glad I did.

links_reviews_title: I would rent this again in a heartbeat
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the fit of this dress. Super comfortable and made me feel amazing

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. Nothing but compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: So as many other reviewers described, the zipper is TERRIBLE. You will need a second, and maybe even a third set of hands, as it curves up the side of the dress. You will need to twist a bit to get it zippered, and I would suggest going up a size to make it easier. BUT, this dress made me look so thin and tall, I was obsessed. Much longer than I would normally wear (hit me just below the knee, I'm 5") but it was sleek and sexy while still allowing me to dance and eat. Fabric was tight enough that I didn't need a bra.

links_reviews_title: This was my extra dress and I wore it to the rehearsal dinner! Perfect!!
links_reviews_text: Great cocktail dress. The back is definitely a show stopper. Color is very different and pretty as well. Quality of the fabric is extremely nice. I felt very luxurious in this dress.
I received so many compliments on this dress! It is a little on the tighter side, so dancing was difficult.

I loved the dress and got many compliments! This was my first time wearing this dress length. The only thing that could have been better was the zipper. It kept trying stuck and my husband and I had to work pretty hard to zip it all the way up. The size up would have fit more comfortably in the chest, but way too big in the hips.

For an 8, it was a bit snug. However, because of the snugness and good fabric quality, I needed no spanx! I wore a bra and wish I didn't. I wear 32DDD and NEVER not wear a bra. I thought I'd be self concious of them flopping around all night. Instead, (the racer back bra looked better than a strapless with this dress cut) my bra peaked out the entire time and I kept trying to push it back in. To my large chested ladies, go camo all the way with this one...it holds everything in place! I felt super sexy! And the cape and open back help draw away from other "imperfections" (belly pooch, etc). I will, one thousand percent, order this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal summer event.
links_reviews_text: Runs a tad small in the waist/ribs, so I went up one size. I had a little room in the chest but it still fit. The back was subtle yet sexy and I received compliments all night. Great length for someone with longer legs. The material is thicker and holds everything in nicely.

My two other dress choices were a disaster fit on me. So Rent The Runway customer service came to save the day and chose this dress for me. Looked at it really quick on the phone and went with it in a size 6. This dress was great! It was just a teeny bit snug on me but it didn't bug me at all. It was a simple dress but with a little pizazz with the upper back detail. Super comfortable too! Would recommend for sure!

This dress fit perfectly. I didn't have to wear a bra (a tough feat for a D cup) because of the thick material. We debated whether the color is purple or navy blue-- no conclusion. Like other reviews have said, the zipper is tough. You just need to use force! I highly recommend this dress.

I listened to what others said in their reviews on here and decided to size up- I usually wear a 6/8 but went with a 10. The dress's zipper was a little bit of a challenge but once on it looked fantastic. I received a ton of compliments! This dress is a little more on the deep blue/purple side.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal event with a little flair!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an awards ceremony where I was being honored and got just as many compliments on the dress as the award. The color is more purple than blue, but is really elegant. The dress is a bit snug but is very flattering for someone with curves. It is formal enough for a nice event, but the back detailing makes it still fun and youthful for a wedding or something like that. The zipper- as I had read on other reviews- is a bit difficult, but as long as you have someone who can help zip it up it's fine. I would definitely rent it again!

This dress ran incredibly small (as previous reviewers have stated). I am a true 6, and this barely made it up over my hips and the zipper was not even close to zipping over my rib-cage. I absolutely loved the color and cut of this dress and hope to size up and try it again!
The fabric and the style are very comfortable. I liked the vibrancy of the color.
Very comfortable dress! Loved the back! The only negative would be the side zipper is a little tough the zip up

links_reviews_title: Great for an early spring wedding with the style fitting great.
links_reviews_text: Being only 5'3'' I wish the dress was a little bit shorter, however I loved how the dress fit. I did not need a bra, and I was complimented all night on the dress. I did have to ask a friend to zip up the dress (since my fiancé was in the wedding and not able to help!!) as the zipper was very hard to do. I probably could have tried a 4 on instead of the 6. The 8 was extremely large on me.

This dress was perfect for a semiformal outdoor wedding in Texas. It was tasteful for being around my family, and still had some personality with the little cape and cutout in the back. Color was the rich purple I expected. I was glad I'd read reviews that it runs small. I'm normally a solid 6 (occasionally a 4) and the 8 fit wonderfully -- tight enough up top that I didnt need a bra (34C) and straight-cut enough at the bottom that it didnt hug in weird ways. Zipper was finicky as others mentioned but I didn't have much problem with it. Overall a wonderful experience to have the perfect dress waiting for me at my hotel. Thanks RTR!
Loved the dress, looked great but was a bit snug and didnt leave a lot of room for us chestier ladies so i went no bra.

Great cut and it does run true to size in the body/torso. It does cut higher in the armpits that would run small for larger busted women. The zipper does take 2 people. Fabric is thick and has some give to it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, bold dress really makes a statement.
links_reviews_text: I don't always go for form-fitting styles, but this one is extremely flattering, especially if you like showing off your back and booty. The fabric is thick and structured and easily smooths any flaws. It's also really sexy without showing too much skin. I felt fantastic in this dress and received many compliments - my hubby loved it too! The other reviews are true - it is purple, not blue, and the zipper is HORRIBLE. You will definitely need help getting into this one, but it's worth it!

I’m 5’11” and typically wear a M. This ran true to size, and was SO easy to wear. I wore it for my class ruinion, and received lots of compliments. It photographs well, and fits like a dream. You’ll love this one!

This dress was great for my friends rehearsal dinner! It fits really nicely but is definitely body conturing - if you fear tight, this might not be the best dress for you. The straps were a bit big for me so I was having to readjust and pull up the dress often but other than that, all was great!
The fit was perfect. My only issue was with the zipper which stuck. Otherwise it was quite comfortable to wear and I was able to move in it easily.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and I felt great wearing.
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews, but I just didn't believe- but believe it- the zipper is a nightmare! The material is too thick and the zipper seems to small. My husband tried zipping me up and it just wouldn't go. I ended up having to take off the dress, zip it up and pull it on over my head. I almost didn't go to the wedding because I didn't think I could get it on over my head- be sure to not get your hair done before putting this thing on. It is true, the color is a very deep, almost purple color. Nice for the fall and the fabric is thick with some stretch. The 8 fit, but not pulled on over my head. Went with the 10 for that extra movement. Strapless bra worked just fine.

This was my first RTR purchase and I'm kicking myself for waiting this long to do it! It was so easy and I had a knock out dress for much less than I would have paid in a department store. This dress was a great purple color and the cape made is super fun. I️ have a fairly large bust but got away with out wearing a bra. The dress was snug but in all the right places. Felt super sexy! Would totally rent again!

The color is way more vibrant than in pictures. I tried to play with the filter on this pic to make it more realistic, but its a really beautiful blue/purple. Got tons of compliments. It runs a little small. The 0 fit, but was too tight. I wore my back up size. I gave it only 4 stars bc the parricular dress that was sent to me was hell to get out of. Idk if it wasnt well made or if the dress had been a little worn out, but the zipper got caught and wouldn't budge. My husband had to literally tear it off. Thankfully that wardrobe malfunction didnt happen until the end of the night!

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner. It fit perfect and received tons of compliments. BUT YALL this zipper took 45 minutes and two people to get up and an additional 45 to get down! Not so great after a late night! While the dress was amazing, I'm not sure the pain of the zipper was worth it.
I wore the 8. Material is nice and thick and sturdy so you feel held in. Very cute back with cape! Happy with my choice.

I was attending a work related awards ceremony. I needed a dress that was classic, yet sexy and easy to wear. This dress did ALL of that for me. I got a TON of complements. The zipper was REALLY tough, so I had to ask for help getting it on. I am a size 34DD and the dress was quite tight around the bust, but I didn't need to wear a bra! YAY! Overall, I would rent this again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress with a modern twist!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It's very high quality and although it fit snug, it was stretchy and the fabric was thick making it very flattering. I loved the cape in the back and the color was gorgeous. It looked great in photos. I have a smaller bust and rib cage with curvy thighs and a booty and this dress was perfect for my body type.

links_reviews_title: The service was excellent! They delivered the dress to the hotel as promised.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 4-6 and the 6 fit perfectly. I did struggle a bit with the zipper as the other reviews mentioned, but my husband helped and it was fine. The back looked awesome, the dress was a heavier quality material. Definitely purple not blue :) loved it and will be renting from RTR again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for the fundraiser I went to.
links_reviews_text: I was afraid this dress wouldn't fit because I had read the reviews and I think I am usually a 12, but you never really know with designers. I always want the option to go up a size. Unfortunately I just had to take the chance and order only one size. The reviews talked about the terrible zipper. I had the same experience, but what I found was using a little blue crayon on the zipper to get it both up and down was the trick!! After using the crayon, the zipper went up without much tugging. The back detail made the dress special. There is a slit in the back that goes up a ways, so the biker short style shapewear I had couldn't be worn; I went and bought a legless one. It didn't ride up, no tugging or repositioning during the night. I would rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to speak on stage in front of 20,000 people to speak on health.
links_reviews_text: Needed a dress to wear on stage. Something professional yet fitting. This dress was perfect for that. I talk with my hands so the sleeveless dress gave me room to do that.

links_reviews_title: Fit well, just not for me
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute just not my style, fit true to size, great color, just wish the neckline wasn't so high.
Con: Had to keep tugging on the longer side due to the shorter side sliding up. Pro: Well made, thick material with some give, comfortable, can wear a normal bra.

This dress was super cute and fun to wear. But it runs funny the small fit, but was a little too tight and the medium was far too big. It's a heavier material so if you are renting for a summer (Southern) outdoor wedding, you might want to rethink. It doesn't breath at all. Really cute and fun, but probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and so comfortable. Got so many compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about it. The color, fit, and style were exactly what I wanted.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a summer wedding. Style and color are amazing!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly and wasn't too tight. Loved the material too! Very comfortable for a summer wedding.

Great color, awesome fit. I'd recommend ordering your true size or one size up. I am typically a 0/2 and the size small fit well. Fabric has stretch and is breathable. Great for a party or night out. Easy to wear with a bra. Love!
Better than expected. Comfortable dress with stretch, cut-outs are cute but not too much. Can wear a normal bra. Beautiful color. Overall win - I wore twice.
It is very well made and very comfortable
I loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it all night long. It is thick material and extremely comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great color. Not such a great cut
links_reviews_text: If I wasn't posing the way I am in this picture the dress wouldn't look good. The fabric is beautiful. The color is perfect. However the lining underneath is sort of twisted and it doesn't lay right. And when you walk the dress creeps up. It's too bad. Because it is a really cool dress. As long as you are just striking a pose.
Fun dress! Loved the cutouts and the hemline. Was definitely form fitting but received compliments and could dance in it. Fabric was also thick which was good for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect summer wedding dress!
links_reviews_text: The material is thick & flexible so it shapes you nicely, even if you have no shape! The color is GORGEOUS!

I love this dress however had to Send the XS back bc the lining is a weird thick netting and bunches up too much for a tight dress. Size up to avoid this issue. I am consistently an xs or 0 so please take note of sizing up. Loved the color and style will consider purchasing

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but my skin bulged out the cutouts.
links_reviews_text: A small was too small and this was my backup dress so I didn't have a medium to try. I just got home from work 6:00pm CST and you can only exchange by 6:00 EST within 24 hours. The problem is our flight leaves very early tomorrow morning for a wedding. I don't want a replacement because I don't trust it sent to a hotel. I wish this dress had been my first choice so I could have the medium to try.

links_reviews_title: Received as 2nd option but didn’t wear because fabric was too heavy/thick for summer
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit but a very heavy dress. Not ideal for hot weather.
The top fit well, the shoulders were a little bit if you're narrow like I am

links_reviews_title: So I sized up and it worked well.
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was so beautiful. When I got my usual Medium, it just didn't suit my very hourglass body. It somehow squared me out. I ordered it again in a Large, and it was lovely (though it still squared me out a bit).
I was worried about the cut outs being unflattering, but it's draped so beautifully it was stunning. Great color. Form fitting without making me feel like a sausage. Hooray!

The color of this dress was great! I can see what the other reviewer meant about the lining looking weird, however I got a xl when I normally would have gotten L and it seemed to lay fine. One of my fave things is the hips, there is a little structure flare to give some shape (o have no hips so it was flattering). The cuts were perfect! I didn't end up wearing because I went with a different option but I will keep this one in mind! Also sizing up had it fit more like a sexy sheath and length was slightly above knee on me at 5'6"

links_reviews_title: Fun, flowy ruffles. Not my fav
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my birthday dinner. I do think the ruffle camouflaged my stomach, I just don't think the dress gave me a shape (like other reviews have said). I thought the shoulder ruffle would be more odd the shoulder, but it was more like a cap sleeve. This was flirty and fun, but I have felt more confident in other things.

I did not love the cut of this dress. I'm more of a pear shape with a small waist. The dress was cut straight at the middle. I think it obscured my figure and made me look frumpy. The ruffle on top is a lot of fabric. May work better for a taller, athletic build.
the dress is cute but it is not flattering on me

I rented this for vacation. I didn't think I would like it so much, but my RTR boutique had slim pickings so I tried it on. The length is great for petite girls and the cut has some room for curves too. The dress works for everyday. I wore it out to dinner with platform sandals and then later in the week with flat sandals and a large sun hat.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a baby shower & got many compliments !
links_reviews_text: Fit well, was nice and light , and true to size.
This is not something I would typically wear, everyone was asking where I got it. It fit really well and I didn't think it was to shear because there is lining

links_reviews_title: Because I wore this beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress!!! It is double lined but make sure you still have skin colored bra and panties on. I would rent again!
COMFORT

Sorry I didn't get a pic of this. It fit well on the shoulders and the length was perfect, BUT it basically just hung on me. I gathered up some material in the back, and if the dress had been tailored to be more form-fitting it would be a KNOCK OUT! But as is, it left me with no shape definition and looking very dowdy. Sent it back without wearing. If it were priced reasonably, I would consider buying and having it tailored to fit.

I liked the print, but I didn't love the fit or the fact that it was pretty sheer even with the white slip underneath. I felt like I needed to wear a bra, which was a bummer because I have a relatively small chest and it was for a hot wedding outdoors. It seemed too dressy to just wear for fun out and about, too. Wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a dream! It made me feel so amazing. I got lots of compliments too! It’s unique!
links_reviews_text: The fit is great overall! The straps took a bit of adjusting to properly sit on my shoulders and back but other than that, it was true to size!

links_reviews_title: cute dress but didn't end up working for me
links_reviews_text: this dress is a very cute color and length, and fit true to size at the waist - i wear a 10 dress usually, 30 jean, and it was just the right tightness. but the open back straps were loose and the skirt a little too stiffly poofy for my taste. i think a larger bust or some well-placed fashion tape might have helped, but the stiff hem of the skirt as noted by others didn't work for me.

This fit was true to size, it had a classy crisscross open back and I felt great at a holiday brunch! There's really cute details on the dress that you can't notice as much in the photo but makes it super classy. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wore for a holiday party and loved it
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, so many compliments. It was slightly loss I might have been able to wear the 0, but the way the back cuts in, I felt it would have given me a back fat roll. I felt even with the size two of you had any body fat at all there was a bit of a roll, which I was worried about but seemed to be ok.
I loved the vibrant color and the lace gave it a very feminine detail. It was the perfect dress for a Christmas dinner.
The dress was perfect! A great color and design, fit perfectly and even had pockets!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, but I had some difficulty with a sticky zipper on the 4. Other than that- flawless! Love the full skirt.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress :)
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. I usually wear a 0-2 and the 2 fit perfect. The chest was a little baggy so had to wear a padded bra but my chest is small (A cup).

I loved wearing this dress to my husbands work Christmas party. The shade of red, lace detailing & back are so darling. I love the flare of this dress, it makes it so flirty. There was one spot on the hem that sat awkwardly because of the stiffness of it. I wasn't able to really "fix" it. I thought it was a bit snug on the waist, but I am currently between sizes. Very forgiving & pretty! This was my first rental with rtr, and I am in love with it.

the back of the dress is open, when at first I was hesitant, but it is very flattering and sexy! The bust was a little snug, so if you are on the bustier side, I would suggest going up a size, as I did and had no problem. Loved this dress, perfect for a holiday party or evening wedding.

I loved this dress and got so many compliments! The fit was perfect, very comfortable. I ended up wearing the size 4 even though the size 2 fit the same. The hem on both dresses was bent and bunched up in the back. I went with the 4 because it was less noticeable than the 2. I would definitely wear this one again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful setting, amazing weather, and great people!
links_reviews_text: The color alone is stunning! The fit was great with the exception of the straps being a TAD itchy. Other than that, lots of compliments were given. I would 100% rent this again!

links_reviews_title: My daughter rented this for homecoming and it was beautiful
links_reviews_text: It was a gorgeous color and fit perfectly. The only part that was a little big was the front chest area... probably made for a woman with... shall we say a couple of bigger chesty friends. It was not very noticeable though.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything. Many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Love the dress. I worn it to a Quinceanera

I loved every part of this dress!! The color was beautiful, and I loved how it fit on me. The cross back was lovely as well. And pockets!!! I'm so glad it had pockets! Incredibly satisfied with this dress <3

I wore this dress to a summer wedding. It was a backup and I ended up liking it more than the other dresses I had rented. The dress was comfortable and made it easy to enjoy dancing. The pockets were great for carrying around my phone. It was a perfect length for my 5'0" frame. The only flaw I found was that it was a little loose in the back area. Don't know if I would rent it again, but I did receive a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Didn't want to return it!
links_reviews_text: Oh my goodness...I can't say enough good things about this dress. Compliments all night! Loved the fit, the color, the open back, the flare of the skirt...everything! You need to wear a nu bra (or something similar). This dress made for a memorable Christmas party!!

This gorgeous dress was so comfortable and fun to wear. I received tons of compliments, even in a sea of other red dresses (Christmas parties, amiright?!). Even standing next to my husband in his ludicrous tuxedo I received compliments. And pockets! Thank you dresses that have pockets for awkward people like me who need a place to put their hands when they don't know what to do with their hands. It is also made from that nice material that doesn't show all the lumps and bumps. And a gorgeous open back so you can be a little scandalous.
I loved this dress!! It was my back up dress but fit much better than the other dress i reserved. The lace overlay is even more beautiful in person. Definitely will rent from RTR again!
The picture does not show how beautiful the lace detail is. This dress is super comfortable & has pockets! Bottom is stiff, so it was fluffy the whole time.

links_reviews_title: Not another like it at the dance
links_reviews_text: Back& shoulders are difficult to get tight so we used a safety pin to cinch it together where it was gapping

links_reviews_title: My Daughter wore this dress to a Scholarship Acceptance Award Banquet for her High School. Perfect!
links_reviews_text: Very high quality ~ absolutely gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Loved the detail and the back!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but it is a bit smaller in the midsection than I thought it would be. Also, the lace was a bit irritating but nothing horrible! If you do rent this dress I highly recommend ironing out the skirt as it is pretty stiff and sometimes doesnt lay how you'd like it to. Its not a flowy skirt like I thought it would be. Other than these minors things I totally loved this dress and would rent it again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear little red dress!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and comfortable. A little loose in the chest but not a big issue. Would rent again!

At the time of this rental, I am 5'5" and 142 lbs with a 34D bust. I am generally a size 8. The 8 fit perfectly and I didn't even try on the back up 10. I rented this dress for Christmas Day with my very classy in-laws. The dress is very sophisticated and but also fun. Received lots of compliments. Could not wear a bra with this dress so if you are self conscious about that, this isn't the dress for you. The criss-cross back is lovely! The only reason why I rated this a 4 instead of a 5 is because the bottom of the dress billows in an odd way. It still works and is very beautiful, just an odd gathering at the hem in the front, which I did read about in other reviews. Overall I am very happy with this rental and I will continue to be a RTR customer! (This was my 2nd RTR experience and I just went Pro!)
This dress was SO beautiful! I loved the back and I got so many compliments! Perfect for a company christmas party!

Dancing in this dress was very fun! The thickness of the fabric was perfect to feel covered in the absence of a bra, and the back is wide open. The arm holes were a tad tight at times but I was able to make adjustments and it didn't end up being too irritating overall. The wide shaping band at the bottom of the shirt was a bit wonky when I first received the dress but I bent and worked it flat. Also, some lace was detaching on the front of my dress but not enough that anyone would have noticed, so I ignored it and danced away!

I felt like a Christmas bell. I liked this dress better off than on... I think it looks better on taller people, but it worked. Also, the size that fit me the best had a hole in the lace. However, RTR was super quick to answer my email asking for a picture and stating that they would fix it and give me a percentage of my rental back.

links_reviews_title: Truly stood out at my holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I️ absolutely loved this dress- I️ mean, it had pockets! Can't get better than that! My only issue with the dress was that the mid section (right about where my rib cage was) was extremely tight, in the 4, but everywhere else fit perfectly or was even a little big. If you have a small chest, the front area might be a bit "baggy", but because of the material and texture, you really can't tell!

links_reviews_title: We went to a Christmas party and it was so fun!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. It was a little roomy in the top but the waist couldnt have fit any better. So if your chest is bigger than a 32C you will be fine in the size 4 dress. It was super comfortable and light weight. Loved the pockets, too. Would definitely rent again for a holiday party!
This dress is freakin' awesome! The material has some stiffness to it, so great for moving around. The back is super sexy and the length is great!

links_reviews_title: Long enough to be appropriate for a work party but short enough to be fun
links_reviews_text: Worn to a holiday work party. Back detail got a ton of compliments as well as people loved the whole dress. I am small chested and was worried this would look very oversized on me but actually it was comfortable braless and looked great. The band around the bottom was slightly misshapen but I am not picky enough for that to matter. Pockets were great! I didn't appreciate the lace detail on the front of the dress in the pictures but it definitely added some dimension.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but not my favorite ML
links_reviews_text: I love red dresses and this one did not disappoint. I received so many compliments on it all night. Only con was the arm holes were a little tight.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, high quality, beautiful back!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress! Fit true to size at the waist and in the torso but it was a little too long for me, which isn't uncommon for me at 5'. I felt like the roundness of the skirt along with the length made me look even shorter so I chose to go with my backup dress.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress with a touch of sexy!
links_reviews_text: This was such a fun dress to wear! I loved the color- I don't normally choose red so this was out of my box. The dress fit true to size I'm just under 6 foot and it wasnt too short for me which was really nice. Loved that it had pockets too! I had my phone in my pocket all night and the way the skirt flared out you couldn't even tell. The only reason this dress got one less star is because the hem didn't lay perfectly flat when I got it and I had to press it to get it to look better. Also the top part was pretty big in the bust and I'm on the smaller side up top so I went to target and got a push up stick on bra (since there's an open back) and it worked great! I received a ton of compliments and continue my love affair with RTR!

Dress fit perfectly! Rented this because I loved the back and then realized I never got a single picture of the back of the dress. But it was a super flattering and fun dress for a night out! Loved wearing it!

I wore this to a gala fundraiser for work, and it was perfect! The theme was New York, New York with black and red attire. This dress was a showstopper with its classic shape and feminine lace details. I loved the open back, which made it a little more interesting. The fit was true to size, and I didn't wear a bra. I have a small chest, but the material was thick, so I don't think a bra is necessary even with a larger bust size. Otherwise a backless bra would be the way to go. I felt confident and comfortable while working.

Loved the color, fit and cut. However, the dress shows wear and tear. The hem is no longer laying flat. It was fine for wearing on vacation, but would have been noticeable at a more formal event. I rented this as part of my unlimited subscription.

links_reviews_title: My fiance loves how sexy the back is!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress. I signed up for Unlimited just so I would have the option to buy this dress! I have rented it on three previous occasions. I've worn it to a friend's wedding, anniversary date night, and a Broadway show. The skirt is full and flirty. The pockets are the right size and depth to hold a small wallet/coin purse in one and my cell phone/lip gloss in the other. There is enough structure in the bodice that I can wear the dress without a bra! As a full busted woman, I love that the top is not solid and has some sheer lace to keep the sexy without being over the top. I have never been self conscious about showing too much in this dress. The back is gorgeous and very sexy. I can't wait to wear this dress for our rehearsal dinner in January!

This style is so flattering! The fabric feels high quality and the color is fantastic. The hem has some weight to it so your skirt won't fly up. My dress had a small hole burned inside the lining, but that was not visible. Compliments all night!
I loved this dress. It was unique & eye catching, but also modest enough to wear anywhere. I wore it all day, with my 9 month old, and had no issues or malfunctions :) Practical & beautiful

I found this dress to run large and the elastic around the waist wasn't actually small enough to do anything. The cape was a beautiful touch but it is split down the middle, which wasn't really obvious from the photo on the model. Underneath the cape, there is a band that snaps in and makes it so you can wear a regular bra. The weight of the cape and sleeves wanted to pull the shoulder of the dress down a little bit. But the color is beautiful and it has pockets. Overall I did quite like it.

I wore this for my sister's bridal shower (her dress is also RTR) and it was perfect- received many compliments. I am usually a M so I would say it runs a little large, although you couldn't really tell. Would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: The dress was the perfect color to match the bride’s color scheme.
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing a camisole under it, because the back is partially open. The slit in the back goes so low that even my strapless bras would have been seen.

This dress was great for hiding some recently put on weight, but it ran a little big. I don't think I would have been comfortable in a small in other areas, but the back strap to hide your bra kept sagging and showing it anyway. The back of the bottom where the zipper is would also sag down and show the top of my spanx. I decided it was worth keeping the spanx on anyway :) It was a fun color for a September wedding and was perfect for the temperature.

links_reviews_title: Great color and definitely a different look.
links_reviews_text: This dress looks great, if you walk around with your hand on your hip or in your pocket. However, the cape sleeve tends to look droopy, hangy, sloppy, etc. if you're in any other pose. The waistband was also a little awkward for me, hitting higher than my natural waist but lower than just under my chest... I felt like it was either making my top half look too long or accentuating all of the hors d'oeuvres I'd eaten! Great concept but didn't execute well on me!

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like dancing all night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a work dinner in Las Vegas and out to a Cirque du Soleil show after. I wasn't disappointed, but definitely wished I had ordered a size down. The waist and top were at least a size too large on me, so I felt like I was swimming a bit in this. I did use some safety pins to get it to fit alright, and overall I loved the rental! I could wear a normal bra, thanks to the strap across the back. The cape also kept it from feeling too risque for a work event, since it mostly covered the open back, but I could just as easily have worn this on a date or somewhere else. The fabric is light and airy, and you will need a bra of some sort with it. It also hit me just past my knees (I'm a little over 5'9"), so it's a great dress for the taller ladies but it might be something to avoid if you're on the short side. The color is definitely bold, and you do stand out (I got pulled up to be a part of the Cirque du Soleil show we attended while wearing this!). I loved this rental, will likely rent again in a smaller size, and would highly recommend trying it!

links_reviews_title: Fun but a little too much fabric
links_reviews_text: This was a replacement when a dress I rented wasn't available. I ordered an XS but was sent a S and it was a bit too big. Loved the back details, and the pockets were a design element and I liked that, but the top is just too drapey and flowy and swallowed me up

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress! Such a fun color!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. The color is not quite as orange as i expected, but it's a great bright coral color. Definitely have some safety pins to help keep the strap in place to cover the bra, but otherwise, enjoy this light, breezy dream of a dress!

links_reviews_title: first day back at work from maternity wear and this dress made me feel great
links_reviews_text: after having spent 12 weeks in yoga pants, t-shirt's, mom hair bun and some spit up, it was nice to get dressed and feel great on what i was wearing. tons of compliments from the color of the dress to the style! loved this dress. will def rent again

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite, but got the job done!
links_reviews_text: This dress ran quite large, so I sized down to a medium. I ordered it to wear to a Father's Day brunch. It got the job done, but was my least favorite rental so far. Due to the nature of the fabric the pockets are not practical - you wouldn't actually be able to use them to hold anything and even when empty they show. Also, the snap strap that goes across the back came undone on one side almost every time I moved. The attached cape was a nice idea but all that extra fabric made it difficult to navigate a buffet and eat while wearing it and had the effect of making you look larger than you are in photos and when standing in certain positions.

The fit was perfect for me! And I live, live, loved the color! The back strap that covers the bra snaps together, and I found that the snaps popped when I breathed, so we pinned those. I also had to roll down my spanx so they wouldn't show, the elastic waist comes up almost high enough in the back. It didn't take away from the dress, just an FYI. I was thrilled by this dress!

links_reviews_title: Really unique - love the peek-a-boo back!
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on this dress and felt fantastic in it. I think it runs a bit big with how it's cut. Still flatters curves in a more subtle way - with just a touch of cleavage. The only issue I had was with my bra showing in the back - had to use safety pins to secure it. If I were to rent this again, I'd just use my backless bra. Really fun stand-out dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fun occasion!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me really well and I am tall! Beautiful color and cape and back were a fun touch. Only downside was my bra showing in the back of the dress. I tried fashion tape but it didn't work out great. If I had a backless bra I would have worn it but I do not.
Very nice. Doesnt show off cirves and a bit frompy but still nice.

I️ wanted something for a family wedding that was classy but not frumpy. I️ have a very large chest and a lot of dresses end up being too revealing. This dress was the perfect combination between young and fun and classy.

links_reviews_title: I have rented this multiple times because it's super flattering and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: The belt hits at exactly the right place.

Rented this for a presentation at work and received a ton of compliments. I am 130 lbs, typically wear a size 4, and the Small fit perfectly (in fact, I could have potentially gone for XS but it was not available at time of rental). The only watch out - for work - was that the back orange strap that was supposed to cover my bra strap was super loose and did not cover it, but thankfully a few clips later, it was secured:)
