This was my backup dress and I absolutely loved it. I got a lot of compliments! The back is open, though covered by the cape. There is a strap in the back that's to cover your bra. It didn't 100% cover mine, but it did a good enough job that, with the cape, I felt comfortable. Based on other reviews, I pinned the strap to the dress, just to be sure it didn't pop open. This was a lot of fun to dance it. There are pockets, though the material is too thin for them to actually hold anything. It's the right combination of color and style to be noticeable, but not over the top.

links_reviews_title: Easy breezy glamour for an outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress got so many compliments and was perfect for an outdoor California wedding. The color is a beautiful deep orange/coral (not quite as coral as my photo suggests, but deeper than the RTR model photo). The elastic helped ensure a nice fit on the waist. My only challenge was with the back - it's open with a bar of fabric that snaps across. It's supposed to cover your bra band, but it did not fall quite right since the top runs large. Safety pins would have fixed the problem, but I didn't have any on hand at the hotel. I loved that this had pockets, but be aware that you really can't put anything in them without it being very obvious.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a fancy fundraiser dinner and received many compliments. The dress is comfortable and the color is amazing. It's a bit challenging to put on and you need a special bra that doesn't have anything in the back. Otherwise, a beautiful dress!

I LOVED the way this dress looked on, and I received compliments all night. I'm short and petite, so I worried about the proportions, but it was almost perfect. It did run large- I'm usually a solid XS/2, but this in an XXS would have been even better. There's a back strap that I assume is supposed to cover a bra, but it fell a good three inches below where a bra would fall (on me, at least). This dress needs a bra because the fabric is thin and there's no support, so you may have to do as I did and buy an adhesive one. Bottom line: this dress is comfortable, beautiful, and functional (has pockets!) and I would totally wear it again!

Absolutely LOVED this dress! From the color to the fit, it was an overall winner. The open back was a surprise, but mostly covered by the fun cape. I pinned the strap on the dress that goes over your bra strap like some of the other renters did, and that worked well. If you're thinking about renting this one, do it!

I wore all day to a conservative convention in Rochester, Minnesota. Very flattering, proper modest length on a woman 5'7", covered the knees. Beware the open back. Had to wear a camisole-type top underneath since the back is pretty wide open. Nonetheless a gorgeous dress for anyone with olive skin/the right coloring to pull off orange. Great upper arm coverage for those of us in the over 45 age group ;) Nrmally wear a size 4 lately and it fit perfectly.
Wore it for graduation. Felt comfortable and open back covered my bra. Great for winter when you want more coverage but still cute!
Compliments all night, gorgeous color, photographs well and is very comfortable

This dress would be perfect for a shower, brunch or a casual work event. Great spring color. I have a small waist and larger bottom, and this dress accentuates the positive, and minimizes the negative!
Loved this dress. Gorgeous color and unique style. I normally wear a size 6 and the small fit perfectly.
Dress runs slightly large. It does not have any stretch in the waist but the back has elastic making the smaller size the better fit. It was perfect for a wedding, very flattering.

links_reviews_title: This dress worked perfectly for my son's 1st Communion. It was beautiful, flowy, comfortably & fun.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a large but needed a medium for the dress. The only issue I had was with the strap in the back. I kept coming open if I reached to aggressively for things. Overall look her the pockets, color and length. I am 5'2" so loved that it was past my knee!
Pros: color was beautiful, pockets, comfy, elegant yet simple Cons: I usually wear small so I was glad I got the XS which I wore.

links_reviews_title: Exactly what I needed for an ORANGE event
links_reviews_text: This dress was super fun. Oklahoma State's colors are orange and black, and this was the perfect shade for the alumni fundraiser. I'd love to own it! I was running around all night and was so comfortable (added bonus of the cape when you walk fast) and got a ton of compliments. I ended up wearing a NuBra since I didn't want to fool with the strap covering my bra all night, and it worked great. One thing - it's a little long (I'm 5'5") and I wore boots (Cowboy fundraiser, after all) and it completely covered my legs, so you may want to try heels if you're short and want to show some leg.

links_reviews_title: Very unique style! Back was beautiful and I didn't expect it to be open like it was!
links_reviews_text: I am a solid medium, sometimes a large and the medium in this dress was BIG! (made me feel great!) It is very flowy, loved the pockets, great color, awesome deep neckline to show some cleavage. I had a few compliments on the dress at the wedding I attended in it. People loved the color and I was definitely the only person wearing it! It was very fun to dance and twirl around in; the arm drapery made for some fun! On the downside, in group pictures I looked like I was wearing a circus tent! Definitely need to be strategic in the way that you stand and hold the dress to avoid this. It was longer than I expected it to be, well below my knees (I'm 5'5"). I saw that some people wore it as a maternity dress... I am NOT pregnant, but can certainly see why it would be great for anyone who is.
I wore this to a conference reception and it was stunning, comfortable and best of all had pockets! Would definitely rent again. Looks great with turquoise jewelry

Really loved this dress, size large easily fit my 23wk baby belly, the top was a bit big though even for 34DD. The color is a very pleasant shade, not too orange. The sleeves are Very much like a cape...flattering if you need to hide your arms but kind of silly otherwise. Strap in back to cover bra was way too loose, like inches, had to wrap it around, could have used some pins...

I usually wear a small or a medium and the small fit great, even with my 11 week baby bump. I could wear a regular bra and like others said, pinned the dress strap to the bra strap so it covered it fully. Loved the neck line and pickets. Great color, a deep salmon. And the split cape back was so fun.

This dress was so pretty and fun. It hid any problem areas I have. Two things: (a) it runs VERY large. I weigh 165lbs, and the large was huge on me! So glad I got the medium as a backup. (b) I recommend pinning the strap in the back to your bra strap and to the side of the dress where it snaps. I'm busty, and the strap kept coming undone when I moved my arms until I finally pinned it. Other than that, it's stunning. I do recommend this for taller people, though. I can see this looking very frumpy on a smaller frame.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color. Unique look. Wanted to keep it
links_reviews_text: True to size, fit a curvy girl.

I wore this to a summer garden wedding and it was absolutely perfect- summery, flowy and comfortable for my second trimester belly! It does run a bit big and the medium was plenty big. I also used safety pins to keep the back strap over my bra strap but that was no problem! Overall, I loved it!

The cut and style of this dress were so different and interesting! V neck was sexy but not too low. True midi length. Open back cape was super different but also sexy with the open back. Great vibrant orange color. Bonus pockets! Only downsides: ran a bit big.... There is a strap across the open back that is meant to hide a bra strap, but it was so big across by back that I had to pin it to my bra strap. Once pinned. It was perfect. Felt so chic in this! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cutest summer outfit for a wedding preparty!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an all white garden themed wedding pre-party. The fit was snug around the waist/hip area. The bottom half and the shoulders were looser. I did not use the straps and tucked them away for this occasion. Taking it off and putting it back on was a little difficult since I couldn’t reach the back zipper so be prepared to ask someone to help!
Fits great, amazing for a day around town while on vacation.

links_reviews_title: Perfect romper for my bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect romper for my bachelorette party! It was really comfortable and flattering. I didn't like the straps much though, so I ended up just trying to tuck them in the sleeves.
Gorgeous thick lace. Fits beautifully and received a Ton of compliments. Second time I'm renting this piece. Once on vaca in Captiva and now at home. 5'5" 125lb 32DDD

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a bridal brunch and got tons of complements!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and nicely lined so undergarments don't show through.

I rented this for a white boat party in Los Cabos, Mexico. Great outfit for the summer! It was lightweight so I didn't feel too hot. And I got a lot of compliments!!! The lace and the keyhole detail really make this romper unique. It comes with straps but I just tucked those in to give it an off the shoulder look. I actually ordered a M (which is what I usually wear in rompers) but when I tried it on it was huge! So I exchanged it for a S in store. The small fit much better but I still think it was loose in the crotch area. Definitely size down!!!

links_reviews_title: I received so many complements it felt so comfortable. I loved this romper !
links_reviews_text: I had to wear the M as it was a warm day. I wanted the extra room to be cooler. The zipper was a tiny bit sticky but worked thank God. So cute rent this you won't be sorry.

I loved this romper! I got a handful of compliments on it and thought it was very comfortable. I dropped the straps down because I liked the way it looked without them and it stayed up just fine. The only downfall (and reason I didn't give it 5 stars) was because there was no way I could zip it up and down on my own. I wore this to a concert and had to have my mom come to the bathroom with me every time which was kind of a pain. Otherwise, love it!
Ran a bit big. Suggest sizing down if you prefer a tight fit. Loved the lace detail.
Liked this romper- but not obsessed.

links_reviews_title: Dress up or down, perfect for summer time.
links_reviews_text: Everyone thought this was a dress and friends loved the lace look. The only negative is that it is difficult to get in and out of to use the bathroom but that is expected with a romper. I'm usually a small medium but the extra small was the only available and it fit fine -- the zipper made it up to the top (maybe a little snug)

I wore this for a night at of my bachelorette weekend. It was not the original romper I ordered, but I ended up really liking it! It was comfortable and cute. The only downfall is the straps kept falling down and they were unable to be tucked into the sleeves.

This romper fit true to size and was more comfortable than it looks! Only downside is unzipping to use the bathroom but that's a typical hurdle for all rompers. I decided to tuck the straps in since they hit near the end of my shoulder and were slipping off anyway. No biggie- the top held up really well!

Deby Debo I love this feminine, trendy romper by Deby Debo! Running small with no stretch, I recommend wearing a size up for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A-C cup. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this romper so you should wear a strapless bra, nubra or no bra due to the cut. At 5'0", the length hit mid-thigh length on me. This was a cute, light romper great to wear for vacation or brunches. If you are curvier, I would recommend sizing up. Pair with strappy heels or sandals to complete your outfit!
too long

links_reviews_title: Great outfit for my bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, slightly short in the crotch.

This romper fit well. A little loose in the waist, but still looked okay - plus I just added a belt. The straps were a little strange and kept falling down, so I just kept them down. Overall good romper for a hot summer night.

links_reviews_title: I sized up and sent back!
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and many people said it was on the smaller size. Since I am usually a medium, I sized up to a large and it was unwearable! I had to send it back!

Loved it so much that I bought it! I'm tall (5'7-5'8"), and it can be hard to find rompers with the right proportions for my body, but this one was perfect- the torso length is just right, and it's not too short!!! It goes down to my mid-thigh, which is amazing, as most rompers end up being too short on me. It's a very cute, classic summer style. It has a tie in the middle of the chest, but I think it looks better without, and I just tuck that behind (easy to do).

links_reviews_title: its pretty. Lots of fabric and a little too formal for beach wear. I did not wear this
links_reviews_text: pretty
I wound up not wearing the dress. It fits, however, it is worth knowing that the shorts are VERY long - not flattering at all.
This is pretty but it was not as pretty as I expected and runs big. I needed an XS so I didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: did not wear, just didn't do anything for my body
links_reviews_text: did not end up wearing, Was not sure what to do with all the straps. the straps that were closest to the sleeves couldn't be adjusted and just hang out and couldn't tuck them in discretely
The fit was weird and the crotch was way to low.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, meant for a long torso & long legs
links_reviews_text: I didn't take a picture of this dress because it was too unflattering to bear. I did wear it for a half of a day since it was all I had to wear in 100 degree weather that day, but it was not my best work by any means. The torso was so long that I had to roll it over itself. It kind of looked like a two piece with the shirt tucked in. The shorts were too long despite my long legs for my height and we a bit puffy, wide and unflattering for me. I didn't look like a train wreck, but this outfit was definitely not meant for someone who is 5'0. If your a tall curvy girl I think it could work, but definitely not a great choice for me.
This runs large did not wear

I was sure this item was sent to me in the wrong size because it was enormous, like almost down to my knees big and I'm 5'3. I searched for the tag thinking it would confirm it was the wrong size but it was not. The XS is insanely big on my 5'3 + 118 lbs frame..
My husband complimented the romper. A little tough to get zipped up. Beware if you use the rr much. Would rent again

I think this might look cute if you were model status tall and/or have full hips. As for me, I don't have very big hips and it made me look very straight and boyish. The length of the shorts(rather long) didn't help. It also fit very weird in the front crotch area. Overall, just not terribly cute. It was great quality though and extremely comfortable. I returned for credit.
Runs true to size

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit, made the girls look incredible.
links_reviews_text: This was an emergency backup dress to replace a really gorgeous number that I just couldn't zip up over my ribs. Thankfully, it was exactly what I needed!! I was surprised that the 6 fit as nicely as it did (even with a little room to spare) but it was incredibly comfortable to wear all night. The fabric is thicker with just a tiny bit of stretch, and overall it's very forgiving. I wore basic shapewear underneath, but I think it would have looked fabulous no matter what. There is a LOT of cleavage, but I like to show the ladies off and had fun with it. I was able to wear a deep-v bra, and the dress even had these amazing little snaps hidden under the shoulder straps to keep the bra and dress straps together. I wore the dress to a February wedding, and paired it with a nice tan wool wrap. It hit just below the knee for me, and looked fantastic with a simple set of nude heels and a necklace. Would absolutely rent again and would love to be able to buy this dress! I'm 5'3", about 150 pounds as of that wedding, with a 32DDD.

links_reviews_title: Worked perfectly and can wear a real bra with it!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and super comfortable. The fabric in the V part of the neck folded out a little, but probably not noticeable to anyone but me.

This dress is exactly what I wanted it to be. Sophisticated and sleek, feminine without too revealing. The dress definitely runs large so I would size down. The material was thick enough to be forgiving. You can wear a regular bra, just be mindful of the little bit of plunge. I'm 5'8" and the dress came to just below the bottom of me knee. I would rent this again.

Form-fitting but the material is quite stretchy. It's also thick enough that it doesn't show flaws (the dark color helped with that too). It says it's Navy, but it really reads more as black - only looks navy if you're holding it up against something that is true black. I love this dress and felt really comfortable in it. Only 4 stars because the cut in the cleavage is quite low and the straps are set a bit wide on the shoulders, so I felt like I had to monitor the top a bit all night. I wore the 10 to a party and the 12 dressed down with a sweater and booties to a concert, and both fit great.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric! A bit low cut, but longer dress made it classy! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Super dark navy, almost black. Great for a wedding or night out.

The material is thick enough to be forgiving and is very sleek and sexy. I usually wear a 2 and wore that size in this dress. It's just low cut enough to be sexy without being too revealing. I felt awesome in this dress! Will definitely be renting again!
Cute dress - good length however I didn't end up wearing because I felt it was not appropriate for work considering how low cut it was.
nice fit, a little long for my 5'3" frame
fit perfect. little loose in the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: I received tons of compliments on the dress. It was beautiful, classic, and really comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 10, so that's what I ordered. Based on the other reviews stating that this dress runs large, I planned to order a size 8 for my backup dress. However, the size 8s were out of stock, so I went with a size 6. The 6 is what ended up fitting. The only problem I had was that the lining in the chest area kept creeping up and out of the neckline so I had to readjust it periodically. I think that was probably due to having a larger bust in a smaller dress. Perhaps a size 8 would have been perfect. Other than that, it was wonderful - very comfy and the fabric had a bit of stretch to it. I would order this dress again.

I absolutely loved this dress! This was my 2nd time renting. I was 24 was pregnant. It fit great. I don't think the top would fit well for a small busted person due to the cut. I'm currently a 34D. I received so many compliments. Stretchy fabric that was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my 40th birthday party and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Hit about an inch past the knees (I'm 5'4" with a short torso) and was stretchy enough to both hug my curves (rear and bust) and be forgiving in the tummy area. I felt beautiful and festive and sophisticated. I was comfortable all evening. Note: when I wore it, I was 185 lbs, 34DD, and my normal size was 14.
Super comfortable! Fits true to size. Great dress for dancing!

This is probably my favorite dress I have worn during my pregnancy. I have a pretty significant baby bump, but the fabric hugged it just right and looks awesome on every other part of my body too -which has been super rare lately. Pregnant mamas, rent this!!!!

Great dress, overall - it doesn't stand out, but it's very classy. The material is lightweight, stretchy and forgiving. I'm pretty consistently a 12 in Slate & Willow, but I definitely could've worn a 10 in this dress. The sweetheart neckline is a nice touch, but is still relatively conservative in my opinion. Because it runs big, a push-up bra is a good idea to fill out the top.

I received so many compliments on this dress. I ended up wearing 2 sizes down from my normal size and it fit perfectly. Easy to dress up or down. I felt amazing in this! I'm only 5'1 so it was a little long but still gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. Thick material, hide any bumps, and I have never received more compliments! Definitely a little busty but not too revealing.

I LOVE this dress! It definitely runs big. I wasn't sure my size post baby so I played it safe but the 8 (my small size) was actually pretty big on me. I had to use tape but it still didn't stay put cause it was loose. But other than that, it was comfy everywhere else. Everyone loved the dress and I can only imagine how much better it would've looked on had I gotten the 6. Will absolutely rent again!
This dress was super comfortable, and flattering. I would size down.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and flattering at 28 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding in Sept at 28 weeks. The material is stretchy and thicker so it fits great over a baby bump without being too revealing. I ordered a size 0 (my normal size) which means it certainly runs big! The top was even still a little big.

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable and flattering in all the right places !
links_reviews_text: The only con was it had a hole in the one seam and I had to stitch it up

links_reviews_title: Classic dress - perfect for many occasions
links_reviews_text: It fit well, and the thick material is forgiving, although I still opted to wear spanx. The bust was slightly loose (Im 36B) but it didnt bother me at all. Im tall (6 ft) and the dress was a great length. Highly recommend!

I wore this as matron of honor dress for my sister's wedding. The fit was great. A 6 is usually fitted on me, but this one has a bit of extra room. It looked good, but I would size down if you're between sizes. The material is actually very lightweight. I wore it for an outdoor wedding in 88 degree weather and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and easy to move and dance in!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the wedding I attended in July! After reading the reviews I decided to order my size and a size smaller since people were saying it ran large. They were right! I fit in the size 10 (normally wear a 12) and it was still loose enough that I had room to move, dance, and breathe! It was lightweight and not too hot after a night of fun! I absolutely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! Hesitant to rent a dress while pregnant but RTR and this dress proved me wrong!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding at 35 weeks pregnant and I received compliments all night long! The dress was made of stretchy material that formed perfectly and comfortably over my bump. It wasn't too tight or loose and I wasn't uncomfortable the entire night (even after eating for 2). A regular bra can be worn which was a plus as well. I can only imagine how beautiful this dress would have looked if I wasn't pregnant!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a NYC wedding and great for dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: This was not the dress I had originally rented, but after UPS delayed my shipment RTR was able to get this shipped to my hotel in NYC instead. I was disappointed not to get my first pick, but this dress was a perfect substitute! I ordered a size 8, but this size was large on me. I fluctuate between 6 and 8, so I should have gotten a 6. I was able to make it work with some double sided tape. This dress is very flattering! I was amazed by how slimming it is and think it covers any areas you might be insecure about. I also liked that it emphasized my curves without being indecent. The lines are clean and simple, so it is easy to jazz it up with accessories. I was also impressed with how comfortable it was. The material is stretchy and easy to dance in. My only complaint was the length, but dresses are always a little long on me, and the size being too big didn't help. In general, this dress is slimming, flattering, and comfortable and I definitely plan to rent it again!

I had this overnighted to me when another dress I rented didn't work out, and ended up loving this one! The neckline is so flattering- it's low cut, but you can wear a bra without it showing. The fit is a little large- I probably could have sized down and been fine. It's easy to dress up with jewelry to fit the occasion.
I loved the neckline on this dress. Easy to wear and move in. Definitely runs large- I could have gone a size smaller and been great but the extra room wasn't a huge fit issue. Classy and classic!!

links_reviews_title: Great fit especially for a large bust.
links_reviews_text: I had a baby a couple of months ago and was nervous about what dress to get because I'm really self conscious right now. After reading the reviews, I rented this dress and received many compliment. The fabric is forgiving, the color hides things nicely and it accommodates a very large bust well. I would definitely recommend this dress no matter how tall you are. I'm only 5ft and the length wasn't bad even for a shorty. Easy to dance in! Super comfortable.

I ordered a size up to be careful and I shouldn't have. It was loose so order your true size with this dress. It was simple but not ideal for large chested people. Just a little too much cleavage showing for me!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my daughters college graduation!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. Hugged all my curves without it feeling tight. I have 38DDD and the 14 fit perfectly. The back up size was too big.
The dress fit as expected and well a nice color and material the only con is it had a metal piece that made the v neck stick out a little I’m 5.6’ 160 lbs and bra 34c
I loved this dress for a Texas wedding. It fit so comfortably, and looked wonderful! Will rent again!

As most have said, this dress runs LARGE! I was 26 weeks pregnant & up almost 20 lbs but wore a size 2. My regular pre-pregnancy dress size is a 0/2. That said, this was a pregnant girl's dream dress. The material was very thick & stretchy - I felt like it was holding everything in place but still allowed me to move & breath comfortably. The front is a bit low so be prepared to have lots of cleavage & if you have a smaller bust I'm not sure this would work with your body type or if you had a smaller waist. Lots of bonus points for being able to wear a regular bra with this dress. At 5'1 the dress was just a tad longer than I would have preferred but overall was fine. I'm not sure I would rent this not pregnant as the cut may not work with my normal frame but depending on your body type I think this dress could be very flattering. It's a very dark navy color and simple/classic. Very happy I read the reviews & rented this style. And shout out to RTR customer service who was able to get me a smaller size before my event (originally ordered a 4 and was swimming in it!). Did I mention this dress runs LARGE!? Definitely size down at least one dress size but maybe two!

The dress was pretty, but the fit runs big. I also rented a statement necklace to wear with the sweetheart cut - great decision! The dress was longer than I would have liked, but I'm used to that since I'm so short. The sweetheart cut was nice and I felt well dressed for a wedding we attended in late April

I wore this to a wedding and paired it with colorful heels (shown) and animal print flats later; both styles worked well and got compliments. The shape was flattering and the dress was very comfortable. Being able to wear a normal bra was a huge plus!

I rented this for a friend's wedding, and I felt so good about myself in this dress. It does cling a bit, so Spanx might be a good idea, but this is one of my favorite dresses I've rented. I am so happy I got this dress and had a great time at the wedding!!! Everyone said I looked good too, which was an added bonus! I wore the 12 (the 14 was way too big).

links_reviews_title: Such a confortable dress! Not to mention stylish and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly! It has a good stretch factor, so you will definitely be comfirtsnle in it all night. Color is like a darm plum. I thought it was black. I give this dress 2 thimbs up!

Great stretchy material and felt very sexy but classy in this dress. Hugged my curves in all the right places and didn't show too much cleavage. Definitely size down though - I usually wear a 6 or 8 but I wore the 4 and it fit perfectly! Overall very satisfied with this dress and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Simple yet elegant for any ocassion
links_reviews_text: This dress was wonderful! I was thrilled that I could wear the smaller size which was the 10. It is very simple but if you have large breasts then you will definitely have cleavage so be aware of that. It was perfect for a gala and a work holiday party! I would suggest throwing on statement necklaces or earrings and Pair it with a flashy shoes.I would rent again
Received so many compliments on this dress! Love the color, the neckline!
This red dress was everything. Simple and classy. Loved the beaded neckline. The Fit was perfect for my not so perfect waistline and comfortable all night. Compliments all not long!

links_reviews_title: This was an annual scholarship fundraiser and we topped last year's attendance.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Actually this was my back up dress but ending wearing this because I fell in love with the neckline detail and fit. The dress ran true to size and was comfortable. I received quite a few compliments and looking forward to renting again for another event.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, classy, dressy but not over the top! Got lots of compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: The fit was good - - halter top was just right - - not gaping around the arms and flattering through the chest and body! The length was short but not too short (for my age, and build, which was good)! I went up a size to make sure there was plenty of room through the hips (for my wonderful pear shape). LOVE the dress and got LOTS of compliments!!!

I rented this for my husband's work holiday party. This dress is simple, elegant, modest, slimming, but most of all comfortable. I wore the 16, even though I usually wear a 14. The 14 was slightly snug, the 16 was perfect. I rented a clutch purse that had a optional strap (Sondra Roberts Silver Crystal Minaudiere) from RTR. I found black satin heels with bling on foot strap by Nina (Nordstrom).

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable dress that I got so many compliments on.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 6 dress but typically with a waist or empire style and one that has a fuller skirt due to my bottom being one size larger than my top. This size 8 was perfect and allowed me to wear a column dress which I loved. The collar has it's own jewelry so all I needed was earrings and a bracelet to accessorize. I loved the way the top flowed and did not accentuate my tummy!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for formal Christmas party
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8 and 10. Ended up in the 10, but honestly could've gone for a 12. The dress was super flattering, but sitting down was hard given the choker at the top and how tight the dress was. If I'd been in a bigger size, I don't think it would've been as much of an issue. Overall, I loved the dress and got so many compliments throughout the night.

This dress was a replacement dress that RTR shipped to me, and it was perfect! I got tons of compliments on it, and felt wonderful in it all night. It was easy to dance in, and I had no problem sitting with the neck being tight as a few other reviews mentioned. I would definitely rent it again.

I didn't like it on the hanger, but this dress is great on! A comfortable (and tummy-forgiving) fit that you can relax in but is still shapely. I could have used a little more room under the arms (it cut in a bit) but it wasn't really a problem and there was no chance of my bra showing, which was good. I loved the drape, the length, the quality of the fabric and the color. I got loads of compliments and felt great, this might be my favorite RTR find yet!

links_reviews_title: Work Christmas Party was unforgettable thanks to this beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: A bit snug in the bust area but overall great fit
The dress runs a little small so I sized up. I am glad I did. The color is vibrant and beautiful

I have very difficult dimensions to dress well, and surprisingly this dress was the perfect fit! I have a large bust, carry my weight around the middle (#apple), yet am short and petite. This dress did not gape under the arms, had plenty enough room in the bust (but not so much it looked baggy; I think the pleats in the twist help with that), and was an appropriate length. I did find it a little snug in the waist. I had to wear spanx in order for the seam not to show in the middle of the dress. One other thing to note is that there is no slit in the skirt, so getting in and out of the car was a bit difficult. All in all, I was very pleased with this dress and got lots of compliments!

Wore this to a wedding and got tons of compliments. I can wear between 10-14 depending on the dress but had to wear the larger size because it fit better in the hips. It was a little roomy in the waist but still looked fine. Not much give in the fabric so if you're curvier or bottom heavy (hourglass or pear) you should size up.

links_reviews_title: I liked the way it felt on me it was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and there was room to move around comfortably. would wear again
Wrinkles easy, but great color and I loved the beads around the neck!
I wore this dress to a formal dinner dance. Fit was TTS and flattered my figure. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - got loads of compliments on how pretty it was and how good it looked on me.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size - I normally wear an 8 - I recently lost a couple of pounds and the 6 was just a little too tight. Could have worn it but wanted to make sure I was comfortable as it was an extremely hot day and I knew I would be dancing all night. Neckline is very flattering and didn't have to worry about a necklace.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: I was nominated for an award for a nursing banquet. When you are used to wearing basically pajamas and tennis shoes daily getting dressed up can be daunting. This dress and RTR made it fun and easy.
Fits perfectly. True to size. Elegant. No stretch in the bottom , so getting "down" while dancing, probably wouldn't be advised. Tons of compliments. Definitely flattering.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress to wear!!!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. Got so many compliments on it. Very comfortable. Fits true to size.

This dress is gorgeous! I wore it to a fundraiser ball, and I got a ton of compliments. Although it fit much more snug than I'm comfortable with the right body shapers I was able to camouflage some of my "imperfections". I recommend if you're a curvy girl, like myself, size up. Also, the beading is a chrome charcoal grey color. While it wasn't a huge deal, I would have chosen a silver shoe had I been able to tell ahead of time. Overall, a good experience. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work event recently. The color of the dress and the beaded neck piece were the main selling points for me. I normally wear a 4 and got a 6 for backup. The dress fit me perfectly in my bust and hips, but was a tad loose in the middle. Depending on your body type, you may want to go a size up. Otherwise, it was very comfortable and perfect for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: Birthday dinner made extra special by this beautiful red dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much I wanted to keep it! I thought it was very forgiving in the belly and bust, and as a woman that wears a 34DDD bra that is really important. I paired this dress with some Valentino look-alike rock stud nude heels. Very comfortable, though you need to take care when you sit so that the neckpiece doesn't strangle you! I will definitely rent again in the future.

I wore this dress to a beach restaurant in Puerto Vallarta. I added silver bling sandals and was ready to go. I loved that I didn't have to worry about additional jewelry because the neckline jewels were so beautiful. My husband told me that he saw several women admiring my dress and he thought it was beautiful on me.
This dress was very comfortable to wear. In a sea of black dresses, this dress really stood out at my function and I received complements all night long!
Dress is Amazing! Fit comfortably while being very complimentary. Extremely classy. Too bad my event was canceled, but hopefully it'll be around to rent again.

links_reviews_title: Curvy girls size up and you will have a winner
links_reviews_text: I am a true 14 in regular retail. I also have big boobs and big hips. After reading the other reviews, I decided to order a 16, and am so glad that I did! This dress was a hit and I kept getting told that I looked like a movie star all night. Winning!

I felt so pretty and got tons of compliments! The red is a show stopper. The top and bottom is form fitting, but the middle is relaxed. You can breathe! And EAT! The only reason I gave it four stars is that the neck chokes you when you sit down, so you have to adjust when you are seated. I rented this twice, I loved it so much!

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress for a formal Xmas dinner!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a Xmas party and it was awesome! It was very forgiving of my mommy belly and super comfortable. I got a ton of compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: The dress was a great fit! Received so many compliments at a Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: Fit was petfect and dress was comfortable.
Form fitting, vibrant color. Loved it
Brand new!
Neckline is a bit flinstone-ish and it was very tight at the bottom and loose at the waist.
Nice fabric, good color.
I love it but I could not wear it do to the stomach area I have wide hips so it was to snug on the bottom
Gorgeous fit and color. Received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but loose at stomach and tight on hips.
links_reviews_text: Fit wasn’t quite right for my shape. Sitting was a process to prevent choking!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, very wearable, ornamentation at neck gives it a little extra sparkle
links_reviews_text: perhaps a little short for a conservative party
I wore this to a holiday party on Dec 1. It was a gorgeous color red and very festive!
Was a little tight at the neck when sitting down, overall very flattering.
Wore for my rehearsal dinner on the water, and it was lovely! I ended up belting it with a white belt, the flowy empire top hit me in the wrong place.
Fit true to size, has pockets, length was great on me, I'm 5'5". Chest area a little tight but I have large breasts.

I rented this for my baby shower and it was a big hit. I rented my usual size XS and a Small to accommodate my 33 week bump (I'm 5'10 and currently 145lbs). The XS fit better (the small had too much fabric in the hip area). The chest was tight, so if you have a larger bust I'd go up a size. Overall a really beautiful flowy option, especially if you're expecting!

links_reviews_title: Wore out to dinner while we were on vacation at the beach.
links_reviews_text: I felt the chest was a little snug, but not too obvious and it would have likely been too big if I had sized up. The fit everywhere else was perfect, falling along the curves of your body and actually giving it form for as flowy as the material is.
I rented this for a sorority semi-formal. I loved the way this dress felt & looked on me. I want to rent it again!

It worked out for a day at the winery but it was not as flattering as I hoped when I looked back at pictures taken. Hourglass shapes may want to swipe left on the dress unless you're looking for something to hide your belly. It was also low cut for those who don't want cleavage showing.

I had to do some wardrobe adjustments to make this dress work. I had a little trouble with the straps, basically my torso is a bit short being 5'1, if the straps in the back were a bit shorter the girls would of showed a bit less. I had to use a ribbon and tie them together in the back. And I bought higher shoes then I was originally planning to wear so the sides wouldn't drag on the ground. Again I am 5'1 so that is often my life. I wore and 8 which is the medium and I wish I would of done medium and small rather then my backup being large because maybe the straps would of been a bit better. Overall I liked this dress I just had to often readjust the top.
I loved this dress, very spring. I wore it for brunch and it was a eye catching dress!!! True to size fit.

Love how it looks but I had to tie the back for it to fit on top. I also took a sash from another shirt I owned and make it more empire waisted. It looked good after all the adjustments but if you could size down, I would recommend you do that.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress -- if you have average size Chest you must size up
links_reviews_text: Chest part way too small
Brought on vacation but did not end up wearing. Only okay.

Beautiful pattern and fabric but felt like I was swimming in it. If I had a C or D cup I feel like it would have been way more comfortable and less gapping. Very flowy- does not come in at the waist or hips at all though so I felt like it was a little too tent-like.
This was very strange fitting in the chest area. I couldn't wear a bra and you definitely need big boobs for this

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this dress to one of my best friend's wedding
links_reviews_text: I was 6 months pregnant, so I sized up and the dress worked great. I'm pretty sure I wore a medium, but I may have worn a large. The dress was pretty low in the front, so I used a safety pin to pin the straps up at my neck under my hair and that helped. Great quality, beautiful dress!
Print was a little overpowering in person. Didn't end up wearing it.

I have a tiny waist and this was very loose in the waist, but he fabric fell in a flattering way. I cannot usually wear something loose in the waist as it makes me look much bigger than I am. Not the case here. LOVED IT!
Very comfortable, love the back details very flattering but meant for a smaller bust. I'm a 34C (small C) and it was a bit snug.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a summer event.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a wedding on the beach. Fit with even extra room which made it comfortable- so it's sizing runs a little big. Flower pattern was beautiful and gave the right amount of cleavage
slide it on with heels or flats and you are ready to go- cleavage dips a little lower than anticipated but not too much that it was inappropriate- fabric is amazing for warm temps

This was actually a back dress I found at a RTR store after a dress I originally ordered didn't work out. This worked great for an outdoor wedding! It was very flattering and flowy. The only thing was it shows some cleavage and a little more than I was comfortable with, so I didn't wear bra with it to keep things in the dress :).
This dress is flowy and fun. However- you may want to size down because it runs big. I also didn't wear a bra so may not work for everyone.

I'm a pear and wouldn't normally gravitate to this shape, but the fabric was cut so well it was very flattering and comfortable. I had people come out of their way to tell me how great the dress looked. It also has pockets, which is a fun twist. It's a little more boho chic than the picture suggests.
This dress is light, airy, feminine, and pretty. U Fortunately, the seem across the bust isn't designed for bustier women. I'm a size 6, but wear a 34D bra. The dress is cut for A & B cups.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a friend's wedding
links_reviews_text: It was super comfortable & flattering! I am considering purchasing it.
Fit was good, but difficult to get on & off since there isn't a zipper

Excellent fit! Perfect length, the fabric was soft and thick. It has a shelf bra, but i still wore a strapless underneath.. I loved the cutout shoulders and long sleeves. I sized up after reading the reviews, and was glad I did! Definitely recommend, and will likely rent again!
The size 2 fit but was pretty tight. I felt more comfortable in the 4. Super comfy material and perfect for a fall outdoor wedding!
Fit was great. The mesh bra inside the dress helped keep my strapless bra up. Color was great and I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: The color, fit and fabric was very flattering. Comfortable to dance in. Tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6 but the size 8 was a better fit for my body type. I'm 5'6" and 140 lbs. I have broad shoulders but slim hips. I loved everything about this dress. I'm always self conscious about my "belly" but the dress was very flattering. I'm considering purchasing it! Perfect for business holiday parties, wedding or even a nice date night.
Fits very well, makes me look skinnier, not crazy about the material

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the rehearsal as a bridesmaid
links_reviews_text: So many compliments thank you rent the runway

I love this Edgy dress by Trina Turk. This dress runs true to size so you should size up for a back up. The stretchy fabric allows comfortable fit throughout midsection and is formfitting but not tight at the hips and waist. This style is great for any cup size and should be worn with a strapless bra. Pair with Gold earrings and heels to make this dress really pop!

This dress was gorgeous. The color is rich and lovely. I normally am an 8 and was worried about the fit due to my belly, the 10 fit beautifully. It was stretchy in all of the right places and made me feel classy, comfortable and beautiful. Highly recommend!

The dress was a thick material and loose enough to be comfortable during all parts of the wedding. It was perfect for a "colder" setting wedding. This was the first big event for my husband and I since having our daughter 5 months ago. I felt great in this dress!

This dress fit like a glove. Im 5'10 and wore a size 6. I have long legs ans always worry that dresses will be too short or ride up; not the case with this. It was form fitting and I received multiple compliments about the dress cut outs at my shoulders
I loved this dress and felt beautiful in in. The fabric is heavier and clings. I found this to be very flattering. I would recommed sizing up.

The dress is made of a very thick material. I did not wear any spanx underneath it and, if I had worn underwear, there would have been visible panty lines. So, keep that in mind if you're renting it. Make sure you have a high waisted pair of spanx. I didn't which is why I didn't wear any. My confidence would have been higher with some shapers but i got lots of compliments all night and it was a great dress.
It's a lovely dress - well constructed and elegant. You will not need a strapless bra as there is a built in mesh liner. I needed Spanx to smooth things out. I definitely recommend this dress!

Loved it!! Only looked good with super high heels. I'm a little curvy - fit tighter than I wanted around the stomach, but overall a good fit. I normally wear a 2 or 4 in dresses - could've done a 6 in this one

I absolutely adored this dress. It fit like a glove, with quality thick fabric that made me feel secure but also had a decent amount of dress, so it was very comfortable. I seriously didn't want to take it off and return it! I did not wear a bra because of the straps, and although I have a fuller bust, the thick fabric of the dress made me feel secure.

This dress is super pretty and flattering. I loved wearing it! It was also surprisingly comfortable. My only complaint is that the sleeves were a bit baggy on me. This might not be a problem for other people but I have very slim wrists so it looked a little weird, but not so much I wouldn't wear this dress again. Overall great experience and super easy to return!

links_reviews_title: Dress really stands out. Lots of style and compliments. Great in pictures
links_reviews_text: Beautiful off shoulder design and radiant color. Material gathers and bunches slightly at waist. Could have sized down for smoother fit since material is stretchy

links_reviews_title: Head turner! Just the right amount of sexy!
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I could wear the 6 with Spanx which is my normal size but I would have been more comfortable in an 8. Size up one!
Great fit and very sexy. Got a lot of compliments!

Get a size up, I am a size 6 but had to wear my back up size 8. The material is very tight it is very similar to a wet suit. There is no zipper on the dress so you have to put the dress on over head. Over I looked amazing in the dress.
Super cute dress but didn't fit at all.

I wore this dress at a business casual work holiday party and got lots of compliments on this dress! The fabric is stretchy, warm (perfect for a winter event so I didn't have to worry about layering during the party), and fits snug to your body. Definitely recommend wearing underwear/bra that's not bulky to keep the dress looking smooth. I'm 4'11 and the length of this dress was good enough (possibly an inch shorter would have been ideal but wearing heels helped). I especially like this dress because of the sleeves to keep me warm. I can see myself wearing this dress in the future again. #modestyetlowkeysexy is how I would best describe this dress :) good luck!

links_reviews_title: This was a backup dress, I returned the first dress.
links_reviews_text: If you have a tummy issues don't rent this. Hugs in all the wrong areas. Otherwise it would have been beautiful. Loved the color and the shoulders just not a good fit for my body type.
Kept me nice and warm for an upstate NY fall wedding. The sleeves are nice, and the should cut out and back cut out gave the dress a little flare.
Loved so much....I bought and kept it!!
Didn't end up wearing but wanted to note it was very cute for my large bust and size 12 body. It was a little loose so perhaps size down. I'd rent for a different occasion!
Material is thick and very flattering. I found the darts created wrinkles that were somewhat resolved with body tape, but would not recommend for A or AA bust.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy, great fit, trendy color!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! No need for a bra and the length was perfect for my 5'5" frame. The color is super trendy and is definitely an eye-catcher!

I was really caught off guard by the material. It felt like a wet suit ready to ride the waves. I just could not do it. I did like the fit and the style but the material. No. I need material not a wet suit. Sorry, but that is just me!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! The material is very flattering and form-fitting.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 (or 8 depending on the cut of the dress) but wore a 4 in this dress. I loved the material. It was form-fitting, but flattering and forgiving. I have an athletic and curvy build. The shoulder cut-outs were my favorite part. I would rent this dress again!

This was my backup dress I ordered for a wedding but didnt end up wearing it to the event. It didnt wuite fit the way I liked and decided to not go with that fit/style. Maybe ill try it for another occassion.

links_reviews_title: gorgeous color with subtle satin sheen
links_reviews_text: Dress is well made, beautiful deep maroon color. It is very form-fitting, has a bit more of a spandex feel to it than I was expecting. It is a thick material though. Careful choosing undergarments as lines can be seen. I ended up "taping" breasts to provide a bit more lift, and used high waisted (just under my breasts) spanx to suck tummy in a bit more. I felt very elegant and was told I look stunning!
Too small in the bust for me to wear comfortably.
This dress was a perfect fit. The material is unique and the cut was sharp.
I did not end up wearing this dress. It ran too big for my petite frame. The color was beautiful though.

links_reviews_title: I ordered a 10, figuring designer dresses usually run small. That was not the case. It was too big
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but didn’t wear it because it was too big.
Perfect fit , classy, beautiful color

links_reviews_title: The dress felt amazing and I adding it to my favorites
links_reviews_text: The dress was form fitting with an amazing material that felt great. Easy to move in - we sat for dinner, moved around the room and danced all activities done with ease. Gorgeous color for the fall/winter and the shelves added some cover against the elements while the bare shoulders added some sexy appeal. Loved, Loved, Loved this dress

This dress is SO comfortable! The fabric is sort of stretchy too so it's very "forgiving" which is why I said I think it runs a little big. I'm normally a size 6 in jeans/pants and a small or medium in tops and I wore a size 4 and it wasn't "clinging" to my body. Great for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: The lacy back really spiced up this classy gown!
links_reviews_text: I sometimes have a hard time with waistbands/seams that hit right on my ribs (I have a long torso) but this dress hit right where it was meant to! Super comfy, danced my butt off all night and never felt constricted.
Rented to wear to wedding reception. Love all of the details and fit perfectly!
Loved the dress. Fit like a glove and top is very flattering

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a winter event!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. However the straps are not adjustable and found they were a bit too long for me. It is also pretty low cut and I felt a bit exposed..I read this is other reviews but dropped the ball and was not prepared. Had to end up stopping on the way to the wedding for safety pins to pin the straps and fashion tape to keep the girls in. Overall I loved this dress and received so many compliments! P.S. make sure you have help with the zipper..my boyfriend and I were both sweating by the time we got it zipped, not because it was too small, it was just a tough small zipper!!
I fluctuate between a 4,6,8 and the M was perfect. The material was thick. This does best on long legs and short waist like myself. Didn't need a bra!
I looooved this dress! It fit very well and was super cute and classy. The quality was also really great and thick
Loved it so much I bought it. Super plunging neckline so had to wear a camisole underneath. Great to give shape but not restrictive

Wore this to a wedding and it was great - works great for those with a larger bra size! The large was a little big on me but it still worked. The material is really nice and thick. Definitely recommend!

This dress was beautiful! I love the pattern and got lots of compliments. I wore it to a wedding and it is low-cut. I bought a lace maroon bralette just in case, but ended up not having to use it. This is a thick material, so it can get hot. The zipper was tricky and on the side like the other reviews stated, so I had someone help me zip it up as well as unzip. Another great rental from RTR!

This dress was actually my backup dress. It was stunning. I wore an X/small but probably could have worn the small. Being tall made the bodice a little tight around my ribs because it was supposed to sit a little lower. Fabric is super thick but not uncomfortable.

Being petite in frame and bust, the straps ran long and it required some fashion tape to keep the top part in place. However, it fit snuggly around the waist. Dressed this down for a daytime show with a black waist belt, but can definitely be dressed up for an event or evening out as well. Highly recommended. Great for petite figures.

links_reviews_title: This was my first experience with RTR and I would highly recommend to all my friends!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit super well but was a little tight in the chest area which I wasn't mad about as it helped to contain the girls. The straps were also a bit long but manageable. I got lots of compliments even though I felt like I looked a bit like drapery. The material is heavy and thick. The print makes it look like it should be worn during warm weather but the fabric is heavy like a winter dress. Overall I would recommend.
Length was great, fit was great, the straps are really long, though!!! You can't be afraid of a deep neckline either. Perfectly paired w a jean jacket to dress it down a little :)
Adored this dress. Fit like a glove.

I wore this for NYE one year and this has been one of my all times favorite RTRs. Very flattering, although I did need help zipping it up. It was a tight fit in the back but the pictures don't reflect that as it is very flattering. Plan to buy.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on the color and unique neckline of the dress. Happy I rented!
links_reviews_text: I kind of took a risk with the chest area, I agree with some of the reviews about having bigger boobs to fill the top part. I'm sort of medium in that area so if my boobs were any smaller it might have stiffly moved around in a weird way instead of just settling over them. Only reason I'll give it 4 stars. Otherwise, it was beautiful, the material was thick and very well made, and I liked the waist and how the bottom pleats flared out. It made it really cute for an early fall wedding while it was still super hot out.

I wore this dress to a fancier wedding shower and it was perfect for fall weather in both color and material. It looked and felt really nice on- very comfortable and I got a ton of compliments on it. The straps were a little long so I had to pin them up but other than that no major issues. I wanted to order the XS as my backup but it was unavailable. The S was a tad large in the waist so I do wonder if the XS would've fit a little better. Overall was not a big deal though and the dress was lovely!! I would definitely rent it again.

Total bummer, because I feel in love with the material, colors, pattern and pleats. Length was perfect on my 5'3 height, but neckline is way too low cut for a family wedding. Straps were loose on shoulders and could have been resolved by safety pins, but I couldn't get past the cleavage.

Got a small and medium but wore the small. I wear a 32DD but still felt like this dress was totally flattering. Like everyone else says, the zipper is impossible by yourself (even struggled with someone helping). The straps were a little long for me which made the chest feel not as secure as I would like but a little fashion tape fixed that. Sexy but cute and classy dress. Would wear it again!

I wore this dress for one of my band's gigs. We were shooting video that night and I wanted to kick it up a notch. This dress is hands down gorgeous! The shape and colors of the dress are incredibly flattering. I received compliments all night from both men and women. The reason I gave it a 4 out of 5 stars is because the zippers on both dresses were completely impossible. I couldn't even zip down the dress on the size 4 to take it off of the hanger. I had an easier time with the size 6, but it wouldn't go all the way up. And it wasn't because it didn't fit! At one point my boyfriend had taken out a pair of pliers to try and get a better grip on the zipper. It still wouldn't budge! We ended up safety pinning the dress shut at the top. It was kind of a nightmare, but the dress was killing, and therefore worth it! This dress runs a bit on the small size, and given the fiasco I had with both zippers, I would highly recommend sizing up for your backup. I'm a 34A and didn't wear a bra. None was needed. The fabric was thick enough that I never worried about my girls! If you have patience and/or feel like pressing your luck, rent this dress!
Fits true to size , beautiful dress, nice material

links_reviews_title: This is the second try I give this dress and thankfully it worked.
links_reviews_text: The first time i rented this dress I could t wear it cause the straps were so long (and not adjustable) that they constantly fell off. Having such a low cut you can't wear a bra. I went with the medium even though I had to squeeze in it a bit more than the large because it helped make the cleavage look and feel better with the tighter support The fabric is gorgeous and the colors look great. Would rent again.

I got SO many compliments on this dress.. I felt great in it!! I think it ran a bit small. I ordered a medium and a small as my backup and the medium JUST fit but it was perfect. Would definitely recommend!!

links_reviews_title: The battle of the invisible zipper continues
links_reviews_text: The dress was my back up, and thank heavens for it as my primary dress became unavailable be day before it was set to ship. It was super cute, perfect for the event (a gala at the zoo celebrating the new macaque exhibit, so I accessorized with tiny stuffed monkeys), and withstood the bizarre weather (7000% humidity and pop up storms). The invisible zipper and I had some words, though. Couldn't get it zipped. Took the dress off. STILL couldn't get it zipped. Enlisted a friend. No dice. Eventually I found that if I put the dress on sideways, I could zip it and then fold in my arms and boobs. Turned out fine once I learned the trick, lol.

LOVED this dress! I wore it to a summer wedding and it was perfect. I received a lot of compliments! Two issues...it was very low cut, and I had to make sure to sit up straight so I wouldn't show anything....I would recommend fashion tape. Also, the zipper was VERY difficult. Be sure to have someone around to help you! Overall LOVED this dress.

I really liked this dress but like the other reviews said, the zipper was challenging to get up. Once it was zipped, it was comfortable! One downside was the low cut of the dress meant I had to be conscious of my posture all night long to make sure nothing showed (because I also didn't wear a bra with it. It was thick material so a bra wasn't needed). I think I would have felt more at ease if I would have bought some fashion tape to keep the dress secured. I never had any problems with the dress gaping open but I was just conciliatory of it all evening. Other than that, it's a beautiful dress, high quality for the price, and I would recommend it!

I got this as my backup dress and ended up wearing it for my birthday celebration. This is a standout dress and was elegant and sexy. It took me a little to get used to the drop neckline because I have a larger chest, but other than that, I loved every part of it! The zipper was a little tough to get up, but after a few minutes of working with it, all went well. I wanted to keep this dress forever!
The dress fit really tight around the chest. Super beautiful fabric and fit.

Gorgeous dress! Got a lot of compliments. Amazing heavy fabric and flared skirt. This dress took two friends to get the zipper up (and some help from vaseline), and the zipper was hard to zip without even having the dress on. Dress has no stretch and is really tight at the waist. Needed a ton of dress tape to keep the upper part in place, and had to keep my shoulders back and watch how I moved all night. Because the waist is very fixed, there's not much to be done about the shoulder straps. They stayed on for the most part but easily slid off if I moved the wrong way. I kept my hair down partially to cover them up.
Fun dress to wear! Got alot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: i got so many compliments on this dress! Hard to wear with a bra because it is low cut
links_reviews_text: the straps are not adjustable so i had to go down a size from M to S but overall great fit and strong material

I rented this dress for a second time for a friend's wedding. I love the pattern and the fit and flare style of the dress. The only negative for me is the the shoulder straps were a little long on me because my torso is quite short (even for a short person). Not a deal breaker though. The other challenge is that a bra cannot be worn with the dress, which is a challenge if you need support. I got around this using tape for support. Love this dress!

This dress was seriously the hit of the party!! I only wish I would have gotten a size bigger. Im typically a medium which is the size I got. It fit me perfectly everywhere except for my double D chest. But I made it work! Would definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Loose in the top but flattering overall
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 or 6 and like to have room for my hips. This dress left plenty of room for my hips and flattered the waist, but the straps wanted to fall off even though I'm not unually tall, and the boning in the chest area seemed bent and wanted to turn the bra part out. I ended up taping the dress to my boobs and it stayed put after that. The material is pretty thick so it's good for a winter event, and there's no need for a bra because of how thick it is! This is overall a very flattering dress but you should definitely err on the small side and have fashion tape ready.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments on this gorgeous dress. It is beautiful and so flattering!
links_reviews_text: Pros: The material is so high quality, the dress is almost a little heavy to wear! It's a gorgeous fit and beautiful pattern. Looks exactly like the photos. Cons: Runs a little large, I was so glad I got a small as a backup for the medium! I could have probably gone with extra small. Little bit large in the chest area - making it hard to find a bra that works with the dress without showing. You might need dress tape to keep everything together. The flounce at the bottom makes this dress a little short, which is fun, but beware if you're not looking to show some leg!

I loved this dress so much! The colors were great for a fall wedding and the style was super flattering on! The small fit well, but the top did still feel a little large for my chest. I didn't wear a bra with it, though and never felt like I was going to show too much. Also have someone with you to help zipper it up- it was a workout alone .. ! Wore with gold and blue (clutch) as a pop of unexpected color and it worked super well. Wish I could own this one!
Loved this dress- I'm small in the chest so it was a bit big on me. Otherwise no complaints!

links_reviews_title: The dress was very comfortable and flattering and I would wear it again.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very cute and flattering! I received many compliments. However, the zipper is very stubborn because the material is very stiff and thick. Also I had to put a cut up tshirt into the bust because the neckline is very plunging and I would not have been able to get into my homecoming dance without it (my school is strict).

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! Sexy!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel amazing and was very flattering, although, like other reviewers was not the safest option for large-chested girls. The zipper was tough to zip because of the materials and seams but once I got it on it was very comfortable. The straps could have been a tiny bit shorter but they were not a problem. The only thing I would recommend is not wearing it in hot weather. The material felt like heavy drapes and was perfect for October, but would have been sweltering in warmer months.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I received so many complements - especially the low cut aspect ha. : )
links_reviews_text: Runs a tiny bit small in the upper torso area but all in all true to size.

links_reviews_title: Unique and great for a very warm fall wedding. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for my first RTR! I chose a size down because I wear a size 2-4 depending on the stretch of the fabric and the cut of the dress. I have a small bust 32in and waist size is 24in so I ended up wearing the XS. It was comfortable dancing and moving throughout the night and my boyfriend loved it! This dress enhances the waist and makes legs go for days ;) The only thing was the right strap fell down a few times throughout the night and the zipper was a little hard to zip up at the top but I was able to do it alone. Overall an awesome first RTR experience!

I wore this to a gala in SF. I really wasn't sure about this dress at first since I'm more of a "little black dress" type of gal, but I LOVED it! I've never received more compliments on a dress in my life. The fabric felt high quality/heavy (in a good way), was sexy enough on the top but comfy enough with the flare out at the bottom to drink and dance all night. It's the perfect mix of flirty and glam. I usually feel like I need a bra for a little extra push up but it fit so perfect, it was flattering without one.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper! I've never received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress is incredibly comfortable. I ended up wearing the smaller size and it fit perfectly. The pockets were a huge bonus. My phone (in its bulky Otterbox case) fit without issue and the dress didn't bulge with the phone in the pocket. I wish I could keep this one!

Dress and material were beautiful. I ended up not wearing it because it was a little fitted on my back where the dress material met the lace material. It was a back up dress and I may order again but size up.
Loved this dress. Fit true to size. Loved the sheer upper back.

I generally wear a 14 / 16. I borrowed three different dresses size 14, 16, and 18. They all fit. This one was the 18, and the one I picked to wear. It doesn't have any stretch so I would size up. Beautiful dress, I was getting compliments all night. And it has POCKETS!!!
Conservative enough for church and festive enough for a party. Comfortable too! I loved it.
True to size. Very comfortable and it has POCKETS!!! Wore an 8. I'm 5'10" 134 lbs.

Great dress! It fit just a bit loose in the waist and torso but that worked out okay as I wore it bra-less but the fabric is thick enough that no one was the wiser. The back sheer black section dipped a little too low to wear a regular strapless bra with this. The bright red color really popped and got a lot of compliments. I was worried it would look like I was wearing a table-cloth but the fabric was great in person. Also, the bit of pleats in the top waist section gave it a nice fullness and a silky red nylon liner kept it from feeling itchy. I would rent again and recommend it to anyone!

links_reviews_title: Dress was very comfortable. Loved having pockets and not needing to worry about a purse.
links_reviews_text: I have a long torso and this dress gave me a lovely waist. I normally wear between a 14 and a 16. Ordered the 16 and 20 after reading reviews. I could get the 16 on but the 20 had room for me to breathe and not feel unable to sit. Felt beautiful and recieved many compliments!

The fabric on this is really lovely in person, both the inset sheer panel and the brocade. The dress is perfectly serviceable but I didn't feel over the moon about it. I wish the 4 had been available for a more fitted look. I'm 5' 2 1/2" and wore 3-inch heels and it hit right at tea length and if I owned this dress I'd have it hemmed higher. The circle skirt would have been too tough to carry a decent looking taped hem on, I think. Overall, it's a yes but was sort of a forgettable one.

links_reviews_title: Classic dress for a evening cocktail wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress is much more vibrant in person. True red colors. Very pretty. The ribcage was tight but to be fair, I have broad shoulders. The dress made me look heavy in the hips which I didn't like. Overall the dress was comfortable and classy. Liked the pockets. Great for holding lipstick and a phone.

I loved this dress! However, it does run a bit small in the waist and bust so I ended up wearing my back up size which was a size up from my normal size and it fit perfectly! I got compliments all night!

Both were too big. I loved the dress so much, but it was disappointing, because I picked the size based on my measurements. There was no time to get a new one, but I made the best of it. Look at the beautiful background, no filter, Sedona

links_reviews_title: Ordered this for my daughter's homecoming; it's so classy and elegant....a real head-turner!
links_reviews_text: This dress received rave reviews from my daughter's friends at homecoming and also from parents who commented that it was so refreshing to see a return of old glamour and elegance, which is exactly why Claire chose it. The dress fit her like a glove and is modest, yet splashy. She opted for conservative hair and makeup with a bright red lip to bring out the Spanish vibe she felt as soon as she pulled it out of the bag. A real 10/10!
This dress fit beautifully. It was snug in the right places and flattered my curves. Material was slightly heavy so only wore it for the ceremony.

I went a size down to keep the girls in check, and wore the dress without a bra. It was comfortable, flattering, dramatic, and had pockets! I wore it to 3 holiday parties in 1 day and loved every second of it.

links_reviews_title: The energy in the room of this gala was palpable. It took our mind off the election!
links_reviews_text: I was wearing a size 6 and it was a littleeee big on me. The staff offered to order a size 4 but were honest and said it might not arrive in time.

links_reviews_title: The fact that RTR sent my dresses early for no xtra cost to make sure i received them in time.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I got major compliments on this. I'm bigger in the middle and the boning of the dress kept me in. I wore a strapless bra but a cuplett would work better because you could see my bra in the back. Overall though, phenomenal dress.

links_reviews_title: This was worn at a formal gala for my husband's job.
links_reviews_text: Typically wear a 16W - glad I got the 18W as a backup.

This is the type of dress you can put on, feel gorgeous, and not feel like you have to monitor your dress all night. No worries of poking out anywhere, things slipping... This was actually my back-up dress and I put it on MINUTES before walking out the door when I realized my very low cut first choice was going to make me self conscious all night long and worried that I'd have a wardrobe malfunction. In this dress I felt comfortable and pretty and I loved that I could keep my cell phone in my pocket in case my babysitter texted me or I needed a cute pic of the night. I wore it with no bra and the top fits snugly enough that it worked perfect. The sheer back would make most bras not work very well.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful dress that fit well!
links_reviews_text: A backless bra would have been best - I have a heavy bust so I went with a strapless bra. I loved the dress and don't have much to say! What you see is what you get.

links_reviews_title: Back-up dress but worked out perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I was crushed when the original dress I ordered didnt fit. This dress was my backup and it looked gorgeous. Lots of compliments. Was also great for dancing.

This was my first experience with RTR, but based on my experience, it won’t be my last! The dress fit great, was comfortable and even had pockets!!! I got so many complements. Thank you for giving me the opportunity to wear a designer dress like this.
The fit was great! I loved everything about it.... and it has pockets!!!!

This was my backup dress and I loved it more than my first choice! As soon as I got it zipped up, I knew! I loved how the torso fit me, and loved the full skirt, which I don't normally wear. The back is beautiful. I purchased a Nu-Bra to wear with it. I discovered the pockets during the wedding reception! A bonus I'd wish I'd found sooner. I felt beautiful in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Another KNOCK OUT from Rent the Runway!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel so pretty. I love the way it fit. I was even able to go without a bra which is really unusual for me. The dress was just tight enough (but not uncomfortable) that I put little adhesive cups in too give me a little lift and it worked out wonderfully. I had so many kind remarks about how nice I looked and the dress was so fun. It was a perfect Fall Weather Formal dress. I would definitely rent again.

The fabric was awesome, the pockets of course were amazing, it wasn't too hot or cool. It was a little long, as I'm only 5'1 but with heels it was fine by me. Nothing itched, it matched everything and anything. I usually wear a 10 because I don't prefer things to be tight, but this was looser so I could've gone with an 8. I'd rent it again it was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I ordered a different dress for an evening fundraiser, and I received this dress instead.
links_reviews_text: The chest area was a bit big, which is not surprising because I am small-chested. Also, the sheer section in back dips low, so a low-back strapless bra is needed if worn. However, the mid-section fit well, and there was no problem with the hip area because the skirt flares out. I pinned the sides, which helped the dress fit better around the chest. Overall, I really liked wearing this dress. The stiffer fabric helps to maintain the flare of the skirt, and the print is eye-catching. Also, the dress has pockets, which come in handy. Five stars for this dress, and I would rent it again.
This dress was so pretty and flattering tons of compliments! Pockets are trendy, fabric is vintage, bodice is defining, a definite keeper. Elegant, refined, classy and sassy!
Very comfortable. Loved the pockets, but the other blue dress I rented looked even better, so went with that one instead.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for dinner out. We were in a resort, and I still got admiring glances even at my age!
links_reviews_text: This dress is elegant and sophisticated. It was age appropriate, but it would look lovely on all ages. The sheer black mesh top made wearing a bra difficult, but the front paneling was sufficient to go braless. The top portion of the dress is very fitted, and the waist is fitted. Pear shaped women would love this dress, because it does not emphasize the hips. It is slimming and gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Great color and comfy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Got many compliments on the style and color. Wore this for a "derby day" at Pimlico Race Course. The material is light which was great for a 92 degree day. The dress did not stick to me at all, granted I had some spanx on--but I didn't feel hot and uncomfortable wearing it.
