I recommend getting a good strapless bra to wear with it if you're blessed up top like me. Although the back is see through, I was able to hike the top red part of the dress up slightly to meet the bottom of my strapless bra, and it looked like it was apart of the dress. The dress runs a little snug around the ribs but not enough to not wear but I also recommend going with the bigger size of what you normally wear. It's a great lower tummy hider too! I will definitely wear this dress again!!!

links_reviews_title: A Princess Dress Complete With Pockets!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I felt like a princess wearing it.The stretch in the top easily fit my 40D top. I did decide to wear a black strapless bra as top did not fit appropriately without the bra The folds of the dress draped nicely over my narrow 40' hips. I loved the pockets! My husband adored this dress and complimented me several time on how beautiful I looked in at. At age 61, such compliments are always enjoyed! I would love to own this dress!

This dress was sent to me last minute because the original dress I ordered didn't fit. I'm so grateful for the stylist Irena who picked it for me. It's very feminine and fun as well, it's also something I would never have picked for myself.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a formal event with a Cuban theme!
links_reviews_text: Color was fabulous and fit was fantastic. Dress was so comfortable and had pockets!
Fits beautifully. It's better if you can go bra-less because the sheer section comes very low in the back so a regular strapless bra can be seen.
Loved this dress. Fit very snug in the top half. Loved the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Got great compliments about this dress and the added bonus is POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: POCKETS were very handy for the events. Only issue I had is having to go braless. The dress does run tight though it would be wise to get a size higher. Would rent this dress again.

I love this designer. Dresses are always made with high quality material and the fit is great for curvy girls. My only complaint is that the back made me look short waisted. No bra needed and I always need a bra. Great dress for NYE or any other holiday celebration.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. Felt so pretty and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. Tighter up top, but not too bad. Easy to sit and dance in. Loved the length.

The dress was structured and the material is textured, even the sheer material is sturdy which is great since you can't really wear a bra with it! It was fine since the dress is very fitted and I used a strapless bra. I normally wear a 8/10 but they only had it in a size 10. It fit perfect! Also, the skirt is fuller than most dresses but still super fun. Also, it has pockets. A great dress! I received several complements.

Runs slightly large and proportioned for a taller person but still looked good on my petite frame. I had no problem with the overall length but the torso would have fit better if the straps around the neck were a little shorter. Also probably works best on women with a derrière as it might not hang quite right.
Very comfy and I received many compliments while bumping around Los Angeles. Runs a bit big, but not noticeably.

links_reviews_title: Touch of class for a sun dress
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a rehearsal dinner that had a 'sundress' dress code and felt beautiful and polished. It's a pain to iron so make sure you have the time before the event starts. Medium felt a little big but overall good fit
Elegant, but casual . This dress has a beautiful flow to it. Fits perfect, true to size, and can be worn many places!
This dress fits amazing and feels amazing! It's fun and modest enough for a family gathering. I got lots of compliments and will probably wear again before sending back in. :-)
TTS and well made. Perfect for every day, girls might or a date.
I ordered a small and typically wear a 4. It fit well. Material was nice quality. I'm 5'7" and it was fairly long on me. I wore it out several times for dinner and received compliments.
Pictures don't do this dress justice. It's gorgeous. It's a little small. I wear a 10 in a dress, 8-10 in pants, and the large barely fit me. I wish I had got the xl.
nude heels , strapless bra and light colored spanx help make this look polished

I really enjoyed wearing this dress. The fit was great. The only thing was that it ran long- on the model it shows the dress hitting high to mid shin- it defiantly hit me lower than that. But great dress!
Was a tad large on me but the cute was unique and I loved the fabric!
Loved this dress. Many compliments and form fitting.
It just fit a little weird, I am a DD but the top was loose in places and then the pattern made my waist look wrong... only wore once with a cover up that helped the pattern seem more flattering

Overall, I liked but didn't love this dress. Fit: a little long, but mostly fit great (no tight or loose areas) Fabric: polyester, but breathable and comfortable Style: very chic, the light & bright colors are great for the summer
I should have ordered a medium, but otherwise the dress was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: A lot of fabric on the bottom
links_reviews_text: I got this dress as a last min back up so it wasn't something I would usually chose. I liked the halter top and the fit through the hips. But I am not a fan of asymmetrical bottoms and this had a lot of fabric in the bottom part of the dress. I am tall 5'8" and can usually pull off tea length styles. but it was still overwhelming . I can't imagine a shorter person being able to wear it. Overall not a fan

links_reviews_title: Well made, but not for me
links_reviews_text: This is a high-quality garment; beautiful and well made! Unfortunately, it's an example of how garments - dresses in particular - can't just be sized up without adjustments in cut for fit. I ordered the recommended size (I'm typically a 12, 5' 6.5" and about 190 lbs, hourglass), and was swimming in it. Had it fit, however, it would have made me look really stumpy. With a shortened waist, this could be really lovely on curvier women - there are some really great elements to this dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the fit - not well made
links_reviews_text: Loved the way this dress hit my waistline and was slimming. Only thing is it feels cheaply made. It has a double clasp, when I received it one of them was broken. Maybe pick your next favorite dress...
I’m 5’2 so because of that it was too much dress and was not flattering.

links_reviews_title: What a great dress! It is beautiful and the hem lines and details make it such fun and glamorous.
links_reviews_text: The bodice was fitted nicely and flares beautifully at the waist. The dress moves when walking and is sexy and fun. I received lots of compliments and looks!
Odd fit, I have a broad back and shoulders and was just swimming in this dress. Size down for sure.
I ordered a large and it was too big. I liked it so may order a M and try it on.
runs a bit large since the small was slightly big on me. plenty of room all around. this wasn't the most wow dress, but was extremely comfortable.
Fits true to size at the waist for a 4. I'm larger on top and the top still had a lot of room. A 4 could probably wear a 2. Super cute dress though.
Love this but ran big on top.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for Seder dinner and a ballet and loved wearing it! Unique and lovely spring dress
links_reviews_text: I am long waisted and the dress hit me perfectly at my natural waist with a lovely sweep down from there. I love it! Many compliments. Will rent again. Came with the tags on.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite pieces I have rented to date. Runs large so get one size smaller.
links_reviews_text: Unique cut and attention to detail made this a statement piece for the pool party I wore it to the first time and the theatre the second time. Easy to dress up or down.

Fits on the larger side, especially the top. I paired it with a denim jacket and high heel sandals for a beer festival and dinner after. Got lots of compliments and felt great in it. Would rent again.
Wore this for our fall party and received so many compliments. The fabric is very thick and luxurious, zipper is a bit tight to zip as a result and you'll need help, but it is a showstopper

This dress is gorgeous and fits like a glove. Its thick enough to hide the imperfections in my waste and hips. I probably wont wear it because I want something a little more exciting for my anniversary dinner, but I will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfectly classy for any formal occasion
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal, more conservative dinner and it did not disappoint! This structured dress delivers in all the right ways. Fit was perfect, and doesn't hug any of the wrong areas. I'm fairly short so it hit right below my knee, but didn't make me look ridiculous. You can't tell from the photos or model, but the fabric is somewhat shiny but not obnoxious. Highly recommend!
Great fit, great fabric. In a room full of red dresses, this stood out. Deep color and lovely textile. I sized up and didn't regret it one bit. Very roomy and comfortable for the day
Wore to a holiday party. Great fit beautiful look and pockets. It's a winner.

The cap sleeves are flattering, as is the cut in around the waist. It is very tight around the rib cage, so eating and wearing this dress is a bit tricky. The length falls below my knee which I wish was a smidge shorter. However the bright red was complimented many times at dinner and at church. Great dress with black heels for a holiday celebration.

I wore this to a work holiday party and was worried it might be too short before I received it. It was knee length for me (5'7 plus I had heels on) which was just what I was looking for! It also had pockets which came in really handy! Only downside was sitting down the high neck was a little tight.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a Christmas wedding!!
links_reviews_text: I felt absolutely incredible in this dress. I was nervous when reading reviews to size up that the size 8 would be too small (no 10 was available at the time) but it ended up fitting like a glove! Of everything I ordered for my unlimited shipment, this is what I really wanted for this wedding. I'm so happy it worked perfectly and that I even matched the poinsettias. Wish I could keep this dress forever!

This dress is very nice. deep color and unusual fabric. Pockets are awesome. It fit perfectly, is cut full in the hips but it hangs just like the photo because the fabric is kind of stiff. I really liked it. I think it's more sweet and young than elegant, but I loved wearing it. I could not steam out the crease down the front center from where the dress was obviously folded, I got it to look a little less creased though.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. The fit was great and it was very flattering on. Would definitely recommend!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for cocktail attire. Can dress up or down which I love in a dress. The fabric is great and has the right amount of texture with color and sheen. I would wear this again for sure!
Wonderful material almost burgundy and pockets to boot!

This was a backup dress and I was a little nervous about it as all of the other photos showed it for winter events. I was planning to wear this to a Cinco de Mayo-themed gala. The dress is stunning. Gorgeous, rich fabric, pretty embossed flowers. It was PERFECT with a floral crown for the party. The dress fit so well...sometimes there's not enough room up top, but this was so flattering and not too tight. Also, POCKETS!!! I got so many compliments on the dress and felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little large, but it is beautiful
links_reviews_text: I always wear a six, but I could have sized down with this dress. Beautiful fabric, and a gorgeous color. It hit an appropriate length. The structure wihtin the torso was great!
Stunning dress and wonderfully made!

Rented this for an afternoon at the opera. The bell shape is so cute and the color and length are great. The fabric and quality are amazing. I can't wait to rent this dress again. Would be great for any dressy occasion.
Rent this for a little photo shoot with my baby. So beautiful. I read reviews and most said run large. So I ordered a size up (2), usually I wear 0, a 2 is very comfortable on me. Color is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I loved the hue and how shapely it made me!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for graduation and I loved it! I got my normal size 16 but it was too tight, good thing I had the back up size of 18. The pockets were a big help since I wanted to bring my phone and I didn't want to bring a wristlet on stage. The length was just right for me and I wish I could afford to buy this dress to keep. You will definitely stand out with this.

links_reviews_title: The dress, earrings and purse all came together perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Dress fits great. A bit snug in the waist. Pockets are great!

I wore this stunning dress to a Red Brunch for HIV/AIDs awareness. I got stopped so many times with compliments. This dress is eye-catching and flattering. The fabric does not have much give, so I would not recommend it if you are hoping to dance the night away. But for a brunch or cocktail hour, it is perfect!

This dress is *almost too dressy and holiday-like for a professional setting, but I still wore it to work because the red looks great on TV. There's no stretch to the fabric but it fits true to size, so just order your usual size. The capped sleeves are slightly constricting so you may need to leave the back slightly unzipped at the top. Love this Carmen Marc Valvo style!

Wore this for a casino wedding. The dress fit great and I got tons of complements. Have a 36E cup size and the bust was very comfortable. The middle poofs up a bit when you sit, but the dress is otherwise perfect and I strongly recommend it!
The fit was amazing everywhere. And just a very luxe and classy look. I wore it with strappy leopard stilettos for a bit of interest.

links_reviews_title: Perfect length and thickness for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I felt so beautiful in this dress. It was the perfect length so I wasn't constantly having to tug on it when I sat down. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This was a fabulous dress for my Valentine's date!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress out on a date with my husband for valentine's day. It was beautiful and i received many compliments. I love a dress with pockets!

I usually wear either a 4/6 in most sizes. I wore this dress in a 6. The top was a little loose but not too bad that I couldn't wear it. I love the color of this dress and the fact that it has pockets. I wore this dress to a valentine formal lunch work event. It was the perfect fir the occasion. I received many compliments on both the color and the style.

I rented this dress for an anniversary date. Loved the intricate flowers, the color, and the pockets! It does run a bit small so make sure you wear your true size or a size up. I wore the size 2 and wish I had worn the 4. It was fine for standing up, but trying to sit or bend over was nearly impossible because my booty was sucked in tight! It was also tight in the collar. As long as you order the right size for you, I'd recommend this dress. I wore with gold bangles and strappy tan sandals.
This was my back-up dress, but it fit so well I wore it instead. The fit was amazing, I have a wide rib cage (plus 34DD chest) and had no issues. Great for my company Christmas Party!
LOVE THE FIT AND RICH COLOR.. flattering and the material is really nice too.
The dress fit as expected and was very comfortable for dancing! Loved this whole experience.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable and looks amazing on!
links_reviews_text: I found it to be slightly longer than I wanted but used temporary hem tape and it worked like a charm!
Fit perfectly, did not show too much without looking frumpy. Loved the fabric and the cut of the dress

This is a lovely dress that is super flattering on curves. I wore it multiple times while I had it on my unlimited rental. It was a perfect dress for wedding and holiday cocktail party. I would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Made me look like a poinsettia (in a good way!)
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect dress for a holiday party! I got lots of compliments on it. The printed texture is beautiful and it had the perfect amount of shine. I wore the 10 but it I did it again I would probably size up to the 12 because it was a little tight in the chest. I paired with gold earrings and heels and it was a great final look.
Wonderful dress for a formal Wedding. Shows off the curves while staying classy.

This dress runs true to size. It doesn't have ANY give. I have large thighs and vary between a size 12 and 14 dress. I was able to wear the size 12 because of the generous cut through the hips, but I wouldn't consider this a fit and flare dress. I think this dress would flatter almost all figures. The 14 wasn't available as a back-up size and I was nervous, but it ended up being a very flattering dress. It doesn't require much accessories. Beautiful color of red and very easy to look great for your special event!

links_reviews_title: This dress was just amazing, the color was vibrant, perfect for wedding.
links_reviews_text: The 4 fit true to size, great color, easy/carefree delivery. I definitely recommend this for a wedding.
This dress looked great and was just as comfortable!!! I received so many compliments .. Even from people at this wedding that I didn't know. It's a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and Perfect for a Wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience and I will definitely be back! This dress was stunning! Incredible color and very well made with wonderful detail! I was nervous because of other reviews, but it fit great! I probably could've worn a 16W because I have a smaller waist, but it was unavailable and I was worried I needed to size up. It's a great length and was perfect for the cocktail wedding we went to!

links_reviews_title: Perfect cocktail dress that's even more beautiful in person
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience but it definitely won't be my last. I rented another dress as my primary dress for a friend's July wedding but really loved this one. I was nervous to rent it because it had so few reviews at the time, but when I saw a promo to rent a third dress for $35, I decided to give this one a shot and I'm so glad I did. The fabric is stunning and the color is very rich - photos don't really do it justice. I have a small waist and wide hips so I ordered the 18 even though I wear a 16 normally. It really accentuated my waist and the pleats were very flattering. The top wear the sleeves connect to the dress was a little big, but I was still very happy with the fit and because it flares out, there was no need for spanx! I highly recommend this dress for anyone with an hourglass or even pear shape. Ordering one size up is probably a good idea too.

links_reviews_title: A classy way to slay!...beautiful deep red with beautiful embroidered flowers. The fit was stunning!
links_reviews_text: I generally wear an 8 or a 10 but per the recommendation I ordered a 10 with a 12 as a back up. My body type is definitely not thin but to small to be fat... round it all of with the fact I am short (4'11), busty, with a booty. I am a 43 G, so the dress was a lil tight in the bust area but that's expected with all my clothes so I wasn't uncomfortable. I could zip up the 10 but since I order this dress for a religious convention where I would be sitting down for 8hrs , getting in and out of a van and walking around, and taking pictures, the 10 was a bit too tight, so I went with the 12 which gave me a lil more wiggle room. The color is beautiful, the embroidered flowers are a nice touch. I felt beautiful and received a lot of compliments. The dress is a classy fit yet stunning. I recommend a size up to have some breathing room if you will be sitting down, but overall a great dress for a special event without being overly formal.
I wore this dress to a work holiday party! It was conservative, classy and sexy.
Pro : flattering. Beautiful color. Con : zipper is not easy to zip, even if it is the right size. Runs small, I am usually a 10, thankfully I got the back up size 12. Size up when in doubt.

I wore this dress for an alumni reception and was super excited for the peplum and lace. However, I was disappointed at the size when it arrived. The band at the waist had no stretch and bunched up, making my torso look shorter than it really is. It was extremely difficult to zip, and nearly impossible to get into without someone there to help (the zipper starts really low and goes up to the neck of the dress). The arms were also tight, and I couldn't feel when my bra straps kept slipping. Overall, I received compliments on the dress but would not re-order.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and flattering dress perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the color! Perfect for a fall or spring wedding. Fabric is not stretchy, especially the band near the waist so take a size bigger. Got lots of compliments.

The color of this dress is drop dead gorgeous and the concept is great. The fit was off for me and the cut of the armholes strangely large. I think that if the lace on this had some stretch there would be more chance of the dress fitting a broader range of women. I have narrow shoulders, small bust and average arms and the lace sleeves were droopy and sad. Someone with more going on up top could pull it off.
Bra straps will show. Good quality

Wore this dress to a winter wedding. Wore a size 0 which fit perfectly. There was some stretch in hip area. Fabric was not itchy and the peplum is very flattering. I'm 5'3" and dress hit above the knee.. perfect length. Really nice berry red color. Would wear again!
Fits very true to size or a little small. Lining shows a little when sitting

This dress is a stunner! I felt sexy all night and could easily dance in it. The only downside I saw was the material of the sleeves hurt when I placed my elbows on a table. I would definitely rent this one again.
Super cute dress for fall wedding! Very flattering, got tons of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Classy with a pop of color
links_reviews_text: I am typically between a size 2 or 4 and both fit, but I opted for the 4 for a little more room and more comfort overall. I'd say the fit is as expected. The dress really accentuates all the right places. The detail in the lace is so pretty in person! More of a purple/deep pink tint to the dress vs just red or dark red, very pretty color!

Pros: Every performance I wore this for, I received compliments on the amazing color/fit. So flattering, especially as a short and busty woman, I was ecstatic it fit like a glove. Cons: Zipper is VERY finicky. I was concerned it wasn't going to fit the first time I tried it on because it just wasn't shutting, but after a few hands helping out the zipper eventually went up. I would say it's from use, but the dress doesn't seem used at all, which is a nice thing.
As others mentioned, it's more in the purple family. Great fit. Lots of compliments. The 10 would have fit perfect but the zipper was stuck. Disappointed but the 12 worked fine. Would rent again.

My experience with this dress was great...my only complaint is that it did have a slight smell in the underarms, barely detectable (I'm very sensitive to these things), but still present. It's a little disappointing, as it was too late to do anything about it by the time I noticed. The dress received dozens of compliments and I felt great in it. It was a little snug, so if you are on the fence about sizing, I'd recommend a size up. The color is gorgeous. A perfect berry red. It's sophisticated and just enough to be "the woman in red," without it being over-the-top. The peplum is a real hit-or-miss. I can see why it wouldn't work on other women. And, if I'm honest, the dress would have been much more flattering had the peplum been about an inch and a half lower on my torso. So, it really depends on your measurements. If it hit "just right," I can see how it would be extremely flattering.
I loved this dress! So comfortable and the fit was perfect. I wore a size 0, and I'm 5'4", 108 pounds.

I wore this dress do a day time ceremony in a Catholic church. I wanted something thay stood out but was still conservative. The color was bold and beauitful, the fit was great, and the peplum accented my curves just right. One thing to note, I could not zip this by myself, needed help.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for the fundraiser I planned at work. I felt comfortable and classy in this dress.
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the 4, the size I ordered, mostly due to the length so that it would be knee length since I wasn't wearing hose or tights. The color is stunning. I received so many compliments while wearing this dress. I have a little extra weight around my midsection after having a baby and this dress was perfect as it kind of cinched me in but also the peplum covered it without adding bulk. The sleeves were not too tight and felt perfect for a mid October evening in the midwest.

Absolutely loved this dress! The detail is lovely, and the color was perfect for a fall wedding. I ended up going with the 2 instead of the 4 because I liked the more fitted look. This dress was fun, easy to move around in, and comfortable. I would wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear but will rent again
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, my daughter was in the hospital and we didn't get to go to our wedding but since I had it, I did a quick try on. Fit is perfect. Color isn't really showing up in my photo but it's more of a fuchsia then red. Perfect for a holiday party. Pardon the lack of makeup and husband in the background :)
Great dress, loved the sleeve details and the beautiful color...more purple/plum than shown online. Versatile dress that could be worn for many occasions. Fit true to size. Recommend!

Loved this dress! I received compliments all night. This is a dress I wish I owned to wear over and over. I thought I would need the 8, but 10 fit wonderfully. Very flattering and the color is a rich berry, not red not pink. Perfect for a November wedding with a jacket. I wore black open toe ankle strap heels and pearls.
LOVED the color and so did everyone else. I really loved the lace and peplum as well, and I thought it was really flattering on my hourglass figure.
A little shorter and more fitted than I had hoped. I should have gone a size up. Otherwise loved the color and the style.

I really loved this dress. It was very well made and I got compliments on the fabric. The stock picture makes the dress look like it's cranberry, when in actuality, it's more of a fuchsia color, maybe with a slight purple tint. I'm a curvy 12 and this fit my body like a glove in the best possible way. I'm 5'6 - and the dress hit about mid-thigh, so it's a little bit "mini" especially when I sat down. Overall, I recommend and would wear this again!
I loved this dress and received so many compliments! The material is actually pretty stretchy, which made it so comfortable! Highly recommend this rental.

Loved the color and style of this dress but was a little disappointed with the fit. For some reason it made my hips look wide and was short on me in length. I loved the top half but there was just something off with the fit in the bottom half. Not one of my favorites from RTR
I loved everything about this dress. Great color and fit.

links_reviews_title: Not bright red, more of a maroon
links_reviews_text: This dress is very pretty and delicate. It was a bit sheer and thin, but is photographed very structured. Additionally it photographs a holiday red color but is really more of a maroon (think Texas Aggie) color.

Rented this for my sister in laws bridal shower. First time wearing a peplum style and I liked it. It did make my hips look a little wide but overall comfy flattering dress. You will need to wear a strapless bra since the sleeves are see through.

links_reviews_title: I don't think I've ever received so many compliments on a RTR dress!
links_reviews_text: A gorgeous pop of color, this dress both accentuated and hid all the right things. A strapless bra worked perfectly and I felt comfortable all night long. Will definitely rent again!

Do not rent this if you are petite! I rented a size 0 and for context I am 5'2" and 102 lbs. I am built narrowly and have an average length torso for petites. This dress fit horribly and was baggy. I rented it because I saw other ladies in my size who reviewed it but I don't know how it fit them. If you have a long torso and are my height, this may work for you. For context I'm a 28DD (narrow ribcage) and I fit into most 00P clothing with no tailoring.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, festive for a holiday event. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, maybe runs just a tick small so it was very fitted but I felt comfortable in it all night. Had to wear a strapless bra because my other one showed through at the shoulders with the lace. Sexy, fun dress, I received a lot of compliments on it and would buy it if I could. I'm 5'7", 160 lbs with an hourglass shape and 36DD. For some reason that won't come up in the About You part.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for a fall wedding! I got so many compliments. I'm an aggressive hourglass shape and was worried about the peplum making me look too hip-py but it was actually strategically placed so you don't have to worry about your belly, but still makes you look curvy and nipped in. I did wear a nu-bra with this; the mesh on top and down the back would show a strapless. But I'm a 34D and still had no issues in that department. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Ontime delivery. Pressed perfectly. Ready to wear right out of the box.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Quality of fabric was amazing, photos don't do do it justice. I wish I could keep it. Tons of compliments. Color was beautiful.
Dress was elegant and conservative, but still sexy. I've recommended it to several of my girlfriends.

I am very petite so I was happy this dress wasn't too big or baggy. It looked tailored and fit like I could have owned it. It is very flattering dress with the waste line. I wore a strapless bra with the dress to fill out the top. The fabric of this dress FAR exceeded my expectations. It is a thick and very high quality fabric, and the color is rich with bit more burgundy in it that the model photo. My photo is not an accurate color of the fabric, it's more red than it seems here. Great dress, and would rent again!

This dress was a great rental - I ordered the 0 and 2 (usually fluctuate between the 2 sizes depending on the dress). Although the 0 fit, I ended up wearing the 2 because it was a little more comfortable and looked a little better. The 3/4 sleeves and just above knee length were great for an early November wedding. This dress is definitely more of a cranberry color - I paired it with nude heels and gold earrings. The unique fabric on the dress was very comfortable and not itchy at all, and I loved the peplum!
So different. Perfect color for fall/winter. Very flattering and definitely stood out. Received so many compliments
I felt amazing in this dress and received so many compliments! The picture is off regarding the color...it's more of a dark fuscia, but I liked it even more! Great fall wedding guest dress.

links_reviews_title: My dress was so unique and the color is gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect for my hourglass figure. I ordered the 10 and a size 12 as backup. I am a 34DD so I wore the 12 to accommodate the bust and give me a little more room in hips. The arms of the dress have a little stretch but the rest is not as stretching. I felt the dress runs a little small. I typically wear an 8 or 10. Tons of compliments and easy to dance in.
Very cute dress I always wear a 6/8, this was a 4 and it fit well. The waist is a bit high, but I'm tall. Pretty material, a bit tight in the chest (32ddd)
I rented this for a change of command. It worked out perfectly. It was true to size, reasonably light weight, and perfect for the occasion. Would definitely rent this one again.
Loved the shape, fit, material, and colors of this dress! It was very flattering and I received multiple compliments and was told I should buy the dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful for a spring wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am typically a size 4 and petite. This dress fit perfectly. I could also fit in the size 2, just tighter, especially around the arm pits. This dress is beautiful, flattering, and comfortable. I am 5'2" and the length was just covering my knee.

links_reviews_title: Elegant! Perfect dress for the 2019 Kentucky Oaks!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me pretty well. I am 5'4", 175+/- lbs, but carry a lot of muscle from weightlifting. This dress was so comfortable and I wore it for over 10 hours! The best feature of the dress were the pockets, which became life-savers throughout the day/evening. The dress is a bit long for someone shorter in stature, so be cognizant of that. Additionally, depending on how limber you are, you may need assistance zipping it up completely. The dress is textured and NOT quite as white as it appears in photos. There is a lining, which makes the dress somewhat warm depending on the outside temperature. The pinks are more coral than pink and I would consider the p purple to be more plum. The colors are still fantastic, though! Overall, I would highly recommend this dress and I would rent it again to wear for another party or wedding.
Wore this to my rehearsal and the brunch afterwards - the dress is amazing. Pockets, elegant, light and classy. Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: My first RTR was great. The dress fit well. The dress itself had some pulls but was perfect for the mountaintop wedding. Not to heavy in the late summer heat. A bit snug in the top but I am a 34 DD so that's fairly normal. It was a great dress & I was very comfortable in it.
This was my backup dress for a friend's wedding - it fit, but I ended up wearing a different dress. Love the flare and pockets in this one, though!

links_reviews_title: Stunning, Comfortable, and Pockets To Boot!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a stunner! RTR sent it to me as a back up after my original dress didn't fit. I'm so glad the original didn't work out! This dress was comfortable, flattering, and had pockets! It was great for dancing, and was still comfortable after several hours of food, drink, and wedding festivities. It was the perfect summer wedding dress. I would highly recommend this dress to anyone going to a dressier/fancier event.
This dress was super comfy and has pockets! Great length but it does run a little small. I wore the size 20.

This dress was a little snug in the waist but, was able to sit at a wedding dinner for a couple of hours by scootching the waist above my true waist (just under my bra) and it worked great. Very flattering shape for larger girls. I wore this to an outside wedding and the lightweight material was perfect. Got lots of compliments. No need for spanks since the skirt was full and I was very happy that I could wear a regular bra.

This dress is so adorable. It is curtain-ish in the RTR model photos but I'm so glad I got it. I wore it to the church ceremony for my brothers wedding and highly recommend it. Im usually a 6 but wore a 4 because when I wear a-line styles I don't like when the skirt has a ton of extra fabric just for my chest because it's less flattering on my bottom half. I could've used a 6 for my D chest but no one noticed and I only was uncomfortable after 7 hours of wear. For all those hourglass ladies with a bottom and D-ish size chests, I'd say go a size down for sure! Way more flattering. Got compliments all day!

links_reviews_title: Memorial Day Weekend to an outdoor dinner
links_reviews_text: This dress has pockets! And is a bit long but very cute! Perfect florals! Great to dress up with heels and jewelry or down with sneakers! Perfect for summer!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my rosé themed bridal shower! It was the perfect dress for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 2 and a 4. The 2 was very tight in the chest and armpits. The fabric was also really pulled in the chest area. So I wore the "backup" size 4 and it fit like a glove! Absolutely no cons with the dress, fit perfect, was comfortable and beautiful. Added bonus is pockets!!!!

I ordered a 0 and a 2 and the 0 fit me better. The dress stopped right above the knee, and didn't show much cleavage, which is what I was looking for to wear to a friend's wedding. It was proper but comfortable enough to dance in for hours. Overall really pleased!

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty dress that went well with my date's navy suit.
links_reviews_text: Pros=Lightweight, pockets, and comfortable. Cons=Fabric doesn't stretch around ribcage.
I'm a 34DD with a smaller mid section and this fit perfect

The dress was cute, comfortable, and has pockets. Wore to a summer wedding at a racquet club. The material is a little heave and the dress is lined so it may feel a little stuffy on a really hot day in the sun.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for family birthday dinner!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for family dinner at a steakhouse in Las Vegas!
Fit great and very appropriate for a Baby baptism.

links_reviews_title: Multiple events over the whole day in a hot city.
links_reviews_text: Reviews said this dress runs large, so I ordered a size smaller as my backup and ended up wearing that one. It fit great and was so comfortable throughout the day. I needed something celebratory, but not too formal and it was perfect. The service was great. too. I will never buy another dress.

links_reviews_title: Party ready and with pockets you'll love!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, exactly everything you would want and expect!

This dress was out of my black, navy comfort zone, but was perfect for the summer wedding! Amazingly comfortable, didn't need anything extra underneath. I received many compliments on the dress, and I felt very feminine. The only thing that was disappointing was the dress was quite worn, several snags that needed attention and the lining of the dress was torn in many places.

links_reviews_title: I didnt wear this, but it fit nicely and was pretty !
links_reviews_text: I needed something conservative for a formal lunch and ordered this dress and the yellow floral Carmen Marc Valvo also. My husband liked this one better on, but it felt a little too prim, shop I ended up wearing the yellow. I'm normally a 0 or 2, depending mostly on how fitted the hips send butt are. The zero would have been the right call. I'm 5'4", 119 lbs, 32A, straight build.

I was very pleased with this dress! I rented it for a traditional wedding in Ireland, where the guests tend to dress up more formally and fashionable than in the US. It paired nicely with my fascinator and hit right at the knee. I ordered a 6 but ended up wearing the backup size 4 because it hugged my waist better. Only thing was it was a bit tight in the arm holes. This is a perfect dress if you're busty / hourglass shaped like me because you can wear any bra/undergarments with it, and it shows just a tiny bit of cleavage.

This dress was perfect! I wore it to my husbands work event in SC. Formal, but breathable in the heat as everything was outdoors. I didn't need a purse because it has pockets which was a huge plus. I am very small busted and was nervous the neck line would be too low because of other reviews I read, but it was perfectly modest.

links_reviews_title: Loved the silhouette, but dress was very worn
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to take on vacation for a nice dinner out and the fit and comfort was as expected - carmen marc valvo dresses run a bit large so I sized down and the fit was perfect. I was disappointed in the condition of the dress though - there is beautiful lace detail throughout and the dress had quite noticeable pulls throughout. Seems to be an older dress so I wouldn't recommend renting for any event where you want a top quality piece, but if you just like the designer and need a classic dress in a pinch, this will do the trick!
Very pretty. True to size. Wear with a blazer and look professional. Length is right below knees.

Loved this dress! It was perfect for a spring day event. It was a little tight in the arms, but ok. I'd describe it as mostly true to size. The fabric is a little bit shiny and textured. I got so many compliments.

Well constructed and flattering cut, especially for a pear shape like mine. Length was a perfect length, just below the knee (in 5'6"). Colors were vibrant, but fabric was a bit worn. Great pockets! I'm usually a dress size 8, sometimes 10. The 8 fit a bit too snug, so I went up.

links_reviews_title: The customer service was amazing! My dresses didn't fit so they shipped me 2 new dresses !
links_reviews_text: It fit and it was lovely!!

Loved this dress! I have larger breasts and it wasn't too revealing, very flattering...and it has pockets! I'm also almost 6'0" and it was long enough but showed the right amount of leg. Received so many compliments, perfect for summer/spring! I would rent this dress again! Highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. The fit was comfortable and I was able to dance the night away.
links_reviews_text: I ordered 2 sizes of this dress and ended up going with the bigger size. Best decision I made because I was comfortable all night and received tons of compliments.

I loved this dress! It was a little loose and I probably could have gone down a size but it felt great and I was able to move around. I wore this to a bridal shower luncheon, it was perfect for the occasion and I received so many compliments for the design and overall look! Great dress
This dress was super comfy! Perfect for a summer wedding. The dress even has pockets!!! It was a little snug at the the arm pits but other than that loved it

This spectacular dress was extremely comfortable and won rave reviews from everyone, including my son, the groom! True to size and perfect for a winery wedding, I absolutely adored it! This was my first RTR experience and I am sold. My online stylist, Danielle, was so helpful when I added this dress to my order as a backup to my original selection, which as I suspected didn't fit. I have several more events later this year and will definitely turn to RTR for my attire. Thank you for providing gorgeous, affordable style!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful for a wedding and flattering
links_reviews_text: Lining is tighter than top
It has those clever little snaps to secure your bra strap on the top of the shoulder. Pockets were a lifesaver. I looked good and felt fantastic in it.

links_reviews_title: This was my first time using RTR and it was great! Delivered on time and return was super easy.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size! Dress was beautiful. I wore it to an out door summer weeding and got lots of complements on it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a June wedding
links_reviews_text: Went out of my comfort zone and selected this non-black dress and was rewarded with so many compliments I might do it again!! Always love a dress with pockets!

links_reviews_title: Okay but go with another dress
links_reviews_text: This does runs a little small. Top was okay but the bottom part of dress wasn't great - a little too much volume but my biggest issue was that the folds the waist didn't lay right/ just made the dress look more puffy. Other was an okay dress. Thick material

A touch snug on ample bust and booty. The top stretched across tightly giving a slight uni-boob effect. And the bottom was really short and tights were necessary. The material is of excellent quality and it looks and feels very luxurious. Just not the right fit.
Loved this dress so much more than I thought I would. So flattering and comfortable, pockets, perfect fit!
Very well made dress. The material is thick so it's perfect for a fall or winter wedding. I got lots of compliments on the color. It crushed "the girls" a little bit but I think it ran true to size.

links_reviews_title: Rented this last minute for my daughter who procrastinated on getting a dress. So lovely!
links_reviews_text: Zipper was hard to pull up/down.

links_reviews_title: Who has such a small diaphragm?!?
links_reviews_text: Luckily it fit my nursing breasts however the space under my boobs tight. Love the color and the pockets. Wore to cocktail party with leather jacket for an edgy vibe.
Everyone loved this dress!!! It was perfect for the holiday party. Looked great with heals and flats.

I love this Syrah Stripe Seam Dress! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’6”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person. Pair with nude heels to complete your outfit!

I ordered both 4 and 6 as backup. There is definitely something wrong with the zipper on the size 6 because it wouldn't zip up all the way when I had it on. Luckily the 4 still fit although I would have liked the 6 for a little more breathing room. Overall this was a great dress for my height and formal enough for the wedding I attended. The bottom poofs out more in person than it shows in the pic but it looks alot nicer that way. I recommend this one for Fall and Winter events!

links_reviews_title: Cute and brand new plus pockets!
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear but very cute. Still had tags on when I received it. I got it for work but wasn't really my style for the office. I would maybe wear to an event or party. PS it has pockets!
This was a new dress that no one had worn before . I have broad shoulders and weigh 145 pounds This dress ran a little small on me I loved the length and it was comfortable yet formal
It was too puffy at the bottom and too big on the chest
Beautiful color dress and heavy fabric for a cold weather event. However I did not wear this dress because the large pleats in the back were NOT figure flattering for a woman my size.

Rented this for my husband's company holiday party and it's a beautiful dress. Quite structured! The bust area is small; maybe I should have gone bra-less or nu-bra but the bust fit, just tightly. The skirt was very full, had tons of room and the pockets are tiny. A very pretty dress!
The dress was way too small! Typically wear a 12-14, rented this in a 14 and could not even come close to fully zipping. Definitely size up if you plan to rent this dress.

links_reviews_title: So cute but I couldn't zip it. There is no give up top.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't zip- going to try the next size up.
Short dress very thick fabric but a unique nice dress.
Do not order if you are tall. Looks like a babydoll dress. Could not wear at all.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not flattering on me!
links_reviews_text: The dress is super cute but it was a little short on me and was stiff in the hips, which made me look bottom heavy. The zipper was also hard to finagle. Ended up not wearing it.
Too small but beautifully made dress. Great color!

links_reviews_title: Maybe not for the curvy girls
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress and it fit perfect, but it really poofed out where my hips wide and made me look bigger than I already am. Too bad because the dress is really flattering on top.
Dress is well made and I like the bodice details. However, it is too short for my body type (I have a long torso) and the pleats sit weird on me.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this dress, it didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: I'm relatively new to RTR but the reviews for this dress is on point. This dress runs extremely small, its ridiculous. If you have any fat at all around the stomach or torso you'll need two times the size you normally wear. I usually get away with a size 10 or 12 in dresses but ordered those sizes and neither would zip up in the back. Pretty color, weird shape a little short especially for someone taller (I'm 5' 7''). Try it at your own risk.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it but the color is nice and I liked the material.
links_reviews_text: Shorter than I expected and the skirt had more volume than expected.
The skirt sticks out A LOT due to the pleating. it was a bit excessive, but still a great dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous detail on top, but runs very small
links_reviews_text: I was so excited when I picked out this dress to wear to my friend's upcoming fall wedding but unfortunately I have to send it back. I am a true size 10 in dresses (bust is 34D/34DD) and it wasn't even CLOSE to zipping up top. We are talking a solid inch to go. The neck piece hooked fine, but there was no chance of zipping past the waist. Also, be wary of the pleats. I have curves and the pleats opened up on me weird. I thought the silhouette would work for a pear, but I don't think a size up would be much better. Still giving it a 4 since its a gorgeous dress, just not meant for my body type.
I usually wear a 0 or XS petite and this dress runs small in the bust. I could not zip this closed even without a bra. Beautiful material and color. Fun cut and pockets. Just size up!

I loved this dress! The top is very thick and structured. It is a really flattering shape. I did not end up wearing it, because the wedding I attended was more formal then this looked, but I would definitely rent it again for a different event!

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, especially the color. It fit true to size, however the full skirt was definitely more than I was expecting. It was perfect for my sorority's semi-formal.
I wore this to a benefit gala and got tons of compliments! This fits true to size and is very flattering. I felt comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color. Zipper was a little wonky
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! was perfect for a fall wedding. It is very low cut and required some tape but still respectable enough for someone small chested like me attending a family wedding. The only problem I had was the zipper kept slowly unzipping down the back. The top was loose and the mid section was fairly fitted. Overall, Would rent again.
I'm usually between a 4 and 6 but I'm glad I sized up and got the 6. It fit perfectly. For reference I have a 28" waist and 34D. I wore it with pasties and no bra.
Beautiful simple classic
I am a large chested woman and I absolutely SPILLED out of this dress in every direction. There would be no possible way to wear a bra with it. 0/10
I’m 5’7”. In these photos I weighed about 158lbs. I loved the fit and cut. I thought it was flattering in the right areas. It was my back up dress and I wore a size 6.

This dress was so amazing - I can't wait to rent it again. I didn't need to wear a bra with it so that was nice. It was a bit tight around the rib cage which made eating a lot a little difficult but overall, the best dress I've ever rented. Sooo many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my husband’s military homecoming and I loved this dress! Super comfy.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. Short but not too short, felt like it accentuated the smallest part of my waist. I liked the zipper on the back actually. I have a rather small flat chest so o went braless with no worries.

Wearing this was out of my comfort zone. I liked it a lot and felt secure that I wouldn't have a wardrobe malfunction but it was very revealing. The material was also very heavy and warm which wasn't ideal for a beach wedding. I wouldn't rent it again.

Loved this dress that I rented for my cousin's wedding! The most important thing to note is that the waist has absolutely no give. I rented a 6, the higher of my usual 4/6 and it was perfect. Had to wear a certain bra that was low enough to accommodate the deep V

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a cocktail party at my college reunion- fun for dancing
links_reviews_text: Quite snug in the rib cage but I’ve had 4 kids and I could zip it but it was tight.

links_reviews_title: Great color and details, but very low cut
links_reviews_text: I had not realized how low cut this dress was. Unfortunately it also hit at a very unflattering place on my waist, which make me look wider. I think this might work better if I had less on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful, and was so much fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly--I didn't have to worry at all throughout the night about any dress issues! It can get a little tight in the chest if you eat a bit too much during the reception! This dress felt amazing, the weight was perfect (felt fancy and sturdy, but not too heavy), and the dress was SO MUCH FUN to twirl in--the skirt is fairly full! I got so many compliments, and had a blast.

This dress was beautiful and I received many compliments. As other reviews mentioned it has a deep plunge but with the right bra and some sticky tape, everything stayed in place. The band around the waist is VERY tight. The 2 was a little big everywhere else but the band was almost too tight to zip and by the end of the night it was pretty uncomfortable.

I ended up going with the smaller size 0 because it fit a little snug around the waste but had less of a gap around the deep neckline. Still needed to use fashion tape to keep the girls from showing because a bra of any kind would have shown. But it was very comfortable to dance in and the color was great for a spring wedding!
Great color! Perfect for a wedding!

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments and the dress was Super fun dress to dance all night in!
links_reviews_text: Like the other reviews said, it was definitely a little tight around the ribs above where the dress flowed out. Other than that it fit great and it wasn’t too tight! I used a sticky bra because it is a low cut dress and I ended up changing sticky bras so that the dress wasn’t too busty.
True to size and no give in the fabric.

I absolutely loved this dress. It fit a little snug around my ribcage, but I did not find it uncomfortable at all. Just make sure you get a size that will let you breathe! Also the dress is a little low cut, so be aware of that. I didn't find it to be classless, but definitely something important to note.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and cut - very flattering!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a fun night out in New Orleans during Mardi Gras. I wore it to a nice dinner, then walked around the Quarter and went to a parade. I got tons of compliments. The cut is super flattering and I was able to wear a regular bra with it. The straps were a little loose, but only when I slouched, so I just had to have good posture all night. LOL! The waist was very fitted and there is no give, so keep that in mind when ordering a size. I current weigh 135. My measurements are 35, 27, 37 and I wear a 32 D or C. I wore the size 4 and it fit great. I didn't want to send this dress back!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but very low cut
links_reviews_text: Definitely agree with the reviews that it works for specific body types! It was a cute dress, but extremely low cut. The material is also very heavy just FYI. The waist has no give so kind of 50/50 if it will fit there! I thought it ran a bit large, but I'm also petite so that may have played into it.
This dress will give you the tiniest waist and you'll look fabulous! Beware if you have boobs at all - which I don't. I can imagine it'd be a tight squeeze or a slip liability.
The dress was stunning and long enough for my 5' 9" frame. The waist was a bit tighter than anticipated, but the flare below the waist made it even out. Got so many compliments on it all night!
This dress was cut well & showed off all the right places. Was a bit tight on the torso but nothing too bad.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Great for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress was great. Ran small so had to size up. Couldn't wear a bra (V is just too deep) but fashion tape easily held everything in place. Skirt was fun for dancing! Very flattering cut.

Was very happy with my rental choice! The neckline fell much deeper than I expected, as the dress doesn't fall so low on the model, but I assume thats because I'm rather short (5'3") with a small torso. My boyfriend, however, appreciated that aspect of the dress so I'm still very pleased, haha. Otherwise it was super comfortable and the lower half of the dress spun really well and made it fun to dance in! I usually wear a 2 or a 4, but had to go with a 0 on this one so I recommend sizing down. Also, this could be because I have small shoulders and am a B cup, but the straps didn't fit well even though the ribcage did. I still loved how it looked despite it being a bit big / bunched up on top though, just something to keep in mind. Overall, very pretty, fun dress; I'm very happy I chose it!! Would recommend

At first I thought this dress would be a little too revealing, but it ended up being perfect! I got tons of compliments. It's especially fun to pair with a cool statement necklace since it's a lower neckline. The length was perfect for me, even with heels I didn't feel like it was too short.

links_reviews_title: Amazing color, amazing fit, and an amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments on it all night. Its definitely a deep v-neck cut so I ended up going without a bra (cus you could see it otherwise) and using sticky tape. The color is a beautiful purple and the skirt is full and perfect for twirling around the dance floor. I highly recommend this dress, if retail wasnt so high I would buy it for myself!

links_reviews_title: The Skirt Twirls Like a Dream
links_reviews_text: If you want to be your own swirly-twirly gumdrop, rent this dress! The skirt was perfect for dancing and was quite the show-stopper! Word to the wise: come prepare with cups or no bra if you want the neckline as is. It plunged pretty deeply and I had trouble finding a bra where the ribbon between cups DIDN'T show. Ultimately, went without which was worked well, straps kept everything where it needed to be but my chest runs on the small size. Also, the fabric is not lined up top so if you are going braless, and it's going to be chilly....be prepared. All in all, lovely for a fall wedding! ALSO the zipper in the back is functional and goes all the way to the base of the skirt. You've been warned.

I loved this dress! It was very flattering and a nice material. The waist was a bit tight and I was ready at the end of the night to take the dress off. Word of warning this is very low cut and you could really see cleavage. I didn't mind with the event I was at, but if at a more conservative shin-dig I would not have been comfortable in this. Still beautiful and would rent again!
Fit perfectly, tons of compliments! Gorgeous color.

Very low cut dress had to wear a shirt underneath. I didn't fill out the top of the dress, it was a little baggy, like my torso was too short. The back zipper unzips completely and the waist fits very snug. Normally wear a size 10 but I wore the size 12. The bottom of dress was full and the length not too short. Overall it worked out great.

links_reviews_title: So cute, but requires tape if you have small boobs!
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable and the fabric is so comfortable - I got tons of compliments and the zipper detail all the way down the back looks so cool in person. I have a smaller chest (34B) and I felt like it would have been easier to wear for someone with bigger boobs. I ended up wearing sticky inserts sort of offset to the side so they wouldn't be seen in the plunging neckline and that was fine if I didn't dance too hard, but if you're really small chested this may not be the dress for you.

Loved this Marilyn dress for a fall wedding! It's very low cut, so I wore a #spanx tank under. I'm also 5'10, so I paired with some black tights to help with length. Beautiful thick fabric and full skirt.

This dress is a beautiful purple, a bit more vibrant than in this picture. Easy to style and the material is a bit thicker, which helped for a late September outdoor wedding. Dress runs small, definitely size up! I ordered a 2 and a 4, wore the 4. The waistband has no stretch and the bust fit with a bit of fashion tape on the neckline. This dress is perfect for dancing in and I received lots of compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a barn wedding, no bra needed!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, my boobs looked great, I got tons of compliments!

The color was beautiful and the style was great for semi-formal day wedding. I had a bit more cleavage than I had hoped, but the material was thick and I did not need to wear a bra (which would have been too much).

links_reviews_title: Fun to dance in, Twirls and Twirls
links_reviews_text: low cut, no stretch, glad it fit!

Super cute fit! loved this dress, I have a large bust so it definitely showed of the girls, but still classy. No bra needed, everything stayed in place. The color is great and i loved the full skirt, very flattering. I will say i felt like this ran a little small. I am usually a 4 or 6, but the 6 was pretty tight around my waist and by the end of the night I couldnt wait to get out of it, which was kind of a bummer. GREAT rental, but def size up!
Awesome little black dress! Runs a little small so I sized up and it fit perfectly. Very comfortable yet felt dressed up. Also, the pockets are a plus!
I bought it. Pockets, Machine washable, leather accents. Fit like a glove. Versatile, no wrinkles

Snug fit, especially if you carry any weight in your midsection as I do (I couldn't wear it - needed one size up). Really cool fabric with the pockets. Vavoom vibe. I really liked it. Just needed a different size (or flatter stomach!)
It sucks everything in! Very deep V! This dress is very elegant and sexy. I wished it didn't show so much boobs but I loved it nonetheless.

links_reviews_title: The chest darts definitely look like nipples!
links_reviews_text: It was form fitting and flattering, but the darts on the chest absolutely look like nipples, so I felt kinda weird about it. Also a tiny bit hard to walk with the cut.
Fit well. Was a tad low cut
Pros: Very slimming. Cons: -Super difficult to walk in - very tight at the knees. -The chest area was weird and kind of bulky compared to the rest of the dress.

links_reviews_title: The RTR experience is so simple and cost effective. I've rented this dress three times, always a hit
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments, comfortable but classy. Loved the pockets!

Perfect black dress. I wore this to a work function/dinner. People liked the dress and I loved the pockets and satin details. Fit my curves. Was a tad revealing in the bust area but worked without being over the top. Would rent again.
Formfitting and flattering, but runs small so I would suggest sizing up for your second size!

I read that this dress ran a little small so I ordered a size bigger which worked out well! The smaller size probably would've fit but this one was more comfortable. This is a simple classy, black dress. Perfect for work functions.

I absolutely love this dress! I rented it for an industry night and it was so flattering to my curvy figure! I typically wear a 12 or a 14 and the 12 was a bit snug on me. If you're a larger chested gal like myself with a curvy figure I would get the 14 rather as it seems to run a little small. I got so many compliments, I didn't mind that it was a little snug! Love this dress and would absolutely rent it again!
The length was perfect for this classy yet sexy dress. I was able to dance all nice. It fit perfectly--I would say to size up with your back up. Received many compliments.
Top ran a little tight for me in some areas and loose on the sides, but overall great dress. Got lots of compliments and looks all night!

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything... best of all it has pockets.
links_reviews_text: I am normal either a 4 or a 6 depends on the name brand.. This dress I took the 6 and canceled the option of taking the extra size which I would of taken the 8. It fit me a little light by my chest. But nothing uncomfortable. If I order this specific dress again i would choose the 8 instead. But it worked well for the few hours I needed it. I danced the night away and everyone loved my dress.
This dress was a little roomy on top and under the arms. But, it felt and looked so good that I had to wear it anyway. It's such a beautiful cut and fabric, it was still a head-turner. Plus: pockets!

I fit in both the 0 and 2, but the top fit a bit loose on the 2, so I went with the tighter 0. It was a very narrow fit down my hips to my shins, so walking up stairs and getting in and out of chairs was a bit tricky. I definitely couldn't move very fast even though I would say I'm good at walking in stiletto heels. It was also difficult to use the bathroom while wearing this dress. It was too tight to pull up from the bottom, so I had to unzip the back and pull it down in the restroom. My favorite thing about this dress was the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Classy with a touch of HOT
links_reviews_text: I was so worried about this dress fitting as it's fitted throughout and I have a bit of a stomach to hide BUT it was perfect!!! Paired with opaque black tights it looked great! The inside lining did ride up a bit when sitting for long periods but overall a great rental. Definitely recommend
This dress is great. Runs small, so size up. Slit could be a little bigger in the back, but wasn't awful. Top is very flattering

Slate and Willow Black Empire Shine dress was a stunning dress. This LBD hugged my figure perfectly and flaunted my best assets. Although this dress was sleeveless, it kept me warm the fabric was pleasantly thick. The pockets are a major game changer and add so much personality to this perfect silhouette. I can not wait for my next RTR rental I had such a great experience with Customer services and overall.

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD for cocktail/work affair. Wish I owned it.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and absolutely love the pockets. Might be too snug for a large chest.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT mix of classy and sexy!
links_reviews_text: When I was looking at the dress, I didn't know why there weren't a TON of photos because it seems like the PERFECT dress for a work christmas party where you want to look and feel sexy but not like you are trying too hard or you are showing too much. It was such a fun dress. Well constructed, great fit. Try to size. Perfect little black dress. I always have a hard time finding the right dress because I do crossfit and have an athletic build. Will definitely rent again!

Amazing contrast of fabrics! This Slate and Willow sheath dress runs small and we recommend sizing up for backup. If you are curvier in the hips you may want to consider sizing up for your primary size as well. It is fitted throughout the midsection, waist, hips and bust, making it work best for smaller cup sizes. The fabric has some stretch and should be worn with no bra. Pair with black strappy heels and silver jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you have a larger bust and/or hips
links_reviews_text: The 10 fit perfectly in my chest area but was too tight around my hips so I opted for the 12. Definitely runs small but I felt great and comfortable all night and could still cut a rug when the band played "Shout!" The material has a lot of give so I somewhat wished I had gone with the 10 but overall it was a great dress. Midi length on me but it worked!
Beautiful dress just never got the chance to wear it as it's too hot right now
Has pockets! Worked well, a little low cut but overall great.

links_reviews_title: More than one person told me that I should own this dress
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Sad I did not get any photos. Seriously thinking of buying it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so perfect that I actually wore it out two nights in a row in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Great snug fit and very flattering. I didn't even need to wear a bra.

This dress was fun to wear- the detail is satin black and pockets. Overall it's comfortable but definitely tight in the midsection. A 2 was fine (actually lower in the chest than I had hoped). But if you want a little more room and to not shimmy to get it off or to go the bathroom, size up.

links_reviews_title: Classic LBD to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and paired it with a cropped jacket to cover my shoulders and dress it down a bit. It was a bit longer than I was anticipating but it fit well throughout - from waist to calf especially. Above average LBD.

This dress sizzles! The side panels are made of a silky material which draws attention to the smallness of your waist. It fit like a glove and I did not have to wear a sticky bra. The only quirk: the darts on the chest make it look like you have "headlights" showing. No matter what I did, I could not keep them from pointing straight out. It's a dark color and isn't noticeable to others unless you point (no pun intended) it out.

links_reviews_title: Classy dress but form fitting so you look and feel like a goddess!
links_reviews_text: Neckline had just enough plunge. Fit was fantastic and form fitting to accentuate in all the right places! Loved the contrast in fabrics. Sophisticated and sexy!
Size up

I agree with the reviewers who have said that it runs slightly small. I'd normally be a 2 but wore a 4. The 2 probably would have worked, but the 4 was more comfortable and didn't look oversized at all. This is super cute, the pockets/details really make it. Length was professional and looked great. Wore to work and then to a professional event after. Would probably have kept it, if it was in slightly better shape (has been rented a few times, for sure). But all in all, two big thumbs up.
This dress was very large on top. I am a size 32B but the size 2 was very large so unfortunately I couldn't wear it. Otherwise this was a really cute and flattering LBD!
Sexy but still classy. Hit me just below the knee. With the low cut top it strikes just the right balance. With a blazer could even be worn to work.

links_reviews_title: Sexy little number - slimming but for those with hips, it runs small.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a friend's birthday party. Though I was able to wear it, it seems to run small. The dress was very, very tight which did not make for easy sitting. However, it is very slimming and the paneling and pockets are fabulous details.

I wore this dress for a cocktail work event and it was perfect. Form fitting and stylish, but not too sexy. My husband loved me in it! You can wear a regular bra underneath (with cross cross straps, dress has no bra keeps) if you want more cleavage. All the other reviewers are right, size up for your backup size. The 2 fit perfectly especially on top, but was tight through the hips and harder to walk. The 4 was a little loser up too but easier to move. Highly recommend this dress to anyone with any and all body types, I think it would stunning on everyone.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but top too big.
links_reviews_text: This dress is fabulous! Unfortunately, my torso is smaller than my hips, so the 4 fit my hips but was too big on the top. The fabric was gorgeous and if I were a little taller this would have been a perfect dress!

I loved the fit of this dress and how I felt in it! I am usually a size 6 and the 8 was pretty tight so I would say it runs small. Obviously loved the pockets it was a great twist on the LBD. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Not for girls with short torsos
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. The color is gorgeous, the fit was amazing, and it even has pockets! Unfortunately the torso on the dress is pretty long so I couldn't wear it because there was about 2 inches of space between my shoulders and the straps. Would be perfect if it could be altered.
Loved this dress- lots of compliments all around. Highly recommend
I wore this dress to a charity benefit and it looked amazing on! I would have loved it even more if it came in pink or red, but this dress is fantastic! Don’t overthink it, get it.
So cute. Amazing color, great fit as usual with KS

The dress was a beautiful color and fit! It has pockets which I love. The bust was alittle tight but I’m a 34D so most things are pretty tight. Overall, perfect dress for my friends wedding. I ordered the wrong size, and costumer service overnighted me the correct size no problem. They were so friendly and solved my issue quickly. So so so happy with this company and will be using them again!
Pockets were amazing. Lovely, classy dress.
The dress fit perfectly. It have pockets so that was amazing too.

links_reviews_title: Dress looked as expected and I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress was true to size and the color was a very vibrant blue in person.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fabric but this style was not for me...
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress! The color is beautiful as is the neckline but the poofy style from the waist down did nothing for my figure, especially y backside. The length was above my knee and I realize now that also doesn't look great on me. I didn't end up wearing but glad I tried this one.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a school dance! It got true to size and really stuck out!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran a little big

I normally wear a dress/skirt size 4, size 28 jeans and bust is 34C. A size 4 of this Kate Spade dress was too tight in the torso however the size 6 was absolutely perfect (neither too tight nor too loose when wearing a strapless push up bra). Loved this dress!

Fun color, good fit -- kinda like a bubble-skirt, so no lunges. I agree with all of the other posts about the back kind of popping away from your back, but it was manageable. The color was exactly what I wanted, but it wasn't an "Oh, I wish I owned this!"-type-rental.

links_reviews_title: Kate Spade just knows how to make a great dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress. From the vibrant color, to the perfect cut, to the pockets, it was just a great dress all around.

I loved the way this dress fit. It was a little snug in the chest but I just didn't wear a bra which helped. This dress had pockets and I loved how it ballooned out at my stomach. Btw it does have bra straps if need though. It was very flattering and comfortable enough to wear out all night in Vegas. We danced, we ate and walked a lot. This was my first RTR experience and although I didn't get my order on time(stressful event but RTR gave me a partial refund) overall it was a great experience and so fun to rent a dress I otherwise would not been able to wear. I received several comments on it and my fiends loved it on me. Thanks RTR. I'm a 38Dchest and 165 lbs 5'6. If the dress had been any tighter in my chest it would not have been comfy.

Loved the color of the dress! I would definitely recommend ordering your true size, plus a size up. My true size is a 10, however the waist line runs a bit a small and I had to go up a size. Many reviews will say that it gapes open at the top, and since I had to go up a size I experienced a lot of gaping when I sat down with the dress on. However, it's definitely still a beautiful dress to have on!

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect for a summer night out!
links_reviews_text: The length, the neckline and the color were perfect! The dress ran a bit tight in the chest area; however, in terms of sizing it was true to size. I received compliments all night! It paired well with the Kendra Scott earrings that were suggested.

Pretty bright blue color without being too flashy. Perfect for a formal or semi formal depending on the accessories. I am small to medium in the chest area and the back seemed to gape open a bit but it totally covered my tummy problem area. Felt totally comfortable dancing and sitting.
This dress worked well for a professional event. It was easy to wear and comfy- especially with the pockets.
Loved this dress for Easter Sunday. Perfect color, fun fit. True to size.

The top of this dress fits perfectly! I could've not worn a bra with the size 6, but wanted a little more arm room so I went with the size 8. The bottom is the perfect compliment to the top- it is structured with pleats but bubbles out AND HAS POCKETS!! Such a fun dress all around!

links_reviews_title: Worn by my daughter in her first pageant. She came in 3rd and won the People's Choice Award.
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully once we got the zipper to work. The zipper is on its last leg and we didn't realize that until the day of the event.

I rented this dress for my brother's wedding. The color, the fabric, and the formally were perfect for the event. The fit, however, was bizarre. The skirt is a bubble skirt, and the waist was very fitted. The hem of the skirt was so confining that getting in and out of the car gracefully was nearly impossible. It wasn't the best silhouette on my curvy frame, but it wasn't awful. The issue came from the fit on the bodice. I am very, very busty. The back of the dress pulled so tightly from armpit to armpit that it was almost painful. The top of the back of the bodice was so loose that it gapped significantly. If I could have tailored it, I could have put two darts in and cut off about 2-3 inches of fabric: that's how large the gap was! The neckline was so deeply cut that had there been more than close friends at the wedding, I would have been mortified with the amount of cleavage. The bodice was also so fitted in the front that my chest was smushed down. I'm not sure who this dress is designed for, but it isn't a curvy woman with an hour-glass figure.
Fit was true to size. Just a little poofy and bubble like front and back below the waist. Easy to accessorize and can dress it up or down as well.

This dress was very fitted in the waist, and bunched just a tad in the back. The zipper also sticks a little where the seam is at the waist, but once on, it was very comfortable and flattering! Got lots of compliments on this one, and would even wear this one again!
The cut, color, and fabric of this dress is very flattering. It has pockets, too! I loved wearing this dress.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a wedding in NYC
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight in the chest but thankfully not too tight for me. Otherwise loved the color, length and the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Got compliments all night!
