links_reviews_text: This dress was great. I wear a 0 and went with the 2 because the 0 was unavailable. It was definitely a bit big in the chest and back area but it worked out well. I loved it and didn't want to send it back! The color is so bright and the dress is beautiful.

Loved the fit and color of this dress! The pockets were AMAZING as well. The only downside to the dress is the back gapes at the top. It was ok for me since I have longer hair, but shorter length hair may have fallen into the back if worn down. Otherwise, this dress was perfect for a beautiful wedding in the mountains!
Comfortable and forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Great color, great length, loved the pockets!
links_reviews_text: Ran large, but I have a challenge finding clothes that fit in the bust so I was fine with it. Very comfortable and was able to dance in it with out issue. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Not a perfect fit, but still loved this dress for the color and style, perfect for my bachelorette!
links_reviews_text: The shade of blue is amazing and the style is gorgeous, plus the fabric just feels super high quality. I added this dress to an existing order, so only got one size. I normally wear an 8, 10 or 12 in dresses, depending on the designer and style. Based on the reviews I went with a 12 to be on the safe side. It was big in the top, and the full skirt was very forgiving in the waist/hips, so I definitely could have gone with a 10. But it still looked great and I got lots of compliments. The length was great, right above my knees since I'm 5'2", but careful when you bend down/over, it gets real short, real fast! ;) The style was very me, so with that on top of the fit, it was really comfortable to wear all night. Once upon a time the dress did have the little snaps to hold bra straps in place, but both on my dress were broken, so I wore a strapless bra, otherwise straps would have been showing anytime I moved. Overall, I would totally get this dress again in the next size down. Lots you can do for styling, I chose a big multi-strand pearl necklace, and a boa, because that's what you do at your bachelorette weekend, right? Apologies for the mediocre photo, I forgot to get a full length one! :)

Overall the dress fit very well. It's a great color and fun to wear with the pockets. Overall I would definitely rent again and it's the perfect attire for a wedding. I did have a problem with the back gaping at the top of my neck. Once I used fashion tape it was perfect the whole night. Great dress!

This was the perfect last minute find for my sisters wedding. As someone who has an athletic build with very little curve, this dress gave the appearance of hips and I couldn't be happier. Considering renting again for a wedding this summer!

I love this quintessential Kate Spade dress! The color is so vibrant on camera, and the material feels thick and substantial. If your ribcage area is your smallest part, I highly recommend this dress. I rented this dress to hide my hips and I felt it ran true to size.

I loved the color of the dress! It was perfect for a summer (more formal) wedding. The fit was true to size. The only con of the dress was it had a lot of fabric at the waistline. When I say down it bunched up a lot. Other then that, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Great color for a blonde. Beautiful fabric. Comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, fit was right now (I'm a size six and it fit perfect). I loved the cut; however, one of the bra stays was broken, so that caused some aggravation. Didn't realize it until it was too late, and didn't back a strapless. Other than that, enjoyed the dress.

links_reviews_title: You'll be the life of the party !!
links_reviews_text: I can't decide if my favorite thing about this is the bright cobalt color, the fantastic fabric which was just a little shiny and held its shape perfectly or the pockets. The neckline was so flattering and the lingerie straps were perfect for hiding a regular bra. The length hit above the knee enough to show some leg but not enough to compromise any bending or sitting. I'm just crazy about it. Definitely want to rent again.

I was sad to send this dress back! The fit was perfect for my hourglass figure and the color was bright and beautiful! Not to mention the bra strap holders were super convenient! I would definitely recommend this dress!
Was the perfect dress for a spring wedding! The fit was great for eating and dancing and it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit of this dress--so flattering!
links_reviews_text: Everything was great about this dress--including the pockets! Would definitely rent again.

This dress stole my heart. I felt sweet AND cool in this it. It's definitely adorable, but also gives off those urban girl vibes. Loved bouncing around in this one all night. Til next time, navy ruffles dress.
Great color, fabric and fit. The ruffles just make a classic silhouette stand out.

Rented this dress for a "cocktail attire" wedding in Cape Cod and loved it. It wasn't too short, and the side frills added a lot to the otherwise boxy dress. Pockets too! Not sure that I'll rush to rent again but was great for a rental!
Wore this to an event where I was receiving an awards. Received so many compliments. Material is sturdy and love the structure and detail of this dress. I will rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress with stand out styling and color
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I took advice from other reviews and sized down. It was very short but I owned it and flaunted the legs that get me through marathons. Nice material and the bows kept their shape beautifully.
Love this dress. Material is heavy and thick. The ruffles hit just right so you dont look frumpy. EXTRA plus - it has pockets

Unique ruffle dress that is great for a formal affair. This stylish dress runs true to size with no stretch to the fabric - I would definitely size up for your backup. I wore an IT size 38 which equals a US size 2. It is great for any cup size with comfortable room in the bust. The dress is straight down throughout the hips and waist and came to about a few inches above the knee. The great thing about this dress is that a standard bra may be worn with this!

This was a last-minute replacement dress. I went in-store day -of and had to try on dresses in stock. I'm a 14, so my choices felt a bit limited (and I recently gained a little weight, so I was feeling down about that). So, I tried on whatever I found in my size, just to see. For that reason only did I pull it off the rack. What a fun surprise! This dress is a little more fashion-forward than I usually go for, and I worried that the side ruffles would accentuate my curves in the wrong way. But, it was SO CUTE! I'm also on the short side, but the dress hit me mid-thigh--perfect! If you are taller, it's probably more mini-length. There's also just enough stretch to move with you and make it a super-comfy wear. I didn't want to send it back!
Super comfortable yet looked elegant. I got many complements! Dress fit true to size, 5'8" 125lbs size 2.

This dress is so cute!! It is a shift dress so it is not fitted, but the color and style is stunning. Received numerous compliments. There is nothing like it. Love the "v" in the front and back details.
I will rent this again, but will size down. Very chic!!!
Too short

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this dress at my brother in laws wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wonderful fabric. Wore this at 22 weeks pregnant in my usual size. I might just have to purchase it!
Great dress, hems have started to fray a little sadly. Runs big, would get a size down next time.
It fit perfectly!

This dress runs big so I sized down 1 size from my usual. It is a straight shift cut which was flattering. Its made of a thick heavy weight scuba-type material which kept its shape all night. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a graduation ceremony. The ruffle is just enough to make it fun but not over the top
links_reviews_text: I think this could be a little short for the taller girls, it hit my thigh just right. Def compliments all body types!

Really enjoyed the dress, it's roomy and boxy which is great if you're going out for your birthday dinner! The ruffles are a really fun detail and it sets it apart… The material is heavy and strong and it keeps its shape, and more importanlt, the ruffles keep their shape all night long. I really liked it.

I love this dress. It was super comfy to wear. I got a larger size because I am over 6 feet in heels and I wore the dress with heels. It was super baggy and still short but it worked well. It was a super fun look and I got tons of compliments. Adore this dress!

links_reviews_title: The wedding was fabulous but I did not wear this dress - too boxy even though really cute
links_reviews_text: It is pretty much true to size, I could wear a 38 or a 40 but it is boxy so but for the legs, not a flattering piece.

links_reviews_title: It is a cute dress, but ended up not wearing it because it just didn't fit as well as on the model.
links_reviews_text: A little boxy amd material was very thick. The length wasn't as short either, and it fell in a funny place. Ended up not wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Loved it Flirty and Fun, great fabric
links_reviews_text: love the shift style, perfect length

I was worried about the side ruffles since I'm petite, but I loved the dress. The fabric was so thick and comfortable and was perfect for a night of dancing. The dress was a little longer than mid-thigh since I'm short. I wore a large statement necklace which finished the look. The pockets were the perfect addition.

This dress was perfect for a daytime event with nude pumps. The v-neck is fairly high, so cleavage is minimal. It was worn as-is, but in chillier temps or a more conservative environment, it would be just cute with a button-down underneath. Or could be dressed up with fancy shoes. Fabric is beautiful, as are the ruffle details--many compliments!

I got this for a boots and ballgowns gala but ended up wearing a dress I already owned instead. The neck/shoulder cut was a simple tank, not cut in like on the model. It was lightweight and unlined and didn’t feel formal, even if it photographs more formal. It was a wider cut at the waist and the pintucks for the bust were too high for me. I think this would work better on more petite figures, it just wasn’t as flattering as I hoped.

links_reviews_title: Fun festive holiday dress without being too "Christmasy"
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, the polka dots were fun but not over the top, I fit right in at an upscale work Christmas party! The pockets were a lifesaver & didn't make my hips look wider, even with my phone inside. As others have said the top runs small/tight, but I was not uncomfortable & the fit on the rest was so good that I could tolerate it. I was glad to be able to wear regular undergarments & stand out without being flashy. Received many compliments, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! I also felt very comfortable and confident.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Loved the length.

I went with the backup size because the six (normal size) was SO fitted that I was afraid on the 90+ deg day I’d be miserable. The 8 was just the slightest bit looser so I went with that for comfort. Definitely size up for your backup.

The dress was comfortable. It had pockets which I loved because you could put stuff in the pockets and it wasn’t visible. It’s a very light dress, tight on the top. So if you are really busty it may not work for you:))

links_reviews_title: Last minute rental worked out great!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Wore it for a gala for my husband's office and it was perfect. The metallic dots dressed it up just enough. Fits true to size although the 6 was a little snug on top so I wore the 8. Pockets are always a plus and I was able to wear regular bra.

This dress was really pretty and photographed even better! It's just the right amount of fun on a classy cut dress. The 2 fit perfect and i didn't need to wear a bra! Slightly snug in the armpit area but nothing I couldn't handle. The 4 was definitely loose even if I put a bra on. Loved this and would consider renting again.

links_reviews_title: The silver and gold highlights were perfect for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fitted torso and longer length.
The photos don't do the fabric justice, silver and gold metallic polka dots, but very understated. Loved it - highly recommend!

Hey ladies, do yourself a favor and rent this gorgeous dress with pockets! This dress is extremely flattering. Fits TTS. I'm normally a 6/8 in day to day clothes, but a 10 in dresses. The alternating silver and gold polka dots were super cute. This dress is fun and playful, but also very elegant.

I rented this dress to wear to a outdoor party in Florida in May. I was worried it was going to be too hot but this dress was seriously the perfect weight. Pictures are deceiving. It's light & airy & I was comfortable all night. There is ZERO stretch in this dress so I would suggest sizing up in your 2nd size if you can. Great dress for many occasions. I'd definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and made the wedding so much fun. I received a lot of compliments,
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and the pockets were awesome. I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, and loved the pockets!
links_reviews_text: True to size
I wore this as a rented bridesmaid dress and it was much more special than you average bridesmaid dress. I don't think the high-low hem was as dramatic as in the pictures but the fit was great.
Loved this dress for my work holiday party! The pockets were my favorite part!

The dress looked beautiful and I️ received compliments from strangers. A warning however... this dress has no give. I️ usually wear an 8 but needed the 10 for the bust. Even with Spanx the 10 was extremely tight. Could have used a 12. I'm a 36 D/DD so that always seems to be an issue.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flattering cocktail dress for fancy occasion
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friend's evening wedding and cocktail party. Of all the dresses I've rented thus far on Rent the Runway, this was my favorite! It was fancy and flattering, and you can go gold or silver with jewelry and shoes, or mix them up since both are in the dress. I got lots of compliments. I normally wear an 8, but ended up wearing the 10 because the smaller size was tight in the chest area. With the empire waistline and high-low, flirty skirt, I'll bet this dress is flattering on everyone.

LOVED this dress and received so many compliments. I rented for work and it was perfect. The arm holes and chest runs small IMO - I typically wear a 4 but sized up based on reviews and glad I did for those two areas. Other than that very comfortable and I would definitely rent again - one of my favorite rentals for work.

I love everything about this dress. It's so comfortable. It has pockets. The color would look good with most complexions. The sparkles silver & gold dots make this dress edgier than it would be otherwise. The high/low hem is darling. I get so many compliments when I wear this dress!

The fit & flare is very flattering for a short body (and short torso). Plus it has pockets!! But the real showstopper is the metallic print - it looks subtle online but really sparkles in person. Would buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for conference in New Orleans - super comfy in humidity!
links_reviews_text: I rented this in a size 6 for a conference in New Orleans and was worried I would be too hot. The fabric is light and breathable - and this dress has pockets! I'm surprised by how much I like this dress - Id definitely wear this again!

Such a cute Shoshanna dress! This style ran true to size and I would size up for your back up as the fabric has no stretch. It is fitted at the natural waist and flared at the bottom allowing comfortable room at the hips. It is best for A-C cup sizes and you can wear a standard bra. At 5"10" the front of the dress hits above my knees and the back is behind the knees. It is a great option for work-to-night or a party! Also, it has pockets!!
I ordered this for a 2pm wedding. I also wore it to work with a button up underneath. I loved it for work more than for the wedding.

links_reviews_title: Overall it was a very comfortable dress for a big night!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a holiday party. If you are pear shaped it looks wider than it is due to the pockets but would definitely rent again as I received many compliments.

This dress felt like a lightweight but structured cotton. It was fun and flirty without being revealing or constricting. I had a 10 week baby bump just starting to pop out and this was flattering and comfortable. I got so many complements at the holiday party we attended!

Beautiful dress! I was lucky enough to get a last minute appointment at the new RTR location in San Francisco. The stylist chose this dress for me, wasn't sure about it on the hanger but fell in love once I put it on! The fit is very flattering, I wore this to an office Christmas party and received a ton of compliments. I have a smaller chest and didn't have any issues with snugness, however if you're on the bustier side you may want to go up a size as there isn't much give in the bodice. Would definitely rent again!
Great dress and tons of compliments. Perfect dress for holiday party.
Shoshanna is a genius! Accentuated to positive and hid the trouble areas for a pear shaped lady. Feeling beautiful at a high school reunion is no small feat!

links_reviews_title: Incredible experience wearing this to a holiday party! Extra points for the pockets
links_reviews_text: I ordered one size up just in case it first one didn't fit but didn't end up needing it. This dress is roomy and still manages to fit on my body well. I love the shorter cut in the front, which accentuated my legs. Highly recommend this dress for women on the taller end as my tail did snag a little whenever I was standing up/sitting down.

For true to size. So comfortable. Pockets! The high low detail was awesome. I was nervous because at first glance the dress does look more cotton-based, but the metallic polka dots balanced it out. Wore with silver heels and pearls and it was a hit!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, love the pockets and flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: A little tight around my tummy.

links_reviews_title: I would BUY this dress...it's PERFECT. Just the right mix of pulled together but playful. LOVE!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Perfect light, almost crinkly material with lining. The high-low cut is playful while the neckline is conservative. Bra strap ties give it extra points. And did I mention POCKETS?!

links_reviews_title: First choice dress. Ended up not wearing.
links_reviews_text: This was my first choice dress, however I ended up not wearing it because my back up dress was so lovely. I will share the fit details, which were what really made me wear the back up dress. I'm short, 5'0". This dress hit me right at the knees in the front and halfway down my calves in the back. Which is exactly the wrong length for me as it makes me look even shorter than I am. The top half fit very well. But I would recommend this for taller women, or for women who prefer a more modest length on their dresses.

I loved this dress so much I rented it twice (will probably rent again because I still haven't gotten a good picture in it). It is such a great fit and the cut of the sleeves is very flattering. Loved the pockets (of course) and it's a fun pattern without overdoing it.
Size 2 was too large on me, the pleats in the front poofed oddly and the material was thick and heavy. It seemed too formal somehow for cocktail attire.
I loved this dress- such a cute and comfortable piece for work. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a formal work event!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and pockets were a great touch. Conservative enough for a work event but fun and flirty. Runs small in the bust area but I am flat-chested so it worked

links_reviews_title: This dress was a great rental for an outdoor/indoor September cocktail attire wedding in PA.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and fabric wasn't heavy as this style can be sometimes. I didn't realize how metallic the polka dots were, but it worked!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Top was a little snug in shoulders
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress. The top was a little snug fitting but tolerable.
Excellent structure, beautifully flattering cut and fun metallic print made this dress stand out against the crowd. Loved the fit and pockets!

links_reviews_title: I am 5'5" and weigh 119 - size 2 was perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: This was a great holiday choice. I ordered a 2 and it fit like it was made for me. The only complaint was the zipper...it took some fancy maneuvers to get it zipped. It seemed to get stuck right in the middle.

I got this dress in size 6 and 8, which are the two sizes I usually get. I wore the 8 because the 6 was too small up top. even the 8 was a little tight for my chest but it wasn't a deal breaker or anything like that, and I preferred a little tighter than looser. I am always afraid the dress will slip, but this one didn't. the red was a beautiful, rich jewel tone color, and it was a flattering fit. I got a ton of compliments :) the zipper stuck a little but nothing too difficult to deal with. I steamed the dress before wearing it and it unwrinkled easily. I'd rent it again if I was in a pinch. #wedding #glam

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly. However, there is very little stretch so you might want to order two sizes just in case. It was fun, and the flounce at the bottom gave the dress a little something extra! I would definitely rent this dress again.

Ok, I confess: the dress was too small. But i could clip the fastener in back and left it open and it actually looked like it was meant to be that way. Know that the sleeves are built specifically so that you can't nudge them up on your shoulders at all. But this construction also holds them in place nicely so you're not tugging and adjusting all night. The fabric is heavy & great quality.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress to wear to a holiday party. Right color and just dressy enough but no too
links_reviews_text: This dress runs to to size. I'm long waisted and this style is perfect for that body type. The fabric also has a little stretch so that's was perfect as well. I have some curves and the fit was just right. I got a ton of compliments for it - - holiday party hit!

This was a cute dress but it felt a little snug to me. I'm sure it was because Thanksgiving was just a few days prior! Anyway the skirt is very swingy and fun and the neckline is quite flattering. However in exchange for the cute neckline and exposed shoulders, I couldn't raise my arms past my ears. The material in the arm area is not elastic or stretchy so there is zero give. If you can manage around that (someone around to zip and unzip the dress, reach for things on high shelves, etc) then you're good to go.

I wore this dress to a fundraiser where the dress code was cocktail attire. I felt amazing and it was classy and fun. The color is perfect for Fall/Winter. The bold color was enough to make me stand out in a sea of LBD.

Lovely thick material with a built in corset, but the sizing seems to run on the larger side (I normally wear a US size 0/IT 36, and I wore 0), or the dress is made for a taller woman than me (I'm 5'2''). Sleeves were long, and both the waist and hip areas seemed to run a bit wide. The skirt section felt needlessly volumtious, and the slight high/low hemline just emphsized that fact. This dress would be a good fit for someone curvier and taller.

Off the shoulder dress is just what I wanted for a fun look and this dress delivered! Running a bit small, we recommend going one size up for backup. With room in the bust this dress is great for all cup sizes. The midsection is fitted to show off your curves, but it is still comfortable. If you’re curvier, you may want to consider sizing up due to the fitted hip area. One thing that I love about this dress is the off the shoulder feature; however that means you would have to wear a NuBra or strapless bra for this look. The long sleeve and off the shoulder feature make this dress super flattering. This dress is perfect for weddings and holidays. It would look best with black heels and accessories.
Size runs small. I sized up to 6, which fit, but it wasn't as comfortable as a different dress I rented. The swooshiness of the skirt was fun, though.

This dress is super classy. It was slightly too tight across the back of my shoulders but I have very broad muscular shoulders/back. It fit like a glove everywhere else. Zipper was a little sticky at the seams so I had to have help zipping it up- which would have been a problem since I wore shapewear, I would not have been able to go to the bathroom without help. I ended up not wearing this one because it was my backup dress but it was a close second for this very swanky Holiday party I attend every year.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful dress for a Fall or Winter party.
links_reviews_text: This dress worked well for my husband's work holiday party. It has nice, thick fabric for cold weather and the color is a very pretty deep red. I usually wear a 6 and it fit. Was a bit snug around the hips (I am quite pear-shaped), but it worked. I would size up for your second size, just to be safe.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and flattering but runs small
links_reviews_text: I would size up for this dress

links_reviews_title: Could be cuter if your proportions fit the dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress had everything I wanted but the proportions were off, the arms were too tight, and the bum portion was too tight, but the waist and bust part were slightly loose. It also has a kind of high low thing kinda going on which I didn't love. If you have more ruler like proportions it will likely fit you a little better
This was a very young dress and bunched in all the wrong places (I'm typically a size 6)
A bit tight on the ribcage. Beautiful color.
Wore this to my fall rehearsal dinner in late October. It was perfect, fit like a glove, gorgeous color and fabric, comfy, tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Best Dress at the Party - hands down
links_reviews_text: Outdoor cocktail party and networking event -- this was my secret weapon. It is flattering as can be on a proper waist and does not hit your knees too high. The slightly lower hemline in the back was flattering on a slightly curvy frame. This dress is perfect for showing off your collarbone game and this color was beautiful day and night. I wish I could keep it.

links_reviews_title: Runs small - if there was a size-up, I would reorder it!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, this runs super small and getting the zipper up over the seam is difficult. We got it zipped, but as soon as I bent over to buckle the ankle straps on my heels, the zipper pulled apart and I couldn't wear it. For such a structured and fitted dress, the zipper was flimsy and plastic. The cut of the dress and the red color were beautiful, though. If they had a size up, I would re-order it!
Great fit, I wear a 8-12 depending on the designer. Wore a 12 with this and it was perfect- I wouldn't suggest wearing it too tight. Would rent again.
Gorgeous neckline, true to size, but a little uncomfortable due to the boning in the dress. Great color for fall or winter!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, too tight in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: I wasn't able to wear the 4 as it didn't fit across the bust. Plenty of room in the hips and waist and a lovely material and high quality. If I had sized up to a 6 it would have been perfect!

links_reviews_title: Hard to fit into this dress-I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: I was hoping to wear this dress for Thanksgiving and learned a hard lesson-try on your dresses as SOON as they arrive! I waited until a couple days before Thanksgiving to try it on and was disappointed that I could in no way get it zipped up. I either wear an 8 or a 10 and had ordered a 10 in this dress, but it is super tight around the shoulders with no give. I do work out, but am by no means a body builder and my shoulders were way to broad for this dress. It was listed under the hourglass feed but I think it will fit a straight and narrow or pear type much better.

links_reviews_title: Sadly, I had to wear a different dress for this event.
links_reviews_text: I wanted so badly to be able to wear this dress, but even the larger size I ordered was so small that I couldn't zip it up. The dress itself is, however, quite beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful burgundy color but runs small
links_reviews_text: Dress runs very small. I am usually between an 8-10 and I would probably need a size 12 in this. The sleeves are tight.
I absolutely loved this dress! It is classy but sexy. Very comfortable. Rent this!

I wore this dress to a small New Year's Eve get together followed by bowling later at night. Received tons of compliments, and even a comment about how classy the look was. This dress would normally be too "high school prom" for my taste, but I rented it anyway and am so happy I did. I'm between an xs/s and the xs fit great. Didn't even have to try on the second size. Rent this dress and prepare to turn heads!

links_reviews_title: Easy, fun, classic dress perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress was very thick, maybe even wool, that was perfect for a fall wedding. I wore fun, black tassel earrings, a tortoise shell headband, and a leopard print fuzzy coat and got TONS of compliments. Easy and fun to dance in. I usually avoid bell sleeves because they can make eating difficult. These sleeves are a really interesting cut that didn't give me any trouble and were beautiful. I'm 5'4", 125lbs, pear shape, and the small was perfect.

Wore this dress on a trip to NY and got several compliments. Love the color and length, and it was very comfortable because it has a lot of stretch, but the top is pretty tight, so it could be a bit unflattering if you have a bigger chest.

links_reviews_title: Backup dress, but would rent again as first pick
links_reviews_text: I hover between a 4 and 6, depends on designer. Medium still had a little room in waist but was fitted at chest. Really liked the weight of the fabric. Looks even better in person. Seems pretty comfy. This was my backup dress, didn't need it after all, but I'd rent it again.
This dress was a standout in a sea of black dresses! It fits true to size. The fabric is a bit heavy, but it holds its shape without wrinkling. I got tons of compliments.
This dress was fun! The fabric is very thick and heavy.

I love this feminine style! Running true to size, we recommend getting your usual size as your primary and going up one size for the backup size. There is comfortable room throughout the midsection and comfortable room in the hips. This dress is great for any cup size and can be worn with a strapless bra. In regards to length, this dress hit me right above the knee. I love this color and the off the shoulder style with the bell sleeves. I would pair this style with either black or nude heels, delicate simple jewelry and a small handbag.
This was a perfect dress for a New Years Eve party. I got a ton of compliments. The one strap kept coming off the shoulder but it was still a great dress and I would for sure rent it again!

The dress runs larger than expected. I wore the medium rather than the large. I am a size 8. At times the straps would slip down. The material is a smooth fit and arrives unwrinkled. Strapless bra hides well underneath. Beautiful dress!

Dress has lots of stretch and runs true to size. I am thicker in the waist area and this dress hides the tummy well by not being tight in the waist. Spaghetti straps do not like to stay in place so if you are going to be taking alot of photos, you will need to adjust the straps. Otherwise loved this dress!
Looks great in photos! A bit uncomfortable but nice fabric, true to size and hot! Loved it

links_reviews_title: The color was great. I am pear shaped.
Great high-quality dress in beautiful RED!
links_reviews_text: Looked great, very flattering. Sleeves not practical but looked nice. Don't wear this dress if you are having to cook/serve food as it's a little tricky.

This dress is the perfect amount of sexy, yet conservative. It has high quality, forgiving fabric that will be flattering on any body type. Highly recommend! I'm typically a large but unfortunately a large was not available, so I had to choose a medium and XL as back up. The medium was snug and short (I'm 6'0"), but still worked great. The XL looked like a curtain. Moral of the story- get your extra dress a size down, not up.

I rented this as a backup option for an Atlantic City weekend. I didn't end up wearing it out of practicality (the sleeves would have gotten in the way while playing card games), but overall the fit on my body was great. I did notice some awkwardness along the shoulders with the smaller straps, as others mentioned, but it could have been easily remedied with fashion tape. The dress itself still felt sturdy and made of a thick, quality fabric. The color is also perfectly bold! A classy, fun twist on the classic red dress vibe.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for NYE and it was a perfect selection
links_reviews_text: Great fit- Great fabric. It was a bit loose on the shoulder straps but I attribute that to me being short. This was my first experience with RTR and I was very pleased!

links_reviews_title: Sleeves are quite flattering, so is overall cut of dress.
links_reviews_text: I rented for a New Year’s Eve bash at Opryland in Nashville, good fit, flattering and while short - not too short. The lining was a little off, but wearable.
Rented this to wear for Christmas but couldn't wear. Beautiful color and structured fabric but fit is not flattering for petites. Avoid if you have a belly or wide hips.
It was too large on me I would like to try a small
Didn't end up wearing. Was too fancy for the wedding I was attending.

links_reviews_title: I picked it as a back up. I chose not to wear as the other one was more comfortable
links_reviews_text: Was fitted in the stomach, would have required spanx. Sexy- well made dress

links_reviews_title: Loved it except slightly too big
links_reviews_text: Ahh I wanted to love this so much, but it was slightly too big. I'm usually a 6 so ordered the medium and I definitely need a small. I love the thicker fabric and length, but there was extra material that bunched up in the back middle area and around the shoulders. I have a large chest and it fit fine there so hopefully the small won't be too tight in the chest. This still had the tags on! I'll be renting again in a size small with my next unlimited order!

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately I didn't make the event so I didn't get to wear the dress :(
links_reviews_text: This dress is quite heavy - I believe it is a wool of some sort. It is beautiful but I am only 5'2" and a little busty so going up a size made the dress too long for me and the arms way too long.
We had a home date as it's time to shelter in place. We made the most of it and I was so happy to have this dress.
Loved it, best choice .
I could have gone a size up because the dress was a bit tight in the torso area. I loved the flare of the drop "sleeve". The color was impeccable as well. I also rented the purse from RTR.

links_reviews_title: Stylish and comfortable dress for fiancés graduation ceremony and dinner!
links_reviews_text: Pros: the color is beautiful and it fit perfectly in every area. My measurements are 36.5 bust, 28 waist and 38 hip. Height is 5'4". I hope this helps someone because I was very indecisive in choosing between size 4 and 6. Size 4 ended up fitting me perfectly! Cons- the zipper is really hard to pull up in the back. It's one of those hard zippers.Thankfully my mom and sister were able to work together to pull it up. The other con I can think of is that the fabric was a little thinner than I expected considering the price and brand. The positive about this fabric though is that it has room for stretching.

I can definitely see this dress becoming a majorly popular rental, because it was so well-priced for such a unique high-quality dress. I rented my usual size and sized up for my backup, ended up wearing the larger size to have extra room in the hips/stomach. I wasn't sure how the bra situation would turn out, due to the stylist recommendation to wear a Nu Bra or no bra. However, I was able to wear my standard strapless bra with no fashion taping or pinning. Got tons of compliments and highly recommend!

This is definitely a traditional sheath fit, which I loved because it is very flattering on my straight figure. This does run small, I typically wear a 6 and ended up wearing the 10. The color is more berry than the true red that the photo shows. I received so many compliments all night long and felt amazing in this dress. Would definitely recommend!
Great color

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Runs true to size
links_reviews_text: My first RTR dress and I loved it! I wore this to an engagement party. I ordered up and got a size 6. A little baggy around my waist but still looked super cute. Probably would have looked more tailored with the size 4. The zipper on my dress jammed at a certain spot but I could still get the zipper up. Tons of compliments the moment I walked in. My measurements are 34-27-41 if that helps.

I loved everything about this dress. The color was the perfect shade of red and made me look so tan. The built in belt gave me a great waist. The off the shoulder sleeves still allowed for full arm movement. I would definitely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: This dress got a lot of compliments. Perfect dress for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: I’m usually a 4 but this dress looked better in a 6, I needed the extra room in the hips and because of the cut, that didn’t make the waist too big (like it might for other dresses). This dress flatter an hourglass and would help give the appearence of an hourglass on any body type. Really fun and comfortable summer fancy dress.

I love this trendy dress by Rachel Zoe! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. This dress is tight (very firmly and closely fitted). It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’6”, the length hit knee length on me. The piece is ideal for a formal affair or cocktail occasion. It's fun and flirty, but also mature and means business. The dress is a statement enough, so don't over accessorize.

After my first dress was a poor fit for the wedding. I was able to go to the RTR NYC store and the wonderful ladies there helped me find this dress. It was a wonderful fit and I received many compliments The material has some stretch but it's not lined so everything will show.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a my girls night birthday dinner!
links_reviews_text: Slim fit, but so fun and flattering!
Loved the fit and style of this dress! It was perfect for a nice evening out.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an August hotel wedding. Received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, easy to move and dance. The material is not too thick but just the right amount, don't really need any special undergarments at all.
I rented this for a wedding. The top part was too big in size and also too over the top of the event I had rented if for
Lots of compliments on this one!

This dress was perfect! I wish I could have bought it! It ran about a size-2 sizes small for me. I’m 5’8 and typically wear an 8 or sometimes 10 and I needed a 12. I got so many compliments on it! The quality was amazing. Highly recommended this dress!
Lovely color, and very flattering

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress because I did not like how it fit.
links_reviews_text: I wore a different dress because the fit of this one felt odd. The shoulders were weird, therefore I wore a different dress.

Rented last minute for a cocktail party with a fun and colorful theme. Received many compliments. I would size up if you have a bust. I ended up not wearing a bra with this because the dress didn't really fit with the extra fabric from my bra. It's VERY fitted if you are hourglass shaped.
So cute! Very comfortable and flattering!
The dress is super cute but I gain too a little fat after pregnancy so..
Fun dress is a bold color. Great fit and style!

links_reviews_title: Cute color pop in a friend's wedding
links_reviews_text: This was an amazing dress to wear to a wedding. Felt amazing dancing in it! Except maybe difficult to raise arms super high. But I got tons of compliments.
I loved this dress. Perfect fit for my frame. Flirty ruffles perfect for dancing the night away. I loved the off shoulder ruffles.

I originally rented this for a wedding but ended up going with a differently dress. The material is great and the sleeves/ straps on this dress are a gorgeous feature but I ended up wearing a different dress simply because it's tight around the stomach area and I prefer a looser fit. I think this dress is perfect for a destination wedding and will probably give it another try later!
Not a normal Rachel Zoe fit.
Comfortable and with pockets. I felt elegant.

links_reviews_title: Professor Plum Clue Dinner Party: Fit and Flare Perfection-so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for the event! Clue dinner party (professor plum). I'm 5'4 130lbs and rented the 6& 8. Wore the 6, but was a bit snug at the tummy after we ate so wished I'd gone with the 8. The pockets are legit-kept my IPhone 8+ no problem. Complements all night from my lady friends and bonus! My other half loved it! If you're pear shaped this fit is fit and flare perfection.
The perfect fall wedding dress. A bit snug around - had to wear 10 vs. 8 but so many compliments on the style & color.

links_reviews_title: For the first time everyone told me they loved my dress
links_reviews_text: I'm 4'10" and roughly 100lbs and it's always hard finding a dress but this size is true to its size and it fit perfectly and left me enough room even after I bloated from too much food :) the length was just under my knee which was great for the occasion, very professional and very elegant. 10/10 would rent again

links_reviews_title: This dress was great for my brother's garden wedding!
links_reviews_text: Really big fan of this dress, has some shimmer up close but isn't noticeable from a far or "glittery". No stretch in the bust. I barely zipped up into the 4 and it still looked good without the fabric being able to give/stretch. I am a taller girl and it was not too-short by any means. Was a huge hit, I really liked this dress a lot and would highly recommend.

This dress was so much more beautiful in person. It has a slight, but not gaudy simmer to it. It was super comfy and has pockets :). I normally wear a 2, but I decided to wear the 4 this time as it was a bit more forgiving for the food and drink I'd be having that night. The length was just a bit over my knee.

I am 5'8, 135 lbs, 34A bra size. I normally wear a 2/4 and the 2 fit very well. A tad snug above my waist, but not bad. Very comfortable material and I loved the pockets. Got a lot of compliments! Would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a gala event!
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on the bright color. A bit tight on the torso but great everywhere else. Deep v in the back was sharp.

I wore this to a February wedding and received so many compliments! The dress was very comfortable and the perfect length for me. I normally wear a size 2 or 4 and ordered both. The 2 was a little tight in the chest area so I wore the 4. I also loved that it has pockets! I recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Sparkly Dress for an Evening Wedding
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews, I knew that the dress was going to be sparkly, and I actually really liked that about it. It gave it a little something extra. I loved the fit and the pockets. I wore this to a semi-outdoor wedding and paired it with a shawl, tights and pumps. I felt it fit true to size but was tight in the chest area for me.

links_reviews_title: The color was pretty and it made me stand out next to all the black dresses.
links_reviews_text: Overall, it was a nice dress. The zipper was a little tricky but I was able to zip it up. I liked that it had pockets too. I wore a shrug with it since the weather was cold.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a replacement for my original order because it did not fit. Super easy to reorder.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful and the pockets are a bonus! It's pretty tight in the bust. If you are chesty I would consider ordering up a size.

links_reviews_title: The dress was nice but too tight. Did not wear it
links_reviews_text: Dress was nice that it had pockets and would have probably been comfortable but it was too tight up to. Did not wear it.
Fit super well and was long enough for me at 6'1. I was able to wear a strapless bra with no issues. Color was as pictured and I'm so happy I got this dress!

I needed help to zip up the dress and once on it kept moving up from the chest. Very cute though. I would order a bigger size just so that it can fit better on the chest area, otherwise it feels like it's choking you a little bit. Even though I'm very short, the length was great for the work party I wore it for. Would rent again!
Wore this for my company's Christmas party, fit perfect & I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a winter wedding
links_reviews_text: I had to wear the smaller size (8) because the zipper on the other was broken when I received it. It fit, but was tight so I would definitely say it's true to size. I imagine this can be a tight fit for women with larger busts. I have a small bust and it perfectly. I may also caution taller women against this dress. I'm 5'2" and it was the perfect length. As previous borrowers have noted, it's more pink than the model shows but it's beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Loved the high neckline, also loved the “shine” to the pop of color in this dress! Total recommend!!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit amazing, I have a smaller bust and it fit just right. So many compliments and very elegant but fun dress! AND POCKETS :-) !!

links_reviews_title: Website/app is super easy to use. Lots of styles. Quick delivery, easy return.
links_reviews_text: The massive pro was this dress has deep pockets! No need for a purse, it was fantastic. Beautiful material, well made, great flattering style. Only con I had was that the clasp (to hook the top of the dress) was missing. You obviously couldn't tell, and the dress stayed up with the zipper. The zipper was a little difficult, just a bit stiff. Got lots of compliments.
Nice to be able to wear a regular bra. Definitely more purplish than it looks online, but a very pretty color with a sheen and texture.

links_reviews_title: This was my first time using Rent the Runway and I'll definitely be doing it again and again!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and fit of this dress plus the great POCKETS! It was comfortable to dance in as well. The armpits are pretty tight despite the dress fitting well everywhere else so if you typically have trouble with that area of a dress fitting you may want to size up. Overall loved this dress for a wedding!

I had to size up on this one even though I'm a solid 10. The zipper on the 10 was really difficult and we were afraid to break it- but even if it did zip it would have been uncomfortable. I got a lot of compliments on the dress anddddd it has pockets!

I loved the look of this dress online and it was great for a wedding. I'm 5'3" so if a dress is too long it usually makes me look squatty but the flare at the bottom made the length look a lot nicer. Though it was a little snug in the chest area it was overall very comfortable. The color is definitely pretty sparkly and a lot pinker in the light but I still thought it was gorgeous. Overall I loved this dress and thought it was very flattering! For the right occasion I would rent again.
Perfect fit! Pockets for the win! It's definitely a magenta pink color and less purple. Loved the detail at the waistband. Would definitely rent again!
The material was different than expected but it worked. Loved the pockets. It fit a little small in the bust area but the fit was perfect elsewhere.
The 2 fit but the top was very tight. The 4 fit perfectly. The color and texture are gorgeous!
This dress is perfect for a fall event. The color is more purple then burgundy and the dress is very comfortable and true to size. I loved the pockets!

This was my first time using Rent the Runway and I will be back! This dress fit so perfect and the colors were rich and sparkly, the photos don't do it justice. Material is high-quality. Loved it and got a lot of compliments!
Wedding weekend... gorgeous dress
This dress was very comfortable and perfect for a winter wedding. Pretty color as well

links_reviews_title: Great fit and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! It was a little more purple than I initially thought from the pictures, but it looked amazing and I got a ton of compliments all night. The pockets were nice and deep and had plenty of room for my phone, and I was not nervous it would fall out. Best part was that I could wear my normal bra and the straps were covered! I'd definitely rent this again.

Great color! The top is a bit snug so be prepared for that (I have a wider back but smaller chest and it was a bit tight). Also-this dress was shorter on me than I thought it would be. I'm 5'9" and it came mid-thigh and that's shorter than I'm used to. Other than that, love the pockets and the style!

It was a bit scratchier than I expected. There is some glitter on the dress so it was sparklier than I expected. I got a size smaller for my backup since people said it tends to run large but I ended up wearing the 8 which I am normally. I liked that the dress had pockets and I got a bunch of compliments.

I fluctuate between sizes 6 and 8, and the size 8 in this dress fit great! Not too snug but it didn’t look big on me either. Perfect length for a formal event. It also had pockets - definitely a bonus! This dress was comfortable throughout the five hours I wore it, no complaints!
Dress fit great to cover all areas for a work party. Great for people with long torsos also. And I could wear a regular bra. Perfect!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but made me feel old
links_reviews_text: The dress quality, color, and length were perfect. But the cut around the top was too similar to what all the older ladies were wearing. I didn't feel young in it. I did like the iridescent purple color.
So comfortable! And loved the pockets. I have narrow shoulders so luckily the smaller size still fit in the hips. No give to the fabric. Very good quality. Loved this dress! Got many compliments.
Size 6 fit perfectly. Color is a lot brighter than it appears in my pic and the websites pic. Loved the pockets.
Fit perfect!
Perfect for an award night
Nice bold color and pretty simple in the front. The cutouts in the back make this dress special. It's great for the holidays!

I loved the heavier weight of the fabric for a cool night out. The fabric had some stretch to it which made it easy to sit and stand without getting wrinkled. The front is plain, but cut beautifully and the cut outs on the back and elbows are adorable. I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Very warm , perfect for the cold November weather
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit long on me. But overall the fit was perfect! Very comfortable

Loved the little elbow slits and back cutout (smaller than in photos). Great for winter with the sleeves- I wore it with black tights and black booties to make it work appropriate, and got many complements! I am usually a 2 or 4 and the 2 fit well.

I really liked this dress for a nice date night - it's not super flashy, in terms of the cut and styling, but the bright red makes it very eye-catching. I thought it ran a tad big - the sleeves were too long for me, so the elbow slits hit me more below the elbow, and the sleeve cuffs were sort of awkward (but I am short, so this is probably not a problem if you're 5'4 - 5'8). The rest of the dress was comfortable - not tight, not overly loose. I'd say it runs a bit large, in that I was able to put it on without unzipping the lower back part. The length is good, I don't like dresses to run too long since I'm short, and this one hit well above the knee (without being super short, either).

The color of this dress is gorgeous! The open back and cut out detail on the elbows is amazing! I am wearing a size two in the photo and the dress does fit true to size. The dress is fitted throughout my midsection, waist and hips. Even though it is fitted I felt very comfortable in it. I do recommend curvier women going a size up for this backup size. This dress is great for any cup size. I am a 36D and felt very comfortable in the dress. This dress can be worn with a standard bra. I am 5’9” and the dress was mid-thigh length on me. This dress would be great for a summer cocktail party or special event. Pair with black heels and big earrings.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Just what I was looking for and RTR came to the rescue!!
links_reviews_text: This was an amazing dress for my dad's wedding reception. The dress was true to size and wasn't as short as the picture on the website. I received so many compliments. Overall I was pleased with this dress. I was so disappointed I had to return both the dress and the necklace. Will definitely rent it again.
Fun little red dress! This dress has a great classic shape with updates in the back and sleeves. It runs true to size and the material provides room for movement. Can be worn with a standard bra.

links_reviews_title: Structured dress with pop of color
links_reviews_text: I was afraid this dress would be better suited for winter / Christmas but it was perfect for my May art event. The material held its structure without wrinkling when sitting. The length was perfect for the event - short but not alarmingly so (I'm 5'6"). The color was awesome! I wore with nude/clear shoes and an army green purse.

I rented this for work to dinner/date. I wore it on Valentine's Day and got tons of compliments. I originally ordered a 4 but returned for a 2 with my unlimited because the 4 just didn't offer much in terms of shape. I am fairly tall and it was somewhat short, but with tights underneath and booties it was still work appropriate. The cutout details on the back along with the bright color make it sexy and fun even though the overall shape is pretty modest.
This dress didn't fit well. It was very boxy and not flattering at all.

links_reviews_title: wore it to work with a blazer on top then to dinner with husband
links_reviews_text: loved this dress. Great orange-y color and flattering fit. the backslit adds a perfect pop of excitement without being overly revealing.

links_reviews_title: The dress is very fashionable and the color is absolutely gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: This beautiful dress fits true to size. I wore it on a photoshoot and the color is just amazing. I would definitely rent this again for an event or a night out. It's a stunner!
Would have been better if length was shorter and sleeves were shorter. Very heavy fabric, so be aware before renting for an outdoor event. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress is well made, and very cute. The red is vibrant. Heavy material.
links_reviews_text: The material is heavy, and you can get hot in this dress. Definitely for fall or winter. I like the cut outs on the elbow and back. The cut out on the back is very cute. I ordered a zero and I usually wear a 0-2 and it was alittle boxy. It did not hug my waist enough.
This dress just kind of swallowed me, didn't wear. It's also not as short as in the picture, with it being pretty loose I think it would look better on someone taller or if it was hemmed a few inches

links_reviews_title: It was a very fun dress to wear. and I received many complements.
links_reviews_text: True to size. great color
I wore this dress to my dad's 20th Pastoral Anniversary celebration. This dress is so pretty and was perfect for the occasion. I got a lot of compliments. I enjoyed this rental.
Nice dress Well-made. No complaints, however didn't fall in love with the dress. A little long in length.

I loved this simple but sophisticated dress. The fabric feels wonderful and it is incredibly flattering on a curvy body. I paired it with big sparkling statement earrings and felt like the belle of the ball.
Great color and fit. Length was more midi than knee length. Seemed to be missing a belt so I added my own. Would rent this dress again.
Dress was a little longer than I was expecting, about ankle length in the back (I'm 5'6"). Otherwise, it fit perfectly. The ruffles were so fun to twirl in!
Great cut, color and fabric

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to my cousins wedding, and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: For a pear shape, the top was a little loose, but it had a nice fluttering drape and the fabric was a beautiful deep blue. Such a great dress, would for sure wear again!
Nice fabric
The fabric of this dress was gorgeous. I found it unforgiving & would have needed spanx under it. I really didn’t like the length on my 5’6” frame.

links_reviews_title: Great rental for a formal party!
links_reviews_text: I loved it. It runs a bit small, I normally wear an 8 or a Medium, and had to wear the large. The color is a bit brighter in person, but it's even better than the photos, being more of a blue/grey. The fabric is silky, and was cool to be in all night. The dress is a bit on the long-ish side, falling a bit below my knees. Considering renting again for a future occasion!
I really liked this dress. The M was a little loose on top for my A cups but otherwise it was a fun dress that packed well.

links_reviews_title: This was a beautiful dress, but wish I it fit.
links_reviews_text: Could not wear. I'm a 4 petite, and this was a regular. Fits very narrow. But a gorgeous dress.
LOVE this dress! Fits perfectly, very comfortable, great color, great movement on the dance floor. Received TONS of compliments.
Couldn't wear due to loose fit
Fit perfectly. Wore it to a work event and received lots of compliments. Considering buying it!
Love the flounce of this dress - truly fun to wear. Neckline and armhole cut are super flattering.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a charity event.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a perfect fit. It looked great and was very comfortable.
Great dress! Cutouts are sexy but not revealing! Fabric is thick- but not hot... I wouldn't rent for a summer daytime but nighttime would work.
The dress fit perfectly. Super comfortable and flattering. True to size, the cutouts were killer! Got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress! Maid of honor & bachelorette dinner
links_reviews_text: Super flattering Deep green Tons of compliments Pockets! Amazingly comfortable

I loved this dress. The material was on the thicker side so with my chest on the smaller side I didn't need a bra. It was just an overall comfortable dress to wear. It hugged in a the right places. I will definitely be renting this dress again

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable! Perfect length and just the perfect coverage to make this dress fun and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Love the cutouts and the fact that the dress has pockets, I could put my phone in my pocket and you couldn't even tell it was in there!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress with pockets and a hint of sexy.
links_reviews_text: I rented the jumpsuit version of this dress, so I knew I would love it! Flattering cut, length was perfect. I wish it came in more colors. Many compliments, everyone wanted to kmow where I got this dress. I would rent again!
I got so many compliments on this dress! Very edgy, Great structure and beautiful color. Felt like a rockstar.

links_reviews_title: I went to my schools athlete formal in this dress. While I dressed up clearly my date did not lol
links_reviews_text: My dress was a hit. Everyone loved it and the cut outs where the perfect amount of skin showing. The material is very stiff but you can still move around in it. The length is perfect for a more casual night out but is still classy enough to dress up. The only bad part is that if you are not tan in some areas, you can clearly tell.

I picked the 2 because it was the only one available but definitely think the 4 would have been perfect not so snug. I liked the dress, my boyfriend liked it even more. I'd say the dress is pretty true to size.

links_reviews_title: Love the green & the fun cutouts !
links_reviews_text: This dress was really fun , Runs large though . Very thick fabric - so not the best for an extremely hot day . Great color

links_reviews_title: Love love love! Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and style for my birthday! I love the cut outs and the quality was amazing! Wish I could keep the dress!

Loved the thickness of the material which was still lightweight enough for a Mexico wedding. It laid great on my body and I didn't have to worry about the dress skirt flying up. I felt very sexy and everyone loved the dress. Color is great as well!

This dress is really well made. I wore it to a party which took place in a tent outside. The material is thick and the dress is lined. I didn't need to wear a bra and I'm a 32DD. I have a pretty athletic build and felt that the dress fit me really well, even if it was a 0. I'm 5'0 and the dress hit me right above the knee. The best part? POCKETS! They don't bulge out or anything. I would definitely rent again.
Excellent fit. Lots of compliments.

I absolutely love this dress! I wore it for a formal charity event. This was my first RTR and it was excellent! The dress was so comfortable, you can wear a normal bra with it, and the fabric is forgiving. I loved the cut out. I felt like it gave the dress some flare without showing too much skin. I typically run between a 10-12 so I got both sizes and ended up in the 12. The 10 fit well but the 12 was just more comfortable. I'm also always weary of shorter dresses ending up being too short as I'm tall but this one was the perfect length on me. Also, the color is hard to photograph but this picture was the most accurate. It's a dark hunter green but can appear dark teal in photos or even black. Wish I had this hanging in my closet still!

links_reviews_title: Everything About This Dress is Perfect!
links_reviews_text: This is probably one of my favorite RTR purchases. The fit, length, color, and material were perfect. I wore a sticky bra, and the 2 was true to size! The cutouts added nice detail, and I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: So comfy and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Fit was super comfy and flattering. I was able to wear a normal bra which was a huge perk. I ended up wearing the smaller of the two that I ordered but either probably would've worked if I'd wanted to skirt to be longer/more full. Overall, loved the dress

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress! Perfect for my semi-formal, got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress perfectly, true to size! It is made out of a thick material so you don't have to wear a bra with it if you don't want to. The color photographs beautifully and the length was just right! Sad I couldn't keep this dress in my closet.

One of my favorite rentals I think! It has pockets (YES) and fit me perfect. I typically have to go up a size for most of my dresses, but this one fit true to size with the 10. I didn't even try on the 12. A bit longer than I anticipated, hitting a few inches above the knees, but it didn't bother me like it usually might because the top had so much interest. I wore a normal black demi bra with no issues - you couldn't see it really. It hid my trouble area (midsection) very well and the fabric was thicker but I think would work well for any time of the year. This dress made me feel confident and beautiful and I would highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Rented for our vacation to Las Vegas perfect for dinner & a show!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, it was true to size. Cut outs are in the perfect places, I felt stylish but not uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my 20 year high school reunion that was held in a banquet hall.
links_reviews_text: I probably teeter between a size 6 and an 8 and the size 6 fit perfectly. I didn't have to wear a bra and I was very comfortable all night. The material is a bit thicker than you would expect and it was nice to have "coverage" and not be see through or thin. It is a dark dark green color, but looks black. I wore gold jewelry and black heels. I love this dress.

Absolutely loved this dress! My apologies for the flowers blocking the second cut out. This dress fit like a glove - I rented it for my farewell/birthday party prior to moving and got compliments all night. I fit into both the 4 and 6 but opted for the 6 with a night was eating, drinking and dancing. The color is beautiful in person and the fabric is thick and fabulous. Strapless or regular bra will work however I went without since the m material is thick and supportive. I am 5'9" and the length was perfect for a going out/cocktail dress. Highly recommend. Will 100% rent again!

links_reviews_title: I am obsessed with this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautiful! I loved the color. It was true to size and so comfortable. I was able to wear a normal bra, which is an added bonus! I received SO many compliments. I will definitely rent this dress again!
Fit was amazing and very flattering. Ran true to size. Sexy and classy!

Wore for date. Glad I went a size down.... in usually between a 2 and a 4 and I went with the 2 and it was plenty roomy. Comfortable. Amazing fit. Looked awesome. Color was perfect. The picture really doesn't do it justice. Would look good on lots of body times... can hide many flaws. Very happy and almost bought it!!!

Loved the cut outs on this dress and the fabulous shade of green! I paired it with simple gold earrings and a geometric cuff. The Louboutin Marlena rocks are the perfect complement to this dress the strap crossover on top of my foot perfectly complemented the cutout design in the dress and the black added to the look! Highly recommend looking for shoes with a similar crossover pattern :) Love love loved this dress!

Loved this dress-- fit a little snugger than expected, but still fairly true to size. I'm about 5'4" and thought the length was good (it's supposed to be short). Dress has a fairly typical a-line cut, but the pockets are a nice touch. Also, I'm about a 34D-36D and thought the top fit perfectly. Would definitely rent again!
Perfect fit! This dress is amazing! I wore a sticky bra so I could adjust where the strap in front crossed. Normal bra showed.

links_reviews_title: Dress was a great fit, arrived in perfect condition, RTR knocked it out of the park once again!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and the material was a bit heavier than I expected keeping the skirt from flying up and keeping the cut outs where they belong. The pockets felt a bit awkward making me feel wide in the hips, but a received tons of complements.

The perfect dress. I received so many compliments and I was sad to send it back. The fabric is thick enough that some may not need to wear a bra but I did anyway. I wore a gold bracelet and black block heels! I felt so comfortable in it and the cuts were not revealing at all.
I love everything about this dress - the color, the cutouts, the fabric! This was a perfect dress for going out in Vegas!

links_reviews_title: The most flattering cut outs ever!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so great! The cutouts are perfectly placed to make you look HOT! I usually wear a 2 but I took the advice on here and sized down to a zero, it was perfect. I wore a VS bombshell bra it it and it only showed slightly under my arms so I didn't mind. Wear black bra and you'll be fine. The material is thick and smoothing but not to hot for a FL night. I pair it with gold jewelry and black accessories. My husband loved it too!!

Loved this dress rental! With the slim A-line cut, the dress was super flattering, and the cutouts added a special sexy touch. The color is very dark, so it looks almost black in pictures. This dress is a great length for "shorties" like me - it hit a couple inches above the knee.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, and can easily be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. I have now rented it for three very different events including two birthday parties, a New Years eve party. This dress is very versatile and can easily be dressed up or down. The material is heavier and is long enough for tall girls. Love it! Fits like a glove.

Perfect for a date night! Would not wear to a wedding. The cutouts are dramatic, but I did manage to wear a regular bra! The stretchy fabric was forgiving and comfortable. The color was dark and rich which I liked for the night out. Would recommend

links_reviews_title: Super hot and flattering party dress
links_reviews_text: Great balance of sexy and comfortable. I paired with black tights because winter, and it worked but I want to rent again when I can wear without them.

links_reviews_title: I felt great at my 30th birthday!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress to wear for my 30th birthday. The fit was very flattering (I have bigger hips, and it made my top half and waist look tiny). I could have worn either size, but went with the 4 as the top fit a little snugger and looked better without a bra. The cut outs are fun and the bottom was strategically placed at the rib cage area so you didn't need a flat stomach to wear. I would rent again 100%!

Daring cut outs but in a non revealing way (please note I'm an A cup). It's an interesting twist on a basic silhouette that really shines in its day to night versatility. Not totally in love with the color, the teal was kind of flat. Did appreciate the nice thick fabric and pockets.

links_reviews_title: loved the dress. It was fun and flirty and was a nice material.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to my friends wedding. It looked great and I received a lot of compliments.
This dress was perfect for a FL wedding. So fun and flattering!

It took three tries to get the sizing right - as a shift dress I ordered a 6 which I can usually wear for this style dress but the inside liner was so so tight around my chest, I looked completely squashed (36C). The waist and length were great however. The lining on a size 8 was still way too tight (the dress material is stretchy but the liner is not), and finally a size 10 fit. It was roomy in the waist but the length was alright and overall didn't look too big. That being said, I loved this dress! The color was great and the side ruffle spiced it up nicely.

I loved this dress and did not want to return it. I ordered the 2, with a back up 4. I typically wear a 2, and that is the one I wore for this event. It is true to size and I did not even take the 4 out of the bag. The dress is a little short when you sit down, but I always wear spanx under for when I am dancing, so it did not bother me that much. The color was great- I wore this to a fancy sweet 16 for my niece. Had a lot of compliments on it. Loved that you could wear a normal bra with it. Would totally get it again.

Obsessed is an understatement. This fit so well, it was the first RTR rental I tried on and I fell in love. The lightweight fabric was breezy and lovely for an afternoon summer wedding. It has a light liner layer which was nice. It fit well, even at my chest. Loved it so much I almost bought it!

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments on the color of the dress. No one had a dress similar to mine.
links_reviews_text: The dress is very comfortable, little tight in the bust area. I am only 5 feet, so the length was perfect for me.
I wore this dress for a cocktail party. I am 4 months postpartum so this felt very comfortable and flattering!

I wore this for my daughter's christening. Due to lingering baby bump and larger chest, it was snug in those areas. I still received many compliments. I am short and the dress length was perfect for me, however, if you are of average or tall height and don't want a short dress this one isn't for you.

links_reviews_title: Lovely pink dress! Perfect for wedding guest!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Simple but fun! It was just the right length for my height. It was a tad tight around the bust (32D) but it wasn't bothersome. I loved that I could wear a normal bra. Easy to dance in!

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful barn wedding with an outdoor ceremony.
links_reviews_text: This dress was light and comfortable. Fit perfectly! I think if I were taller it would have been a little short, but at 5'2" it was great! The color was nice and bright. It was actually my back up dress but I ended up liking it better than my first pick.
I wore this dress to a summer wedding. It was true to the size. A little tight by the bust area. I would recommend ordering a backup size a size bigger. It was a great dress to dance all night long!
This dress is just okay. It was not flattering on me at all. Im short and chunky and it made me look exactly that!

links_reviews_title: Pretty and comfortable, a bit unexciting.
links_reviews_text: The reviews suggested that this dress runs small, so I ordered an 8 and 10 instead of 6 and 8. This photo is of the 8, and I definitely would have preferred the 6. I ended up not wearing the dress as the weather turned super cold that weekend. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie event at the Ritz Carlton and it was comfortable, classic & elegant.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It fit well and didn't wrinkle. The Size 10 was too tight in the bust. I wore the Size 12 but had to tack up the slip/lining since it was longer than the dress. I would rent this again. 12/2017 - I DID rent it again for a rehearsal dinner & a holiday party. Many compliments! The slip/lining was fine on this one.

This was a great dress for an August wedding. I got a lot of compliments on the color and fit of the dress. For me it was a perfect length - not too long, not too short (I'm 5'6") It does run a little small in the chest area, so if you're in-between sizes or a larger chest, the bigger one will be your better bet. The only con of the dress is that the slip shows a bit when the dress is on.

I absolutely loved the color! It was so bright and fun! I do have a 34DD and the top was a little tight. Typically I wear a size 10 but I had to wear the 12 so the top would be a little looser. The only thing I did not like was the slip underneath ( which made it right at the top) it was also like a swishy material and made a lot of noise. But other than that this dress was perfect and got a lot of compliments
Perfect for a summer wedding, loved it and could dance in it all night.

links_reviews_title: Looks like a beach cover up
links_reviews_text: I didn't pick this dress- it was sent to me bc the one I wanted wasn't available in size 4, and it was pink so they thought this was a good replacement. I didn't wear it. I thought it felt and looked like a beach coverup. Pretty color, comfortable, but not at all what I wanted.

Loved this dress. Super comfortable and sexy. Perfect for a hot summer night. I went up to a 10 since other reviews said it was a little tight in the bust and the 10 fit me perfectly. Sexy and stylish. Would rent again for any party!
Loved the color! I did have to hem the lining of the dress as it was longer than the dress. The fit was true to size and I got lots of compliments.
A little tight in my chest, and a little short for my preference due to my height but my fiance loved it ;)

It was great for my post pregnant body. Not my favorite dress from rtr buy loved that it made me feel comfortable in this hard stage. It was tight in the chest but normal fit other than that. I'm 5'10" and it was on the edge of being too short.
Very cute simple and cute fit very well

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my son's baby dedication. It was perfect. Classy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. True to size.
Great dress, got a ton of compliments on the color. Could have gone with smaller size but the length is a little short

links_reviews_title: Super cute, comfortable. Perfect for dancing all night long!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9'', 125lbs, and this was so perfect. Very comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but runs VERY SMALL!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a spring wedding and it was the perfect style! My weight has fluctuated a lot over the past year so based on previous reviews I went with an 8 and the 10 as my back up. I ended up wearing the 10 since I have a large bust (36DDD) and I probably could have even used the next size up. The length was perfect though and I was very pleased with the overall fit and color. I would rent this one again (I wish it came in other colors) but in a bigger size next time!
I received a ton of compliments on this dress through the night. It was shorter than I had expected but it worked.

I felt like a movie star in this dress! The color was perfect for a spring wedding and a pregame trip to Keeneland. Pairs great with nude heels. I ended up sizing up to the 6 because it was a tad tight in the chest and puckered a little bit (I am a 34C). Great modest dress, although don't plan on raising your arms up all the way - it makes it dangerously short!

links_reviews_title: Business social evening at Merv Griffin's estate - perfect.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, shift dress so didn't have to worry about 'holding anything in'! I'm 5'7", 145 lbs, midsection is a challenge area, average bust, flat booty.

links_reviews_title: It was for a charity event that I organized for breast cancer and wanted the dress to be pink.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very comfortable and very flattering! Plus I received many compliments!

It fit just right! It was smaller in the chest than the waist but that worked great for me. I ordered a back-up size the next size up but didn't need it. I got so many compliments. The bright fuchsia was perfect for this autumn wedding.

I rented this dress for my husbands 30 year HS reunion. The dress was a bit blousy around the mid section but it was great because it wasn't constricting.
