It's a short dress; I'm 5'7" and it stopped mid thigh. I loved how comfy the dress was and was able to dance in it all night long. The pink color is very flattering and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Surprise 40th birthday party for my husband!
links_reviews_text: Great party dress! I was still nursing and had larger chest -- pulled a little at back key hole. But great dress and beautiful for many types of occasions.

Rented this for a wedding at 20 weeks pregnant. I was excited to see RTR now has "bump friendly" options, and this was one that was suggested. I was an 8-10 pre-pregnancy, but based on reviews that the chest was tight, I rented a 12 with the 14 as my backup - VERY glad I did this! The 12 would have been the perfect fit - slightly hugging the hips, showing off the bump - but the chest was ever so slightly too snug. My boobs have grown a little bit, but I'm still in my pre-pregnancy bras (34D). The 12 was tight enough in the chest and armpits that I wouldn't be comfortable. The 14 fit my chest and unfortunately a little big and boxy for my body - but for anyone who's pregnant, you know that you'll often choose comfort over style =) In the end, I was comfortable, loved the color, and felt very cute and confident with my 20 week bump. Great rental for the bump, but definitely size up for the chest!

Perfect dress for an end of summer wedding! It was a little tight in the bust, even in the size up I had ordered as my back up, but was flowly and fitted nicely throughout the rest of the dress. It was easy to sit and dance in.

I am usually an 8 or 10 in dresses but ordered up based on previous reviews and am glad I did. The 12 offered a little extra length. Also I am a 34dd and the 10 was very snug across the bust. Overall this was such a fun dress. I reviewed tons of compliments

I was a huge fan of this dress. The color was great as was the style. It ran small, I happened to try the 12 on first and it fit well so I wore that without trying the smaller size on. I have broad shoulders and it could have had a bit more room under the arms, but it was not a problem. I'd wear it again!

More fitted in the bust, so go a size up for backup if your chest is larger. If you're little up top, I would go a size smaller. Bright pink color was fun and the shape/material made it classy too. I loved this dress and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my brothers rehearsal dinner and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran a little big but I went with the larger size because it was short. It was comfortable and flowy. I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I'm obsessed with this dress! I want to wear it for every wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the wedding I went to this past weekend. I ordered a 4 and a 6, and the 6 fit perfectly while the 4 was a little too tight on the chest. The hem hits about mid-thigh, but I had no worries about it being too short. The ruffle is a fun little detail and the color is stunning, more of a deeper pink than in the picture though I would say. I paired it with nude heels, a Lauren Merkin clutch, and Alexis Bittar drop earrings and I got so many compliments, which, you know, always feels good. Only complaint I have is that the 4 had a dark stain on the ruffle so had that one fit me better, I would have been kind of upset. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was light and perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a bit tight on my bust (I have a large chest) so I went up a size. I loved this dress though! It was light and perfect for a summer wedding. I highly recommend this dress!

I'm a true size 6 and this dress is massive in the chest and underarms. Salvageable with a cute lace bra or a camisole- both of which I did during the rental, because it's otherwise a light, fun, easy summer dress.

I'm 5'3", 105lbs, and usually wear a 0 but they only had a 2 available. It still fit just fine! A 0 prob would've been a better fit but I still felt great in it and kind of like an oversized look anyways. The material is great for a summer evening. I wore it to a film screening and it was the perfect mix of chic but casual.

It wasn't a great fit, my bra could be seen through the sleeves, I had to pin it to keep it from slipping below my bra in the front. But it's very pretty and I WOULD wear it again, I just might size down.

I wore this as my backup because my original rental did not fit. I loved it. It was a bit showy in the chest but I just went with it. The length with the ruffle was super flattering and I didn't have to worry about my dress riding up while dancing all night. Also loved the lightweight fabric for a June outdoor wedding in the sun.

This dress was gorgeous -- I received a ton of compliments on it. It is very fitted down to the flare on the skirt but the overall fit is true to size. The colors aren't quite as vibrant as the picture on the model but I liked it nonetheless. It paired great with a jean jacket for a less formal affair.

links_reviews_title: Wore the replacement size sent (not the six)
links_reviews_text: Just beautiful
As noted in other reviews, this dress runs quite large. That being said, it's much better in person than in the photos, and with jackets/long-sleeve shirts/scarves could be multi-seasonal.
Colors are vibrant and the fabric is good material.

This is a nice dress. I liked the pattern and mermaid bottom. The dress is not lined though, so unless you have a super flat tummy, might want to wear a slip or shape wear underneath bc it won't hide anything.

I love this edgy dress by TOME! Running true to size, I recommend wearing your true size as your primary and size up for your back up. This style is fitted at the waist and hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra. At 5 ft, the length hit tea length on me. I absolutely love everything about this dress. Pair with a sandal or heel to complete this look!

links_reviews_title: More interesting in real life than it looks online
links_reviews_text: I would have never rented this dress if I didn't see it at the store. The fabric has a nice distressed finish to it, and it's grooved fabric almost so it look really high quality and unique. The cut up top could be problematic for some. It's a very defined boob area, so if you run small or large in that department it might be a tricky fit. I found that the boob area fit decently for me (dd) but it was borderline. Great option for everyday if you're looking for something unique. Was flattering, featured a lot of color, the ruffles were fun and features a classy amount of cleavage.
This dress is really cute and comfortable. Bonus: it matches my bathroom at my family's beach house.

Dress received tons of compliments. I tried it on week prior so knew I had to wear the right bra. The sides were a little loose on the top so I get the feedback out it being big. I will be renting again
Too low cut and form fitting for teaching and fabric is heavy
Runs extremely large - not a flattering silhouette.

I wore this twice. Both very were very long days where I flew into 100 degree towns, had business meetings all day and client dinners at night. It held up great! Super comfy, No wrinkles, paired with a short cardigan for day and wore sleeveless in the evening. I loved this dress!
I'm usually a 4 but rented a 10 and it's also really cute oversized with a bralette showing!

This dress was very flattering for My curves. I'm a 34 DDD and thick waisted. It skimmed me and complimented my bust. Numerous complements. Beware, cleavage will show. So if you're very modest, you may be uncomfortable.
The arms were to large but fit well otherwise

Lots of compliments but I had to pair it with a cardigan because it runs large in the bust area and straps in addition to being pretty revealing in the neckline. I will rent again but size down next time.
Loved the fit and material

links_reviews_title: Cute design but too low cut.
links_reviews_text: The top /bust of the dress ruins it. Very low cut and requires tank top under it. Not cut for large bust

links_reviews_title: Runs large, definitely order one size down
links_reviews_text: Dress fit beautifully in the waist, but very roomy in the bust and underarms. I'm 5'7, 130lbs, and 32DD.
Really cute and different. I sized up for a large bust, it it would have been fine with the size 14, maybe even the 12. It was huge.
Terrific dress, fit me perfectly. Could wear it for casual days or dress it up with a lot of heels at night.
Looks good but usually I have to squeeze into a size 14 dress and it was huge. Make sure you size down. Will try again for a different event in the right size. Material is kind of thin.
Love the dress but too much cleavage for work! Also a little too loose in the waist.
The top runs big which made it low cut and the arm holes gapped. After putting on a lace bralette all was good. Rent this one, much nicer in person than in the pictures.

links_reviews_title: I think it's just me in that the bottom fit but the top was too big.
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress, thin material. A girl at the poké shop complimented me, haha!
This dress is really pretty but was quite too big for me. I may rent it again in a smaller size

This dress was so huge on top it was bizarre. The bottom was a little large too but not at all proportionately so. For reference, I am a 36 DDD so not sure how many people out there would have the right shape for this dress.
Much too big on top for small breasted women!

links_reviews_title: Very thin material. Size 22 doesn't fit like a true 22. Feels like fit not test on wide hips.
links_reviews_text: The fit feels like it's more for narrow hips. I'm a true 20/22 and couldn't fit into this dress without bulging out in all the wrong areas.
Nice, good quality, everyday dress. I'm a bit chesty and this chest design just wasn't working with my body. I did not wear the dress.

I have a large bust and could not find a bra that was cut low enough to wear with this dress. If I wore a plunge bra, you could still see significant side boob. I tried pinning the shoulders down, but just looked bad. Sadly, not a great fit for me. The weather at the wedding was 99 Degrees + 80% humidity and the light fabric would have worked well, but you could have seen the sweat stains like whoa. The fabric is light and almost reminded me of a beach towel from the 70's...or a candy-stripe uniform. On the right woman, this could work

Unfortunately, this runs really big in the bust and waist. It started to feel like I had a sack on. I may go down two sizes and try again for another upcoming trip. I usually wear a 14 or 16, so I went with 16 since this is the first piece I've rented from this designer. That was a mistake. I should have ordered a 12 or 14 based on how baggy this was on me. But it is a BEAUTIFUL dress. Very light and easy. I give 3 stars for now because of the fit. I think that it also is just not cut for women with hips/butt and a smaller waist. I will try a smaller size and see, but I experienced a lot of gaping up top and under the arms.

links_reviews_title: Not made for girls with big hips.
links_reviews_text: I sized up for this dress as suggested. I'm definitely a pear but I have a large bust as well and the sizing was so off. It was too large on top and too tight on the bottom. The designer definitely doesn't know how to make pieces for curvy girls. At least with this silhouette.
Loved this dress so much, but ran too big in the shoulders/chest. Definitely made for someone taller than me. The bottom is so flattering and unique so I wore it with a leather jacket.

links_reviews_title: This dress was not flattering on me.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very cute and I did wear it but I would not rent it again because the style was not flattering on me. I am too short and round.

links_reviews_title: Not for small--breasted women - HUGE in the bust
links_reviews_text: I was excited to get this but I couldn't wear it because it was gigantic in the bust. I'm a 32DDD so I have to be careful how things fit so I don't show too much boob, but this dress was crazy big. The rest of the dress fit fine.

The dress was very comfortable! I received a lot of complements. I was able to easily wear a strapless bra that didn't show, even with the plunging neckline. The material was perfect weight for a winter event.

This dress was beautiful and I received so many compliments all night. I wore this to a wedding in 40 degree weather. The material of the dress is thick and heavy so it kept me warm. I wore a strapless bra and was able to hide it no problems. I also wore shape wear underneath to keep everything smooth looking as the dress is form fitting. I'm 5'6 and the length was perfect with 4in heels. Easy to dance in. Has a little bit of stretch. Thanks RTR for another awesome rental!
The event ended up being less formal, which is the only reason I didn't wear this dress. Fit like a glove and felt great. The long was a good length (I'm 5'6" and inseam is 33).

I really couldn't have imagined a better dress for my friends wedding. Simple and sleek. The fabric was comfortable and easy to move in. The flute at the bottom was super flattering and the back of the dress was gorgeous. Really love love

links_reviews_title: The style of the dress was a good fit for my body type. I really like the fit of the dress.
links_reviews_text: The only con I could say about this dress is, it has a low neck line. There was more of my cleavage area exposed then I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: One of the most flattering gowns I’ve ever worn!
links_reviews_text: This dress might be my all time favorite rental. The fit was perfect. Hourglass shape, a little low cut but was able to wear a plunge strapless bra. Gave me a great shape , hugged all the right places. The material was stretchy and there was room in the tummy area. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Long, elegant dress - gorgeous back for evening wedding.
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric - choose larger size do less stretch across my mom-belly. Could wear with no bra.

This dress fit beautifully. It was a heavier material so for a winter wedding it was perfect. The only thing I had trouble with was that I don't have a big chest (large A/small B) and I had to purchase a deep plunge stick on bra to wear with this dress for list and to fill it. Other than that I danced the night away and was complimented all night.

I ordered this as the backup dress for my friend's wedding. She had asked me to be one of her bridesmaids and had specified that I needed a long dark purple dress. I originally had my eye on a different dress which I ordered as my main dress. This was my backup dress just in case though I thought I wouldn't really need it. I tried this dress on and was immediately in love. It fit like a glove and went perfectly with the flat shoes she had instructed us to wear (I am 5 ft 5 in for reference). The dress is definitely clingy, especially across the middle, but fit very well. It also has a super deep v-neck, making a bra nearly impossible. However, I was fine without a bra and just using some pasties since the top section was fitted enough.

links_reviews_title: Deep Purple with Beautiful Back Details
links_reviews_text: Flattering and fairly comfortable but I thought the lace was a little bit itchy. One size I rented had a thin padding on the boobs that I had to spend some time straightening out which was kind of annoying but I made it work. Still beautiful and was happy with it overall.

The fit, length and color were stunning! I was able to dance all night and even ate a great meal without feeling like I was going to bust out the dress! Lol! Perfect dress for my pear shape. I'm 5'7, 195lbs and wear a 14 on average for reference.
The dress was the perfect color for a November wedding. It hugged in all the right places yet was stretchy enough to be comfortable and move around.

The dress fit really well. The long worked better as I was wearing 3 inch heels and the regular length you could see a lot of the shoes. It had enough support to go without a bra (which I never do) so that was nice. Able to wear an under garnet without it showing through. Great dress and would rent it again.
Fit well, material is heavy and has a little flare at the bottom which helps it fit nicely. The lace back has hooks to hold it together.

links_reviews_title: The color is beautiful and it was easy to move in and comfortable to sit in.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4R and 2R for back up. I wish the Petite sizes would have been available because both sizes were long for a 5'3 frame. However I used some fabric tape to shorten the hem and it held out luckily! The color full is bold and material is very forgiving and stretchy. I'm a bit inbetween sizes but I think I could have even worn a 0 and had been comfortable. The lace around the shoulders and back is of course a bit scratchy but not unbearable. I wore a sticky bra as it was a bit loose in the chest to go without anything.
Sadly the bust was too large and overall too big. I'm wearing 4" heels and it still drags long. I'm 5'2" and 110 lbs, 32B and the size 0 didn't work. It was super comfortable and beautiful though!

This dress's fabric really made it- it was thick enough where I didn't feel the need to wear Spanx and had some stretch so I could dance. The lace wasn't irritating like some lace is and the color was pretty. I will say, I'm a solid 10 in most formal dresses and I wore the 8 with wiggle room. Also, I am 5'8" and the dress was still a little short- I was told I had the 8L but believe it was just an 8.
Great fit & true to size!

links_reviews_title: Great fall color and flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress worked well on my post-partum, still-breastfeeding body. I feel like it would be flattering on most and appropriate for almost any formal occasion. I'm 5'11 and wore a very low heel with the long dress.
I loved this dress. It's my default color. Hugged in all the right places. So many compliments

Rented this a couple months in advance. I was reluctant because I was not sure what size I would be. I was 7 months pregnant and this dress fit so well. The material was perfect for a fall wedding and had a little give in all the right places.

This was a great dress! I am 5'5" and about 130lbs. I rented it in a 2R and 4R and the 2 was the better fit however with my 4" heels the dress was too short. Customer service overnighted me a 2L and it was a perfect fit! I highly recommend RTR and this dress! My only complaint is that the lace was a little itchy. Overall all the dresses we're clean and odorless. The size 4R did have a small hole in the side where the stitching on the seam had come apart. Not a problem for me though since I didn't wear that size.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for a Pregnancy Bump
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and plenty of stretch for my 24 week bump.
It was a bit more form fitting around the hips than I typically like, but everyone else said it was beautiful. The lace on the shoulders was a bit itchy but not intolerable.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful, hugged all of my curves- husband said it was his favorite dress I’ve ever worn!
links_reviews_text: Great for curvy women
The dress was a bit long for me. I'm 5'4" and wore size 14 regular. Even with 3 inch heels, people would sometimes step on my dress. This is a problem i always have for these kind of dresses.
Amazing perfect dress for a wedding. Cut was a little deep and showed my strapless bra but it was fine

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for an Indian-Jewish fusion wedding where I needed a plum/eggplant purple dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress has quite a lot of stretch, which was great. I had to go down a size, due to the stretch and my body shape. The Regular length worked really well for my 4 inch heels - you could see the shoes but it wasn't too much. Overall, I really liked this dress; however, there were some problems I had that I think other people need to keep in mind when they're deciding on this dress: 1) even though there's a lot of stretch, it's not great for people with butts/hips. It fit fine and I felt pretty but, being very pear-shaped, the back didn't sit flat above my butt, which I would have preferred. 2) the shoulders were for a slightly longer-torsoed individual. I have this problem a lot being 5'4" but it's always slightly frustrating. 3) Boobage! I didn't feel comfortable not wearing a bra with this dress, but because of #2, I had to get a deep-v strapless bra that I could then use band extenders with to bring the back of the bra down a little to not show. The way the lace is, though, I could wear a clear bra strap, halter-style. 4) As other reviews have mentioned, the lace is a little scratchy. Now that I have said ALL that, I did really like this dress. I felt beautiful. I received a lot of compliments. There was a lot of stretch to move and dance and sit - it was surprisingly comfortable.

The color was beautiful. The material was perfect for the evening indoor gala. I was able to go bra less and because of my chest size felt very comfortable. The lace straps were a little itchy but nothing that was annoying. I'm petite and had to wear 4 inch heels. It was very comfortable. I highly recommend this dress.

I received compliments all night and in the following days after wearing this dress to a formal fundraising gala for the hospital I work at. I ended up wearing my back up size, only because the original size was a little loose in the straps/shoulder area as I have a very short torso for how tall I am. I wore the long and the front of the dress was angled just enough that a cute pair of shoes made the length work. Overall, I couldn't be more pleased with how this dress looked and made me feel! Would definitely recommend it!

This dress was perfect! Color is much more purple in person. The Lace detail is beautiful. The fabric has nice stretch to hold you in place. Plunge neck was just the right depth. I wore a black strapless convertible bra and you couldn't see it at all. Also super easy to dance in!

This was my first Rent the Runway experience and I couldn't have been more pleased! The dress was amazing. I normally wear an 8 but never know how nice dresses run, so I was nervous about getting the right size. The 8R worked perfectly! I did wear spanx to help smooth everything out. At first I thought the top was too loose but I realized I didn't have all the claps done up the back. After that, it fit perfectly! I'm a 34DD and it may have been a little too boobalicious for a work event but it was perfect for this non-work event.

This dress has a lot of stretch, and the material is heavy so I didn't have to worry about undergarments. The lace panel and lower cut front makes wearing a bra difficult, so I just skipped it. The lace was a little scratchy, but I got used to it pretty quickly. Overall, I really enjoyed wearing this dress.

This was my second time to rent this dress, and I loved it again! The color is a subtle and elegant alternative to formal black, and the fabric is substantial enough to hug your curves and drape just right. The lace insets are a bit scratchy but really add interest to the otherwise simple design. The description says there's no stretch, but I disagree. I'm 5'8" and the longer length worked perfectly with 3" heels.
I went a size down compared to normal (the backup size came in clutch) and it fit almost perfectly! The fabric was nice, the lace was really pretty (a little itchy), and the length was great.

I loved the fit of this dress. It was a thicker fabric so it smoothes out any lumps or bumps. It felt true to size or even slightly big. I ordered a 4 and a 6, wore the 4 but would have been curious to try the 2. Id say if you are ordering a back up, consider sizing down.
This fit much better than my original choice, it ran true to size. Needed a strapless bra and spanx to smooth it out. The 10R allowed my 3 inch heel to peek if it falls longer you'll drag the back.

links_reviews_title: This was my alternate dress for a black tie wedding in Long Island.
links_reviews_text: This was my alternate dress for a black tie wedding I attended in January. I ended up wearing my first choice (not this dress) but this one fit really well and I would recommend it. The material had some stretch and the back of the dress was stunning. There was some padding in the bra area. The 4R fit but if I was choosing an alternate size, I might size down since the fabric had some stretch.

I loved this rental. The material is rich and heavy but comfy with enough stretch that I could breathe. It hugged all of the right places and made me feel beautiful. I used a little fashion tape on the neckline to keep everything in place. This is a beautiful gown with a bit of old Hollywood glam. I would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the length and style, simple and elegant
links_reviews_text: The breast area was too large for me. Some of the clasps unfasten during the night. It may be best to wear a strapless bra with tape
This dress was super cute, comfortable, and short! Loved all of it! I wore it for a Madmen tv show themed holiday party and got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Classy cocktail attire for husband's company Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and looks good with flats. I am not a heel girl. I am a bit hippy with an apple bottom and the under slip wanted to ride up a bit over my bum. The black tights hid that. I would rent again in a large to avoid that.

Very pretty dress that was easy to wear! Loved the lace detail and bell sleeves. Better in person than in pics due to the loose fit of the lace overlay. It looks slightly boxy in photos, but was cute and swingy in person. The long sleeves worked well for a fall wedding. Minus one star since it had a few minor stains on it and this was a replacement dress due to my original choice becoming unavailable one week before my event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail with lots of leg!
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress, so hard for me to return. First, I followed the advice to order my size and then a bigger size as a back up so that I could wear a larger slip - great advice. I loved that there was skin on top showing through the pretty lace, and then lots of leg to show off. I don't normally like bell sleeves, but it made the dress just a little bohemian in my opinion, and I felt wonderful in it. It can be dressed up with neutral heels, and dressed down cute with a pair of brown boots. Favorite. Rental. Ever.
Short & sexy without showing too much. Definitely recommend one size up for the slip. Loved it! Would rent again or even buy it!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a fancy wedding and felt really comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress comes in two pieces... The slip runs very small (length and width) and the lace overlay runs true to size in my opinion. I got a medium, and a large as a backup size. I wore the large slip with the medium overlay. It was very comfortable and I was cool even during a hot, humid, mid-eighty degree day. It was also easy to dance in and the lacy wasn't itchy! I got a lot of compliments and really enjoyed this dress- would definitely recommend if you need/want something comfortable, not form-fitting, and "fancy" as well!

I would have given this 5 stars if the slip underneath hadn't been so small. The sheath itself was so pretty and fit great, but I had to run to the store and buy an emergency slip to go under it or else my entire bum would have shown after just a few steps due to it riding up. Got compliments and loved it with my new slip. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a dinner party
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, very flattering and fun and flirty!

This dress was so comfortable and easy to dance in! I'm glad I read reviews prior to ordering though because even though I wore a medium, I used the large slip that was sent with my backup. The slip is MUCH smaller than the lace overlay. I almost wish the slip was two sizes up because of how short it was when I sat down. Overall, I loved this dress but wish the slip size matched the dress size.

I wore this as an Easter dress. I ordered the small and medium as my backup. I ended up wearing the small overlay and medium slip, as the small slip was too short and tight. The small overlay was still a little big on me. I was able to wear a normal bra with this because the back didn’t come down too low. I am 5’3 and it was fairly short on me.

I loooove this dress. It was super forgiving through my midsection and a great length for my 5 foot 2 stature. The slip underneath was tight, not too tight, but I would get your normal size and one size up in case you needed to wear the larger slip.

Thanks to the intel from other reviews I got this in medium and large - and as expected, I ended up wearing the medium dress with the large slip under it – and even then the slip was skintight. The medium dress fit perfectly - not too tight or too loose - and looked great . the large dress was just too big and shapeless, but the medium slip was more like an XS. I wore this to a dinner party so I spent most of the evening sitting down but every time I stood up I had to pull the slip down because it would keep creep ing up almost up to my waist. If I ever rent this again I'm probably going to wear my own slip underneath to avoid these problems. In any case it was comfortable and fancy without being too formal - the bell sleeves are 3/4, so I didn't have to worry about them dragging or getting caught in things. Overall a good choice - I just don't know what is up with the slip sizing.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and a great party dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit wonderfully! I ordered a medium and a small, and ended up wearing the small! I'm 22, 5'8" and about 140lbs and usually wear a 34D. It was definitely short, but I wore it out to a New Years Eve party, so was fine with that! I got a lot of compliments on it, and the material was very comfortable. If you'll be dancing though, or even sitting, I'd suggest wearing spanks or shorts underneath, because it was pretty close to revealing a little too much. All in all, I loved it!
It is a little on the short side if you are tall. For reference im 5'7. But it is classy and was perfect for my work event.
This was a nice and easy dress. The bottom layer fit well but the top was a bit big. I wish I had gotten a smaller size for my backup and mixed the sizes.

links_reviews_title: The event was a beautiful rooftop wedding in Beverly Hills.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great and I would highly recommend it for any Fall event, such as a wedding or cocktail party. I was 3 months post partum and it was flowy enough to cover my not-so-perfect stomach. I am also a DD and it wasn’t too tight in the chest area, which is rare!

This dress was perfect for the outdoor fall wedding I attended. All of the reviews I read were pretty accurate. I have a curvy/athletic figure and the large slip was very tight and short on me, but paired with the lace overlay you couldn't tell. I was definitely pulling the dress down a lot throughout the evening but I didn't mind. I could've gotten away with the medium lace overlay but it felt a little too short, so I went with the large all around, but it's nice that you can mix and match with this dress. If you are taller (I'm 5'7"), this dress might be too short. Overall, I would definitely consider renting this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Looking beautiful in a designer dress 😁
links_reviews_text: This dress was PERFECT! I was super nervous to order online with out trying on, but this website seriously rocks! The slip under the dress was a little small though, I have a large bust and big butt so I had to wear a different slip, which turned out to be the slip from my back up dress! I got so many compliments and I wish I could keep this dress forever!! Highly reccomend for any occasion!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fall barn wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Previous reviews are right, the slip is much tighter than the lace overlay. Unfortunately my S backup size wasn't available at the last minute (ugh RTR!) but I was able to fit into the XS with little issue. It did ride up a little throughout the night but wasn't annoying enough for me to give a lower rating. Perfect length, but I'm just under 5'. Wish I didn't have to send it back!

As all of the reviews have stated, the slip is way smaller than the dress. I wish I would have received the large also so that I could have worn the medium dress with the large slip. Instead I ended up wearing my nude slip and it worked just fine. I do have a baby bump here, but the dress was very loose and comfortable in this area. The navy slip would have hidden it much better.

A lot of room and very comfortable. It is short and rode up a tiny bit when I lifted my arms while dancing but if you can contain yourself you should be ok. I received compliments. The long sleeves were warm on a chilly evening. I felt comfortable in this dress. I'm 5'4 with b cup and athletic shape. Dresses are not fun for me most of the time because it's either "frumpy" or completely uncomfortable where I feel the need to suck in or not move. As a 35 year old mother I have a hard time finding age appropriate dresses (not 'clubby' yet not matronly). I felt this dress was the balance I've been seeking.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! True to size and very flattering!
links_reviews_text: No cons at all, loved this dress! Perfect for those self conscious about their arms like me and want to cover up a bit but still look and feel sexy! Perfect for a cocktail party outdoors.

This dress was awesome! I was worried about the length it's short! It worked out fine on me I'm 5'4" and weigh 155. The fit was perfect I was able to wear the medium. I would say it runs big because I normally wear large.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress that can be used for multiple occasions
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, especially the neckline and bell sleeves. The slip underneath was separate from the lace dress. The slip ran very small and short, and the lace dress ran slightly large. I would consider renting this again but the sizing was a little off.

Wore this dress for a summer wedding. This dress is two pieces -- the slip underneath and then the lace on top. The slip is SHORT! (And I'm only 5'3"). Anytime we sat in church during the ceremony I definitely had to double check where things were to make sure everyone didn't see things they weren't supposed to. I considered wearing the large slip w/ the medium lace top but it was too large in the bust. The good news is, the lace part of the dress is long enough where no one will notice. If you have a large badonkadonk or long legs I do not suggest getting this dress.

As everyone else mentioned, I had to wear the L slip with the M lace overlay. It was the perfect combination and looked gorgeous. It was appropriate for the rehearsal dinner, and yet looked young and playful enough for my personality. I would buy this one given the opportunity to purchase the correct fitting pieces.

It's important to note this dress comes in two pieces: a slip and the lace piece. I wore the medium slip and small lace piece. I wore this to an outdoor graduation and didn't want fabric clinging to my body so I opted for the slightly bigger slip. What I liked about this is it covered me from the sun without being overalls hot. Wore it to the grad and then the after party at a nice steakhouse. The statehouse required shoulders to be covered so this dress perfect for the whole day! Would rent again or even buy, very pretty dress!

This dress was awesome to wear to a Derby Party.. I got the XS and S.. It is a two part dress, and I wore the small slip and XS dress. The XS slip was tight to get on. The lace covering part was flowy and comfortable. I did need to wear a sticky bra because the slip is low cut in the back. Very happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful dress. Feminine, lacy and also comfortable. Loved.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a (casual) gala and I wanted something feminine and soft but still with a little sex appeal. The lace overlay on top of the slip fit the bill. I loved the bell sleeves and felt really good in this dress. I received a ton of compliments on it! I would definitely wear this again. I'm only 5'3 and 160 lbs, and I wore the medium in both slip and overlay.

I ordered the Small and the X-Small for back-up and ended up wearing the liner from the Small and the lace overlay from the X-Small (it comes in two different pieces). The X-Small liner was just a tad small through my hips but the lace overlay hung perfectly. It worked out great. I loved the bell sleeves and the length was perfect for my 5'1" height. I did not want to send this dress back! Will definitely rent again!
Perfect length, sleeves weren't too long, and super comfy for wearing all night for New Years Eve

links_reviews_title: Great dress, got so many complements!
links_reviews_text: Looser fit, pretty short in length, got tons of complements!

Wish I had a better photo for you all! This was at the bar with their lousy mirror. Loved! But! VERY short lining (dress is lining slip then separate lace overlay) the slip barely came mid thigh and when it sat down it literally came all the way up so my entire thigh was showing through the lace. Not the best look! Didn't realize it until out for the night. Still got a ton of compliments. Loved the look. Paired with taupe peep toe booties and the necklace shown.
The lace is beautiful and bell sleeves are really fun. It's very short so you can't life your arms too high.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and dress was comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore the medium, but the underslip was a little tight, however if I got the large the dress was too baggy. Had to adjust few times during the night but overall comfortable dress. Arms were perfect. I am 5,4 and the dress was short. Careful for ladies that are taller and worried about the length.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Liner ran small.
links_reviews_text: The liner ran small, but the overlay was a great fit. I'd recommend getting the size you usually wear and one size larger and using the liner from the larger dress for the best fit.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a day wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress was very short! I wore the large slip with the medium lace overlay because the large slip was slightly longer than the medium. I am only 5'3" but I was definitely pulling the dress down all night. Lots of compliments on this dress!!!
This dress is so comfortable and cute. I rented for Thanksgiving and loved it. The bell sleeves weren't ideal for cooking but they looked great

links_reviews_title: Too short for my long legs but a great dress
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8 and weighs around 125. The small fit great BUT I have long legs and it's too short to wear to an office holiday party. I think my tush my show if I had to bend over. So I didn't wear it.
Great material and lace detail! Fits true to size with attractive cut and fun sleeves! As others have shared it is short and flirty!
Perfect for a fall wedding! Wore the 6 because the 4 was too tight in the chest, so had some room in the midsection and shoulder but nothing crazy - It looked beautiful!

This little beauty was perfect for my daughter's Homecoming dance. It fit perfectly true to size. The fabric is richly textured with a lovely bit of delicate black lace along the neckline. Not too low cut. Has pockets (always a plus). It is quite short. My daughter is around 5'6" - she wears a lot of short skirts, so I was perplexed at the comment. Perhaps it's the voluminous skirt? Anyway, she loved it. Had many compliments.

This dress was great for an early fall wedding! The lace detail at the neck and back was a great touch. I got so many compliments on the dress and it had pockets so what's not to love?! I would say if you are taller it might be a little short but being on the shorter end i didn't feel like it showed too much! Definitely fits true to size.
Loved the quality of the dress. Was slightly tight for me after eating a big lunch, but otherwise fit well!

Beautiful dress, rich fabric, and unique color. Definitely stands out in a good way. The bottom is flowy and top is snug and flattering - a bit more cleavage than I wanted though. Great for a cocktail party, birthday, evening event.
The absolute best dress. It fit perfectly. Had pockets. And received TONS of compliments.
Rented this dress for a wedding and received so many compliments. Perfect for a petite figure.
Loved the way it fit-- if you are larger chested, it is a little more revealing. It poufs out a little but was great for cocktail hour at wedding.
Really cute and comfortable. Fits like a glove and was fancy enough for my senior gala!
I'm 5'2 and this ran SO short. I had enough room for my bust but only because I was sitting still. If I had to dance or move around in this, I might have fallen out. Cute dress, though!
Beautiful, thick fabric and perfectly cut neckline! This dress fit to a T!
The 4 wouldn't quite zip up because I am a 34D so I ended up wearing the 6. If you have a full bust, definitely get a size up!

links_reviews_title: A dress I will never forget.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments. Dress for me perfectly, and this is a dress I would love to purchase. Very beautiful and comfortable, it's a 10!

I was sad to return this dress--that is how beautiful it was! You can wear a real bra with it, which is a big plus because I find strapless bras to be super uncomfortable. This dress is an amazing thick material, and shows off a sexy amount of cleavage. Can't recommend it highly enough!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a winter holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Love this! I'm pretty short and this dress was a bit short on me...but I had planned to wear it with black tights so it was totally fine! I felt great in it and got several compliments at my husband's holiday party. This dress photographs well, too! It is probably one of my top RTR dresses to date!

links_reviews_title: Fantastic dress – super flattering, very comfortable, and has pockets!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress must be a well-kept secret on RTR because my size and my back-up size were both available for an overnight delivery during the Christmas party season. I can't say enough good things about this dress. It was so comfortable and easy to wear. The cut is slimming. The pattern is gorgeous in person. I received so many compliments on it. Cynthia Rowley really knows how to make great clothes for women! I will add that it's a little short. My tall friend said she probably wouldn't be able to wear it.
I’m 5’2” and the length was perfect for me. It’s definitely more low-cut than I’m used to but very flattering. I rented sizes 6 and 8 and went with the 6 despite it being a little snug.

I got compliments on this dress throughout the night, and I felt incredible in it. It was slimming and glamorous. The event was a formal gala, and I was a little worried about the length, but on me (5'2") it hit my knees, which was PERFECT. Love the dark purple and the gold. This was my first RTR experience and it absolutely delivered. Can't wait to rent the runway again!

I rented this for my homecoming, it was the perfect color and fit. It was a bit snug around my waist and chest which fit well with my body shape, but I did get a size down because it wasn't available in my usual size- which ended up working out anyway. Customer service was so helpful. I am 5'7" , around 125 pounds with 34B chest and a 0 fit me well.

This dress was a hit! I received a ton of compliments on how flattering the dress was and how great the quality of it was. The colors were also gorgeous for a fall wedding. The only issues I had with this dress was that it was a bit short and the top area was a little loose. If you have a smaller bust, it may be a little big in that area, especially if the straps are a little big. It was also kind of short, and I am 5'2". So, if you're taller than that, definitely keep that in mind. Otherwise, I loved the fit and flare of this dress, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Looks great, got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits really nicely and had pockets so I didn't need to carry my purse around to have my phone on me. Love this dress!
Amazing dress! I wore the size 10 in this dress and it fit perfectly, no bra needed! And pockets!! I got so many compliments with this dress- I love this designer!
Beautiful dress! It was exactly as pictured, beautiful fabric and it has pockets! It was a little snug, which made for amazing cleavage...

Great length for petite. It hit around mid thigh. Could definitely be too short for taller people. The back was slightly longer which was nice! Pockets were a great plus! The thicker material was great for an 80 degree day that turned chilly in the evening. I loved the purple and gold colors of this dress for a late summer/early fall wedding. I wore my usual size 2, but it was right in the chest/rib cage. No bra made it more spacious but I would order a size up for your backup.
Loved the dress! The fit is perfect for petite and small busted women. Color is gorgeous and dress was comfortable all night long.

links_reviews_title: Love, Love, Loved this dress. I should probably buy it.
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect, a little hard to zipper, but once you got the zipper moving, it went right up. The length was perfect on me, I'm 4'11".

Everything about this dress met my expectations. Flattering fit and great material. The material is on the thicker side, so I probably wouldn't want to rent it in the summertime for an outdoor wedding. The colors are beautiful -- gold jewellery and black shoes pair well. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the dress seems a tad short in the back. Careful when bending down!
My daughter chose this dress for homecoming. It was cute and fun and the pockets were great for her. A little low cut in the front, but not immodest.

If you are going to an event where there will be a lot of dancing, I would highly recommend this dress! It's super comfortable and has a really flattering cut. I wore it to senior homecoming, and it was super cute!

I rented this dress for my husband's work banquet. I loved the colors, fabric, and lace detail. I expected the dress to show some cleavage and it did! I was able to wear a normal bra with it, which made me happy. Oh, and it has pockets which also made me happy! However, I was a little uncomfortable with how short it was. I'm only 5'4" and I was almost sitting on my bare buns when I sat down. Given how much cleavage I was showing, I would've preferred it to be a *little* longer. I doubt I would rent again.

This dress was truly stunning! I recieved so many compliments. The fabric is so unique and pretty and the lace is such a great touch. The fit was great too and held my stomach in well. It was the perfect balance between low but not too low and short but not too short. Im 5'7" and wore 3in heels and it was the perfect length. I hope I can rent this dress again! It was one of my favorites!

This dress fits like a glove. I did not wear a bra with it, and did not feel too exposed or that I was going to slip out of the dress at all. It is very comfortable and I received several compliments!

I rented this for a semi-formal wedding and received a lot of compliments! The color and pattern were unique and stood out against the other dresses. I didn't feel that the length was too short; however, I have a larger chest and the dress showed a bit more cleavage than I normally would. With that said, it was a good back up dress and worked for the occasion. I'd recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 3", 105 lbs. The dress length was perfect for me and size 0 was exactly right. I couldn't wear a bra with it because of the cut, but didn't really need it. The style is so flattering and comfortable. I loved this dress. The color and texture made it a stand out. The pockets were great, but I accidentally left my small wallet with ID, debit card and cash in it in the pocket when I sent it back. I sent an online chat to RTR and a week later my wallet (with everything inside) showed up at my house via UPS at no charge to me. THANK YOU FOR YOUR GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE AND BEAUTIFUL DRESSES, RTR!

I wore this for homecoming and was very happy with it! I have a larger bust compared to my smaller frame, so it's difficult to find dresses that fit well, but this one worked very well! I usually wear a size 4, but the size 6 worked best. I couldn't zip it up with a bra on, but the dress gave me enough support so that I didn't need one. I would definitely recommend this, just make sure to size up!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a party. Sexy without being too tight. Comfortable and POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: Highlights your waist and breasts while being classy. The fabric is heavy and has some texture. Great color and the lace on the neckline is a beautiful detail. It's a little on the short side but that's what makes it fun! I'm 5'6, so anyone taller might want to pass. There definitely wasn't any fabric to sit on!

I loved this dress. I was able to wear a normal bra and the pockets are always a fun bonus! This dress has no stretch and I don't think it would fit with a larger chest. Overall fun structured dress that I would wear again. The colors are beautiful.

This dress was perfect for a fall wedding. At 5'1" & 115lbs it can be difficult to find dresses that fit my petite frame without drowning me in fabric. The cut was perfect, although the straps could have fit my shoulders a little better. I rented the 2 &4 thinking the 0 would have been too small, but I wish I had sized down than up. The fabric was really thick & felt really nice as the evening got a little colder. I would totally recommend this dress for a fall event as the colors are perfect & it fits great!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for the wedding that I went to!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit very well! Loved the pockets. Usually dresses are long on me (I am 5'1") but this dress was the perfect length and was super comfortable for a night of dancing!

I rented this for my LSU Graduation! Geaux Tigers!! It was a great Purple and gold dress. The material is very thick and stiff, so it was a bit hot in the Louisiana heat. I wore the 6 because the waist band does not stretch and I knew I'd be sitting. It also has pockets which is nice because you can't have a purse when you cross the stage at graduation and it gave me somewhere to put my phone. It is a little short, but so am I and the proportion worked. The top is very structured so you don't need a bra.

Fit true to size. I have large hips for my frame and worried that I may need to size up but it fit comfortably in the bottom half. Perfect cut out details made it fun and interesting. Loved that the black and blue made me able to match my partner no matter what he chose to wear.

I was absolutely in love with this dress... being extremely picky I was nervous for my first RTR, but it was perfect. I have an hourglass/athletic build, 5' 8", 150lbs, and wore a size 6 which fit perfectly. The 4 looked fine, but felt wayyyy too tight. Will definitely rent this dress again!

Loved the cut, colors, cut outs! The dress runs pretty small, normally wear a 2 and sized up to a 4 due to my curvy hips. The 4 was a little big up top, but you can't even tell with the lace detail. Very comfortable!

This dress checked a lot of boxes: the right mix of modest and sexy/flattering, colors and cut that would work in chillier spring weather. I am 5'5" and the dress hit just below my knees. Cutouts hit in flattering place. Would rent again.
I loved this RTR dress. I got so many compliments! The fit was tight but comfortable. The cut outs were just enough for a fun look. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, a little long for a short girl
links_reviews_text: Wore to our 2 year anniversary dinner. I'm glad I sized up, the waist and overall fit was a little tight on the smaller size. Can definitely get away with a normal bra, wasn't too constructed on a large chest (32ff). I'm only 5'1" so it was longer on me than I would have liked but I got tons of compliments all night!
Loved this dress. Ran true to size. Cut-outs we perfect. Would rent again 👍
Had to go a size up to my usual size.
Beautiful dress that allows for a sexy but classy look! Very flattering and comfortable

I loved this dress! It was so easy. No bra issues. So many compliments. The blue on the dress is beautiful and vibrant. The separation between the top and the skirt just take the style level up a notch.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was so unique and fit me perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4 and the 6. The 4 was too tight across my chest, but the 6 fit perfectly! I got so many compliments on this dress. I'd definitely order it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and love the cut out
links_reviews_text: Slim fit, but forgiving material with the thicker black design. Loved the high neckline but side slits for a perfect balance. Beautiful color. Would wear again!

I am 5’ 7” and 135lbs...I typically wear a 4 because I’m smaller up top but the 6 fit better because I have fuller hips. The dress was very comfortable to dance in & I got a lot of compliments. I loved the back of the dress...I wish I had some better pictures!!

links_reviews_title: I almost bought this from RTR
links_reviews_text: Love love love. So classy but sassy with the cut outs. I love that it looks like two pieces in the back. I read reviews that said to size up so that the cut outs were more flattering and I'm glad I did. Wasn't super tight or fitted but the 12 gave me room to breathe and eat AND drink #cheers

Loved this dress for a Fall wedding. The color combo was beautiful and the cut out made the dress youthful and modern. As for sizing, I tend to wear 0-4 depending on cut since I have an athletic shape with a small waist and more muscular butt and thighs. I found the 2 a little tight in the waist and hips, while the 4 fit almost perfectly (a little big in the chest but close enough).

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I fit in both sizes I got -- the 6 and the 8 but I felt a little bulge-Y with the size 6 slots so I went with the 8. This dress was so comfortable and I received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and awesome details for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: It was a great length and the details were awesome. I had a lot of compliments. My husband really liked the sexy cut outs on the side. I can't remember if I wore a bra but you can wear a strapless with it. It was challenging to get it on by myself but doable.
I usually wear about an 8/10 and wore a 10. It fit perfectly. Got lots of compliments on it and had some great sapphire blue shoes to wear with it!

The dress was an emergency backup order, so dress number 3, and it was my favorite one! The fit was as good as I am going to get off the rack, I normally wear 00 but most dresses don't run that small. The dress was in great condition. My only less than positive issue was that the dress had no slit. I saw this in other reviews but they said it worked out fine. Well I was a little more active and have a very long stride. I can't Barbie walk! The colors were great and the cut out was super cute without being too much.
Loved this dress! The colors were beautiful and I received so many compliments. I did think it ran a little smaller than expected, but would definitely rent again. The lace was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Plenty of compliments. Cut outs in the right places.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It's a lot bluer in person than in the pictures but I loved it. Very comfortable. Fit perfect. Length went to my knees but the cutouts made it flirty. Would recommend.
Great details on this dress. It runs a little tight so I recommend sizing up for your backup size. It is classy, yet stylish. I loved it!
I ordered the size 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the size 2. It was comfortable to sit, stand, and dance in!

This is the first rent the runway dress that I didn't end up wearing - and I have rented 10+ times. The quality of the dress is great and it is a beautiful dress but it is not for short petite girls - I should have known this from looking at the photos but it just didn't work for me.
This dress was so great. The subtle blue underneath the black, along with the cut outs, gave it that awesome POP. I would absolutely wear this dress again!!!
I loved the fit of this dress. It hugged my curves perfectly. My husband was a big fan. The cut outs were amazing and I felt super sexy. I wanted to keep this one!

links_reviews_title: New and fun take on the LBD
links_reviews_text: I'm more often a size 2 but sometimes a size 4. For this dress, I sized up to the 4 because the hips/butt area were too constricting in the size 2. The color/style/fit was great- it just wasn't my most favorite RTR dress. I'd rent again though because it's a great look for a good price!

links_reviews_title: Brighter blue in person with fun cutouts!
links_reviews_text: The blue is much brighter in person then it appears in pictures. It was a perfect pop of color for a spring wedding. Be aware that the fabric has very little give/stretch to it, I had to size up just so I could breathe! The length was nice and even though I'm on the shorter side, the bottom has no lining so it didn't drown me out. Would definitely recommend this dress.

Wish I could keep it but would def rent again! I wore the larger size so it was more comfortable to sit and dance. I could only wear a front sticky bra but didn't totally need it. Lots of compliments : )

I don't often rent things that show skin, but this wasn't that much skin and it was fun to wear! Honestly, I'm super delayed in writing this review, so I don't remember a ton of details other than I was pleasantly surprised by this dress and happy with it!

links_reviews_title: Cute cut outs but felt too conservative for a Hawaiian wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit well and I was able to wear a regular bra with straps! Despite the cut out it felt pretty conservative so I ultimately didn't wear it for the wedding but would rent again for an evening event, etc.

Loved this dress, didn't have to wear a bra, the cut outs were so flattering! I have wide hips and the dress was easy to put on and take off. Got lots of compliments! One of my favorite rentals for sure! Felt sexy, comfortable, classy, fun, it was perfect!!!!

This was my back-up dress, so I didn't end up wearing it to the wedding, but it was beautiful! I tried to get my boyfriend to take me on a date before I had to return it, but no such luck : / Order up at LEAST two sizes because it runs small. I have a true hourglass figure and I think this dress is most likely to be the most flattering on that body type. The cutouts hit right at my true waist, so it was very flattering. The back makes it look like a two-piece dress which is so unique and interesting. The other dress was so stunning and more appropriate for the venue/weather, so I went with that, but I'd definitely rent this next time I had a similar event to attend!

links_reviews_title: Trendy take on the little black dress
links_reviews_text: What a great dress. Comfortable but glad I sized up - straight fit so for those with curves I would get one size bigger than your usual. So many compliments but I still felt like it was easy to wear and style like an LBD, just with a few fun updates :)

Great fit, cut outs are high enough that you don't have any 'pudge' sticking out. I am small busted, but there was plenty of room in the top for larger chested women. Overall, great fit and length. The material is pretty thick, which makes it flattering, but would be a bit warm for a hot, summer event.

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful and I received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I run between a 0 and 2 and the 2 fit perfectly, no cons to report.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit, length + style of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Great for a tall girl, classy yet showed off my shape! I'd wear it again for sure!

I have had this dress in my hearts list for a long time and was looking for an excuse to rent it. So I finally got to wear it to a welcome party during a wedding weekend. The cut of the dress was very flattering on me and the length was great even for a tall girl! I would say it runs true to size. The pop of blue in the front and sexy open back were the best two highlights!
This dress was so pretty and everyone loved it. It was the perfect length and fit- showed just enough skin. I was totally comfortable and strutting my stuff all night!

I ordered the 4 and 6 in this dress and ended up sizing up for the cut outs. I could've worn the 4 but would've been popping out at the cutouts a bit more. I loved this dress, wore it for a rehearsal dinner and got tons of compliments. The blue and black contrast is so pretty! Wish I could've worn it longer

links_reviews_title: Flowy Dress, Great for 1st or 2nd Trimester
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress at 17 weeks pregnant to a wedding, got lots of compliments! Went a size up than normal so I could feel comfortable while pregnant, but the dress is true to size. Would rent again for sure!
The asymmetrical bottom of the dress completes the look! Easy to wear a blazer over for work.

I just ordered this because it seemed like it would be comfortable but I wasn't really thrilled. It just looks boring to me. When I put it on I really liked it. It was comfortable I got compliments and the uneven headline was kind of fun!

This dress was perfect. I loved everything about it. It is nice and lightweight and fully lined. It's easy on and easy off. Every part of it fit me perfectly. I wore it a lot and got tons of compliments. It's the perfect travel dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for outdoor summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented the large and got the XL as backup. The large fit well for the most part, but was a little snug in the chest. I was afraid I'd be tugging on it all night long, so I wore the XL & am glad I did. I got compliments all night long and it was very comfortable to wear.

The dresses arrived several days early and both the small (a little looser) and extra small fit (more form fitting). I wore the small to work and then wore the extra small to a bridal shower. The material is light but does not feel clingy. It's easy to toss on, no wrinkles, and you can wear a regular bra. The ruffles and cut along the bottom make it fun. Would rent again!

I wore this dress for my graduation and it was perfect! It fit well throughout, maybe ran a touch large in the bodice area but not anything anyone else would notice. Was light and airy and didn't clingy anywhere I didn't want it to. 5/5 would recommend.
The material is stretchy so this was easy to wear. The hem was so cute and a great color, I love it! I think I want to keep this dress!
This dress fit perfectly everywhere! Was roomy and comfortable in the chest and mid section. Length was perfect for cute heels. I got many compliments when wearing this!

links_reviews_title: Felt very comfortable and cute in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to an outdoor summer wedding. Very hot and humid day with no AC and still felt comfortable. Stretchy and slimming.
Flimsy material, need spanx or extra support to hide imperfections.
Soft fabric though a little clingy, definitely needed the spanx. I'm a size 14/16 and wore the 1L. I think a true 14 would fit xl perfect. Beautiful pattern, got many compliments.
Stretchy fabric made it easy to move in but also hugged all the right places. Got so many compliments!
I don't like dresses that make my chest look bigger, especially for work. Don't feel great in this one.

I rented this dress for a classy summer event at a horse racing track. The fit and length of the dress is sexy and fun, but conservative enough to fit in for a high end event. I did wear my Spanx- the dress doesn't show lumps but it does show love handles. The chest area is stretchy and amazing for big chested gals. Fits 100% true to size, the large fit my size 14 body well. The colors are nice in person, there is a bit of cleavage that will show and luckily you can wear a regular bra instead of strapless.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the color
links_reviews_text: Loved the weight and slight stretch of the fabric. I felt more comfortable wearing a camisole in order to hide some cleavage. The next size up would probably have been better across my hips.

I wore this fun dress to work on a Friday with a navy blazer, and then straight to dinner and a wine class for date night - turned out my boyfriend had bigger plans for the evening. He surprised me with a proposal and had a photographer on hand to capture the moment and do a quick shoot after. The dress was perfectly feminine and romantic. It has plenty of room in the bust but I did have to wear spanx for my tummy. It's nice and light for warmer months, even with the undergarments. I bought the dress, and as a bonus, it's machine washable!

links_reviews_title: Versatile dress, great for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great. Based on some of the other reviews, I thought this ran big and I sized down. I'm a 6/8 and would have normally gotten a medium. I got the small thinking it would run big and I was sadly mistaken. The small was too tight, too short and showed too much cleavage. I wore it anyway but would have been much more comfortable in a medium. This dress does not run big in my opinion!

I wore this to a derby event and it was perfect! The material is stretchy making it very comfortable for all the walking around we did that day. The high low ruffle hem gave it some extra personality :) This would be great to rent for a daytime wedding, rehearsal, or spring/ summer party

links_reviews_title: I ended up wearing this dress to church with a navy blazer and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is extremely comfortable! It's very stylish and can be dressed up with accessories. I actually had planned to use it on a weekend trip, but the trip was cancelled. So I wore it to church services with a navy blazer, silver jewelry, and some dressy navy sandals and received so many compliments! It also fit very well as I have a full bust and normally wear a size 18W so the 2L fitted perfectly.

This is a cute dress and good for the summer (especially Memorial Day, 4th of July or other American holidays with the red white and blue). It shows your curves without being too tight and uncomfortable.
Wore this to a graduation. Works well with my body size but also clings to my tummy a bit, which I don't mind. Bright and colorful, fun to wear, and very soft fabric.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, spring dress that's perfect for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove. Stretchy material and no zipper is a huge plus. Dress is low cut but it was fine for work. It's form fitting especially around the waist.

links_reviews_title: I highly recommend this fun, yet classy, work dress!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress. It fit like a glove! I usually would have rented a M, but based on other reviews, I sized down to a S. I'm so happy I did. It was super form fitting everywhere without being too tight. I didn't find it too low cut for work. The dress is really pretty with bright colors. It is a perfect length for work, but the asymmetrical design kept it young and a little flirty. I wore it with a blue blazer to make it a bit more professional since I am a lawyer, but removing the jacket, it could definitely be work out after work for drinks.
I love the feel and the look of this dress. The material conforms to your figure so no problem with sizing. I received it brand new with the tags. Nothing to not love about this cute little number!

This dress is true to size, or slightly big. I struggle with dresses since I'm top heavy, the large fit my bust a little better (DDD) but the medium was much better at the waist, just a lil more cleavage happy. The dress was wicked comfy and flattering. It's not a snug fit so if your self conscious you may want an undergarment, I felt better without one. Was in it all day and didn't need to adjust or shift. Stretchy fabric.
Beautiful. Love! Wear spans and size down. I have large breast's and it was baggy

links_reviews_title: While not a maternity dress, worked great for my 24 week bump!
links_reviews_text: The dress was loose enough that it accented my bump in a flattering way. Material was light and the print was fun for a September wedding.
Very cute dress. Will rent again but it was much to large for me.
Great fit, pattern and style.

Loved this dress so much, I bought it! At first I was afraid it would be too form fitting in the tummy but it turned out to be very flattering (tummy and booty). I paired this with a dark blue jean jacket since it was a little out of my comfort zone for the office. I'm not exceptionally full up top so I wasn't falling out but for someone who has more than a C cup you may find the breast area of the dress a little too revealing. The length is perfect and the flair at the bottom gave just enough flounce, not overwhelming at all. The material is thin but not cheap. I received a lot of compliments, which further supported my decision to purchase.
Runs small. Very tight, very low cut and very short.

Like everyone has said, this dress is great! It's unique and I love the shape of it. I ended up keeping it to wear with a blue blazer, but i wouldn't wear it without a blazer. I am a bigger girl and the dress is clingy. It's hard to tell since the pattern of the fabric, but it's that material that sticks to you. I love it though and am gonna make it work!
Wore this dress to my graduation banquet and loved it. It was perfect for the summer heat with a cute pair of sandals. The material is very forgiving.

This dress is not a maternity dress but it was very comfortable and the cut worked well for showing a 2nd trimester bump. I liked the color and the pattern as I feel maternity wear can get a little bit too sweet. And I liked that this wasn't a giant maxi which also feels inappropriate at this size bump. The main down side is that the comfortable material feels cheap; it doesn't feel like an expensive dress. But it's not an expensive dress, so in that case, it's definitely well worth what you pay for

links_reviews_title: This dress is flattering, a little sexy and totally forgiving.
links_reviews_text: The dress is stretchy and with the flowers, it is very forgiving. It camoflauge's anything you'd like to hide. The asymmetrical cut with the ruffle is cute and sexy. The dress isn't too low cute and you can wear a regular bra with it.
The dress has a very comfortable stretchy fabric. I am a very curvy 5'10 and the dress was too short for me. I ordered an xl and I'm a size 16.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a beach wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a beach wedding. It runs large, I am normally a medium but wore the dress in a small. Didn't love the deep v neck, thought it made my boobs look bigger than they are (some might like that!). Wasn't overly flattering on my body.
The style was not for my age. Too old looking

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and easy to wear though looks stylish.
links_reviews_text: No zippers or buttons and easy stretchy fabric make for a comfortable fit.
Comfortable but sexy, the open back detail is really cute!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, I loved it! Fun and flirty and fit well.
links_reviews_text: I'm petite so the length was perfect!
I'm usually a size 4 but I found the bust to tight. The size 6 fit better in the bust area and left a little room in the stomach area. It's very cute.
This dress is adorable and fit great. It's a fun spin on the LBF. It flares, but not too much and made me feel awesome. Boyfriend also loves it. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The bow is the best part!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a great choice, I received compliments all evening! I usually wore a 4 which I could have done but the 6 allowed more wiggle room. Dress was super cute and great quality.
I loved this dress! I would buy it if I could. It was shorter than expected, which worked well on my 5'1 frame.

links_reviews_title: The dress is a classic cocktail dress
links_reviews_text: Dress fit was great. It was a little snug around the waist and then a little loose around the chest (I didn’t wear a bra, but rather stickies because of the exposed dress back). I would consider ordering a size down next time. The length of the dress is great if you’re on the shorter side (ride above knee).
fit perfect

The dress was perfect for my 5'1 daughter's height but it was a bit loose in the chest area. She has a very small bust being somewhere between a 30-32 A & B cup. Since the back is open and ties the way it does, you can't wear a normal strapless bra. If we would have planned ahead better she may have been able to fill out the top better with silicone bra inserts. Other than the top being loose it was lovely and a great length for her junior Homecoming.
This dress was perfect. I felt so sexy yet elegant at the same time. I received many compliments and it fit my body very well!

I am usually a size 2 but rented his dress in a 4 and the 4 fit perfectly. Overall the dress is plain on the front with the cute bow in the back. Definitely need a stick bra or no bra to wear it. The material is thick but not heavy. I'm short (5' 3") and this barely covered me. It was cute and fun for one day but I had to watch to make sure the dress didn't come up when I was wearing it because it was so short.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely beautiful and so fun & flirty! The length was perfect as it was a summer wedding , short but still classy! I'm normally between a 2 -4 and the 2 was super tight, the 4 fit like a glove!
Loved the simplicity of this dress. Paired with some fun colorful earrings. Would rent again. I'm 5'6" 123 lbs and the 2 fit perfect.
Wore it for my friend's bday and fell in love with it! Ended up buying it :)

links_reviews_title: most flattering dress for my pear body shape that ive ever worn!
links_reviews_text: This was my first rental and i absolutely LOVED it. I wore the size 4, which fit great although a little snug standing up but because the fabric does not have a lot of give it was uncomfortable sitting down. I reccomend going up a size especially if youre going to be doing a lot of sitting (e.g for a rehearsal dinner like me)

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful wedding where some pretty awesome memories were made.
links_reviews_text: I'm a long-waisted pear shape and the fit was great for me. I normally wear a size 4 (as long as the dress has a flared skirt) and this dress has a very fitted top and natural waist with the skirt shape starting pretty much right below the natural waist. The dress shape is really flared out and the fabric helps keep it's shape well. Perfect for wider hips! The open back is just amazing...But be sure to wear a backless bra because the bow will not conceal it. The only con for me was that the top was a little big under my arms, so I may try a size 2 as my second size option next time.

I loved how classic this dress was. Simple and pretty, and easy to wear any jewelry with. At 5'3", 125lbs with a 26in. waist, the size 4 fit perfectly. Runs very consistent size-wise with other Elizabeth and James dresses. I wore for a dance and loved it!! I wish I could have kept!!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on the dress and necklace!
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable to wear, and hid a backless bra well. Was a bit short, but okay for the occasion.
Perfect for a school dance

links_reviews_title: I am in LOVE with this dress. It is fun, sexy, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: It is a short dress but not inappropriate. It is super flattering and comfortable. I would wear this dress again and again!

I loved this dress SO much!!! I rented it for homecoming and it was PERFECT. The dress runs small tho so instead of wearing the 0 I wore the size 2. I got so many compliments. I definitely recommend!!
It was a great fit and looked great in photos.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so fun to wear! Expect a load of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! It's a simple LBD with a fun twist. Makes you want to dance all night long! I am 5'3 and 115lbs. I ended up wearing the 4 for a little more length but I could have worn the 2. Rent this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Classy, comfortable version of the LBD with a gorgeous back!
links_reviews_text: The reviews were so helpful in ordering the right size! I am 5'6" and 135lbs, and I would normally wear a size 4. I ended up wearing a size 8 (size 6 wasn't available) which gave me enough length to be comfortable, and the adjustable tie on the back made it a perfect fit, even without a bra. Other reviews aren't kidding when they say it runs short. I'm not someone who minds showing off a little, but my usual size 4 hardly covered the goods in both the back and the front. I do have a long torso, so it's possible it would be less dramatic on someone with a shorter torso, but I definitely recommend sizing up one or two sizes. The skirt flares out quite a bit which creates a nice narrow waistline and would likely be flattering on most shapes. This dress isn't exactly a showstopper, but it is a great version of the LBD with the added flare of the tie-back. It is very comfortable, with thick, quality fabric, and gave me the freedom to indulge in food and dance all night long. I would definitely recommend.

I rented this for my husbands birthday party. It was sophisticated and sexy all at the same time. I'm 5'4.5 and it was short but perfect for my frame. I'm a solid size 4, 34C and the size 4 dress fit like a glove! I paired it with the rose gold KENDRA SCOTT necklace & rose gold strappy shoes. Tons of compliments all night. Oh the back was the cutest part... pretty much backless with a very secure tie to hold everything in place! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Adorable classic LBD with a fun twist!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much! This was my second time renting this dress, and it did not disappoint for round 2. It is so flattering and comfortable and then my favorite part, the back, spices up this classic little black dress! The material is nice and thick so a bra is not needed which is great because the back is open and a bra would show. I rented this dress as a back up this time and ended up needing it, they only had a 2 which fit great but was a little loose on the sides of the chest, the first time I rented I wore a 0 which fit like a glove. So as far as Elizabeth and James styles go I feel like this one ran pretty true to size (possibly only slightly small)! Love love love and will most likely rent again!
