links_reviews_title: ADORABLE dress, I should've used better judgement and ordered 2 sizes up! Wanted to wear it soo bad
links_reviews_text: They weren't kidding... this dress is a little on the short side. The model is 5'10 and I knew going into it there was a strong chance it wouldn't work out. I'm 5'11 but it was exactly what I was looking for! Unfortunately, I ordered sizes 2 and 4 due to the reviews of the bust measurements being a looser fit but the length was definitely even shorter and not wearable. Going to try order a few sizes up for my next event because the dress was just that cute!! This dress could be flattering on any body of any size!! (under 5'11:)

Loved this dress! It ran a little small so I had to wear an 8 instead of my usual 6. Showed off my shoulders and back which was great. It was a little bit short so make sure to wear something full coverage underneath if you're tall or have long legs. I wore flats for the pre-party/walk to the venue and changed into heels once I got there. I'd say between those two it definitely looks better with heels. Was great for dancing!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a petite girl!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Gala, the event was black tie and this dress was classic. I have a short, petite frame and this dress fit me wonderfully. I have a small chest so it fit well however, it was snug around the waist, but not uncomfortable. The bow on the back was adorable.

Loved this dress! I'm 5'4 so it wasn't short for me I loved that the skirt was flowy. The back is beautiful and the bow really makes it more unique than just another LBD. the material is thick which was great and I didn't need to wear a bar with it which usually isn't the case because I'm a 32DDD but tying the back was able to keep everything in place. So fun to dance in - definitely Rent!!
Loooved this lbd the material was thick and the length was absolutely perfect for my 5'0 self; dresses are always too long...finally found one with the right length!

links_reviews_title: Great bachelorette party dress! Such a flattering dress and great for dancing.
links_reviews_text: I loved the back of this dress! The material is thick so it's flattering. Runs true to size. I felt so comfortable and got lots of compliments on the dress.

links_reviews_title: Business in the front, party in the back
links_reviews_text: I sized up as I typically do with Elizabeth & James - I find these dresses tend to run tight around my ribs. The area under the armpits ended up being a bit wide, but the tie in the back tightened that right up. The dress was comfortable and perfect for twirling on the dance floor all night long. The back tie was a great detail on an otherwise plain dress. Not my favorite rental, but a nice option for this event.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for my 30th birthday !
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress . It does run small around the waste. I wore sticky boobs instead of a normal bra because of the open back.

This was my first RTR and I could not have been more impressed! I went with the bigger size to have more length in the skirt but could have easily went with the 8. I didn't wear a bra with it because it would have been noticeable in the back but I didn't need to. The thick fabric provided more than enough coverage. It was fun and flowy and provided more than enough room to dance! I would definitely highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Classy in the front, cute in the back!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and true to size. It was fitted perfectly to my waist and then because loose! You could also easily accessorize with it!
Definitely on the shorter side, but not a big deal for me because I'm short too! Very comfortable and easy to move in. Back bow is adjustable to fit your chest. Nice material.

This dress fit so perfectly. The material was high end. The back of the dress is what made the dress. I got so many complements. It is very short, but it was very classy. I wore pasties and no bra and you could not tell. I still think about this dress...I wish I owned it!

Fun dress with a very flattering shape. No bra necessary. I am a weightlifter so I prefer dresses wth stretch this had non, so a little tight through the back. But the adjustable tie helps this issue. Danced and partied all night without having to adjust myself once!

links_reviews_title: Danced all night long in this cute fit!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I could have probably fit in the 6, but the 8 was the only size available so I went for it. It wasn't too loose since the tie was manual in the back! I have broad athletic shoulders and this cut was perfect. I received so many compliments!! It was short, but not too short. I danced all night comfortably!

I'll say this dress runs large because I wore a size 6 at 8 months pregnant (usually a size 4). It was very comfortable around bump and easy to wear. Was able to get away with a normal black bra underneath. With the blue with black overlay, this dress is on the dark navy side, paired with orange accessories for a fall wedding. May be too short for tall women.
Simple and the lace is nice

It's hard to tell in the picture but I wore this 7 months pregnant to a benefit. It is super comfortable and stylish! Ordered one size up from normal size (usually a size 4, currently 145 lb preggo). Loved it!!

Love love LOVED this rental! Perfect with a light shawl for an early May wedding in New England. Received so many compliments. The navy/black color combo is beautiful and the lace is high quality. Loose fitting but super flattering, not tent-like at all. Perfectly hid my small 5 month baby bump (no one even could tell I was pregnant) and was great for the dance floor. Highly recommend and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wore for my Baby Shower and it was a perfect Fit!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 4, which was one size up from my pre-pregnancy size 2. I am 5'2" and went from 122 to now 140 weight (mostly bump @7 months pregnant ). The dress was a comfortable fit and everything I needed for my baby shower.
Absolutely loved this dress! It was incredibly comfortable and can be flattering for all body types! I received tons of compliments and went great with tights and booties for a winter wedding!
The dress fit my 19 week bump well and was cute for work.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a holiday cocktail party and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I just loved this lovely little dress. It is the perfect dress for a party where you actually want to eat! The cut is a little roomy, but it doesn't look potato-sacky b/c it drapes so nicely. The dress is short but not so short that you can't sit down in it. I didn't need to wear spanx b/c of the forgivable cut, but I wish I would have bought a strapless bra to wear with it b/c my black bra straps showed through in the lace in the upper back. It didn't look terrible, but it was a little detail I wish I would have thought of. The blue is a little darker than in the pictures of the model...the dress reads black. The details of the lace are just gorgeous and I got a ton of compliments on it. I highly recommend it!

Rented this as a backup for my birthday. I was disappointed that some of the other, flashier styles I'd rented didn't fit me well. This dress came through! It looks basic in the photos, but it's crazy flattering in person, and it photographs beautifully. It drapes elegantly over the figure. The trapeze shape looks exaggerated in the photos, but in person it's more of an A line. The lace at the neck is lovely, and the subtle flash of color in the lace is very pretty. It's a very comfortable dress, as well, thanks to the material and the shape. All in all a total gem. Feels as comfortable as a nightgown, looks like a formal dress, and makes you look great in photos. Maybe it's not the most trendy or flashy, but I highly recommend!

This dress was a saving grace! I had a wedding to attend just 4 weeks after giving birth to my second child. This totally hid my lingering bump and made me feel more like my pre pregnancy self! Prior to baby I was 125 lb, 5'5'' and typically a size 2. Right now I am about 137lbs and 34dd. A size 4 fit like a dream! A 6 might have been a bit roomier (though I didn't try one on), but i didn't feel at all restricted in the 4. Highly recommend!!
Very flattering! The lace overlay isn't heavy or weigh you down. It's soft and the dress felt luxurious. Perfect for a summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR dresses to date!
links_reviews_text: Sometimes I worry about this style dress, (often looks boxy or adds pounds having a fuller bust), but I found this dress to be true to size, super comfortable for dancing/eating/drinking as much as I wanted, and yet also still really flattering! I wore it for a summer wedding and it was breathable and flowy, so not too hot either. The detail is hard to see in the picture, but it's really beautiful and the black and blue combo was really nice.

I rented this dress for a friend's wedding at 27 weeks pregnant. It worked out perfectly. It wound up fitting me differently than the model. It was less A-line/flared and more fitted around the stomach due to the baby, but it was so comfortable and I was still able to wear my normal size. The lining/shell had plenty of give and extra room as well as the outer lace layer. I am 5'8" and the length was good even with the baby belly in the way. The lace is very soft, not itchy at all. The blue in the lace is subtle but very pretty. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: The fit is comfortable and great for dancing! The hemline is beautiful. Compliments all night! Love!
links_reviews_text: The lace on top is shear, so I opted for a strapless bra. But I’m sure a nude of clear strap would’ve been fine. The large, open lace can have a tendency to get caught. Be careful. I think this would be a great option for pregnant women. The under lining is stretchy and the outer lace is generous.

This dress fit like a dream. It was comfortable, formal, and felt sexy at the same time. I loved that this dress didn't hug my mid section. Also the lace at the bottom looked great. The only downside was that the paint was worn to nothing on button on the back of the dress. There were a few snags in the lace but they were not obvious. I was careful to make sure the slip dress under the lace was not flipped up. I never had any issued though. I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Bump friendly and not too short
links_reviews_text: I️ sized up 2 sizes (33w pregnant) and felt this dress fit well (not too big or too short). It was 90 degrees (in November!) when I️ wore this, so I️ was glad to have chosen a short dress. Would rent again.

Fit was super flattering and not billowy like a lot of these dresses tend to be. I'm 5'5" and weigh 125 and I wore the 0. I'm usually between a 0 and a 2 in most dresses. The length was perfect for a wedding and it's perfect for a fall or winter wedding!

links_reviews_title: How the navy in it shimmered in the sunlight.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3" and it was a bit long. But overall super lovely and very comfy.

I was afraid that the trapeze cut was going to make me look huge in photos because of how it can hang on a person but I was happily mistaken. Loved the fit and comfort level of the dress. Paired well with my boyfriends' tux. Tons of compliments highly recommend

Beautiful, easy-to-wear dress. Wore this to a semi-formal/cocktail party. Prefect upgrade to the traditional LBD. More fun and formal. I love that it hides problem areas with out making you look like a potato sack. I'm usually a 10/12, but the 8 was perfect in this dress.
Very flattering fit. Worn for a black tie optional wedding and I felt very appropriately dressed.
I am 70 years old, and this dress was super flattering. I had at least 50 people come up and say how fabulous my dress was.

This dress made me feel beautiful when so many other dresses have cut me in awkward places now that I have a post baby body. Definitely made me feel like I was back to my old self again being that it hardly even touched my skin! It did all that without making me feel like I was wearing too much fabric! I would definitely recommend! I wish I had remembered to take a picture of the whole dress! For now I only have the top!
I rented this dress for my law school graduation and absolutely loved it. The fit is flattering and the dress is comfortable, fun and gorgeous. Highly recommended
Rented for a cocktail party. The dress was great allowing room to move. I rented a two so the fit was as I expected.... The dress will stand out because it isn't like the typical lbd.
great fit -- only complaint is the dress is easily 'snag-able' -- so watch those chain link purses, ladies!
Perfect for baby bump, as other reviewers described.

This fun and flirty dress was comfortable and chic! I sized down as I'm a true 8 and read the reviews. I wore the 6 for its closer and more flattering fit. Enjoyed the event and the compliments too! I would definitely rent here again!

links_reviews_title: Felt and looked gorgeous at 7 months pregnant!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my birthday celebration. At 7 months pregnant I was concerned about finding a dress that wouldn't look like a tent or a sausage casing and this dress was perfectly in between! I normally wear a size 4 but ordered a 6 and an 8. They both fit great but I ended up wearing the 8 to have a little extra room. It's form fitting at the top and then loosely opens up so it flows nicely without looking like a bag. I paired mine with black tights and booties since it was December. The underlay is black and the lace is part black and part shimmering blue. Loved the dress! Another perfect rental from RTR!

links_reviews_title: Arrived on time as promised....clean and in perfect condition!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, exquisite lace detail, very flattering!
So pretty! Almost six months pregnant, and it still looked great. You couldn't even tell from the front that I was pregnant.
Fit me perfectly. Flattering for any body type. I was comfortable all night and got many compliments. Cannot wait to rent again!
I am 5'2" and about 125. Both the 4 and 6 fit, decided to wear the 6 because it was a little roomier in the bust. (I am 34d) Got quite a few compliments and it was comfortable to wear

After reading reviews I ordered both 6 & 8. I ended up wearing 8 because 6 felt a little snug in chest. Dress was gorgeous. I received several compliments. So why 4 stars and not 5?....it was not as blue as photo of model. Dress looked black. The lace detail on bottom was just as pretty in person as in pictures.

Easy to pair with black shoes/ accessories you may already have in your closet. Blue undertone isn't as vibrant as I had hoped like in the model photo. Lace was snagged in a few places from previous renters but luckily not obviously enough for others to notice. Lace detail was super feminine and pretty.

First RTR dress = success. I wanted something comfortable but cute for my nonprofit's black tie optional fundraiser gala. I volunteer throughout the night so I need to look nice, but be able to move, meet and greet, and troubleshoot. This dress perfectly fit the bill, and I got a ton of compliments! It was very flattering in its flowy shape without making me look too wide and the neckline was perfect. The blue in the lace overlay is subtle but a lovely, unique touch. I'm 6'0 and normally wear a size 12, but I often have to size up in dresses. Both the size 12 and 14 fit, but I ended up wearing the 14 because it was a tad bit longer. Even so, I wore black stockings, and the dress might have been a little too short for my formal event without them. #tallgirlproblems

I absolutely loved this dress. It ran large making me feel Teeny Tiny! :-) The details of the dress made it stand out at the wedding I attended and I received quite a few compliments. Even the wedding photographer looked up during the ceremony and mouthed "I love your dress!" I am quite busty and this dress gave me room for my bust. I could also wear a regular bra with black straps-- great bonus! It also had a looser fit going down from my chest, which let me eat and drink as much as I wanted! I would absolutely rent again.
Beautiful fabric and great fit, this is a gorgeous dress and I would definitely rent it again

links_reviews_title: Wore this 5.5 months pregnant and it fit PERFECT!
links_reviews_text: Great dress. I was 5.5 months pregnant and wore it to a family wedding. I got multiple compliments on it. It was so comfortable, fit well over the belly with plenty of room.
This was my first RTR, and I have since rented two more times. This dress was stunning in person. The details were gorgeous, and it was flattering/comfy.

It's an odd piece - a bit racy because of the cut outs but otherwise sort of conservative. Good for a date night but I think it might be odd to figure out what to wear it to. Also the restaurant was very air conditioned and I got so cold with the open back!

links_reviews_title: Classy and cute; great for a hot day!
links_reviews_text: I took this on a trip to Vegas and wore it for a day of brunch and shopping. It was lightweight on an extremely hot day and felt classic but with a stylish twist. I like the placement of the cutouts and dress length was perfect for my height with or without heels.

links_reviews_title: Everything about this dress is excellent. Simple yet sassy - so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit me perfectly, usually a size 4 or so but wore the size 2.
Wore this to dinner one night while on vacation in Provence. The fit was great, I felt very sophisticated with a twist.

links_reviews_title: I felt so great in this dress! It is classy with a hint of sass. Great for a casual outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: The top was tighter than the skit, but other than that the fit was pretty close to perfect. I thought the dress would be longer per other reviews, but I was pleased that it hit just above the knee.
A bit tight but overall cute and fun style!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress wasn't the one I originally had my heart set on, but it was PERFECT. Thank goodness my first choice wasn't available for the week I needed it! I loved everything about this dress....the style, the fit, the length, the way I felt in it. I wasn't sure if I'd like the "cutout style" but I really did. I'm tall (5'10") and with the shoes I selected I'm just at 6' in the picture; length was at my knee. I simply can't wait to rent this TB dress again.

Super cute dress with cut outs that were very flattering. Wore it to an outdoor lunch date and received an outstanding compliment from a woman in the bathroom who said she spotted the dress on me earlier at the restaurant. The fabric and small pattern are cute and casual- almost a neutral like wearing denim. Dress is easy to wear and move in- the clasp at the bottom of the top zipper does dig in a it if you sit against it. Loved it!

Loved this so much. Sexy without revealing too much and can show skin while still wearing a good bra. I went up a size to accommodate my chest (30G) and as a result the skirt was a little big, but it worked and I felt great in the dress. Lots of compliments.
This was the perfect dress for a wedding shower. Classy with a sexy touch. Fit like a glove but a little hard to sit down in.

Love, love, love this dress! It fits like a glove and is super comfortable. I could wear a normal bra, which is always a plus. It's a little longer than I expected (I am only 5'4"), but I thought it still looked cute.

I was able to pull double duty with this dress. For work, I paired with a cardigan and skinny leather belt to cover the cut outs. For an evening garden birthday party, paired with a flat sandal, it makes an easy outfit. Its the perfect length to wear with heels or flats. The fabric is heavy enough to not need a bra, though one can be worn without issue.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress!! One of my favorites ever!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely amazing!! I received SO many compliments throughout the night about my dress. The cut-outs are slightly sexy but the modest neckline and longer hem line (hit just above the knee on me and I'm 6'2) make the dress classy and appropriate for more casual weddings. You could wear a regular bra with cut of the dress and the fabric was beautiful, you could tell it was very well made. The cut of the dress also naturally makes you look thinner than you are at the waistline, like magic! It was great! This was my first Rent the Runway dress and it was a total success!!

I hated to send this dress back because I enjoyed it so much. Quality dress in an interesting jacquard fabric. I wore it a bunch of times during my unlimited rental - once to work (with a cardigan), to my daughters' dance dress rehearsal, to a graduation party and a rehearsal dinner. I received so many compliments on this dress. Everyone seemed to this dress from teenage girls to (fashionable!) grandmothers . You can dress it up or down - I wore with flats and also with a block heel (sorry the pics I've uploaded doesn't really show off the dress very well but I didn't get a full length shot). I saw this as a perfect rental because the cutouts are trendy and something that you might be reluctant to invest in because they could be "out" next season. I loved the length of the dress (on me it fell just below the knee) because as other reviewers have mentioned it is conservative enough to counteract the (potentially) risqué cutouts.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering dress for summer beer fest!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a beer festival in 95° heat and it was awesome. The fabric is thick though was not too hot, the cutouts probably helped! It came down just below my knees and the fit was incredibly flattering. Glad I could easily wear a bra with it. Modest and classic though still a little funky and more interesting than I usually find Tory Burch, I had tons of people commenting on it and asking where it was from! I wish I could buy it! Only downside, it did look quite worn, especially on the inside, as the white lining was discolored and it seemed a little dirty. The outside looked fine, you can just tell this one has been rented a lot.
Cut outs make for a very unique and flattering detail. Rented for one shower and liked it so much I held onto it for an additional event. If short, does go below the knee though.
Love it! It was different and very flattering. It was great for an outdoor wedding. Fabric was very structured which helped keep things in place with the cutouts.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a wedding next week as part of my unlimited subscription. Can't wait to wear it!
links_reviews_text: Makes my waist look small. Perfect for hourglass shape. A little bit long, but ok considering there's cutouts

links_reviews_title: Never worn a dress with cut outs--but loved it!
links_reviews_text: Felt very pretty in this! It is the right amount of covered up with the cut outs. It was tighter in the chest area and the bottom piece was looser so it looked nice. I am normally a 4-6 but wore the 2

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for classy with a little edge...
links_reviews_text: Loved the mix between conservatively cut skirt and cut out sides and back! Fit was perfect.

A random girl yelled out of her car while driving by complimenting my outfit. That's how cute this dress was!The fabric was amazing quality. It was nice and thick but it wasn't too hot due to the cutouts. I really can't think of any cons about this dress, except maybe it's a little long. That midi length is so in style right now though, so I didn't mind it. I would definitely rent this again!
I loved how elegant it was, but had a surprise on the sides and the back. I got so many compliments and it was fitting for so many occasions!

links_reviews_title: just not cute on me. awkward
links_reviews_text: not my style

Very nice dress with a great material. The material has a tiny bit of sheen to it and can totally be dressed up or down. I wore for a summer date night and the sides and back are the perfect wow factor. Would say the upper half of he dress is snug around the rib cage. True to size but size up if you're nervous about the top half

I wasn't able to wear as it runs small in my opinion. It has an odd zipper that zips from the top down of the top portion. It's likely not a great choice if you have a larger chest as there is no give. The skirt portion fit true to size for a 6. It came to about knee length on me, not most flattering length.
Cute dress with a nice material, however, it is narrow in the rib cage yet seemed to run bigger in the bust so I had to send back. No stretch at all!
Great fit.
Im always in between sized and wish i got a medium. Reording in the correct size!

May work if I was wearing heels, but felt awkward in length. Hit me right at my knees, and as my sister described "makes you look dowdy". Was a bummer, as I loved the cutouts and actually worked on my chest.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a rehearsal dinner. I'm 5'9 with a long torso, so the cut-outs were more pronounced than they would be on a shorter person, but it still fit me extremely well. It was flattering and comfortable!
Wore for a rehearsal dinner. Fit true to size but definitely needed to pinch in my ribcage--but that's an issue I often have. SO MANY COMPLIMENTS. Would recommend, buy, and wear again.
great dress - holds it's shape well. Very comfortable and much cuter than I expected even.

I wore this for a bridal shower I hosted. It is super cute and the cutouts show just enough skin to be fun, but it's balanced out by the longer length of the skirt. Note that the way it's made will accentuate any belly you have, and it's not possible to wear Spanx under. It's also quite a challenge to get on! The 2 fit like a dream.

links_reviews_title: The dress was pretty and very sophisticated
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and the cut outs looked great. it works for all occasions!

links_reviews_title: Sexy in all the right ways!
links_reviews_text: What a head turner! My husband thought it was super cute and adventurous. The top was a little loose. I was worried about sitting down in it with the cutouts, but it felt/looked fine.
i could have worn a size smaller for a better fit but the way its made even a larger size has a tailor fit look as the back portion by your waist drapes down a bit.
I didn't end up wearing this dress because it runs very small and didn't fit. The quality and style of it are beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Small on top, large on bottom, generally cute
links_reviews_text: The top is true to size, maybe a bit small. The bottom, though, runs large and the skirt is long. Overall it is cute, but the fit was a little weird! Nice material and cute pattern.

links_reviews_title: Better in person than the pictures!
links_reviews_text: This was a little edgy for work, but I work in a young and modern office setting, so I wore it and got tons of compliments on the style! If deciding between two sizes, I would order down. I am 5'8" and 135 lbs, and the size 4 fit perfectly.

I loved this dress -- it was cut well and showed just enough skin to be sexy without being scandalous. I actually wore this to work with a button-up cardigan (so you couldn't see the cutouts) before I flew to New Orleans for a night out on the town for my birthday.
I was surprised it wasn't true black, and almost looked faded. But I was overall happy with the look for a wedding that I wasn't sure if it was going to be casual of formal

I received this dress as my last minute backup. I had to iron it upon arrival since it is cotton. I was initially worried that the fabric would be too casual. My dress was perfect for an outdoor late spring evening wedding where the temperature soared to the upper 80's. The fit is relatively true to size. Easy to zip on the side with the comfortable ruched waist. It was a bit right across my chest as I'm top heavy and wore a padded strapless bra. It did not fit loosely on top like on the skinny display model. The high-low hemline was not prevalent but I got lots of compliments and it matched my straw and linen accessories and my gold jewelry well. The color was advertised as a black background but it was really very navy.

Much cuter in the pic than in person. The material wasn't my favorite, too structured. The top of the dress had A LOT of room. I'm a small C-cup and it was just too big on the top. I'm sure I would have liked it better if it was more fitted up top.
It was very comfortable but pulled a little funny in the chest. Got several compliments on it.

Great dress! Love the high low design and the one shoulder look. Stretchy waist which is comfortable and flattering. Looks nice with your hair swept to the side. Wore this on book tour and I think it looked pretty good!
Great for anyone with an hourglass figure. It ended up being slight fancier in person than it looked online, but I rolled with it.
Cute dress - comfy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't the most flattering dress I've rented
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my mom's retirement party, but when I tried it on, I felt like it wasn't quite as flattering on me as the other dress I rented. So, I didn't end up wearing it...
I enjoyed wearing this dress! It fit nicely, wasn't too tight and had nice varied length detail. The fabric was thicker but not too heavy. Wore it during a fun night of bar hopping.

This dress was beautiful and I received a lot of compliments on it. It has a side zipper which was easy to zip and I loved the hi-lo aspect of it. I didn't have to wear a bra but you could wear a strapless or some of the petals to cover up if you needed. It was comfortable and perfect for an outdoor evening party. I would highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Cute, easy to wear day to evening dress
links_reviews_text: This was a fun dress to wear! I loved the high to low hem and the slight ruffle. I also loved the floral fabric. It was the type of dress that worked perfectly for a slightly fancier daytime look and it transitioned perfectly into evening. Not too fancy, not too casual. It was really comfortable through the waist and bust. My only issue with the dress is that the arm hole was pretty snug. I don't generally have an issue with that so it must just be smaller there? Overall, the arm hole size might keep me from renting again but I thought it was great for the occasion!
I enjoyed this dress. It fit well and was a nice item to wear to a Hawaii themed outdoor party in July.

I could ALMOST zip this fully. The material does not give at all, so it either fits or it doesn't. Had the bodice zipped up, I think the fit would have been great everywhere else. The material seems almost matte but still vibrant--great material!! Sadly, I am returning it without wear.

I had to pull the elastic band up above my baby bump which made the top bunchy and the front of the skirt a little too short for my liking. Otherwise, I love the design and the floral pattern. Maybe I will try this again in the future after the baby is born.
I didn't end of wearing this one. But I loved it! Fit well, slightly big. I will rent again!
It poofed too much at the waist/hips which made me look larger than I am. Not flattering. The top half was ok.
The material was a lackluster for the event I was attending. It would be a nice day dress. The fit was fine.

links_reviews_title: did not drape nicely like it appears in photo
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this. The fabric was quite stiff which caused a ballooning effect, rather than draping in a flattering way.
Agree with others, it poofs out in odd places on the top. Or perhaps there is just extra room built in for extra busty gals. It was all right, but not my favorite.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but fabric and cut were not for me
links_reviews_text: Fabric is rather stiff & I prefer a softer flowing material. Also waist is a bit high (I am 5'8)

links_reviews_title: Cute dress easily work appropriate with a jacket
links_reviews_text: Cute dress easily work appropriate with a jacket. True to size

I ended up not wearing this dress and wore the other RTR dress that I got for the summer wedding that I was attending. I personally didn't like the fabric of this dress, as it felt more casual than what I was looking for, but it would be perfect for a more casual summer wedding. For my height, the high-low look of the dress was definitely unflattering, even when I tried pairing it with heels. This style just might not be for me, and I definitely wished that it was!
The fit is very forgiving, gorgeous dress but am sending back because the smocked waistline flairs out on the skirt making my hips look huge. :(

This dress was very comfortable. I initially intended to wear it to my mom’s 90th birthday party but because the dress is cotton it seemed a bit too casual for that so I wore it the next day to an outdoor party. Be aware that because it’s cotton you will most likely need to iron it before you wear it.

The dress I got was not black. It's navy blue. The shoulder also bunched weirdly - too much fabric gathers there and I gave me a weird bulge. Main problem is that black is in the name, and in no light did the dress I receive look black. Especially with black shoes on.
I wore this to three dinner parties. It is so comfortable and because of the pattern I didn't worry about my kids wrecking it. Loved it!

I would have given this dress 5 starts but it is a tad tight under the arm of the sleeve side. Not enough for me not to wear this great dress but just a tad tight. I would have bought this dress if it fit a little bit better. The dress is not silky so it doesn't have to be dressed up, but it can be. I am normally an 8 and other than the tightness under the arm the rest of the dress fit perfectly.
Fun and light. Good rent. Would rent again.

This was my back up dress for a wedding and ended up being invited to a bridal shower the same day. The dress was fun and easy to wear and a great fit. It was fun to have a dress style that I wouldn't usually pick. The only sad part was I forgot to get a picture in it!

For my body type, a structured dress is essential for maximum flattery--this dress was not that. The dress's waistband is elastic, which is fine for some, but for me it wasn't flattering at all. The fabric was loose and needed to be steamed but even then, the lack of structure didn't do my body type any favors. The fabric bunched all around the top and bottom of the elastic waist. The top was too large for my bust size. If you can make a zero-structure cut & fabric work, the one shoulder is pretty and so is the pattern. I needed structure so this didn't work at all.
Didn't like the material it's made from, it was matte cotton and I thought it'd be a dressier fabric.

This is a fun dress to wear with the one shoulder design. I would recommend sizing down which I did in this case. Typically I wear an eight and the six fit perfectly. Very comfortable even in super hot Texas weather.

I ordered this as a back up dress for my husband's birthday party. I'm glad I had another option! I go between an 8 & 10 and the 8 was still pretty huge. The skirt was so full and the fabric was a little stiff so it poofed out a bit from the waist. The top also just was puffy looking. It just wasn't flattering. My husband was sweet and said it looked great but I felt like a big flowered marshmallow puff! I'd definitely try sizing way down...that might look better!

I didn't end up wearing this because there was just too much fabric. The top was much too long for my torso, and there was WAY too much fabric around my hips (and I have ample hips). I loved the print and the design but it looked terrible on my frame.
Fitted waist, more room in the bust than I needed for 34B but still good. Modest length and light weight fabric. Comfortable, cute, done!
Loved the pattern and one shoulder design of this dress. I also loved the elastic waist as it made it more comfortable. Will be renting again!
The dress fit nicely, it was just too big up top. If I had a longer torso it would've been perfect. This dress is better for taller gals!

I rented this dress for date night and dressier everyday. It runs slightly large, but it works well that way. The one shoulder is so flattering, fitted waist allows for nice definition, and I even love the high/low skirt. And I am not a high/low trend fan at all. The print is gorgeous over black. I received endless comments- I will wear this dress a few more times before returning and will definitely rent again. Love it! Update: I did end up wearing this for so many events: date, dinner out, even a backyard bbq. I hated returning this beauty!
Super cute romper! I wore it to a cocktail party for my husbands work. Got lots of compliments and felt great all night.

Fit great, flattering and fun. I didn't realize the back was so open. I wore a black take under so I could still wear a bra. Somewhat difficult to take down for bathroom but overall I worked it out. I would wear this again to a party/night out.

links_reviews_title: This price was simple, slimming and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I wore a gold sequined bandeau under it as it was a jumper of unused tape I'd need to retake every time I went to the bathroom, but the bandeau was a perfect touch.
Fit great and super comfortable! Was definitely not gold as pictured on the model (pretty much black with a hint of gold).

Wore this for a fallen angel costume. It looks more black in photos but in person you can see more gold. I sized down so the sleeves would fit tighter than I'd seen in other photos. The xs was just right but slightly short for my torso. Had no issues with the opening and wore pasties just in case. Loved it and would rent again

By itself it might look a bit too flashy but I paired it up with some Pendleton x Nike Airmax to keep it more casual for a roller skating date. Color: not as gold or shiny, much darker in person Neckline: V is deep and floppy. It has a mini snap for a modest V but it's a bit too high. Instead, I just went with an interesting bralette underneath.

Ordered in both a Small and X-Small and wore the XS. Really comfortable and easy to wear. More black than gold in real life. The best part about this romper is the subtle open back. I received a lot of compliments and felt great!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but short and hard to get out of!
links_reviews_text: I wore this romper to a party my friends threw for our friends who just got engaged. You definitely have to wear something under it - I wore a black bralet. I got a ton of compliments and enjoyed wearing it but it was very short and hard to get in and out of because there's no zipper.
I wore this romper for my birthday dinner. Rompers are fun to wear in place of a dress. Also a great going out look! Fits TTS.

#1 Pro: Rompers make for a great time on the dance floor. #1 Con: Way too low cut, and got very close to flashing people all night. There is a little clip to close the front, but it is way too high up, and very matronly. I ended up using a safety pin to close it at a normal place, but because it is a romper, I had to undo the safety pin in order to use the restroom. Essentially, the outfit caused me a lot of stress throughout the night, and I ended up losing my safety pin in a bathroom with minimal lighting. I wouldn't rent this piece again, but it definitely looked good, and was a unique outfit for the occasion, I got lots of compliments throughout the night.

I really loved this romper, this color was great - just like the model picture. I ended up wearing the XS (my back up size) instead of the S, mostly because the elastic waistline was roomy. There was a fun open back detail that you can't really see in the pictures, which was fun. My only complaint was the neckline was cut extremely low. I had to put a safety pin in it to avoid my bra hanging out all night. With a smaller bust or a pretty bralette, this wouldn't have been a problem. Overall, very good experience, very flattering in the booty! :)

links_reviews_title: My grad party was unforgettable with this romper. Literally every one asked me about my romper!
links_reviews_text: This romper was perfect! I used fashion tape to show a little more cleavage as I don't believe snapping it would have showed much, and I paired it with black ankle booties. It made my grad party unforgettable, everyone complimented me all night!

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Sexy and classy and fun all in one.
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumper. I felt sexy and fun, and I was comfortable all night. I used double stick tape to make the closure a little lower. I paired it with tall boots and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for my event - fun and easy to get down!
links_reviews_text: I got the Small and Medium, and both fit almost identically, but I decided on the Medium just because I knew I would be drinking and dancing (as evidenced by the picture - whoops). There's a snap closure at the top, but for anyone with any cleavage I would say that the placement of the snap is a little matronly. I used some beauty tape instead and it worked really well. The waistband is elastic and the fluttery layer over the shorts are both super forgiving and flattering. I wore this to a night time event in Houston, TX, so it was a little chilly, but the sleeves definitely helped (and I could wear a normal bra so no nippage either). If you have a fall event, have lost your tan from summer, and are feeling a little chunkier than usual, this outfit will definitely make you feel great!!

links_reviews_title: could be cute with tights, too short!
links_reviews_text: couldn't wear it because it was too short and it's summertime so couldn't wear tights. the top is more open, would need a safety pin to hold it closed.

links_reviews_title: I didn’t end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: I wasn’t aware that the romper had an open back, so I didn’t have the right bra to wear with it. The snap on the front was flimsy and kept popping open. I didn’t wear it for my event because I didn’t trust that it would stay closed.

I was going to a fun but fancy work event and this romper helped me bridge that. Some of the reviews complained about the snap in front- I didn't have a problem with it except that it wouldn't stay snapped. I ended up wearing a solid black bralet under with a strips across the back and it worked for maintaining cover when the front opened without looking awkward with the back opening.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a weekend night out.
links_reviews_text: I gained about 8 pounds so this was great to still feel skinny with a little leg action but hide the mid area. I had to put a safety pin on the top area as the button kept popping but that was a simple fix.

links_reviews_title: Got a new nickname - hot legs !
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit , easy to dance all night in . Had a very sexy , but classy vibe to it . I paired over the knee boots with it to set the hotness factor over the edge . Loved it !

links_reviews_title: Got to have the right body type!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for NYE, it would have been perfect for the occasion with black tights and black heels, but unfortunately it just was completely unflattering on me. I'm kind of tall, but this romper was prettttty far up my butt, even with tights on it was uncomfortable to try to get in and out of. The top didn't lay right at all, maybe the Large would have been better?! Anyway, I didn't end up wearing it. I know I have a long torso, so maybe that was why it didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: Much darker in person ... back has open slit
links_reviews_text: Comfortable
Super cute and comfortable. Wore it for a work Mardi Gras party. Perfect length for a long waist, and plenty of room for beer and dancing.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but didn't have a wow factor for me
links_reviews_text: I rented this as part of my unlimited but was not impressed with how it looked. The cut was good. I ordered a small and am a S/M in tomorrow because I have a long torso but this small fit in this cut. The material was pretty but kind of a drab gold color-almost brown. I tried this on but did not wear it and returned for a different dress for my charity fundraiser.

The top has a very small button that easily comes undone, so the likelihood of you needing a safety pin is high. The dress is perfect for dancing and super comfortable, but it's definitely fit for a more casual night out. I wouldn't wear it to a club though as the material isn't too high quality.

links_reviews_title: Adorable. Perfect size. Easy to get on and off. Looked great with stockings. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and was the perfect amount of sparkle.

links_reviews_title: Super cute once I got it on!
links_reviews_text: I am just under 5'9" and curvy....I rented this golden romper for a glam rock Halloween party. It's really cute & I have worn similarly cut rompers...but this one unlike others has no zippers & did not open at the next: ( I managed to squeeze past this obstacle when I did my fitting the day before, but when I went to take it off! OMG! What a nightmare and most definitely not how I saw myself trapped into it at a party with beverages! Oy vey. Made no sense - I rented a similar romper during the summer that simply had a button at the back of the neck to child in and out- no need to slither in and get stuck inside! : b. I did not wear this : ( wasted rental $$$

wore this for my bachelorette party and loved it! very comfortable. the stretchy material makes it movable and the lace sleeves breathe well so dancing doesn't get too hot. a great way to dress up without wearing a dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a concert - it was comfortable and cute!
links_reviews_text: Cons: Hard to get in and out - I'm usually a medium, but I had to wear the large since it was difficult to get in and out of it easily. Luckily, the large didn't look baggy or oversized on me. Pros: Super cute!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: This was so comfortable & seemed perfect for a night out, but when I saw photos I realized how unflattering it was. Made me look wider than I am. Otherwise it was pretty. As other reviewers call out, it is fairly low cut (which is great for going out but it's not flattering in other ways...)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress!! Runs very very small and is super short, but classy!
links_reviews_text: I’m a size 0 in everything and I was surprised I could even fit into the 2! Runs very small, I would size up. My 10 year old literally fit into the 0 and she is 90 lbs. :) Got so many compliments. I recommend thick black tights if you’re taller like me because the dress is so short. Very comfy & could dance all night! One of my favorite RTR! I am 5’7” and 119lbs

I really liked this dress! Fit was small as others have reviewed. The black lining of the sz 0 fell below the lace, has probably been stretched from people pulling it down, so I wore the 2 which fit fine. I'm short 5'0", so shorter length was fine for me. The reason I'm giving a 4 is b/c there is no hook/eye closure at top of zipper so it kept coming unzipped!! I had to safety pin it. If I'd worn my hair up, this would have been a deal breaker. Not sure if dress is supposed to have hook/eye and has just been ripped off over time, but neither dress had one.

I love this dress - i rented the white one for engagement photos. It runs small, i am usually a 2 and the 4 was a comfortable fit. It is SUPER SHORT!!! Too short at times, i would recommend this dress to petite ladies. Otherwise size up. The dress did have signs of wear, the lace around the neck does not lay like it should, but as you can see, still stunning in photos.

I rented this for a dress to impress event in Boston. The dress is very short and tight. Usually I am more comfortable in a form fitting dress but this one flattened my chest out. I was nervous about it being itchy because of the lace and it really wasn't. I liked how I looked in pictures with this dress, but I can't say I was comfortable the entire night. Definitely order a size up if you pick this dress!
I ordered the 8 & wore the 12. There was not a size 10 available or I would have worn that. Fabric not forgiving in stomach area & the dress is pretty short. I did wear a regular bra with it.
Super cute and flirty but fancy. It's snug without a lot of give, so if you're deciding between two sizes, Defs go up.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a girls' night out!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so gorgeous! It was very comfortable to wear, and although it fit a little snug at the beginning, it stretched out a bit throughout the night (without getting saggy). I didn't have any trouble with the lace being itchy on the arms, and I wish I could have kept this dress! As many reviewers noted, it is very short.

This dress was gorgeous. I got compliments on it all night long. It does run small so would recommend ordering up a size. I normally wear a 0 or 00 but the size 2 fit perfectly. It was perfect for an evening wedding.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a Gatsby themed holiday work party. So many compliments! Perfect glitzy glam dress
links_reviews_text: Def true to size. I wore a size 0 petite and it fit perfectly. Beautiful glimmering lace detail. I'm about 5'2 so the length was great as well.

links_reviews_title: I love, love, LOVE this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a perfect balance of sexy and classy. I got a ton of compliments. I'm 5'5 and 150 lbs and wore a size 12. The dress is pretty short but I was still comfortable, even dancing all evening.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of glitz
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a petite person like me. Love the full back zipper!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dark gold lace, way too short
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this dress, but it was so short it was almost uncomfortable! Admittedly I'm somewhat tall (5' 7"), but whew, this was approaching indecent if I shifted from straight upright which was a bit of a bummer at a new years eve event. Should have worn black tights with it! The lace sleeves were also somewhat stiff, so it limited mobility a bit. However, to the good--the fabric was beautiful! Definitely a darker gold than expected, but very pretty nonetheless. The modest neckline was nice as a comparison to some of the other NYE dresses out there. I got loads of compliments about the dress, so a unique dress for the right event!
Fun and stunning! This dress is very short! If you have awesome legs - show them off with this dress. It is stretchy and comfy. I danced all night in this dress and everyone loved it.
I loved this dress, but I wouldn't rent it again. Though I ended up wearing it, it was way too short for my taste. It was comfortable but I probably should have gone up a size.

links_reviews_title: Too short for a wedding or formal work party
links_reviews_text: The dress is stunning but way to short for a wedding or a work holiday party. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect match for this black and gold party!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'1" and the length was perfect for a this 54 year old. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress makes you feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly!
Went with one size up as the smaller size was too tight on my midsection (no stretch). Loved the detail and especially the hem.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove, a little short
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect; I am typically a 4, and I wore the 4. Not too tight, and not too loose. Fabric did not "give" a lot, so the fabric simply laid on me. Received many compliments! Only con; it is a BIT short. I am 5'2, and was taking extra precautions when sitting. Beautiful!
Fit was perfect for petite bodytype. Length is short even for me, and i'm only 5'2. Loved the dress overall because it was slightly shimmery and suitable for an evening formal event.

Although this dress is beautiful it is so short! I was constantly pulling it down and sitting was risky! Also, I was afraid the zipper at the bottom would come up and expose me even more! I'm only 5'2 and wore a 4. Can't imagine someone tall wearing this, it's look like a shirt!

links_reviews_title: Felt the dress looked great for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Fit was form fitting with some give. There was some pilling under the arms but with sequence it is understandable pus it was a night wedding event so couldn't see. I wore with tights as I felt it was short (for me). Overall is was a good experience.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't the one graduating but all eyes were on me!!
links_reviews_text: This was the first dress that I rented form RTR, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. The packaging great, and the dresses arrived in perfect condition! I'm 5'6 almost 5'7, and my weight tends to fluctuate within the 128-135 ish range. A lot of that weight is leg muscle however, so I tend to size down on dresses. After reading the reviews, I decided that I would most likely fit a size 4, and I got a size 2 as a backup. After trying both of them on, I decided to go with the size 2. Although the size 4 was a teeny (almost not noticeable) bit longer, I preferred the size 2 because it hugged my figure. The material is solid without being too thick, and it has a nice slight stretch. It was a little shorter than I'd prefer however. Wearing tights under the dress prevented wardrobe malfunctions. The dress was short enough to reveal the bottom of the darker top portion of my control top Spanx, which has never been an issue before with other dresses, so ladies, be warned, it is short. Nonetheless the lace with the gold accents was such a showstopper. I wore this to a graduation, and my did I turn heads. A couple strangers stopped to compliment me on my dress. Absolutely beautiful and eye catching. The only issue I would say that I had with this dress is the length, but hey, I'm known for scandalously short clothing :) Nothing out of the ordinary for me.

At first I wasn’t sure if I’d like this dress, but I really came to love it. My boyfriend adored it. The gold lace has a lot of bling in person, so it’s better for a festive or formal affair (if x-short is ok). As everyone notes, this dress is really short – but if you’re petite like me (5”0’) it’s a good length. It seemed to run a bit small. My usual size 0 was sold out, but the 2 turned out to be better. Although I sized up, the sleeves and bust were a little tight (had padded bra on). The lace in the arms is comfortable (as is the whole dress) but prone to snagging, even on itself. The inside black layer is jersey. Could be worn all seasons. On the sexy side for a work event or conservative affair, but perfect for parties, fancy dates or a night on the town. I was happy with this rental, it really made my night.
The lace is very comfy yet moveable.

links_reviews_title: Always having something new and beautiful to wear
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress more than I thought I would. It's difficult to see in my photo but the gold really stands out beautifully from the black. The length is on the shorter side, which I liked, and skims the body nicely without being too body conscious.

This dress was very flattering, my only complaints are that the lace was staticky and would bunch up often-revealing the black slip underneath right above my knees so I was constantly pulling the lace down. While the 6 fit it was too short on me, so I'm glad I sized up for the backup. The size 8 fit perfectly, at 5'4 with 34Ds and a short torso the length was manageable.

This was my first RTR dress and I couldn't be happier .. I love the dress, fits perfectly like a glove! Gorgeous dress with beautiful lace and a sexy zipper. The gold lace is delicate you can tell this dress is well made. I got a "0" and a size "2". The 0 fit perfectly in every way. I would definitely rent this dress again. Received many compliments on it. I recommend it for winter events but not necessarily weddings.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a "touch of gold" themed sorority date party and it was perfect. Looked great on.
links_reviews_text: Hugs in all the right places which is unique for a tight dress. Like other reviewers said it is quite short, even for a short girl. I don't usually wear tight dresses, but this one opened my eyes to them.

I wore it to a ballet production. It was extremely comfortable, and surprisingly the sleeves weren't itchy or tight. And it fit perfectly! Only reason it didn't get 5 stars was because it was a bit shorter than I expected...and I'm 5'4.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a prohibition themed holiday party and loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a prohibition themed holiday party and loved it! I'm usually a 4, sometimes a 6, and was hesitant because of all the reviews saying the dress ran small. It fit perfectly for me. Definitely snug, but not in a bad way. I paired it with tights because it was a work party, but I think it would have worked without for NYE etc.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, easy to dance in, may be short for taller people.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a NYE wedding, and I LOVED it!! It was my first RTR experience, and it worked to great. I usually wear a 4 or a 6, depending on the dress- and ended up in the 6 in this one. The 4 was pretty tiny, but the 6 fit well. I'm short- so taller people would probably find this a little too short as it was relatively short on me. The only downside to it was that some of my jewelry got caught on the lace. Otherwise, I adored it and got lots of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I had some reservations about this dress, mostly because it wasn't sparkly and it was not my first choice. However, not only did it fit like a glove, but it is even more beautiful in person! It is the perfect combination of elegant and sexy. Definitely a little short but not too short. I work it to a fancy work holiday party and it was perfect.
I love the dress, fits perfectly like a glove! Just a little short lengthwise but still soooooo cute!

The dress was beautiful, and the reviews I read before renting proved accurate. I've worn DVF before and have been very happy with her dresses. It's definitely short, even for my 5'1" frame. Other than the length, it was very comfortable and allowed for wearing a standard bra. I could have worn the 8, but I preferred the 10 for the extra room in the arms.

links_reviews_title: OK dress for a corporate holiday dinner.
links_reviews_text: This dress was OK. I normally wear a 6, but rented a 4 and 8 since there were no 6s left. I really should have picked another dress because this was not very flattering. The 4 was too tight in the bust and shoulders, and the 8 too big in the shoulders and arms. There was a lot of fabric left so the sleeves were baggy. The most annoying thing for me was that the zipper kept sliding down the entire evening and my husband kept zipping me up. I wanted to love this dress but it just didn't work out.
This dress is gorgeous and classy. Highly recommend. However- definitely size up! I am typically a 6, maybe an 8 in some designers. I could have used the 10.

links_reviews_title: Attended a Filipino College Semi-Formal in Washington, DC and had a blast (the dress helped a ton)!
links_reviews_text: Pros--True to size, hugged my body and it was comfortable. Cons--It's lace, so it's prone to catching on things. Also the sleeves were a tad tight, but didn't restrict mobility.

I normally wear size 0, but definitely needed the 2 for this dress. The 2 fit perfectly. It was a little short for my liking. I was planning on wearing a slip anyway, but noticed it added extra flair for the lace of the slip to show. I would definitely rent this dress again. Received many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Great dress to kick off the holiday season in!
links_reviews_text: Dress was extremely comfortable. Perfect dress for a thanksgiving dinner or company Christmas party. Great choice for petite girls :)
Love this dress! It hugged the curves in all the right places and it was comfortable. Winner!

Loved that the chest was lined. Fun to wear to work party in early September. Plenty of stretch for a bigger belly but still super cute for 18wks. Many bodycon dresses are too big for my belly. Very cute at 18wks/155lbs/36b chest now. Didn't feel cheap even though it was stretchy material. I love the design and am sorry I don't have anywhere else to wear it before the weather returns.
I absolutely love this dress. True to size, stretchy fabric and a good length for this 5'2" gal. This dress garnished a bunch of compliments too. I was able to move and be normal in it too.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this dress for our 1 year anniversary.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for our 1 year wedding anniversary. I am 6 months pregnant and this dress in a M felt perfect. Material was soft and stretchy and felt like I would be able to wear in every stage of pregnancy!
very strechy material

I wore this dress for my baby shower. I was 31w5d. We aren't finding out the gender, so I thought it was a cute combo of both blue and pink tones. It was very comfortable, a good length, and I could wear a standard bra. Loved it. :)
Fit was perfect it showed off my 25 week bump perfectly I got so so many compliments too. I felt beautiful and this dress is very comfortable. Perfection

This dress was so cute on the rack, however, the way the dress looked on my actual body was a different story. The actual fit of the dress was perfect but the way the pattern is positioned across the stomach region made me look like I had a larger stomach than I actually have. It's hard to tell in my picture but it's a little bit of an optical illusion. I'm not sure why they decided to switch up the pattern on such a sensitive area... the dress would have been perfect except for that weird design flaw.
Ordered the small and medium -- ended up wearing the small. Very comfortable and flattering fit. Currently 31 weeks pregnant, 5'2 and 145lbs. Loved it!
I wore this for my baby shower - about 7.5 months pregnant. It is very stretchy, so the fit was perfect. I would also wear this not pregnant as well, super cute and flattering fit!

Wore this dress to my husband's Chief Pinning Ceremony. I needed something semi casual that I could dress down with black sandals, and I also needed something I could handle a one year old in, while trying to sit through and hour long ceremony. This handled the job. It also allows you to wear a normal bra without it showing. The rouching in the abdomen area allows everything to look flawless and the material is stretchy but not loose. Great dress.
Hugged my growing bump in all the right places and was comfortable too! Love the bright colors. Fit was easy and fuss-free.
This dress was very stretchy! I ordered a medium at the advice of other reviewers, and it fit but was so tight that I had to wear a long cardigan to make it appropriate.
Thick and flaterring fabric, good support (I wore without bra). However the extra fabric and patterns in the waste line create an illusion of a "belly bump"

links_reviews_title: Perfect maternity dress to show off your bump!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress while 8 months pregnant for my baby shower. I wanted a dress that showcased my bump and this dress did so in a flattering way. I got so many compliments! It was super comfortable and cute. I sized up given I'm in my third trimester and was happy I did... if I were earlier on in my pregnancy a smaller size would've been ok because of the stretch. I recommend this dress to everyone - pregnant or not!
This dress was worn many times in my third trimester. It was very comfortable, had a lot of stretch as I grew, and received many compliments.

I got this dress to wear to an Art Gallery dinner. It was comfortable and complimenting. The gathering of the fabric around the waist was nice. The fabric is thick and did not wrinkle after being packed in a suitcase. I am tempted to buy this dress.

Depending on your figure and office dress code, this might be borderline too sexy for work but I wore it to the office on a Friday anyway, then out for drinks with friends after! Got tons of compliments throughout the day. Shelf bra gives extra support which is great.

links_reviews_title: Great, flattering to pregnancy bump (16 wks)
links_reviews_text: Great dress, perfect for a summer wedding while pregnant. I received several compliments. Would rent again!
Stretchy soft material. Easy to wear from work to date night. Would rent again. Fit true to size, loved the ruching in the tummy area.
I sized up to a medium to allow for more stretch. This was very forgiving to curves. Casual knit fabric, however you can dress it up or down. I loved the pattern and color.

Being a very busty chick, I was worried about how much cleavage would show in this dress. I cannot begin to rave enough about how I felt wearing this dress; it was sexy without being too revealing and made my curves pop. I'm a 34DDD and felt supported with just the shelf bra in the dress, which isn't something that I can say about most shelf bras. My only complaint is that the ruching on the back added a little bulk, which I wasn't a fan of. However, it wasn't enough that I felt uncomfortable or heavy-looking, just a little awkward to try to arrange it to lay nicely. My date couldn't stop complimenting me on how great I looked.

Loved this dress so much and I really wasn't expecting much. It came new with tags which is awash great and on the hanger I wasn't sure if I was going to like it, but it fit perfectly. My husband really loved it too ;). Got a bunch of compliments.

This was a perfect dressy casual kinda dress. Sexy without being provocative so I couldn't ask for anything more. Hosted a party for my hub's 40th birthday and I got so many compliments! Easy to wear, comfy, and pretty. Love!!

I wore this dress during the day to walk around the Strip. I have a horrible photo but at least you can see the fabric. I actually thought this was flattering when I stood normal, but ??? The fabric is a simple cotton, but the cut is like other Nicole Miller dresses. This dress is above the knee due to the rouching. I was the first to wear the dress (arrived with tags), and I am not sure how the fabric will age long term.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Super comfortable! Lots of compliments!
I should have gotten an M, but it wasn't available. Dress is fun, length is good. Definitely hugs every curve but the pattern makes it forgiving.
Material was good, not great. Overall fit was pretty tight
Super stretchy but also structured. Very flattering and comfortable at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Cute and flattering, but not right for my event.
links_reviews_text: Super cute and flattering. It was a little to formal for the casual party I an attending, but too tight fitting for work.
Great for maternity!
I was sceptical at first because this isn't a maternity dress.... but it has lots of stretch and room in the belly. I'm 33 weeks and now 150lbs. Really comfortable and pretty for my baby shower!
Length was good and plunge in neckline was just enough.
Beautiful but couldn't wear bc it was too tight
I wore this to a casual party and out to run errands. Easy to wear and perfect for summer. It's definitely a body con style. Awesome colors. Not a single bad thing to say about it.
Wore this to work and a party, might have been a little tight for work but still got tons of compliments! Stretchy and comfy, Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: bust was too tight, the rest fit. pattern has intentional neon yellow dots that look like a spill
links_reviews_text: Looks like a misguided Barbie dress
This dress definitely ran small and was really so so. The fabric was kinda thin, and the dress was really low with an odd shelf bra. I returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: just ok runs small did not wear it
links_reviews_text: too tight
Wore with a navy cardigan for work and it was cute, but nothing super special. Would size down next time.
Fit like a glove. Color palette was very classic.

I am in my first trimester so there is give in the stomach area :) I liked how different the cut for this high-low is. It works well for both shorter and taller ladies. My only complaint is the straps were too long so they kept slipping off my shoulders. Great for a date night or even casual wedding!

I love this feminine dress by ADEAM ! Running small with no stretch, I recommend wearing your size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear NuBra or no bra. At 5 foot, the length hit floor length on me. I loved the design of the dress. Pair with simple strappy sandal.

I love this feminine, by ADEAM ! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your size for your primary size.and going up, for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress., so you should wear , nubra or no bra. At 5 foot the length hit the floor on me with my heels. I loved the way the material felt, the flow of the dress and the way it flattered my body type. Pair with simple strappy sandal.
Couldn't zip it up. Didn't fit

links_reviews_title: Straps were too long nd not adjustable
links_reviews_text: Overall nice fit but couldn’t wear it because the straps would not stay up.
Tight in the bust, but beautiful lines.
This dress was pretty, but very bold print and had kinda a crunchy fabric feel to it. I decided not to wear this dress for the occasion. It fit true to size though.
Nice length and colors. Was also comfortable. No real wow factor and sleeves made it feel a little frumpy.
I liked this cute dress for a dinner with friends.

This dress was very comfortable and flattering. I could have worn the medium but it was a little too short for an event with work colleagues so I decided to wear the large. Very happy with this dress!

links_reviews_title: It was heartbreaking to send this one back!
links_reviews_text: This was gorgeous. I am 5' even, short legs and arms, 32E. Usually wear S/M. Medium fit perfectly, didn't even try on the S. More form fitting than a shift. A lot of reviews said too short, but not a problem for me bc I'm so short. Sleeves were a tiny bit long but definitely wearable. Gold drop necklace and nude patent heels and I was good to go for a late fall wedding. Would also work easily with tights and nice booties. I liked not needing a coat and less pale skin showing!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a semi-formal charity event.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4, 155 pounds and the dress (size large) was about 2 inches above my knee. I ended up wearing shape wear to smooth out underneath just in case. Dress was really comfortable and sleeves were great for a late fall/early winter event.

Great dress! I was nervous it may be too short based on reviews, but it was perfect. I was even able to carry around a toddler without feeling self conscious. Beautiful navy color, gold threading is not too flashy. Need minimal accessories. Would rent this one again.
True to size. Very nice dress.

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress I would definitely recommend it.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, great quality. The dress is navy blue with gold threading. When you look at the picture it looks like it’s black but it is not. It was a little too short for me. If I was young the length would have been perfect lol. Thank God I got the next size up because I think it ran a little small. All in all it was a good choice.

I'm 5'5" 150 pounds and both the M and L size fit, but the L was more comfortable and I could lift my arms all the way and dance without worrying about it getting too short. I wore the dress to my company holiday party and it worked out great. It was easy to pair with gold accessories because of the metallic details in the lace. The detail was flawless, beautiful and elegant. This dress and both of my back up choices were all clean and seemed as if they were brand new. I will definitely use this service again!
I have a booty and short torso so the dress did not fit like the picture. I cinched the waist with a belt. Very short so be careful dancing! Overall very happy!

I loved this dress. It was very flattering. I do think Spanx would have made it even better, but I forgot to pack them so I went without. I usually wear a 12 so I went with the XL. I'm 5 feet tall and it hit a little above my knee. If you're tall, it might be short, but for me it was the perfect length. The sleeves are great for winter weddings or events.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but ended up finding a different one that worked better!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, true to size. I liked that it was shorter and loved the arms!

links_reviews_title: Great dress. I felt great and got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! Navy with gold accents. The fit was great. The xs fit as well, this one just gave me a bit more wiggle room. Can wear regular bra with.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! Great fit!
links_reviews_text: It was very short. If short dresses make you uncomfortable, I would skip this one.
The dress fit great. Was a little big so could have gone down a size. Wore it for NYE and received a ton of compliments. Was really flattering.
Dress is little tighter than shown on model. Otherwise it is beautiful and did fit. Dress is longer than on model, I am 5'3" and 150 lbs. Would def rent again.
I have rented this dress before and wore it. This time I didn't but I still really love the dress. Weather was too cold to wear!

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful. It had gold throughout which added something extra.
links_reviews_text: The dress is short. I'm short and it went to the top of my knee which was perfect, but it might feel really short on taller people.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress. Not my first choice but I got a lot of complements and it was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The length was good-not too short.
The sleeves were so pretty
Great dress
Loved the lace, it was not forgiving in the tummy area.
I really liked this dress. I did not this dress because it was a little too short for me. Very comfortable, I would def rent it again for a bach party not for a family wedding.

I rented this and one other dress as options for an evening semi-formal work event. I ultimately chose to wear the other because it has pockets, which are extra handy considering the circumstances, but I did really like this, and absolutely will consider it for future dressy events. Note that it does run small: based on other customer reviews, I rented the XL, when typically I would wear an L or even M in most "typical mall/department store" brand dresses. The XL fit beautifully. It's also quite short, which isn't a problem for 5'2" me, but could be for taller women. Really nice overall, though, and I hope to have another occasion for it in the near future.
Unfortunately I expected the L would fit more flowy than it did. It ended up being as snug as a bodycon dress. Didn't bother wearing. Doesn't fit as flowy as the model shows

links_reviews_title: I ordered both a Medium and Large to ensure that one would fit. Both were too small.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs SMALL, I am typically a M-L and both sizes were too small. The Material was super scratchy as well. I am sure it would have been fine for one evening, but unfortunately, I wore a back up dress instead of this beauty!

links_reviews_title: Unique and well made but didn't fit right
links_reviews_text: Rented as one of my New Year's Eve options and was so sad it didn't fit well. Beautiful Greyish navy color with flecks of gold. Nice, structured lace material, sleeves a bit long but ok. Too tight fitting in the belly area. I probably could have gotten away with it wearing spanx but anticipating a large meal I decided it wasn't worth it. Good for petites (with flat stomachs!) and shorter women.
Very short! Too short for my age :) and an evening wedding. Would be more appropriate for a night out.
Ended up not wearing since I got sick. Nice dress and pretty fabric.
Dress fits boxy and gaps above the butt..pretty dress but doesn't fit well. Didn't end up wearing it

Just loved this dress. It could have been a smidge tighter in the midsection because it came off a little boxy; but the medium was way too short. Im 5'3, 160 and ended up wearing a Large. It was a little bit looser than what I wanted, but thats better than being too tight! There was a great difference in size between the medium and large which was suprising. But overall, this was a gorgeous dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but it didn't fit
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit, way too small for me.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments; husband loved it too!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, sleeves fine for eating dinner. Paired with gold strappy heels for a charity gala.
Dress itself was adorable! Love the color and the lace but way to short for a work event.

links_reviews_title: I received SO many compliments on this dress. I didn't want to part with it!
links_reviews_text: This dress had the perfect fit and length. If anything, the sleeves were slightly long and went past my hands (not 3/4 length like in the picture).
Just a little too short for me.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it, It was a nice dress, but a bit too shiny for me.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, nice fabric
Cute dress, pockets are key, but for someone who is usually a 6 this ran too small to wear

links_reviews_title: Such a unique dress! Loved the metallic with the lace
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, if anything a little tight in the chest

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a summer wedding. I loved the style and the pockets were a huge plus! It does run tight in the bodice, but it was not uncomfortably tight. I was still able to wear my usual size. I also felt that this dress was a great length. Not too long and not too short! I got several compliments on it all night long!
The fit was tight around the top. Loved the pattern, lace and pockets. I got a ton of compliments!
Pockets were a plus as always! Fit was comfortable, a little tight on the ribcage but not unbearable. Color was lemon-lime, got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for my Beauty and the Beast themed bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: It fit well and was very comfortable, I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! Wore for an outdoor wedding in July. Very elegant
