links_reviews_text: Very tight around the rib cage (I don't even have fat there)- I'm usually a size 4 and the size 6 was hard to zip up due to the tightness in the rib cage. Also not light material and bunched up toward the middle (where it was tight) overall liked the dress though

I'm a little short, so the dress hit just above my knee. The chest was a snug fit but not uncomfortable. It was a little tight in the midsection/love handle area. The dress itself was stunning, though. I was really impressed that it was shipped in a garment bag! The color of the dress is a little misleading though. The website said it was yellow, but in person it's more of a neon highlighter green. It would look a little green on those with a fair complexion. Other than that, the dress was great!
I loved everything about this dress! The color, lace, pockets, length, & the fit! It was the perfect dress for a June wedding! I would absolutely rent it again.

My daughter wore this to a graduation dinner and loved both the lightness of the brocade fabric, in addition to the fact that the zipper travels up one pice of fabric so that it doesn't stick at all. She was especially pleased by the fact that the dress has pockets.

This was not the original dress that I rented but RTR was quick to notify me that the dress was not coming and sent this one instead. I was pleased with this dress. It was a little worn but no one noticed and it was fine. I wore this to a derby party and paired it with a navy fascinator for a nice contrast. It was a hit. The fit was a little snug at the top but not uncomfortable. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Totally classic. Received compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: Loved it.
This dress is unique, both in style and color, which is more neon/yellow-green than I realized. Still it was fun but you def need a spray tan! Overall, flattering and comfortable!

The dress is beautiful and glows in pictures. The breast area is a bit tight. I usually wear a size 2 or 4 and I went with the 4 in this dress. I loved the length, style, and color of this dress. This was my first RTR and was very happy with the experience!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so fun and formal at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Was perfect dress for a summer wedding. Also very comfortable and could wear any style bra.
Loved the material. Perfect length. Plus it has pockets! This dress is yellow - the picture makes it looks a little green.
Loved my first RTR experience! This dress is true to size. So fun but still classy. Got compliments all night long!

This dress is a soft metallic yellow color with beautiful details in the fabric & lace. It was a little large & a little short, but the backup size fit & I did end up wearing to a bridal shower I hosted. The length was longer than fingertip & still appropriate, just a tad short when I bent over. I have a slender build & small bust, so I wore the size 0. The fabric on skirt was a little worn, but overall, I really enjoyed wearing it. Beautiful & comfortable; would recommend for any dressy occasion. I am 5'6 & 125 lbs

The fit was perfect, only slightly tight around the rib cage. I did not need a bra either. The flower pattern is actually gold, but shines like silver in pictures. I ended up wearing silver shoes. Also the yellow is more green, but not in a bad way. The pockets were a fun bonus. The length and neckline made it classy though if you want to feel sexy and steal the show, this isn't the dress for you. I had so many compliments and no regrets!
The dress definitely ran small and wasn't really yellow. In pictures it looks yellow but in real life it's more of a lime green. Other then that it was super comfortable and stylish

Fun dress for a spring/summer event such as wedding or formal. Color is more lemon lime than picture, fit is true to size however if you have C or D cup bra size you may need to size up as fabric up top has no give. I am giving it 4 stars cause I didn't love the look of it as much as other rentals.
I loved this dress. Wore it for my bridal shower and received SO many compliments. It is very unique. I'm on the shorter side so it hit me right above the knee.
Fit very well. Super comfortable. Zipper and dress was kinda worn. Love this brand as well!

As other girls have already said, this runs a little small in the rib area so definitely get a size up. I also agree it's a little more greenish that yellow. I did get so many compliments all night and felt so comfortable dancing. Throw some nude heels on and a purple nail color and you'll feel and look great!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a southern, summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well -- got tons of compliments! It's a little tight in the chest for those with slightly larger busts. The pockets were a plus, but they were fairly small. I wore it with gold jewelry and nude pumps, and it worked well!

links_reviews_title: This was my first experience with RtR and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an April wedding and it worked out perfectly. It was comfortable all day and easy to dance in as well. The dress is a bit more green than pictures show. I wore nude shoes with sequins which made the metallic detail in the dress stand out even more. I also rented a pearl clutch and gold bangle bracelets which matched great.

I wore this dress for Easter when my boyfriend and I went to mass with his parents and then out to eat. This dress really fit perfectly! I love have unlimited! I will probably rent this dress again for a wedding in May.

This dress fit perfectly. I didn't end up wearing it because it was too summery for a fall wedding but I absolutely loved it and will rent it again in the summertime. It is more lime than yellow as other reviews have stated. but the shiny skirt and the pockets are perfect!

The dress fit well! The top was a little more snug on me than I preferred in the 4, but I wore it all night and it didn't cause any issues. I think the 6 would have been perfect. I loved the color of the dress and the pockets. Overall it was a super easy and fun dress to wear. I would definitely recommend this dress.
Very beautiful and quality dress. The fabric is relatively thick so I did not wear a bra. It was longer than I had anticipated. The color was lovely, and I got many compliments!

I LOVED this dress! The color was more of a yellow-green than light yellow like it looks in the picture. The dress ran true to size and it was very comfortable! I also loved that it had pockets. You can't tell in the picture on the website, but the flowers on the skirt are a shiny metallic color. This dress was perfect for the summer wedding I attended.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, comfortable, and different than anything else at wedding.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! The color and design were stunning. I loved the lace overlay at the top, and it was very comfortable to wear and true to size (I'm an 8 in real life but often a 6 on RTR). I wore it with gold shoes and turquoise nails and turquoise-accented jewelry. Perfect for a spring/summer wedding or event. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detail on this dress. I received numerous compliments!
links_reviews_text: Top part of the dress is a little tight so if you have a bigger bust, I'd go with a bigger back up size.

links_reviews_title: I felt very confident and pretty
links_reviews_text: I got a 6 and an 8 and the 6 fit perfectly. I'm 5'8" so I tend to have trouble with dress length but the length was a couple inches above the knee, so very appropriate for the wedding I wore it to. I could wear a regular bra with this, which is key. I got so many compliments! Also, love the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for an outdoor wedding and I got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Overall fit well but needed to wear spanks.

links_reviews_title: The AC broke so we were all dancing in an 80 degree enclosed space.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, nice for a conservative wedding. Everyone loved the color and design. I'm a bit busty for the rest of my body so waist vs chest is always a concern for me; I also have a short torso so fitted waist dresses are hit or miss, but this dress didn't give me any problems
This dress fit me perfectly. I liked the length, the fit, the material...the whole package. It is better quality than I am used to wearing and so I felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! The color and the fit were perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great and perfect for the outdoor summer wedding I attended. I wore a size 2, which is what I usually wear. The dress is fitted up top and flares out at the bottem, so it was perfect for dancing! I would defintiely rent this dress again. :)

The dress fit like a glove! The fabric was great, too, especially for an outdoor summer wedding - not too heavy but also not cheap feeling. The color was gorgeous, lace top made it feel elegant and the metallic flowers on the bottom really popped! My husband wants me to buy this dress, so I may even rent it again for another event down the road!!

I wanted this dress to work, but it was not terribly flattering on me. I sent it back. The material is beautiful, but it was too tight across my midsection. This dress made my stomach look huge, and it's not. Very disappointing. Still, it's a gorgeous dress. I recommend sizing up if you get this!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and print, not easy to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty, but the zipper wouldn't stay up at all without a pin. I think my torso was a bit too short because the back gapped along the sides.

links_reviews_title: The colors on this dress are so classy!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great! I opted for the smaller size because I like a tighter fit. The zipper in the lower part of the back kept unzipping slightly, but was no big deal. I felt so gorgeous in this dress!!

links_reviews_title: All the fabulous compliments I received!
links_reviews_text: I attended a local charity called the "Indigo Ball" where the only requirement was to wear something with Indigo in it. I easily found this dress on RTR and was in love! Fit great as I can get away with a smaller size with a fit and flare due to having a smaller upper half than bottom. Easy to wear and dance the night away in!

Loved this dress! It ran slightly large- i usually wear an 8 but went with the 6. It was very comfortable, classy and fun to dance in. Received tons of compliments- the fabric is beautiful and appropriately weighty.
Homecoming dance. Fit great. Good length for my petit 5'2" frame.

links_reviews_title: Tight around stomach. Back doesn't look that flattering
links_reviews_text: Pros: pretty colors perfect for fall, front part is appropriate (I didn't want something with cleavage as I was going to a fundraising event for St. Jude), cut of dress at the bottom was nice Cons: tight on my stomach so it was uncomfortable, didn't like how my back looked
It was true to size. I wore this to an outdoor fall wedding. It was comfortable all night. The material was light weight and perfect for a night of dancing!

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for a perfect Homecoming!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my daughter going to her first Homecoming dance. She is not much of a girly girl so didn't want anything low cut or tight. This was the perfect dress for her. She looked adorable and was comfortable all night!

I wore this to a wedding on NYE and it was perfect for the occasion. I received several compliments on the dress throughout the night. The length is great for petite ladies - the only minor issue was that the back gaped a little since the shoulder straps were a bit long but it wasn't a big deal. The dress is pretty fitted in the waist but it was comfortable to dance in all night. Overall, loved the dress and I would rent it again!

Ordered the size 8 and 10 (normally wear 8) but wore the 10 because the zipper on the 8 kept falling down (this was the reaaon for 4 stars rather than 5 star rating). Beautiful fabric. Cannot wear a bra with this dress because of the cut out on the back but still worked well for me. Very comfortable dress. Got lots of compliments all night! Classy in the front but a little sexy with the cutout in the back.

links_reviews_title: Impeccable customer service!! And amazing dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: So thankful for the amazing customer service when trying on my backup size and backup option (as original dress choice and size was unavailable) and neither fit! I was leaving for a work trip the following day and heading straight to an out of town wedding. RTR shipped me two more dresses one of which was the original dress I requested in the size I needed! This dress was beautiful and comfortable. The only con - as a person with a short torso, the top was a big large causing gaping on the back (as seen in the photo). This didn't bother me enough to stop me from wearing it OR renting again for another wedding!

I really liked the color and weighted material of this dress. Unfortunately the zipper would not stay put without a hook and eye closure. It would have worked with a belt, but didn't want to wry about it while dancing so I didn't end up wearing it. Might have been ok with a larger size but I didn't have time to try that out.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a junior league event!
links_reviews_text: This was a fun dress to wear! I️ loved the open back, but the zipper kept falling down! I️t was a little baggy in the chest area and in the back, but was tighter around the waist. But I️ loved the colors!!!

I wasn't crazy about the fit of the dress, the back seemed loose, but other people were. I received many compliments on the details of the dress, perfect for an outdoor fall wedding in Dallas! I'm usually a size 6 but I wore the size 4 because of how loose the back felt, I'd recommend getting a size smaller for this reason.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a November wedding in North Carolina. The fabric is beautiful and the cut is very flattering. I loved the high low and open back features. I am small chested, so it was a little roomy on top and gaped a little in the back, but the smaller size would not stay zipped up. I wish that the zipper had a clasp, but that is the only thing I would change about this dress. This was my first RTR and overall it was a great experience!
Beautiful, especially cool back, it just didnt fit so great, plus in october it was almost too much (pale) back!

links_reviews_title: Dress was gorgeous and fits true to size
links_reviews_text: Dress was gorgeous and fits true to size. It is also very well made and the floral pattern is very unique. I received a lot of compliments and I felt beautiful and comfortable all night. Two issues: the back of the dress gaps a little so I chose to use some dress tape, I also had to put a pin in the zipper to keep it from sliding down. Small issues - great dress!

links_reviews_title: relatively comfy, tons of compliments and very versatile
links_reviews_text: The zipper came down a bit at the end of the evening.

links_reviews_title: I felt so sexy yet very comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was so gorgeous. I got a ton of compliments. The front is a higher neck and is a bit more conservative. The hi-low look of the skirt is romantic. The band of the waistline sat right at my natural waist so it was very comfortable to wear. The flounciness of the skirt made it fun to dance and twirl around in. The back of the dress, though you can't see, is stunning. The open back is sexy but it's not extremely open. I didn't need to wear a bra at all (I'm a 34D). Because I'm so short waisted, the fabric did not lay entirely against my skin but it still looked incredible. I felt sexy and chic but understated and glamorous.

links_reviews_title: The dress was very flattering and made me feel confident and beautiful
links_reviews_text: I really loved wearing this dress to a wedding. The dress fit me perfectly and I loved the back-it was conservative yet playful all at the same time which is my style. The colors were beautiful and the length was perfect. I can't say enough great things about this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a friends wedding, had so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit a bit large so I went with my smaller backup size. The back cutout did not bother me as much as some of the other reviews, though I did notice it more sitting down. Great flow for dancing, yet very nice heavy material made it look and feel luxurious. Thick enough to wear without a bra, though having a silicone stick on felt nice for a larger bust. So many compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but the zipper was very annoying!
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size, and fit comfortably...however the biggest problem was the zipper!! It does not have a clasp at the top. During dinner when you're sitting down it was fine. But when we went out, it continuously fell down. If you rent this, make sure to use a safety pin!

links_reviews_title: Memorial day weekend in Newport RI!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit pretty true to size, it was a little snug at the waist as other reviews said. Also in the back, it was buckling out at the waist, I am short-waisted so I had to tape it to my skin in order for it to lay flat. I couldn't wear a bra but the fabric was thick so it was not an issue. It was a very fun dress and I got a lot of compliments on it. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Color of dress and length is perfect for formal affair.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Breast area was loose but still wearable. Most likely would fit perfectly someone with larger breast size. Wore a sticky bra with this dress since back of dress is revealing and would have shown if wore a regular bra. Overall, loved the dress and would rent again.

This dress was so flirty and fun to wear. The fit was perfect. I usually wear a 2 and that's what I wore in this dress. The top was large enough and held me in well with no bra. May not work well if you have a smaller chest. I am a D cup. I love that the back is longer than the front. It gives it a fun look for a formal dress. I am 5'1" and the length in the front was a few inches above my knees.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a dressy casual wedding in Alabama.
links_reviews_text: This dress ran small, especially at the waist! The 10 actually fit okay on me except for the waist so I had to do the 12 where the waist still felt tight! It was the perfect length and I loved that it was slightly lower in the back so I didn't have that awkward thing where your butt makes skirts too short. The dress itself was gorgeous. The fabric is really heavy and the colors are rich and lovely. I felt very pretty in this! I agree with other reviews that said you didn't need to wear a bra but I wanted some support and got a nubra, which worked out just fine. The only thing I didn't like was that, like other reviewers have mentioned, there's no hook-and-eye clasp at the top of the zipper so it is prone to falling down. I had to get my fiance to yank it up as hard as he could and then try very hard to not dislodge it for the rest of the night! (I'm sure that if the dress fit a little more loosely this wouldn't have been such a big deal.) Luckily there wasn't that much dancing but if you wanted to get your groove on, I would choose something a little more secure. I don't think I would wear this again, because of the frustrating zipper problem, but it was so pretty and well made and I am happy that I did get to wear it once!

links_reviews_title: Everyone asked me where I got my dress
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size. The only down side is the zipper kept going down throughout the wedding.

I ordered a size 0 in this dress and probably should have gotten a size 2 which is my normal size. The dress still fit but the opening in the back bulged at the sides because the dress was small on me. Also the zipper doesn't have a hook & eye so it kept opening up. I ended up fastening it with a safety pin. Overall, great rental.

The fabric was so beautiful and felt so lux (and thick enough where I didn't need a bra. I'm a 36C) it was perfect for my friends beachside wedding. The waist fits a little tight so my backup size (10) fit around my waist but the torso was a bit loose. So not a perfect fit but not super noticeable. Overall very happy!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for new year's eve
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a new years eve party in Brooklyn. I danced like a fool and loved the full skirt! Open back meant I couldn't wear a bra, which is usually a problem for my Ds, but the front was tight enough that I was ok to go braless! Pretty dress and great experience. The fabric looks dark in person; it doesn't appear as green and bright as it does in the photos here.

links_reviews_title: Perfect choice for work holiday party
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for my boyfriend's work holiday party and was very happy with my choice. In my experience the fit ran small, I typically wear a 4-6 and even the 6 was a little tight in the arms area but actually seemed to loosen a little throughout the night and was overall very comfortable. Perfect for winter because of thick material and the pattern, which is more subtle than in the RTR picture but beautiful even in the dark. Very classy but back is amazing. First RTR experience and will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so gorgeous in person. It made me feel so stylish and classy!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great, the length was perfect-not too short. I got so many complements!! I can't say enough, it was simply perfect for my company's big NYC holiday party.
This dress was gorgeous!! I loved the open back! The only thing that I had a tiny issue was with the zipper riding down a bit. Besides that, I loved the dress!

Wore this dress for a wedding cruise and received tons of compliments! The material was thick, but the dress was still breathable without being too heavy. The colors were the perfect shade of colors (not too bright or dark) and the gold detailing on the dress really popped. The only con is that the material tends to bunch at the seam where the bodice connects to the skirt (because the material is so thick), which made the dress look slightly unflattering at specific angles.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I normally range between 8 & 10 in formal dresses depending on where they are most fitted. I wore the 10 in this dress due to lack of stretch in the waist area and lock for the zipper. I commonly run a size smaller on top so the sz.8 fit my bust area best but my hips and booty called for the 10. It was no surprise that I had to size up to accommodate my bottom half. This dress was very comfortable and got dozens of compliments! I could dance without any fussing. Honestly it was hard to send this dress back! The only con for me and it seems like for other reviewers as well was the zipper. It would fall about an inch every time I moved. I spent a lot of the night pulling it back up.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Stunning but not overpowering
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. The open back is fun. The other wedding guests loved the look and it felt perfectly appropriate. Not too loud, but beautiful and eye catching. I'm short 5'1" and the length was perfect.

I really liked this dress. I loved the open back and the gold in the pattern. I rented this for a fall wedding, but it ended up being a really hot day. The thick fabric got hot. I have a long torso and the waist was about 1-2" above my natural waist. Overall, this dress was beautiful and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: The colors in this dress were perfect for an evening fall wedding. The materiel was nice and thick and did not wrinkle. My only critique is that it was a bit big on the top, especially because I wore a backless stick on bra.

I wore this to a September wedding. I loved the jewel tones. It was very comfortable and true to size. I wore the 4 only because the 2 felt a little tight around the arms. I would recommend a stick on bra or none at all. I didn't have any issue with the zipper coming down as others had mentioned. Everyone loved it-especially the back!

This dress fit like a glove, and I had so much fun dancing in it all night at a friend's wedding. Beautiful high quality textile. Flattering waistline (excellent cut for ladies who are on the shorter side). Snug yet comfy fit across the chest so no need for a bra. I would definitely recommend this fun and flirty frock xx

This is the second time I rented this dress. I absolutely love the fit and how comfortable yet stylish I feel in it. It does run big, definitely not a fitted dress, which is why I love it so much! Just the right amount of sass!
I wore this to a retirement party and it was perfect. I received many compliments. The fit is loose but flattering. I would wear again, I could see this dress being easy to wear for many occasions.

Wore this to an outdoor wedding and it was great. The dress runs large so I sized down- it was the perfect mix between showing shape but still having a little looseness which I loved. The color is awesome and the ruffle neck detail was the perfect addition to jazz the dress up. I also loved that it didn't wrinkle at all! Would definitely buy if it was an option!
Ran big, so I would suggest ordering a size down.
Great dress just runs large and not form fitting at all. I even sized down! The dress was not right for Vegas. I would have worn to work or a more conservative event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work cocktail event
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an evening work event and loved it. Runs large so I wore a size smaller than usual. The neckline was a little low, so it was a work event I wore a tank underneath - it didn't take away from the dress at all. Would definitely wear again!

The dress was nice and fit fairly well. But be aware it definitely runs big. I wore the xs and typically i would wear a small or medium. Definitely size down. I wish it were a little more form fitting at the waist and the color appeared darker in person then in the pictures. Otherwise i was happy with it and did receive a lot of compliments
This dress was a success! It is the perfect shift and I was comfortable all night long.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, so comfortable & received numerous compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was SO cute & comfortable! I would definitely recommend renting it. I wore it to a roof top wedding in Indiana, and even though it was hot the dress definitely hid the fact that I was sweating lol. Plus it's a really high-end soft quality fabric so that added to it's comfort-ability.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering and the color is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: This was my second time ordering this dress. The first time, I selected the M and L (even though all the reviews said it ran large!) and they were both way too big. I wore the medium but it wasn't that flattering, as it was very baggy and just didn't seem like it fit right. This time, I ordered the small and it made such a difference! It fit beautifully and I really loved the neckline, which is dramatic without being too lowcut. The color is absolutely stunning in person. Probably my favorite dress I've worn from RTR.

Wore this to a casual wedding ceremony but would totally work in something more formal. Fabric was forgiving and not super heavy. I wore the back up medium (ordered large) and it was still a bit loose but not in an unflattering way. Ruffle detail at the neckline is adorable and the dress was just comfortable--no tugging/adjusting necessary. The neckline is a bit lower than I expected, but not in a bad way--just enough to make sure I wore a bra that didn't come up too high in the middle. It's just about as short I would go, though I was self conscious or feared flashing my bits and pieces. Tall or leggy ladies, just take note. I would totally wear this again.
Great weight, perfect for early summer graduation party. Roomy fit but the cut was well done so it didn't hang. Lots of compliments!
Fit great and I usually wear a 10. I was able to wear this in a small. The ruffle wouldn't stay put, but it was cute for my niece's wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. The dress cute was very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Light and flirty.

I rented this dress for a Sunday afternoon wedding. It was perfect. The dress is a little longer on me since I'm under 5" but still a great length. Note the front is cut low so if you are not comfortable showing cleavage this dress is not for you. This was my first rental and I was very pleased.

Easy, stylish dress that can be worn for multiple occasions. I dressed it down a bit with a sweater and simple jewelry for work. Comfortable, light fabric that's a beautiful blue color. Length was perfect as well. Great staple dress for any wardrobe--loved it so much I bought it!
Really love it!

Rented this dress for an award shows where I was representing my company. Simple blue dress while still being flattering and cute. It was a bit low cut and that had me concerned but not enough to change course and wear something else. The fabric was comfortable and the length was good. With heels it felt a little short but again, not enough to wear something else. The inside of the ceremony was a bit chilly so paired it with just a simple long white sweater.
I think this dress would be so flattering on every body type! It was really easy and comfortable to wear.

Rented this as a back up for a rehearsal dinner and loved it so much I wore it to an offsite work meeting. Little low cut for work but the overall fit was great! It runs large so you can size down. It was so comfortable and the ruffle is a cute touch. This is a fantastic dress!!

The dress was great! It fit perfectly and was super comfy. I had tons of complements on it. My only issue was when I was outside the wind kept blowing the ruffle collar into my face but other then that a great dress!

Loved the stretch and light weight fabric. Hey comfortable to wear all night. I wear this for my rehearsal dinner where we barbecued and had to set up the reception site. It was comfortable yet classy. Very pretty color!

Loved this dress! The v-neck is *very* deep. However, I'm pretty modest and it wasn't too deep for me :) The website has the size listed as "XS," but it's actually a "petite small" so the proportion was much better on my 5'4" frame. It fits loosely, so you don't have to suck in or be uncomfortable. The color was a beautiful, bright navy and not too dark. I paired this dress with the Kendra Scott "Nyla Emerald" earrings and nude sandals (like the model). By the way, these pictures don't do this dress justice. Just wanted to add the pics for an idea of how it looks.

I chose this dress to wear for an extended family picture session. I've gained a little weight recently so I wanted something that wasn't too form fitting. After reading the reviews, I decided to rent a size S but I really should have gone down to an XS! The dress was very comfortable though. I wish the ruffled part would have stayed up better but it still looked fine even though it fell.

links_reviews_title: Classy (and comfy!!) dress for family wedding
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Great rental value! Ordered this dress to wear to a family wedding, so wanted classy and comfortable for a night of dancing. This dress fit the bill! It does run VERY large. I normally wear a M, and followed reviews and got a M and S. Wore the S, and it was still very large - think I could have easily gone with the XS. Was a bit low cut - again, think the XS might have helped here- tried some fashion tape but wasn't sticking. Ended up with a pin under ruffles to my bra and it worked perfectly!! Would rent from the runway again!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a beautiful sunny summer wedding or event
links_reviews_text: The dress runs big perfect length even for someone short . Not a heavy material and falls nice to the body.
The dress was perfect. Outside wedding comfortable all night.
I've rented this twice and my sister has rented it in black. It is flattering and comfortable. A good go-to

links_reviews_title: Simple and comfortable, but flattering and fun!
links_reviews_text: This was a last minute rental for a fundraiser, and I loved it! Super comfortable - would definitely wear it again, or a similar style from this designer.

Needed a light and airy dress for a wedinng in Texas in June. This was perfect. The dress was nice but wish I would've picked something more fancier. My only complaint was after being outside for a while the dress had slight smell to it. Dry cleaning chemical smell.

Wore this for a night out when I didn't know our venue ahead of time. This dress was perfect because it can definitely be dressed up or down. And the navy looked wonderful against my white sash! Would love to own this dress as an LBD--little BLUE dress! :)
Absolutely loved this dress. Simple elegance! Great material and stunning color. Fit perfect in all the right places. This dress was make for me. I give it a 12 on a scale of 1-10!

I wanted to keep this! I usually wear a 10 and the M was a great fit for a rehearsal dinner in June in NYC. The Large also looked ok but was longer and wider. I got so many compliments and my husband kept telling me how sexy it looked. SO easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a bridal shower. Could be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Beautiful shade of navy; however it does run large, so size down!

I rented this for a recent wedding I attended and loved this dress! It definitely runs large! I typically wear a medium and the xs fit like a glove. The only downside for me was the neckline. I had to constantly adjust so my bra wouldn't show and wish I had some tape to keep it in place. Other than that, I got tons of compliments and really felt comfortable in this dress!

I got my usual size, a Med, because with my boobs, etc, I never wear smaller, but I felt like I was swimming in this dress. I wore it with the idea that I would keep my hands on my hips or something when not at my desk (because it looked great with my waist defined). It ended up looking better than I expected with heels and whatnot, but it still wasn't my favorite.

Elegant and simple, this dress is great for any work event or professional setting! This runs true to size and we recommend going up one size for your backup. This is great for any cup size and is comfortable throughout the waist. This may be work with a standard bra, and the fabric has no stretch. Pair this with a black blazer and black heels for the perfect work day!

Wore to evening engagement party. Definitely runs large! I normally wear an 8 and wore the small, it was not tight at all. I've gained weight and am very self conscious, this dress made me feel smaller and was very comfortable. I have a large bust, top is a little low cut, but can be worn with a regular bra, a definite plus!
Gorgeous dress and color. Runs very large and was very low cut. I should have rented the XS . I typically wear a size 6 so even the small ran very large.

Wore this for a date night and I would definitely wear it again! It was so comfortable, and the color was beautiful! It is pretty low cut (which is why it's 4 stars) because I had to make sure I wasn't showing too much. I received several compliments on the dress! Would be great for a date, wedding or party!

links_reviews_title: It was easy and convenient. We had a hiccup with my back sizes. RTR offered additional dresses.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I'm typically between a size 6 and 8. This dress was comfortable and sexy

links_reviews_title: Great cocktail dress for fancy event
links_reviews_text: Got many compliments and loved the crochet type "lace" arms and trim. Packed well for out of town trip (no wrinkles) and held shape well...almost too well. Is a little more clingy material than I normally wear and will easily show panty lines and/or poochy tummy so had to get a great Spanx undergarment to ensure it was smoooth and pretty. But loved the final look!

This dress is 100! The length, fit, and design couldn't have been better! It was in my hearts for a long time before I had a chance to wear it, but it was worth the wait. I think this is definitely for someone on the taller side though. I'm 5'8" and the length was perfect (in my opinion). Would definitely rent again - might even rent it in red next time.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this, but super solid choice!
links_reviews_text: This dress did fit incredible! The arms were a pinch snug, but was still comfortable.

This dress fit like a dream. I still have a little postpartum weight on but the dress made me feel beautiful. I'm 5'6", 145lbs and 38D. The small fit like a glove, but the medium would have worked too. So many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits great. The Small fit but I wore the Medium just to be a little more comfortable. Lace on the bottom is lovely but there is a spot where it peaks out that I feel they need to fix up a bit. Almost like the lace ripped a little.

links_reviews_title: A week later... still getting compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was my dress for a black/white formal awards ceremony for work. It was classy, appropriate, and memorable! Love, love, love this dress! Would love to wear it again!!

The fit of this ran a little large, but not large enough to be a problem. It was nice to have a little room honestly :) the weight of the fabric is just heavy enough to look and feel expensive (and NOT see through). I was still cool during the evening outside wedding thanks to the breathable fabric and woven bottom and sleeves. I received so many compliments all night. I would absolutely recommend this dress to anyone!

links_reviews_title: A great dress for a rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fun and classy - I received many compliments all night. I felt very comfortable as well! Good quality and fun little flare at the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a speaking engagement. Never received so many compliments on a dress before.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like it was made for me. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Great cocktail dress for a gala
links_reviews_text: I wore the small to a fundraiser gala and it was flattering but not too sexy, perfect for this event. Since I am petite, the dress ran a bit long for me, so make sure to choose your highest heels if you are 5'4 and under. Super comfortable and easy to put spanx on underneath to smooth it all out.
The arms are a lil tight but other that the fit is amazing!
I'm 5'10 so it's always a bit hard to find a dress that fits right. But this fit perfectly and was very comfortable. I was able to move around easily too.

So happy with this rental. Received several compliments from other wedding guests and random people in hotel. Its a girly yet sophisticated dress with very beautiful detailing in the lace and scalloped layers at hem. The dress material is forgiving but you need to wear seamless panties to avoid VPL.

links_reviews_title: Wrinkles easily.... Very nice dress. Looked great all day for work then out.
links_reviews_text: Loved!!! True to size. Will rent in red
The small fit well surprisingly.

I rented this for family pics and loved it! I would buy this dress for future events in a heartbeat. It fit like a glove and is thicker material which a like. Will definitely rent again unless I purchase it.

pictures simply cannot do this dress justice. i mean, i want to buy it. in both colors. besides fitting like a glove and hugging my curves - even the dip atop my derriere - in the most classy way, it was extremely comfortable, standing or sitting. the lace detail is stunning, although the ruffled hem has a tendency to curl up while one is walking. an easy fix, however, with the flick of a wrist. i will most definitely rent this again!

This was my first RTR experience and it was great. The dress and it's back up arrived on time. The medium fit like a glove but I chose the large so that I would have a little more breathing room. The dress was beautiful, looked great and I felt like million bucks. I will definitely rent a dress for the next event I have.

links_reviews_title: It got good great and moved great...my first rent am done definitely not my last!!
links_reviews_text: I loved how the dress was made. It was form fitting but it was well made and moved with your body. At no time was it ever too tight or looked like you were going to pop out. I truly loved it! I'm 5'4" and 160 lbs...medium was perfect for me.
This dress is form fitting and is not forgiving. I loved it but I couldn't have worn it around business associates. I doubt you can wear spanx underneath either.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my aunt's 60th birthday
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. not the most forgiving dress, but still incredible. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I wanted the lace to be more see through like the picture on the RTR model.

This dress is so comfortable! The material is thick but also very stretchy. The details are so cute and make it a standout LBD. My favorite part was the ruffle at the bottom! Do yourself a favor and order it!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress if you're in PR and on a formal red carpet. Comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. I'm 5'3" and I was concerned the dress would look too long, but it was actually perfect. I would love to own this dress and got many compliments.

Great elegant dress,have some stretch, nice detailing on skirt & sleeves, it was perfect for spring/ fall weather- not to warm not to cold,it was easy to wear to Palace tour- look great in photos , easy to walk in & then go to dinner! I am thinking to buy it, will re rent for sure
The dress fit prefect!!

links_reviews_title: This is my Third dress rental. The quality of the dresses never disappoint!
links_reviews_text: Fit Very well. Nice length. Sleeves were not tight at all. Hugged me in all the right places. True to size. Loved this dress!

Very Pretty Dress.. Should Have Went Salsa Dancing Afterwards. Material Is Stretchy Plus Hugs. I Would Rethink Wearing It For A Summer Event That Is Outside. Thank God This Wedding Blessed Me With Workable AC!

links_reviews_title: Fit great but definitely shows Everything underneath
links_reviews_text: Fits great, got so many compliments! However- the fabric is thick but still shows every line for anything you wear underneath (spanx, underwear, natural curves, EVERYTHING). Still felt good in it but I had to remove the spanx and suck in all night.

RTR sent this dress when my backup size was not available. It was so much nicer than my selection. At first I thought I wouldn't be able to fit into it but the fabric is stretchy. I did need to wear spanx to help with the pouch. The lace part is not very see thru so I could swear it to a work retirement party. Thanks RTR for the nice surprise

links_reviews_title: Very unique dress. Classic with gorgeous detailing.
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely beautiful. The dress hugged my curves, and was elegant while being sexy. The lace was beautiful and quality. I would love to purchase this dress.

Dressed served its purpose. It was a last minute decision. RTR sent this dress to me because my original was too tight. The material is a little heavy. But the dress was pretty. Wasn't sexy enough for me. But the little lace details were cute. I did receive compliments on my dress. I like it but didn't love it. Dress fit true to size. Was very comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: It worket but wasn't my favorite
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for a wedding. I chose it because based on the reviews and because it seem to photograph well. The photo of the model looks so much better than the actual dress. The fabric was woven and a bit loose and I only had the larger one as a backup based on the reviews. Since my body has changed lately I wasn't comfortable wearing something too tight or too short. But at the end It worket out.
I loved the details of the dress. Very comfortable and easy to pack!
Rented this for a birthday dinner in LA and have to say it's by far one of my favorites. Instant glam but also classic. Would rent again in a second. Recommend!

This was my "second choice" dress but I absolutely loved it. The material is a heavier knit so it's perfect for colder weather events. It is pretty form fitting so you'll need some smoothing undergarments. The center panel is NOT see-through like on the model - only the sleeves and midriff part. I got tons of complements and it was super comfortable!

This dress i unfortunately didn't wear because it was a little tight in the bum for the conservative event I was attending but would be great for a wedding or party dress Sheet on front so I was going to wear a can I underneath The laced bottom is a nice touch- very comfortable stretchy material I'd say it runs a tad small but maybe it's supposed to be very fitted Next time I'd order the small :)

Felt so classy and beautiful in this dress! I loved how it was conservative, yet sexy with the sheer detailing. Running true to size, we recommend sizing down for backup since the fabric is very stretchy and forgiving. It is a fitted silhouette that will really flatter your curves and will work for any bust size. It's knee to tea length. At 5'1", it hit about 3 inches below my knee. I loved the tea length on me, it was sleek and sassy and I loved how it looked when I walked. The fabric is thick so it is a warm option for chilly weather. I can't wait to wear this for a fancy dinner date! Would look great with a pair of statement earrings.
This is a great dress! Perfect for a work holiday party; I got so many compliments! It ran a tiny bit small but with the right shapewear it was fine. Loved it!

The stock photos make it appear as though the chest panel is much more sheer than it really is. That was disappointing, as it makes the dress more conservative than I would have liked. Still, it was very pretty, high quality, and different than your standard LBD.
Formerly beautiful dress with a lot of stretches and sags. Fabric is lovely thin mermaid-sequence blue with subtle dark shimmer.
Fits like a glove in the most complementary ways

I love this dress, I really do. I'm normally a 0 and they only had a 2 so I took a chance based on some of the reviews and I'm glad I did. I definitely recommend going up a size. This fits snug and has some stretch but I think if I had the zero it would've been too tight and would make it tricky to sit down. I didn't notice any issues with the slit in the back but being 5'3" it's pretty long on me but I really enjoy the length. I wanted something to wear to our office holiday dinner party that was both festive and understated. I think this nails that. One thing--the neck is a little tighter than I expected it to be. It's not bad, I just wanted expecting it to hit my throat in the spot it does so be aware of that if you have any neck sensitivities. Otherwise highly recommend just be sure to go up a size (or two).

Dress was true to size, very form fitting and hugged in all the right places. It is very shimmery, not a plain or muted blue by any means. I wore to a wedding and got multiple compliments. I gave it four stars rather than five as the back slit went very, very high! This is not a dress you're going to dance away the night in; I made my husband follow behind me when going up the stairs to make sure I didn't show off my "assets." Great dress, but more for a formal occasion without a lot of movement or dancing.
Wore to a black tie wedding. It was perfect! I ended up wearing the bigger size.
A gorgeous dress! I'm 5'3" and I liked how the length was midi on me. The sparkle to the material make it perfect for an evening formal event. I'm usually a 8 and the 10 fit me perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Very classy. Perfect for a day to evening event.
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I typically wear a size 4 but I went up a size for this one. Loved the material (although it bunched a bit). Slit up the back is really high

links_reviews_title: Shimmering blue dress for formal occasion
links_reviews_text: Beautiful blue shimmer. Dress is form fitting but stretchy. I usually wear a 2 but wore a 4 and could have sized up one more. I'm 5'8" and this was just bellow my knee. Slit in back is quite high but appropriate. Loved this dress. Really fun to wear and different color in a sea of black formal wear.
Fits true to size but the slit in the back was a bit of a problem for a work event. I couldn't sit down.
great fabric, comfortable and flattering
Got this dress for a small home wedding And it was perfect. It fit my curvy body to perfection! I would definitely rent again!!!!

This dress is far more sparkly in person than the photos let on, but that's a good thing! It definitely walks the line of formal/not if you are unsure how to dress for a wedding. I wore a size up; I probably could have fit my size as the material stretches but it would have been very unforgiving and the zipper is quite cheap so it may not have gotten up. The dress bunches a bit in a flattering way. If you are tall the back slit comes almost all the way up, but amazingly still doesn't show anything!! I loved this dress but one warning- the material is odd and I wouldn't wear on a hot day! It was 70 degrees at our wedding and until the temperature went down in the evening I was dying!
This dress is made all a stretchy material that clings to you. It's super comfortable and gets a lot of compliments. I wore it for a fundraising Gala and pictures with my husband.
Love the dress and little glimmer it has. Fits snug, get one size up. Material stretches just enough. Dress has a long slit in the back, makes it easy to walk in, it's a fun dress.

Loved the chic simplicity of the Blue Medina Dress! Running true to size we recommend sizing up for backup if your're curvier, and down if you're smaller framed. The fabric does have some stretch and allows comfortable room in the bust area for any bra you are interested in wearing. Slightly fitted in the waist and hips, falling about knee to tea length depending on the heels paired with it. This piece would look great with earrings or a stand out clutch!
Loved the dress. Not my usual LBD. The shimmery navy was fun! It was super stretchy and fitted. Plan on wearing spanx ; ) and the edges were a bit itchy but not awful.
This dress was just perfect. I am 5'2'' and it hit about mid calf. I am smaller chested with a booty, 120 lbs, so the little bit of stretch was great in the size 2.

Like many other reviewers, the dress does run on the smaller side. That said, I could comfortably fit into my regular size 2 (although I can often size down to a 0 in many brands). The dress is very form fitting and flattering for those who have a lean torso. The dress also has a VERY high slit - which at my height was a bit of a problem - but nothing that I couldn't solve with a little fashion tape and a slip. Once I fixed the slit, the dress was incredibly comfortable and I danced all night. Highly recommend if you are lean (and handy)!
I wanted to rent this for a wedding, but it was unavailable at that time. So I reserved it to try on for future reference. Love this dress and cannot wait until I have a place to wear it.

Beautiful fabric and style but not for busty women. Hips fit fine (size 8) but could not zip past the bust. I usually wear a 6-9. In this style, the 12 would fit the bust and be too big in the hips. The style is beautiful and so is the fabric.

links_reviews_title: Not as comfortable as other dress option ordered
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing either the 4 or 6 because the dress was too tight and less comfortable than the other dress I rented.
loved how this dress seemed understated from afar, but up close was sparkly and sexy! amazing fit, though a little snug, so I went a size up. highly recommend for a formal affair with some flair!

links_reviews_title: This was easy last minute, not the most fabulous, but got it done.
links_reviews_text: Very stretchy fabric, for snug but stretch made it comfortable. VERY high slit in the back so I had to be pulling it down and careful not to walk too fast or you could totally see undies. Ordered 10 as back up but it was very bunched up in areas, didn't fit snug.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of sparkle, and cover, for a fancy work event.
links_reviews_text: Material was not particularly thick, so might call for spanx if your so inclined. (I actually didn't wear spanx, and still felt great in it, but I usually prefer a thicker fabric just in case!)
Not right for my body style

I rented this, intending to wear it to work, but thought no way when I got it home. The material was way too shiny, almost glittery, in a way that didn't feel professional or work-classy. I would have considered wearing it to an event where glittery sparkle was more appropriate.
Not good for non skinny girls, reflect all the drawbacks of your body
It is beautiful and dressy, it is a bit stretchy, but still ran a bit small. getting the next size up.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but a little tired.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and had a lot of stretch and give, but the dress looked worn. The fabric was peeling around the sleeves. I didn't pick to wear this dress for my occasion because of the condition the dress was in.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: Was too sparkly for a conservative work event.

links_reviews_title: Casino themed work event. Fun, sparkly, and form fitting.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a casino themed work event and it was just right. Just enough "sexy" for the casino theme, but classy as well. I have a large bust and the little bit of stretch in the material made it fit perfectly. The only reason I gave it four stars is because the slit in the back goes up very high. It made it just a bit uncomfortable at times. Otherwise, GREAT choice!

Pretty dress, but the size 2 was too small (and I am normally a size 0). As far as quality, the interior of the dress has large seams, which make it look cheap. But, the exterior looks nice, so over all I would rent this again in a larger size.
Very flattering. I would definitely order a size up.
The material was thin, the fit was okay but it was more shiny than it looks in the picture. I decided not to wear it.

links_reviews_title: This fabric has a sparkle that I wasn't expecting from the picture and the waist is TINY.
links_reviews_text: This fabric has a sparkle that I wasn't expecting from the picture and the waist is TINY.

I loved the look and feel of this dress. It's structured, but has a little bit of stretch. I am 6'0 and generally wear a 6 or 8. I would have been able to wear the 6 if not for the slit in the back. The slit came up so high that I could not wear the dress without my underwear being visible. Clearly this isn't a problem for everyone, but I was disappointed that I couldn't wear this one because of it.
I rented this for work, however when looking at the picture it doesnt do it much justice in the fact that it is very sparkly. Too much for work.

Love the fabric, inside it reminded me of scuba suit material, comfortable thick and stretchy. The color is really pretty. I have always worn a size 2 or 4. I ordered a 4 in this dress. This is my first order with RTR so maybe all of these designers run extremely small- but to me this dress felt like a 0 at most. I could zip it and it was still comfortable so i can only imagine how comfy it would be when it is the correct size! I recommend, just order a few sizes UP

links_reviews_title: This dress is really really tight. I am normally a size 4, but it fit like a size 2. Go up a size.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, I couldn't wear it because it was so tight. Cute dress, but def. go up a size.

links_reviews_title: This dress was super comfortable and is great for semi-formal to formal events.
links_reviews_text: If you're big busted, this dress might be too constrictive. The slit in the back is quite high. This is super comfy and would work for a range of events. It is more sparkly than it appears in the photos.
